headline: Human Rights Watch Yokurudzira Kuti Vana Vasashandiswa Mumapurazi eFodya
text: Zimbabwe iri kukurudzirwa nesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reHuman Rights Watch, kuti ichengetedze kodzero dzevana vachiri pasi pezera, avo vari kushandiswa muminda yefodya zvisiri pamwero. Sangano iri raparura gwaro reongororo yarakaita pakushandiswa kwevana vadiki mumapurazi efodya munyika. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana vari kushandiswa mumapurazi efodya zvinoita kuti muchetura we ‘nicotine’ upinde muganda ravo uchikonzera zvirwere. VaMavhinga vanoti sangano ravo rayambira hurumende pamusoro pezvirwere izvi uye kuti idzike mitemo yakasimba inobatsira vana ava uye vanhu vakuru vari kushanda vasina kupfeka mbatya dzinodzivirira muchetura uyu. “Pane chirwere chikuru chinobva mukubata fodya, ingava nyoro kana yakaoma, kana paya painopiswa chinonzi muchetura we ‘nicotine’. Kana vana vachishanda mumunda vanenge vachinzwa kupera simba, kuda kurutsa, kusvotwa kana kuita sevane nyongo. Ndizvo zvimwe zviratidzo zvekuti pane chirwere ichocho,” VaMavhinga vakaudza Studio 7. “Takaonazve kuti vana nevabereki nevarimi vefodya vazhinji, vange vasingatozivi dambudziko iroro.” VaMavhinga vanoti vakaita hurukuro nehurumende pamusoro penyaya iyi uye vakavimbiswa kuti hurumende ichaedza kugadzirisa nyaya iyi kutanga nekuisa mitemo yakasimba inochengetedza hutano hwevana. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inonyorerana Chibvumirano neKambani yeKunze Kuti Ishambadze Marasha
text: Hurumende yanyorerana chibvumirano neimwe kambani yekunze kwenyika kuitira kuti ibatsirwe mukutengesa marasha kunyika dzakaita seIndia neJapan. Vachitaura pakunyoreranwa kwechibvumirano ichi ne Victoria Consulting, gurukota rinoona nezvezvicherwa, VaWinston Chitando, vati donzvo rehurumende nderekuti nyika iwanirwe kwekutengesera marasha kuIndia uye kuitira kuti iwane mari yekushandisa mukuchera marasha aya. VaChitando vati Zimbabwe inofungidzirwa kuti ine marasha anosvika mabhiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu ematani asi pagore kuri kucherwa matani ari pakati pemamiriyoni maviri nemamiriyoni matatu. VaChitando vatiwo India ndiyo inotenga marasha akawanda pagore zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika. Vachitaura pamusangano mumweyo, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutora mukana wekudyidzana wakanaka uripo pakati payo neIndia. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva kuti kambani yeVictoria Consulting yakamboshanda nenyika dzipi, uye kuti vakuru vayo ndivanani. Asi vaimbove mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvezvicherwa muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaGift Chimanikire, vati havaoni kuti zvakanaka kuti Zimbabwe itsvage misika yekutengesera marasha kunze kwenyika, ipo pari zvino kusiri kucherwa marasha anokwana munyika. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vatiwo havaoni zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe itsvake kambani yekunze inonotsvakira Zimbabwe misika yemarasha. VaMuchichwa vatiwo zviri nani kuti kushandiswe hukama hwagara huripo nedzimwe nyika. Dandemudande rebazi rezvezvicherwa rinoti Zimbabwe ine marasha akanaka, uye ine nzvimbo makumi maviri nepfumbamwe dzine marasha. Makambani maviri chete munyika, Hwange Colliery neMakomo Resources, ndiwo ari kunyanyochera marasha. No media source currently available

headline: Zvimwe Zvizvarwa zvekuChina Zvopomerwa Mhosva Yekutyora Kodzero dzeVashandi muZimbabwe
text: Mamwe makambani ezvizvarwa zveChina zviri muZimbabwe ari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora mitemo yevashandi sezvo vasiri kuvarapisa kana vachinge vakuvara vari pabasa. Vamwe vashandi ava vanosanganisirawo VaTobias Mleya vepakambani yeSouth Mining kuHwange vakagwinwa nemagetsi pakambani inochera marasha iyi. Asi vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chavati vabatsirwa nacho nekambani iyi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakuru vekambani iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Mumwe mushandi akatumira Whatsapp kuStudio 7 akati anonzi Collen anotiwo akadimburwa minwe ari pabasa asi haana rubatsiro rwaakawana kana chikafu chaicho kubva kukambani yaaishandira yezvimwe zvizvarwa zvekuChina zvekare. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanogara mune zviwanikwa nezvicherwa reCentre for Natural Resource Governance VaFarai Maguwu vanoti pane nyaya dzevashandi vakawanda vari kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo nezvimwe zvizvarwa zvekuChina kusanganisira kupondwa asi hapana zviri kuitwa nehurumende kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi. No media source currently available Sezvo tichitema tisina divi ratinorerekera, tabata gurukota rezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima avo vanoti kana paine vashandi vanenge vakuvara vari pabasa vanofanira kumhan’ara kubazi ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Dambudziko reMari muZimbabwe
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru enyika, Va John Mangudya, vave nevhiki rimwe chete vaparura mabond notes kuti vayedze kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari. Gavhuna webhanga guru enyika, Va John Mangudya, vave nevhiki rimwe chete vaparura mabond notes kuti vayedze kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzvezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanhu vari kutambira mabond notes nekuti hapana chembwa sezvo tenzi vararira mutakura. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwa neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaCalvin Mudzingiri, vanodzidzisa paUniversity of Free State ku Bloemfontein kuSouth Africa. Mari yakaparurwa naVaMangudya pari zvino ishoma zvikuru sezvo ichingosvika mamiriyoni gumi. Asi mutungamiri weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaDavison Norupiri, vanoti mabond notes ari kushanda sezvange zvakatarisirwa. Doctor Chitamabara vanoti kuparura mari dze bond notes kuzvisikira moto muziso. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo naVaMudzingiri vanoti ma bond notes akawanda anoshandiswa kutsvaira madhora ekuAmerica mashoma achiri pamusika wemari. VaChitambara vanoti kungodira mari kunopawo kuti inflation ibva yanyanya kukwira. Vatiwo hurumende mune remangwana inoti ichada kuparura mari yayo asi izvi zvinoda nguva. KuWestern Union vanhu vanonzi vari kukwanisa havo kutora mari yavo. Asi kuti mari yema bond notes iyi icharamba ichishanda zvakaenzana nedhora rekuAmerica here? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti mhinduro inowanikwa kumakore eku1950 apo Sir Thomas Gresham vaive maneja wa mambokadzi Elizabeth wekutanga, vakati kana paine mari mbiri dziiri kushanda panguva imwe chete imwe iine huremu hwegoridhe hwakawanda imwe iine hushoma, ine goridhe rakawanda inoiswa mudura imwe yacho ndoinoshandiswa. Uyu ndomutemo unonzi Gresham Law nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinotenderana kuti mari yemuZimbabwe iite chiremera, zvinoda kuti nyika igadzire zvinhu zvakawanda zvekutengesa kunze kwete kungodhinda mari. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Vanoti Dhora reZimbabwe Harisi Kudzoka
text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti havana hurongwa hwekudzora dhora remuZimbabwe kunyange hazvo vati vari kuparura mari yemabond notes anotangira pamadhora maviri kusvika pamadhora makumi maviri munguva pfupi inotevera. Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti havana hurongwa hwekudzora dhora remuZimbabwe kunyange hazvo vati vari kuparura mari yemabond notes anotangira pamadhora maviri kusvika pamadhora makumi maviri munguva pfupi inotevera. VaMangudya vanoti zvavari kuita chete kuyedza kupedza dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika uye kukurudzira kuti vanhu vagadzire zvinhu zvekutengesa kunze kwenyika kuti Zimbabwe iwane mari yekunze. Asi vanoona nezvehupfumi mubato guru rinopikisa reMDC-T, VaTapiwa Mashakada, vati VaMangudya vari kubata vanhu kumeso uye zvavari kuita kudzora dhora remunyika sezvo hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere. VaMashakada vati zvoitwa munongedzo wenyika isiri kutongwa zvakanaka, huori uye kutadza kugadzirisa hupfumi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri webato rePeople’s Democratic Party uye vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTendai Biti. VaBiti vati zviri kuitwa naVaMangudya zvichaendesa nyika kuna taisireva. Asi VaMangudya vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuyedza kugadzirisa nyaya yehupfumi uho husina kumira zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veNRZ Vochemachema neKusabhadharwa Mari dzavo
text: Vashandi vekambani yeNational Railways of Zimbabwe, NRZ, vanoti vanga vachitarisira kuti hurumende ichabatsirawo kambani yavo mukuona kuti vashandi vayo vawaniswa mihoro yavo, iyo yave nemwedzi inodarika gumi nemishanu vasati vatambiriswa. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomirira vashandi veNRZ, reZimbabwe Amalgamated Railways Workers Union, VaKamurai Moyo vanoti vashandi veNRZ vari kushupika zvakanyanya zvekuti hurumende iri kuzviona asi hapana matanho airi kutora ekugadzirisa dambudziko ravo. "Tanga tichitarisirawo sevashandi kuti hurumende inofanirwa kubatsira railways kuti vabhadharewo chimwe chikwereti chedu, nekuti iye zvino vanhu vari kufa, vanhu vari kurwara, vamwe vari kusiya mabasa nezira dzakasiyanasiyana, vachingosiya zvikwereti kurailways," VaMoyo vanodaro. Sachigaro vebhodhi reNRZ, VaLarry Mavhima, mwedzi wapera vakatenda kuti kambani yavo iri kukundikana kubhadhara vashandi vayo mari dzemihoro idzo dzave kudarika mamiriyoni makumi mapfumbamwe emadhora, nekuda kwekuti haisi kushanda zvakakwana. VaMavhima vakazivisawo kuti dare remakurukota rakavapa mvumo yekuti vatsvage vanoda kubatana navo mumatanho avo ekumutsiridza kambani iyi. Asi VaMoyo vanoti hurongwa hwekuti kambani yeNRZ ibatane nevamwe vane mari hahuna kuipa, kana chete vashandi vasingazorasikirwa nemabasa. No media source currently available Gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, Doctor Joram Gumbo vanoti ichokwadi kuti NRZ ine chikwereti chevashandi chemari yakawanda, asi kambani iyi haisi kuita mari. "Mari inotambirwa navashandi inobva pabasa ravanoita. Kana pasina basa ravanoita hapana mari inouya, nokuti inobva kuna ani? havana basa," Doctor Gumbo vanodaro. Vanoti hurumende iri mushishi kutsvaga vanoda kubata neNRZ, asi vanowedzera vachiti pari zvino kambani iyi inotove nevashandi vakawandisa iyo isisina basa. Doctor Gumbo vanoti makambani aisimbopa NRZ basa akaita seemarasha, eshuga neesimende haacha basa raanoipa. No media source currently available

headline: Hondo Pakati peAir Zimbabwe neSouth African Airways Yoenderera Mberi
text: Hondo inotyisa yange yamuka pakati pekambani yeAir Zimbabwe neSouth African Airways inonzi haisati yanyatsopera zvopa kuti kufamba kwendege pakati penyika mbiri idzi kukanganisike. Kunetsana uku kwakatanga nemusi weChishanu zvakapa kuti ndege dzimbotadza kubhururuka zvichikonzerwa nenyaya yemamwe magwaro anonzi neSouth Africa ange asina kumira zvakanaka. Magwaro aya anonzi Foreign Operations Licenses. South Africa yakamisa ndege yeZimbabwe kubhururuka kubva kuJohannesburg ichienda kuHarare. Zimbabwe yakabva yamisawo ndege dzeSouth Africa kupinda kana kubuda munyika. Vanhu vazhinji vari kukanganiswa zvikuru mafambiro avo pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu VaJoram Gumbo vati mari iri kudiwa inosvika zviuru zvitatu pandege imwe chete. VaGumbo vati haina kuwanda uye makore ose vaingoshanda neSouth Africa pasina aiti anoda magwaro aya. Parizvino, ndege shoma ndidzo dziri kubhururuka pakati peZimbabwe neSouth Africa nyaya dzemagwaro aya dzichigadziriswa.  No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Zvikoro Zvichavhurwa Mwedzi Uno, Varairidzi Vachiti Zvikoro Hazvina Gadziriro Yakakwana
text: Hurumende yakazivisa neChipiri kuti zvikoro zvave kuzovhurwa muzvikamu zviviri, chikamu chekutanga musiwa 15 Kurume kuchiti chikamu chepiri chiri musi wa 22 Kurume, unove mwedzi uno. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati vana vari kuita zvidzidzo zvinonyorwa bvunzo gore rino zveGrade 7, Form 4 neForm 6, ndivo vachatanga kuvhura musi wa 15. Vakatiwo varairidzi vari kudzidzisa zvidzidzo zviri muchikamu chekutanga vanofanirwa kunge vave kumabasa avo musi wa 10 mwedzi uno. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati vamwe vana vese vachange vachizovhura musi wa 22 Kurume, uye varairidzi vavo vanofanirwa kunge vave kumabasa avo musi wa 17. Vakati muzvikoro munenge musina mukana wekuti vana vasiye mikaha pakati pavo, vana vachapana mukana wekudzidza nguva dzakasiyanasiyana. Asi vakafannobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, VaGoodwell Taderera, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yazadzisa matanho anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organization pamwe nebazi rezvehutano isati yafunga zvekuvhura zvikoro. VaTaderera vanoti sesangano revashandi vanoti varairidzi vanofanirwawo zvakare kupiwa mihoro inovaita kuti vagare pamabasa, kwete zvekuti mudzidzisi anofunga zvekusiya basa ombonokorokoza. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro vakaudza Studio 7 neMuvhuro kuti bazi ravo rakagadzirira kuvhurwa kwezvikoro, uye svondo rapera vakuru vakuru vebazi ravo kusanganisira negurukota redzidzo yepasi VaCain Mathema vaishanyira zvikoro vachiona kuti zvakagadzirira zvakadii kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Vanoti zvikoro zvavakashanyira zvinosanganisira zvehurumende, zvine vana vanodzidza vachigarapo kana kuti boarding, izvo zvakamboita dambudziko reCovid-19 zvakanyanya, pamwewo nezvakazvimirira. VaNdoro vakati bazi ravo rakagudzikana nezvavakaona muzvikoro. No media source currently available

headline: Vakaremara Votarisira Kuti VaNcube Vaise Mari yeKuvabatsira muBhajeti ra2022
text: Vakaremara vari kukurudzira gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, avo vari kuparura bhajeti rehurumende ra2022 nemusi weChina, kuti vawedzere mari dzekuvasimudzira sezvo vaomerwa nehupenyu zvakanyanya. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, vachirwirawo kodzero dzevakaremara uye vasingaone, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pari zvino vakaremara vari kupihwa madhora zviuru zvitatu zvemunyika pamwedzi. Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reUnited Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization, kana kuti UNESCO, yakaburitsa pachena kuti vakaremara ndivo vakanyanya kuomerwa nehupenyu munguva yeCovid-19 muZimbabwe sezvo vainge vokundikana kuzviitira mabasa emaoko kana kupemha. Vasikana vakaremara vanonzi vari kumbunyikidzwawo zvakanyanya munguva dzino dzekurwisa denda iri. Vakaremara vanonzi neongororo iyi vari kutadza kuenda kuchikoro kana kuzvipatara. VaKuchera vati zvakakosha kuti paiswe mari parutivi yekuti vakaremara vakwanise kurapwa nyore. No media source currently available

headline: Dambudziko reMari Roramba Richinetsa Apo Zimbabwe Yoita Misangano neIMF neWorld Bank
text: Gurukota rinoona zvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa naGavhuna weRBZ Doctor John Mangudya vari kutarisirwa kuuya kumusangano wavo wekutanga kuInternational Monetary Fund neWorld Bank kana kuti IMF and World Bank Group Boards Spring Meetings kuWashington DC kubva zvauya hurumende itsva iri kutungamirwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Misangano iyi iri kuitwa kubva musi wa Kubvumbi 16 kusvika 22. IMF inoti nyika dzakawanda dzatotanga kunyoresa kuti dzipinde mumisangano yepagore iyi. IMF mumazuva mashoma anotevera iri kutarisirwa kutumira nhumwa dzayo kuZimbabwe pasi pechirongwa cheArtilce IV. Parizvino IMF iri kutsvaga nzira dzekubatsira Zimbabwe dzisingadi mari. Zimbabwe haisati yatanga kukwereteswa mari sezvo iine zvimwe zvikwereti zvairi kutadza kubhadhara zvinodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika dzinoti Zimbabwe iri kuda mari nechimbi chimbi sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka. Asi Doctor Mangudya vanoti nyaya yekushomeka kwemari munyika iri kuita ichiita nani. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nevanhuwo zvavo vanoti havasi kuona paine chachinja sezvo mari iri kutowedzera kunetsa kuwana mumabhanga. Vamwe vanhu vari kugunun’una kuti kana kuWestern Union vari kuwana mari yemadhora dhora kwete madhora gumi zvichikwira yavanenge vachida sezvo iine huremu hwakati kwirei zvichienzaniswa nedhora remabond notes. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paDevry University kuOhio muAmerica, Doctor Elliot Masocha vanoti Zimbabwe inotoda kuti iwane mari kana kubva kunyika dzainodyidzana nadzo dzakaita seRussia nekuti kuwana zvikwereti kubva kuIMF neWorld Bank kunonetsa kana zvikwereti zvisina kubhadharwa. Zimbabwe nemusi weChina yakanyorerana chibvumirano chemari inosvika mamiriyoni gumi nemashanu nesangano reOPEC Fund for International Development. Chibvumirano ichi chakanyoreranwa kuVienna, Austria, pakati pegurukota rezvemari vapatrick chinamasa nemukuru wesangano iri VaSuleiman J. Al-Herbish. Mari iyi yakanangana nekupa zvikwereti kuvarimi vendima diki kana kuti smallholder farmers. Vachabatsirwa varimi vari kuMasvingo, Manicaland, Midlands uye Matabeleland South. Mari yose ichapihwa Zimbabwe inonzi ichasvika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nematatu. Hurumende inonzi ichaisawo imwe mari pamwe nevarimi vacho kuti homwe iyi ikure. No media source currently available

headline: Chikwata cheIMF Chinopeta Rwendo kuZimbabwe Chichirumbidza Mabatirwo eHupfumi, Asi Chichiti Haisati Yave Kukodzera Kupiwa Rubatsiro Rwemari
text: Chikwata che International Monetary Fund (IMF) chichitungamirirwa naVaDhaneshwar Ghura, neMuvhuro chakapeta rwendo rwacho rwemazuva masere muZimbabwe, umo chaiita hurukuro nevakuru vehurumende, vakuru vebhanga guru renyika pamwe nevemabhizimusi pamusoro peshanduko dziri kuitika mune zvehupfumi pamwe nemamiriro ahwo. Mugwaro ravakaburitsa mushure mekupeta rwendo urwu, VaGhura vakati hupfumi hweZimbabwe hwaratidza kusimba kukuru nekumuka kwahwo munguva yakaoma. Vakati hondo iri pakati peRussia neUkraine, kusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura pamwe nemitengo yezvinhu iri pamusoro zviri kukanganisa hupfumi nemagariro evanhu muZimbabwe, izvo zvakasakadzwa kare nedenda reCovid-19. IMF yakapembedzawo matanho ari kuitwa nehurumende ekudzikamisa mutengo wemari yekunze, asi ichitiwo panodiwa mamwe matanho ekunyatsodzikamisa hupfumi ane hupenyu hunoenda mberi. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe yakapembedzwa neIMF nekukwanisa kubhadhara chikwereti chayo kuIMF muna 2016, sangano rinokweretsa mari iri rakati haisati yasvika pakuti ikwanise kupiwa rubatsiro rwemari nekuda kwekukundikana kubhadra kwayo zvikwereti zvayo zvekunze. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi pamwe nekudyidzana kwenyika dzepasi rose, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvinofadza chose kuti IMF yakarumbidza Zimbabwe nematanho ayakatora ekukwanisa kuraramisa hupfumi hwenyika, panguva iyo dzimwe nyika pasi rose dzaitarisana nematambudziko aitosvitsa pakubviswa kwevatungamiri pazvigaro. Asi Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti havaoni hurumende ichibudirira kuzdzisa zvayakakomekedzwa kuti izadzise nekuti zvinhu zvave nemakore ichiudzwa nezvazvo asi isina matanho ainotora. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yogunun'una neKurambidzwa Kutengesa Nyanga dzeNzou kuCITES
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa Amai Oppah Muchinguri kashiri vari kushora zvikuru nyika dziri kuda kurambidza Zimbabwe kutengesa nyanga dzenzou dziri mudura maro. Amai Muchinguru-Kashiri vataura mashoko aya kumusangano weConvention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora kana kuti CITES uri kuitirwa kuJohannesburg, South Africa. Nyika dzakaita seKenya, China neAmerica dzinoti nyanga dzenzou hadzifanire kutengeswa sezvo zvichizokonzera kuti vari kuvhima nzou zvisiri pamutemo varambe vachizviita. Kenya mwedzi yapfuura yakapisa nyanga dzenzou dzayo dzose. Mukuru wesangano reU.S. Fish and Wildlife Service VaDan Ashe vanoti kuti nzou dzisapere dzose nyanga hadzifanire kutombotengeswa zvachose. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vanoti Zimbabwe ine nyanga dzenzou dzinopfuura mabhiriyoni mapfumbamwe mudura mayo uye inoda kuti dzitengeswe.

headline: VaGumbo Vopomerwa Dzimwe Mhosva neZaac
text: Gurukota muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, Va Joram Gumbo, vanonzi havana kumiswa pamberi pedare redzimhosva sezvange zvakatarisirwa zvichitevera kusungwa kwavakaitwa neMuvhuro neZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission, Zaac. Asi VaGumbo vambosvika havo kumatare edzimhosva kwechinguva, ndokubva vadzoserwa zvakare kumahofisi eZaac. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kugweta raVaGumbo, VaSelby Hwacha, kuti nyaya iyi iri kufamba seyi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika muZaac vaudza Studio7 kuti VaGumbo vari kupomerwa dzimwe mhosva pamusoro pemhosva dzavakasungirwa neMuvhuro. Vatiwo ichokwadi kuti VaGumbo havana kumiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva sezvo pamuka dzimwe mhosva dzavari kupomerwa. VaGumbo vakasungwa neZaac vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori panguva iyo vaive gurukota rezvekufambiswa kwezvinhu munyika. VaGumbo vanonzi vakaita zvehuori apo vakashandisa imba yehanzvadzi yavo, Mavis Gumbo, kuti ishandiswe semahofisi ekambani yeZimbabwe Airways, iyo vanonzi vakaita kuti iumbwe muna 2012 apo vaive gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. VaGumbo vanonziwo vakanyorera bhanga guru renyika musi wa 10 Nyamavhuvhu 2017 vachiriudza kuti rikweretese kambani yeZimbabwe Airways mari inoita miriyoni imwe chete yemadhora ekuAmerica. Musi wa 21 Nyamavhuvhu 2017, VaGumbo vanonzi vakazivisa kuti mari yakanga yabva kubhanga guru renyika ishandiswe mukubhadhara rendi yemba yaMuzvare Gumbo, uye imwe yacho kuti ishandiswe mukuvakiridza imba iyi. Hurumende inoti zvakare musi wa 12 Gunyana 2017, kambani yeZimbabwe Airways yakaisa mari inoita miriyoni imwe chete yemadhora ekuAmerica mubhanga rekambani yeMaclaten Holdings, inova kambani yemwanasikana waMuzvare Mavis Moyo, Clara Rachel Mudzami. Hurumende inoti zvakaitwa naVaGumbo zvaive kunze kwemutemo, uye zvisingatarisirwe kuitwa nemunhu mukuru muhurumende.

headline: GMAZ Yoronga Kuwedzera Mutengo hweHupfu
text: Sangano reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe rinoti riri chiri rakangomirira kunzwa kubva kuhurumende kuti mutengo wehupfu hwowedzerwa kusvika papi. Izvi zvinotevera kuwedzerwa kwemutengo wetani rechibage kubva pazviuru zvina zvemadhora kusvika pazviuru makumi matanhatu nezana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemasere. Mwedzi wapera, hupfu hwakawedzerwa kubva pamadhora makumi mashanu kusvika pamadhora manomwe. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vakti mutengo wechibage wainge wawedzerwa kubatsira varimi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube kana gurukota rezvemaIndustry Doctor Sekai Nzenza kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi mutauriri weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe VaGarikai Chaunza. No media source currently available

headline: Makanzura eChitungwiza Akambomiswa Basa Omiswa Pamberi peDare reTribunal
text: Makanzura ekuChitungwiza makumi maviri nemashanu akambomiswa basa achipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuwori, atanga kumiswa pamberi pedare rakagadzwa negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaSavior Kasukuwere, kuti rinzwe nyaya dzaari kupomerwa. Dare iri rinotarisirwa kupeta basa raro musi wa 29 Gunyana. Makanzura aya, kusanganisirawo nameya weChitungwiza, VaPhilip Mutoti, vari kupomerwa mhosva yekusashandisa mari yekanzuru nemazvo, uyewo kuzvipa nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba dzinokosha mamiriyoni manomwe emadhora zviri kunze kwemutemo. Zvichitevera kumiswa kwemakanzura aya basa, VaKasukuwere vakadoma komisheni ine vatatu inotungamirwa naVaMadzudzo Pawadyira kuti ifanofambisa basa mukanzuru iyi. Asi vagari vari kunyunyuta kuti havana zvikuru zvavari kuona zviri kuitwa nekomisheni yaVaMadzudzo iyi, sezvo zvinhu zviri kutoenderera mberi zvichiwondomoka mukanzuru. Mukuru wesangano revagari vemuChitungwiza, reChitungwiza Residents Trust, VaMarvelous Kumalo, vanoti havatarisiri kuti makanzura aya anopiwa mutongo wakajeka sezvo dare iri rakaumbwa naVaKasukuwere, vanove zvakare ivo mumhan’gari munyaya iyi. VaKumalo vanotiwo makanzura aya aifanirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare iri mukati memazuva makumi mana nemashanu vamiswa basa, asi izvi hazvina kuitika, zvichireva kuti vagari vakatorerwa kodzero yavo yekuve nevanovamirira. No media source currently available

headline: VanoRojesa Dzimba kuVictoria Falls Voda Kubhadharwa neMadhora ekuAmerica
text: Vanedzimba dzekurojesa muVictoria Falls vanonzi vave kuda kubhadharwa nemadhora eku America, kwete nemari yemu Zimbabwe. Izvi zvinonzi zvave kunyanya kuomera vashandi vehurumende muguta iri, zvikuru sei masoja nemapurisa avo vanonzi vamwe vavo vave kugara mumatende pahofisi yemapurisa mushure mekudzingwa mudzimba dzavairoja pamusoro pekutadza kubhadhara nemari yekunze. Vakuru vemapurisa varamba kuti pane masoja nemapurisa arikugara mumatende pamahofisi avo, vachiti titaure nevakuru vavo kuHarare. Kanzura veWard 6 muVictoria Falls, VaEphias Mambume veMDC Alliance, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sezvo pamahofisi emapurisa pachigara paine matende, havasikuziva kuti ichokwadi here kuti mamwe mapurisa nemasoja vave kutogara mumatende aya pamahofisi yemapurisa. VaMambume vati nyaya iyi haisi yezvematongerwo enyika asi yezvemihoro yevanhu vanoshandira hurumende vasingapiwe mari inokwana kuriritira mhuri dzavo. Asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanoti handi chokwadi kuti mapurisa ari kugara mumatende nekushaya pekugara. Vanoti matende akaiswa nekuti pane basa ravari kuita pakamba apa.  No media source currently available

headline: Germany Inoudza Komiti yaVaParadza Kuti Zimbabwe Ibhadhare Zvikwereti Zvayo
text: Mumiriri wenyika yeGermany muZimbabwe, Doctor Thorsten Hutter, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende kuti Zimbabwe inofanira kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuWorld Bank, African Development Bank nenyika dzaya kakwereta pasi peParis Club, vachiti izvi ndizvo chete zvichaita kuti ikwanise kuwana rubatsiro kubva kumasangano aya nenyika idzi. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nenhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekunze kwenyika, VaHutter vati manyepo ekuti Zimbabwe iri kunyimwa rubatsiro nekuda kwenyaya dzematongorewo enyika. Vati chikonzero chiri kunyimwa Zimbabwe mari inyaya yekusabhadhara zvikwereti. Vati World Bank nenyika dzekuEurope hadzikwanisi kuramba dzichipa zvikwereti zvekusimudzira maindasitiri muZimbabwe kana isati yabhadhara zvikwereti zvainayo. VaHutter vatiwo makambani ekunyika kwavo nedzimwe dzeku Europe haasi kufara nemitemo yemuZimbabwe yakaita sema roadblocks ayo ave kuitwa pese pese nemutemo wekupa masimba kuvatema munyaya dzehupfumi. Vati vemakambani vanoda mitemo yekajeka uyewo apo nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko remari, vemakambani vanoda kuziva kuti kana vakatengesa zvinhu zvavo kunze kwenyika, vanokwanisa kushandisa mari yavanenge vawana pamadiro here kana kuti kwete. Pari zvino vebhanga guru, VeReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, ndivo vanoronga nekuudza makambani kuti anga shandise sei mari dzekunze dzaanenge awana. Sachigaro wekomiti iyi, VaKindness Paradza, vati vanobvumirana naVaHutter pazvichemo zvavo, asi vati zviri kugadziriswa. VaParadza vaenderera mberi vachiti komiti yavo yakumbirawo kuti Germany ibvise zvirango zvayakatemera VaMugabe vachiti izvi zviri kukanganisa hupfumi wenyika. Vatiwo izvi hazvifaniri kunetsa sezvo Britain yavainetsana nayo muEuropean Union yave kubuda musangano iri. Kunyange hazvo VaParadza vati komiti yavo, iyo ine nhengo dzeMDC-T, yakumbira kuti VaMugabe vabvisirwe zvirango zvavakatemerwa neGermany, mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vati sebato, hapana chati chachinja chingaite kuti VaMugabe varerutsirwe. VaGutu vati VaMugabe vachiri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu, mitemo yesarudzo haisati yagadziriswa, uye bato ravo rinoita rusarura pachikafu, icho chinopihwa nhengo dzeZanu PF chete. Imwewo nhengo yekomiti iyi, Amai Priscillar Misiharabwi-Mushonga, vatiwo zvakakosha kuti paramende yeZimbabwe neyekuGermany, Bundestag, zvidyidzaneuyewo kubatsira kumutsiridza hukamapakati penyika mbiri idzi pasi pesangano Zimbabwe German Association iro vati raibatsira vakawanda zvikuru Asi VaHutter vati zvirango zvaVaMugabe nemudzimai wavo nekambani neZimbabweDefence Industries hazvikanganisi hupfumi hwenyika vachiti pari zvino makambani emuZimbabwe anotengesa zvinhu kuEurope pachena pasi peEuropean Parternership Agreement. Vatiwo hupfumi hwenyika hwakakura chose panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa apo makurukota ehurumende yaVaMugabe pamwe nemakambani akawanda aive pasi pezvirango. Vati hupfumi uhwu huri kutodzikira panguva ino kunyange hazvo EU yakabvisa makambani aya nemakurukota pazvirango. VaHutter vati hazvina kushata kuti paramende yeZimbabwe idyadzane neBundestag asi vakati pari zvinonhengo dzeBundestag hadzigoni kubuda munyika sezvo nyika yavo ichiita sarudzo muna Gunyana. Asi vati vanozvikurudzira kuti paramende dzenyika mbiri idzi dzidyidzane. Makambani ehurumende anosanganisira Telone, National Railways of Zimbabwe neZiscosteel ane zvikwereti zvinodarika mazana mashanu emamamiriyoni emaEuro kuGerman Deveopment Bank uye mari iyi yave nemakaore akawanda isati yabhadharwa. Zvichakadai, VaHutter vazivisa kuti nyika dzeEU pamwe neAfrican Union dzichasangana muna Mbudzi gore rino kuAbijan nechinangwa chekuzeya chirongwa chekudyidzana pakati pemasangano aya cheCotonou Agreement. Vati zviri pachena kuti chave kudiwa neAfrica handi rubatsiro asi kuti makambani anogadzira zvinhu achiunza mabasa kumamiriyoni akawanda evechidiki vari kubva muzvikoro muAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yofara neMabasa ari Kuitwa neSangano reUSAID rekuAmerica eKusimudzira Vanotambura
text:
Hurumende inoti iri kufara nemabasa ari kuitwa nesangano reUSAID
rekAmerica ekuyamura vanotambura. 

Vachitaura nezuro pakupihwa kwemichina yekusonesa pamwe neyekunamisa
simbi kune vechidiki vanosvika makumi mashanu, gurukota rinoona
nezvedunhu reMashonaland West, Amai Mary Mliswa-Chikoka vakati vari
kushanda zvakanaka chose neUSAID sezvo sangano iri riri kutevedzera
zvinodikanwa zvinosanganisira kushanda nemapazi ose ehurumemde.

Vachitaurawo pachiitiko chimwechetecho, mushandi weLEAD, rimwe
remasangano ari kushanda mukuwanisa vagari zvekudya asi vachipihwa
mari neUSAID, VaKudzanai Zhemu, vakati pamusoro pemakumi mashanu
evechidiki vakayamurwa, mhuri dzinosvika chiuru nemakumi maviri dziri
kuyamurwa pamapurojekiti emapindu, kuchengetwa kwehuku, kurima howa,
kudzidzisa vanhu mabasa emaoko pamwe nekuchera zvibhorani zvemvura.

VaZhemu vakati zvose izvi zvakaita madhora ekuAmerica zviuru mazana
maviri nemakumi masere ,kana kuti US$280 000.

Senzira yekuti mabasa atangwa aya aenderere mberi, VaZhemu vakati
vakadzidzisa vagari ava mafambisirwo anoitwa mabhizinesi vachibatsirwa
nevadzidzisi vepachikoro chepamusorosoro cheChinhoyi University of
Technology, CUT.

Mumwe akadzidziswa kunama simbi kana kuti kuweredha paCUT akapihwa
muchina wekushandisa neUSAID ndiAmai Venencia Chinyani, avo vakati
vanofara nemuchina wavakapihwa uye vanofunga kuti hupenyu hwavo
huchashanduka nerutsigiro rweUSAID urwu.

Chirongwa cheUSAID ichi chiri kutarisirwa kuyamura mhuri dzinodarika
chiuru nemazana mashanu munzvimbo dzinoti Norton, Chegutu neMakonde
gore rino risati rapera.

Chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rekuti: "Building and
Strengthening Community Resilience", kana kuti kuvaka pamwe
nekusimbisa kumutsiridzwa kwenharaunda. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuti Isabate Mutero paMari Inotambirwa neVashandi iri Pasi pePoverty Datum Line
text: Vashandi pamwe nedzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vari kutambira zvakasiyanasiyana hurongwa hwakaziviswa svondo rapera negurukota rezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, hwekuti hurumende yakakwidza mari isingabatwe mutero kubva paZWL$75 000.00 pamwedzi kuenda paZWL$91 700.00 pamwedzi, kana kuti kubva paZWL$900 000.00 kuenda paZWL$1.1 million pagore. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti iri idanho rakanakira vashandi chose, kunyange hazvo sesangano, vakanga vakurudzira Muzvinafundo Ncube kuti vashandi vanotambira mari iri pasi pemihoro yepasi pasi, kana kuti minimum wage, vasabatirwa mitero. Munyori mukuru wemubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi vehurumende, weZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions (ZCPSTU) VaDavid Dzatsunga, vanoti sevashandi vanotambira chero danho rinotorwa nemushandirwi rekuona kuti mushandi asara aine mari muhomwe dzake. Asi VaDzatsunga vanoti sevashandi vehurumende havasi kufadzwa nekudzikira kwakaita mihoro yavo zvekuti vanototadza kubhadhara mitero sevamwe vashandi. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti sesangano vanga vachitarisira kuti mari isingabatirwe mushandi mutero inge iri pasi peinodiwa nemhuri yevanhu vashanu pamwedzi kuti irarame, kana kuti pasi pePoverty Datum Line. VaMoyo vanoti pamire sangano ravo ndepekuti mari isingakwanise kuchengeta mhuri haifanirwe kunge ichibatirwa mutero. Ukuwo, Doctor Chitambara vanodzoka vachiti kusara kunoita vashandi vaine mari muhomwe dzavo kunoita kuti vaende kunotenga zvinhu kuzvitoro uko hurumende inozowana zvakare mari yakawanda kubva kune mimwe mitero yakaita seValue Added Tax, kana kuti VAT. Muna Gumiguru munhu mumwechete anonzi aida mari inoita ZWL$$28 144.00 pamwedzi kuti ararame, zvichireva kuti mhuri ine vanhu vashanu yaida mari inoita ZWL$140 720.00 pamwedzi kuti irarame. Asi vamwe vanoongorora zvehupfumi vanoti nekuda kwekukwira kunomboita inflation munyika, mari iyi painozotambirwa nevashandi gore rinouya inogona kunge isisina simba zvekuti inenge yangove yechirango. Muzvinafundo Ncube vakaudza paramende svondo rapera kuti hurumende yave kukwidza mari isingabatirwe mutero iyi mushure mekunge nhengo dzeparamende dzachema chema kwavari kuti vaone zvekuita sezvo vashandi vakanga vasisina chekusara nacho mushure mekubatirwa mitero. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi veFodya Voyambira RBZ Kuti Vabhadharwe Zviri paMutemo
text: Vane misika yekutenga fodya vanoti bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, rinofanira kuona kuti mabhanga ese ari kumisika iyi ane mari inokwana kuti varimi vese vawane mari yavanosungirwa kuwana pazuva. Vachitaura nevakuru vakuru vekambani yehurumende yeTobacco Industries Marketing Board avo vange vari kuona kuti misika iyi yagadzirira zvakadii mwaka wekutengesa fodya, vemisika iyi vati sezvo RBZ yakati varimi vanokwanisa kuwana madhora mazana matatu pazuva, mabhanga ese anofanira kunge aine mari yekuita izvi. Mumwe mukuru pamusika weTobacco Sales Floor, VaPeter Mujaya, vati chisingafadzi ndechekuti kana varimi vachinge vashaya mari dzavo kumabhanga, vanodzoka kuzopopota kumisika uko vanenge vatengesa fodys yavo. Vati semuenzanizo gore rapera RBZ yainge yavimbisa kuti varimi vazokwanisa kuwana churu chemadhora pazuva asi izvi hazvina kuitika uye mamwe mabhanga aipa mazana maviri emadhora izvo zvakazomutsa bongozozo pamusika uyu. Asi sachigaro veTIMB, Amai Monica Chinamasa, vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vemisika yefodya vadzidzise varimi kuti vachange vachibhadharwa sei uye kuti vanofanira kunyoresa fodya vasati vauya nayo kumusika. Amai Chinamasa vati vanozivisa kuti varimi vanenge vachidawo mari yekunobhadhara vanhu vakaivaitira basa asi vati zvakakosha kuti varimi ava vazivewo kuti nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko remari uye vanofanira kutambira mari iripo. Svondo rapfuura RBZ yakazivisa kuti varimi vachange vachikwanisa kupihwa mazana matatu emadhora pazuva mushure mekutengesa fodya uye imwe yacho ichange ichizoiswa mumabhanga avo. Amai Chinamasa vanoti vanofara chose negadziriro yekuvhura misika iyi uye pamisika mina yavashanyira nhasi inoti Boka, TSF, Premium neMashonaland Tobacco Company, yese yave nezvinodiwa zvakaita semakirinika, zvimbuzi, mvura nezvese zvinoita kuti misika iyi ikwanise kushanda zvakanaka. Misika yefodya inovhura nemusi wa 21 Kurume. Amai Chinamasa vati zvinofadza kuti mamwe makambani anotenga fodya achange achitenga fodya munzvimbo dzakaita seRusape, Mvurwi neKaroi. Vati izvi zvichaderedza huwandu hwevanhu vanouya kuzotengesa fodya pamisika iri muHarare. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanopa Madzishe, Vechidiki neMadzimai ekuBinga Zvikepe Zvekubatisa Hove
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neChitatu vanonzi vakapa zvikepe zvekuredzesa hove gumi nezvinomwe (17) kumadzishe ekuBinga, zvina (4) kumadzishe ekuKariba, zvishanu kumasangano mashanu evechidiki pamwe nezvimwe zvishanu kumasangano mashanu emadzimai. Izvi zvinotevera vimbiso yakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika kuvagari vekuBinga mwedzi wapera yekuti vachavapa zvikepe zvekushandisa mukubata hove senzira yekuti vazvisimudzire uye kuvandudza hupenyu hwavo. Zvikepe izvi zvinonzi zvakagadzirwa makare muBinga. Bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko rakazivisa nezvehurongwa uhu, richitiwo chirongwa chemutungamiri wenyika chekuchera zvibhorani chiri kushandawo zvakare muBinga sehurongwa hwehurumende hwekurerutsa dambudziko remvura mudunhu iri. Vachitaura pamabiko ekupa zvikepe, VaMnangagwa vanonzi vakati hurumende yavo ichavaka mahofisi ekwamudzviti muBinga senzira yekurerutsira vagari vaitirwe nyore pakutora zvitupa nemagwaro ekuzvarwa. Vanonzi vakatiwo vane hurongwa hwekuti magetsi ari kugaiwa kubva mugwenya remagetsi ezuva reSolgas nemamwe magwenya mudunhu iri aende muzvikoro nemakirinika zvemuBinga. Studio 7 haina kuwanisa kubata mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, kanawo gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa. Asi mumiriri weBinga muparamende achangobva kusarudzwa ari webato reCitizens’ Coalition for Change, VaPrince Dubeko Sibanda, avo vanoti havana kukokwa kuchiitiko ichi, vanoti makorokoto kumadzishe ekuBinga akapiwa zvikepe sezvo madzishe aya achingotamburawo semamwe madzishe emunyika yose. Panyaya yekuti mabasa ebudiriro ave kuitwa nehurumende mudunhu mavo angadai akanangana here nesarudzo dza2023, VaSibanda vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti hurumende yave kuita chipatapata iye zvino asi yakarega dunhu ravo richisarira shure kwemakore makumi mana nemaviri adarika kubva nyika yawana kuzvitonga. Vanoti kunyange hurumende yakaita zvirongwa zvakadii muBinga, vanoramba vachingokunda chete. No media source currently available

headline: Inflation Yokwira Zvakanyanya Kusvika pa59.39 %
text: ZIMSAT inoti inflation munyika yakwira kusvika pazvikamu makumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe nezviga makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe kubva muzana kana kuti 59.39% zvakapedzisira kuitika makore gumi apfuura. Asi gavhuna weRBZ Doctor John Mangudya avo tisina kukwanisa kubata parunhare vakazivisa neMuvhuro kuti vanofunga kuti mukupera kwegore inflation vanotarisira kuti inflation iderere kusvika pazvikamu zviri pakari pegumi negumi neshanu kubva muzana. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari mukuru weLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze vanoti zvinonetsa kuti inflation iderere nenyaya yekudhura kwezvinhu uye nzara yakatarisana nenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Voramba Kunyengedzwa neMasitendi eHurumende
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council raramba mashoko ari kunzi akataurwa negurukota rezvemabasa nevashandi, ekuti vashandi vakawanda vari kuda kupiwa masitendi semuripo wemari dzavo dzemabhonasi egore rapera, pane kuti vapiwe iri mari. Sachigaro weApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti semaziviro avo vashandi vari kuda kupiwa mabhonasi avo iri mari nekuti sangano ravo rine humwe hurongwa hwekutsvagira nhengo dzaro masitendi ekuvakira dzimba richishanda nebazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu. Amai Alexander vanorambawo mashoko ekuti vatungamiri vemasangano evashandi vehurumende ndivo vari kurasisa vashandi panyaya iyi. Amai Mupfumira svondo rino vakaudza vatori venhau kuti hofisi yavo iri kutambira vashandi vakawanda chose vari kuda kunzwisisa nezvehurongwa hwemasitendi uhwu. Vanonzi vakatiwo ongororo yekunzwa pamire vashandi panyaya iyi iri kuitwa nebazi ravo inoratidza kuti ruzhinji rwuri kuda nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba pane mari. Amai Alexander vanoti vamiriri vemasangano ose evashandi vehurumende vachasangana neMuvhuro svondo rinouya kuti varovane masoro padanho rekutora vachienda mberi. Musangano wanga wakatarisirwa kuitwa neMuvhuro svondo rinouya pakati pevashandi nevamiriri vehurumende unonzi wambosendekwa zvakare parutivi, danho rinonzi riri kutowedzera hukasha wkevashandi. Studio7 yakundikana kubata Amai Mupfumira kuti tinzwe pavamire pari nhasi. Asi Amai Alexander vanoti havaone vashandi vachitadza kutora matanho kana pasina chagadziriswa. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHupfumi Dzozeya Kurudziro yeRBZ Yekuti Mari yeMunyika Ishandiswe Zvakanyanya
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kurudziro yagavhuna vebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, yekuti vanhu vashandise mari yemunyika zvakanyanya ipfungwa yakanaka chose, asi izvi zvinoshanda chete kana mari yemunyika iyi iine huremu hunounza chivimbo muvanhu. Vachitaura kumusangano wavakaita nevemabhizimusi svondo rapera, VaMangudya vakati kushandiswa kwemari yekunze munyika kwakaonekwa muna 2008 kuti hakukudze hupfumi hwenyika kunze kwekungodzikamisa chete mitengo yezvinhu. Vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanhu vemunyika vanofanirwa kuve nechivimbo nemari yemunyika kuitira kuti itambirike. Izvi zvinotsigirwa neimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vanoti chivimbo nemari yemunyika chinofanirwa kutangira kuhurumende, iyo vanoti iri kutara mitengo yezvinhu kusanganisira mari dzinoripirwa pama Toll gate nemari yekunze. Vaimbotungamira sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa vanotiwo mari yemunyika inofanirwa kuzvishambadza yoga, kwete kuti iite zvekushambadzwa naVaNgudya sevanoshambadza mbatya dzekupfeka kana zvekudya. VaMutasa vanotiwo nyaya hombe yaita kuti mari yemunyika ipere simba inyaya yehuwori, zvikuru kumusika wemari yekunze, uko vanoti vamwe vari kutenga mari yekunze nemutengo wepasi vozoitengesa pamusika mutema nemari iri pamusoro. Asi pane chakaipa here kuti nyika ishandise mari yekunze? Doctor Chitambara vanoti kushandiswa kwemari yekunze hakuna kuipa sezvo kuchibatsira kuti hurumende isarambi ichidhinda mari sezvo isingazokwanisi kudhinda mari yekunze iyi. Asi vanoti mari yemunyika inokwanisa kutambirika chete kana nyaya yekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation, yadzikamiswa. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvemabhizimusi, vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanotsinhira pfungwa yekuti vanhu vaite chivimbo nemari yemunyika. VaMuponda vanoti izvi zvinogadziriswa chete kuburikidza nekuti nyika itengese zvigadzirwa zvayo kunze uyewo ichideredza zvainotengawo kunze. VaMangudya vakati nyaya ye inflation vachaigadzirisa kuburikidza nesimbisa kushandiswa kwemari yemunyika, pamwechete nekukasika kuwanisa vanenge vahwinha pamusika wemari yekunze mari dzavo mukati memasvondo maviri senzira yekuti mari yekunze iwande mumabhizimusi. Asi nyanzvi dzezvehupfumi idzi dzinoti kunze kwekunge hurumende yatora matanho amasimba kurwisana nehuwori, hupfumi hwenyika hunogadzirisika chete kuburikidza nekudzorwa kwemari yekunze kuti ishande munyika, kana kuti dollarization. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi, VanaChiremba, naVanaMukoti Voramwa Mabasa
text: Sangano rinomirira vadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ rinoti nhengo dzaro zhinji hadzina kuenda kumabasa nhasi zvichitevera kurudziro yesangano iri yekuti varairidzi vasaende kumabasa vachitsutsumwa kuhurumende nemari dzemihoro. ARTUZ inoti nhengo dzayo dzakawanda nhasi dzaswera dzichidziya mushana kudzimba dzisiri pabasa zvichitevera kurudziro yesangano iri yekuti nhengo dzaro dziramwe mabasa kubva nhasi kusvika neChishanu nepamusana pekushomeka kwemari dzemihoro dzavari kutambiriswa nehurumende. Sachigaro weARTUZ mudunhu reHarare, VaMunyaradzi Masiyiwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vadzidzisi vasina kuenda kumabasa nhasi vanodarika zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vatiwo vachatora matanho akasimbarara kana hurumende ikaramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve isiri kuda kuvabhadhara nemadhora ekuAmerica. Zvichakadai, mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chiri kuGoromonzi mudunhu reMashonaland East, Amai Tinotenda Kahari, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa nhuna dzevarairidzi nekukasika kuitira kuti vana vasarasikirwe nedzidzo. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri werimwe sangano revadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati nhengo dzesangano ravo dzichatangawo kuramwa mabasa svondo rinouya. VaZhou vati sePTUZ vachataurawo nevemamwe masangano anomirira vashandi vose vehurumende kuti vaite muonerapamwe sechuma chemuzukuru. Mutungamiri weZIMTA VaRichard Gundani vanotiwo havasi kufara nemari dzavari kutambiriswa. Zvichakadai, gurukota rezvedzidzo, VaPaul Mavhima vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti homwe yehurumende yakabooka zvekuti hurumende haikwanise kubhadhara varairidzi nemari yekunze kana kuvawedzera maRTGS parizvino. Vati zvakawanda zvine chekuita nekuwedzerwa kwemari dzemihoro yevashandi vehurumende tibvunze kugurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube avo vatisina kukwanisa kubata panharembozha yavo. Mutauriri weHealth Apex Council VaPanganai Chivese vanoti vanachiremba, vanamukoti nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vatotanga kuramwa mabasa nezuro. Vati vashandi vakawirirana kuenda kumabasa kaviri pazuva asi vachiita zvekuchinjana. Vayambira kuti hurumende ikasagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo havasi kuenda kubasa vose svondo rinouya. Vati health Services Board iyo tisina kubata yati hurumende yakanzwa chichemo chavo uye iri kuyedza kuchigadzirisa. Sangano rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU rinoti mushandi anotambira mari iri pasipasi anofanira kutambiriswa mazana matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichiwedzerwa mutengo muyika. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe neSouth Africa Dzinonyorerana Zvibvumirano Munyaya dzezveUpfumi
text: Zimbabwe neSouth Africa nemusi weChina dzanyorerana zvibvumirano zvakawanda zvakanangana nekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika mbiri idzi. Nyika mbiri idzi dzanyoreranawo chibvumirano chezvemuchadenga chichaita kuti ndege dzekuSouth Africa dzakawanda dzikwanise kumhara muZimbabwe. Izvi zvinotevera musangano waitwa pakati pemakurukota emapazi akasiyana-siyana ehurumende idzi wanga uchidaidzwa kuti bi-national commission unove wekutanga wakadai kuitwa nenyika mbiri idzi. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakurudzira vemabhizimusi vekuSouth Africa kuti vauye kuzosima mari dzavo muZimbabwe vachiti mabhizimusi avo haana chinoawana. "Ndinoda kusimbaradza vemabhizimusi vekuSouth Africa kuti mabhizimusi avo akachengetedzeka muno uye tinodawo kuona vemabhizimusi vemuZimbabwe vachivhurawo mabhizimusi avo kuSouth Africa," VaMugabe vadaro. Mashoko aVaMugabe aya anouyawo apa vekunze vazhinji vari kubatwa nenhetemwa panyaya yekusima mari yavo muno pamusana pemutemo wakaiswa nehurumende wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema. Kunyange hazvo VaMugabe vasina chavataura pamusoro pekutya kuri kuita vekunze vakawanda kusima mari yavo muZimbabwe, vati chirongwa chekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema chazvara anamuzvinabhizimusi vatsva vanogona kuita kuti hupfumi hweZimbabwe neSouth Africa husimukire. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaJacob Zuma, vakurudzira kuti pawumbwe hwaro hunoita kuti vemabhizimusi vakwanise kushanda zvakanaka. "Patinoita izvi tinofanira kutarisa nyaya yekudyidzana munyaya dzehupfumi. Nokudaro tinofanira kuona kuti vemabhizimusi havana zvibingamupinyi zvavanosangana nazvo mukuita mabhizimusi avo. Tinofanirawo kuona kuti pavakwa muganhu mumwe chete pakati penyika dzedu kuitira kuti vanhu vafambe vakasununguka," VaZuma vadarowo. Zvichakadaro, gurukota rinowona nezve kunze kwenyika, VaSimbarashe Mumbengegwi vati zvimwe zvibvumirano pakati penyika mbiri idzi zvichiri pakati pekuzeyewa uye zvichasainwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera. VaMbengegwi vati nhaurirano dziri kuitwa dzakanangana nekuchengetedzeka hukama kwenyika mbiri idzi, zvekushanyirwa kwenyika nezvimwe zvakawanda. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa Votarisirwa Kukumikidza Chirongwa Chekuwanisa Bulawayo Mvura
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiperekedzwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga nevamwe vakuru vakuru vehurumende, vakasvika muguta reBulawayo neCitatu manheru pamberi pehurongwa hwavo hwekukumikidza chirongwa chichawanisa guta iri mvura. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kukumikidza chirongwa chekutora mvura kubva kuEpping Forest kuNyamandlovu, pamwe nekuparura chimwe chirongwa cheGwayi-Shangani, icho chichawanisa zvakare guta reBulawayo mvura kuburikidza nepombi dzemvura dzichange dzichitora mvura kubva kudhamu iri. Basa rekuvaka dhamhu re Gwayi-Shangani rinonzi rakatotangwa kare, uye rinotarisirwa kunge rapera gore rinouya, kuchitiwo basa rekuisa pombi dzichatora mvura kubva kudhamu iri richinzi rinotarisirwa kutanga chero nguva. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti chirongwa chedhamu nepombi dzemvura cheGwayi-Shangani ndechimwe chezvirongwa zvehurumende zvekuwanisa mvura kuguta reBulawayo, zviri pasi peNational Matabeleland Zambezi Water Project.

headline: Mapurisa Onetsana neVanotengesera Mumigwagwa yeGuta reHarare
text: Vanotengesa mumigwagwa varwisana nemapurisa ekanzuru neZimbabwe Republic Police ayo ange achida kuvabvisa mumigwagwa nechisimba uye pakuvara mapurisa nevanotengesa vane chitsama mukurwisana uku. Vanotengesera mumigwagwa varwisawo mapurisa vachiatema nematombo. Mapurisa ekanzuru neZimbabwe Republic Police ange achitenderera neguta achisunga nekutora zvinhu zvevanotengesa mumigwagwa kubva mangwanani izvo zvazotsamwisa vazhinji vatanga kurwisa mapurisa panguva dzekuma12 masikati. Zvitoro zvakawanda nemabhanga mumigwagwa yakaita saFirst, Jason Moyo, George Silundika naAngwa avhara apo mapurisa ange ave kurwisana nevanotengesa mumigwagwa. Veruzhinji vakurira mapurisa ayo apinda mumarori awo akatiza ndokuzodzoka chinguvana ave nezvombo zvehutsi hunokachidza pamwe nemotokari dzine mvura inovava. Muparurisa anodzivirira nyonganyonga azokokwawo kuzopedza mvongamupopoto yange yave muguta. Meya veHarare, VaHebert Gomba, vaudza vatori venhau kuti kanzuru haisi kurwisana nevanotengesa mumigwagwa uye iri kutaurirana navo kuti vaende kunzvimbo dzakatarwa kuti vatengesere. Asi vati mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police vari kuona kuti vanotengesa mumigwagwa vaenda kunzvimbo dzavanofanira kutengesera. Vati mangwana chaiwo vachaita musangano nevanhu ava kuti vazeye nyaya iyi. Munyori mutsva weguta reHarare, VaHosia Chisango, avo vawana basa iri nhasi vatiwo vanhu vari kutengesera panzvimbo dzisingaite uye kubvira pavakatanga chirongwa chekubvisa vanhu mumigwagwa, guta rachena. Vati chirongwa ichi chicharamba chichienderera mberi kudzamara dambudziko rekorera rapera muguta. Vaviri ava vatiwo zvichitevera kubuda kwekorera muguta pamwe nezvakaitwa nehurumende kuti yave State of Emergency, zvimwe zviri kuitwa muguta zviri kuitwa nehurumende uye vati ivo havazive kuti zvinhu zviri kutorerwa vanhu zviri kuendeswa kupi. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vanotengesa mumigwagwa reVendor Initiative for Socio-Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane nhengo dzesangano ravo nhatu dzakuvara munyonga nyonga yanhasi. VaWadzayi vatiwo vashamisika zvikuru nekuita kwemapurisa sezvo paine musangano wavachaita mangwana nekanzuru nevese vane chekuita nenyaya iyi. VaWadzayi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakaudza hurumende kuti nyaya yekubvisa vanhu mumigwagwa nechimbi chimbi haiite uye kuti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vagare pasi voita nhaurirano nechinangwa chekuti munhu wese akwanisa kuita basa rake akasununguka. Hurumende yakamisa mabasa ekutengesera mumigwagwa mumadhorobha ese munyika senzira yekudzivirira chirwere chekokera icho chinokonzerwa netsvina. No media source currently available

headline: GMAZ Inoti VaMnangagwa Vanoziva nezveNyaya yeMari Inofungidzirwa neParamende Kuti Haina Kufambiswa Zvakanaka
text: Sangano reGrain Millers Association kana kuti GMAZ nhasi razivisa paramende kuti rakabatsira Grain Marketing Board nemari yekugadzirisa matura ayo mushure mekunge rakumbirwa kuita izvi nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, panguva yavaive mutevevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika zvakare vari sachigaro wedare remakurukota ainona nezvekuti nyika yawana chikafu chakakwana kana kuti Food Security pachirungu. Avo ndisachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekurima, VaJustice Mayor Wadyajena, vachikandirana makobvu nematete nasachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara. VaMusarara, nhasi vaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvekurima, kuti vakapa kambani yehurumende yeGMB mari yekugadziria matura ayo muna 2016 mushure mekunge vakumbirwa kuita izvi naVaMnangagwa. Vaenderera mberi vakati vakaudzwa naVaMnangagwa kuti chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture chaizoburitswa goho rakanaka nekudaro vaida kuti GMB igadzisirise mataura ayo uye vaida kuti sangano ravo ribatsire panyaya iyi. Vati mushure mekutaura naVaMnangagwa, vakazoita mumwe musangano nevaive gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, apo vakazoita chibvumira chekubatsira GMB nemamiriyoni mapfumbamwe emadhora ekuAmerica. Vati vakabvumirana kuti hurumende yaizobhadhara mari iyi nekutengesera sangano ravo chibage nemutengo uri pasi izvo zvinove zvakazoitika. Kunyange hazvo VaMusarara vaburitsa magwaro avati anoratidza kuti mari iyi yakashandiswa kubva kubhanga ravo reMetbank pamwe nevanoongorora mari dzeGMAZ kana kuti auditors veBaker Tilly, GMB yaramba kuti yakawana mari kubva kuGMAZ. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muGMB, VaClemence Guta, vati GMB yakagadzirisa matura ayo nemari yaitengwa chibage nenhengo dzeGMAZ. Panyaya yekuti bazi rezvemari raiziva nezvekubatsira kwakaitwa GMB neGMAZ, VaWadyajena vati paramende yakanyorera kugurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube avo vakataura kuti hapana humbowo rweizvi mubazi ravo uye havana zvavanoziva nezvenyaya iyi. VaWadyajena vati nekuda kwaizvozvo VaNcube vakati hapana humbowo hwavaikwanisa kupa komiti yavo. Komiti yaVaWadyajena yati iri kuenderera mberi nekuongorora nyaya iyi uye inoda kuti GMAZ iendese kuparamende magwaro aya kaita chibvumirano chekubatsira GMB nebazi rezvemari nezvimwe zvingabatsire komiti iyi panyaya iyi. Mune imwewo nyaya, komiti yaVaWadyajena yange ichida kuziva kuti GMAZ yakashandisa sei mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe emadhora ekuAmerica ayakapiwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. VaMusarara vati mari iyi yakashandiswa kutenga gorosi kunze kwenyika. Vati mari iyi haina kupihwa kuGMAZ asi kuti yakapihwa kukambani yeHolbud iyo inove kambani yaiunza gorozi munyika. Asi VaWadyajena vati komiti yavo haina kugutsikana nezvetaurwa naVaMusarara uye vati kuferefetwa kwakaita neparamende kumakmbani akaita seZimbabwe Revenue Authority, kwaratidza kuti GMAZ haina kana kumbotenga gorosi kubva kunze kwenyika asi kuti izvi zvakatoitwa neimwewo kambani inonzi Drostky. VaMusarara vabvuma kuti Drostky ikambani yavo uye VaWadyajena vati komiti yavo iri kuenderera mberi nekuongororo kuti sei Droskty iri iyo yaitenga gorosi kubva kunze kwenyika ichishandisa mari yainge yapihwa GMAZ. Mangwana komiti yaVaWadyajena iri kutarisirwa kushanyira makambani aVaMusarara anoti Drostky neAlpha Grain apo iri kuenderera mberi nekuongororo nyaya iyi. Nyaya iyi yaifanira kunge yakaitwa gore rapfuura asi VaMusarara vakanyorera kumutauriri weparamende VaJacob Mudenda vachiti vaida kuti inzikwe nekomiti inoona nezvekushandisa kwemari yehurumende sezvo vaiona VaWadyajena semunhu aive nedivi raakarerekera. Asi hutungamiriri weparamende hwakagara pasi hukaona zvakakodzera kuti VaMusarara vamire pamberi pekomiti yaVaWadyajena ndokuvatumira masamanisi azovaunza kudare nhasi. VaWadyajena varatidzawo kusafara kuti VaMusarara pamwe nevashandi veGMAZ vaitaura kumapepanhau nezveongororo iyi uye vati kana zvikaitika zvekare vachatongwa nenyaya yekuzvidza dare. VaMusarara avo vauya negweta ravo varambidzwa kushandisa gweta ravo uyewo mutauriri wesangano reGMAZ, VaGarikai Chaunza, avo vange vatora mhiko yekuti vape humbowo vadzingwa mudare vachinzi vange vave kukanganisa komiti iyi. VaChaunza vayambirwawo kuti vacharangwa kana vakaramba vachitaura pamusoro penyaya iyi. Ongororo iyi iri kuenderera mberi uye VaMusarara pamwe nedzimwe nhengo dzeGMAZ vanzi vachakokwa zvakare kudare. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende, Makambani Akazvimirira, Vokurudzirwa Kubhadhara Vashandi Mari dzeMabhonasi Avo Ari muMadhora ekuAmerica
text: Mumwe mubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi, weZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, uri kukurudzira hurumende pamwe nemakambani akazvimirira kuti vabhadhare vashandi vavo mari dzemabhonasi dziri mumadhora ekuAmerica uchiti kuvabhadhara nemadhora emunyika kuno ita kuti varasikirwe nehuremu hwemari dzavo. Munyori mukuru weZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira, vanoti nekuda kwekuderera kwesimba redhora remunyika richienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica, mushandi akatambiriswa bhonasi yake iri kumadhora emunyika haazooni kukosha kwedikita rake. VaShamuyarira vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo pamwe nekutsemura mari yacho kuti ibhadharwe mukati memwedzi maviri kunoitwa nevamwe vashandirwi, bhonasi haichina chiremera sechayaive nacho makore ekare. Vashandi vakawanda vanonzi vari kutarisira kutambiriswa mabhonasi avo kutanga mwedzi uno, uye hurumende yakatozivisa kuti ichange ichibhadhara vashandi vayo mabhonasi avo, pamusoro pezvo vopiwa zvakare mazana maviri emadhora ekuAmerica sebhonasi inobva kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vamwe vashandi vehurumende vari kutarisira kutanga kuwana mabhonasi avo svondo rino. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa Zviri Kunze Zvowana Mukana weKupinda Muchirongwa Chinorerutsa Zvinhu Munguva yeKushaikirwa
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika mukupera kwesvondo zvakave nemukana wekunzwisisa pamusoro pechirongwa chekuvigana kana munhu achinge ashaya, cheSahwira International Plan chiri pasi peNyaradzo Life Assuarance Company. Mukana uyu wakavepo kuburikidza nemusangano wakaitwa padandemutande reZoom nevari kumirira kambani iyi kunze kwenyika, vekambani yeMKI, iri pasi pezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica. Mumwe mukuru wekambani yeMKI, VaEsau Mavindidze, vanoti vanhu vanodarika zana vakakwanisa kupinda mumusangano wavo uyu vachibvunzawo mibvunzo yakakosha zvikuru pamusoro pechirongwa ichi, icho chakanangana nekurerutsira vari kunze munguva yekushaikirwa. VaMavindize vanoti chirongwa cheSahwira International Plan ichi chinorerutsa ndima zvikuru kana mufi achida kuendeswa kunoradzikwa kumusha. Vanoti munguva zhinji hama neshamwari dzemufi vanozopinda mudambudziko rekuunganidza mari kuti vakwanise kuzadzisa zvido zvemufi zvekunoradzikwa kwaakasarudza achiri mupenyu. VaMavindize vanoti musangano wavo wavakaita uyu wakaratidza kuti vanhu vave kutarisira kuchirongwa ichi, uye vave kusununguka kutaura nezveremangwana ravo kana vachinge vazosiya pasi rino, izvo zvagara zvichionekwa nevamwe sechinhu chisingataurike nezvacho nguva zhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Kuvharwa kweZvitoro Kwokonzera Kugeda Geda kweMeno Munyika
text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Elliot Mashocha, avo vanodzidzisa paDevry University, kuOhio muAmerica, vanoti vave kutyira kuti dambudziko rezvehupfumi munyika richatonyanya kukomba sezvo zvave pachena kuti hurumende haina hurongwa hwakati tsvikiti hwekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaburitsa mashoko ekuti makata anoshura materu uye zvinhu zvichagadziriswa munguva inotevera vanhu vakapfavira ngoma sezvo husiku huri hurefu. Munyika mune matambudziko makukutu anosanganisira kushayikwa kwemari mumabhanga uye kushaya simba kwemari yemabond notes uye yeRTG’s iri mumabhanga kana pamakadhi akaita seEcocash neOne Wallet. Zvitoro zvakawanda munyika, kusanganisira Chicken Inn, KFC, nezvimwe zvinotengesa mishonga zvambovharwa. Zvitoro izvi zviri kuvhara zvichiti hazvina mari yekuAmerica yekutenga zvinhu zvekutengesa. Zvinhu zviri kushomeka muzvitoro zvinosanganisira shuga, furawa, Mazowe, munyu wakatsetseka nezvimwe. Mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari ari kunetsawo uye mhando yemoto wekubikisa inoshandiswa nevakawanda yegasi. Kuyedza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti vakawana chikwereti chemari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana mashanu kubva kubhanga reAfriexim Bank. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehuphumi dzinoti uku kuteya nzou neriva nekuti hapana chinobuda.

headline: Botswana Yotsigira Makambani Ayo Anoda Kutanga Mabhizinesi muZimbabwe
text: Zimbabwe neBotswana dzanyorerana chibvumirano chemari inosvika bhiriyoni rimwe chete rema Pula ekuBotswana. Chibvumiranbo ichi chaona Botswana ichiisa mazana mashanu emamiriyoni ema Pula pamusoro pemazana mashanu emamiriyoni ema Pula agara aripo. Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokwgweetsi Masisi, vaudza vatori venhau kuti Zimbabwe neBotswana dzawirirana hurongwa hwechikwereti uhu. Mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, vabvumawo kuti ichokwadi kuti nyika dzavo dzanyorerana chibvumirano. Vachitsanangura zviri muchibvumirano ichi, gurukota rinoona nezvekutengeserana muBotswana, Va Bogonelo Kenewendo, vati mari yabvumiranwa iyi ichashandiswa nemakambani emu Botswana anoda kutanga mabhizinesi muZimbabwe. Mashoko aVaKenewendo anopesana nemashoko ari kuburitswa nemapepanhau muZimbabwe ekuti Zimbabwe yapihwa chikwereti neBotswana senzira yekuti ivandudze makambani anoshanda akazvimirira. Ukuwo gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vatiwo Zimbabwe yapihwa neBotswana mari inoita mamiriyoni makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu emadhora. Asi havana kujekesa kuti mari iyi ndeyekubatsira here makambani emuBotswana kuti atange mabhizinesi muZimbabwe kana kuti kwete. Apo VaMasisi nechikwata chavo vange vari muHarare, bazi renyika yavo rinoona nezvekutengeserana nedzimwe nyika, razivisa kuti mari iyi ndeyekubatsira makambani ekuBotswana anoda kuita mabhizimisi muZimbabwe uye Zimbabwe inofanirawo kuisa hwaro hwekuti mabhizimisi aya haasi kuzorasikirwa nemari dzawo muZimbabwe. Bazi iri ratiwo kuti chibvumirano ichi chitange kushanda chinofanira kutsigirwa neBilateral Investment Protection and Promotion Agreement pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio7 kuti izvi zvinoreva kuti hapana chashanduka sezvange zviri kutaurwa nemapepanhau ehurumende. VaKuchera vati zviri kutaurwa nebazi rezvekutengeserana rekuBotswana zvinoreva kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuona kuti chibvumirano ichi chashanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemabhizimisi, VaRoy Magosvongwe, varatidza kusafara nemanyepo aiburitswa mumapenhau ehurumende pamusoro pechibvumirano chemari ichi dzisati dzapera. Vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende imbomira zvekurova bembera pamusoro pezvibvurano zvainenge ichironga asi kuti iite basa rinoonekwa kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Bato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, rashora manyepo ehurumende ekuti yainge ichazowana chikwereti chemamiriyoni mazana matanhatu emadhora kubva Botswana. Mumashoko araburitsa, mutauriri webato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vati manyepo aya haana kusiyana nemamwe anogaroutarwa zuva nezuva kuti hurumende iri kusaina zvibvumirano zvichaunza mari kunyika asi pasina chinobuda kana kuti ari manyepo chete. Vanoti hurumende inosungirwa kutaurira vanhu chokwadi kwete manyepo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kutaura nemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende. Zimbabwe neBotswana dzasainirana zvibvurano zvitanhatu munyaya dzedzidzo pamwe nezvicherwa uye musangano unotevera uchaitirwa kuBotswana gore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vekuArda Vakabviswa kwaChiyadzwa Votora Dzimba dzeMarange Resources neChisimba
text: Mhuri dzinosvika makumi mashanu nenhatu dzakatamiswa kubva kwaChiadzwa mushure mekuwanikwa kwemangoda dzichiendeswa kunogariswa patsva kunzvimbo yeArda Transau kwaOdzi kumawirira kweguta reMutare nemusi weChina dzakarovera moyo kudombo ndokupinda mudzimba dzakavakwa nekambani yemangoda yeMarange Resources zvechisimba. Mhuri idzi dziri kunyunyuta nerekuti dzaneta kurindira guyo sembwa dzakatarisira kupihwa dzimba idzi kuti dzigare zvakanaka nemhuri dzavo. VaAntony Mwashita mumwe wevagari vakatora dzimba kuArda Transau vanoti nguva yareba pasina chirikufamba. “Zvakangoomawo ini sekuti ndiri baba vane mhuri yakura nevana vatatu, vasikana vaviri nemukomana mumwe uye vabva zera." Amai Euna Mwashita vanoti vamhanyirawo kundotora imba yavo nekuda kwekuti pavaigara vange votatsurana navanatete, hanzvadzi dzemurume wavo apo pange ponetsa kugara. Vanoti chimwe chavapa shungu iyi kunyeperwa kwavanoti vange vachiitwa kwatora makore akawandisa. ”Ini handingarambi ndichigara navanatete mu-one house, vakadzi vatatu vachibikira muimba imwe hazviiti, ndange ndiine imba ini, ndaona zvakakodzera kuti ndigare muimba iyi yakavakwa nemakambani aichera madiamonds akatitamisa kuuya kuno, imba idzi ndedzehurumende." VaPeter Munjoma vanoti havangasaririre segotsi. “Ndabata imba iyi nekuti haa nguva yacho yareba zvisati zvaitwa izvi, mhuri yangu yakura property yangu haichina pokugara nekuti dzimba dzacho dziri kungoparara pasina anogara, saka tati regai titore hedu dzimba dzacho apo takanzi sanai kuenda nevabereki tichakupai imba nepamberi apo.” VaReuben Kusena vanotsinhira mashoko aVaMunjoma maringe nekutora dzimba dziri kuArda Transau. “Chaita kuti titore danho irori rekupinda mudzimba idzi inhau yemakore atatora tisina kupihwa dzimba idzi anosvika six, saka tatoona kuti zvitori nane tipinde hedu nekuti dziri kuparara dziri kungotsva saka tati kubva takaputsirwa dzimba dzedu uku tauya kuno hatina kupihwa imba dzacho tatora dziripo.” Amai Mary Sunguro mumwe wemadzimai ari kuArda Transau vapindawo mudzimba kwaOdzi nhasi. “Tave nenguva tichingoovimbiswa pekugara pakanaka asi hapana chiri kubuda mazviri, muimba idzi mava kugara mbudzi, mombe, nehuku vamwe vave kutoitira mabasa akasarurama mudzimba idzodzo isu vanhhu tisina pekugara pacho" Mudzviti wedunhu reManicaland VaFungai Mbetsa vange vasiri kudavira nharembozha yavo apo Studio 7 yaedza kuvabata kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya. Gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reManicaland Muzvare Mandi Mandiitawepi Chimene vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata vakuru vekambani yeMarange Resources vakavakisa dzimba dzapambwa nhasi nevagari vekuArda Transau. No media source currently available

headline: Dhora reMunyika Rotanga Kudonha Zvakanyanya
text: Dhora remuZimbabwe riri kuramba richishaya simba zvakanyanya zvave kupa kuti mitengo yezvinhu irambe ichiita chamurambamhuru sezvakamboitika kumakore ekuma2007 na2008. Dhora remuAmerica riri kutengwa nemadhora makumi matatu nemaviri kusvika makumi mana. Zvekudya, mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nezvinhu zvakawanda zvave kudhura zvakanyanya zvekuti vamwe vave kuti danho rekushandisa dhora remunyika raramba kushanda. Vachitaura kuKuwadzana pahurongwa hwekuchengeta nzvimbo iyi muna Ndira, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati vainge vodzora dhora remunyika sezvo pasina nyika ingararame isina mari yayo. Asi mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa, VaNelson Chamisa, vakatiwo zvekuda kushandisa dhora remunyika haishande. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti vezvematongerwo enyika panyaya yemari handivo vanoudza musika wemari zvekuita. Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vatendawo kuti zvinhu zvave kutengeswa nemari yekunze. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaChris Mugaga, vanotiwo panoda kutoisa musoro pamwe chete kuti dhora rishande zvakanaka. Asi Muzvinafundo Mugano vanoti hapana chembwa tenzi vararira mutakura nekuti kana iyo hurumende yave kuramba kutambira dhora remunyika. Munyori mukuru musangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vatiwo kumushandi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, iri kupota ichidhindha mari izvo zvinogona kuti nyika irambe iri kumawere. Asi gavhuna weRBZ, Dr John Mangudya, vanoti aya manyepo. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa mari dzekunze kusanganisira dhora rekuAmerica muna 2019 asi ikazoti yave kudzokera mukushandisa dhora remunyika chete gore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Dzidzo Yodzikira Sezvo Varairidzi Vari Vashoma Munyika?
text: Bazi rezvedzidzo yepasi rinotarisirwa kuwana bhiriyoni remadhora mubhajeti regore rinouya. Asi bazi iri rinoti veruzhinji havafaniri kutarisira dzidzo yemhando yepamusoro sezvo risina varairidzi vakakwana muzvikoro zvemunyika yose. Mashoko aya akataurwa nezuro nemunyori mubazi iri, Dr Slyvia Utete Masangano, kunhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvedzidzo yepasi, apo vaitaura pamusoro pebhajeti rebazi ravo ra2019. Vakati pari zvino hapachina zvekuronga bhajeti sezvo vave kuudzwa zvekuita nebazi rezvemari. Amai Utete-Masango vakati vakatoudzwa kuti vachapihwa mari inoita bhiriyoni nezana remamiriyoni emadhora nebazi rezvemari. Amai Utete Masango vakati zvikamu zvinodarika makumi manomwe nezvishanhu kubva muzana zvemari iyi zvinoenda kumihoro. Asi vakati kunyange zvakadaro, hapana mukana wekuti bazi iri ripinze vamwe varairidzi basa sezvarinoda kuitira kuti rikwanise kupa vana dzidzo yepamusoro. Vakatiwo izvi zvinoreva kuti murairidzi mumwe chete anodzidzisa vana vakawanda kudarika vanokodzera izvo zvinoderedza mukana wekuti vana vaite zvakanaka padzidzo yavo. Amai Utete-Masango vakati havana zvavangakwanisa kuita nenyaya iyi sezvo hurumende iine chirongwa chekuderedza mari yainoshandisa pamihoro yevashandi vayo. Asi vakati vari munhaurirano nebazi rezvemari pamwe nebazi rinopinza vashandi vehurumende basa reCivil Service Commission kuti vagadzirise nyaya iyi. Vachipawo humbowo pamberi pekomiti iyi, mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira varairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaSifiso Ndhlovu, vakati hurumende inofanira kupinza varairidzi vakawanda basa kuitira kuti varairidzi varipo vasafe nebasa. Pari zvino muraidzi mumwe anodzidzisa vana makumi manhatu kana kudarika kunyange hazvo achifanira kudzidzisa vana vane huwandu huri pasi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo dzinoti pavana vekireshi, murairidzi anofanirwa kudzidzisa vana makumi maviri nevashanu, ku primary, murairidzi anofanirwa kudzidzisa vana makumi mana pakirasi, kozoti kusekondari, murairidzi anofanirwa kudzidzisa vana vasingadarike makumi matatu nevashanu. Zimbabwe inofanirwa kupinza vamwe varairidzi zviuru gumi nezvinomwe kuitira kuti varairidzi vashande sezvavanofanirwa kuita kana zvinhu zvakanaka. Pari zvino Zimbabwe ine zvikoro zvinodarika zviuru zvisere, asi panodiwa zvimwe zvikoro zviuru zviviri nechidimbu kuitira kuti vana vakwanise kudzidza zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Vanongosva Hurumende Kuti Vatange Zvakare Nhaurirano dzeNJNC
text: Vashandi vehurumende vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Service Trade Unions, iro raimbonzi APEX Council, vakanyorera kuhurumende vachikurudzira kuti nhaurirano dzemihoro, dzeNational Joint Negotiating Council, NJNC, dzimutsiridzwe. Mutevedzeri wemunyori wesangano iri, VaGibson Mushangu, vanoti chikonzero chikuru chaita kuti vanyorere kuhurumende vachiiyeuchidza nezvenhaurirano dzemihoro idzi inyaya yekuti mitengo yezvinhu zvinodiwa nemunhu zuva nezuva iri kungokwira, asi mihoro yevashandi vehurumende isina kwairi kuenda. "Takanyorera hurumende tsamba musi wa 02 mwedzi uno tichivarangaridza kuti tarirai tava mugore idzva rava nemasandukiro aro ekurarama. saka tinotarisirawo kuti tinge tichisangana tichiita hurukuro nekutika isu nyaya yedu yemihoro ndeyekungoti nguva nenguva tagara pasi tichikurukura." VaMushangu vanoti zvavari kuda sevashandi vehurumende hazvirambe zvichichinja, uye hazvisi zvinhu zvakawanda, kunze kwekungoti hurumende idzose mihoro yavo pamari dzavaitambira muna 2018, dzinove madhora mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri emari yekuAmerica pamwedzi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vononga Svosve neMuromo neNyaya yeHupfumi Hwaenda kuMawere
text: Veruzhinji munyika vanoti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika kwakonzera kuti hupenyu huvawomere kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti ine hurongwa hwakasimba hwekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoti hupenyu hwavawomera zvichitevera kuwondomoka kuri kuramba kuchiita hupfumi hwenyika. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaGodfrey Banhwa vanogara mumusha weBudiriro muno mu Harare vanoti vakaburira muzvidzidzo zvavo zve Development Studies pane imwe yunivhesiti yemuno asi vanoti vave nemakore matatu vagere kumba. VaBanhwa vanoti vavakuswera vachigeza motokari dzevanhu mudhorobha kuti vakwanise kuchengeta mudzimai wavo nemapatya avo. Muzvare Kudzai Chiwanza vanogara ku Southerton vanoti kuwoma kuri kuramba kuchiita zvinhu munyika kwanyanya kuomera vanhukadzi vachiti chipfambi chizhinji chiri kuitwa munzvimbo dzakawanda chiri kukonzerwa nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika. Muzvare Chiwanza vanoti kushayikwa kwemari kwavakukonzera kuti madzimai mazhinji atadze kutenga zvipfeko zvemukati panguva yavanenge vachitevera. Nekuda kwekuooma kuri kuramba kuchiita hupenyu, vanhu vazhinji mu Harare vavekutsvaga zvinhu zvingavararamise. Amai Getrude Govere vanogara mu Gen Norah vanoti mushure mekuenda papenjeni makore mashanu apfuura, vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vatange kuswera vachitengesa matohwe, tsubvu pamwe nemasau mudhorobha vachiti penjeni yavo ishoma zvikuru zvekuti havakwanise kuterera imba yavanogara nemhuri yavo. Amai Govere vanoti vanobva kumamisha vachivahodhesera michero yavanotengesa vanenge vakatarisirawo kuwana chouviri pamichero yavo asi nguva zhinji vanogara vakashaya mari yekuvapa sezvo vachiti mari inenge yapeera mukubhadhara mafaindi kukanzuru yeHarare iyo isiri kubvumidza vanhu kuti vatengesere kunzvimbo dzisina kutatrwa. Vanoenderera mberi vachit havasi kuda kuenda kunzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru idzi vachiti mari yavanowana mukutengesa kwavanoita haikwane kuti vabhadhare mitero kukanzuru pamwe nekuchengeta mhuri yavo. VaFarai Kabesha vanogara ku Mbare vanoti vanoswera vachitsvaga chero munhu anenge achida kubatsirwa kutakura zvinhu pamusika kuti vawane chouviri. VaKabesha vanoti havana chavari kuona chiri kuitwa nehurumende kuedza kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Nekugarochema-chema kuri kuita veruzhinji, vamwe vanhu vakaita sa Amai Govere vanoti hurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe inofanira kutsvaga nzira dzkuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika nekukasika. Amai Govere vanoti zvinhu zvakamboita nani pakawumbwa hurumende yemubatanidzwa muna 2009 asi zvinhu zvakazotanga kuwoma zvakare pakaitwa sarudzo. Asi VaKabesha vanoti chave kutodikanwa ndechekuti pambotsvagwa imwe hurumende ine pfungwa itsva dzinogona kufambisa hupfumi hwenyika zvakanaka. VaMugabe vakaudza nyika svondo rapera kuti hurumende yavo ichashanda zvakasimba kusimbaradza nyaya dzezvekurima kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Hurumende yavo inoti chirongwa chekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika che Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio Economic Transformation kana kuti Zimasset chikazadziswa chinogona kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika uhwo hwagwadama. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti Zimbabwe ikasawana chikwereti chimwe chakakura kubva kunze kugadzirisa hupfumi acharamba ari manyautsa mukanwa chembere kurota ichiyamwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanyori Vakawanda Vanoti Zvinyorwa Zvavo Zviri Kushandiswa Pasina Muripo
text: Chirongwa cheZimbabwe International Book Fair chiri kuitika muHarare hurumende ichikurudzirwa kuti ipedze dambudziko rekubiwa kwepfungwa dzevanyori mumabhuku, kupedza huori munyaya dzekutengesa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo kuitira kuti mabhuku abhadhare vose vane chekuita nekunyorwa, kudhindwa pamwe nekutengeswa kwemabhuku. Vanyori, vanodhinda, vanotengesa mabhuku pamwe nevadzidzisi vari kuwirirana kuti hurumende haina kupedza dambudziko rekudhindiswa nekutengeswa kwemabhuku zvisiri pamutemo. Munyori ane mukurumbira, Musayemura Zimunya, anoti huori hwakanyanyisa munyika zvekuti mapurisa nevezvematongerwo enyika vanodhindisa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo. Zimunya anoti vanhu vanoonekwa vachitengesa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo vanenge vatumwa nevakuru vekumapurisa nekumapazi ehurumende. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemukuru weZimbabwe International Book Fair, ZIBF, VaBlazio Tafireyi, vanoti tsvakiridzo yavakaita inoratidza kuti mapurisa nevezvematongerwo enyika ndivo vevamwe vari kuita basa rekudhindisa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo. Zimunya anoti zvikoro ndizvo zviri pamberi mukutyora mutemo wekudhindisa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo. VaTafireyi vanoti kunyange vakaendesa vanhu vakawanda kumatare edzimhosva nemari inosvika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvishanu hapana chakabuda kumatare sezvo vachinzi vabhadhare mari yefaindi inosvika madhora makumi maviri. Vachivhura musika wemabhuku neChitatu, gurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi, VaLazarus Dokora, vati vemuzvikoro vanofanirwa kushanda vasingatyore mutemo wemabhuku. Vanotengesa mabhuku vanoti mabhuku avo haasi kutengwa sezvo vakawanda vave kutenga mabhuku pamikoto. Mukuru weInnov8, VaPeace Muwani, avo vanotengesa mabhuku, vanoti rimwe dambudziko ravari kusangana naro nderekuti vanodhinda mabhuku vave kutengesa vega mabhuku senzira yekuita mari yakawanda. Musika wemabhuku wavhurwa kuruzhinji rwevanhu nhasi uye uchange wakavhurwa kusvika neMugovera. Mangwana rinenge riri zuva rekuratidzira mabhuku kuvanhu uye kusangana kwevaverengi vemabhuku nevanyori . Gore rino musika wemabhuku uri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rinoti: Making the Book Pay. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Vocherechedza Zuva Ravo Pasi Rose Vachichema neNzara
text: Panguva iyo pasi rose riri kucherechedza zuva revashandi, kana kuti May Day, vashandi vakawanda, pamwe neveruzhinji vanoti hapana chekupemberera sezvo hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere uye vanhu vasisina mabasa. No media source currently available VaNigel Phiri murume ane makore makumi mana nemana ekuberekwa. VaPhiri, avo vanogara mumusha weMkoba 1 muGweru, ndemumwe wevashandi vazhinji munyika vakapererwa nebasa mushure mekunge makambani avaishandira avharwa. VaPhiri, avo vakashandira kambani yeCaridorn kwemakore anopfuura gumi kambani iyi isati yavhara mugore ra2012, vanoti kubvira pavakabuda basa, ivo - sevamwe vashandi vakawanda vasisiri pamabasa - vave kurarama hupenyu hwehwakumukwaku zvekuti zororo rezuva revashandi rangovewo rimwe zuva rakafanana nemamwe ose. Mudzimami waVaPhiri, Amai Juliet Phiri, vanoti murume wavo paaishanda ivo nemhuri yavo vairarama hupenyu huri nani zvekuti vaingogara zvavo kumba pasina zvakawanda zvavaiita. Asi nekuda kwekuti murumme wavo paakabuda basa haana kana kuwana tiki, Amai Phiri vanoti hupenyu hwavaomera zvekuti vave kutoita muonera pamwe nemurume wavo kuedza kuraramisa mhuri yavo. VaFrancis Shoko ndemumwezve mugari wemuMkoba 1. SaVaPhiri, VaShoko vakapererwawo nebasa mushure mekunge kambani yeKariba Battery Manufacturers yavaishandira yavhara. Kunze kwekuti havanawo kupiwa mari yemudyandigere nekambani yavo payakavhara, hupenyu hwaVaShoko hwave kunyanya kuvaomera nekuti vave nechirwere chemakumbo icho chinovaita kuti vatadze kuita mabasa anorema, izvo zvave kuita kuti vanetseke kuriritira mhuri yavo. VaCharles Chikozho, vanove Regional Officer weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, kana kuti ZCTU, mudunhu reMidlands, vanoti kunyange hazvo sangano ravo risina huwandu hwemakambani akavharwa kana huwandu hwevanhu vakasiiswa mabasa kusvika pari zvino mudunhu reMidlands, pane makambani akawanda akavharwa uye vashandi vakawanda munzvimbo iyi vakarasikirwa nemabasa.
