VaChikozho vanoti nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvinhu, zuva revashandi rave kucherechedzwa mukusuwa kukuru sezvo vashandi vakawanda, pamwe nemhuri dzavo, vari kutambura Sangano reZCTU rinoti kubva mugore ra2011 kusvika gore rapera vashandi zviuru makumi mashanu, vakarasikirwa nemabasa. Kune rimwe divi, bazi rehurumende reZimstats rinotiwo vashandi zviuru makumi matatu ndivo vakarasikirwa nemabasa, ukuwo zviuru zvina zvemakambani zvakavharwa panguva imwe chete iyoyo. Pane kupokana kuripo pakati pehurumende nesangano rinomiririra vashandi pamwe nedzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi pamusoro pehuwandu hwevanhu vasiri kushanda munyika. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti huwandu hwevanhu vasina mabasa munyika hunopfuura zvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana. Asi hurumende inoti huwandu hwevanhu vasina mabasa huri pasi zvikuru nekuda kwekuti vanhu vakawanda vave kuzvishandira pachavo vega. Pakutanga kwegore rino, sangano reInternational Labour Orgnanisation rakaburitsa kuti huwandu hwevanhu vasina mabasa munyika huri pasi pezvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana. Asi vanhu vakawanda havatambiri maonero aya. Mumwe weavo vasingatambire ongororo iyi ndiVaKudakwashe Munengiwa vanove national trustee weZimbabwe Urban Councils Workers' Union . VaMunengiwa vanoti kuti vanhu vanotengesa mumigwagwa vanzi vari pamabasa kuda kusatambira chokwadi chekutambudzika kuri kuita ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika. VaChikozho vanoti kuti makambani akasiyana-siyana atange kushanda zvakanaka zvakakosha kuti hurumende iite mitemo inokwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze kwenyika kuti vazosima mari yavo muZimbabwe. VaChikozho vanoshora vamwe vemabhizimisi vekuChina vanouya kuzotanga mabhizmisi muno vachiti vakwanda vavo havaite zvinhu zvavo zviri pachena. VaTrust Chikohora ndimuzvinabhizimisi uye vari muongorori wezvehupfumi anoshand akazvimirira ega. VaChikohora vanobvumirana nekuti zvakakosha kuti hurumende ikwezve vemabhizimisi vekunze vanosima mari muno. Asi vanoti zvakakoshawo kuti hurumende igadzirise zvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nedzimwe nyika pamwe nemasangano akadai seInternational Monetary Fund pamwe neWorld Bank kuitira kuti chimiro chenyika chive chakanaka, izvo vanoti ndizvo zvingabatsira kugadzirisa kuwondomoka kwehupfumi hwenyika. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yeZanu PF yakabuda negwaro rinonzi nevamwe rine hwaro hwakanaka hwekumutsurudza hupfumi, vamwe vanoti vashandi vacharamba vachidemba manyakare apo vaive nemabasa, ukuwo veruzhinji vachiramba vachidya nhoko dzezvironda kudzamara hurumende yarongeka mumaitiro ayo.

headline: Vakawanda Voshaya Mari Itsva Yainge Yavimbiswa neRBZ
text: Vanhu vakawanda vafumobata jongwe muromo vachienda kumabhanga netarisiro yekuwana mari sevimbiso yebanga guru renyika asi vafambira dhongi rakaora. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 kumabhanga akasiyana siyana muHarare, Bulawayo, Chinhoyi, Masvingo, Mutare, Gweru nemamwe maguta yaratidza kuti hakuna mabhanga awana mari itsva iyi uye mabhanga mazhinji anga asina mari yekupa vanhu kana tsaru yacho. VaJossam Marwira mumwe wevamukira kubhanga vati vaswera vakamirira vaine tarisiro yekuwana mari sezvo vaive vanzwa munhau kuti kuchawedzerwa mari itsva. VaMarwira vati vanonyanyoshungurudzwa nekutenga mari mumigwagwa vakati zvinganakire vanhu vakaita saivo vakakwanisa kuwana mari kumabhanga pasina muripo. Mumwe murume anotenga nekutengesa mari mumugwagwa aramba kudomwa nezita audzawo Studio 7 kuti anga akatarisirawo mari itsva iyi asi hapana chaaona. Bhanga guru renyika reRBZ munguva pfupi yapfuura raive razivisa kuti richaisa mari itsva netarisiro yekurerutsa matambudziko emari munyika. Gavhuna weRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya vakazivisa kuti vachaisa mari yemabond yendarama yemadhora maviri pamwe nemari yebepa yemadhora maviri nemashanu iyo yanga ichitarisirwa kutanga kushanda nhasi. Mutungamiriri weBankers Association of Zimbabwe VaWebster Rusere vatiwo vanga vasati vaongorora kuti kune mabhanga anga awana mari iyi vachiti RBZ ndiyo ingave neruzivo. Nyaya yekuunza mari itsva iri kukonzera kusawirirana munyika vamwe vachiti ichabatsira vanhu varfi kunetsekana nemari asi vamwe vachiti kutungana kwembudzi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yobvumidza Kutengwa kweZvinhu Kunze kweNyika
text: Hurumende yambomisa mutemo unorambidza kupinda munyika kwezvimwe zvinhu uye inoti makambani nevanhuwo zvavo vave kubvumidzwa kutenga zvinhu zvange zvichirambidzwa kupinda munyika zvakaita semafuta ekubikisa nekuzora, floor nezvimwe. Vachitaura pamusangano wavanoita nevatori venhau mushure medare remakurukota svondo rega rega, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati hurumende yatora danho iri nechinangwa chekuda kuona kuti vanhu vawana chikafu pamwe nekugara zvakanaka pamwe nekutenga zvinhu nemutengo uri pasi. Amai Mutsvangwa izvi hazvirevi kuti hurumende haichatsigira makambani emunhu uye vati izvi zvicharamba zviripo kudzamara zvinhu zvagadzikana munyika. Zvimwe zvezvinhu zvave kukwanisa kutengwa kubva kunze kwenyika ndezvinoti, bhinzi, fotireza, mabhara, mishonga yekurimisa, mazenge, ice cream, jam, dovi, shuga, mushonga wekuporisha shangu, pamwe nesipo. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vati chinangwa chavo ndechekuti zvinhu zviwande muzvitoro kuitira kuti mitengo yezvinhu idzike. Vati danho iri rakananganawo nekugadzirisa kusamira zvakanaka mumaindasitiri nemabhizimisi umo mitengo yezvinhu iri kukwira zuva nezuva. Vanongoorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio7 kut danho ratorwa nehurumende richagadzirisa nyaya yemitengo munyika. Asi mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira maindasitiri, reConferderation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo danho ratorwa nehurumende richikwanisa kuti zvinhiu zviwande munyika, mitengo yezvinhu haisi kuzodzikira. Vatiwo mitengo yezvinhu ichatokwira zvakanyanya sezvo vanhu nemakambani vachatsvaga mari yekunotenga kunze pamusika mutema izvo zvinozoitawo kuti vatengese zvinhu zvavo nemitengo iri pamusoro soro. VaJabangwe vati zviri nani kuti hurumende irambe ichitsigira makambani emuno nemari. Vati hurumende yakaderedza huwandu hwemari yekunze hwainopa kumakambani muna Nyamavhuvhu izvo zvakatanga kukonzera kushomeka pamwe nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. No media source currently available

headline: Vaimbove Gurukota rezveKutakurwa kweZvinhu, VaJorum Gumbo, Vanosungwa neZACC
text: Vaimbove gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJorum Gumbo, avo vave gurukota muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, vasungwa neZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuwori pavaive gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Sachigaro veZACC, Justice Loice Matanda-Moyo, vatenda kuti komisheni yavo yamboshevedza VaGumbo kuti vabvunzurudzwe uye kuti vape divi ravo panyaya dzavari kupomerwa idzi. "Vasungwa zvavo asi vachiri kutorwa ma warned and cautioned statement, vozoendwa navo ku court." Justice Matanda-Moyo vanoti VaGumbo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuwori kukambani yendege yeAir Zimbabwe kuburikidza nekutengwa kwendege ina dzerudzi rweBoeing 777 kuMalaysia. Ndege idzi dzakatengwa munguva yehutongo hwevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Justice Matanda-Moyo vanoti dzimwe mhosva dziri kupomerwa VaGumbo dzinosanganisira yekudzora pabasa mumwe aive mukuru wekambani yeCMED, kunyange hazvo akanga awanikwa aine mhosva nematare edzimhosva. Dzimwe mhosva dzinosanganisira yekushandisa imba yehama yavo kuyiita muzinda wemahofisi eAir Zimbabwe, pamwe nekusashandisa mari yehurumende zvasina kujeka. Justice Matanda-Moyo vanoti VaGumbo vanotarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare neChipiri. "Hativaisi mumaoko emapurisa Aiwa. Vanotori mumaoko eZACC, kusvika taenda kudare, tozonovaisa mumaoko ema prosecutor. Kana tichida kuti varare ku police station tinotsvaga police station yatinotaura nayo kuti vararewo vari ku police station iyoyo, asi vanenge vangori mumaoko eZACC," Justice Matanda-Moyo vanodaro. Gweta riri kumirira VaGumbo, VaSelby Hwacha vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vaGumbo Havana kusungwa kwete, asi kuti vangoenda kuZACC kunopa divi ravo panyaya yavari kupomerwa. VaHwacha, avo varamba kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya iyi vachiti vanosungwa nemutemo wekudzivirira vavanomirira, vati VaGumbo varegwa vachienda kumba kwavo, uye zvinozotevera Havana ruzivo nazvo. Justice Matanda-Moyo vanoti vanhu vakawanda vave kusununguka kumhan'gara huwori hwavanoona kukomisheni yavo, asi vachakasungwa nenyaya yekuti hapasati pave nemutemo unochengetedza vafakazi pamwe nevanoruma nzeve ZACC, izvo vanoti zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuitira kuti vanhu vasununguke kubatsira komisheni inorwisana nehuwori iyi. No media source currently available

headline: VaChasi Vanoti Hurukuro neEskom Dzichiri Kuenderera Mberi paNyaya yeMagetsi
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto VaFortune Chasi vanoti hurukuro nekambani yeESKOM yekuSouth Africa panyaya dzekuti Zimbabwe itengeserwe magetsi dzichiri kuenderera mberi. VaChasi vaudza Studio 7 kuti parizvino South Africa haina magetsi ari kutengesera Zimbabwe. No media source currently available Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kukambani yeESKOM iyo yakaita chikwereti chemari inosvika mabhiriyoni makumi maviri emarands mukushanda kwayo kubva gore rapera kusvika muna Kurume gore rino. Kambani iyi yave kurarama nerubatsiro rwairi kupihwa nehurumende yeSouth Africa. Vakuru muESKOM vari kuti Zimbabwe inofanira kubhadhara chikwereti chinosvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu emadhora ekuAmerica kana ichida kutenga magetsi. Zvichakadaro, makambani mazhinji munyika ari kuti ari kutatarika nenyaya yekushaya magetsi zvopa kuti mamwe avhare kana kuti ati vanhu vashande maawa mashoma husiku panenge paine magetsi. Asi dambudziko iri riri kupa mukanha kune mamwe makambani akaita seZimplow iyo iri kutengesa magwenya emagetsi kana kuti magenerator. Kambani iyi inotiwo yakaita zviri nani gore rino kunyangwe zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika. Mukuru mukambani iyi kana kuti Group Chief Executive VaVimbayi Nyakudya vanoti kambani yavo iri kuitawo mari nekutengesa magejo anodonzwa nemombe munyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Vedzimotokari muChinhoyi Voti Vari Kushaya Mafuta eDzimotokari muMagaraji
text: Kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti mafuta edzimotokari azere munyika anokwana kusvika gore rinouya vedzimotokari muChinhoyi vari kushaya peturu mumagaraji. Vedzimotokari dzinotakura vanhu mumisha inogara veruzhinji vanoti kushayikwa kwemafuta kuri kuita kuti vasashande sezvavaimboita apo mafuta aiwanikwa nyore. VaCuthbert Chioko avo vanotakura vanhu kuenda kuBanket vanoti kushaikwa kwemafuta emotokari kwakuvadza basa ravo. Mumwe mugari weMuchinhoyi VaTodd Nyangana vanoti kushaikwa kuri kuitwa mafuta zviri kukonzerwa nevemagaraji vasiri kuda kutengesa mafuta avanawo netarisiro yekuzoatengesa kana mutengo wakwira. VaNyangana vanoti chiri kunyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti vanotengesa mafuta edzimotokari vari kuramba kutambira mari yemabond coins. VaNyangana vanoti zviri pachena kuti mari yemabond notes iri kutarisirwa kuparurwa kupera kwemwedzi uno ichanetsa kushanda kwayo. Asi vanotengesa mafuta muChinhoyi varamba kutaura neStudio 7 vachiti titaure nevekumahofisi avo makuru ari kuHarare. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvemhando dzemoto VaPatson Mbiriri mugwaro ravaburitsa mumapepanhau nhasi vati mune mafuta edzimotokari anokwanira nyika yose kusvika gore rinouya. Asi vanoongorora nezvehupfumi vanoti hurumende iri kuhwanda nemumwe sezvo dambudziko remafuta edzimotokari riri kuonekwa nemunhu wese nokuda kwekuvharwa kwemapombi emafuta mumagaraji. No media source currently available

headline: Huori Muhurumende Hoendesa Nyika kuMawere
text: Nyaya yehuori yanetsa munyika zvikuru mumakambani ehurumende ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita chikiribidi munyaya yematenda ane mari inosvika mabhiriyoni emadhora. Nyaya yehuori yanetsa munyika zvikuru mumakambani ehurumende ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita chikiribidi munyaya yematenda ane mari inosvika mabhiriyoni emadhora. Huori hunonzi nevakawanda huri kupawo kuti nyika irambe iri mumadhaka. Mapazi ehurumende akaita seremhando dzemoto anonzi akapa basa kunhengo yeZanu-PF, VaPsychology Mazivisa, rekushambadzira kambani iyi kunyangwe paine vanhu vari kuita basa iri. Kambani yeZesa inonziwo iri kupa VaWicknel Chivhayo mamiriyoni emadhora ekuita zvinonzi nevamwe zviri kuitwa nechikiribidi. Vakuru kumakambani akaita seZimra neAnti-Corruption Commission vari kuferefetwa pari zvino nenyaya dzehuori. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakatendawo kuti mari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu yemangoda yakatsakatira kwachiyadzwa. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti mutungamiri wenyika anofanira kuona kuti nyaya yehuori yapararira. No media source currently available

headline: Platform for Youth Development Yorwisa Kuti Mhuri Dzisabviswa kuMunyokowere, kuChipinge
text: Sangano revechidiki rePlatform for Youth Development rinoti rave kushanda nemagweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights mukuedza kumisa kubviswa kwemhuri dzinodarika mazana mashanu dzigere Munyokowere kuChipangayi, mudunhu reChipinge kuManicaland. Mhuri idzi dzinonzi dzakatopiwa tsamba dzekudzizivisa kuti dzinge dzabva panzvimbo iyi mukati memazuva manomwe, kukundikana kwadzo dzinozobviswa nechisimba. Mutungamiri wePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vanoti mhuri idzi dzakatambira matsamba aya, ayo anonzi akanyorwa musi wa 27 mwedzi wapera, dzichiziviswa kuti dzinge dzabva munzvimbo iyi panopera zuva nemusi wa 05 mwedzi uno. VaMadhuku vanoti matsamba aya akabva kuhofisi yebazi rezveminda nekugariswa patsva kwevanhu, kunyange hazvo mhuri idzi dzagara panzvimbo iyi kubva muna 1992 padzakagariswa zviri pamutemo nevaive mudzviti wedunhu iri. Vanoti chakaita kuti mhuri idzi dzigariswe panzvimbo iyi chaive chikumbiro chevarimi vachena vaiveko vaida kuti vabatsirwe nemasvikiro kuchenesa nzvimbo yavo., Asi vanoti chiri kunyanya kurwadza mhuri idzi ndechekuti hurumende haina kutanga yagara navo pasi isati yavapa matsamba ekuti vabviswe aya. Vanoti hapana kana hurongwa huripo hwekuti vana vechikoro vachaita sei, uye hapana nzvimbo yavati varatidzwa yekunzi ndiko kwavachaendeswa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvekurima nekugariswa patsva kwevanhu pamusoro penyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muAmerica Zvokurudzirwa Kunotanga Mabhisimusi Kumusha
text: Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vari kukurudzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika kuti zvitangewo mabhizimisi munyika. VaNcube vakataura mashoko aya muWashington DC nezuro umo vari kushanya. Vari kuitawo misangano nevakuru muhurumende yeAmerica pamwe nevesangano reIMF neWorld Bank. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muWashington DC, VaTaka Kapikinyu, vanoti kunyangwe hazvo vakawana mukana wekunzwa kubva kuna VaNcube, vachiri kuda kuti nyaya dzehuwori nedzekumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu dzitange yagadziriswa. Vanoti zvinhu zviviri izvi zvinoodza moyo yeavo vanoda kunotanga mabhisimusi kumusha. "Nyaya yekuchinjiwa chinjiwa kwemari inoshandisa munyika ndiyo iwe iri kundiworesa moyo sezvo ndakarasikirwa nemari yangu munguva yapfuura," VaKapikinyu vakaudza Studio 7. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti, "Hurumende haitipe nguva yekutora mari dzedu dzisati dzamedzwa zvinova zvinotishungurudza parizvino." No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kushanda neIMF Apo Makambani Otadza Kubhadara Mitero kuZIMRA
text: Nyaya yekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika inenge yoramba ichinetsa zvichitevera mashoko eZimbabwe Revenue Authority, ZIMRA, ekuti iri kutadza kuunganidza mari yemitero yavange vachitarisira kubva kuvanhu nemakambani. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vari muridzi wekambani yeManagement Solutions, VaLuxon Zembe, avo vaimbova mutungamiri weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, vanoti vanhu vose vanofanira kutsigira zviri kuitwa negurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, zvekuyedza kugadzirisa hupfumi vachishanda neIMF. Zimbabwe pari zvino haisi kupihwa zvikwereti nenyika uye mabhanga ekunze nepamusana pekutadza kubhadhara mitero. Mamwe makurukota ehurumende kusanganisira rezvekuendeswa kwehupfumi kuvatema, VaPatrick Zhuwawo, pamwe rezvevakarwa hondo, VaChris Mutsvangwa, vange vachishora VaChinamasa zvikuru vachiti vari kurasika nekuda kuumba hukama neIMF neWorld Bank. Mari dzemitero inobatwa nehurumende dzinoshandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vehurumende, kugadzira migwagwa, zvikoro, magwenya emagetsi, madhamu nezvimwe zvivakwa. Mukati memwedzi mitanhatu yekutanga kwegore rino, ZIMRA yakawana mari inosvika US$1,66 billion asi iyo yaitarisira mari inosvika US$1,76 billion. Sachigaro webhodhi reZIMRA, Amai Willia Bonyongwe, mumashoko avo mugwaro rezvemamiriro emari yemitero, vanobvuma kuti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi kwapa kuti makambani akawanda atadze kubhadhara mitero. Vanotiwo vakayedza kupa makambani nguva yakareba yekubhadhara zvikwereti vachiyambira kuomesera vari kuramba kubhadhara mari dzemitero vachiviga mari kuti ZIMRA isaone zviri kuitika, asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida . Makambani ane zvikwereti kuZIMRA zvemari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru weZIMRA, VaGershom Pasi, sezvo nhare yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMRA Yoomesera Vasiri Kubhadhara Mitero
text: Chipiri range riri zuva rekupedzisira remakambani emunyika ane zvikwereti zvemutero kuti ange atenderana nebazi reZimbabwe Revenue Authority, ZIMRA, kuti angazvibhadhara sei mari iyi gore rino risati rapera. Asi vakuru vemabhizimisi vanoti kuda kuvamanikidza kubhadhara mari iri kunzi neZIMRA inopfuura bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora zvichapa kuti vavhare mabhizinesi avo, vanhu vorasikirwa nemabasa. ZIMRA inoti mari iyi ndeyezvikwereti zvekubva muna Kukadzi 2009 kusvika muna Gunyana 2014. ZIMRA iri kuyambira kuti vanhu vanenge vanyepa pamapepa avo vanobvisirwa kanganwiro kana kuti Amnesty yavanenge vapihwa. ZIMRA iri kuita chipatapata chekutsvaga mari yekupa hurumende kuti ibhadhare vashandi pamwe nekufambisa mabasa ehurumende. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chnamasa, vanoti ZIMRA inofanira kuona kuti mitero yabhadharwa. Mutungamiri wesangano revemabhizimisi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mufukari, vanoti havaone makambani achikwanisa kubhdhara mari iyi sezvo makambani aya ari kuomerwawo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemukuru anoona nezvehupfumi musangano Resource Exploitation Watch, VaWashington Mehlomakhulu, avo vanoti nguva yekuti vanhu vabhadhare zvikwereti inofanirwa kuwedzerwa. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotenga Gorosi Kubva kuGermany neCanada
text: Sangano reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe rakazivisa kuti riri kuunza gorosi kubva kuCanada neGermany kuitira kuti munyika musashaikwe chingwa sezvo gorosi rave shoma munyika. Izvi zvinoitika panguva iyo mutemo wechingwa uri kunzi wave kukwira kubva padhora rimwe chete kuenda padhora nemasendi gumi nekuda kwekushaikwa kwegorosi munyika nekukwirawo kwezvimwe zvinodiwa pakugadzirwa kwechingwa. Sachigaro veGrain Millers Association Zimbabwe, VaTadzwa Musarara, vaudza vatapi venhau nhasi kuti gorosi rave shoma chaizvo munyika uye mamwe makambani anoita zvekugaya gorosi akatomira basa izvo zvakazoita kuti vatenge gorozi kubva kuCananda neGermany. VaMusarara vatenda banga reReserve Bank nekuvapa chimwe chikamu chemari yekunze kuti vabhadhare gorosi iri uye vati bhanga iri rinotarisirwa kubhadhara mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora zvasara kumakambani akavatengesera gorosi aya kuitira kuti richitange kupinda munyika. Vanoti pane chikepe chine zviuru makumi matatu zvegorosi chakatomira kuBeira uye vachatanga kutakura gorosi iri kana RBZ yabhadhara mari mangwana. VaMusarara vati kunyange hazvo nyika ichida matani anodarika zviuru makumi matatu egorosi, vari kuunza gorosi shoma rinokwanisa kutakurwa nezvikepe zvinosvika paBeira. Vatiwo huwandu hwevanhu munyika huri kuramba huchikwira izvi zvinoita kuti chikafu chavanoda kudya chiwande. VaMusarara vatiwo kunyange nyika ikarima gorosi rakawanda sei, icharamba ichitenga gorosi rekunze sezvo pakubika chingwa pachishandiswa zvikamu makumi matatau kubva muzana zvegorosi remuno chete. Vati zvimwe zvikamu zvegorosi remuno zvinoshandiswa kugadzira furawa inogadzira mabhisikitis nezvimwe. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinokatyamadza kuti nyika inoramba ichiita dambudziko rezvinhu zvakaita segorosi kana chingwa asi iyo hurumende ichagara ichipa vanhu mbeu, zvekurimisa, matarakita nguva nenguva. Gurukota rezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri, vakaudzawo bepanhau reHerald kutanga kwesvondo rino kuti hurumende ichaedza napose painogona kuona kuti gorosi rekubika chingwa rawanikwa munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reAfrican Parliamentarian’s Network Against Corruption, APNAC, Rinoudzwa Kuti Panofanirwa Kuve neMafungiro Matsva eKurwisa Huwori
text:
Kunyange hazvo nyika ine mitemo nemapazi akasiyana-siyana anobatsira
kurwisa huwori, izvi zvinonzi hazvina kukwana nekuti
chinhu chikuru chinodiwa ndechekuti vanhu vave nemafungiro pamwe
nemaitiro matsva pakurwisa huwori uhu. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wekuzeya mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzekurwisa huwori, uri kuitwa nenhengo dzeparamende dziri pasi pesangano reAfrican Parliamentarian’s Network Against Corruption kana kuti APNAC. Vachitaura semunyarikani kuburikidza nepadandemutande pamusangano
wekuzeya nyaya yekurwisa huwori waitwa muBulawayo, Muzvinafundo
Patrick Lumumba vekuKenya, avo vane mukurumbira munyaya dzekurwisa huwori, vati
kunyange hazvo pane vamwe vane maonero ekuti huwori hauna kuwanda
sezvinotaurwa nevakawanda munyika dzemuAfrica uye kuti nyika
dzekumadokero dzinobatsira mukuita kuti huwori huvepo munyika idzi,
chokwadi ndechekuti huwori idambudziko guru ratekeshera munyika
dzakawanda muAfrica.

Vati pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvinoitwa nenyika dzakawanda kusanganisira
Zimbabwe zvinosungirwa kuitwa nevanhu vanoshanda muhurumende senzira
yekudzivirira huwori asi huwori hunoramba huchitekeshera

///Zvinhu zvinoshamisa nekurwadza kuti zvisinei nekuti vashandi
vehurumende nevezvematongerwo enyika munyika dzakawanda muAfrica ndivo
vanowana mihoro yakaderera, vanowanikwa vari ivo vamwe vevanhu vane
hupfumi hwakakura munyika idzi. Pari zvino munyika dzemuAfrica
dzakawanda kana uchida kuve munhu akapfuma asi usingashande unoita
zvematongerwo enyika kana kuti unopinda muchiuto kana kuwana basa
repamusoro muhurumende.///

Vati kunyange hazvo pane mitemo uye nemapazi akasiyana-siyana
anobatsira kurwisa huwori, huwori uhu hunopera chete kana vanhu vakave
nemafungiro pamwe netsika itsva dzekuita zvinhu.

"Yasvika zvino nguva yekuti tiongorore hunhu hwedu tibvume kuti tiri
kuita zvinhu zvisina kufanira; tiri kutadza zvikurusa uye tinofanirwa
kuti tigadzirise kutadza kwedu uku. Hapana mitemo ichatibatsira
pakugadzirisa izvi; hapana matare achatibatsira pakugadzirisa
izvi…tinofanirwa kungochinja hunhu hwedu."

VaTemba Mliswa, avo vanove sachigaro wechikamu chemuZimbabwe
cheAfrican Parliamentarian’s Network Agaiant Corruption, uye vari nhengo yeparamende yakazvimirira, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanobvumirana nemaonero aMuzvinafundo Lumumba. Vashora nyaya yekuti vamwe vakuru vakuru vehurumende nemapazi
ehurumende vane chekuita nekurwisa huwori vanotadza kuvepo pamisangano
yakadai, vakatsinhira kuti zvakakosha kuti munhu wose azvipire panyaya
yekurwisa huwori.

VaBrian Dube avo vanove sachigaro vekomiti inoona
nezvekushandiswa kwemari dzehurumende mudare reparamende, kana kuti Public Accounts Committee, vatiwo vanotsigira maonero aVaLumumba.

Muzvare Memory Mbondiah vanomirira dunhu reMidlands pasi
pehurongwa hwe proportional representation vatiwo zvakakosha kuti pave nedzidziso
yakasimba kuvanhu vose munyika kusanganisira muzvikoro pamusoro
pekuipa kwehuwori.

Asi VaKuziwa Murapa vanove mutevedzeri wasachigaro weZimbabwe
Anti-Corruption Commission, kana kuti ZACC, vaudza Studio 7 kuti
kunyange hazvo vachibvumirana nemaonero aVaLumumba pane mitemo inoda
kuvandudzwa kuti kurwisa huwori munyika kunyatsobudirira.

Sangano reAPNAC rinopindwa nenhengo dzeparamende nesenate nekuda kwadzo
senzira yekuratidza kuzvipira kwadzo mukurwisa huwori. Musangano wekuzeya kurwisa huwori uyu unopera neMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: Komiti yeParamende Inotsamwiswa neMabatiro eHurumende Nyaya yePeturu neDhiziri
text: Kambani yehurumende inotengesa mafuta edzimotokari yePetrotrade inoti kana hurumende ikaramba ichitara mitengo yekutenga nekutengeswa kwemafuta edzimotokari dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemafuta aya hariperi. Vachipindura kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemhando dzemoto kuti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemafuta edzimotokari munyika ringapedzwe sei, vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wePetrotrade, VaGodfrey Ncube, vati izvi zvinogoneka chete kana vemabhizimusi vakapiwa mukana wekunotenga mafuta vouya votengesa nemari yavanotara pachavo. VaNcube vabvuma kuti kuita izvi kunokwidza mitengo zvakanyanya asi vati ndiyo chete nzira ingabudise nyika mudambudziko remafuta rave nemakore ane chitsama richinetsa munyika. VaNcube vati kumirira mafuta anobva kuhurumende kuri kuita kuti mafuta ave mashoma munyika sezvo vari kuwaniswa mafuta aya nenguva iri kure. VaNcube varatidza kushomeka kwemafuta ari kutengwa nerubatsiro rwunobva kuhurumende nemuenzaniso wavapa vachiti pamwedzi mitanhatu yekutanga gore rapera, vakatengesa mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emarita, asi munguva yakafanana iyi gore rino vakatengesa marita mamiriyoni makumi matatu ane matanhatu chete. Vachibvunzwa kuti bazi ravo rinotarisira kupedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari iri rinhi, munyori mubazi rezvemhando dzemoto, Amai Gloria Magombo, vati dambudziko iri haringaperi kana mari yekunze ichiri shoma munyika. Vatiwo kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kunoda nyika yese kwete bazi ravo chete. Vachibvunza nenyaya yekuti hurongwa hwekushandisa Smart Card mukutenga mafuta hwakataurwa nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, apo vaiti kadhi iri rinenge richiratidza huwandu hwemafuta anenge amwiwa nemotokari yega yega pagaraji rinenge rashandiswa kutenga mafuta aya, Amai Magombo vati hurongwa uhwu hwakadzorerwa shure nedenda reCOVID-19 vachiti pane zvaida kunotengwa kuChina. Amai Magombo vati vanga vasingakwanisi kutaura kuti hurongwa uhwu hwuchabudirira rinhi kunyange hazvo VaMangudya vakaudza komiti iyi mwedzi wapera kuti vaitarisira kuti kupera kwemwedzi waChikumi vanenge vaedza kushandisa kadhi iri kuitira kti vaone kana richishanda sezvaitarisira. Izvi zvatsamwisa zvakanyanya komiti yeparamende iyo yati inoona sekuti bazi rezvemhando dzemoto riri kutadza kuita basa rayo sezvo Amai Magombo vatiwo vatangawo kunzwa nenhengo dzekomiti iyi nhasi kuti magaraji mazhinji anotengesa mafuta munyika ari kutengesa nemari yemadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti makuponi anotengwa nemari yekunze . Komiti iyi yati iru kushushikana zvikuru kuti mabasa akawanda ekuvandudza nyika ari kukanganiswa nekushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inodzikisa Mutengo wePasipoti yeChimbichimbi
text: Hurumende yazivisa kuti yadzikisa mari inobhadharwa pakutora mapasipoti zvechichimbi asi yawedzera mari inobhadharwa pamapasipoti anononoka kubuda. Gurukota rinoona nezvinotika mukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, vazivisa kubudikidza nemutemo weStatutory Instrument 16 of 2022, kuti mapasipoti echimbichimbi kana kuti emergence passports, ayo anga achitorwa nemadhora ekuAmerica mazana matatu ane gumi nemasere ($318), ave kutorwa nemadhora mazana maviri ekuAmerica. Muchiziviso ichi, hurumende yakwidza mari yepasipoti inononoka kubuda, kana normal passport, kubva pamadhora makumi mashanu nematatu kusvika pazana rimwechete remadhora ekuAmerica. Mari iyi ndiyo imwecheteyo ichange ichibhadharwa kana munhu achida kutora pasipoti yechizvinozvino, kana kuti e-passport, yakaparurwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa mwedzi wapera. Pamusoro pemari iyi, VaKazembe vatiwo veruzhinji vachange vachisungirwa kubhadhara mari inoita madhora makumi maviri ekuAmerica kuti vawane iri kudaidzwa kuti Quick Response Code inoita kuti ma e-passport akwanise kuverengeka pamichina yechimanjemanje yave kushandiswa nedzimwe nyika. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Tabeth Madziva, vati vafara zvikuru nekudzikiswa kwemari yekutora mapasipoti echimbichimbi vachiti mari yanga ichibhadhariswa nehurumende pakutora mapasipoti aya yanga yakawandisa. Asi umwe mugari wekuEpworth, VaKennedy Mazivanhanga, vati havasi kufara nekukwidzwa kwaitwa mari yekutora pasipoti isiri yechimbichimbi nemadhora makumi mana nemanomwe ekuAmerica. Mutauriri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaObert Masaraure, vati hurumende inofanira kutora matanho ekuti vanhu vakwanise kuwana magwaro ose zviri nyore kubva kumagwaro ekuzvarwa, zvitupa kusvika kumapasipoti. VaMasaraure vatiwo veruzhinji vari kurasikirwa nemikana yakawanda kunze kwenyika nekuti vanenge vasina magwaro ekufambisa sezvo vazhinji vasina magwaro ekufambisa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaKazembe sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nhare dzavo pamwe nevekumahofisi amabharani mukuru, kana kuti Registrar General, kuti tinzwe kuti vachadzikisa here mutengo wemapaspipoti zvakare uye kuti matanho api avachatora pane avo vane mapasipoti asati abuda vave nenguva vakamirira mapasipoti avo. Asi munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vakanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti michina yekudhinda mapasipoti echizvinozvino inokwanisa kudhinda mapasipoti zviuru makumi matatu (30 000) pazuva zvichireva kuti michina iyi ikatanga kushandiswa Zimbabwe inokwanisa kudhindira vanhu vose vakamirira mapasipoti avo vanofungidzirwa kuti vanosvika zviuru mazana maviri mukati memavhiki maviri. No media source currently available

headline: Kambani yeEconet Group Yotungamira Mukubatsira Vakawirwa neTsaona yeCyclone Idai
text: Kambani yenharembozha, yeEconet Group, inoti yatumirawo michina yechizvinozvino, yema drone, pamwe nezvikopokopo nezvikepe kuti zvibatsire mukutsvagwa kwevanhu vakashaya mutsaona yedutumupengo Cyclone Idai pamwe nevachiri vapenyu kuManicaland. Mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muEconet Group, VaFungai Mandiveyi, vanoti kambani yavo yakakwanisawo zvakare kubatsira nemabhokisi ekuvigisa vafi anosvika makumi mashanu, pamusoro pezvimwe zvakawanda zvairi kubatsira nazvo mutsaona yemafashamu iyi, zvinosanganisira mari. "Ma drone tagara tichiashandisa mubasa redu kuona kuti michina yedu yakamira zvakanaka here kana kuti yave kuda kugadziriswa. Asi takaona kuti tinogona kuashandisawo mukutsvaga vakapona mutsaona iyi. Ma drone ari nani pane zvikopokopo nedzimwe nguva nekuti anogona kupinda pasingakwanisi kupindwa nechikopokopo, uye anogona kubhururuka ari pasi chaizvo." VaMandiveyi vanoti kambani yavo iri kurwisawo kuti masaisai awanikwe munzvimbo idzi kuburikidza nekugadzira michina yavo yakarohwa nedutumupengo iri. Vanoti vari kubatsirawo nekupa makadhi ekufonesa kana kuti air time kuvanhu vari mumapoka akasiyanasiyana vari kushanda mukubatsira kutsvagwa kwevanhu, kuvhura migwagwa, nemamwe mabasa. Econet ine vanhu vari kubatsira vakawanda, uye yakatovhura muzinda wayo wekusvikira rubatsiro uyo uri maMutare. Vamwe vevari kubatsira ndavanachiremba. Kambani iyi yazivisawo kuti yabatana neAir Zimbabwe mukutakurwa kwerubatsiro kubva kuvanhu vari kuVictoria Falls neBulawayo kuenda kuHarare uko rubatsiro urwu rwunozorongedzwa rwusati rwananga kwaMutare kwarwunozosusukidzwa kuenda kunzvimbo dzine dambudziko. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inorambidza Kubviswa Mudzimba Vanenge Vatadza Kubhadjhara Rendi Munguva yeLockdown
text: Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vakazivisa kuti dare remakurukota ehurumende, kana kuti ‘Cabinet”, rakabvumirana kumbomisa vanhu kubudiswa mudzimba dzavanogara kana kubviswa muzvimbo dzemabhizimisi mavanorenta kana vachinge vatanga kubvisa mari dzerendi. Vachinyora pa Twitter pavo, VaMangwana vakati izvi zvinotanga pamari dzinobhadharwa neavo vanoshandisa dzimba kana nzvimbo dzavanobhadhara marendi kuti vagare kana kushandira, vachiti mari dzemarendi dzinofanirwa kumbomira kubhadharwa pari zvino uye hapana anofanirwa kubudiswa munzvimbo dzavanogara nenyaya yekusabhadhara mari dzema rendi dzange dzichifanirwa kubhadharwa kupera kwemwedzi uno, Kubvumbi, kusvika panomiswa mutemo wekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo, kana kuti ‘lockdown’. Mudzidzisa wezvehupfumi hwenyika paNational University of Science and Technology, VaStevenson Dlamini, vaudza Studio7 kuti danho rakatorwa nehurumende richabatsira vanhu vazhinji vanozvishandira sezvo vari ivo vakawanda kupfuura vanoshandira makambani. VaDlamini vanoti zvicharwadza vazhinji asi zvakanakira avo vanoshanda vega sezvo vari ivo vazhinji vanoshanda munyika uye vanopfuura avo vanoshandira makambani. No media source currently available

headline: VaChinamasa Vanotura Bhajeti re$4,1 Billion Kuti Ritambirwe neParamende
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vaparura neChina bhajeti regore rinouya remabhiriyoni mazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora. VaChinamasa vanoti zvikamu makumi masere nezviviri kubva muzana zvemari iyi zvichashandiswa pamihoro yevashandi vehurumende. Vati izvi zvinoreva kuti hurumende inosara isina mari yekawanda yekushandisa kuita mamwe mabasa ayo akakosha. Vachitura muparamende hurongwa hwavari kuda kuti hushandiswe pamari yehurumende gore rinouya, Chinamasa vati hupfumi hwenyika hauna kumira zvakanaka uye bhajeti iri harina kunyanyosiyana nere gore rino. Semaonero avo, VaChinamasa vati izvi zvinoreva kuti hupfumi hwenyika hausi kufamba zvakanaka. Vati mari zhinji ichaunganidzwa nehurumende ichaenda kumihoro yevashandi vayo uye izvi zvinoreva kuti hurumende ichange ichibhadhara vashandi vanenge vasingaite basa sezvo pasina mari yekuitisa mabasa anodiwa nehurumende. VaChinamasa vati kunze kwemari yavari kutarisira kuwana kubva kumitero, vanotarisira kuwana mari ingangosvika bhiriyoni remadhora sezvikwereti pamwe nerubatsiro runobva kune dzimwe nyika. Vati sezvo hupfumi hwenyika husiri kufamba zvakanaka, zvakakosha kuti bhajeti ravo rironge hwaro hwekuti makambani avhure uye kuti nyika ikwanise kukwezva makambani ekunze. Vanoti pari zvino nyika iri kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda kubva kunze kudarika zvairi kutengesa. Vatiwo zvizhinji zviri kutengwa kunze zvinogona kugadzirwa munyika. Nekuda kwaizvovo, VaChinamasa vati makambani achange achitengesa zvinhu kunze zvakanyanya achabvisa mitero inenge iri pasi pasi. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo vari kushanda nemabhanga ekunze akaita seInternational Monetary Fund mukugadzirisa nyaya yezvikwereti, hurumende yavewo nehwaro hwekugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Zimbabwe ine zvikwereti zvekunze zvinosvika mabhiriyoni masere emadhora ekunze. Vatiwo mutemo wekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema vemuno unofanira kujekeswa kuitira kuti vekunze vakwanise kuzotanga mabhizimisi muZimbabwe. VaChinamasa vanoti vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi munyika vanofanira kutaurirana nebazi rinoona nezvevechidiki nezvekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema kuti vajekeserwe kuti mutemo uyu unofamba sei. Vati izvi zvakakosha sezvo makambani emunyika ari kuvhara. Vatiwo kubva muna 2011 kusvika gore rino, makambani anodarika zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu akavhara, ukuwo vashandi vanodarika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvishanu, vakarasikirwa nemabasa. VaChinamasa vatiwo vashandi vanotambira mari isingadariki mazana matanhatu emadhora pamwedzi havafanirwe kubatirwa mutero kutanga gore rinouya. VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende iri kuda kukwidza mitero wefodya yemudzanga senzira yekuunganidza mari. Vatiwo vari kukumbira paramende kuti idzikewo mutero kuvarimi vefodya vachiti mari ichaunganidzwa kubva pamutero uyu ichashandiswa pamabasa ekudyara miti sezvo varimi vefodya vari kutema miti apo vanenge vave kupisa fodya yavo. VaChinamasa vati vari kudawo kuderedza mitero yehwahwa hwemumabhodhoro kana izvi zvikatambirwa neparamende. VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekupa hurumende dzematunhu mari asi yakamirira kuti patange pave nemitemo yekushanda kwehurumende dzematunhu idzi. Vatiwo vari kuda kuisawo parutivi mamiriyoni gumi emadhora semari yekusimudzira matunhu kana kuti Constituency Development Fund. Asi vati mari iyi ichapihwa nhengo dzeparamende kana pachinge pave nemutemo wekushandiswa kwemari iyi. VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubatsira varimi nembeu nefotireza nezvimwe senzira yekuti nyika iwane goho rakanaka. Vatiwo hupfumi hwenyika hunotarisirwa kukura nezvikamu zvitatu nechidimbu kubva muzana gore rinouya. Matare eHouse of Assembly ne Senate ari kutarisirwa kuzeya bhajeti raturwa naVaChinamasa oona kuti oritambira here kana kuti kwete sezvinodiwa nemitemo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Vanoti Vanotengesa Mafuta Vari Kuita Chitsotsi
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, pamwe negurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwepeturu nedhiziri munyika riri kunyanyokonzerwa nehuwori huri kuitwa nemakambani nemagaraji anotengesa mafuta. Vachipa humbowo kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaMangudya vati vanoshamisika zvikuru kuti pane mitsetse yepeturu nedziziri ivo vakapa makambani emafuta munyika magwaro ekubhadhara mafuta aya kana kuti maLetters of Credit anokwana nyika yese. Vati pari zvino vakabhadhara mari inoita mamiriyoni zana negumi nemashanu emadhora ekuAmerica, iyo vati inokwanisa kutenga marita mamiriyoni zana nemakumi manomwe emafuta pamwedzi, kunyange hazvo nyika ichida zana nemakumi matatu emamiriyoni emarita emafuta pamwedzi. VaMangudya vati pane humbowo hunoratidza kuti mamiriyoni mashanu emarita ari kubva kumatangi ekuMsasa zuva rega rega, asi mafuta aya haasvike kumagaraji sezvo ari kuendeswa kunze kwenyika. VaMangudya vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti pane chitsotsi chiri kuitwa nemakambani aya. Asi VaMangudya vaudza komiti iyi kuti nyika ine chikwereti chisati chabhadharwa chemari inosvika mazana maviri emamiriyoni emadhora kumakambani ekunze anotengesa mafuta anosanganisira Independent Petroleum Group, Glencore, Trafigura, Engen ne Total. Vachipawo humbowo kukomiti iyi, VaChasi vati zviri pachena kuti pane huwori huri kuitwa nemakambani aya uye vari kutora matanho ekupedza zvese izvi. Vatiwo mafuta emotokari emuno ari kutengeswawo kunyika dzakati komberedza sezvo akachipa kudarika kunyika idzi. VaChasi vati Zimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority inofanira kupihwa simba rekuita basa rayo nemazvo pamwe nekuongorora kuti mafuta anofamba sei kubva kwaonochengeterwa kuMsasa kuenda kumagaraji mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri anotengesa mafuta munyika. VaChasi naVaMangudya vatiwo nyaya yemanyepo pamadandemutande akaita seWhatsApp, Twitter nemamwe ndiwo anokonzerawo kuti vanhu vaite chipatapata chekutenga mafuta vachichengeta mudzimba izvo zvinoita kuti ashaikwe mumagaraji. Vati izvi ndizvo zvakaitika svondo rino apo pakatanga kufambiswa mashoko ekuti mafuta emotokari ainge akwira mutengo asi iwo asina. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei vari kuramba kuti mafuta atengeswe nemadhora ekuAmerica, VaMangudya vati hazvigoni kuti hurumende iiite izvi nekuti vanhu vakawanda munyika havawani mari iyi. Vati zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana chete zvevanhu munyika ndizvo zvinowana mari yekunze chete. Pavabvunzwa neimwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaAnele Ndebele, kuti havawoni sekuti nyaya dzekusamira zvakanaka kwematongerwo enyika ndidzo dziri kukanganisa zvinhu munyika, VaChasi vati zviri pachena kuti izvi zviri kuitika munyika zvinokanganisa chimiro chenyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati zviri kuitika zvinoratidza kuti nyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoda kugadziriswa. Zvichakadai, VaChasi vazivisa kuti kushanduka kwemamiririro ekunze kuri kuita kuti mvura irambe ichidzikira kuKariba izvo zvinogona kuti gwenya remagetsi rimire kushanda mukati memwedzi gumi nemina kana izvi zvikaramba zvichiitika. Vatiwo nyaya yekusabhadhara magetsi, kubiwa kwemaTransformer nedzimwe tambo dzemagetsi zviri kutadzisa ZESA kuita basa rayo nemazvo. VaChasi vatiwo bhodhi reZESA pamwe nevakuru vakuru mukambani iyi vange vasiri kufambisa basa nemazvo izvo zvaita kuti kambani iyi isvike pakutadza kugaya magetsi anokwanira nyika. VaChasi vati vachadoma nyanzvi nevanhu vane chimiro chakanaka kupinda mubhodhi reZESA kuti vaburitse kambani iyi mumadhaka mairi.

headline: VaBiti Votatsurana naVaMangudya neNyaya yeMari ye"Command Agriculture"
text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, nhasi vaudza komiti yeparamende kuti hapana chavakatadza apo vakashandisa mari inodarika mabhiriyoni matatu kutenga zvinhu pazvirongwa zvakaita sePresidential Input, Command nezvimwe muna 2017 na2018 vachiti zvese izvi zvakaitwa paine mvumo kubva kuhurumende. Sachigaro wekomiti iyi ndiVaTendai Biti vanova mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC. Komiti iyi yange yakoka VaMangudya kuti vazotsanangura kuti sei RBZ yakashandisa mari inodarika mabhiriyoni matatu emadhora muna 2017 na 2018 zvisina mvumo yeparamende. VaBiti vaudza VaMangudya kuti komiti yavo yaita izvi mushure mekunge hofisi yaAuditor General yaburitsa magwaro anoratidza kuti RBZ yainge yashandisa mari isiri mubhajeti uye pasina mvumo yedare reparamende sezviri mubumbiro remutemo. VaBiti vabvunza VaMangudya kuti chii chakaita kuti vatyore mutemo wenyika. Asi VaMangudya vaudza komiti iyi kuti hapana mutemo wavakatyora vachiti vakatumwa nehurumende kuita zvese zvavakaita. Vati kana paka kanganiswa mutemo, gurukota rezvemari ndiro rinofanira kubvunzwa nekuti ndiro rakavapa mvumo yekubhadhara zvinhu zvakawanda zvakaita sezvinhu zvaishandiswa pazvirongwa zvakaita sePresidential Input Scheme, Command Agriculture pamwe nekubhadhara makambani akaita seZESA, ZISCOSTEEL nemamwe. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube sezvo vari kuRussia kumusangano weRussia Africa Summit. Asi VaBiti nevamwe vavo vati komiti yavo yakabvunzurudza vamwe vakuru vakuru mubazi rezvemari nerekurima avo vakataura kuti vainge vasingazive kuti mari dzainge dzabhadharwa neRBZ dzaive dzei. Asi VaMangudya vati zviri pachena kuti vakuru vakuru ava vanogona kunge vakanyepera komiti iyi kana kuti vainge vasingazive zveshuwa asi vakati bhanga ravo rine matsamba ese akabva kugurukota rezvemari richivaudza kuti vabhadhare makambani kana kutenga zvinhu zvakatenga. Imwe nyaya isina kufadza komiti iyi ndeyekuti maTreasury Bills akaburitswa neRBZ nebazi rezvemari ainge asina zvese zvinodiwa pamaTreasury Bills. VaMangudya vabvuma kuti apa vakati vachagadzirisa izvi mune remangwana. Pamusangano wanhasi pamboita kukandira makobvu nematete pakati paVaMangudya naVaBiti izvo zvisina kufadza dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi. Mumwe asina kufara nekuita kwaVaMangudya naVaBiti ndiAmai Barbara Rwodzi avo vaudza vaviriri ava kuti varekemekedze dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi kuti ikwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka. Komiti yaVaBiti iri kushushikana kuti mari dzehurumende dzakashandiswa zviri kunze kwemutemo zvikuru sei pazvirongwa zvakaita sePresidential Input Scheme neCommand Agriculture uye nemusi weMuvhuro unouya ichabvunzurudza zvakare vakuru vakuru mubazi rezvemari pamusoro penyaya iyi. Nhasi komiti iyi yange yakatarisirwa kutura gwaro rayo rekutanga pamusoro pemashandire eRBZ. No media source currently available

headline: Mutengo weShuga Unokwira Zvakapetwa Ruviri
text: Kambani inogadzira shuga yeTongaat Hulett inonzi yakwidza mutengo weshuga nezvikamu zvingada kusvika kuzana kubva muzana kutanga neMuvhuro uno. Gwaro raburitswa nekambani iyi rinoratidza kuti mutengo wepakiti yeshuga ye brown ine huremu hwekirogiramu imwechete wakwira kubva pamadhora mana ane masendi makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kuenda pamadhora masere ane masendi makumi matanhatu nerimwe emaRTGS. Makirogiramu maviri eshuga imwecheteyo akwirawo kuenda pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi makumi maviri nemaviri kubva pamadhora mapfumbamwe ane masendi makumi mapfumbamwe nemasere. Kukwira kwemutengo weshuga uku kunotevera kumboshaikwa kwayo mune zvimwe zvitoro mumazuva mashoma adarika. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti hausi mutengo weshuga chete wakwira, asi kuti zvakawanda zviri kukwirawo mitengo, zvichikonzerwa nekukwira kwemutengo wemafuta edzimotokari. Panyaya yekushaikwa kwechingwa, Doctor Citambara vanoti vamwe vanobika chingwa vanogona kunge vakamira kuita izvi nekuda kwekupindira kwehurumende mukutarwa kwemitengo yechingwa. No media source currently available

headline: ZACC Yovimbisa Kuvhura Mamwe Mahofisi Matatu Kuitira Kurerutsa Mabasa Ayo
text: Komisheni inorwisana nehuwori munyika, yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, inoti iri kutarisira kunge yave nemahofisi anoshanda mumatunhu matanhatu emunyika mukupera kwegore rino senzira yekuedza kurerutsa mashandiro ayo. Mashoko aya, ayo ataurwa nemumwe wemakomishina uye vari mutauriri weZACC, VaJohn Makamure, anotevera nyunyuto yabuda muvanhu vanga vari pamusangano waitwa maMutare wekuzeya mashandiro akanaka ekomisheni iyi, kana kuti Draft National Anti-Corruption Strategy. VaTakashinga Mashayahanya mumwe wevagari vemaMutare vange vari pamusangano uyu. VaMashayahanya vanoti sangano reZACC rinosungirwa kuwanzira mimwe yemisangano yaro kumaruwa kune vanhu vakawanda uye nekune mamwe maguta, kwete kungorambira vari kuguta guru reHarare. "Tinoziva kuti ZACC iri kuedza kuita basa rakanaka asi inofanirwa kuonekwa kuti yambosungawo vamwe vanhu vachipika here kwete kungoti kune ZACC pasina asungwa. Tinoda kuti ZACC iwonekwe kwese kumisha, kumaruwa ichiita basa kuti vanambuya nevana vechikoro vazive nezvebasa rayo, kwete kuwandira mumaguta makuru chete." Mumwe wevanga vari pamusangano, VaFarai Matebvu vanoti ZACC iri kuita basa rayo zvakanaka, asi kuti vanovimba kuti kumhan’arwa nekuferefetwa kwedzimhosva kuitwe kwaaawanda, kwete mumaguta makuru chete. "Kumaruwa kunosungirwa kunge kuchisvikwawo nekuti kune nyaya dzehuwori dziri kuitwa ikoko vanhu vasingazivi kwekuenda, saka misangano yekuzivisa vagari zvekuita panenge paitwa huwori ikodzero yemunhu wose kuti ange aine zivo. Misangano yavo veZACC ngaiparadzirwe kwakawanda munyika yose." Asi VaMakamure vanoti itarisiro yavo kuti panopera gore rino ZACC inge yave nemamwe mahofisi mumatunhu anoti Mutare, Masvingo uye Marondera kuwedzera pane mamwe ari MUHarare, Bulawayo nekuGweru. "Tinofanirwa kunge tavhura ma-offices edu kumaprovinces ose emuZimbabwe, gore rino tinovhura anokwanisa kuita six, asi izvezvi tine three aripo, Harare, Gweru neBulawayo, saka ZACC inenge yave mamwe maregions six muZimbabwe kuti vanhu vakwanise kuzouya kurepota nyaya dzehuwolri, kana corruption nekunzwa mamwe maprogram edu atinoita ane chekuita necorruption," VaMakamure vanodaro. VaMakamure vanoti chimwe chechiri kunonotsa kuvepo kwemahofisi aya ndechekushaikwa kwemari yakakwana uye zvishandisiro zvinosanganisira vashandi vakadzidzira mabasa sezvo vachida kubhadharwa zvakaringana nemabasa avo. "Chatinoda kuti tiite ndechekuti mahofisi atiri kuzovhura aya munofanirwa kunge muine nayanzvi ma-officers arimo achikwanisa kupindura nekugadzirisa zvichemo zvekotapusheni; tinenge tichida kuti chinangwa chekuvhura mahofisi aya chinge chichozadzikiswa, by 2021 tinofanirwa kunge tatove kuna-districts akawanda emunyika kujti tipedze huwori." VaMakamure vanoti komisheni yavo iri kugadzirawo zviverengwa zvevanhu vasingaone zveBraille nevamwe vanoshandisa mutauro wemaoko, kana kuti sign language. Musangano wanhasi wapindwa nevemapoka ehurumende akasiyanasiyana uye vemapoka anoshanda akazvimirira akaita seTransparency International Zimbabwe nemamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kuwedzera maWar Veterans Mari dzeMudyandigere
text: Hurumende yazivisa kuti ichawedzera mari yemudyandigere yevakarwa hondo yerusunguko pamwe nekuvabhadharira mari kuzvipatara pamwe neparufu. Hurumende inoti chinangwa chayo ndechekuona kuti vanhu vakarwira rusununguko rwenyika vagara zvakanaka munyika yavakasungura. Izvi zviri mubhiri riri kuda kuvandudza mitemo inobata vaimbove varwiri verusununguko. Munyori mubazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika pamwe nevakarwa hondo yerusununguko, Ambassador Mark Grey Marongwe, vazivisa komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemukati nekudzivirirwa kwenyika kuti hurongwa uhwu huri mubhiri rekushandura mutemo weWar Veterans Act iro riri kunyorwa nebazi ravo. VaMarongwe, avo vaonovewo munhu aive murwiri wehondo yerusunguko vachizivikanwa nerekuti Tichatonga, vati maWar Veterans ari kutambura uye anotarisirwa pasi neveruzhinji izvo zviri kupa kuti bazi ravo ritore matanho ekugadzirisa chimiro chevanhu ava kuitira kuti vakwanise kugarawo zvakanaka. Vati hurumende iri kuronga kuwedzera mari yemudyandigere yemaWar Veterans kubva pamadhora mazana matatu negumi nemashanu emaRTGS - kusvika pamari inotambirwa nemusoja ane chinzvimbo chameja muchiuto. Meja muchiuto anotambira mari iri pakati pemazana mashanu nemazana matanhatu emadhora zvichienderana nemakore aanawo ari pachinzvimbo ichi. Vatiwo vari kuronga kuti maWar Vets avewo neMedical Aid kuti akwanise kurapwa kana achinge aburitsa kadhi rinoratidza kuti aive murwi wehondo yerusununguko. Asi vati pari zvino vanhu ava vari kurapwa kusvika vapora kana vachinge vapinda muzvipatara zvehurumende. VaMarongwe, avo vakamboshanda semumwe wevakuru vakuru vezvirongwa zveZBC, vaenderera mberi vachiti vanodawo kuti maWar Veterans achengetedzwe zvakanakwa kana achinge ashaya nekudaro vari kuronga neimwe kambani inoviga vanhu kuti pese panoshaya murwiri wehondo yehondo rerusunguko, achengetedzwa zvine chiremerera. Vazivisawo kuti pane maWar Veterans ari pakati pemazana mashanu nemazana matanhatu anoshaya gore rega. Vati pari zvino pane maWar Veterans zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu munyika. Vati vamwe vavo vakawanda munyika havana kunyoreswa uye chirongwa chekuita izvi chiri kuenderera mberi nechinangwa chekuti vese vanokodzera vawane mari yemudya ndigere pamwe nekubatsirwa kupinza vana zvikoro. Vati bazi ravo richapinza basa maDistrict War Veterans Officers makumi matanhatu nematanhatu mumatunhu ese munyika kuti agadzirise nyaya dzavo mumatunhu ese munyika. Dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzakaita saAmai Angeline Chipato vati kunyange hazvo chiri chinhu chakanaka kuchetengedza maWar Veterans, zvakakoshawo kuti hurumende ione zvaingaite pamusoro pana chimbwido nana mujibha avo vavati vakaitawo basa guru. Asi VaMarongwe vati mutemo uri kutosandurwa kuti vana chimbwido nana mujiba varemekedzewo pamwe nekupihwa mari dzemudyandigere sezviri kuitwa maWar Veterans. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Manyanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo pasina chakaipa pakuchetenegedza varwi vehondo yerusununguko, vanoona sekuti danho iri riri kuda kutorwa richavhiringa hupfumi sezvakaitika muna 1997. Vati vanhu havafaniri kuve nemweya wekuda kungomora chete vasingatarisi kuti remangwana renyika richange rakamira sei. Kuma 80s hurumende yakadzika mitemo yeWar Veterans Act ne War Victims Compensation Fund iyo inosungira kuti vese vakarwira hondo yerusununguko vapihwe mari yemudyandigere pamwe nekubatsirwa panyaya dzehutano nedzidzo. Muna 1997 sangano rinomirira varwi ava, reZimbabwe Liberation War Veterans Association, rakamanikdza hurumende kuti vapihwe zviuru makumi mashanu zvemadhora pamunhu mumwe izvo zvakadonhedza dhora remunyika nekukanganisa hupfumi wenyika. Asi VaMarongwe vati rwendo runo havasi kuda kuti hurumende itore danho rinokanganisa hupfumi nekuda kwemaWar Veterans vachiti vachaumbawo Trust ichange ichiita mabhizimisi anotsvaga mari yekubatsira maWar Veterans. No media source currently available

headline: Gurukota reMari neHupfumi Rinoparura Hurongwa Hunovandudza Hupfumi?
text: Bazi rezvemari raparura hwaro huchatevedzwa nenyika kwemakore maviri ari kutevera senzira yekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika. Vachiparura hurongwa uhwu muHarare, gurukota rezvemari, Va Mthuli Ncube, vati hurongwa uhwu, uhwo hwavari kudaidza kuti transitional stabilzation program, hwakanangana nekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika kubva pari zvino kusvika muna zvita 2020. Izvi zvichaitwa kubudikidza nekusimbaradza nyaya dzekurima, kucherwa kwezvicherwa, kusimbisa nyaya yekutengesera dzimwe nyika, kudzikisa mari inoshandiswa nevari muhurumende, kugadzirisa migwagwa, madhamu nezvimwe zvivakwa zvehurumende pamwe nekuona kuti makanzuru aita zvose zvaanosungirwa kuita kuitira kuti veruzhinji vawane hugaro hwakanaka. VaNcube vati hurumende ichasimbaradzawo nyaya yekucherechedzwa kwekodzero dzeveruzhinji pamwe nekuona kuti munyika magara muine runyararo kuitira kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kukwezva vemabhizimusi ekunze vanoda kuzosima mari muno. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vemabhizimusi emuno vasimewo mari yavo munyika senzira yekukwezvawo vekunze uye kuti nyika yashanda zvakasimba kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kumasangano anokweretesa mari akaita se world bank ne internationational monetary fund nemamwe. VaNcube vaenderera mberi vachiti hupfumi hwenyika hwakatarisirwa kukura nezvikamu zvina kubva muzana mumakore mana kubva gore rinouya, huchizokura nezvikamu zvinomwe kubva muzana mamakore anenge achitevera maererano nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekuti munhu wese munyika ange ave kugara zvakanaka panosvika gore ra 2030. VaNcube vatiwo hurumende ichawedzera nhengo dzeparamende mari dzadzinotambiriswa kuitira kuti dzinyatsoitawo basa dzakachena mwoyo sezvo vachiti nyaya dzinozeyewa nenhengo dzeparamende mudare radzo dzichibata hupenyu hweveruzhinji. VaNcube, avo vanga vakatsigirwa nemunyori mubazi ravo, Va George Guvamatanga, vati mari dzemitero dziri kubhadhariswa vanhu dzichashandiswa kugadzira zvinhu zvinobatika zvakafanana nemigwagwa nekuona kuti zvipatara zvine mishonga vachiti zvakakosha kuti nyika irwisane nehuori kuti mari dzemitero dzioneke kushanda kwadzo. Mushure mekuparura hurongwa hwavo, Va Ncube vaudza Studio7 kuti vane hurongwa hwekubvisa mari yemhando yema bond notes nekufamba kwenguva mushure mekunge vagadzirisa zvinhu zvakati kuti. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Propser Chitambara, vaudza Studio7 kuti hapana chinofamba kana hurumende isina kuzvipira kuita zvose zviri kutaurwa naVaNcube. VaChitambara vati Zimbabwe inogona kusimukira kana ikashandisawo zviwanikwa zvayo zvakanaka pasina kutsvaga mari kunze yekuisa muhupfumi kana kuti stimulus package. Vazivisawo kuti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuti pave nenzvimbo imwe chete ichange ichipa marezeresi kune vekunze vanoda kuita mabhizimusi munyika vachiti pane vamwe vana muzvinabhizimusi vavasina kudoma nemazita vavati vakatonosima mari dzavo kune dzimwe nyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe nechikonzero chekuti vainzi vatsvage marezenesi anodarika makumi maviri kuitira kuti vaite bhizimusi ravo muZimbabwe. Bazi rezvemari ratiwo riri mubishi kuongorora nyaya yekuti vari muhurumende vashandise motokari dzisingadhure senzira yekuderedza huwandu hwemari inoshandiswa nehurumende muzvinhu zvisina nemusoro. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yogadzirisa Bhajeti Asi Vashandi Vachiti Vari Kuyaura
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti hurumende yavo yakwanisa kugadzirisa nyaya yebhajeti kuti hurumende isashandise mari yakawandisa mukubhadhara vashandi asi mukusimudzira nyaya yezvivakwa nezvimwe. VaMnanagwa vakataura mashoko aya neMugovera pamusangano webato ravo mudunhu reMidlands. Ko izvi ndizvo here zvavakwanisa kuita kana kuti muromo hauzarirwe hawo nerwizi. VaMnangagwa vakati mukati memwedzi gumi nesere, vakwanisa kudzikisa mari inoshandiswa nehurumende kubhadhara vashandi nezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, kana kuti 40%. Vanoti kare, hurumende yaishandisa mari inosvika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana kana kuti 90% kubhdhara vashandi uye zvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 6% kuzvivakwa nemamwe mabasa ebudiriro. Asi vanoti ikozvino hurumende yave kushandisa zvikamu zvakaenzana mukubhadhara vashandi nemumabasa ebudiriro. Mashoko aVaMnangagwa akambotaurwawo negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, asi panguva iyi vakawanda vakangoti vainge vakangosimbira kumuromo sepinjisi. Pakugadziisa bhajeti, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vachishanda nesangano reLabor and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti zvakanaka asi hurumende haifanire kuregedza kubatsira varombo kuburikidza nenyaya dzezvehutano uye zvikoro. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti hurumende iri mugwara uye yakwanisa kusiya mari yekugadzira zvakaita semugwagwa weHarare-Beitbridge, kuwanisa vanhu hupfu nemutengo wakaderera uye kuti vakwire bhazi reZupco nemutengo wepasi. Mutungamiri wesangano revarairidzi reZimta, VaRichard Gundani, vanoti zvakanaka kugadzira bhajeti asi kumushandi, wakagarika ngewakafa mupenyu pfumo riri mushure. Vanoti vashandi vari kutambiriswa mari isiri kuvakwanira. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti zviri kutaurwa nehurumende ichokwadi asi kunogona kunge kuri zvekare kupedza zuva kuveza demo nechinangwa chekuda kutema mubhanana. Pasi rose Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechipiri kubva kuVenezuela munyaya dzekukwira kwemitemgo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation. Hurumende inoti kusagadzikana kwehupfumi kuri kukonzerwa nezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika. Asi vanopikisa vanoti huori nekutonga nedemo ndizvo zvapinza nyika muna taisireva. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeHarare Yobhadharisa Mitero Ichishandisa Madhora ekuAmerica
text: Kanzuru yeHarare yatanga kubhadharisa vagari mari yemvura nemimwe mitero nemadhora ekuAmerica zvichitevera kupihwa kwayakaitwa mvumo yekuita izvi nehurumende. Sangano rinomirira maguta nemadhorobha munyka reUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe, kana kuti UCAZ, ranyorerawo kuhurumende richtsvaga mvumo yekuti maguta nemadhorobha ese munyika abhadharise vagari mari nemadhora ekuAmerica. Hurumende yakapa kanzuru yeHarare mvumo yekubhadharisa vagari nemakambani vachishandia madhora ekuAmerica kutanga mwedzi uno. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichaeil Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vasingakwanise mari yekunze vacharamba vachishandisa mari yemuno, asi inenge yakatarwa ichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica. Mamwe maguta akaita seMasvingo, Kwekwe neRedcliff akaitawo zvisungo zvekuti vanokwanisa vabhadhare mitero vachishandisa madhora ekuAmerica. Mutungamiriri weUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe, zvakare mari meya weGweru, VaJosiah Makombe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatonyorera kugurukota rinoona nezvemadhorobha nematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vachikumbira mvumo yekuti maguta nemadhorabha ese munyika makumi matatu nemaviri abvimidzwe kubhadharisa mitero nemvura nemadhorobha ekuAmerica. VaMakombe vati maguta nemadhorobha ange ave kutatarika kuita basa ravo sezvo vese vanovatengesera zvinhu zvekushandisa zvakaita semishonga yekuchenesa mvura vave kutengesa nemari yekunze. Vati kubhadharisa mari yekunze kunoita kuti makanzuru akwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka asingapedzi nguva ari mumitsetse yekutsvaga mari yekunze kubva kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Association, VaPrecious Shumba, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotambira danho rekubhadharisa mitero nemari yekunze vachiti zvinoita kuti makunzuru aya asagare achishandura mitero nekuda kwekushaya simba kunogara kuchiita mari yemuno. VaShumba vaenderera mberi vachiti danho iri rinoita kuti maguta nemadhorobha asagare achikumbira mari kuReserve Banj nehurumende. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano rreCommunity Water Alliance, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, vaudza Studio 7 kunyange hazvo iri riri danho rakanaka uye richikwanisa kuvandudza mabasa emakanzuru, dambudziko guru nderekuti vagari nevashandi vakawanda munyika vari kutambira mari yemuno, izvo zvichanetsa kuti vawane mari yekunze iyi. Mukuru wesangano reMasvingo United Residents and Ratepayers Association, VaAnoziva Muguti, vaudza Studio 7 kuti danho rekushandisa mari yekunze rakanaka chose uye chinofadza ndechekuti vasingawane marii iyi havasi kumanikidzwa kubhadhara nemari yekunze, sezvo vachibhadhariswa mari yemunyika asi yakatarwa nemutengo wedhora rekuAmerica. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaJuly Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Mumwe mushandi mukuru mubazi ravo uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita, audza Studio 7 kuti VaMoyo vachapindurachikumbiro cheUCAZ, nguva ipi zvayo kubva pari zvino. Hurumende yadzika mutemo unobvumidza vemabhizimisi bhadharisa vatengi nemari yekunze neyemuno, kana kuti Dual Pricing System, asi haina kunge yapa makanzuru mvumo yekuita izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Vakaremara Vobatsirwa neMishina Inochera Goridhe kuManicaland
text: Sangano revacheri vezviwanikwa zvakakosha, reZimbabwe Miners’ Federation, ZMF, rakabatsira vakaremara mudunhu reManicaland nemuchina unoshandiswa pakuchera goridhe. Vachitaura pakutambidzwa kwemuchina uyu nezuro, sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Miners Federeation kudunhu reManicaland, VaLameck Mushayamhara, vakati vanovimba kuti muchina wakapihwa nhengo dzeManicalanda People with Disabilities in Mining uchapa kuti vasiye tsika yekupemha. Mumiriri weZMF kudunhu reManicaland, Amai Judith Shadaya, vakatiwo vanorarama nehurema vanofanirwa kusimudzirwa sezvaitwa neZMF. Sachigaro vesangano revanorarama nehurema mudunhu reManicaland, Va James Mutisi, vakatiwo vakafara zvikuru nezvavaitirwa neZMF Munyori mukuru musangano revanorarama nehurema mudunhu reManicaland, Muzvare Esther Nemaramba, vakati zvavo zvavaitira zvakanaka sezvo vasichapemhi kuburikidza nemuchina wavakapihwa. Nhengo makumi matanhatu dzakapihwa rubatsiro rwemuchina wecompressor dzichange dzichichera goridhe munzvimbo dzinoti Premier, Old Umtali, uye kuPenhalonga mudunhu reManicaland. Rubatsiro urwu rwakapihwa kuvanhu ava pamabiko akaitirwa muDarlington Extension muguta reMutare.

headline: Vanofamba neMabhazi Vochemachema neKukwidzwa kweMari paNguva ino yeZororo
text: Veruzhinji vari kuda kufamba pazororo reKisimusi negoredzva vanoti havasi kufara nekukwira kwaita mari dzekubhadhara mumabhazi panguva iyo mafuta edzimotokari asiri kuwanikwa, hurumende ichiti dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemafuta rinogona kutora nguva yakareba kuti rigadziriswe. Vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vanoti kukwira kwaita mabhazi panguva ino yezororo reKisimusi kuri kuvarwadza zvikuru sezvo mari iri kuvanetsa kuwana, vachiti zvinhu munyika zvaoma semafuta agwambira mubhodhoro. Pasvika Studio 7 pamusika unokwirirwa mabhazi anoenda kumaruwa weMbare, panga paine vanhu vakawanda vanga vachitsvaga chokufambisa kuti vaende kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana. Mumwe wevanhu vari kuti varwadziwa nekukwira kwaita mabhazi ndiAmai Viola Mafa, avo vati vanga vachida kuenda nemhuri yavo kuMhondoro asi vawana mabhazi akwira zvakapetwa kaviri. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevesangano rinomirira vemabhazi ano anotakura veruzhinji sezvo nhare dzavo dzanga dzisiri kudairwa. Asi mumwe mutyairi webhazi rinoenda kwaMutare uyo ati anongoda kudaidzwa nezita rekuti Nohoreka, ati chaita kuti vakwidze mitengo yemabhazi ndechekuti mafuta edhiziri vari kuawana achidhura pamukoto sezvo mumagaraji mazhinji musina mafuta. Zvichakadai, kukwira kunonzi kwaita mabhazi uku kwashorwa zvikuru nesangano rinomirira vafambi rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaTafadzwa Goliati vatiwo havasi kufara nekurambwa kuri kuitwa mari dzendarama kana kuti ma coins nevemabhazi, iriyo imwe yemari dzavari kuwana. Vati kunyange hazvo hurumende yakaisa mabhazi eZupco mumigwagwa yakawanda, mabhazi aya mashoma zvikuru pakatariswa huwandu hwevanhu vari kuda kufamba nguva ino yezororo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nagavhuna webhanga guru munyika VaJohn Mangudya kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira zvakare nharembozha yavo. VaGoliati vatiwo hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemafuta kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasaoneswe chitsvuku nevemabhazi avo vanonzi vari kuchemachema nekukwira kuri kuita mafuta edzimotokari nguva nenguva. Gurukota rinoona nezvemando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vanoti dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemafuta munyika richaramba rakapfunya chisero munyika sezvo hurumende isina mari yekunze inokwana kuti itenge mafuta anokwanira nyika. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vakatarisira kufamba nguva ino yezororo reKisimusi negoredzva kuti vanoona hama neshamwari sezvo vazvinji vavo vachange vasiri pamabasa panguva ino yezororo. Asi nekuoma kwaita zvinhu munyika nekudhura kuri kuita mabhazi nemichovha vazhinji vanoti vanogona kunoita zvichoni kunzendo dzavanenge vafamba. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotanga Zvakare Kugadzira Mabhazi
text: Sangano rinomirira vemabhazi, reAmalgamated Bus Operators nemakambani eAVM Africa neQuest Motors nhasi vasainirirana chibvumirano chekuti makambani aya agadzire mabhazi muZimbabwe izvo zvinotarisirwa kupedza dambudziko rezvekufambisa rakatarisana neveruzhinji munyika. Vachitaura mushure mekusaina chibvumirano ichi, sachigaro weAmalgamated Bus Operators, VaSamson Nanhanga, vati kugadzira mabhazi muno kuchaita kuti nyika ichengetedze mari yekunze pamwe nekuwanisa zviuru zvevanhu mabasa. VaNanhanga vati mari yavange vachishandisa kutenga mabhazi kunze kwenyika ndiyo yavave kushandisa kugadzira mabhazi muno. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Passenger Transport Orgnaisation, VaFungai Makoni vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kushandisa mari yekunze yakawanda kutenga mabhazi kunze kwenyika asi munyika muine hunyanzvi kwekugadzira mabhazi. VaMakoni vati chirongwa ichi icho chichatanga mwedzi unouuya chinotarisirwa kupinza mabasa vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe kana kudarika. Vatiwo vanotarisira kunge vachigadzira mabhazi mazana mashanu pagore vachishandisa mamiriyoni manomwe kusvika kumamiriyoni gumi emadhora eku America pagore. Vatiwo kugadzirwa kwemabhazi muno kuchaita kuti vakwanise kushanda nekambani yehurumende yeZUPCO iyo iri kukoka makambani akazvimirira kushanda nayo pakutakura vanhu mumaguta nekumaruwa. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaMike Madiro, vati hurumende iri kugadzirisa migwagwa yese munyika, vakakurudzira makambani aya kuti agadzirewo mabhazi akasimba zvekufamba kumaruwa. Vanoona nekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rePassenger Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Goliati, vatambira zvaitwa nhasi nemufaro vachiti zvichabatsira veruzhinji zvakanyanya. Munyori anoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu muMDC Alliance, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vati sebato vanokurudzira zvikuru kuti makambani akazvimirira atanga mabasa anoita kuti munyika muve nemabasa. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaya zvekufambisa sezvo ZUPCO isina mabhazi akakwana. ZUPCO inoti inoda mabhazi zviuru zviviri kuti ikwanise kuita basa rayo nemazvo asi pari zvino ine mabhazi mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nemaviri chete. Makambani munyika akamira kugadzira mabhazi muna 1993 mushure mekunge hurumende yabvumira veruzhinji kupinza makombi matsaru munyika izvo zvakawisirawo ZUPCO pasi. Pari zvino hurumende yakarambidza makombi nemamwe mabhazi kutakura vanhu kunze kwekunge achiita izvi ari pasi peZUPCO. No media source currently available

headline: POTRAZ Yoshorwa Ichinzi Yave Kuda Kumbunyikidza Vanoshandisa WhatApp
text: Makambani enharembhozha anoti achaziva svondo rino kuti chikonzero chei kambani yePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority kana kuti POTRAZ yakavamisa kupota vachimboderedza mitengo yenharembozha nekumboita zvirongwa zvekuti vanhu vafonewo nemari yakaderera pane dzimwe nguva kana kuti mapromotions. Danho rePOTRAZ iri rave kuunza mutauro vamwe vachiti danho iri rinombunyikidza kodzero dzeveruzhinji. Vanhu vakawanda vakataura neStudio 7 vanoti havazi kufara nekusabuda pachena kweveboka rePOTRAZ padanho ravakatora rekuti makambani enharembozha matatu ari munyika eEconet, Net One neTelecel ambomira kuderedza mitengo, kana kuti promotion muChirungu, kwaange achiita. Vamwe vevanhu ava vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotyira kuti POTRAZ yakatora danho iri senzira yekudzivira veruzhinji kuti vasawane mukana wekutaura zvavanoda nenzira dzakachipa dzepa internet. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo muzvare Tinaye Shumba vanoti mafungiro avo ndeekuti, hurumende kuburikidza nePOTRAZ, yakatora danho iri nekuti mapoka anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akawanda ange ari kushandisa nzira dzakachipa idzi kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varatidze kutsutsumwa kwavo kuhumende pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. VaIpithule Maphosa vanove sachigaro weboka revechidiki vebato reZAPU muBulawayo vanoti danho rePOTRAZ iri ndemumwe muenzaniso uri pachena unoratidza kushaya hanya kwehurumende pazvinhu zvinobatsira veruzhinji. VaMaphosa vanotiwo danho iri inzira yehurumende yekuedza kutsvaga nzira dzose dzingakwanisika dzekutsvaga nadzo mari sezvo hurumende iri kutambudzika kuwana mari yekubhadhara vashandi vayo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuPOTRAZ panyaya iyi. Mumwewo mugari uyo akangoda kuzvidoma nezita rekuti Michelle akaudza Studio 7 kuti danho rakatorwa nevePOTRAZ harifadze vakawanda, asi anoona zvakakosha kuti boka iri riise mitemo inobatsira kuti nyika ichengetedzeke. Kunyange hazvo achibvuma kuti danho iri rinogona kuita kuti veruzhinji vadhurirwe nekushandisa nharembozha dzavo, muzvare Michelle anoti zvinonetsa kuti hurumende idzivirire vanhu kuti vataurirane pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pezviri kuitika munyika. Amai Koliwe Majama vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muchikamu cheBroadcsating neInformation Technonology musangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa kana kuti MISA. Amai Majama vanoti kunyange hazvo sangano ravo richiziva nekunzwisisa kuti ibasa revePOTRAZ kuti vaongorore mashandiro emakambani enharembozha, chiri kuvanetsa ndechekuti vePOTRAZ vakatora danho iri vasingape chikonzero. Amai Majama, avo vanoti sangano reMISA rakamboita musangano nePOTRAZ, vanoti zvakakosha kuti boka iri ribudire vanhu pachena pamatanho arinenge ratora, vachitiwo chiri kuita kuti vanhu vashushikana parizvino inyaya yekuti vechiuto vakabuda vachityisidzira veruzhinji pamusoro pekushandisa iinternet. VaButler Tambo ndivo mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano reCentre for Public Engagement uye vanoongororawo mitemo yehurumende kunyanya ine chekuita nezvehupfumi. VaTambo vakashorawo danho rePOTRAZ vachiti rinodzorera kumashure zvehupfumi munyika. Hurumende pasi pegurukota reInformation Communication Technology, iri mushishi kugadzira mutemo unonzi Computer Crime and Cyber Crime Bill uyo unonzi uchashandiswa kusunga vose vachawanikwa vachishandisa internet zviri kunze kwemutemo. Vamwe vanoti mutemo uyu unogona kutyora kodzero dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika dzekuti vanhu vane kodzero yekutaurirana pachena kana kuti Freedom of expression muChirungu. Asi vamwewo vanoti zvakakosha kuti nyika ive nemitemo yakadai sezvo ichibatsira kudzivirira nyika kubva kuvavengi kana vanopfurikidza mwero.

headline: Kukwira Kwaita Mitengo yeZvinhu Munyika Kworwadza Vakawanda.
text: Veruzhinji vari kuchema chema zvikuru nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu inonzi yakwira zvakanyanya kubva payanga iri mumazuva ehurumende ya va Robert Mugabe. Vataura ne Studio7 vati saga refotireza ravaitenga madhora makumi matatu, nhasi vave kuritenga madhora makumi matanhatu. Vanoti shangu dzevana vechikoro dzavaitenga madhora makumi maviri, vave kudzitenga nemadhora makumi masere. Vanhu ava vanoti zvinhu zvese zvakwira mitengo uye hupenyu hwaomera vanhu zvisineyi nekuti unoenda kubasa kana kuti kwete. Muzvare Portia Katiyo, avo vari ku Kadoma, vanotiwo zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika zvekuti hupenyu hwava kuvaomera. Izvi zviri kuitika panguva iyo vana chiremba vari kuramwa mabasa uye varairidzi vachiti vachaenda kubasa mazuva maviri chete pasvondo nekuda kwekuomerwa nehupenyu. Munyika muri kutaridza kuti hamuna kugadzikana nekuda kwekunetseka kuri kuita vanhu. NeMuvhuro vashandi vemumigodhi vaitiwo vave kuda kubatana nevarairidzi, navana chiremba mukukanda mapadza pasi. Vezvitoro vanonzi vave kutiwo vanoda mari dzekunze kwete kutambiriswa bond notes izvo zviri kuita kuti veruzhinji vatambure zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanovhura Kambani yeGasi kwaMutare Vachiti Zvakaitika kuZambia Hazviitiki muZimbabwe
text:
Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nhasi vaparura zviri
pamutemo kuvhurwa kwekambani ichange ichigadzira mweya wekubatsira varwere kufema pamwe negasi richashandiswa mudzimba
nemumaindasitiri kwaMutare. Vachitaura pavasvika kwaMutare, Mnangagwa vati hurongwa hwekuti pange paine kambani yakadai hwagara huripo asi kungoti kushayikwa kwemari ndiko kwange kwakamisa mabasa. Vachitaura kuchitsama chevatsigiri vavo vange vauya kuzovatambira, VaMnangagwa vati vanofara kuti kambani yehurumende yeVerify Engineering inokwanisa kugadzira mweya unodiwa nevarwere zvikuru panguva ino yeCovid 19.

"Zvino takati Covid zvayauya iyi todini apa tinenge tichida Oxygen. Ndikati saka togadzira seyi oxygen iyi, ivo vakomana nevasikana vakati tipeyi mari tinoigadzira Oxygen yacho. Takatora mari tikavapa," vadaro VaMnangagwa. VaMnangagwa vati kusimuka kwakaita kambani yemagasi iyi kunoratidza
hunyanzvi huri muvana veZimbabwe kana vachinge vawanirwa zvikwanisiro, sezvo basa iri rakaitwa nenguva pfupi kwazvo. Vati gasi richagadzirwa richakwanisa kushandiswa munyika uye kutengeswa zvakare kunze kwenyika. "Within 18 months vakomana nevasikana ava vakakwanisa kubudisa plant
yekuita produce oxygen neimwe surplus yekutengesa kunze," VaMnangagwa vaudza vanhu vanga vaungana. VaMnangagwa varumbidza vadzidzi vemunyika vakakwanisa kugadzira kambani yemagasi iyi vakati muzvikoro zvepamusoro muzere vanhu vane hunyanzvi.

Vachitaura pamusoro pezvakaitika kuZambia uko vaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaEdgar Lungu, vakakundwa musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika naVaHakainde Hichilemba, VaMnangagwa vati izvi hazviitiki muZimbabwe.

"Anenge arota zvakaitika Zambia zvayambuka kuuya kuno muka muhope ubike doro," vadaro VaMnangagwa. Asi mutauriri weMDC Alliance mudunhu reManicaland, VaDavid Panganai,
vaudza Studio7 nhasi kuti muromo hauzarirwi nerwizi. Mune imwewo nyaya, vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuroora nekuitisa pamuviri mwanasikana ane makore gumi nemana, mushakabvu Memory Machaya, VaHatirarami Momberume, avo vaizviti vanonzi Evans Momberume, havana kukwanisa kumiswa pamberi pedare nhasi sezvo pachiri kuitwa dzimwe ongororo dzekuona kuti ndivo here zvechokwadi baba vemwana akwazvarwa nemuchakabvu. Muchuchisi mukuru wedunhu reMutare, VaTirivanhu Mutyasira, vaudza vatori venhau kuti VaMomberume vachamiswa pamberi pedare mangwana. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vati mapurisa akasunga VaMomberume, uye munhu akashaya musi wa15 Chikunguru ndiAnna Machaya kwete Memory Machaya, sezvaitaurwa. VaNyathi vati mapurisa ari kuda kusunga VaEdmore Machaya baba
vemuchakabvu nemudzimai wavo, Shy Mabika, nemhosva yekudziviridza
mapurisa kuita basa rawo nemazvo. Vaviri ava vanonzi vakanyebera
mapurisa paaiferefeta nyaya iyi. VaNyathi vati munhu anonzi Memory Machaya mupenyu uye mwanasikana waVaErnest Machaya, vanova sekuru wemufi. Vabereki vemuchakabvu vari kupomerwa zvakare mhosva yekuroodza
mwanasikana ari pasi pemakore anobvumidzwa nemutemo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yovandudza Mitemo Kuti Matunhu Awane Imwe yeMari yeZvicherwa Zvawo
text: Hurumende inoti iri kunyora mitemo mitsva inozoona kuti nzvimbo dzine zvicherwa dzigovane nehurumende mari inobva muzvicherwa zvemunzvimbo idzodzo. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti hurumende yavo inoona kuti nzvimbo zhinji dzine zvicherwa hadzina mari yadzinowana saka vanoda kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Mukuru weCenter For Natural Resources Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti zvingave zvakanaka chose kana hurumende ikaita izvi asi vanotizve matunhu anofanira kupiwa simba rekusarudza zvinoda kuitwa munzvimbo dzawo uye kuti matunhu asarudze vanhu kana makambani anozoita zvemabhizimisi mudunhu iroro. "Nyaya yekunyorwa kwemitemo iyi yakagara ichitaurwa kubva VaMnangagwa vari gurukota rezvemitemo. Kubva kuna 2006, Zimbabwe yatadza kuti inyore mitemo mitsva yezvezvicherwa. Vanga vachiramba vachingoita zvigamba zvigamba. Saka handizivi kuti vave nemaonero matsva here," VaMaguwu vakaudza Studio 7. "Chinhu chekutanga chatinoda kuona, kupa matunhu ese masimba ekuzvitonga, kana kuti 'devolution of power'. Dunhu rimwe nerimwe rinofanira kusarudza vanoita bhizimisi mudunhu raro." No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNamibia, VaHage Geingob, Vanovhura ZITF Vachikurudzira Kudyidzana kweZimbabwe neNamibia
text: Mutungamiri weNamibia, VaHage Geingob, vanoti kudyidzana pakati peNamibia neZimbabwe munyaya dzemabhizimisi kwakaderera vachiti kudyidzana uku kunofanirwa kukwira. Vachivhura ZITF yegore rino zviri pamutemo, VaGeingob vati mugore rapfuura Namibia yakatenga kubva kuZimbabwe zvinhu zvemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemana emadhora. Vati kudyidzana pakati peNamibia neZimbabwe uye pakati penyika dzemuAfrica kunofanirwa kukwira vachiti kuita izvi kunobatsirawo kusimudzira hupfumi henyika idzi. VaGeingob vati Namibia ichiri yakatarisana nedambudziko munyaya yekugovewa kweivhu vakati nyika yavo inogona kudzidza zvakawanda kubva mukugadziriswa kwakaitwa nyaya iyi muZimbabwe vachiti kugadzirisa nyaya iyi kunobatsira kurwisa hurombo hune veruzhinji. Vati hurmende yavo yakatanga chirongwa chavakati "Harambe" senzira yekurwisa hurombo uye kusimudzira hupenyu hweveruzhinji munyika mavo. VaGeingob vati vemakambani vanofanirwa kuita zvemabhizimisi vasina kungonangana nekuwana mari chete, asi kubatsirawo kurwisa hurombo. Vasati vatura mashoko avo, VaGeingob vamboshanyira nzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana muZITF pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachiona zviri kuratidzwa pachirongwa ichi. Nyika gumi neina chete ndidzo dzange dziine makambani adzo achiratidza zvigadzirwa paZITF yegore rino. No media source currently available

headline: VeMajeri Votadza Kuita Mabasa Avo Zvakanaka neKushaya Mari
text: Zimbabwe Prisons and Correctional Services kana kuti ZPCS inoti pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri mumajeri kune dzimwe nyika zviri kutadza kuuya kuzopedzesa mutongo wazvo mumajeri emuno nekuda kwekuti hazvina magwaro ekuzvarwa kana kufambisa. Izvi zvataurwa nemumwe mukuru muZPCS, Senior Assistant Commissioner, Spetosomusa Chinobva, vachipa humbowo kukomisheni inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu, yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission pamusoro, pekuti kusavepo kwemagwaro aya kunokanganisa basa ravo sei. Vati Zimbabwe ine chibvumirano nenyika dzakaita seZambia chekuti zvizvarwa zvemuno zviri mumajeri kuZambia zviuye kuzopedzisa mitongo yazvo muno, ukuwo zvizvarwa zvekuZambia zviri mumajeri emuno zvinopedzesera mitongo yazvo kuZambia. Asi Amai Chinobva vati vari kutadza kuunza zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuZambia nekuda kwekuti hapana humbowo kana magwaro anoratidza kuti vasungwa ava zvizvarwa zvemuno. Vati ongororo yavakaita yakaratidza kuti zvakakosha kuti vasungwa vapike mitongo yavo vari munyika dzavo umo vanokwanisa kushanyirwa nehama dzavo. Vatiwo pane vanhu vakawanda vanopinda mumajeri vasina magwaro ekuzvarwa kana zvitupa uye izvi zvinotadzisa vasungwa ava kunyora bvunzo vari mumajeri sezvo magwaro aya achidiwa. Amai Chinobva vatiwo rimwe dambudziko ririko nderekuti vasungwa vanofira mumajeri vasina magwaro vanovigwa sembwa sezvo hamadzawo dzisingazivikanwe. Zvichakadai Amai Chinobva vati vasungwa vari mumajeri vanobvumbidzwa pamutemo kupihwa mukana wekuti vanotoresa vana vavo magwaro ekuzvarwa kana kufambisa. Zvichakadai komiti yeparamende inooa nezvemukati menyika yaudzawo komisheni iyi kuti yakaitawo ongororo yavo kudunhu reMatabeleland South uko zvakabuda pachena kuti vanhu vari kunetseka kuwana magwaro ekuzvarwa pamwe nekufambisa.
