Sachigaro wekomiti iyi VaLevi Maihlome vati semaonero avo vanhu vese vasina magwaro aya zvikuru sei vakabatwa batwa neGukurahundi vanofanira kupihwa magwaro aya pasina mubvunzo kuti vakwanise kurarama sevamwewo vanhu. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, Dr Elasto Mugwadi, vati zvataurwa nekomiti yeparamende izvi zvinoenderana nezvakabuda muongororo yavo uye vanoda kuti matambudziko aya agadziriswe pamwe nekuti kodzero dzevanhu dziremekedzwe. No media source currently available

headline: Makombi neZvitoro Vokwidza Mitengo kuBulawayo
text: Apo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichiita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika, vamwe vagari vemuBulawayo vanoti vanotengesa mari pamusika mutema ndivo vari kukuchidzira kuti zvinhu zviipisise. Sekune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika zvitoro zvakawanda muguta reBulawayo zvakwidza mitengo yezvinhu zvinowanzoshandiswa nevanhu zuva nezuva kunyanya mafuta ekubikisa pamwe nemukaka. Nekune rimwewo divi zvimwe zvitoro zvinotengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana siyana kusanganisira chikafu, pamwe nezvimwe zvakadai semishonga nechikafu chezvipfuyo zvange zvakavharwa nechikonzero chinofungidzirwa nevakawanda kuti inyaya yekuda kukwidza mitengo. Vemakombi anoenda kumisha inogara veruzhinji vakwidzawo mari yekufambisa Vamwe vanhu vataura neStudio7 vange vachitsutsumwa zvikuru nekukwira kuri kuramba kuchiita mitengo yezvinhu. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndemumwe mudzimai angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Ndlovu avo vati vanoshora vanotenga nekutengesa mari pamusika mutema vachivati ndivo vari kukuchidzira kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nemumwe murume angozvidoma nezita rekuti George uyo ati anoshamisika kuti sei hurumende isiri kuda kugadzirisa nyaya yekutengeswa kwemari pamusika mutema. VaReginald Shoko ndivo mukuru mukuru weAffirmative Action Group mudunhu reMateleland uye muongorori wezvehupfumi akazvimirira ega. VaShoko vati kunyange hazvo vanotengesa mari mumigwagwa vachibatsira kuwedzera kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi, dambudziko guru inyaya yekuti vanhu vakawanda havana chivimbo nehupfumi hwemunyika. VaShoko vatiwo rimwe dambudziko inyaya yekuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuita humbimbindoga kana kuti mazvake mazvake izvo vati zvinoita kuti matambudziko akatarisana nenyika anetse kugadzirisa. Vamwe vanhu kusanganisira vatsigiri vebato reZanu PF, vanoti vemabhizimisi vari kukwidza mitengo zvenhando senzira yekuda kushoresa mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nehurumende yavo. Asi mutauriri webato reZapu VaIphithule Maphosa vaudza Studio7 chinhu chikuru chiri kukonzera kuti zvinhu zvisamira zvakanaka munyika kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti kushaikwa kwemari yekunze ndiko kuri kunyanya kuwedzera matambudziko ari munyika. Mitengo yezvinhu zvakasiyana siyana iri kukwira kubvira svondo rapera apo mukuru webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vakatura mamiriro ezvinyu munyaya dzekushandiswa kwemari munyika.

headline: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kutsigira, Kusimbaradza Mari Itsva
text: Bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, razivisa kuti richadhinda mari itsva ichange ichishandiswa mumabhanga serimwe rematanho ariri kutora mukugadzirisa nyaya yekushomeka kwemari munyika, pamwe nekugadzirisa zvinhu mumabhanga nemisika yemari munyika. Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanodzidzisa zvemabhizimusi paDevry University ku Ohio, vanoti vanhu vanoda mari yavanoshandisa, naizvozvo danho ratorwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe idanho rakanaka kana hurumende ikatevedzera mitemo nemirairo yezvehupfumi hwenyika inotevedzwa nenyika dzepasi pose, kwete zvokuzoramba ichidhinda mari pavanenge vazvifunga. Muzvinafundo Masocha vati hurumende inofanirwa kuratidza vanhu kuti inovimbika kwete kudhinda mari nguva dzese zvinozokonzera kuti mari yacho ishaye huremerera. "Vanhu vanoda kuona mari yavo mumavoko kwete kuudzwa kuti iri mukati mefoni yavanoshandisa, saka kana hurumende ikaunza mari iyi vanhu vangafara nekuti zvema RTGS hazvisi zvinovafadza. Asi hurumende inosungirwavo kuchengetedza chiremera chemari iyi nekurega zvekuzodhindadhinda mari sezvayaimboita makore apfuura," Professor Masocha vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available

headline: RBZ Yotarisirwa Kuparura Svondo Rinouya Mamwe Mapeni Ane Huremu hweGoridhe huDikidiki Zvinonzi Nevamwe Zvichabatsira Vane Mari Shoma
text: Nekuona kubudirira kwarinoti kwakaita zvirongwa zvaro zvekutanga zvekudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekusunga inflation, zvinosanganisira chekutengeswa kwemapeni egoridge, bepanhau reSunday Mail rinoti bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, svondo rinouya riri kuwedzera zvakare pamusika mamwe mapeni . Mapeni egoridhe aya, ayo anonzi anenge ane huremu hwegoridhe hwepasipasi, anonzi anenge ari zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu, kana kuti 4 500 . Asi hurongwa uhwu hwagara huchisimudza maonero akasiyanasiyana kunyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, dzimwe dzichihupembedza asi dzimwe dzichihushora. Mumwe wevari kupembedza danho rekutengeswa kwemapeni egoridhe iri ndi Doctor Prosper Chitambara, avo vanoshanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe. Doctor Chitambara, vanoti kuparurwa kwemapeni madikidiki aya kuchapawo mukana kune veruzhinji wekuti vange vachikwanisawo kuchengetedza mari dzavo kuburikidza nekutenga mapeni aya. Imwe nyanzi mune zvehupfumi, Doctor Charles Mutasa, vanotiwo kuuya kwemapeni egoridhe kwave kuoneka kubatsira kwawo sezviri kuonekwa pakuderera kwe inflation kwakatika mwedzi wapera. Asi Doctor Mutasa vanoti pachine zvakawanda zvinofanirwa kuitwa kuitira kuti kudzikamiswa kwehupfumi hwenyika kubudirire. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, Muzvare Chenai Mutambasere, vanoti hapana zvikuru zvati zvaonekwa zvati zvaburitswa nekuuya kwemapeni aya. Muzvare Mutambasere vanoti vanhu vanongonzwa kuti kwatengeswa mapeni akawanda zvakati, asi hapana humbowo kunoiswa pajekerere. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe vose vari kuti mapeni egoridhe aya pamwe nemamwe matanho avari kutora akwanisa kudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika nekusunga inflation, zvirongwa zvehurumende zvinoda mari, zvinosanganisira mabhonasi evashandi vayo, zvekurima zvePfumvudza nePresidential Input Scheme, uye sarudzo dzegore rinouya, zvinogona kuisa mudondo hurongwa hwese uhwu. Mapeni ari kutarisirwa kuparurwa svondo rinouya aya anonzi achange achitengeswa nemutengo wemadhora ekuAmerica pamwe nemadhora emunyika zvichienderana nemutengo wegoridhe pamisika yekunze yezuvaro, sezviri kungoitwa pane akaburitswa kare. Gavhuna veRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti kubva muna Chikunguru wegore rino mapeni anodarika zviuru gumi nechimwe, kana kuti 11 000 atengeswa munyika. Zvasarira kuona kuana kuiswa kwemapeni madikidiki aya pamusika kuchaitawo kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuatenga sezvo agara achitengeswa anga achinzi mitengo yawo iri pamusoro zvekuti vakawanda vepasi havakwanise kuwana mari yekutenga. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Vanoti Dhiziri nePeturu Zvizere Munyika
text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Dr John Mangudya, vaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemhando dzemoto kuti munyika mune mafuta emotokari akawanda uye vanhu vanofanira kuashandisa zvine mwero. Vatiwo mitsetse iri pamagaraji mazhinji inokonzerwa nekuti vanhu vari kutenga vachityira kuti achashaikwa zvakare. Vachipa humbowo pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika panyaya dzepeturu nedhiziri nezvimwe, VaMangudya vati nyika yakatenga mafuta akawanda zvekuti vanhu havafaniri kutenga mafuta zvematyira sezvari kuitwa pari zvino. Vati bhanga ravo rine zvirongwa zvekutenga mafuta kubva kumakambani akawanda uye pari zvino makambani emafuta ari kuendesa mafuta aya kumagaraji mazuva ose. Semuenzaniso, vati kambani yeTrafigura inounza munyika mamiriyoni gumi nemana emarita emafuta ayo inoendesa kumakambani ePUMA, Redan, CMED, Trek ne Genesis pasvondo rega rega, panguva imwe cheteyo Total ichiunza mamiriyoni gumi, Engen ichiunzawo mamiriyoni manomwe kozotiwo IPG ichiunza mamiriyoni manomwe. Vatiwo kune mamwe makambani akawanda anopinzawo mafuta munyika achiwana rubatsiro kubva kuRBZ. VaMangudya vati kunyange hazvo nyika iine dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari yekunze, bhanga ravo riri kupa makambani anounza mafuta munyika mari inokwana kutenga mafuta anokwanira nyika yese. Zimbabwe inoda zana nemakumi maviri emamiriyoni emadhora semari yekutenga mafuta mwedzi wega. Vati mitsetse iri kuonekwa zuva nezuva pamagaraji inokonzerwa nekuti vanhu vari kutenga mafuta vachinochengeta nekutengesa pamukoto sezvo vachitya kuti anogona kuzoshaikwa. Vatiwo huwandu hwemotokari hwakwirawo zvakanyanya zvekuti munyika mave nemotokari dzinosvika miriyoni nemazana masere. Mukuru weZimbabwe Engery Regulatory Authority, VaEddington Mazambani, vaudzawo komiti iyi kuti pave kudiwa kutora matanho anopedza dambudziko remafuta aya. Vati panodiwa kumutsiridza hurongwa kwekuti pashandiswe mabhazi nematireni kuitira kuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vanoshandisa motokari. No media source currently available

headline: Makambani ekuChina Anodarika Makumi Matatu Oratidza Zvaanoita paMusika weMabasa weMazuva Maviri, weStanbic-China Job Fair
text: Makambani makumi matatu ekuChina ari kupinda muzviratidzwa zveChina-Stanbic Job Fair kwemazuva maviri apo anotarisirwa kupinza basa vanhu vanodarika mazana manomwe, zvikuru sei mainjiniya. Zviratidzwa izvi zviri kurongwa nebhanga reStanbic pamwe nesangano rinomirira makambani ekuChina muZimbabwe reChamber of Chinese Employers in Zimbabwe. Mumashoko avo pavhurwa zviratidzwa izvi muHarare nhasi, mukuru anoona nezvemabhizimisi mubhanga reStanbic, VaPatson Mahachi, vati donzvo rezviratidzwa izvi ndere kubatsira vana veZimbabwe kuwana mabasa. Vati bhanga ravo rine hukama hwakasimba nemakambani ekuChina ndosaka vabatana nawo pazviratidzwa izvi. Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weChamber of Chinese Enterprises in Zimbabwe zvakare vachiona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko musangano iri, Amai Shanel Liu, vati varonga zviratidzwa zvanhasi nemangwana nekuti makambani anobva kuChina ari muZimbabwe anoda kubatsirwa kutsvaga vashandi uyewo vanhu vakawanda munyika havana mabasa. Vaenderera mberi vachiti pane kusanzwisisa munyika pamusoro pemashandiro anoita makambani ekuChina munyika uye zviratidzwa izvi zvinopa vari kutsvaga mabasa mukana wekubvunzurudza nekunzwisisa mashandiro anoita makambani ekuChina. Mumwe wechidiki apinda muzviratidzwa izvi, Muzvare Naome Chifamba, audza Studio 7 kuti zviratidzwa izvi zvakanaka chose sezvo zvichipa vanhu mukana wekuwana mabasa. VaMalvin Katiyo vatiwo vatiwo zviratidzwa izvi zvakanaka asi vakati hazvinyanyi kubatsira zvikuru sei kune avo vachangobva kuchikoro. Mukuru anoona nezvekupinzwa kwevanhu mabasa mubazi rezvevashandi nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Amai Vimbai Chiza, vati hurumende inotsigira zviratidzwa izvi. Vatiwo kunyange munyika muchinetsa mabasa, pane mamwe mabasa akawanda anoda hunyanzvi ayo ari kutoshaya vanhu. Pane makambani ekuChina anodarika makumi masere ari muZimbabwe uye ane vashandi vemuno vanodarika zana rezviuru (100 000). No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veKanzuru yeGweru Voratidzira
text: Vamwe vashandi vekanzuru yeguta reGweru varatidzira neChina mangwanani vachichema-chema nenyaya dzakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira kusapiwa mari dzavo dzemihoro. Vashandi ava vashandisa nguva yavo yekunwa tii kuti varatidzire vachiimba vari panze pemahofisi ekanzuru ari muguta reGweru ndokubva vazodzokera kumabasa avo mushure mekunge vanzwa kubva kune vamwe vevatungamiri vesangano ravo revashandi. No media source currently available Vamwe vevashandi ava vange vakabata zvinyorwa zvange zvakanyorwa mashoko akasiyana-siyana kusanganisira ange achishora makunzura pamusoro penyaya dzehuwori. Vachitaura neStudio 7 pakuratidzira uku, mutauriri wesangano revashandi, VaCornelia Selipiwe, vati vashandi vaona zvakakodzera kuti varatidzire senzira yekuratidza kusafara kwavo pamusoro penyaya dzakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira nyaya yekuti kanzuru haisati yapa vashandi mari yemwedzi mina yegore rakapera yavakanzi nedare rezvevashandi vapihwe. VaSelipiwe vatiwo vashandi vari kurwadziwa nenyaya yekuti havasati vawana bhonasi yegore rapera uyewo kuti havasati vapiwa mari yemihoro kubva muna Zvita kusvika pari zvino. Vachitaurawo kuvashandi, mutevedzeri wemunyori wesangano revashandi, VaFrank Mudzorera, vati vashandi vanorwadziwa zvikuru nenyaya dzehuwori dzavati dziri kuitwa nemamwe makanzura pamwe nevamwe vashandi vekanzuru avo vasina kuda kudoma nemazita. Mapepa aonekwa neStudio7 anoratidza kuti kanzuru ine chikwereti kuvashandi chemari inopfuura mamiriyoni maviri nemazana matanhatu emadhora. Pavabvunzwa pamusoro pezvezvichemo zvevashandi izvi nevatapi vanhau, munyori weguta reGweru, VaDaniel Matawu, vati vange vasina zvekutaura. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna meya weguta reGweru, VaHamutendi Kombayi, sezvo vanzi vange vasiri muhofisi. Kunyange hazvo vati vashandi vari kuedza kutaurirana nekanzuru kuti vapiwe mari yavo, VaSelipiwe vati vashandi vachaenderera mberi vachiratidzira panguva dzemangwanani ega ega, vakatiwo kana izvi zvikaramba vacharamwa mabasa munguva pfupi iri kutevera. Nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvehupfumi, makunzuru akawanda munyika ari kunetseka kuwana mari yekubhadhara vashandi uye kuita mabasa aanotarisirwa kuita nemazvo. Asi vamwe vagari mumaguta nemumadhorobha akasiyana-siyana vanochemawo nerekuti chimwe chinhu chiri kudzorera shure mashandiro akanaka emakanzuru avo huwori hunoitwa nemamwe makunzura pamwe nevamwe vashandi vemakanzuru aya.

headline: Zimbabwe Inoiswa Munyika Dzine Huori
text: Sangano re Transparency International raburitsa gwaro raro rinoburitsa nyika dziri pamusoro munyaya dzehuori. Nyanzvi dzinoti Transparency International inoshandisa chikero chinobva pa zero kusvika pa 100, nyika inenge iine zero ichionekwa senyika ine huori hwakanyanyisa, iyo inenge iine 100 score, ichinzi inyika yakachena. Ongororo yakaitwa inoisa Zimbabwe pa 22 score, uye iri panhamba 157 kubva panyika zana nemakumi masere. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa murimwe sangano rinorwisana nehuwori re Anti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa, VaMunyaradzi Alois Chaumba, vanoti chiri kunetsa muZimbabwe ndechekuti hurumende haina kuzvipira kurwisana nehuwori hwayakatarisa nayo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoomerwa Sezvo Hupfumi Huri Kuparara
text: Apo vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuyaura nhenhamo, zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichioma uye hurumende iri kuramba ichiomerwa zvekuti yave kutadza kuita basa rayo pamwe nekutadza kubhadhara shandi vayo. Hurumende iyo inowana mari yekushandisa kubva kumitero yakasiyana siyana yakaita semutero unowanikwa pakutengeswa kwezvinhu, Value Added Tax, mitero yemakambani, Corporate Tax, pamwe neyavashandi kana kuti Paye As You Earn, inoti mari iri kuwanikwa nehurumende iri kuramba ichidzikira. No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti hapana tariro yekuti zvinhu zvichanaka munguva pfuti inotevera. Mumashoko avo emashandisirwo akaitwa mari nehurumende kusvika pakati pegore rino, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakati mari inowanikwa pamitero iyi yakadzikira zvakanyanya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti mari iyi kusanganisira PAYE icharamba ichidzikira sezvo makambani ari kuramba achivhara vashandi vachidzingwa mabasa. Nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi, hurumende inotarisirwa kunge yave kutadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo pakupera kwegore rino. VaMasimba Manyanya, avo vakamboshanda mubazi rezvemari mumakore ekuma 1990s, vanoti izvi ndizvo zvinoitika kana hurumende ikatadza kuvandudza hupfumi munyika. VaManyanya vanoti zvinhu zvinogona kusamira zvakanaka mukati menguva pfupi inotevera. Vamwewo vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vanoti matanho mazhinji ari kutorwa nehurumende mukuedza kugadzirisa hupfumi haasi kushanda uye chave kudiwa kuti vari kutonga vabude pachena kuti vatadza kuitira kuti vanhu vemunyika nemapato nemasangano akasiyana siyana ashandire pamwe mukusimudzira hupfumi. Pari zvino hurumende yakaremerwa zvekuti pane mashoko asina kutsinhirwa ekuti iri kutopona nekutora mari kubva kune mamwe makambani ayo kuti ikwanise kuita basa rayo. Sachigaro wekambani ye Mbada Diamonds inove mubatanidzwa wehurumende neimwe kambani yekuSouth Africa, VaRobert Mhlanga, vakaudza paramende gore rapfuura kuti kambani yavo yakambosvika pane imwe nguva yekuti yaipa hurumende mamiriyoni makumi matatu emdhora pasvondo kuti ibhadhare vashandi vayo. Asi VaManyanya vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yange ichitora mari kumakambani emangoda nemamwe, zvinhu zvave kuoma kwese uye ichasara isisina kwekuenda. Pari zvino, hurumende iri kushandisa zvikamu makumi masere nezvitatu zvemari yese yebhajeti mukubhadhara vashandi izvi zvinoita kuti isare isina mari yekushandisa muzvipatara, zvikoro pamwe nemamwe mabasa. Semuenzaniso gore rapfuura, bazi rezvemari rakapa zvipatara zvese munyika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nematatu emadhora yekushandisa gore rese asi zvipatara izvi zvaive nechikwereti chemamiriyoni makumi matatu nematanhatu emdhora zvinoreva kuti mari yese yakaenda kunobhadhara zvikwereti. Makambani akawanda munyika kusanganisira ehurumende haasi kubhadhara mitero iyo inove nzira inowana hurumende nayo mari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehufpumi dzinoti hurumende inofanira kusimbisa kubhadharwa kwemitero kuti iwane mari yekushandisa. Semuenzaniso gwaro raAuditor- General rinoti makambani ehurumende ange aine zvikwereti zvemutero zvemazana mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora gore rapfuura. VaChinamasa vanoti vakapa simba rekutevera mari dzese dzemutero dzisina kubhadharwa uyevo vanoti hurumende ichabata mitero pane mari dzimwe dzinowanikwa nevashandi vemakambani neakazvimirira kuti mari dzekubatsirikana dzibatirwe mitero. Asi VaMuchichwa vanoti hapana chinobuda nekuti vanhu havana chivimbo nemashandisirwo ari kuitwa mari nehurumende ndosaka kana makambani anokwanisa asiri kubhadhara mitero. Kunze kwemitero, nyika inokwanisa kukwereta kana kuwana rubatsiro kubva kunyika kana masangano ekunze. Asi VaManyanya vanoti izvi hazvikwanisike pari zvino nekuti hurumende iri kutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo uye hukama hwayo nenyika zhinji dzinopa rubatsiro dzakaita seAmerica neBritain hauna kumira zvakanaka. Zimbabwe haisiwo kuwana rubatsiro kubva ku World Bank ne International Monetary Fund sezvo iri kukundikana kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvinodarika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kana hupfumi hwenyika hukadonha, zvinhu zvinogona kushata munyika zvinogona kukonzera kuti sarudzo dziitwe nguva yadzo isati yasvika muna 2018. Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency inoti vanhu vanodarika makumi matanhatu munyika varombo uye zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zveavo vachiri pamabasa vanotambira mari iri pasi pemadhora mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu emadhora pamwedzi. Kumatunhu akaita seMatabeleland North, kune hurombo hunotyisa zvekuti vanhu vanodarika makumi masere kubva muzana kunzvimbo iyi vari kuyaura nenhamo.

headline: Vakawanda Voramba Kutambira Mutemo Mutsva Unorambidza Kushandiswa kweMari yeKunze
text: Vamwe vana muzvinabhizimusi muMasvingo, vari kuramba kutevedzera mutemo mutsva wakaiswa nehurumende wekuti vasatengese zvinhu muzvitoro zvavo nemari yekunze. Vemabhizimusi vataura neStudio7 vati ivo vacharamba vachitengesa nemari yekunze nekuti zvinhu zvavo zvizhinji vanozvitenga nemari yekunze kwenyika, nekudaro vakatengesa nemari yemuno iyi inogara ichipera simba, vanobuda mubhizimusi. VaNeedmore Manyasha, avo vanotengesa mbatya dzinotengwa kunze kwenyika, vati vachiri kutengesa nemari yekunze nekuti vakatengesa neyemuno, havazokwanisi kuotenga kunze kwenyika zvimwe zvekutengesa. Vezvitoro zvizhinji zvembatya nemidziyo vanotiwo vacharamba vachitengesa nemari yekunze apo zvimwe zvishoma zvichi engesawo nemari yemuno pachitevedzerwa mutemo mutsva. Asi vanotengesa mafuta edzimotokari vazhinji muMasvingo vaswera vakavhara vachiti vari kumirira kuona kuti vodiyi nekuti vanotenga mafuta aya nemari yekunze. VaDonald Joma, avo vanotengesa pachiteshi chemafuta, cheZUVA muMasvingo, vati vanzi vambomira kutengesa mafuta avo nhasi. Vezvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga yekuzvipatara vatiwo vambomira kutengesa mishonga nhasi vachiti vachatanga kutengesa nemari yemuno kana makambani akapuwa marezinesi ekuvatengesera nehurumende ava kutambirawo mari yemuno. Izvi zvaita kuti vanhu vamwe varwere vatadze kutenga mishonga yavanofanirwa kushandisa. Vamwe vemabhzimusi madiki vakaita saMuzvare Martha Maduviko, vati vatambira mutemo mutsva uyu. NeMuvhuro, hurumende yakaisa mutemo weStatutory Instrument 142 of 2019, uyo wave kurambidza kuti mari dzekunze dzishandiswe mukutenga nekutengesa zvinhu munyika. Izvi zviri kupikiswa neveruzhinji, zvikuru vanotenga zvinhu kunze kwenyika sezvo vari kutadza kuwana mari dzekunze mumabhanga emunyika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rebhanga guru renyika panyaya iyi. Asi munyori mubhazi rinoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muhurumende, VaNick Mangwana, vati vari kupikisa mutemo mutsva uyu vari kupara mhosva. Zviri kuitika kuMasvingo zviri kuitikawo mumaguta ose ari munyika vakawanda vachichema nerekuti havasi kukwanisa kuwana mari dzekunze kumabhanga avo. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi Vovhiringwa neKushanduka kweMamiriro eKunze kuMaruwa
text: Varimi vekumaruwa kuchamhembe nekumabvazuva kweAfrica vanoti hurumende dzenyika idzi hadzisi kuita hurukuro navo kuti Africa ingarima kudya kwakakwana sei yakatarisana nematambudziko ekuchinja kwemamiriro ekunze ichishandisa nzira dzemuAfrica. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano waitwa muHarare, uchikokerwa nesangano reLa Via Campesina in Southern and Eastern Africa. Varimi vati hurumende dzemuAfrica dzinofanirwa kuchengetedza nzira dzekurima dzemuAfrica kwete kutora zvinobva kure. Sachigaro wesangano iri, Amai Elizabeth Mpofu, avo vanotungamirirawo Zimbabwe Small-Holder Farmers Forum, vatiwo varimi vekumaruma muAfrica havasi kukosheswa sezvinoitwa varimi vemapurazi makuru. Sangano iri rinotiwo rinoda kuti hurumende dzemuAfrica dzisakurudzire kurimwa kwembeu dzakauchikwa vachiti mbeu idzi hadziunze hutano hwakanaka muvanhu. Amai Mpofu vatiwo kunyange hazvo chibvumirano chekurima cheMaputo Declaration chichiti zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvemabhajeti enyika, zvinofanirwa kubatsira varimi, varimi vekumaruwa havasi kuwana rubatsiro urwu. VaBenedict Aminer, vanomiririra Kenya Peasants League vatiwo nzira zhinji dzekurima dzinoshandiswa nevarimi veminda mirefu dzinokuvadza nharaunda nezviwanikwa asi hurumende dzemuAfrica hadzima zvadziri kuita kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Sangano iri rinotiwo ranyora tsamba dzenyunyuto munyaya dzemabatirwo ari kuitwa varimi vekumaruwa dzichaendeswa kuSADC neComesa.

headline: Kushaya Mari Kwopa Kuti Vakawanda Vasaende kuKisimusi kuMusha
text: Dambudziko rekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi pamwe nekushaikwa kwemari mumabhanga raita kuti vamwe vanhu vemuZimbabwe vatadze kufamba kuenda kumisha yavo yekumaruwa pamwe nemamwe madhorobha. Vemabhazi anotakura vanhu vanoti vanhu vari kufamba panguva ino yezororo rekisimusi vashoma gore rino kana zvichienzaniswa nemamwe makore. Pamusika mukuru weMbare apo panokwirirwa mabhazi anoenda kumaruwa nemamwe maguta nemadhorobha pange pasina vanhu vakwanda uye vemabhazi vange vachiti gore rino zvinhu zvakawona sezvo vanhu vasiri kufamba. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 pamusika uyu yaratidza kuti pange paine vanhu vashoma uye vemabhazi vange vari kugunun’una kuti vanhu vange vari vashoma uye mabhazi ange ari kutora nguva yakareba kuti azare. Muchairi werimwe bhazi rinoenda kuNyamapanda, VaJohn Kagonye, vanoti makore apfuura nguva dzekisimusi havaiwanzomira nguva inodarikaa maminitsi makumi matatu kana awa chairo vari pamusika. Mumwewo muchairi anoshandira kambani yeJoma Transport, iyo inotakura vanhu vanoenda kuMasvingo, uyo aramba kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatori venhau, anoti gore rino vanhu havasi kufamba sezvavange vakatarisira uye patataura navo vati vange vave nemaawa matatu vakamira pamusika bhazi ravo risati razara. Vati vanofunga kuti nyaya yekushaikwa kwemari ndiyo iri kukonzera kuti vanhu vasafambe. Vati mapurisa akawandisa mumugwagwa zvekuti kubva muHarare kusvika kuMasvingo pane maroablocks anodarika gumi nemashanu izvo zviri kuitawo kuti vatore nguva yakareba vari pamugwagwa. Asi VaPeter Tofarasei avo vanoshandira kambani yeBless It Transport, vanoti vanoona sekuti mabhazi awandisa uye ndozvave kuita kuti bhizimisi riite shoma. Vemabhazi ese vataura neStudio7 vati vari kutambirawo mari yemaBond Notes uye gore rino vatadza kuwedzera mutengo sezvavanosiita nekuda kwekuti vanhu vari kufamba vashoma. Kunze kweve mabhazi, vanotengesawo paMusika weMbare avo vanosiwanzo wanawo mari yakawanda panguva ino yegore vanotiwo bhizimisi ishoma gore rino. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaTari Marizan vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu zvakawoma Zvichakadai mitsetse yange yakareba zvakanyanya mumabhanga mazhinji uye vazhinji vari kutyira kuti vachatadza kutamba kimisimusi zvakanaka nekuda kwekushaya mari. Kunyange hazvo veReserve Bank vakawedzera huwandu hwemari inotorwa pazuva, veruzhinji vanoti mabhanga ari kutora nguva yakareba kuvapa mari uye mamwe mabhanga ange asitorina mari pama ATM. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano Re PTUZ Rinoti Nhengo Dzaro Dzichashanda Zuva Rimwe Chete Pasvondo
text: Sangano rinomiririra varairidzi, re Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (PTUZ), rinoti ragumbuka zvikuru negurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, avo vanonzi vakapamhidzira mari kune vamwe vakuru vakuru vanoshanda muhurumende asi pasina chavapa varairidzi. Mutungamiriri wesangano iri, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti varairidzi vakagara vasingabvumi kuti hurumende haina mari. Vati chave kudiwa nesangano ravo ndechekuti hurumende ibudise pachena mari inotambirwa nevashandi vese vehurumende sezvo zviri pachena kuti hurumende inopa vamwe mari ichinyima vamwe. Doctor Zhou vati sangano ravo riri kukurukura nyaya yekuti varairidzi vaende kubasa zuva rimwe chete pasvondo, kwete mazuva matatu seavari kushanda ikozvino vachiti varairidzi havana mari yekuendesa kubasa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kupa Mapazi Ayo Mari Shoma Pane Yavari Kuda muBhajeti
text: Paramende nemusi weMuvhuro yatanga kunzwa kubva kumapazi ehurumende pamusoro pebhajeti ra2019 uye zvabuda pachena kuti mapazi akawanda akanzi nebazi remari aunze mabhajeti ari pasi pasi pemari yavanoda kushandisa izvo zvichakanganisa mashandiro awo gore rinouuya. Vachitaura pamusoro pebhajeti rebazi ravo regore rinouuya, munyori mubazi rezvevashandi, Doctor Judith Kateera, vazivisa komiti yeparamende inoona nezvevashandi kuti bazi rakaziviswa kuti bhajeti rebazi ravo harifaniri kudarika mamiriyoni makumi masere nematatu. Dr Kateera vanoti bazi ravo rinokwanisa kuita zvirongwa zvaro nemazvo kana rikawana mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu. Vatiwo kunze kwekupihwa mari isingavakwanire, bazi rine zvikwereti zvinodarika zana remamiriyoni makumi masere uye rave kutarisa nzira dzakasiyana siyana dzekutsvaga mari kwete kungomirira hurumende chete. Vatiwo vanovimba kuti nhaurirano dziri kuitwa nehurumende nedzimwe nyika dzichabudirira kuti bazi ravo rikwanise kuwana rubatsiro kubva kune dzimwe nyika nemAsangano akasiyana siyana. Chikwereti chikuru chebazi iri ndecheBasic Education Assistance Module (BEAM) icho chisati chabhadharwa nebazi iri kuzvikoro kubva muna 2015 kusvika pari zvino. Chikwereti ichi chave pamadhora mamiriyoni makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu. Komisheni inoona nezvevashandi vehurumende, yazivisawo kuti inoda bhajeti remari inosvika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemaviri. Asi yakatoudzwa kuti bhajeti rayo haifanira kudarika zana remamiriyoni nemakumi mapfumbamwe nerimwe. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei pasina chinoratidza kuti mari yekubhadhara kana kuti huwandu hwevashandi vehurumende hurikudzikira, munyori mukuru mukomisheni iyi, VaJonathan Wutawunashe, vati vari kuedza napose pavanogona kuderedza huwandu hwevashandi vehurumende. Vati vashandi vehurumende vakawandira kubazi rezvehurumende nehutano uye vari kuongorora mapazi ehurumende kuona kuti vangagadzirisa nyaya iyi sei. Vatiwo nyaya yevashandi vehurumende vanonzi vanongobhadharwa vasina zvavari kuita iri kugadziriswawo. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Manyanya vati zvinosuwisa kuti mapazi ehurumende achapihwa mari shoma vachiti izvi zvichakanganisa mashandire emapazi aya. Vati hurumende ine mari yakawanda chose iyo inoshandiswa zvinhu zvisina maturo. Paramende ichatura zvese zvairi kuudzwa kubazi rezvemari. Gurukota rezvemari muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vanotarisirwa kutura bhajeti ravo rekutanga mwedzi unouya. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa muBulawayo Vozeya reMangwana Ravo
text: Vamwe vanorarama nekutengesa muBulawayo vanoti vanoda kuti kanzuru iwedzere nguva yayakavapa yekuti vabve pane imwe nzvimbo yavari kutengesera kuitira kuti vawane nguva yakakwana yekuenda kunzvimbo itsva dzavanofanirwa kutengesera vari. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano waitwa nevamwe vevanotengesa paGodini. Vanhu ava vakapiwa kusvika pakupera kwemwedzi uno kuti vabve panzvimbo iyi apo pari kuda kuvakirwa nzvimbo inenge iine zvitoro nemahofisi ichange ichinzi EGodini Mall. Kambani inofanirwa kuvaka nzvimbo iyi inofanirwa kutanga basa musi wa 1 Kurume, svondo rinouya. Murongi wemabasa muBulawayo Upcoming Traders Association, VaVincent Donga, vanoti vaita musangano nekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo vachiiudza kuti vanoda kuwedzerwa mazuva. Mumwe wevanotengesa paGodini, Amai Sekai Ndlovu, vabvuma kuti kanzuru yaive yavaudza kuti vanofanirwa kubva panzvimbo iyi uye kuti vakaudzwa nzvimbo itsva kwavari kufanirwa kunotengesera vari. Asi vati vane kushushikana nekubva panzvimbo iyi nekuti vave nenguva vachitengesera ipapo uyewo havana chokwadi chekuti kwavanonzi vaende kwacho vachange vachiwana vanhu vanovatenga vakawanda here sevavaichiwana paGodini. Munyori mukuru weBulawayo Upcoming Traders Association, VaDumisani Ncube, vatsigira kuti vanotengesera paGodini vanoda kuwedzerwa nguva yekubva panzvimbo iyi nekuti vakanonoka kuudzwa kuti vanofanirwa kubva. Vati sezvo kutengesa kuri iko kunopa raramo kuvanhu ava, kubviswa kwavo hakufanirwe kuti kuitwe zvechimbi-chimbi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumutauriri wekanzuru, Amai Nesisa Mpofu, kana kubva kuna meya, VaMartin Moyo, sezvo vange vachinzi vari mumusangano. Asi kanzuru yakazivisa gore rakapera nezvekuvakwa kweGodini Mall uye kuti vanotengesa vari panzvimbo iyi vaizofanirwa kubva. Kana yapera kuvakwa EGodini Mall inonzi ichavewo nenzvimbo itsva yevanorarama nekutengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana. Nzvimbo yeEGodini Mall inotarisira kuvakwa nemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Vodyira Marasha Kanzuru yeMasvingo
text: Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vanoti havasi kufara nedanho rakatorwa nekanzuru yavo nezuro rekuti itengere vakuru vemapazi nharembozha dzichadya mari inodarika zviuru makumi matanhatu zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Vagari vakawanda vanoti zviri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo zvinoratidza kuti haina shungu nekuita zvinhu zvinobatsira veruzhinji. Maminetsi emusangano wekanzuru wakaitwa nezuro anoratidza kuti kanzuru yakabuda nechisungo chekutenga nharembozha dzemhando yepamusoro soro dzekupa vakuru vemapazi ekanzuru gumi, pamwe nevetevedzeri vavo gumi. Vakuri vemapazi vachatengerwa Iphone7 iyo inoita zviuru zvitatu zvemadhora, vatevedzeri vavo vachitengerwa Samsung Galaxy S9, iyo inoita zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe emadhora ekuAmerica. Izvi zvichadyira kanzuru mari inoita makumi matanhatu ezviuru zvemadhora. Vagari vataura ne Studio7 vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vatungamiri vekanzuru havana hany'a nehupenyu hwevagari sezvo vachishandisa mari yakawanda kuzvinhu zvenhando, asi ivo vasina mvura yakakwana, migwagwa yakanaka uye marara asiri kutakurwa kanzuru ichiti mari yairi kuwana ishoma. Amai Sandra Muzenda, avo vanogara mumusha weSisk, vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vakuru vekanzuru vane humbimbindoga. Mumwe mugari, Muzvare Blessing Chimombo, vanotiwo havaoni chinobatsira nharembozha pakufambiswa kwebasa rekanzuru rakafana nekuti kushomeka kwemvura kupere mudhorobha. Kunyange zvekutengwa kwenharembozha izvi zvisimo mubhajeti rekanzuru ra2019, kanzuru inotarisirwa zvakare kuzobudisa mari yakawanda yekutengera vakuru ava muto wekudzishandisa mwedzi wega wega. Mubhajeti regore rino remari inosvika mamirioni maviri emadhora, kanzuru ichashandisa mari inosvika zviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora gore rose mukugadzirisa migwagwa, zvinoreva kuti mari yenharembozha yose inokwanisa kugadzirisa migwagwa yedhorobha kwemwedzi mumwe chete. Kanzuru inoshandisazve mari inoita zviuru mazana matatu zvemadhora kutenga mishonga inochenesa mvura pagore, zvekuti mari yenharembozha inokwanisa kutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura kwemwedzi miviri, vanhu vachiwana mvura yakachena muguta rine vanhu vosvika zviuru zana. Mari yenharembozha iyi inokwanisawo kutenga mafuta edzimotokari dzose dzekanzuru nedzekutakurisa marara mudzimba kwemwedzi mitatu, izvo zvinoita kuti zvirwere zvive zvishoma muguta. Naynzvi munyaya dzemari dzinotiwo, kanzuru, iyo iri kunetseka kuwanira musha wega wega bhini rawo, yaikwanisa kutenga mabhini zviuru zvisere zvopihwa vagari kuitira kuti vasarase marara pose pose. Mukuru webasa muMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti kanzuru iri kuita zvekutamba nemari yevagari. Kunyange izvi zvakabuda mumaminitsi emusangano wekupera kwemwedzi unopa mvumo kubasa rose rekanzuru richaitwa mwedzi unotevera, meya weguta, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti izvi hazvisati zvapasiswa. Vagari vanoti kanzuru inofanirwa kusatenga nharembozha idzi yonangana nezvinhu zvinobatsira vagari. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaTino Mambeu, Voenda Mberi neMabasa eKuisa Magetsi eMhando dzeMoto weZuva neMhepo muSouth Africa
text: Muchikamu chedu chatinotarisa zviri kuitwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika, tine hurukuro nechizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaTino Mambeu, vanove nyanzvi munyaya dzemhando dzemoto wezuva pamwe newemhepo, kana kuti solar and wind energy vachishanda vari muJohannesburg, kuSouth Africa. VaMambeu, vanove mukuru wekambani yeUlwazi Energy Technologies, vanoti vakatanga vachingoisa magetsi emazuva ose aya vasati vapinda mukuteya moto wezuva neunobva mumhepo. Vanoti vanotarisira kuti gore ravanozodzokera kumusha vanonoenderera mberi nekuita basa iri, uye vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti isabhadharisa mitero pamidizyo yemabasa avanenge vachiita vari kunze kwenyika kana vodzokera kumusha nayo. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi Vanoti Vanoda Kutambiriswa Madhora ekuAmerica
text:
Varairidzi vakawanda vanoti mari yavapihwa nhasi nehurumende yekuti vayamurike ishoma zvikuru vachiti chavari kuda imari yavaitambira iri yemadhora ekuAmerica. Mumwe mudzidzisi wekwaChiendambuya kwaRusape, VaFambayi Fambayi, vati mari iyi ishoma zvikuru sezvo pasina zvainokwanisa kutenga.

Sachigaro werimwe sangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vati kunyange mari iyi ikabatanidzwa nemari dzemihoro yavo haidarike madhora zviuru zvishanu zvinodiwa kuti mhuri yevanhu vashanu vararame pamwedzi.

Munyori mukuru weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaRaymond Majongwe, vati wochiri kunetsa ndechekuti mari iyi haina kubuda munhaurirano uye ishoma zvekuti hairaramise vadzidzisi vari
kukwangwaya nenhamo. Mukuru weZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaSifiso Ndlovu, vati mari yawedzerwa yakafanana nemutero wembwa. Vati vadzidzisi vanofanirwa kuwedzerwa mari kuti idarike madhora zviuru gumi nezvishanu kuti vararame sevanhu.

Hurumende inoti yafanopa vadzidzisi mari iyi kuti vafanobatsirikana apo vanenge vachiita nhaurirano munyaya dzemari yemihoro. Mune imwewo nyaya, vadzidzi vakawanda vapfekedzwa nguwani dzedzidzo vari kumba kana kuti virtual nekuda kwekutyirwa kuti vakaungana pachikoro cheChinhoyi University of Technology sezvavanogaroita makore ese, vano paradzira chirwere cheCovid-19. Mumwe aswera akapfeka nhumbi dzedzidzo nhasi ari kumba ndiMuzvare Vimbainashe Chitauro avo vati vaishuwira kupemberera zuva ranhasi vari kuchikoro nevamwe. Muzvare Chitauro vati vatadza kuona zvanga zvichiitwa kuchikoro sezvo vanga vasina mabhanduru ekuvhura madandemutande.  Asi mumwe wevakanzi vange vari pachikoro nhasi nekuti vakaita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro, VaIgnatius Sakala, vati mufaro wavo mushoma sezvo vamwe vavakadzidza navo vatadza kunge vari pachikoro. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vapfekedza vadzidzi vakapedza zvidzidzo zvavo vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, asi vazvinji vavo vanga vari kudzimba dzavo vachiona zvanga nzvichiitika padandemutande. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inomisa Kanzuru yeGweru Kukwidza Mitero
text: Kanzuru yeguta reGweru yamanikidzwa nehurumende, kuburikidza negurukota rezvematunhu, VaIgnatius Chombo, kusakwidza mitero sezvo bhajeti rayo risati ratambirwa nebazi rezvematunhu. No media source currently available Kanzuru iyi, iyo yaive yakwidza mitero kubvira pakupera kwemwedzi waNdira, yarambidzwa kuita izvi nebazi rezvematunhu sezvo bazi iri risati rapasisa hurongwa hwekanzuru iyi hwekushandisa mari gore ra2015. Muhurongwa hwayo hwekushandisa mari hwegore rino, kanzuru yaida kukwidza mitero yakasiyana-siyana nezvikamu makumi matatu nezvishanu kubva muzana. Asi sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvemari mukanzuru yeGweru, VaAlbert Chirau, vanoti vebazi rezvematunhu vakati kanzuru inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana, kusanganisira nyaya yekuti vakuru vakuru vekanzuru vapiwe mari yemihoro inoenderana neyakatarwa nehurumende, uye kuti mari inoshandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vekanzuru isapfuure zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvemari inowanikwa nekanzuru kubva kumitero. VaChirau vanoti kanzuru iri kugadzirisa zvakanzi zvigadziriswe izvi nevebazi rezvematunhu, uye vanotarisira kuti bhajeti rekanzuru richapasiswa munguva pfupi inotevera. Pakupera kwemwedzi waNdira nepakutanga kwaKukadzi vamwe vagari vemuGweru vakaratidzira vachitsutsumwa pamusoro pehurongwa hwekanzuru hwekuda kukwidza mitero, uyewo nyaya yekuti kanzuru iri kuendesa kumagweta vagari vari kukundikana kubhadhara zvikwereti zvemitero zvavainazvo kukanzuru. VaChirau vanoti pave nehurongwa hutsva hwekuti kanzuru haichaendesi vagari vane zvikwereti kumagweta pasina kutaurirana. Vanoti kanzuru yakatora danho rekuti kwemwedzi mitanhatu inotevera magweta ekanzuru haafanirwe kubata kana kutengesa midziyo yevagari vari kubhadhara zvikwereti zvavo kumagweta aya, uye kuti munguva imwe cheteyo, avo vanobhadhara mitero yavo nenguva vasina zvikwereti, vachabvisirwa zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvemari yavanobhadhara. VaCornelia Selipiwe ndivo sachigaro weGweru Residents and Ratepayers Association rinove sangano rine dzimwe nhengo dzakaratidzira nguva pfupi yapfuura. Va Selipiwe vanoti vanotambira nemufaro mukuru danho rekudzorera mitero payaive isati yakwidzwa pakupera kwaNdira. Vanoti tarisiro yavo ndeye kuti bazi rezvematunhu richapa pfungwa yekuti kanzuru yeGweru isakwidza mitero zvachose sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzemari Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kanzura nevagari vanofanirwa kugara pasi votaurirana kuitira vagari vaziviwo kuti zvavanoda kuitirwa nekanzuru zvinoda mari inobva muvagari. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo kanzuru inofanirwawo kuisa zvido zvevagari pamberi, uye kutambirisa vashandi vayo mari dzinoenderana nemari inowanwa nekanzuru kubva kumitero.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanovhura Zviri paMutemo 2018 Agricutural Show
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vavhura Harare Agricultural Show zviri pamutemo vachiti zvirongwa zveCommand Agriculture nePresidential Input Scheme hazvisi zvematongerwo enyika uye hurumende yavo icharamba ichitsigira zvirongwa izvi sezvo zviri kubatsira nyika kuwana chikafau chakakwana. Vati zvirongwa izvi zvaita kuti nyika iite goho rakawandisa uye hurumende yavo icharamba ichizvitsigira. Vati kubudira kweCommand Agriculture kwakaita kuti ivandudzwe kusanganisira zvimwe zvirimwa zvakaita segorosi, zvipfuyo zvakaita semombe pamwe nehove. Vati zvirongwa izvi hazvisi zvematongerwo enyika sezvinotaurwa nemapato anopikisa munyika uye hurumende yavo icharamba ichitsigira chirongwa ichi. VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yavo inotsigira Harare Agricultural Show pamwe nezvirongwa zvayo zvakaita semusangano wayakaita svondo rino wevarimi nemabhizimisi. Vati mashoo emamwe matunhu munyika yose anofanira kudzidza kubva kuHarare Agricultural Show uyewo vati vachakurudzira hurumende dzematunhu dzichaumbwa pasi pehurumende kuti dzikoshese zvirongwa zvevarimi. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo makambani akazvimirira kuti atsigire mabasa ekurima kuitira kuti nyika ikwanise kutengesa zvirimwa zvayo kunze sezvayaiita kare. Mukuru weZimbabwe Agricultural Society, varongi veHarare Agricultural Show, VaNgoni Kudenga, vati chirongwa chavo chakabudira zvikuru gore rino uye huwandu hwevairatidzira zvirimwa hwakakwira nezvikamu gumi nezvina kubva muzana kana zvichienzaniswa negore rapfuura. Vatiwo ivo nekomiti yavo vari kuzeya pfungwa dzakapihwa nevamwe kuti Harare Agricultural Show isandurwe kuve National Agricultural Show sezvo ichipindwa nevarimi nemakambani kubva mumatunhu ese munyika. Mutungamiriri weGrain Millers Association, GMA, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vaudza Studio 7 kuti makambani ari musangano ravo ave kutotsigira varimi nechekare. Pashoo yegore rino GMA ndiyo yapa mubairo wezviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu emadhora kukambani yeGushungo Dairy iyo yatora mubairo wekutanga pachikamu chevarimi vanochengeta mombe. Zimbabwe Parks and Wildlife Management Authority yatora mubairo wekuita basa rayo zvakanaka. Mukuru wekambani iyi, VaFulton Mangwanya, vaudza Studio7 kuti vafara chose nekukunda kwavaita. Kambani yeSeedco ndiyo yawana mubairo wekutanga pamakambani ese airatidzira gore rino kozotiwo Zimbabwe Broadcasting Cooperation ndiyo yawana mubairo pamakambani ese ezvenhau akapinda pashoo yegore rino. Varimi vahwina mibairo inosanganisira dzimotokari, mari nematirakita. No media source currently available

headline: Vari Kunze Vochema neKwavanoti Kusatirimuka kweHurumende paNyaya yeMapasipoti
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvikuru zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kunyunyuta zvakasimba nekwazvinoti kukundikana kwehurumende kuzviwanisa magwaro ekufambisa matsva kana kumutsiridza anenge apera kushanda, izvo zvave kuita kuti vamwe vavo varasikirwe nemabasa. Hurumende yakanga yambozivisa svondo rapera kuti zvinhu zvakanga zvave kuzoreruka sezvo yakatenga mapepa nezvimwe zvinodiwa mukugadzirwa kwemapasipoti. Asi tsvakiridzo yaitwa neStudio7 inoratidza kuti hurumende iri kutotarisira chikamu chekutanga chemapepa akatengwa aya pamwe nezvimwe zvinodiwa mukudhindwa kwemapasipoti zvakaita se ink zviri kutotarisirwa munyika pakati pemwedzi unouya. Mushandi uyu atiwo pari zvino hapana chiri kudhindwa kumahofisi kwavo, izvo zvinopesana nemashoko anga achiburitswa nevamwe ekuti zvinhu zvave kutanga kufamba. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuSouth Africa, VaMaxwell Mwale, vanoti vari kuchema zvikuru kuti pasipoti yavo yave kupera kushanda pasina hurongwa kwekuti vawane imwe nekukasika. VaMwale vanoti vanhu vakawanda muSouth Africa vave kuvharirwa mabhuku avo ekumabhanga sezvo vasisina magwaro anovabvumidza kugara nekushanda munyika iyi zviri pamutemo. VaMwale vanoti vanhu vakawanda vave kungogara vasina mapasipoti, kunyange hazvo vachityira kuti vachabatwa vachidzoserwa kumusha. VaMwale vanokurudzira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti igare pasi nevatungamiri venyika dzine zvizvarwa zvayo votsvaga nzira dzingabatsira vanhu ava, pane kuti vadzoserwe kumusha. No media source currently available

headline: VaMthuli Ncube Voendeswa kuMatare neNyaya yeKukwidza Mutero
text: Mumwe muzvinabhizimisi wemuHarare, VaArnold Mutsondi, vaendesa gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Muthuli Ncube, kumatare vachiti mutemo wavo wavakadzika wekuwedzera mutero hausi pamutemo uye hautarisirwe munyika ine hutongo hwejekerere. VaNcube vakati vanhu vatange kubhadhara masendi maviri padhora roga roga pavanoshandisa makadhi avo ekubhengi kubva pamasendi mashanu pachero mari yavanenge vachitumira kana kushandisa. VaMutsondi vanoti zviri pachena kuti hurumende iri kuda kuomesera vanhu vasina mhaka nekuti yakundikana kugadzirisa dambudziko remari. Gweta raVaMutsondi, VaAlex Majachani, vanoti zviri kuitwa naVaNcube kutyora bumbiro remutemo wenyika. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaNcube kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbawe Zvofarira Kuvhurwa kweBhodha neBotswana Svondo Rinouya
text: Varidzi vemabhazi anofamba pakati peHarare neGaborone nemamwe maguta ari munyika dzakatenderedza Zimbabwe vanoti vafadzwa zvikuru nedanho ratorwa neBotswana rekuti vatange kushanda musi wa1 Zvita. Gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwevanhu nezvinhu uye kufambiswa kwemashoko muBotswana, VaThulaganyo Segokgo vaivisa nezvedanho iri vachitaura nevatori venhau nemusi weMuvhuro. VaSegokgo vazivisa kuti rimwe remabhodha mashanu ari kuvhurwa zvizere kubva musi wa1 Zvita ndere Plumtre-Ramokgwebana iro rinoshandiswa zvikuru nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. Botswana yakavhara mabhodha ayo nenyika dzakaitenderedza muna Kubvumbi gore rino senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hweCovid-19. Kuvharwa kwemabhodha uku kwakakanda ruzhinji rwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe mukanwa mamupere sezvo zvichirarama nekutenga zvinhu kunyika dzakatenderedza Zimbabwe zvichinotengesa kumusha. Mukuru kukambani yeMangongongo Logistics ine mabhazi anobva mudhorobha reFrancistown muBotswana achienda kuHarare VaMartin Vumbani vati bhizimisi range radzokera kumashure zvakanyanya nekuvharwa kwemabhodha. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinotyaira kukambani imwe cheteyo VaThompson Moyo vatsinhira mashoko aya. Kunyange hazvo vachigamuchira kuvhurwa kwemabhodha nemaoko maviri, VaMoyo vaenderera mberi vachiti vachatenda maruva vadya chakata nokuti zvinoda kutevedza kuti kusaparadzirwa hutachiwana hhweCovid-19 hazvisi nyore kuzadzikisa. Vachitsigira mashoko aVaMoyo, VaThomas Muzavazi vaudza Studio 7 kuti dai nyika dziri mudunhu reSADC dzataurirana kuti vanhu vasabhadhariswe mari zhinji pakuvhenekwa hutachiwana hweCoronavirus. Vafambi vanotarisirwa kuva nechitambi chinoratidza kuti havana chirwere cheCOVID-19 uye kutewedzera zvinodikanwa kuti hutachiwana husapararire kusanganisira kupfeka maface mask, kugeza maoko nguva dzose uye kusaungana kwenguva refu. Vakuru mubazi rezvekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu muZimbabwe vakatozivisa dare reparamende kuti havana zvimwe zvikwanisiro zvekuona kuti vanhu havapinde here pamabhodha nemapepa ekunyeba vachiti vanoda mari yekutenga michina yechizvinozvino. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotatarika Kutenga Mafuta eKufambisa Motokari
text: Zvinhu munyika zvaita manyama amire nerongo sezvo makambani anotenga mafuta edzimotokari ari kuti ari kutadza kuwana mari kubva kubhanga guru renyika rereserve bank of Zimbabwe. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvemhando dzemoto VaPatson Mbiriri vanoti hurumende iri kuita chipatapa kuyedza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kuti munyika musaite dambudziko rekushomeka kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Izvi kumwana weZimbabwe inenge yave nhamo yechikwepa kuti uku chakarumwa uku chinotsva. Parizvino vanhu vari kuswera vakamira mumitsetse kutsvaga mari kumabhanga. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF inomirira Dangamvura-Chikanga mudare reparamende uye vaine mabhazi VaEsau Mupfumi vanoti vanhu vekuManicaland vanenge vange vogara havo vachienda kunotenga mafuta kuMozambique uko mutengo wacho wakaderera. VaMupfumi vati havo zvinonetsa kuziva kuti mafuta aya haakanganise here dzimotokari. Vatiwo vane chivimbo chekuti hurumende ichagadzirisa dambudziko iri risati rakomba. Mutungamiri weconfederation of Zimbabwe industries VaBusisa Moyo vanoti dambudziko iri rikasagadziriswa zvichaomera vemabhizmisi. Vatiwo pane makambani akawanda achatatarika sezvo achishandisawo mafuta aya. Vakawanda vari kushamisikawo kuti sei zimbabwe iri kutatarika nekushaya mafuta edzimotokari iyo iine kambani yemafuta enzimbe yeGreen Fuel? Vaimbova gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto VaElton Mangoma vave kutungamira bato reRDZ vanoti nyaya yehuori ndiyo yakanganisa chirongwa ichi. Ko chii chingaitwe nehurumende kuti dambudziko iri ripere? VaMangoma vanoti hurumende yaVaMugabe yaremerwa nemutoro wekutungamira nyika. Nyaya yekushomeka kwemafuta iyi hachisi chinhu chitsva muZimbabwe. Kubva muna 2000 pachine kambani yehurumende yenoczim zvinhu zvainetsa zvichikonzerwa kunnyaya nenyaya yehuori nekushomeka kwemari yekunze. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti dambudziko iri rikasagadzirwa nechimbichimbi hupfumi hwenyika hunogwadama.

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri muAmerica, VaNdenda, Vobata Pamwe neMasangano Akawanda muKusimudzira Vechidiki neNharaunda kuZimbabwe
text: Muchirongwa chedu chatinotarisa zviri kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika, svondo rino tine hurukuro naVaInnocent Ndenda vari mudunhu reTexas muAmerica asi vachibva kuHwedza mudunhu reMashonaland East. VaNdenda, avo vakaenda kuAmerica muna 2016, vanoti kunyange hazvo vachishanda samaneja pane imwe kambani kwakare kuTexas, vakaramba vachienderera mberi nemabasa avo avaiita vachiri kumusha, ekubatsira vanoshaya pamwe nekusimudzira nharaunda yavanobva. Pari zvino vanoti vari kushanda nemasangano matatu anoti reMubatirapamwe Trust, iro rinobatsira vanenge vachishandisa zvinodhaka, reMakoni North District Association, rakanangana nenyaya dzebudiriro, pamwe nereGlobal Exchange Program, iro rinobatanidza vanhu vanobva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana. VaNdenda vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuona vana veZimbabwe vachiisa misoro pamwe vosiyana nehumbimbindoga, vachiti chose chinezwi rekuti kubatana chinobudirira. Vanoti ivowo vane shuviro yekuti vange vachizorangarirwawo mune remangwana semunhu akabatsira mukushanda nevamwe kubatanidza vanhu kuti vavandudze magariro avo. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Zimbabwe Ngaitaurirane neBhanga Guru Repasi Rose
text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi inoshanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti Zimbabwe haina chimwe chekuita kunze kwekutaurirana nebhanga guru rinokweretesa mari reWorld Bank mkuitira kuti zvinhu zvifambe zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi. No media source currently available Zimbabwe ine chikwereti chemari inopfuura bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora. Mashoko aVaKanyenze anotsinhirwawo nevaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTendai Biti. Vaviri ava vanoti pasina rubatsiro nyaya yekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika inoramba iri zviroto. VaKanyenze vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutaurirana zvakare nesangano rinokweretesa pasi rose reInternational Monetary Fund. Zimbabwe ine zvikwereti zvekunze kwenyika zvinodarika mabhiriyoni mapfumbamwe ane zviuru zvipfumbamwe zvemadhora.

headline: Varimi veDonje neVabatsiri Vavo Vogura Muchato
text: Varimi vedonje gore rino vanonzi vachatarisana nedambudziko hombe zvichitevera kubuda muzvibvumirano zvekushanda nevarimi kunonzi kwaitwa nevanga vachitsigira varimi nezvekurimisa. Makambani anga achitsigira varimi anonzi ari kunyunyuta nekusawana chimuko kubva muhurongwa hwekubatsira varimi uhu achipomera varimi ava mhosva yekutengesa donje neparutivi, vasingatevedzere zvibvumirano zvekuti makambani aya atenge iwo donje. Hurongwa hwanga huripo hunonzi hwaiita kuti varimi vawaniswe zvinodiwa pakurima zvakaita semishonga, mbeu nefotereza, ivo voisawo simba ravo pakurima, kusakura pamwe nekukohwa donje ravo vozotarisirwa kuri tengesera kambani inenge yavabatsira. Asi zvinonzi varimi vaizonotengesa nerweseri donje ravo kune vamwe vanotenga vanenge vaine mitengo inenge iri pamusoro peinenge ichipiwa nemakambani anenge avabatsira. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarimi, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers Union, ZCFU, VaWonder Chabikwa, vanoti havawirirane nemashoko ekuti kutengeswa kwedonje parutivi nevarimi ndiko kwakonzera kuti vemakambani vabude muzvibvumirano izvi. VaChabikwa vanoti vemakambani anotenga donje ava vanogona kunge vakanga vaunganidza zvavo donje rakawanda nechekare zvekuti havachina shungu dzekutenga zvakare rimwe donje. Mitengo yedonje wemwaka wapera unonzi wakanga wakadzikawo pasi zvakanyanya, izvo zvinonzi zvakasvibisawo mwoyo yevamwe varimi mumwaka uno. Imwe yemakambani aitenga donje pamwe nekubatsira varimi, yeCargill, inonzi yakatovhara bhizimusi rayo munyika ichiti kuoma kwezvinhu kwakanga kwoita kuti isakwanise kurarama. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Ine Vanhu Vana Vafa, Uye Makumi Maviri neVasere Vabatwa neCovid-19
text: Huwandu hevanhu vabatwa neCoronavirus huchiri pamakumi maviri nevasere, uye vakashaya nechirwere vava vana. Zimbabwe yaongorora vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mapfumbamwe ane makumi mapfumbamwe. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kusvika nezuro, Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawanda vabatwa neCoronavirus ichiteverwa neBulawayo. MuHarare mune vanhu gumi nevaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye muBulawayo mune vanhu gumi. KuMashonaland East kune vanhu vana kozoti matunhu eMatabelelalnd North neMashonaland West ane munhu mumwe akabatwa neCoronavirus. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano kuti pane vanhu vangani vaongororwa nhasi uye kuti zvii zvabuda muongorora iyi. Bazi rezvehutano rinozivisa zvinenge zvabuda muongororo dzayo manheru ega ega uye izvi zvinoitwa tabva pamhepo. Zvichakadai, varimi vefodya nhasi vazivisa kuti vanofara chose nedanho ratorwa nehurumende rekutora basa ravo pamwe nekutengesa fodya sebasa rakakosha panguva ino apo nyika yakavharwa senzira yekudzvirira kupararira kweCoronavirus vachiti izvi zvichaita kuti vatengese fodya yavo pasina kunetsana kana kuvhiringidza nemapurisa kana vamwe vanochengetedza mutemo. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira varimi vefodya munyika, reZimbabwe Tobacco Assocciation, VaRodney Ambrose, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira danho iri nemufaro. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimrira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudzaStduio 7 danho rehurumende rakanaka chose sezvo fodya yakakosha pahupfumi hwenyika nekuti rinounza mari yekunze. VaAmbrose vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhengo dzesangano ravo dzatogadzirira kutengesa fodya vachiti vangomirira chete kuti bhanga guru renyika rigadzirise nyaya yekuti vachabhadharwa sei. Misika yefodya yaifanira kuvhurwa svondo rino asi izvi zvakambomiswa kuitira kuti pagadziriswe nyaya yekuti varimi vachabhadharwa sei. Murimi wefodya kuNyabira pedyo neHarare, Amai Helen Shumba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatogadzirira kutengesa fodya yavo. VaKuchera vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe vabude pachena nekukasika kuti varimi vanobhadharwa sei kuitira kuti misika yefodya ivhurwe kuitira kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze nekukasika. Gore rapfuura pakamboita mutauro, pakavhurwa misika yefodya varimi vachiramba kutengesa fodya yavo mushure mekunge hurumende yaputsa chibvumirano chayainge yaita nevarimi chekuti vaizobhadharwa nemadhora ekuAmerica. Mukuru wekambani yehurumende inoona nezvekutengeswa kwefodya munyika, yeTobacco Industries Marketing Board, Dr Andrew Matibiri, vaudza Studio7 kuti RBZ inotarisirwa kuita musangano nevarimimangwana kuitira kuti vabude nechisungo chekuti varimi vachabhadharwa sei misika isati yavhurwa. VaMatibiri vaudza Studio 7 kuti mangwana chaiwo vari kutanga zvidzidzo zvekudzisa varimi zvavanotarisirwa kuita pakuendesa fodya kumisika nekuita pamisika kudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. Zvimwe zvezvinhu ndezvekuti motokari dzinotakura fodya kuendesa kumisaka dzinobvimidzwa vanhu vaviri chete uye kuti vana vane makore ari pasi pegumi nematanhatu havabvumidzwe pamisika yefodya. Gore rino panenge pasina bhanga pamisika yefodya uye varimi vese vachaenda kumisika vachange vachiongororwa nekuita zvese zvinotarisirwa nebazi rezvehutano neWorld Health Organisation kudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. TIMB iri kukurudzira vanotenga fodya kuti vatenge fodya munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika senzira yekuderedza huwandu hwevarimi vanoenda kuHarare kuzotengesa fodya yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kuendesa Muzvare Joanna Mamombe kuChipatara
text: Sangano reWomen's Academy for Leadership and Political Excellence, kana kuti WALPE, uye rimwe rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose, reInternational Commission of Jurists (ICJ), ari kukurudzira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti iendese kuchipatara mumiriri weHarare West mudare reparamende, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, vebato reMDC Alliance, avo vasiri kunzwa zvakanaka kujeri reChikurubi kwavari. Muzvare Mamombe vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora mitemo yeCovid-19. Kunyangwe vange vamboendeswa kuchipatara cheParktown nemusi weChina, Muzvare Mamombe vakamanikidzwa kubuditswa muchipatara ichi nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori kunyangwe vanachiremba vaiti vaifanira kugara muchipatara vachivhenekwa. Sangano reICJ rinoti zvave pachena kuti mutemo wave kushandiswa sechombo chekutsikirira vanopikisa muZimbabwe. Sangano iri rinoti mukusaburitsa Muzvare Mamombe mujeri, hurumende iri kutyora bumbiro remutemo, pachikamu chechimakumi mashanu, kana kuti Article 50(d), chinoti musungwa ane kodzero yekurapwa. Rinotiwo Zimbabwe iri kutyora zvibvumirano neUnited Nations pakubata vasungwa. Tatumira mibvunzo kugurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, nezvemashoko aya asi vange vasati vapindura pataenda pamhepo. Tatumirawo mimwe mibvunzo yedu kumutauriri weZimbabwe Prisons and Correctional Services (ZPCS), Superintendent Meya Khanyezi, asi vange vasatiwo vapindura. Mukuru wesangano reWALPE, Muzvare Stabile Dewa, vanoti havasi kufara nemabatirwo ari kuitwa Muzvare Mamombe. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoparura Chirongwa Chekubatsira Vanoshandisa Zvinodhaka Pachena
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzaparura chirongwa chekuongorora pachena zvinodhaka mumiviri memunhu kuyedza kupedza dambudziko ratekeshera munyika rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka. Chirongwa ichi chinonzi Abused Substances Diagnostics & Manangement Project chichapa vanhu zvikwanisiro kana kuti (test kits) ekuona mhando yezvinodhaka zvinenge zvashandiswa. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, vaFanwell Dzoma vanoshanda kubazi rinoona nezvevashandi uye vataura vakamiririra mushandirapamwe wemapazi ehurumende mukuedza kupedza dambudziko rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka kana kuti Inter-ministerial Taskforce on Drug and Substance Abuse varumbidza zvikuru chirongwa chaparurwa ichi. VaDzoma vati ongororo yakaitwa munyika irikuratidza kuti zvikamu zvinodarika makumi mashanu nechimwe kubva muzana zvevechidiki chirikushandisa zvinodhaka. Vachange vachitungamirira chirongwa ichi, nyanzvi munezvehutano uye vari mukuru weDepartment of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe School of Medicine, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira vati chakanakira chirongwa ichi ndechekuti munhu anozviongorora ega. VaJacob Shamuyarira, avo vakamboshandisawo zvinodhaka vakazovamba sangano rakazvimiririra rinonzi Pamumvuri rinobatsirawo vanoshandisa zvinodhaka varumbidzawo chirongwa ichi. Muzvare Chengeto Nyanzira vanoshanda nekambani yeFaStep inova kambani ichange ichiwanisa zvekuongoreresa zvinodhaka izvi vati vanhu vachazviongorora vachishandisa weti yavo. Pasi pechirongwa ichi pachaitwawo dzidziso yekukurudzira vanhu kuti vasashandise zvinodhaka izvio zvinozokanganisa hupenyu hwavo vamwe vachifa kana kupenga. Masangano akasiyana siyana abatana muchirongwa ichi anosanganisira hurumende, University of Zimbabwe Health Sciences, Zimbabwe College of Pathology, FaStep, Pamumvuri nemamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vanamukoti Vairamwa Mabasa Votarisirwa Kudzoka paBasa
text: Vanamukoti, avo vanga vave nesvondo vachiramwa mabasa, vari kutarisirwa kudzoka pabasa vose nhasi Muvhuro, zvichitevera kuzivisa kwavakaita neMugovera kuti vakanga vave kumisa kuramwa mabasa uku. Gwaro rakaburitswa nesangano rinomirira vanamukoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association nemusi weMugovera, rinoti zvinosuwisa kuti matanho avanamukoti ekuratidza kunyunyuta kwavo nemabatirwo avo pamabasa akanga ave kuiswa kune zvematongerwo enyika. Sangano ravanamukoti iri rinoti kuitira kuti nhaurirano, idzo dzakanga dzambomira, dzienderere mberi, uyewo kudzivirirawo vashandi kuti vasashungurudzwa, vanamukoti vose vakawirirana kumisa kuramwa mabasa uku kuti uye vave kudzokera kubasa. Sangano iri rinoti vose vanamukoti vakanga vari pakuramwa mabasa vari kutarisirwa kudzokera kumabasa kwavo nhasi. Asi hazvisati zvazivikanwa kuti vanamukoti ava vachatambirwa here kana kuti kwete, sezvo hurumende yakanga yazivisa kare kuti vose vakanga vapinda pakuramwa mabasa vakanga vadzingwa mabasa, uye vanoda basa vaifanirwa kutonyorera patsva vachitsvaga basa. Hurumende yakazivisawo zvakare kuti yakanga yatotanga kutambira matsamba kubva kunavanamukoti vaitsvaga mabasa.

headline: Hurumende Yotora Matanho Kudzivirira Kupinda kweCoronavirus Munyika
text: Hurumende inoti iri kutora matanho ese ainokwanisa kudzivirira kuti vanhu vasabatwe nehutachiwana hweCoronavirus uye vanhu vese vanobva kunyika dzine hutachiwana uhwu, vave kusungugirwa kuuya nemagwaro anoratidza kuti havana hutachiwana uhwu. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, vati vanouya vasina magwaro aya vacharambidzwa kupinda munyika. Kusvika musi wa1 Kurume, Zimbabwe yange yaongorora vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitanhatu vakawonekwa vasina hutachiwana hweCoronavirus uye ongororo iyi iri kuramba ichitwa panhandare dzese dzendenge munyika pamwe nedzimwe nzvimbo dzekupinda nadzo munyika. VaMoyo vazivisawo kuti pane chizvarwa chekuZimbabwe chaibva kuBahrain nechimwe chekuChina vakaongororwa pachipatara cheWilkins vakawanikwa vasina hutachiwana uhwu. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato guru runopikisa munyika, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vati kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vane hutachiwana uhwu vasapinde munyika, hurumende inofanira kusimudzira mabasa ehutano munyika kuitira kuti ikwanise kuongorora zvirwere zvese. Mune imwe nyaya, gurukota rinoona nezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vati majeri emunyika akazarisa uye hurumende iri kuronga kuburitsa vamwe vasungwa mumajeri. Vati pari zvino vave kurongwa kuti vasungwa voburitswa ndevapi. Majeri emuZimbabwe ane vasungwa zviuru makumu maviri nezviviri asi iwo akagadzirirwa kuchengeta vasungwa zviuru gumi nezvinomwe chete. VaZiyambi vati vanoda kuti majeri asare aine vasungwa zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu. Muneimwewo nyaya vakasanobatachinzvimbo chegurukota remutambo, VaKazembe Kazembe, vatiwo hurumende iri kuedza pese painogona napo kugadzirisa nhandare dzeNational Sports Stadium neBarbourfields kuitira kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kutamba mutambo wayo CAF neAlgeria munyika. Nhandare idzi dzakanzi neCAF hadzikodzeri kutambira mitambo yeCAF sezvo dzisina zvimwe zvinhu zvinodiwa mazuvano. VaKazembe vati kana vakapedza kugadzirisa National Sports Stadium neBarbourfields, vachakumbira CAF kuti mutambo weZimbabwe neAlgeria musi wa29 Kurume utambirwe munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Dzimwe Nhengo dzeParamende Dzinoti Hurumende Ngaibude Pachena paRubatsiro rweCovid-19
text: Apo huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nehutachiwana weCoronavirus huri kuramba huchikwira munyika, dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende muHarare dzinoti dzinodawo kuva nechekuita nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekudzivirira chirwere ichi pamwe nekuona kuti rubatsiro rwuri kupihwa nyika pamusoro peCoronavirus rwuri kufambiswa sei. Nhengo dzeparamende nemakanzura emuHarare dzinoti dzinofanira kuva nechekuita nemabasa ehurumende ekudzivirira chirwere cheCoronavirus. Mumiriri weGlen Norah muNational Assembly, VaWellingotn Chikombo, vati izvi zvakakosha nekuti vanongonzwa kuti pane zviri kuitwa nehurumende, asi kunzvimbo dzavanomirira kusina chiri kuitika. Asi VaChikombo vati kunyange hazvo paramande yakavharwa, inofanirwa kuvhura sezvakaita paramende yekuAmerica kuitira kuti izeye nyaya dzakakosha dzinobata Covid-19. Mumiriri weWarren Park, VaShakespear Hamauswa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti muhurongwwa hwayo hurumende ishande nenhengo dzeparamende mukudzivirira Coronavirus. Vatiwo vanongonzwa kuti hurumende iri kuwana zvinhu zvekushandisa kudzviririra Coronavirus asi havasi kuona zvinhu izvi munzvimbo yavanomirira. VaHamauswa vatiwo kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti zvikoro zvepamusoro zviri kugadzira mamasiki nemasanitaiza, zvinhu izvi hazvisati zvave kuwanikwa mumisha inogara vazhinji uye zvakakosha kuti hurumende ishande nemadzimai ane makirabhu ekokusona mumisha iyi pakugadzira zvinhu izvi. Kanzura weWard 16 muHarare, VaDenford Ngadziore, vaudza Studio7 kuti havasati vatanga kuwana maSanitiser and maMask vachiti vari kuwana zvinhu izvi kubva kumasangano anoshanda kazvimirira, asi zvishoma. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubazi rezvehutano kana kugurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reHarare, VaOliver Chidhau, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira mbozhanhare yavo. Asi mumashoko avo, sachigaro weTaskforce inoona nezvechirwere cheCoronavirus, zvakare vari mumwe wevatevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, vazivisa kuti nyika ichawedzera huwandu hwevanhu vari kuongororwa zvichiteverwa kuvhurwa kweimwe nzvimbo inoita ongororo yechirwere cheCoronavirus kuBulawayo. Vatiwo pane dzimwe nzvimbo dzekuongorora chirwere ichi dzichavhurwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera. Asi VaMohadi vati Taskforce yavo yakaita misangano mumatunhu ese munyika ichinzwa pfungwa kubva kunhengo dzeparamende pamwe nevakuru vakuru mumatunhu aya uye ichashandisa zvakabuda mumisangano iyi kusimbaradza chirongwa chayo chekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kubatwa Pamwe neKufa neCovid-19 Hworamba Hwuchikura
text: Kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19 huri kuramba huchikwira, vanhu vakawanda havasi kutora matanho ekuzvidzivirira sezviri kukurudzirwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization, akaita sekupfeka mamasiki kumeso kwavo. Kunyange hazvo zviri pachena kuti veruzhinji vari kutapurirana chirwere ichi munyika, kumisika yemabhazi pamwe nekumabhanga vanhu vanenge vakaungana, kana kumanikidzana, izvo zvinoita kuti kutapurirana kweCovid-19 kuve nyore. Studio7 yaona vanhu vazhinji vange vasina kupfeka mamasiki apo vanga vachisangana neveruzhinji muguta reHarare. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaPaul Majaira, avo vanga vasina kuzvidzivirira vati dzimwe nguva vanombokanganwa kuzvidzivirira. Mumwe murume uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita anga akamirira kutora mari pane rimwe bhanga muguta apo vanhu vanga vakatsokodzerana abvuma kuStudio7 kuti ane ruzivo rwekuti huwandu hwevari kubatwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19 munyika huri kukwira. Asi ati kunyange hazvo achiziva kuti kumira vakapatsanurana kunobatsira, nyaya yekutya kupindirwa ndiyo inoita kuti vanhu vabatane vari mumitsetse. VaSimon Zhou, avo vanga vakamirira bhazi kuti vaende kuMt Pleasant Heights, vati vanga vava nemaawa mana vari panzvimbo imwe chete, izvo zvinogona kuti vabate chirwere ichi. Vatiwo vanhu havasi kutariswa temperature kana kupihwa zvekuzora maoko ava pavanenge vachipinda mumabhazi eZupco sezvaiitika pakatanga kuvhurwa nyika. Munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr. Henry Madzorera, vati vanhu vanofanirwa kuchengetedza hutano hwavo kuburikidza nekutevedzera zvinokurudzirwa nevehutano. Dr. Madzorera vakurudzirawo kuti munguva ino yechando dai veruzhinji vagara kudzimba. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Va John Mangwiro, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti vari kuwedzera kudzidzisa veruzhinji nezvechirwere ichi pamwe nekuwedzera vanhu vanoongororwa kuitira kudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. Vachitaura kumusangano wePolitburo yebato ravo, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatiwo kukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevari kubatwa neCOVID-19 kuchaitawo kuti vatarise zvakare nyaya yekuvharwa kwenyika. Huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hausi kukwira muZimbabwe chete, sezvo izvi zviri kuitikawo munyika dzakawanda pasi rose, iro rave nevanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi, vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi masere nezvisere nemazana maviri ane gumi nevaviri, vari vemuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Mashanu Vanobatwa Vaine Mhando yeOmicron Variant
text: Vanhu makumi mashanu vanonzi vakabatwa vaine mhando itsva yeCovid-19 yeOmicron variant muZimbabwe. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Doctor John Chamunorwa Mangwiro, vati ropa rakaongororwa iri raive rabva kuvanhu makumi maviri vakabatwa nedenda iri paMasvingo Teachers College, vatambi venhabvu makumi maviri nevaviri vechikwata che Under 17 National team, uye vamwe vanhu vasere. VaMangwiro vati ropa rese makumi mashanu rakavhenekwa rakawanikwa ruine hutachiona hwemhando itsva yeCovid -19 yeOmicron variant. VaMangwiro vatiwo vashandi vese vanoshanda nekurwisana nechirwere cheCovid 19 pamwe nevese vanorarama nezvirwere zvehupenyu hwese vave kufanirwa kubaiwa nhomba yetatu. VaMangwiro vatiwo kukwira kwehuwandu hwevari kubatiwa nehutachiona hweCovid -19 mucherechedzo wekuti nyika yapinda pachikamu chechina kubva zvatanga denda riri kana kuti 4th wave. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati ongororo iyi inoratidza kuti mhando yeCovid-19yeOmicron ratova dambudziko guru munyika. Zimbabwe yava pakati penyika dxzinodarika makumi mashanu, idzo dzinosanganisira America, Britain, Brazil nedzimwe dzine vanhu vane chirwere chemhando yeOmicron variant pasi rose zvichitevera kubuda kweSouth Africa pachena mwedzi wapera ichiti yainge yawana hutachiona uhu munyika iyi. Nyika dzakawanda dzakabva dzamisa kutambira vanhu vanobva kunyika nomwe dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica dzinosanganisira South Africa, Zimbabwe, Namibia, Mozambique, Lesotho, Eswatini neBotswana. Zimbabwe inoti iri kutora matanho ekuona kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika kuburikidza nekuti vanenge vapinda munyika vachibva kudzimwe nyika, kusanganisira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, vazvipatsanure kwemazuva akatarwa nehurumende mushure mekuvhenekwa chirwere ichi pavanopinda munyika. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti hakuna munhu akafa nedenda iri munyikayose izvo zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vangori pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nevanomwe, 4 707. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemakumi mana nevaviri vakabatwa nedenda iri nezuro wakare izvo zvakasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vava zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nezvitanhatu nemazana matatu nemakumi manomwenevapfumbamwe(136,379). Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika vave mamiriyoni matatu ane zviuru mazana masere nemakumi maviri nezvipfumbamwenemazana matanhatu ane makumi matatu nevatanhatu(3 829 636). Vabayiwa nhomba yechipiri vave mamiriyoni maviri ane zviuru mazana\nmasere nemakumi mashanu nechimwe nemazana matanhatu ane makumi maviri nevashanu (2 851 625). Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti inoda kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Coronavirus Yovhiringidza Kucherechedzwa Zvakanaka kweZuva RaanaAmai
text: Vanhu vakawanda pasi rose vavhiringidzwa zvikuru kucherechedza Zuva reMother’s Day sezvo vachiri vakazvivharira mudzimba nekutya kutapurirwa chirwere checoronavirus. Vakawanda vanoti vangotumira zvipo asi vamwe vachiti vangotaura nevanaamai vavo pambozhanhare uye vachazoita mabiko kana zvecoronavirus zvapera. Zuva rekutenda mabasa anoitwa naanaamai iri rinochercehdzwa musvondo rechipiri rwemwedzi waChivabvu gore roga roga. Muzvare Wendy Muperi avo vari kuIreland vati vanoda kutenda amai wavo vakavarera vari vashanu kunyangwe zvinhu zvainge zvakaoma. No media source currently available VaWhisper Ganya avo vari kuCape Town, South Africa vatendawo amai wavo vari kuMt Darwin vachiti vanoda kuvarangarira nezvose zvavakavaitira mukukura kwavo. No media source currently available Muzvare Netsai Marova vanogara kuMabvuku vati vanoda kuti Mwari aropafadze amai vavo nebasa guru rekuvachengeta. No media source currently available Izvi zvatsigirwawo naVaKumbirai Mafunda vari muHarare vati amai wavo vari kwaVumbunu, Manicaland nemamwe madzimai ose vakakosha zvikuru muhupenyu uye vakati vazvichengetedze munguva ino yecoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Vana veChikoro Mazana Matatanhatu neMakumi Mashanu neVasere (658) Vobatwa neChirwere cheCovid-19 Kubva Zvavhurwa Zvikoro
text: Vana vechikoro mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevasere vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 mumazuva mapfumbamwe adarika chete. Nemusi weChitatu pavanhu pavanhu mazana matanhatu nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, zana nemakumi manomwe nevashanu vacho vana vechikoro. Izvi zvasiya vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vavezviuru mazana maviri zvine makumi matatu nemana nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 234 589. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro hakuna munhu akafa zvichireva kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira muna 2020 vachiri zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi masere nevasere.

headline: Vanofamba neMabhazi neMakombi Votyira Kutapurirwa Coronavirus
text: Veruzhinji vanofamba nemabhazi pamwe nemakombi anotakura veruzhinji vanoti kumanikidzana kwavanenge vakaita mumabhazi kuri kuvapinza panjodzi yekubatira chirwere cheCoronavirus icho chakatekeshera munyika dzakawanda pasi rose. Kunyange hazvo chirwere ichi chichinzi hachisati chapinda muZimbabwe, hurumende inoti iri kuita gadzirio yakasimba kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasatapurirane chirwere ichi kana chikazopinda munyika. Pamusika weMbare panga paine vanhu vashoma nhasi vanga vachikwira mabhazi anoenda nzendo refu pamwe nemaZupco anoenda mumisha inogara veruzhinji muno mudhorobha reHarare. Vamwe vevanga vachikwira mabhazi eZupco, Amai Sinikiwe Nyamadzawo, vati kumanikidzana kwavanenge vakaita mumabhazi, vamwe vakamira mumabhazi umu vasina pekugara kuri kuvaisa panjodzi yekubata chirwere che Coronavirius sezvo vanhu vanenge vachingofemerana vasina zvekuvharisa miromo kana mhino dzavo, kana kuti ma mask. Amai Nyamadzawo vati chimwewo chinonetsa ndechekuti pazviteshi zvinokwirirwa maZupco nemakombi hapana kushambidzika sezvo pasina zvekugezesa uye mumabhazi nemumakombi aya hamuna mishonga yekupfapfaidza zvinoita kuti vasazobatira zvirwere. Mumwewo anga achikwira mabhazi anoenda kuSouth Africa paRoadport, Amai Acqueline Augustine, avo vati vanogara kuKuwadzana, vati mabhazi anoenda nzendo refu arinani pakuzara zvavanoti zvonoderedza mikana yekutapurirana zvizverwe zvakaita seche Coronavirus. Asi mumwe mutyairi wemabhazi anoenda kuSouth Africa, VaTonderai Kusekwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu vari kuramba vachienda kuSouth Africa misi nenguva sezvo vanhu vazhinji vari kuedza kutsvaga zvingararamisa mhuri dzavo mhiri kwaLimpopo. VaKusekwa vati huwandu hwevanhu vavari kutakura kuenda kuSouth Africa nemabhazi hwadzikira kubva pakapinda chirwere che Coronavirus muSouth Africa vachiti vanokurudzira vose vavanenge vakatakura kuti vageze maoko pavanopinda mumabhazi avo pamwe nepavanosvika pamiganhu yenyika. Munyori mukuru musangano reUnited Commuter Operators of Zimbabwe, VaSimbarashe Ngarande, vaudza Studio7 kuti vari kushanda zvakasimba kuti vatsvage nzira dzekuti vanofamba nemotokari dzinotakura veruzhinji vashandise mari yebepa kana ma coins pakufamba senzira yekuderedza mukana wekuti vasatapurirane zvirwere zvakaita seche Covid-19. Munyori anowona nezvekutakurwa kwezvimhu mubato reMDC uye vari nhengo yeparamende inomirira Kwekwe Central, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vakurudzira hurumende kuti ipe dzidziso yezvehutano kuvatyairi vemabhazi nekuvapa zvinovadzivirira mukutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hweCoronavirus. VaChikwinya vati hurumende inofanira kutora matanho akasimba kuti vose vanopinda nepamiganhu yenyika vavhenekwa vose. Munyori mukuru mubato rinopikisa reAfrican Development Party, VaBryn Negomo Murape, vakurudzirawo kuti mabhazi anotakura veruzhinji ange achipfapfaidzwa nguva dzose nemishonga uye vemabhazi vange vaine zvikwanisiro zvekuti vanokwira mabhazi vange vachishandisa munyaya dzehutsanana. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoel Biggie Matiza, kuti tinzwe kuti matanho ari kutorwa nebazi ravo ndeapi kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanofamba nemabhazi nemakombi vasabatwe nezvirwere zvakaita secheCoronavirus kana chichinge chazopinda munyika. Asi gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vati hurumende iri kuedza nepose painogona napo kupa vanhu dzidziso yekuzvidzivirira kuchirwere che Coronavirus uye iri kusimbaradzawo nyaya dzekuvhenekwa kwevanhu vanopinda munyika vachishandisa nhandare dzendege pamwe nemiganhu yenyika. Zvichakadai, mashoko aburitswa nemutauriri wekambani yendege ye South African Airways, VaTlali Tlali, anoti kambani iyi yakanzura kufamba kwendege dzayo kuenda kune dzimwe pasi rose kusanganisira Zimbabwe kubva mangwana kusvika mukupera kwaChivabvu uye kambani iyi yati ndege dzayo dzichange dzichibhururuka muSouth Africa chete zvichitevera matanho akatorwa nehurumende yeSouth Africa ekuedza kurwisana nechirwere cheCoronavirus. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weCivil Aviation Authority of Zimbabwe, Amai Anna Hungwe, kuti tizive kuti pane dzimwe ndenge dzakanzura kumhara muZimbabwe here sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo pamwe nekupindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Asi mashoko atiri kutambira anoti ndege yeEmirates yakagumisira kupinda muZimbabwe nezuro, ukuwo Rwanda Air inonzi yatanga nhasi kusapinda muZimbabwe nepamusana pekutyira chirwere cheCoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokandwa Pakati peNyika Dziri Kutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu Munguva yeCovid-19
text: Rimwe sangano rekuEurope raisa Zimbabwe pakati penyika dzisiri kukoshesa hutongi hwejekerere munguva yeCovid 19 izvo zviri kutsinhirwawo nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika. Sangano rekuSweden reInternational Institute for Democracy and Electoral Assistance, kana kuti International IDEA, rinoti Zimbabwe ndeimwe yenyika dzisiri kukoshesa hutongi hwejekerere munguva ino yedenda redzihwamupengo reCovid 19. Dzimwe nyika dzaiswa muchikwata ichi nesangano iri dzinosanganisira Algeria, Bangladesh, Cambodia, China, Cuba, Egypt pamwe neSaudi Arabia, Sachigaro wesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa muZimbabwe pamwe nekuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaGolden Maunganidze, vati kusungwa kwakaitwa vatori venhau vakawanda munyika vachinzi vatyora mitemo inobata nyaya dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chedzihwamupengo kana kuti Covid 19 Containment Regulations kunoratidza chokwadi chekuti hutongi hwejekerere hausi kukosheswa munyika. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakaita saVaPride Mkono vanoti kusaitwa kwesarudzo dzechipiri dzekutsiva makanzura nenhengo dzeparamende dzakabviswa pazvigaro zvavo kana avo vakafa kwakaitawo kuti zvido zveveruzhinji zvisazadzikiswe ukuwo hurumende ichiti kuita sarudzo idzi kwaizowedzera mukana wekuti vanhu vatapurirane chirwere cheCovid 19 icho chiri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda pasi rose kusanganisira muZimbabwe. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaOstallos Siziba, vaudza Studio 7 vari kuMatabeleland South uku kwavari kufamba naVaNelson Chamisa vachionana sevatsigiri vavo kuti vanowirirana negwaro iri sezvo VaChamisa vanga vasiri kubvumidzwa kuita misangano nevatsigiri vavo munguva yeCovid 19 asi mutungamiri wenyika uye vari mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachingoita madiro aJojina kuita misangano nenhengo dzebato ravo.
