VaSizba vatiwo mhirizhonga ine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika iri kuitika munyika pari kuitwa misangano naVaChamisa pamwe nekusungwa kwakaitwa nhengo dzebato ravo nguva yapfuura kunoratidza kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende pamusoro pegwaro re International IDEA iri sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Munyori mubazi ravo, VaNick Mangwana, vanga vasati vapindurawo mibvunzo yatavatumira pataenda pamhepo. Asi VaMangwana vakamboudza Studio 7 munguva pfupi yadarika panyaya yekusungwa kwenhengo dzebato rinopikisa kuti mutemo hautarise kuti munhu abuda mumba maani vachiti anenge afungidzirwa kuti apara mhosva anonomira nenyaya dzake mumatare ochenurwanematare aya kana kubatwa nemhosva. Pavakapinda panyanga vachitora mhiko muna Mbudzi 2017, VaMnangagwa vakati hurumende yavo ichaita zvose zvainokwanisa zvinosanganisira kukoshesa kodzero dzevanhu kuitira kuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekere. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neHIV Vogunun'una Kunzi Vari Kuonekwa seVakatopara Mhaka
text: Nyanzvi dzemitemo dzinoti dziri kushushikana nekuwanda kwenyaya dzinonzi dzine chekuita nekupomerwa dzimhosva kwevanhu vanorarama ne HIV munyika dzakawanda, kusanganisira united states. Izvi zvinonzi zvabuda kumusangano weInternational Aids Conference uri kuitirwa kuDurban, kuSouth Africa. Zvinonzi kunyange hazvo kusina mutemo unozivikanwa unoti imhosva kuti munhu ave neHIV, magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akawanda anonzi ati vanorarama nemukondombera vakawanda vanoonekwa sevanhu vakatopara mhosva. Bazi reU.S Centers for Disease Control and Prevention gore rapera rakazivisa kuti matunhu makumi maviri nemana emuAmerica anoda kuti vanhu vanoziva pavamire panyaya dzeHIV kuti vaudze vavanodana navo. Apo hupfumi hwepasi rose huri kudzikira, hurombo hunonzi hwabatawo vanhu munyika dzakawanda, izvo zvomanikidza madzimai akawanda kupinda mune zvechipfambi kuti vararame. Asi madzimai aya ari kugunin’una kuti vanoonekwa sevanhu vane mhosva, izvo zvinovasiya pamhene mune zvinhu zvakawanda zvinosanganisira kubata zvirwere zvepabonde neHIV/Aids.

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri kuAmerica Chotaura Pamusoro peKugara Kwacho kuZimbabwe Munguva yeCovid-19
text: Vakuru vakati gonzo mhini gara mumhango chemudzimu chikuwaniremo. Izvi ndizvo zvakaitwa nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaTinashe Tsokodayi, mushure mekunge vashanya kumusha panguva imwechete denda reCovid-19 rakapindawo munyika. VaTsokodayi, avo vanogara muVirginia muAmerica, vanoti pavakaenda kumusha muna Kukadzi wegore rino, havana kumbobvira vafunga kuti vaizogara kwemwedzi minomwe. Asi nekuda kwekuti nyika yakazovharwa muna Kurume wakare nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 mushure mekunge hurumende yakadzika mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, VaTsokodayi vakazongozvipira kugarako kusvika zvinhu zvanaka. VaTsokodayi vanoti vanoona sekunge hurumende yeZimbabwe yakaita zvose zvaikodzera kuti iite kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, izvo vanoti zvinogona kunge zvakaita kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere ichi huderere. Vanoti vaifanirwa kudzoka kuAmerica musi wa20 Kurume asi vakaona zvakakosha kuti varambe vari muZimbabwe senzira yekuzvidzivirira ivo pamwe nehama dzavo dziri kuAmerica, sezvo vaityira kuti vaizogona kubatira chirwere ichi murwendo rwavo, uyewo kuti vambotanga vanzwisisa nezvechirwere ichi. "Ndakaona kuti izvoni ndakafamba nguva yeCovid kwandaisvika ikoko I was a potential risk yekuti ndi spuredhe as I had a feeling yekuti Covid yakawanda yanga ichibatwa nevanhu in transit mundege imomo, saka ndakangoita decision yekuti ndimbomira ku traveller," VaTsokodayi vanodaro. Vanoti vakazokwanisa kubuda munyika kutanga kwaGumiguru, mushure mekunge hurumende yavhura zvakare nhandare dzendege dzose dzemunyika. Semutemo uri munyika dzose, vakasungirwa kutanga vawana gwaro rinoratidza kuti vakavhenekwa Covid-19 vakawanikwa vasina chirwere mukati memaawa makumi manomwe nemaviri kuti vakwanise kukwira ndege. VaTsokodayi vanoti havana kusangana nedambudziko pakupinda muAmerica, asi vakatara kuti vachange vachigara kwavo vega kwemazuva gumi nemana, kunyange hazvo dunhu ravo risina mutemo iwowo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanachiremba Vakuru Voratidzira muHarare
text: Munyori mukuru musangano ravanachiremba vakuru reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Aaron Musara, vanoti vachange vachiratidzira muHarare nekusafara kwavo nemamiriro akaita zvinhu muzvipatara zvehurumende. Vanachiremba ava vari kutarisirwa kuenda netsamba yenyunyuto kudare reparamende. Kuratidzira uku kuri kuuya apo gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, vakaudza Studio7 nezuro kuti hurumende haisi kuzotaurirana navanachiremba vari kuramwa kana kuti vakadzingwa mabasa. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, mushure mehurukuro nemusi weChina nevakuru vekereke yeRoman Catholic vakati vanachiremba vakadzingwa vaikwanisa kudzokera kumabasa mukati memazuva maviri pasina kutorerwa matanho. Asi izvi zvinenge zvakona n'anga murapwa achida sezvo Doctor Moyo vanoti vashoma ndivo vakatambira kurudziro uyi. Vanachiremba vanoti vari kuda kuti hurumende itange yaratidza kuzvipira kugadzirisa zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo muzvipatara zvinosanganisira kushaikwa kwemishonga uye michina yekushandisa. Dr Muasara vaudza Studio7 kuti vanachiremba vanoda chose kushanda asi zvinhu zviri kuvarwadza kuti vamwe varwere vave kungofa nekuda kwekuti havana zvikwanisiro. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voshaya Anorapa muZvipata zveHurumende Vakoti naVanaChiremba Vachiramwa Mabasa
text: Vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vasvika mazuva makumi matatu nematatu vakanda mapadza pasi vachiti mari yavari kutambiriswa haichakwani kuti vaende kumabasa pasina kana tarisiro yekuti dambudziko iri richagadziriswa. Zvinhu muzvipatara zvehurumende zvabva zvaita manyama amire nerongo zvopa kuti vamwe varwere vadzoserwe kumba vasina kurapwa. Zvinhu muzvipatara zviri kutarisirwa kutonyanyoipa sezvo sangano ravanachiremba vakuru reSenior Health Doctors Association vakatozivisa kuti kana nyaya dzemari nekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba vadiki nevakati dzikasagadziriswa naivo vachapindawo mukuramwa mabasa. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru iri Dr Aaron Musara vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara. Dr Musara vanoti kunyangwe hazvo vakazivisa hurumende nezvedanho ravo rekuda kukanda mapadza pasi kuburikidza nemagwaro avakanyorera mapazi akasiyana siyana hapana mhinduro yavati vawana. Vanamukoti muzvipatara zvehurumende havasi kuenda kumabasa uye vari kuda kuti hurumende ivape mihoro yavo nemari yekuAmerica yavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018 pamwe nekuvapa zvekushandisa kuzvidzivirira kubva kuzvirwere kana vari pamabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vanamukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association, ZINA VaEnock Dongo vanoti hurukuro nehurumende kutungana kwembudzi. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association kana kuti ZHDA Dr Tapiwa Mungofa vatiwo kusagadziriswa kwenyaya dzevashandi vezvehutano nehurumende kwave kusiya varwere vasina anovarapa. VaMungofa vatiwo panguva iyo vana mukoti vakaramwa mabasa dzimwe nhengo dzavo dzakawanda dzave kumba senzira yekudzivirira kutapurirwa chirwere cheCOVID-19 inonzi pachirungu Self quarantine. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya yekugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vezvehutano sezvo vakafanobata chigaro chagurukota rezvehutano Muzvinafundo Amon Murwira vanga vasingadaviri nharembozha yavo. Asi vhiki rapera, VaMurwira vakazivisa kuti vanga vatanga hurukuro nana mukoti. Mutevedzeri wavo VaJohn Mangwiro vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vanga vakabatikana nekudaro vange vasingakwanise kutaura. Sachigaro weHealth Services Board, Dr. Paulinus Sikosana, vatiwo vange vari mumusangano unechekuita nedenda reCOVID-19 nekudaro vanga vasingakwanisi kutaura nesu. Nyanzvi dzezvehutano dzinotiwo kana hurumende ikasagadzirisa nyaya yevakoti kuti vadzokere kumabasa uyewo kudzivirira vana chiremba kuti vasaenderera mberi kuzvigokera moto muziso kunyanya panguva ino nyika yakatarisana nedenda reCOVID-19 iro rauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu kusvika parizvino. No media source currently available

headline: Mapiritsi eAbacavir Oshomekera Vanorarama neHIV/AIDS?
text: No media source currently available Vamwe vevanorarama neHIV/AIDS vari pamapiritsi anonzi e “second line” vanoti vava kutyira hupenyu hwavo sezvo mapiritsi e Abacavir ari kunetsa kuwana. Mapiritsi aya anotengwa kubva kunze kwenyika. Mumwe wevanorarama neHIV, Amai Veronica Sikaka, vanoti vakatanga kumwa mapiritsi eAbacavir muna 2010. Vanoti panguva yese iyi yavanga vachimwa mapiritsi aya, vanga vasati vamboita dambudziko rekushaya mishonga yavo. Asi Amai Sikaka, avo vanotorera mapiritsi avo kuChitungwiza, vanoti vave kushungurudzika zvikuru sezvo vari kupiwa mapiritsi emazuva mashoma ipo nguva yese yapfuura vaipiwa mapiritsi emwedzi mitatu. Amai Sikaka vanotiwo kunyange hazvo mapiritsi aya achiwanikwa muzvitoro zvemapiritsi, havakwanisi kuatenga sezvo achidhura kwavari sezvo vari kutotambura kuwana mari yekuti vararame zuva nezuva. Izvi zvinotsigirwawo naAmai Rosemary Mhashu vanoraramawo neHIV vachishandisawo mapiritsi mamwewo. Amai Mhashu vanoti nekuda kwekuti vave kupihwa mapiritsi aya ari mashoma, kudzokera dzokera kuchipatara vachinotora mapiritsi kuri kukanganisa raramo yavo sezvo vachirarama nemabasa emaoko. Sachigaro weZimbabwe National Network of People Living with HIV, VaSabastian Chinhaire, vanoti nhengo dzavo zhinji kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana dziri kuchema nekushaikwa kwemapiritsi e “second line.” VaChinhaire vanoti vava kutyira kuti vanhu vakashaya mapiritsi aya, pavanozoanwa, anozotadza kushanda zvakanaka. Rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, Muzvare Agnes Muzondo, vanoti sezvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika richipa kodzero yehutano, hurumende inofanirwa kuwona kuti pawanikwa mari yakakwana yekutenga mishonga inodiwa munyika. Asi munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Gerald Gwinji, vakati munyika mune mapiritsi anokwanira vanhu kwemwedzi gumi nemitatu inotevera. VaGwinji vanotiwo dzimwe nguva vanhu vanopihwa mapiritsi emavhiki maviri pachinzvimbo chemwedzi mitatu nekuti mapiritsi anenge asati asvika kunzvimbo dzavo kubva kwaanochengeterwa vachiti asi izvi vari kuzvigadzirisa. Bazi rezveutano rinoti pavanhu vanosvika mirioni imwechete varikumwa mapiritsi emaARV munyika, vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nezvina ndovari pamapiritsi e “second line”.

headline: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reChirwere cheRurindi Pasi Rose
text: Zimbabwe yabatana nedzimwe nyika dzepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rechirwere cherurindi, kana kuti World TB Day, pahurongwa hwaitirwa kuDzivaresekwa muHarare. Vachitaura pahurongwa hweWorld TB Day, gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, vati vanhu vanofanirwa kubatana mukurwisa chirwere cherurindi icho chanetsa munyika. VaParirenyatwa vati nzvimbo dzakaita seMatabeleland North, Matabeland South neguta reBulawayo ndidzo dzinonyanya kuwirwa nedambudziko rechirwere ichi. Dr Parirenyatwa vatiwo chirwere ichi chakanyanya mumatunhu aya nokuti ari kumiganhu neSouth Africa, iyo ine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere ichi. Vati Zimbabwe iri kurwisa zvakasimba chirwere ichi kuburikidza nekurapa vanhu pasina mubhadharo. Asi Dr Parirenyatwa vatiwo chirwere ichi chava kuramba kudaira mushonga, zvikuru kuvanhu vasingapedzi kunwa mishonga yavanenge vapihwa apo vanenge vachirapwa chirwere ichi. Dr Wilbert Bara, avo vanoshanda mubazi rehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, vatiwo chirwere cherurinda chinonyanya kubata varume kudarika vakadzi. Vatiwo chirwere ichi chakawanda munzvimbo dzakaita seGlenview, Budiriro, Hopley, Caledonia, Mbare nenzvimbo dziri kuHarare South. Dr Bara vati makiriniki ekanzuru yeHarare ava kushandisa mishina mitsva inokurumidza kubata chirwere cherurindi. Sangano reunited Nations rinoti vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu vanofa pazuva rega rega nechirwere cherurindi pasi rose. Dingindira rezuva iri gore rino rinoti “Wanted: Leaders for a TB-Free World." No media source currently available

headline: Danho reHurumende reKumira Kubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19 Yetatau Parizvino Rotambirwa neImwe Nyanzvi
text: Vaimbova mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Dr Enoch Mayida vanoti vanowirira nedanho rehurumende rekuti pari zvino imbosimbaradza hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba dzeCovid-19 mbiri pasati pabayiwa nhomba nhatu sezvave kuitwa kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seAmerica. Nyika dzakabudirira dziri kubaya nhomba yetatu kune vakwegura nevanoshanda muzvipata sezvo zviri kunzi zvinobatsira masoja emuviri. Dr Mayida vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotenderabna nezvakataurwa panhepfenyuro ino nemukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 Dr Agnes Mahomva kuti vakoshese kubaya vanhu nhomba kaviri parizvino. No media source currently available Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri negumi nevana zvine mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemanomwe kana kuti 3 214, 477 vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kekutanga. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwea vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemaviri zvine mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 2, 472, 859. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshande sezvinotarisirwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vaviri vakafa neMugovera nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 4, 657. Vanhu makumi mana nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nemaviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nematatu kana kuti 132,333.

headline: Seke South Clinic Yomboshandiswa Senzvimbo Yekuongorora neKurapa Vane Coronavirus
text: Menisiparati yeChitungwiza inozivisa vagari veguta iri kuti kanzuru yavo yakabvumirana kuti Seke South Clinic imboshandiswa senzvimbo yekuongorora nekurapa vanhu vane chirwere che Coronavirus. Mutauriri wemenisiparari yeChitungwiza, VaLovemore Meya, vati parizvino vagari veChitungwiza vanofanirwa kushandisa mamwe makiriniki eChitungwiza, akaita se St Marys, Zengeza 3 ne Seke North sezvo kiriniki ye Seke South yambomira kutora varwere vesevese, kunze kweavo vari kurapwa kana kuongororwa chirwere che coronavirus. Coronavirus. Izvi zvinotevera kunyunyuta kwesangano rinomirira vagari veChitungwiza, reChitungwiza Residents Trust, iro rinoti madzimai anepamuviri arikudzorerwa kudzimba kana vaenda kunotsvaka rubatsiro paSeke South Clinic. Mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trust, Muzvare Alice Kuvheya, vanoti madzimai arikuda kubatsirwa haagone kuenda kuma kiriniki ari kure nekwavanogara sezvo makombi asiri kufamba zvakanaka pamusoro pehurongwa rwekurwisana neCoronavirus. Muzvare Kuvheya vanoti kanzuru yeChitungwiza inofanirwa kubatsira madzimai aya kuti akwanise kuenda kwavanobatsirwa panguva iyo vave kuita vana. No media source currently available

headline: Chirongwa cheKudzidzisa Vachadzidzisa Vamwe Mabayirwo eNhomba yeCovid-19 Chinotanga Munyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti ratanga chirongwa chekudzidzisa vanhu vachadzidzisa vamwe mumatunhu madiki nemakuru (district and provincial trainers) kubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 iyo yakapinda munyika neMuvhuro ichibva kuChina. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubazi iri, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti chirongwa ichi chafamba zvakanaka, uye vanhu vanosvika mazana mana vabva kumapoka akasiyanasiyana vawana dzidziso pamusoro pemabairwo enhomba iyi. VaMujiri vanoti vanhu vapinda muchirongwa ichi vanosanganisira vezvehutano vabva kumatunhu maduku nematunhu makuru, mapoka akazvimirira, makanzuru, vekumajeri pamwe nemapurisa. Zvimwe zvinonzi zvadzidziswa vanhu ava zvinosanganisira machengeterwo enhomba, mabairwo, marasirwo ainofanirwa kuzoitwa, kufambiswa kwemashoko pamwe nekuongorora vanenge vabaiwa nhomba iyi. VaMujiri vanoti vadzidziswa ava vanenge votarisirwa kuti kutanga neChitatu kana kuti musi weChina vanenge vototangawo kudzidziva vachazobaya nhomba iyi mumatunhu avo. No media source currently available Mukuru wesangano rezvehutano, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vanotambira chirongwa chedzidziso ichi asi vachiti zvinenge zvakanaka kuti vanezenge vachibaya vanhu nhomba iyi vange vaine ruzivo rwakakwana. VaRusike vanotiwo hurumende yaifanirwa kunge yakatanga kare kushanda nevezvehutano ava kubva pakatangwa mabasa ekutsvaga nhomba idzodzi, uyewo vanoti zvakakoshawozvakare kuti veruzhinji vapiwe mukana wekusarudza nhomba yavanoda pane dzose dzave kuwanikwa, kwete kuti vangopiwa iri kubva kuChina chete. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yobatana neDzimwe Nyika Kucherechedza Zuva reChirwere cheShuga
text: Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day rakacherechedzwa nemusi weChitatu, vamwe vanhu vanorarama nechirwere ichi –pamwe nezvimwe zvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe- vakatarisana nedambudziko guru rekutadza kuwana mishonga nekuda kwekushaya mari yekunze inodiwa pakutenga mishonga iyi. Susan Mpofu anochengeta mai vake vakura uye vave nenguva vaine chirwere chediabetes anoti mumasvondo mashoma apfuura, amai vake vakambofenda vakazomuka mushure menguva inosvika awa rimwe chete nekuda kwekuti vaive vave nemazuva maviri vasina kumwa mapiritsi avanofanirwa kumwa nekuda kwekuti vaive vashaya mari yemadhora ekuAmerica anodiwa nezvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga. Amai Charity Ndisengei ndemumwewo wevanhu vakawanda munyika vari kurarama nechirwere chediabetes icho vakabatwa mugore ra1995. Amai Ndisengei vanoti mumakore ose apfuura vange vasina dambudziko rekuwana mapirirtsi avanofanirwa kumwa, asi pari zvino ivo nevamwe vakaita saivo vave panjodzi yekurasikirwa nehupenyu nekuda kwekudhurirwa nemishonga. Chirwere chediabetes icho chinoziikanwa nevakawanda chichinzi chirwere cheshuga, chinokonzera kushomeka kana kuwanda kweshuga mumuviri izvo zvinogona kuuraya. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya vanobvuma kuti nekuda kwemariro ezvinhu munyika, vanhu vane zvirwere zvakaita sediabetes vakatarisana nedambudziko guru sezvo vane zvirwere izvi vachifanirwa kuwana mishonga kwehupenyu hwavo hwose. Dr Ngwenya vanotiwo zuva reWorld Diabetes Day rakakosha nekuti rinobatsira kuti vanhu vawane ruzivo pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kusangano reZimbabwe Diabetics Association pamusoro pehuwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere chediabetes munyika. Asi gwaro rinonzi World Health Organisation kana kuti WHO Non-communicable Diseases Progress Monitor regore ra2017 rinoratidza kuti vanhu zviuru makumi mana, zvinove zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana, vakafa nekuda kwezvirwere zvisingatapurirranwe kusanganisira diabetes. Gwaro iri rinoratidzawo kuti pamatanho anotarisirwa neWHO kuti atorwe pakudzivirira zvirwere zvisingatapurirane huruemende iri kusarira kumashure pane zvakawanda. Chiremba Dr Rutendo Bonde vanoti hurumende ine mitemo ine matanho akanaka anoratidza zvose zvinofanirwa kuitwa pakudzivirira diabetes nezvimwe zvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe. Asi vati chinonetsa ndechekuti zvinhu izvi hazvizotevedzerwi. Dr Bonde vanotiwo chirwere chediabetes chikasarapwa chinokonzera zvimwe zvirwere zvakawanda vachiti zviri nani kuti vanhu vawane mishonga yakafanira pane kuzoedza kurapa zvimwe zvirwere zvakawanda. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro avo vaimbova sachigaro weZimbabwe Diabetics Association vari kutora hutungamiri hwechikamu cheAfrica cheInternational Diabetes Association kutanga kwegore rinouya. Dr Mangwiro vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti Zimbabwe iri kusarira kumashure panyaya yekurapwa kwediabetese vachiti hurumende yakapedzisira kuita ongororo yemamiriro echirwere ichi munyika mugore ra2005. Asi vati bazi ravo riri kuita zvose zvakafanira kusanganisira kuita kuti zvive nyore kuti vanhu vawane mishonga yavanofanirwa kuwana. Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day rinocherechedzwa musi waMbudzi 14 gore rega rega pasi pehurongwa hwesangano reInternational Diabetes Association rakabatana neWHO.

headline: Vamwe kuMhangura Voramba Kubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19 Madzimai Akazvitakura neAri Kuyamwisa
text: Vamwe vari kubaya nhomba kuMhangura, mudunhu reMashonaland West vari kupikisana nekurudziro yehurumende yekuti madzimai akazvitakura kana kuti ari kuyamwisa abayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 kana hutano hwavo hwakamira zvakanaka. Mamwe madzimai audza Studio 7 kuti vari kudzoserwa kumba vasina kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 vachinzi havabaiwe sezvo vakazvitakura kana kuti vachiri kuyamwisa. Amai Emilda Mwala avo vari kuyamwisa mwana wavo ane mwedzi mitanhatu vanoti vakadzoswa paMakonde Christian Hospital. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe mudzimai akazvitakura Amai Rutendo Makwara avo vanoti vakarambirwawo pakiriniki iri pedyo nekuGudubu kuMhangura. Mukuru anoona nezvedzidziso yehutano kana kuti Provincial Health Promotion Officer mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr George Kambondo vaudza Studio 7 kuti dunhu ravo harisi kubaya nhomba madzimai akazvitakura kana vari kuyamwisa. Dr Kambondo vanoti mhando yenhomba iri kushandiswa munyika iri kubva kunyika yeChina haina kuongororwa kuti inoshandiswa pamadzimai aya here pasina dambudziko.\n\nAsi mukuru anoona nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti madzimai akazvitakura kana ari kuyamwisa vabaiwe nhomba. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nevaive mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Dr Enoch Mayida vati madzimai ari kuyamwisa anokwanisa kubayiwa nhomba uye vakatiwo madzimai akazvitakura asiri kurwarisa nezvirwere zvakaita seBP, shuga kana kunzwa dzungu anokwanisa kubayiwa nhomba. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri webazi rezvehutano vaDonald Mujiri avo vanga vachinzi vari mumusangano. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr Gift Masoja vanoti kusvika parizvino madzimai akazvitakura akabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 anosvika zvikamu makumi maviri nezvitanhatu kubva muzana uye madzimai matatu akazvitakura vakafa nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kufa neKorera Huri Kuramba Huchikwira
text: Hurumende inoti hwuwandu hwevanhu vafa nevari kubatwa nechirwere chekorera huri kuramba huchikwira. Gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakati vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vanga vafa nechirwere chekorera. VaMoyo vakatiwo huwandu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pavanhu zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe ane makumi matanhatu nevana. VaMoyo vakataura mashoko aya nezuro apo vakange vachitambira rubatsiro rwekurwisa chirwere chekorera. VaMoyo vakati kunyange hazvo huwandu uhwu huri kukwirira, vane tarisiro yekuti hudzike munguva shoma shoma iri kutevera sezvo hurumende iri kutora matanho akasiyana siyana kupedza chirwere ichi. VaMoyo vakatiwo hurumende iri kumisa kutengeswa kwezvinhu mumigwagwa muguta reHarare rese. Hurumende inoti iri kushanda pamwe chete nemakanzuru kuendesa mvura yakachena kunzvimbo dzine dambudziko rechirwere chekorera. Kambani yenharembozha yeEconet yapa rubatsiro rwemamiriyoni gumi emadhora, ukuwo Lotto pasi pe President’s Fund yapawo rubatsiro rwezana rezviuru zvemadhora. Mari iyi ichashandiswa mukurwisa korera. Kambani yedzimotokari yeQuest yapawo bazi rezveutano rhori yekubatsira mukurwisa chirwere chekorera. No media source currently available

headline: Matare eDzimhosva Ovhiringwa neChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Judicial Service Commission (JSC) yavhara matare mumadhorobha matanhatu mushure mekunge vashandi vemumatare aya vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19. JSC yavhara matare amajisitireti, kuBindura, Chinhoyi, Kariba, Karoi, Mt Darwin neMutare uko kwavharwawo dare repamusoro. Munyori weJSC, VaWalter Chikwanha, vati vatora danho iri kuti matare aya ambofiritwa nemishonga inodzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19, kuvheneka vashandi pamwe nekuita ongororo yekutsvaga chakapa kuti denda iri ripinde mumatare aya. Vati vanoda kukwidza nyaya dzavo kumatere, magweta nevamwe vanoda rubatsiro kumatare aya vanofanira kubata vatongi vakuru munzvimbo dzavo, Registrar Additional Sheriff kana Assistant Master uye mafoni evanhu ava achaiswa pamatare avharwa aya. VaChikwanha havana kutaura kuti vanhu vangani vakabatwa neCovid 19 kumatare avharwa aya asi vati vari kushanda nebazi rezvehutano kugadzirisa kuti avhurwe uye veruzhinji vachaziviswa kuti matare aya achavhurwa rini. VaChikwanha vati JSC iri kutora matanho ese anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organisation nebazi rezvehutano kudzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19 kumatare ose ari kushanda. Vatiwo vave kusimbaradza kupfekwa kwemamasiki, kugeza maoko nekushandisa maSanitizer kuti munhu apinde mumatare. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakati mapazi ayo anofanira kuderedza huwandu hwevashandi vanoenda kubasa kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, VaChikwanha vati havagoni kuita izvi nekuti matare anoita basa rakakosha. Gweta rinoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kwaMutare, Amai Peggy Tavagadza, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hongu danho ratorwa neJSC rakanaka chose asi rinofanirawo kuitirwa kuvasungwa, mapurisa navose vanoshandisa matare. Vatiwo JSC ngaifambirane nenguva kuti vanhu vatongwe pachishandisa muchina yechizvino zvino vasingasangane nevamwe mumatare. Mutungamiri wesangano reMedical and Dental Priivate Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association, Dr Johannes Marrisa, vati hurumende inofanira kuvheneka vanhu vakawanda kuti izive huwandu hwevanhu vane denda iri. Vaive gurukota rehutano panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuwanda kuri kuita Covid-19 kunokonzerwa nekuti matanho ekudzivirira denda iri haasi kutevedzwa vakatiwo hurumende inofanira kuwanisa vanhu zvekufambisa vachiti vanhu vari kutapuriranawo denda iri vari mimitsetse yemabhazi. Nezuro vanhu mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nevatanhatu vakabatwa neCovid -19 izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika yose pazviuru makumi mana nezvitauru nemazana mana nemakumi masere (43, 480 cases). Munhu mumwe chete akafa neCovid-19 nezuro,izvo zvaskavitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa neCovid-19 munyika yosepachiuru nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbabwe nevaviri, 1 692. Kusvika nezuro vanhu vainge vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vave zviuru mazana manomwe nemagumi zvishanu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 715 056 uye vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana mana nemakumi mashanu nechimwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu, 451 793. Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichaburitsa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Makorokoza Oisa Hupenyu hweVagari veMasvingo paNjodzi neKuchera pedyo neDzimba uye Matangi eMvura
text: Vamwe vagari vekuMasvingo vanoti vari kuronga kuendesa kanzuru yavo kumatare kana isina kubvisa mukati memazuva manomwe makorokoza ari kuchera goridhe pedyo nematangi emvura nedzimba dzavo sezvo vachigona kuzokonzera njodzi huru. Vagari vanoti matangi emvura anogona kutsemuka oyeredza dzimba dzavo zvinogona kukonzera rufu. Sangano revagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance(MURRA), richimirirwa nemagweta aro ekwa Mutendi, Mudisi and Shumba, rinoti raendesa tsamba yeyambiro iyi kukanzuru. Gweta revagari Advocate Phillip Shumba vati kanzuru inofanira kutora matanho ekubvisa makorokoza aya nekuti ndiyo ine matangi emvura ari mugomo remumusha we Target Kopje. Matangi aya anotyirwa kuti akadhirika nekucherwa anogona kupa kuti dzimba dziri pedyo nawo dziyeredzwe nemafashamu emvura sezvo achinzi anotakura marita anosvika mamirironi gumi anopa dhorobha rose mvura yekushandisa. Amai Entrance Takaidza, vemumusha wekwaMajange, vanoti kunze kwenyaya yemvura makorokoza aya ari kushandisa zvinoputika achidhuura gomo zvopa kuti dzimba dzavo dzitsemuke uye kukonzera ruzha rwakanyanya. Meya wedhorobha reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti vari mubishi rekugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Mukuru webasa muMURRA, VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti vanoti vatora danho iri nekuti hupenyu hwe vanhu hunogona kupinda munjodzi.. Asi mamwe makorokoza akataura ne Studio 7 anoti ivo vari kuchera mugo umu nekuti vari kusevenzera vakuru vakuru vezvematongerwo enyika avaramba kudoma nemazita. Mumwe mukorokoza ati anoda kuzivikanwa nekunzi Chinjiri, ati chavanoda imari zvematangi nedzimba dzevanhu havaneyi nazvo. Magweta eMurra ati aendesawo tsamba idzi kubazi rinoona nezve zvicherwa munyika neku hofisi yegurukota reMasvingo, VaEzra Chadzamira. VaShumba vati pakasabuda zviri kudiwa nevagari nyaya iyi inopedzwa nematare edzimhosva sezvo ine chekuita nekodzero dzevanhu dzakaita sehupenyu ne mvura. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Vofarira Kuvandudzwa kweMabvuku Clinic Kuve Chipatara
text: Kanzuru yeHarare ichishanda nemasangano akazvimiririra yakavandudza kirinika yeMabvuku kuve chipatara izvo zvoyemurwa zvikuru nevagari vekuMabvuku. Vagari vanoti kuvepo kwechipatara ichi kuri kuvabatsira zvikuru mukuwana kodzero yehutano nemutengo wakaderera. Chipatara cheMabvuku ichi chave nemishina inoshandiswa kuonekwa zviri mumuviri inosanganisira ma ultra sound scans ne radiological services. Pachipatara apa pave kuvhiyiwawo kusanganisira madzimai anenge ane pamuviri, kubviswa mazino pamwe nekutorwa maX-Ray. Kirinika iyi isati yave chipatara, vanhu vaitumirwa kuzvipatara zvakadai seHarare Hospital neParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals. Amai Sandra Masiyiwa ndeumwe mugari wekuMabvuku. Amai Masiyiwa, avo vanga vachibva kuchipatara cheMabvuku kunorapisa mwana wavo, vanoti kusimudzirwa kwekirinika iyi kuti ive chipatara kwavarerutsira hupenyu sezvo zvobatsira mukurapwa kwavo pachipatara chiri pedyo navo. Izvi zvatsigirwa naMuzvare Caroline Kazingizi avo vaudza Studio7 kuti kuvapo kwechipatara ichi kwava kuderedza mari yavanoshandisa mukuwana hutano hwakanaka. Muzvare Kazingizi vanoti munguva shoma yapfuura vaiti vakasangana nematambudziko anoda maX-Ray kana kuvhiyiwa vaitonotsvaka rubatsiro kuzvipatara zvakadai seHarare Hospital neParirenyatwa izvo zvavanoti zvanga zviri kure navo huye pachidawo mari dzekufambisa kuenda kuzvipatara izvi. Mumwe mugari wekuMabvuku angoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Obiama atiwo kuvapo kwechipatara pedyo navo kunobatsira kuchengetedza hutano hwavo sezvo vamwe vairasikirwa nehupenyu vachiendeswa kunobatsirwa kunezvimwe zvipatara. Asi VaNdlovu vatiwo chiri kunetsa pachipatara ichi inyaya yechinono, vakati varwere vari kunonoka kubatsirwa. Mukuru anoona nezvemabasa ehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vanoti kuvapo kwechipatara cheMabvuku kwaderedza zvikuru varwere vanoendeswa kune zvimwe zvipatara. VaChonzi vati sekanzuru vanofadzwa zvikuru kuti varwere vowana kubatsirwa panzvimbo imwe chete vakatiwo izvi zvinobetsera kuchengetedza hupenyu kunyanya kumadzimai anenge asangana nenjodzi mukusununguka. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti iri kutarisira kuvandudzawo mamwe emakirinika ayo ari mumusha inogara vazhinji kuti avewo zvipatara. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi yeHutano Yoyambira Kusimbiswa kweMitemo Inodzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19 Kana Miganhu neSouth Africa Yavhurwa
text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano inoti kuderera kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kuwanikwa vaine chirwere che Covid-19 munyika pamwe nevari kufa nacho chinhu chakanaka chose, asi izvi hazvifanirwe kuita kuti vanhu vavarairwe vokanganwa kuzvichengetedza. Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, avo vanodzidzisa zvehutano paNottingham Trent University kuBritain, vanotiwo hurongwa hweSouth Africa hwekuvhura miganho yayo hwakanakira vana veZimbabwe vagara vachipinda munyika iyi kunoita mabhindauko avo, asi vanhu vanofanirwa kurangarira kuti nyika iyi ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa muAfrica yose vabatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo, panofanirwa kutorwa matanho akasimba ekuona kuti vese vachapinda munyika iyi vavhenekwa zvakasimba, uye vakachengetedzeka kuti vasanotapura chirwere ichi vachizodzoka nacho munyika vachizoparadzirawo kune vamwe. Vanotiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuti iwedzere huwandu hwevanhu vanovhenekwa pazuva, uyewo kuti igozodzivirira kuunganidzwa kwevanhu kumiganho vozopedzisira vatapurirana hutachiwana zvakare. South Africa yakazivisa kuti ichavhura miganho yayo musi wa 01 Gumiguru, unove mwedzi unouya kubvumidza vashanyi nevanoda kunoita zvebhizimusi munyika iyi, uye ichavhurawo nhandare nhatu dzichasvikira vanhu. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti nekuda kwekukwira kwehuwandu vave kubatwa zvakare neCovid-19 pasi rose, nyika dzakawanda dzinosanganisira Englad, Germany, France neAmerica dzave kusimbisa zvakare matanho ekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Odzidziswa Kubatsira Madzimai Akazvitakura
text: Mukuedza kuderedza kufa kwemadzimai akazvitakura pamwe nekuchengetedza hutano hwevagari vekumaruwa, mamwe masangano akazvimirira ave kudzidzisa madzimai kuchengetedzwa kwehutano kuitira kuti vazodzidzisawo vavakagarisana navo kumaruwa. Mumwe wemadzimai akadzidziswa basa iri kuitira kuti azobatsirawo mamwe madzimai, ndiAmai Rena Round, avo vanogara mubhuku rekwaMambondiani kuDora mudunhu reManicaland. Amai Round, avo vanopinda chechi yemapostori isingabvumidzi nhengo dzayo kuenda kuzvipatara, vanoti chirongwa ichi chiri kubatsira zvikuru nharaunda yavo sezvo pari zvino vamwe vanhu vaisaziva mikova yezvipatara vave kukoshesa kuenda kuzvipatara. Amai Round vanotiwo kunyange hazvo makore mashoma apfuura vaive nedambudzo remadzimai akawanda aifa vakazvitakura, vanoti dambudzo iri rave kugadzirisika sezvo vari kudzidzisana kukosha kwekunyoresa kana mudzimai abata pamuviri, uye kuita izvi nguva ichipo. Madzimai aya ari kubatsirwa nemari inobva ku IM Swedish Development Partner. Sangano reDiocese of Mutare Community Care Programme rinoti rakakwanisa kudzidzisa madzimai makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu, ayo anoshanda mumawadhi maviri, Ward 11 neWard 35. Madzimai aya ndiwo anodzidzisa vagari vemunzvimbo iyi inonzi ine vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri ezviuru vazhinji vacho vari mapostori. VaPeter Mashonganyika vanoshanda ne Diocese of Mutare Community Care Program, uye mumwe wevanodzidzisa madzimai aya zvehutano. VaMashonganyika vanoti vari kufadzwa zvikuru nechirongwa ichi sezvo ndufu dzaderera munzvimbo yavanoshandira iyi. KuChipinge, chirongwa chekudzidzisa madzimai aya chiri kuitwa nesangano rakazvimiririra rinonzi Community Organisation for Poverty Alleviation in Zimbabwe. Sangano iri rakadzidzisawo vagari vekuChipinge Ward 17 ne Ward 18 vanosvika makumi masere nevatatu Mumwe wevari kudzidzisa madzimai kuChipinge, Amai Sarah Mafondora, vanoti kuburikidza nedzidzo yaveko, vanhu vakawanda vava kuziva nzira dzekuchengetedza hutano. VaWitmore Masengu vanoshnada neIM Swedish Development Partner. VaMasengu vanoti tsvagiridzo yavakaita kudunhu reManicaland muna 2014 yakaratidza kuti kwange kuine vakadzi vakawanda vaifa vakazvitakura, uye zvirwere zvepabonde kumadzimai aya zvaive zvakawanda. VaMasengu vanotiwo vanhurume vazhinji kunzvimbo iyi vaive vasina hany’a nehutano hwemadzimai avo kunyanya vakazvitakura izvo zvakapa sangano ravo kuti ribatsire nemari yekuti vagari venzvimbo idzi vawaniswe dzidziso yezveutano. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa neCovid-19 Iyo Yapararira muZvikoro Kunyangwe Hurumende Iri Kuti Yakagadzira
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weSvondo kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika. Pavanhu ava, vaviri vakafira kuBulawayo mumwe chete kuMasvingo. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika vave mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevasere kana kuti 268 kubva zvachatanga kupararira muna Kurume. Vamwe vanhu makumi mana nevasere vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi nemusi weSvondo wakare zvichireva kuti vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga vave zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana maviri nemakumi maviri kana kuti 9,220. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zviuru zvisere nemazana maviri nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 8, 250 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu gumi nevashanu vapora nemusi weSvondo. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 702. Hurumende inengewo yave kutatarika zvakanyanya kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi muzvikoro, zvikoro zvakaita seJohn Tallach High School, Emakhandeni Primary School, Matopo High, Prince Edward, National University of Science and Technology, Chinhoyi University of Technology nezvimwe zvakazivisa kuti zvine vana nevarairidzi vainge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga vakayambira kuti chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvine hukasha sezvo vanhu vasisatevedzeri kurudziro dzekumisa kupararira kweCovid-19. NeMuvhuro chikoro cheChinhoyi High chinonzi change chichirambidza vamwe vana kupinda mushure mekunge mumwe mwana abatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera. Pasvika Studio 7 pachikoro ichi mangwanani vana vose vanodzidza vachibva kumba vange vachidzoserwa kudzimba. Vana vanga vachibvumirwa kupinda pachikoro vana vari kunyora bvunzo chete. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru webazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr Gift Masoja vanoti vakakurudzira kuti vana vambomisa zvidzidzo nekutyira kuti chirwere ichi chinopararira pachikoro ichi. Dr Masoja vanoti vakabva vawongorora vamwe vana vanosvika makumi mashanu nevashanu vanodzidza nemusikana uyu pamwe nevadzidzisi gumi vakambodzidzisa vana ava svondo rapera. Patabvunza kuti matanho api avari kutora kuti vana vari kunyora vachibva kumba nevanogara pachikoro vasa tapurirane chirwere, mukuru webazi rezvedzidzo mudunhu reMashonaland West VaGabriel Mhuma vati vana vari kunyora bvunzo vanodzidza vachibva kumba nevanodzidza vachigara pachikoro vanonyora mumakamuri akasiyana. Mumwe mwana adzoserwa kumba uyo watisingakwanise kudoma nezita sezvo asati abvazera anoti vadzoserwa kumba vachinzi vazodzoka kuchikoro kupera kwemwedzi uno. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti vadzidzi vari pazvikoro zvine vana vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vanofanirwa kuwongororwa vose. No media source currently available Dzimwe nhengo dzedare reparamende dzakakurudzira hurumende kuti ivhare zvikoro sezvo chirwere cheCovid-19 chave kupararira asi vanotungamira mabasa ehurumende mudare iri vari gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakati hurumende yakagadzirira. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nevanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro avo vati zvikoro zvishoma ndizvo zvawirwa nedambudziko uye vari kukurudzira zvikoro kuti zvitevedzere kurudziro yavari kupa nebazi rezvehutano kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Danho reSouth Africa reKunyevenutsa Mutemo weKudzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19 Rotambirwa neMufaro
text: Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa vakazivisa neChitatu manheru kuti hurumende yavo yave kuzonyevenutsa mitemo yakasiyanasiyana ine chekuita nekudzivirirwa kwekupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 . VaRamaphosa vakazivisa kuti kubva pakati peusiku hwemusi weSvondo 20 Gunyana nyika inenge yave kuenda pa Level 1 ye lockdown, zvichitevera kudzikira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kuvhenekwa vaine chirwere ichi munyika iyi. VaRamaphosa vakazivisawo kuti kutanga musi wa 01 Gumiguru, South Africa inenge yovhura miganho yayo uye kubvumidza vashanyi vanopinda nendege pamwe nepamiganho yayo vanenge vaine magwaro anoratidza kuti vakavhenekwa Covid-19 mukati memaawa makumi manomwe nemaviri kana kuti 72 hours. Vakati vanenge vasina magwaro aya vanozoendeswa kunzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanenge vakamirira kuvhenekwa kuona kana vaine Covid-19, kana kuti quarantine centres. Vashanyi vanobva kunyika dzinozivikanwa kuti dzine dambudziko reCovid-19 vakanzi vanogona kurambidzwa kupinda munyika iyi. Mutungamiri wesangano reInternational Cross Border Traders Association, VaDenis Juru vanoti vana veZimbabwe vari muSouth Africa vakatambira nemufaro mukuru danho rekunyevenutsa lockdown iri, sezvo vanga vasingawanewo mari yekubatsirika yanga ichipiwa zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa. VaJuru vanotiwo kuvhurwa kwemiganho, zvikuru weBeitbridge kuchatambirwa nemufaro mukuru nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, izvo zvagara zvichishandisa muganhu uyu kunotenga pamwe nekutengesa zvinhu muSouth Africa Vanoti vanotarisira kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe ichazivisawo nezvekuvhurwa kwemuganhu weBeitbrdge kuitira kuti vanhu vakwanise kiupinda munyika dzose zvisina dambudziko. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inobatana neDzimwe Nyika Kucherechedza Zuva reWorld Cancer Day
text: Zimbabwe inoti sedzimwe nyika pasi rese dambudziko rechirwere chegomarara riri kuramba richikura huye zvakakosha kutsvaka nzira dzekuti vese vanobatwa nechirwere ichi vakwanise kurapiwa. Vachitaura pamhemberero dzekucherechedza zuva rechirwere chegomarara pasi rose reWorld Cancer Day muHarare nhasi, vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiriri wenyika vari zvakare gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga vati chirwere chegomarara idambudziko munyika huye hurumende iri kutsvaka nzira dzekubatsira vese vanobatwa nedenda iri. VaChiwenga vati mugore ra2018 chete vanhu zviuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere chegomarara munyika. Vatiwo kurwisa chirwere ichi zvakakosha kuti vanhu vavhenekwe vachiti vanhu vazhinji munyika vari kubatwa chirwere ichi chatodzika midzi. VaChiwenga vati mugore ra2017 vanhu vana muvanhu gumi vaibatwa nechirwere ichi vairasikirwa nehupenyu. Vatiwo munyika dzisina kubudirira seZimbabwe vana vasere muvana gumi vanobatwa nechirwere chegomarara vanoshaya asi kunyika dzakabudirira vaviri muvana gumi ndivo vanofa nechirwere ichi. Vatiwo sezvo mishonga yekurapa chirwere ichi ichidhura huye nzvimbo dzekurapira chirwere ichi dzirishoma huye dziri mumaguta chete, hurumende yakazvipira kuwanisa mishonga yegomarara pachena. Vati izvi ndozvakaita kuti mubhajeti yegore rino kuiswe homwe padivi yekubatsiridza mukurwisa chirwere chegomarara sezvinongoitwawo mukurwisa chirwere cheHIV/Aids. VaChiwenga vatiwo hurumende ichange ichiitisa zvidzidzo zvemachiremba egomarara pamwe nevakoti kuitira kuti vakwanise kubatsira veruzhinji, kuramboenderera mberi nekubaya nhomba yeHuman Papilloma Virus (HPV) kuvanasikana vari pakati pemakore gumi negumi nemana senzira yekudzivirira gomarara remuromo wechibereko. Vatiwo kuvhenekwa kwechirwere chegomarara kucharamba kuchiitwa uye kuwaniswa kwemishonga nezvekurapisa gomarara kucharamba kuchisimbaradzwa. Vachipawo humbowo hwavo mushure mekurwara negomarara rechibereko pamhemberero dzanhasi, Amai Busisiwe Moyo vati kurapwa gomarara munyika mutoro. Izvi zvatsigirwaro nemukuru weKidzcan VvaDaniel Mckenzie, avo vati kusaenzana kwemikana pakati pevanowana nevanoshaya kuri kukonzera ndufu dzakawanda kuvana. Vatiwo pane mukana wakakura wekuti vana vanobatwa negomarara varapwe vachipora asi nyaya yehurombo inoita kuti vazhinji vasakwanise kuwana mishonga pamwe nekuongororwa nekurapwa. Mumiriri wesangano reWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe, Dr Alex Gasasira vatsigirawo kuti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vese vakwanise kuwana mukana wekuongororwa, kurapwa pamwe nekuwana mishonga zvisinei nekwavanenge vari munyika. Mutauriri weCancer Association of Zimbabwe, VaLovemore Makurirofa vaudzwo Studio 7 kuti vari kukurudzirawo kuti munhu wese agone kurapwa zvisineyi nekunobva kana mamiriro akaita munhu. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti mishonga yegomarara ibve kuhurumende vachiti pamusoro pekudzikisa mitengo zvinoitawo kuti iwanike kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Zuva rechirwere chegomarara rinocherechedzwa musi wa4 Kukadzi gore negore. Dingindira regore rino kusvika 2024 riri kukurudzira kuti vanhu vese vakwanise kurapwa kana kuti Closing the Cancer Care Gap. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzotaura Pamusoro peLockdown
text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kuwedzerwa kwaitwa Level 4 Covid-19 Lockdown nemamwe masvondo maviri kusvika musi wa Gunyana 7. Mumwe mutengesi wemumugwagwa audza Studio 7 kuti kuwedzerwa kwelockdown kunoreva kuti hupenyu hwavo hucharamba hwakavaomera sezvo vanhu vanenge vasina kusununguka kuti vafambe vachitenga zvavanoda. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, uye vachishanda ne Labor and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vati vange vari kutarisira kuti lockdown iyi ichisvika kumagumo senzira yokusimudzira makambani. Mutungamiriri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vatiwo vatambira kuwedzerwa kwenguva yelockdown senzira yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid 19. Asi vati chikumbiro chavo kuhurumende ndechekuti dai nguva yekuvhurwa kwezvitoro yawedzerwa vachiti vanenge vari kumabasa havana nguva yekupinda muzvitoro. Mutungamiri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vatiwo kunyange hazvo vatambira danho rekuwedzera lockdown level 4vanoshushukana nekusavapo kwegadziriro yekuvhurwa kwezvikoro. Asi nyanzvi munezvehutano huye vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vati kupamhidzirwa kwelockdown hakuna zvakuri kubetsera kunyanya vakatarisa nyaya yezvekufambisa. VaMadzorera, avo vanove munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, vati kurambidzwa kwezvekufambisa zvinotakura veruzhinji zvisiri pasi pekambani yeZupco kwasiya vanhu vaine dambudziko izvo zvoita kuti vanhu vamanikidzane mumotokari shoma dziriko izvo zvichawedzera njodzi yekubata chirwere ichi. Gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakazivisa nezuro kuti hurumende yawedzera lockdown nemasvondo mavirisenzira yekurwisa denda reCovid-19. Vakatiwo hurumende icharamba ichitenga nhomba kuti vese vanoda vabayiwe. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti Covid-19 yakauraya vanhu makumi mavirinevanomwe, uye vanhu mazana matatu neguminevapfumbamwe (319) vakabatwa nechirwere ichi Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nezvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi maviri(123 320), uye vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvinanemazana matatu nemakumi maviri , (4 320). Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika yese vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matatu zvine makumi masere nezviviri nemazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe (2 382 359). Vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni nezviuru mazana mashanu nezvitanhatu nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevashanu(1 506 445). Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvabuda muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Linda Masarira Voendeswa kuChipatara
text: Murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu Amai Linda Masarira avo vakapedza mazuva makumi masere vari kujere reChikurubi mushure mekusungwa vachiratidzira zvisiri pamutemo vakaendeswa kuchipatara muHarare husiku hweChipiri mushure mekunge vatanga kurwara. Kumbogara mujeri uu kunonzi nevamwe ndiko kwopa kuti Muzavre Masarira varware. Shamwari yaMuzvare Masarira, VaOstallos Siziba avo vakambovharirwawo kuChikurubi vanoti vakakatyamadzwa nehurwere uhu sezvo vainge vaswera navo vachinzwa zvakanaka muswere wose. VaSiziba vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti Muzvare Masarira vachiri kuongororwa navanachiremba asi vanoti parizvino zvinoratidza kuti chipfuva chavo hachina kumira zvakanaka. VaNqobizitha Mlambo vanoti Muzvare Masarira vanogona kunge vakatapurirwa chirwere vari mujeri reChikurubi iro risina kumira zvakanaka. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanogaroshoropodza majeri emunyika vachiti haana hutsanana pamwe nezvekudya zvakanaka. Muna 2011 dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzakashanyira majeri mashanu emuno dzikabuditsa gwaro rairatidza kuti kumajeri hakuna mvura yakachena, zvekushandisa zvakakwana pamwechete nezvekudya zvinovaka muviri. Vasati vapinda muchipatara Muxvare Masarira vakaudza Studio 7 kuti dambudziko rimwe guru riri kuChikurubi nderezvekudya sezvo vanhu vachidya zvisina kukodzera. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Zimbabwe Inokwanisa Kubatsira Vana Vane Otizimu
text: Sedzimwe nyika zhinji, Zimbabwe iri kutarisana nechirwere cheotizimu icho chinonyanya kubata vana, zvikuru vanakomana. Bazi rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwezvirwere, reCenters For Disease Control, rinoti munhu mumwe chete pavanhu makumi masere nevasere munyika dzese ane otizimu. Vabereki vazhinji vanotadza kuwana zvikwanisiro kuvana vavo vane chirwere ichi izvo zvinozoita kuti vana ava vasainda kuchikoro. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors For Human Rights, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vanoti Zimbabwe ine vana chiremba vazhinji uye vanhu vakadzidziswa kubatsira vana vane otizimu kunyange hazvo paine zvimwe zvapingaidzo zvavanosangana nazvo munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mutori weNhau, Tawanda Gudhlanga, Ashaya nehirwere cheCovid-19
text: Vatori venhau munyika voita misodzi pamatama zvakare zvichitevera kushaya kwemumwe wavo, uyo anonzi atorwa nedenda reCovid 19. Pasina kana mazuva akawanda vatori venhau vabva kuradzika mumwe wavo, muzvinambiri munyaya dzekutora nhau, Sandra Nyaira, uyo akamboshandira Studio7 kwemakore gumi nemaviri, mumwe mutori wenhau ange ane mukurumbira munyika, Tawanda Gudhlanga, ashaya zvakare nechirwere che Covid 19 nhasi mangwanani. Kushaya kwaGudhlanga kwaziviswa neshamwari yake, Nigel Nyamutumbu, padandemutande rake eTwitter nhasi mangwanani. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vatori venhau munyika, reZimbabwe Union of Journalists, VaMichael Chideme, vati vatori venhau varwadziwa zvikuru nekushaya kwaGudhlanga misodzi yavo yekuchema Nyaira, isati yambowoma. Munyori musangano reYoung Journalists Association of Zimbabwe, VaLeopold Munhende, vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti isawanze misangano inoita kuti vatori venhau vange varipo vachiti hurumende yave kufanira ushandisa humhizha hwechimanjemanje kuitira kuderedza mikana yekuti vatori venhau vasangane nevari muhurumende senzira yekuderedza mikana yekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid 19. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, havana kunge vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira uye mutevedzeri wavo VaKindness Paradza vati titaure nemunyori mubazi ravo VaNick Mangwana avo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi VaMangwana vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachiti varwadziwa nekufa kwaGudhlanga vakati chiri kunyanyorwadza ndechekuti nyika iri kuramba ichirasikirwa nevatori venhau vane mukurumbira. Zvichakadai, gurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube vaburitsa mashoko ekuti vachatura hurongwa hweMid Term Budget and Economic Review svon do rinouya vachishandisa humhizha hwechimanje-manje nechikonzero chekupararira kwedenda reCovid 19. Mutungamiri weMedia Istitute of Southern Africa muZimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, avo varatidzawo kushushikana nekufa kwaGudhlanga, vatiwo dai makambani enhau aonawo kuti vatapi venhau vanovashandira vave vashoma munzvimbo dzavanoshandira uye vane zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kuchirwere cheCovid 19. Mupepeti webepanhau reThe Observer, VaBarnabas Thondlana vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vatori venhau vabaiwe nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid 19 uye kuti vashandire kudzimba dzavo. Gudhlanga, uyo ange ave nemakore makumi mana nerimwe chete ekuberekwa, ange ave maneja wenhepfenyuro yeYaFM kuZvishavane. Gudhlanga akamboshandira makambani enhau anoti ZBC-TV achitepfenyura chirongwa chinonzi Business Forum, uye akashandirawo nhepfenyuro yeClassic263 pamwe neSport FM. Muna 2017, Gudhlanga akapihwa mubayiro wekuva munhu akakunda vamwe vese munyika pakutepfenyura parhedhiyo mumakundano eNational Arts Merit Awards. Kusvika pari zvino, vatori nenhau vashanu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachakapinda munyika. Vatori venhau ava vanoti Zororo Makamba, uyo akave wekutanga kutorwa nechirwere ichi, aive munyori mukuru weZUJ, Foster Dongozi, mutapi wenhau weZBC, Janet Munyaka, Sandra Nyaira pamwe naGudhlanga. No media source currently available

headline: France Yowana Imwe Mhando yeCovid-19 Asi WHO Ichiti Vanhu Vasanyanye Kutya Havo
text: France inoti yakawana imwe mhando itsva yeCovid-19 inonzi IHU iyo ichiri kuongororwa hayo kuti inokonzera hurwere hwakaita sei navanamazvikokota munya dzezvirwere. Mhando yeIHU iyi inonzi yakawanikwa mune munhu ainge ashanyira nyika yeCameroon. Pari zvino, vatambi venhabvu vemunyika nevamwe vemuAfrica vari kuCameroon kumakwikwi eAfrica Nations Cup. Asi vachitaura nenhepfenyuro yeBloomberg nevamwe vatori venhau nemusi weChipiri, vanoona nezvezvirwere zvitsva musangano reWorld Health Organization, VaAbdi Mahamud, vanoti mhando itsva yeIHU iyi haisi hayo kunyanya kuvavhundutsa sezvo isiri kupararira zvakanyanya kubva zvayakatanga kuonekwa uye vave nenguva vachiiongorora. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa, Muzvinafundo Davison Saungweme, avo vanodzidzisa paUniversity of North Georgia muno muAmerica, vari kukurudzira vanhu kuti vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo chirwere ichi chiri kuramba chichiuya nedzimwe mhando. Muzvinafundo Sangweme vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvirwere zvemavirus zvakaita seCovid-19 zvinoramba zvichiuya nedzimwe mhando. dzimwe mhando itsva dzinogona kuuraya vanhu, asi dzimwe dzinenge dzisina simba rakanyanya. Zvichakadaro, vanhu makumi matatu nemumwe vakafa nechirwere ichi nezuro zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru zvishanu nemakumi manomwe nevasere. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumu mapfumbamwe nemumwe chete kana kuti 1 591 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro. Izvi zvakasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru mazana maviri negumi nezvinomwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevasere, kana kuti 217 678. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vave mamiriyoni mana nezviuru zana nemakumi mana nechimwe zvine zana nemakumi mashanu nevasere, kana kuti 4 141 158. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine makumi mashanu nevasere ,kana kuti 3 153 058. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu zvikuru vanoshanda muzvipatara, vakwegura nevari munjodzi yekurawara zvakaipisisa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zvinomwe nemazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevana kana kuti 7 254. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuongororwa Ropa Kuti Vazive Pavamire paNyaya yeHIV/AIDS
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti kunyangwe hazvo Zimbabwe yakatora matanho okuti munhu wese awane rubatsiro rwekuwana mushonga wekurapa chirwere cheshuramatongo cheHIV/Aids kune vanhu vakawandisa vasati vave neruzivo maerarano nezvinhu zvinokonzera kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. Imwe nyanzi munyaya dzehutano Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga vanoti chimwe chezvinhu chinonyanya kukonzera chirwere che HIV, kusangana pabonde pasina kushandisa zvekuzvidzivirira zvakaita semakondomu. Vanotiwo kana munhu akabaiwa netsono yambobaiwa munhu ane hutachiwana hweHIV kana kutemwa nyora nereza yambocheka munhu ane HIV/Aids zvinogona kuti munhu atapurirwe chirwere. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti chirwere ichi chashungurudza mhuri dzakawanda asi Zimbabwe iri kuyedza kuwanira vanhu mushonga zvapa kuti zvinhu zvive nani. Vaenderera mberi vachitiwo zvinofadza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nechirwere ichi hwadzikira zvikuru kana zvichienzaniswa nezvaiitika mumakore apfuura. VaEmmanuel Gasa vekusangano reAids and Arts Foundation vakatsigira mashoko akataurwa naDr Chiripanyanga vachiti vanhu vazhinji havazive pavamire maererano nezvehutachiwana hweHIV. Muzvare Maria Munzvandi veku Dzivaresekwa vanove mumwe wevakadzi vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV vanoti munhu wese, zvikuru vari muwanano vanofanira kuvhenekwa kuti vazive pavamire marerano nezveHIV/Aids. Muzvare Munzvandi vanoti pane zvimwe zvinhu zvisingaburitswe pachena zvinokonzera kutapuriranwa kweHIV zvinova zvinhu zvinofanira kujekesera vanhu zvakanyanyisa. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Dr Fortune Nyasha Nyamande vanoti Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rehurwere weHIV/Aids kunyangwe hazvo kwave nemishonga inokwanisa kuwedzera makore ekurarama kwevanhu vanorarama nehutachiwana uhwu. Dr Nyamande vanoti kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba kuri kupa kuti hurongwa hwekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi hunetse. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo nemumwe anorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Muzvare Martha Tholana. Musi wa 1 Zvita ndiro zuva rinoyeuchidzwa vanhu nezvechirwere ichi, hurongwa uhu gore rino hwakairtirwa kuMucheke Stadium, Masvingo. Dingindira regore rino rakanangana nekukurudzira vanhu munharaudza dzavo kuti vataure nezvechirwere ichi kana kuti “Communities make the Difference.” No media source currently available

headline: Dambudziko reMvura Rotyirwa Kuunza Zvirwere zveManyoka muShamva
text: Mukuru wechikoro cheShamva Primary School, VaEdson Chuwe, vanoti vari kukumbira kuboka reZimbabwe National Water Authority, ZINWA, kuti rivhure mvura yarakavhara pachikoro chavo, iyo vanoti yakavharwa nekuda kwechikwereti chemari isina kubhadharwa. Chikoro cheShamva Primary School chinonzi chiri pasi pemugodhi weShamva Gold Mine, uyo uye chikwereti kuZINWA. Chikumbiro chaVaChuwe ichi chinotevera kurwara nemanyoka kwakaita vana vechikoro vatanhatu nemusi weChitatu svondo rino, kunyange hazvo chipatara cheShamva chakati manyoka aya haasi echirwere chekorera kana typhoid. Dambudziko remvura iri rinonzi rakabatawo zvakare musha weveruzhinji weShamva Gold Mine, izvo zvaita kuti vagari vedzimba dzemugodhi uyu vanyore gwaro kudare reparamende vachida kuti ripindire mukuona kuti ZINWA yavhura mvura yakavharwa kubva kutanga kwemwedzi wapera, sezvo iri kodzero yemunhu wese yekuti awane mvura yakachena. Vagari ava vanoti kuvharwa kwemvura kwave kuita kuti vanhu vashandise mvura inobva munzvimbo dzisina hutano, izvo zviri kuwedzera hurwere kwemanyoka. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZINWA kanawo kubva kumugodhi weShamva Gold Mine. No media source currently available

headline: South Africa Inoti Vabvakure Vachabaiwavo Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Hurumende yeSouth Africa yakazivisa kuti vanhu vese vari mu South Africa vachakwanisa kubaiwa mushonga wenhomba, kana kuti vaccine, wekudzivirira chirwere che Covid-19. Izvi zvinotevera gurukota reSouth Africa rinoona nezvehutano, VaZweli Mkhize, vazivisa kuti South Africa ichangobaya mushonga uyu pazvizvarwa zveSouth Africa chete, kwete vabvakure. Mushure mekushorwa zvikuru nenyanzvi dzezvehutano nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakazivisa neMuvhuro kuti vanhu vakuru vose vari munyika iyi vachabaiywa mushonga uyu zvisinei kuti zvizvarwa zvekunyika ipi. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch, iro rakashoravo zvikuru hurumende yeSouth Africa payakange yataura zvekusarura vabvakure mukudzivirira chirwere ichi, rinoti izvi ndizvo zvinotarisirwa kuitwa munyika dzose, kusanganisa muSouth Africa. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti sezvo South Africa ine mbiri yekusarura vabvakure, sangano ravo richange rakatarisisa kuona kuti South Africa inoita here kana kuti kwete, zvayavimbisa kuita izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reThe National Age Network of Zimbabwe Rocherechedza Zuva reHutano Richitarisa Hutano hweVakwegura
text: Sangano rinoona nezvekukwegura kwevanhu munyika, reNational Age Network Zimbabwe, nhasi riri kucherechedza zuva rehutano pasi rose, reWorld Health Day. Zuva iri rinocherechedzwa musi wa7 Kubvumbi pasi rose, asi sangano iri rakasarudza kuricherechedza musi wa 13 Kubvumbi, kumahofisi esangano reWorld Health Organisation, WHO, ari kuNewlands, muHarare. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, VaMarck Chikanza, vanoti vachatorawo mukana wekucherechedza zuva iri vachiparurawo gwaro rakanangana nehutano hwevanhu vakwegura, uye kupemberera kusvitsa makore makumi manomwe kwesangano reWorld Health Organisation. Vanoti gwaro ravachaparura iri rakabuda mushure mekushanda kwavakaita pasi pechirongwa chinonzi “Better Health for Older People in Africa” munyika ina dzinoti Zimbabwe, Mozambique, Ethiopia, neTanzania. “Shure kwekudarozvo, takabva taona zvakakosha izvo kuti tiite iyo inonzi National Health and Aging Strategy. Muno muZimbabwe takaiti National Health Aging Strategy,” Vanodaro VaChikanza. Vanoti vakaronga kutandadza vanhu nemitambo yakasiyanasiyana, inosanganisira mhanzi kubva Salvation Army Band. VaChikanza vanotiwo vakakoka vanhu vakawanda, masangano akazvimirira, pamwe nemapoka ehurumende kumhemberero dzavo idzi. Sangano reNational Age Network of Zimbabwe, mubatanidzwa wemasangano akazvimirira anokwana kuita gumi nemaviri, uye mubatanidzwa uyu wakaumbwa muna 2012 uchitarisa mararamiro nemashandiro aiita vanhu vakwegura, zvikuru mumapurazi. Mubatanidzwa uyu unoshandawo zvakare nemapoka maviri ehurumende, anoti rinoona nezvezvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe, riri pasi pebazi rezvehutano, pamwe neboka rezvekurima, reAgritex, iro riri pasi pebazi rezvekurima. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vane Varwere paParirenyatwa Voswerapo Nekuda kweKuoma kweZvinhu
text: Kuwondomoka kwehupfumi munyika kowedzera kutambudzika kwehama dzine varwere muzvipatara zvakadai seParirenyatwa, uko vanachiremba vasiri kuenda kumabasa. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 pachipatara cheParirenyatwa inoratidza kuti veruzhinji vanorwarirwa vari kuswera vari pachipatara ichi vakamirira kuona varwere panguva dzakeona varwere, vachiti zvinhu zvakavaomera kuti vange vachimbodzokera kudzimba vozodzokazve sezvo mari dzekufambisa mumichovha dzakakwidzwa zvakanyanya. Mumwe wevanhu vanoswera pachipatara ichi ndemumwe mudzimai uyo angoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Mai Miranzi. Amai Miranzi, avo vane mukoma wavo ari muchipatara, vanoti kana vangouya panguva dzekushanyira murwere dza 6 dzemangwanani, vanozobva pachipatara apa mushure mekuona murwere nenguva dza 6 dzemanheru. Amai Miranzi vanoti vanoswera nenzara. Amai Miranzi vanotiwo kunyangwe hazvo vari vanhu vabva zera, vanotofamba netsoka kubva mudhorobha mavanenge vaburukira kuenda kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa. Amai Rumbidzai Shumba vane murwerewo zvakare muParirenyatwa. Amai Shumba vanotsigirawo zvataurwa naAmai Miranzi vachiti kudhura kwemari dzekufambisa ndiko kunovapa kuti vangoswera havo pachipatara apa. Kunyangwe hazvo vane varwere ava vachiswera pachipatara apa, vanotiwo kusavapo kwanachiremba kunowedzera matambudziko avo sezvo hama dzavo dzisiri kurapwa uye vachingowana pasina shanduko. Vanachiremba havasi kuenda kumabasa vachiti havasisina zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vaende kumabasa avo. Vamwewo amai vada kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Kukuwe vati zvinosuwisa kuti zvavanenge vangosiya varwere vavo vari ndizvo zvavanowana vari. Vemachechi pasi pemubatanidzwa weZimbabwe Christian Heads of Denominations vanotiwo vakanyora gwaro kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachitaridza kushushikana zvikuru nekurambodzikira kwezvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi. Vachitaura neStudio 7, Reverend Kenneth Mtata veZimbabwe Council of Churches vanoti vemakereke vanoona sekuti kuramboderera kwehupfumi kunokonzera kusagadzikana kwezvinhu munyika. Ukuwo, dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kushaya simba kwemari yemunyika ichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica pamwe nekudhura kwemitengo yezvinodiwa nemunhu zuva rega rega zvave kusiya mhuri zhinji dzichinyura kupinda muhurombo. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa eZRP Anoparura Chirongwa cheKudzivirira Kuraraira kweHIV/Aids
text: Zimbabwe Republic Police neChitatu yakaparura hurongwa hwehwaro hwekuyedza kudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS kwamutare. Hwaro uhu hwakananganga nekubatsira mapurisa ari pabasa uye vari pamudyandigere. Hurongwa uhu hwave nenguva yakareba huchikwenenzverwa paine chinangwa chekuti panosvika gore ra2020 pange pasisina vanoshaya nekuda kwechirongwa ichi. Vanenge vaine chirwere ichi vanenge vachitarisirwa kuwana mapiritsi zviri nyore. Mukuru wemapurisa mudunhu reManicaland, Assistant Commissioner Dorothy Kupara, avo vakaparura chirongwa ichi, vanoti zvakakosha kuti mapurisa ose aremekedze hwaro hwavapo kuitira kuderedza kuparira kwechirwere ichi. Amai Kupara vanoti hapana chinonyadzisa pakunoongororwa chirwere cheHIV uye pamwechete nekutora mishonga yacho sezvinodiwa. “Chirwere ichi chakangofananawo neshuga, kana zvakubata gadziriswa, so my officer will ensure kuti zvashandiswa sezvinotarisirwa, uye my officer handifungi kuti pane vachange vachiramba kuzotestwa, uye basa richatowanda kune ma medical officers vachitesitwa.” Mukuru wemapurisa uyu anotiwo hwaro huripo uhu hunobudisa pachena kuti vanenge vaine chirwere havaizotadziswa kusimudzirwa pabasa. Hwaro uhu hunotiwo vanenge varwara vanokwanisa kumbonozorora zvavo vachipora vachizongodzokera pabasa kana vave kunzwa zviri nani. Mumashoko avo ekuvhara chiitiko ichi, mumwe mukuru wemapurisa Superintendant Kamanda vanoti hwaro hwavapo uhu huchabatsira mukufambisa basa ravo zvakanaka kunyanya kuvatungamiriri vemakamba kumatunhu ose emunyika. “Ndinoti kumaDispols (District Police Officers) ose kana masangana nechinhu chiri medical chingakunetsai munongoti ko policy inoti chii? Endai munotitoreraiwo ende rinonzi rakatsetseka rinosuppotwa nePolice Act uye ne the current Labour Laws, tinoiti chii zviya, iSimbi yebasa!” Mumwe wechipurisa anorarama nehurwere Sergeant Tawanda Mugeri vachipa huchapupu vanoti zvakakosha kuti munhu wega wega, kunyanya kuchipurisa, ararame achiziva paamire mushure mekuvhenekwa ropa. “Panhau yekuudza vamwe vekubasa, inonzi chii zviya, inonzi disclosure, zviri nani inini ndavakuziva zvandiri zvitori right, ndikaenda kuhospital vave kutondishevedza nefirst name nekuti ndikanzwa parwadza ndotomhanya kuti ndizive kuti chii.” Hwaro hwekubudisa HIV/AIDS Policy hwakaitwa pachidyidzanwa nemasangano akasiyana-siyana anosanganisira reNational Aids Council, NAC, Population Services International, PSI nemamwewo. Mukuru weNational Aids Council muManicaland, VaEvans Makoni, vanoti vari kushanda nemapurisa kuti vazadzikise zviri muhwaro mavo. “Chatiunganidza pano inyaya yeZRP AIDS Policy launch iyi, chirongwa chiripo pakuti National Aids Council yakapuhwa mutoro wekuti irwisane nedenda reHIV. Saka mukuita izvozvo tinoti vanhu vari pamabasa kuti vawanirwe nguva yekuitirwa ma programmes inoita shoma saka kambani ikaita policy yaino implemenda zvinobata vazhinji vanenge vari kumabasa toderedza huwandu hwemari yatinoshandisa pakurapa nekuti vanhu vanenge vadzivirira.” Vakuru vechipurisa havana kuda kuburitsa pachena kuti chirwere ichi chakapararira zvakanyanya seyi muZRP, kunyangwe hazvo ongororo ichitaridza kuti kuchipurisa kumwe kwemamwe mapoka emabasa kwakatekeshera chirwere ichi kusanganisira kuchiuto, nekuvatyairi vedzimotokari dzinofamba mitunhu mirefu. Hwaro hwakaparurwa uhwu hucharamba huchiongororwa nekugadzirisa kuti hukwanise kufambidzana neshanduko inenge iriko uye nenguva. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reKuwanikwa neKukosheswa kweMvura Pasi Pose
text: Nezuro, Zimbabwe yakabatana nepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rekuwaniswa kwemvura yakachena kumunhu wese pasi rose, re World Water Day, iro rinocherehcedzwa pasi rose kubva muna 1993. Pamusoro pekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena, donzvo rekucherechedza zuva iri nderekupa zivo pamusoro pevanhu vanodarika mabhiriyoni maviri vari kurarama zuva nezuva pasi rose vasina mukana kumvura yakachena. Dingindira regore rino rakanangana nekuti mvura inoreveyi kuvanhu, kukosha kwayo uye kuti vanhu vangachengetedza sei chiwanikwa ichi. Vanoona nezvebudiriro yevechidiki musangano revechidiki rePlatform for Youth and Community Development, VaMuburwa Allan Murozvi, vanoti vari kukurudzira hurumende pamwe nemakanzuru ose ekumaruwa nemaguta kuti vakoshese kuwaniswa kwemvura kuvanhu kuburikidza nemari dzebudiriro yematunhu. VaMurozvi vanokurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vadzidze kukohwa mvura kuitira kuzoishandisa munguva dzekushaikwa kwayo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neKutengesa muBulawayo Vowaniswa Mukana weKubaiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Rimwe sangano rinomiririra vanorarama nekutengesa muBulawayo, reBulawayo Vendors and Traders Association, rinoti rinotambira nemufaro chirongwa chehurumende chekubaya nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuvanhu vanorarama nekutengesa icho chaparurwa muguta iri. Mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvezvirongwa musangano iri, uye vachiraramawo nekutengesa, Muzvare Debra Mukasa, vanoti vanofara nekuti hurumende yakanzwa chikumbiro chavo chekuti vanorarama nekutengesa vange vachibaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira kuti vakwanise kuvhura misika. Chirongwa ichi chaparurwa munzvimbo nhatu muBulawayo dzinoti City Hall, Renkini neSokusile, uye hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu zviuru gumi nezvishanu, kana kuti 15 000, mukati memazuva gumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Muzvare Mukasa vanoti vanotarisira kuti vamwe vasiri kutengesera mumisika yekanzuru vachabaiwawo nhomba iyi, sezvo kwanga kuchinzi vanhu vatange vaburitsa makadhi anoratidza pavanoshandira kuitira kuti vakwanise kubaiwa. Vanotiwo vanhu zviuru gumi nezvishanu vanonzi nehurumende ichabaya nhomba vashoma zvikuru, asi vanoti zvakakosha kuti chirongwa ichi chatomboparurwa sezvo vachitarisira kuti hurumende ichawedzera huwandu uhwu. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Mukoti Vanokanda Mapadza Pasi Vachiti Mari Dzavo Dziwedzerwe
text: Vana mukoti muzvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende zvakasiyana-siyana munyika vatanga kuramwa mabasa neChishanu vachiti vanoda kuti hurumende ihadzirise zvichemo zvavo. Kuramwa mabasa uku kunoitika panguva iyo vana chiremba vadarika masvondo maviri vachiramwawo mabasa. Vana mukoti vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu munyika mose vakanda mapadza avo pasi vachiti hurumende iri kuramba ichivabata kumeso pazvichemo zvavo, izvo yakavimbisa kugadzirisa makore akawanda apfuura. Vana mukoti ava vanoti vari kuramwa mabasa kwete senzira yekutsigira vana chiremba avo vava nemazuva gumi nematanhatu vachiramwa mabasa, asi kuti ivo vane zvichemo zvavowo zvisiri kugadziriswa nehurumende, zvavanoda kuti zvigadziriswe nechimbi chimbi. Vana mukoti vari kuda kuti mari dzavanotambira dziwedzerwe, uye mashandiro avo agadziriswe kuitira kuti vashande zvine chiremera, pamwe nekuti muzvipatara muve nemishonga uye zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vashande nemazvo. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vati ichokwadi kuti nhengo dzavo zhinji dzaramwa mabasa kuitira kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe nehurumende. Vati hurumende iri kutaura navo nechinangwa chekugadzirisa zvichemo izvi. Asi vati zvinenge zvavimbiswa nehurumende zvichazeyiwa nesangano ravo voona matanho ekutora. Pashanyira Studio7 zvipatara zvemuBulawayo, vana mukoti vanga vachidzokera kudzimba dzavo mangwanani, pasina basa ravaita. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association muBulawayo, VaSimangaliso Mafa, vaudza Studio 7 vati hapana zvakawanda zvavange vachikwanisa kutaura pamusoro pezvekuramwa mabasa uku sezvo vange vachipinda mumusangano patavabata parunhare. Sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions raburitsa gwaro rinoshora gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, richiti VaParirenyatwa vanofanirwa kusiya basa nekuti varatidza kukundikana kugadzirisa matambudziko munyaya dzezvehutano. Munyori mukuru weWomen’s Committee muZCTU, Amai Barbara Tanyanyiwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo rinotsigira kuramwa mabasa kwemadhokotera navana mukoti vachiti zvakakosha kuti vapiwe mugove wavo wakafanira. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuna Dr Parirenyatwa kana kuhurumende panyaya iyi. Asi hurumende inoti haina mari yekugadzirisa zviri kudiwa nebazi rezvehutano. Vanhu vakawanda vanoti kuramwa basa kwemadhokotera navana mukoti mabasa kuri kuisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji munjodzi vachiti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa nyaya iyi nekukasika. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Takunda ati ange aperekedza sekuru vake kuRichard Morris Hospital chikamu chechipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospital panorapwa vanhu maziso, asi ati vatadza kuwana rubatsiro. Nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, VaDingilizwe Tshuma, avo vanomirira Entumban/Emakhandeni mudare reparamende, vati nhengo dzeparamende dzinogara dzichitaura kuti hurumende igadzirise matambudziko akatarisana nebazi rezvehutano. Mumiriri we Bulawayo Central mudare reparamende, Amai Dorcas Sibanda,vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kukoshesa kugadzirisa matambudziko munyaya dzezvehutano pamwe nedzidzo munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti vana mukoti vari kuramwa mabasa ava vari kuwedzera matambudziko akatarisana nevarwere munyika yose, sezvo vana chiremba vanodarika chiuru chimwe chete, vari kuramwawo mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Mhemberero dzeBlack History Month dzeGore Rino Dzovhiringidzwa neCovid-19
text: Gore roga-roga vanhu vemuAmerica vanocherechedza mwedzi uno waKukadzi semwedzi wekurangarira nhoroondo yevanhu vatema vari munyika iyi, kana kuti “Black History Month.” Izvi vanozviita kuburikidza nekuungana vachiita mitambo yakasiyanasiyana pamwe nekuridza mimhanzi yenyika dzakasiyanasiyana. Mumwe wevanhu vaimbopinda mumhemberero idzi mumakore ose adarika uye vari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaJonah Masiya, avo vanoita zvemimhanzi, vanoti nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19, gore rino vari kucherechedza mwedzi uyu neimwe nzira isiri yekuungana sezvagara zvichiitwa makore ose adarika. VaMasiya, vanove zvakare mudzidzisi, vanoti makore ose adarika vaibatana nevamwe vachiridza mimhanzi yekumusha kucherechedza mwedzi uyu, asi gore rino vachange vachiridza vari kumba kwavo sevamwe vose vachizongoonekwa pamadandemutande. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba veHurumende Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa Kutanga neChitatu
text: Vamiriri vavanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende vaita musangano wechimbichimbi nemunyori mubazi rezvehutano mukutsvaga nzira dzekumisa nadzo kuramwa mabasa kwakaziviswa navanachiremba ava kuti kuchatanga svondo rino. Mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Edgar Munatsi, vanoti musangano uyu hauna zvikuru zvawaburitsa sezvo pasina kuwiriranwa kuti zvichemo zvavo zvingagadziriswa sei. Nekudaro, Doctor Munatsi vanoti nhengo dzavo dzichaenderera mberi nekuramwa mabasa nemusi weChitatu sekuzivisa kwavakaita, kunyange hazvo vachiti vachapa mukana kunhaurirano nehurumende. Vanoti hurumende iri kukundikana kugadzirisa zvinyunyuto zvavo zvikuru zvitatu zvinosanganisira nyaya yekurasikirwa nemabasa kwavanachiremba vanenge vapedza zvidzidzo. "Pane nyaya nhatu, asi yakanyanya kukosha yacho ndeyekuti vanachiremba vaenge vapedza zvidzidzo, vachinge vapedza zvidzidzo vanofanirwa kuenda kunoshanda muzvipatara zvekumamisha. Hurumende iri kuti haichakwanisa kuvapa mabasa iwayo. havana mari yekuti vange vachipa vanachiremba muhoro, vanenge vaenda kunoshanda kunzvimbo idzodzo. "Isusu tiri kunyunyuta kuti kana zvakadero hazvo hurumende yachidii kupa vanachiremba matsamba ekuti vashande vakazvimirira kana vasingakwanise kupiwa mabasa nehurumende." Doctor Munatsi vanodaro. Doctor Munatsi vanoti vasvika pakutora danho iri zvichitevera zvakabuda mukunzwa pfungwa dzenhengo dzavo mumazuva mashoma adarika. Vanachiremba vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo ava vanoti vari kudawo zvakare kuti mari dzekubatsirikana kana kuti 'on call allowances' dzitangire pamadhora mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri. Vanoti vanodawo zvakare kuti Health Service Board igadzirise nyaya yavakambowirirana yekuti vanachiremba vehurumende vasabatirwa mitero. Kana vanachiremba vakaramwa mabasa, vanenge vabatana nevehurumende yeKenya, avo vari kuramwawo mabasa kubva muna Zvita wegore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Vakoti Vanoratidzira paUnited Bulawayo Hospitals
text:
Vamwe vakoti vepachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals, UBH, varatidzira neChina mangwanani vachiti havazi kufara nemari shoma yavanowana zvisineyi kuti hurumende yakawedzera nezuro mihoro yavo nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana.

Vakoti varatidzira paUBH vanga vachiimba uye vakabata zvinyorwa zvange zvakanyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana, senzira yekuratidza kusafara kwavo nemari shoma yavanoti vari kutambira.

Sachigaro wechikamu chepaUBH chesangano reZimbabwe Nurse Association, ZINA, VaAnthony Majongosi, vati vakoti havafanirwe
kubatwa sevamwe vashandi vose vehurumende vachiti vari kuisa hupenyu
hwavo panjodzi kunyanya panguva ino pavari kushanda kuine chirwere
cheCovid-19.

Sachigaro weZINA mudunhu reBulawayo, VaNicholas Chitore, vati vana
mukoti vari kuzvipira kushanda zvisinei nekuti nguva zhinji vanenge
vasina zvikwanisiro kusanganisira mbatya dzinobatsira kudzivirira kuti
vasawana hutachiwana hwecoronavirus. Asi vati hurumende haizi
kukoshesa kuzvipira kwakadai.

Pavapedza kuratidzira vana mukoti ava vadzokera pabasa asi vakawanda
vavo vange vasingashande. Taedza kunzwa kubva kumukuru weUBH, Amai Nonhlanhla Ndlovu, asi vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Hatinawo kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti vakoti vepachipatara cheMpilo havazi kukwanisa kuratidzira sevamwe vavo nekuti vakawanda vavo vakapinda pachirongwa chekuti vasasangane nevanhu vakawanda mushure mekunge pachipatara ichi paita vanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19 mwedzi wapera.

Mune imwewo nyaya, imwe kambani yeProvidence Human Capital inove
chikamu cheInnscor Africa, nemasangano anoti I am 4 Byo Against
Covid-19 neThorngrove Benevolent Community Trust, apa zvipo
zvinosanganisira mafiriji maviri, mbatya dzekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, machira, pamwe nechikafu zvekubatsira mukurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 mukanzuru yeguta reBulawayo. Mukuru weProvidence Human Capital, Amai Buhle Ndlovu, vati vaona
zvakakodzera kuti kambani yavo iise ruoko rwayo pakubatsira kunyanya
kuchipatara cheThorngrove Hospital.

Meya weguta reBulawayo, VaSolomon Mguni, vatenda masangano aya
vakakurudzira veruzhinji kuti varambe vachichengetedza zvinokurudzirwa
nevehutano pakudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus, sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa naho huri kuramba huchikwira. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari veKuMasvingo Voronga Kuratidzira neNyaya yeKushaya Mvura Mudzimba
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevagari vemuMasvingo, re Masvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance (MURRA) pamwe nesangano rekodzero dzemadzimai, reWomen’s Coalition of Zimbabwe vanyorera kanzuru yeMasvingo gwaro renyunyuto vachiipa mazuva maviri kuti igadzirise dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura. Vagari ava vanoti vari kuronga kuratidzira kana kanzuru ikakundikana kugadzirisa dambudziko ravo. Vagari vemunzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji mudhorobha reMasvingo vave nemavhiki matatu vasina mvura mudzimba dzavo mushure mekufa kwepombi inodhonza mvura kubva mudhamu reMutirikwi. Vachitaura ne Studio 7 nhasi vesangano re Murra pamwe neWomens’Coalition vanoti vakagumbuka zvikuru nekuti kanzuru haisi kuratidza kuita chimbi chimbi nekugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Vati vave kutyira kuti zvirwere zvakaita seCholera neTyphoid zvinogona kubata vagari. Muzvare Eshter Chimanikire vanoona nezve kufambiswa kwemabasa muMurra vanoti vatora danho rekuda kuratidzira nekuti kanzuru iri kutyora kodzero dzevagari dzekuwana mvura nguva dzose. Vagari vazhinji vave kutorarama nekunwa mvura yemumatsime iyo isina kuchena. Kanzuru iri kuyedza kupawo vanhu mvura nemabhauza asi haisikukwana. Vagari vazhinji vanoti vanomukira pakati pehusiku kubata raini pa mabhauza aya ne zvibhorani zvishoma zviri munzvimbo dzavanogara. Muzvare, Joyce Mhungu, sachigaro we Women’s Coalition, mudunhu reMasvingo, vanoti nyaya yekushaikwa kwemvura iri kunyanya kubata madzimai ndosaka vanyorera kanzuru tsamba uye nekubatana nemamwe masangano kuti vazoratidzira kana Kanzuru isina kugadzirisa dambudziko iri muma awa makumi mana nemasere.
