Asi Meya weMasvingo VaCollen Maboke vanoti yakagadzirisa dambudziko iri vachiti mvura yatotanga kuwanikwa kune dzimwe nzvimbo mudhorobha. Asi vagari vazhinji vanopikisa Meya vachiti munzvimbo dzavo mvura haisati yave kubuda kunyanya vekuRunyararo West, vachiri kungomirira mabhauza nekuenda ku zvibhorani. VaHardlife Tangai nde mumwe mugari ati zviri kutaurwa na Meya hazvisi zvechokwadi. Dhorobha reMasvingo rave kugara richisangana nedambudziko remvura sezvo mishina inopomba mvura ichigara ichingofa. Muna Nyamavhuvhu vagari vakaita mwedzi wose vasina mvura nekusashanda zvakanaka kwemichina iyi.

headline: Hurumende Inonzi Haisati Yapindura Magwaro Akakwidzwa Mudare rePamusoro naVana Chiremba
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, nemunyori mukuru mubazi ravo, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vanonzi havasati vapindura magwaro ari kudare repamusoro akaendeswa navanachiremba vachiti danho ravakatora rekuvabvisira mari dzemihoro mushure mekuratidzira rainge risiri pamutemo. Kuratidzira uku kwakapfuura mavhiki maviri uye kwakatanga muna Gumiguru kukazopera muna Mbudzi. Vanachiremba vainge vakanda mapadza pasi vachiti havasi kufara nemari dzavaitambiriswa uye kushaya zvikwanisiro zvekushandisa. Sangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association rinoti vanachiremba vakabatirwa mari dzinopfuura mazana mashanu emadhora. Gweta ravanachiremba ava, VaEmmanuel Samundombe, vanoti zvakaitwa nehurumende zvekubvisira vanachiremba mari kutyora bumbiro remitemo. No media source currently available Asi hurumende mutsamba yakanyorwa naDr Gwinji yakaudza vanachiremba ava kuti kuratidzira kwavo kwainge kusiri pamutemo nekudaro vaizobatirwa mari sezvinoitirwa vanenge vaenda havo pazororo risiri pamutemo. Hurumende yave nemakore ichinetsana navanachiremba nenyaya yemari dzavanotambira asi dambudziko iri harisi kupera.

headline: IOM Inoti Vanhu Vanodarika Zviuru Mazana Maviri Vakadzokera Kumusha neKuda kweKukanganiswa kweHupfumi neCovid-19 Munyika Dzavagere
text: Sangano rinoona nezvekufamba kwevanhu kubva mune imwe nyika vachienda mune imwe, reInternational Organisation for Migration (IOM) rinoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinodarika mazana maviri ezviuru zvadzokera kumusha kubva zvatanga denda reCovid-19 muna Kukadzi 2020 zvichitevera kuoma kwehupenyu munyika dzazvange zvaenda kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro. Sangano iri rinoti richishanda pamwechete nebazi rezvehutano uye nemamwe masangano, vakakwanisa kubatsira vanhu vane chitsama kuburikidza nekuvawanisa hunyanzvi mune zvekurima, mari pamwe nezvimwe zvinodiwa muhupenyu hwemunhu kuitira kuti vakwanise kusimukira. Asi IOM inoyambira kuti kana vanhu ava vakasawana rubatsiro nekukasika, vakawanda vavo vachanyura mumatambudziko akadzama kudarika avari kutarisana nawo pari zvino, izvo zvinozotuma vamwe kuti vatsvage nzira dzekurarama nadzo dzisiri pamutemo kana kuti vabude zvakare munyika vachishandisa dzimwe nzira. Studio 7 yaedza kubata gurukota rezvemabasa nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Professor Paul Mavima, asi vati vanga vari mudare reparamende vachiti vaizopindura mibvunzo yedu kana vasununguka. Asi sachigaro vesangano rinomirira zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa, reAfrican Diaspora Forum, Doctor Vusumuzi Sibanda, vanoti havafungi kuti huwandu hwevanhu huri kutaurwa neIOM ndehwe vanhu vakadzokera kumusha nekuti vakanga vaomerwa nehupenyu. Doctor Sibanda vanoti vanhu vakawanda vanogona kunge vakashandisa mukana wekumbodzokera Covid-19 kuti vasanetseke kupinda munyika, asi vachizobuda zvakare vachishandisa dzimwe nzira. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neKukumbira Rubatsiro Vovhiringwa neCovid-19 muZimbabwe
text: Vamwe vasingaoni vanorarama nekukumbira mari mumabhazi nemumigwagwa kwaRusape vanoti vari panguva yakaoma sezvo hurumende yakambomisa kufamba kwemabhazi aya senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaTymon Rukuni vekwaRusape, vanoti kubva nemusi weSvondo apo vakapedzisira kupemha mubhazi, ndiwo musi wavakapedzisira kudya rinopisa nevana vavo vatanhatu, sezvo vasingawani kwekupemhera nekuti muguta hamuchina vanhu ukuwo kumabhazi havachadiwiko nekuda kwechirwere che-COVID-19. "Tine mhuri nine dzinorarama nekupemha asi nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus hapachina kana chichabuda nekuti mumabhazi hakuchina, chikafu hatichina nekuti kumabhazi hatichadiwi kuti tifambe ikoko. Toita seyiwo nhai," vanodaro VaRukuni. Amai Rejoice Chinembiri vekwaRusape vanoti nekusafamba kwemabhazi panguva ino, hakuna kumwe kwavanotarisira kuwana mari kunze kwekufamba nemabhazi iwaya vachikumbira rubatsiro. 'Tinosipinda mumabhazi tikukumbira, towana tumari totenga tuhupfu tuTsunami nemuriwo todya nevana kumba. Zvino izvezvi mabhazi akamiswa hatina kana pekutangira. Tamboenda kwaMP wedu kuti tibatsirwe tikazoenda kuSocial Welfare asi tangonyorwa mazita hatina kupihwa kana chipunu chehupfu chaicho," Amai Chinembiri vanotsanangura. VaNhamo Makusha vanoti sevanhu vanorara nechavawana musi iwoyo, hapana zvazvichareva kana vachirambidzwa kupemha munzvimbo dzemuguta kana mumadutavanhu sezviri kuitika panguva ino yeLockdown. "PaLockdown apa patidhisiadhivhandeja nekuti sevanhu vanotsvaga mumabhazi, nekuti hatina chatinacho, zvichireva kuti takapedzisira kupemha Sunday apo pakaguma kufamba mabhazi acho uye pari zvino hatichabvumirwi kukwira mabhazi acho, takapedzisira kudya musi iwoyo weSunday," vadaro VaMakusha Mumiriri weMakoni Central mudare reparemende, VaDavid Tekeshe, vanoti vari kuedza nepavanogona napo kuti mhuri dzevasingaoni idzi dziwane rubatsiro asi zviri kutora nguva refu. "Ndatouya nemuriwo izvezvi kwavari ndichiti pamwe vangabatsirikana sezvo vange vakanzi vanokwanisa kubatsirwa kumapurisa asi hapana chabuda ikoko vakanzi vaende kuWelfare asi vangonyorwa mazita chete pasina chabuda. Vanhu ava vanoti vakapedzisira kupemha Sunday apo vakakwanisa kutenga katsaona kekudya musi wacho. Vanhu ava vari pa desperate havana chekudya vanotoda rubatsiro," vanodaro VaTekeshe. Dambudziko rakatarisana nevanhu ava idambudziko rakatarisanawo nevanhu vakawanda munyika yose vanga vachipona nekukumbira rubatsiro mumigwagwa nemumabhazi. Zimbabwe ine vanhu vangangosvika zviuru mazana mashanu vasingaoni, vazhinji vavo vachipona nekukumbira rubatsiro sezvo munyika musina mabasa akawanda nepamusana pekuparara kwaita hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kubatsira Munguva yeCovid-19 neMari Yakasara Mubhajeti yeRTG's 9,8 Billion
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti ibatsire vanhu vave kuda kunonga svosve nemuromo nekuda kwekurudziro yekuti vagare mudzimba nekuda kwekupararira zvinotyisa kwoita chirwere cheCovid-19. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vanoti hurumende ine mari inodarika mabhiriyoni mapfumbamwe nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 9,8 billion parutivi kana kuti budget surplus zvakonzerwa nekugona kwayo kushandisa mari zvine mwero. Munyori mukuru wesangano revanotengesa mumigwagwa reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Associations, VaWisborn Malaya, vanoti vanozviitira mabasa emaoko vari kunetseka uye vanoda rubatsiro. Vati sesangano vari kuyedzawo kubatsira vanhu asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. VaMalaya vati hapana hurongwa huripo kubva kuhurumende. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemagariro evanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, sesvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti ishandise mari iyi kubatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe vasiri kukwanisa kuenda kumabasa panguva iyo vamwe vemabhizimisi vave kukwidza mitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro uye kuwedzera mari dzemba nedzekufambisa. Mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Godfrey Kanyenze, vati vanhu vanoda rubatsiro. Vati izvi zvinokwanisa kuitwa muhurukuro dzeTrripartite Negotiating Forum dzinounza pamwe chete hurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iite muonero wetwiza vachiti chikuru chinoda kuitwa kuti patengwe nhomba dzakawanda dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kuti vanhu vazokwanise kudzokera kumabasa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti mhando yechirwere cheCovid-19 yopararira munyika iko zvino yeDelta variant inotapuriranwa zviri nyore uye iri kuuraya vanhu vakawandidsa kudarika dzimwe mhando dzose. Mabhanga anokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino akaita seWorld Bank neInternational Monetary Fund anoti hupfumi hwenyika dzepasi rino huri kukanganiswa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid-19. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti ibatsire vanhu vave kuda kunonga svosve nemuromo nekuda kwekurudziro yekuti vagare mudzimba nekuda kwekupararira zvinotyisa kwoita chirwere cheCovid-19.  No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzoshushikana neKushomeka kweVanhu Vari Kubaiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Nyanzvi dzezvehutano dzinoti dziri kushushikana zvikuru nekushomeka kwevanhu vari kuzvipira kubaiwa nhomba yekudzvirira Covid-19 kunyange hazvo pave nezvirongwa zviviri zviri kufambiswa nguva imwe chete zvinoti Phase 1 ne Phase 2. Nemusi weChina vanhu vanokwana mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu, kana kuti 395, ndivo chete vakazvipira kubaiwa nhomba iyi, kuchitiwo nemusi weChitatu vanhu makumi mashanu nevanomwe, 57, ndivo bedzi vakabaiwa nyika yose. Huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba kubva patanga chirongwa ichi hwakasvika pazviuru makumi mana nevaviri, kana kuti 40 002. Phase 1 yakanangana nekubayiwa kwevashandi vari mune zvehutano, mapurisa nemauto pamwe nevanoshanda kumiganhu yenyika, kuchitiwo Phase 2 ichinanganawo nekubayiwa kwevarairidzi, vashandi vemumahotera, vemakereke, pamwe nevakwegura. Vashandi vezvehutano ndevamwe vanonzi havasi kuzvipira kubaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 yeSinoPharm yakabva kuChina iyi. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti ine tarisiro yekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana. Asi mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti kana pakasave nedzidziso yakasimba chikamu chepiri chePhase chinogona zvakare kuita sechikamu chekutanga kushaya vanhu vanozvipira kunobayiwa. VaRusike vanoti havaone hurumende ichisvika pamamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevana veZimbabwe, zvainotarisira kuti zvichabaiwa nhomba iyi nyika yose kunze kwekunge yashanda zvakasimba nemasangano evashandi mukushambadza nhomba iyi kuti itambirike muvanhu. Asi mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvirongwa zvekubaya vanhu nhomba zviri kufamba hazvo zvakanaka, uye vakaparurawo zvirongwa zvekukwezva veruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhomba iyi, izvo zvave kuitawo kuti vashandi vari muboka rezvehutano vakawanda vatambire nhomba iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Zvimwe Zvikoro Zvorambidza Vabereki Kushanyira Vana Vavo Pachityirwa Korera
text: Zvimwe zvikoro zvakaita seChinhoyi High mudunhu reMashonaland West zvave kurambidza vabereki vane vana vanodzidza vachigara muzvikoro izvi kushanyira vana vavo kana kuvaigira chikafu senzira yekudziviri kupararira kwechirwere chekorera. Mumwe wevanochengeta vana vanodzidza vachigara pachikoro cheChinhoyi High asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatori venhau ati hapana mubereki ari kubvumidzwa kuuya pachikoro apa, uye hapana chikafu chekunze chiri kubvumidzwa pachikoro apa. Muchengeti wevana uyu ati pachikoro apa pane dambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura zvekuti vehutano vakavabvakachira vachiona kuti zvakamira sei pachikoro. Mumwe mubereki, VaSimon Moyo, avo vanga vauya kuzoona mwana wavo vaine zvekudya, vati varambidzwa. Vatiwo vakuru vechikoro vanofanirwa kupatsanura zvekudya zvingangoita korera kwete kurambidza zvekudya zvese zvese nezvinenge zvatengwa muzvitoro. Zvichakadaro, vamwe vanotengesa zvinhu muChinhoyi vashoropodza hurongwa hwekanzuru hwekubhadharisa zvimbuzi uye kuti vatengesere pedyo nezvimbuzi. VaKillian Mashoko vati kanzuru inofanirwa kumbomisa kubhadhariswa kwezvimbuzi zviri munzvimbo dzekutandarira mudhorobha. VaMashoko vati kanzuru haifanirwe kupa vanhu pekutengesera pedyo nezvimbuzi izvo vanoti hazvina hutano. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rekanzuru yeChinhoyi panyaya iyi. Hurumende yakambomisa kuungana kwevanhu vakawanda panzvimbo imwechete nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chekorera icho chauraya vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri munyika pari zvino. Chirongwa cheZimbabwe International Book Fair changa chichifanirwa kutanga muHarare neMuvhuro, chakambomiswa nekuda kwechirwere chekorera icho chatekeshera muHarare, zvikuru munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji dzeGlen View neBudiriro. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chopararira Zvikuru kuMaruwa
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti vana vechikoro vari kudzoka kumusha mushure mekuvharwa kwezvikoro ndivo vamwe vari kubatsira kuparardzira chirwere ichi kumaruwa sezvo chirwere ichi chave kunetsa muzvikoro. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vakaudza Studio 7 pakupera kwesvondo kuti bazi ravo riri kurwadziwa zvakanyanya nekufa kuri kuramba kuchiita vanhu munyika zvichikonzerwa neCovid-19. Dr Madzorera vanoti hurumende iri kuedza kudzikisa huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi asi vachiti vanhu kumaruwa vanofanirwa kupihwa ruzivo rwakawanda pamusoro pechirwere ichi sezvo vaimbofunga kuti ichi chirwere chevanhu vemumadhorobha chete. No media source currently available

headline: Zvimwe Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze Zvotevedzerawo Kurudziro yeKudzivirira Covid-19 muMabasa
text: Nyika dzakawanda pasi rose, idzo dzakambenge dzambovhara senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, dzakatanga kubvumidza kuvhurwa zvishoma zvishoma kwemakambani akasiyanasiyana paine kurudziro yekuti vashandi nevashandirwi vatevedzere mitemo yakatarwa inodzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Matanho aya akaonawo vana veZimbabwe vari munyika dzakasiyanasiyana vachidzokerawo kumabasa kwavo vachiedzawo chose kuti vatevere mitemo yehutano hwakanaka mumabasa mavanoshanda, inosanganisira kupfeka nhumbi dzinodzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere, kugeza maoko nesipo uye kusiya mikaha pakati pavo. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chakaitawo rombo rakanaka rekudzokera kubasa ndaVaPhainos Chikunda, avo vari kuPort Elizabeth, kuSouth Africa. VaChikunda vanoti kubva pavakadzokera kubasa, sevashandi vari kutora matanho anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organisation ekuona kuti vazviidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19, kungave kubasa kana kumba. Vanoti pavanosvika pabasa mangwanani oga oga vanovhenekwa kuona kuti havasi kupisa miviri here, vogeza maoko nesipo uye kuzora maoko avo mushonga unouraya hutachiwana. Vanotiwo mushandi wese anenge akavhara muromo nemhino, vachivhenekwa zvakare vave pabasa. Vamwe vari kunze vari kuunganidzawo mari nezvekudya zvekubatsira zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kutambura munguva ino yeCovid-19 zvisati zvakwanisa kudzokera kumabasa. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kuitikawo muSouth Africa umo vanhu vakabatana kubatsira vari kushaya. VaChikunda vanotiwo munyika iyi mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda chose zvisati zvadzokera kumabasa, izvo zviri kuita kuti vakawanda vanonge svosve nemuromo. Asi vanoti zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe pamwe nevemakereke nevemamwe masangano anobatsira vari kuedza kuunganidza rubatsiro pamwe nezvekudya zvekubatsira vari kutambura ava, vamwe vachitobatsirwa kubhadhara mari dzepekugara. Chinonzi chiri kunyanya kunetsa ndechekuti hurumende yeSouth Africa haisi kubatsira vasiri zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voomerwa neHupenyu Sezvo Vanotengesa Mishonga Vovhara Zvitoro
text: Zvimwe zvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga kana kuti mapharmacies zviri kuvharwa kune dzimwe nzvimbo nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Sangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights (ZADHR) rinoti bazi rezvehutano riri panguva yakaoma nemamirirro akaita zvinhu munyika. Mutungamiri we sangano rePharmaceutical Society of Zimbabwe (PSZ), Amai Portia Mwendera vanoti kushaikwa kwemari yekuti vatenge mishonga nezvinodiwa kugadzira mishonga munyika ndizvo zvauraya basa revanotengesa nekugadzira mishonga. Sangano reZimbabwe Diabetes Association, rinotungamirirwa nevave mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Doctor John Chamunorwa mangwiro rinoti riri kushingirira kutsvaga nzira dzekubatsira nadzo varwere veshuga kuti vawane mishonga pachena senzira yekubatsira varwere munyika. Doctor mangwiro vati vakabatikana uye havakwanisi kutaura zvizhinji maerrano nekushaikwa kwemishonga munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemishonga vachishanda nekambani yeAfro Pham Pharmacies, VaMartin Chinembiri vanoti kana bhanga guru renyika re RBZ rikasagadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika kuti vemakambani nezvitoro vagone kuwana mari dze kuAmerica dzinodiwa kuti vahodhe zvakanaka, hapana chinofamba. Vanotiwo izvi zviri kusiya varwere vakaomerwa ne hupenyu. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vofa Munjodzi Dziri Kuitika Husiku paZororo reKisimusi
text: Mutauriri wemapurisa Chief Supritendant Paul Nyathi vari kukurudzira vatyairi kuti vafambe kwakachena nekuti husiku kwave kuitika njodzi dzakawandisa mumigwagwa pazororo rino rekisimusi izvo zvapa kuti vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vashaye. Mapurisa anoti vatyairi pachezvavo ndivo vari kukonzerawo njodzi nekusatevedzera mitemo yemumigwagwa. Dunhu reMasvingo ndiro rine vanhu vakawanda vashaya avo vari kusvika gumi nevashanu, kuchitevera Matebelalnd South ine gumi, kwouya Harare ne Mashonaland East dzine vanhu vasere vashaya. Mashonaland Central ine munhu mumwe chete. Vanhu vafa pazororo rekisimusi gore rino vakawandisa kudarika gore rapera apo pakafa vanhu makumi mashanu nevatanhatu. Vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mana nevatatu vashaya zvichienzaniswa nevanhu mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana gore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa kuNgwarira Mushonga weCovid Kubva kuRussia
text: Bepanhau reHerald rinoti Zimbabwe neRussia dziri kuronga kudyidzana munyaya yekutsvaga mushonga wekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 nezvimwe . Izvi zvinotevera kupihwa nemusi weSvondo, kweZimbabwe zvikwanisiro zvekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus nemishonga neRussia nemumiriri wenyika iyi muZimbabwe VaNikolai Krasilnikov. Vachitambira zvipo izvi, VaMangwiro vakatenda Russia vakati Zimbabwe inoda chose kudyidzana nenyika iyi munyaya dzemishonga. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kungwarira mishonga inobva kuRussia iyo yakazviti yawana nhomba yekurapa Covid-19 inonzi Sputnik-V. Asi nyika dzakawanda dzinosanganisira Germany, France, Spain neAmerica dzinoti nhomba iyi yakangoitwa zvechimbi chimbi pasina kutevedzera zvose zvinodiwa. Bazi reUnited Nations reWorld Health Organization rinotiwo richiri kuda kuongorora mushonga uyu. Russia iri kuti hayo nyika idzi dziri kuita godo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga kuti tinzwe kuti Zimbabwe yakapihwa mushonga upi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzezvehutano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti Zimbabwe haifanire kungobvuma mishonga kubva kuRussia pasina kunyatsotsvakurudza nezvemishonga yacho. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoti Vashandi Vayo Vakabaiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Ndivo Chete Vachabvumidzwa kuMabasa
text: Hurumende inonzi yakasunga neChipiri kuti vashandi vose vehurumende vachabvumidzwa kuenda kumabasa chete kana vachinge vakabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 ichiti vakapiwa nguva yakareba yekuti vakwanise kubaiwa. Izvi zvakaziviswa negurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota muHarare. Vemakereke vanonziwo vave kubvumidzwa kupinza chidimbu chepakati chenhengo dzekereke dzavo kana chete vatendi ava vakabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19. Mamwe makungano akaita semichato nendufu anonzi vanhu vanobvumidzwa kuungana vachiri pazana sezvo zvichinzi zvinonetsa kuona kuti vanhu vari kuungana vakabaiwa nhomba here kana kuti kwete. Amai Mutsvangwa vakatiwo hurumende yabvumidzawo kutanga kwemitambo yose, uye nguva dzemitambo dzakaiswa pakati penguva dza 6 dzemangwanani nenguva dza 8 dzemanheru kuitira kupa mukana vanoenda kumabasa. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChipiri kuti vanhu vanomwe (7) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose, uye vamwe vanhu mazana mana negumi nevasere (418) vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvina zvine mazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu kana kuti (4 550). Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga hwakasvika pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu nemazana masere ane gumi nevanomwe kana kuti (126 817). Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti huwandu hwevanhu vakabatwa vaine chirwere ichi hwakawanikwa mumatunhu anoti Mashonaland East, Midlands, Matabeleland South neMasvingo, uko kwakwawanikwa vana vechikoro vakawanda vaine Covid-19. Kusvika pakupera kwezuva neChipiri, vanhu vakanga vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamirioni maviri ane zviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nezvitatu nemazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu kana kuti (2, million 873,893). Vakanga vabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri vakanga vave miriyoni imwe chete, ine zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mana nevanomwe kana kuti (1,926,247). Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

headline: Coronavirus Youraya Vanhu Vanodarika Mazana Mana muAfrica
text: Zimbabwe nhasi yapinda muzuva rechipfumbamwe vanhu vachikurudzirwa kugara mudzimba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus icho chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvitatu pasi rose. MuZimbabwe mune vanhu gumi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi uye mumwe chete akafa.Vachitaura neStudio 7, mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Prosper Chonzi vati vari kutyira zvikuru kuti vanhu zviuru gumi nezvitatu vakabva kuSouth Africa painge ponzi vanhu munyika iyi vagare mudzimba vanogona kuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vachabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Vatiwo huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere hunogona kunge wakaderera nekuti varikuvhenekwa vachiri vashoma. Mashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kusangano rinoongorora nyaya dzezvirwere reAfrica Centres for Disease Control Prevention anoratidza kuti muAfrica mafa vanhu vanodarika mazana mana nemakumi mana nevaviri. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vadarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana mana uye vakawanda vacho vari muSouth Africa umo mafawo vanhu gumi nemumwe chete kusvika parizvino. Dunhu reSADC rine vanhu vanodarika chiuru chimwe chete nemazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Asi kunyika dzekumawirira ndiko kune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwaJohns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iri kuongorora chirwere ichi inoti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana maviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi. America iyo ine vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi vafa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi kunyangwe vakawanda vafa pasi rose vachiri vekuItaly kwashaya vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu nemazana mashanu. Mutungamiri wehurumende yeBritain VaBoris Johnson avo vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vaendeswa kunorapwa vari kurwarisa kana kuti Intensive Care Unit mushure mekusimbirwa zvakanyanya nechirwere ichi. Kunyangwe zviri pachena kuti kukurudzira vanhu kuti vagare mudzimba kunobatsira kuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vanofa nechirwere ichi, vamwe muZimbabwe vave kugunun’una kuti vave kufa nenzara sezvo vemabhizimisi vakawedzera mitengo yezvekudya zvakanyanya.

headline: Zimbabwe Yocherechedza Zuva reVane Chirwere chePfungwa
text: Zimbabwe nhasi yabatana nedzimwe nyika kucherechedza zuva revane chirwere chepfungwa. Vachitaura pagungano rekucherechedza zuva iri kana kuti World Mental Health Day muHarare, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Doctor John Chamunorwa Mangwiro vati hurumende yakazvipira kubatsira vane chirwere ichi asiwo vachichema chema nekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka munyika izvo zvinonzi zvinowedzerawo dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa. Mukuru wesangano rakazvimiririra reZimbabwe Obsessive Compulsive Disorder Zimbabwe (OCD) Trust, Amai Angelica Mukorongo, avo vane dambudziko rechirwere ichi vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasadzikisira pasi vane zvirwere zvepfungwa vachiti zvakangofanana nezvimwe zvirwere. Amai Mukorongo vachemachemawo vachiti vazhinji vane zvirwere zvepfungwa havasi kuwana mishonga muzvipatara zvehurumende vakati dai hurumende yawanisa mishonga yezvirwere zvepfungwa pachena. Asi VaMangwiro vati hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuona kuti mishonga yezvirwere zvepfungwa yawanikwa zviri nyore munyika. Amai Babra Machando vanoshanda nesangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation vati dambudziko reCovid-19 rakawedzerawo kuwanda kwezvirwere zvepfungwa vachiti zvakakosha kuti vanhu ava vawane rubatsiro. Muzvare Batsirai Chiedza Muchochomi vanoshandawo nesangano rinobatsira vane zvirwere zvepfungwa rinonzi Insight Wellbeing vati dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa rinobata munhu chero upi zvake vachitiwo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vazive kuti zvirwere izvi zvinorapika. Zuva reWorld Mental Health Day rinocherechedzwa musi wa 10 Gumiguru pasi rese. Mhemberero dzanhasi dzaitwa panine kurudziro yekuti pasi rese rikoshese hutano hwepfungwa. World Health Organization inoti muAfrica, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri kana kuti 792 million vane chirwere chepfungwa. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voshaya Vanovabatsira Muzvipatara Zvikuru zveHurumende
text: Zvinhu zvave kuramba zvichiita manyama amire nerongo muzvipatara zvikuru muguta reBulawayo mushure mekunge vana mukoti nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara vatangawo kuramwa mabasa senzira yekupa rutsigiro kuna vanachiremba vave nemasvondo maviri vachiramwa mabasa. Studio 7 payasvika pachipatara cheMpilo Central Hospital yawana panzvimbo dzinorapirwa vanhu vanobva kumba kana kuti Outpatient Department pamwe neCasualty Department paine vanhu vashoma zvikuru. Vanhu vazoudzwa kunzi vadzokere kudzimba dzavo mushure mekunge vana mukoti nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vaita musangano apo vatora chisungo chekutanga kuramwawo mabasa senzira yekutsigira vana chiremba avo vakatanga kuramwa mabasa masvondo maviri apfuura. Mumwe murume asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati kubva nemusi weMuvhuro ange achiuya nababa vake kuti vazoongororwa navana chiremba paMpilo asi vasingawane rubatsiro. Murume uyu ati hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara. Muzvare Dorcas Mpofu avo vange vaperekedza sekuru vavo kuti vazorapwawo paMpilo vati havachaziva zvekuita vakatsinhirawo kuti dai hurumende yaona zvaingaita. Mukuru waana chiremba paMpilo Hospital, Dr Solwayo Ngwenya, vati chimwe chikamu chishoma chavanachiremba chakauya kubasa asi vabvuma kuti vana chiremba pamwe nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara havazi kufara uye vakawanda vavo havana kuuya kubasa nemusi weChitatu zvekuti zvinhu zvikaramba zvakadaro, hupenyu hweveruzhinji hunenge hwave munjodzi. Pamashoko ari kubuda mumapepanhau ehurumende ekuti hurumende iri kuunza vana chiremba vemuchiuto muzvipatara, Dr Ngwenya vati havasati vanzwa nezvavo. Sangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association rakaita musangano nezuro muHarare pamwe nemasangano anomirira vashandi vemuzvipatara, vakatora danho rekutangawo kuramwa mabasa kutanga nhasi. Mamiriro ezvhinhu paUnited Bulawayo Hospitals ange ari mamwe chete vana chiremba vakawanda vasiri pabasa uye vanoziva zviri kuitika vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana mukoti vakawanda vange vasiri pabasa. Mumwe murume wechikuru, VaMabuku Ndlovu, avo vange vauya kuti vazoonekwa nachiremba paUBH vati vaudzwa kuti havakwanise kuonekwa nekuti vana chiremba vange vasiri pabasa. Mukuru wavana chiremba pachipatara ichi, Dr Narcisius Dzvanga, vati havakwanise kutaura nesu sezvo vange vari mumusangano. Vana chiremba vakawedzera kuramwa kwavo mabasa zvichitevera kupambwa kwakaita Dr Peter Magombeyi avo vange vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vana Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChishanu kuti vanhu vana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 1,496. Vanhu makumi mana nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu zvine mazana mana nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 36,424. Vanhu makumi maviri nevana kana kuti 24 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvichireva kuti vapora kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nematatu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 33, 996. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 931. Zvichakadaro, huwandu hwevashandi vemuzvipatara nevamwe vanoita mabasa anopa kuti vasangane neveruzhinji vabayiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina vasvika zviuru makumi matatatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi masere nevatatu kana kuti 36, 283. Kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere ichi huri kuramba huchidzikira munyika nepasi rose, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Edgar Munatsi vanoti vanhu havafanire kurivara. African Union Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana kana kuti 4 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vadarika zana nemanomwe rezvuiru kana kuti 107, 000. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 3, 5 million. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika zana remamiriyoni rine gumi nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 119 million. Pasi Rose Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti kuti 532, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 29 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 2,6 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe zvine zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 67,5 million. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yozeya Mhinduro dzeVashandirwi Vari Kutsigira Kumakidzwa kweVashandi Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo ,vanoti ivo nemagweta avo vatanga kuzeya mhinduro dzemapazi nemakambani ehurumende apindura panyaya yavakakwidza kumatare yekuti vashandi vasamanikidzwa kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo kuita izvi kuchityora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. No media source currently available Vakaendeswa kumatare ava vanonzi vakati vashandi vasina kubayiwea nhomba vamire kuuuya kubasa. Vakaendeswa kumatare vanosanganisira gurukota rezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavima; gweta guru rehurumende, VaPrince Machaya; makambani anoti ZIMNAT Insurance, Zimbabwe National Road Administration (ZINARA), TelOne, Windmill, SEEDCO Zimbabwe nechikoro cheManicaland State University. Mukupindura zvakaturwa neZCTU kumatare, VaMachaya vati havazivi kuti sei ivo negurukota rezvevashandi vakapinzwa munyaya iyi nekuti handivo vanoudza vashandi kana makambani zvekuita panyaya dzakadai. VaMavima vaudza Studio7 kuti vakamboyedza kuti vataurirane neZCTU asi zvakaramba asi vachiti zvakakosha kuti vashandi vabayiwe nhomba. No media source currently available Kambani yeTelOne inoti nyaya iyi haifanire kunzwikwa nechimbi chimbi ichiti ZCTU yakatora mavhiki matatu kuiendesa kumatare zvinoratidza kuti hayaifunga kuti yakakosha zvekunzwikwa nechimbi chimbi.

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzinoti Dambudziko reMbereko Rinokonzerwa neZvakawanda
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti vanhu vazhinji vanofunga kuti kushaya mbereko munyama, kana kuti kutukwa naMwari, izvo zvinoita kuti vagare vasina mufaro munyika. Nyanzvi dzehutano dzinoti pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zvinoita kuti vanhu vaviri vatadze kuita vana sokuronga kwavanenge vakaita pavanenge varoorana. Mumwe mudzimai akasangana nedambudziko rekutadza kuita mbereko, Amai Sencia Maponga, vanoti vakaroorwa mugore 1989, asi vakapedza gore vasina kubata pamuviri, vachingoti zvichazongoita chete. Amai Maponga vanoti murume wavo hapana zvaaimbotaura nezvenyaya yokuita vana asi zvakazochinja nenzira yavasina kumbofungira vakasvika pokuzorambana. Amai Maponga vanoti vasati vatombofunga kuti vaitove nedambiko rekushaya mbereko, tezvara vavo vakauya mumba mavairara nemurume wavo vakawaranyurwa kuti vabude mumagumbeze vasina kana kumbopfeka vachitukwa nemashoko asinganyoreke. Amai Maponga vanoti nyaya iyo yakavarwadza uye vakajekeserwa kuti kana usina mwana hama nevanhu vemunharaunda vanokuona semunhu asina basa kana chiremerera. Amai Maponga vanoti vanosarurwa nekutarisirwa pasi zvokuti vakatombopindwa nepfungwa yokuda kuzviuraya. Mumwe mudzimai, Amai Tracy Sanudi vekuKambuzuma, vanoti vakaroorwa mugore 1977 vakashaya mbereko zvokuti vakamboedza kutsvaga rubatsiro kuzvipatara, maporofita nekun’anga, asi zvakaramba. Asi Amai Sanudi vanoti vakaita rombo rakanaka rokuti murume wavo haana kuvaramba zvokuti vagere zvakanaka chero zvazvo hama dzemurume dzichitaura mashoko anorwadza nenyaya yavo yekushaya mbereko. No media source currently available  Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekuita mbereko, uye vachishanda mubazi rehutano, Dr Robert Madzima, vanoti kushaya mbereko mudzimba rave dambudziko guru riri kusangana nevanhu vakawanda munyika izvo zvakapa kuti hurumende iparure chirongwa chitsva chakanangana nevanhu vanoshaya mbereko. Dr Madzima vanoti bazi ravo harina chirongwa chekuongorora vanhu kuti vanokwanisa here kuita mbereko muzvipatara zvaro, izvo zvinoita kuti pasave nezvinyorwa zvinoratidza kuti vanhu vangani vane dambudziko irori sezvo donzvo rebazi rehutano raiva rakanyanya kunangana nechirongwa chekuronga mhuri chete. Dr Madzima vanoti kunyange hazvo kuine vamwe vanhu vanozvarwa vasingakwanise kuita mbereko, vazhinji vanoshaya mbereko nemhosva yezvirwere zvepabonde. Dr Madzima vanoti havasi vakadzi chete vanotadza kuita mbereko. Dr Mudzima vanoti varume vanokwanisa kuita dambudziko iri zvakanyanya, asi vazhinji vavo havade kubuda pachena. Kubudikidza nekubuda pachena kwakaita Amai Maponga nezvedambudziko rekushaya mbereko, vanoti zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvakavachaira runhare musi wavakabuda panhepfenyuro vachitaura nyaya yavo, izvo zvakazoita kuti vatange sangano rinonzi "Hannah’s Tears", iro rinonyaradza vakadzi vanenge vasangana nedambudziko rokushaya mbereko. Senzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko iri, gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obediah Moyo, vanoti pane chikwata chevanachiremba vakatumwa nehurumende mhiri kwemakungwa kunodzidzira zvokuuchika vana kuitira kuti vazobatsira vanoshaya mbereko muZimbabwe kuitira kuti vakwanisewo kuita vana vavo.

headline: Vakoti Vari paMudyandigere Votsvagirwa Mari yeKuti Vadzoke Kuzobatsira Kubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangawana vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vati dare remakutukota nemusi weChipiri rakati richaongorora mari dziri kupihwa vari kubaya nhomba senzira yekukwezva vamwe kuti vaite basa iri. Vakatiwo Health Services Board yakanyora tsamba kubazi rezvemari kuti ipihwe mari yekupa vakoti vari pamudyandigere vari kuda kunzi vabatsire mukubaya vanhu nhomba sezvo bazi rezvehutano riine vashandi vashoma. Dare remakurukota iri rakapawo mvumo makirinika nezvipatara zvakazvimirira kuti zvitange kubaya nhomba pachena zvozopihwa mari yevanenge vaita basa racho chete nehurumende. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kekutanga vave miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevana zvine mazana manomwe negumi kana kuti 1, 677, 710. Vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere nemazama masere nemakumi masere kana kuti 798, 880. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti neChipiri vanhu makumi mashanu nevaviri(52) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Izvi zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera hwave zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 3,635. Vamwe chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 309 vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi nemusi weChipiri wakare, zvichisiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zana negumi zvine mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nemashanu kana kuti 110, 855. Vanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nemashanu kana 2 755 zvasiya vapora kubva gore rapera vave zviuru makumi manomwe nemapfumbamwe nemazana mana nemakumi maviri kana kuti 79, 420.

headline: Vari kuMaruwa Vokurudzirwa Kuzvidzivirira kuCovid-19
text: Kunyange hazvo denda reCovid-19 richiri munyika vanhu vakawanda kumaruwa ekuMashonaland East anosanganisira Murehwa vari kufamba vasina kuzvidzivirira kuchirwere ichi izvo zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzehutano zvinogona kukonzora kuparararira kwechirwere ichi. Vanhu vakawanda vekumaruwa vanoona sekuti vanhu vemumadhorobha ndivo vanonyanyobatwa neCovid-19. VaIrimai Chakaza, avo vanogara kuMurehwa West, vanoti vanhu vakawanda munzvimbo yavo havakosheshi zvekupfeka mamasiki munguva ino yekurwisa chirwere che Covid-19. VaChakaza vanoti vanozviza kuti chirwere ichi chinouraya asi havasati vaona pachakauraya izvo vati zviri kukonzera veruzhinji kuti vasatora matanho anokurudzirwa kupararira kwacho. Mumwe mugari, VaTakunda Mabaya, vanoti hapana kurudziro yakanyanya iri kuitwa kumaruwa sezvinoitwa kumadhorobha. Vanoti izvi ndizvo zviri kuita kuti vasaite hany’a nekutora matanho ekuzvidzivirira. Asi vachitaura nevatsigiri vebato ravo muzvimbo iyi, murongi wemisangano muMDC Alliance, VaAmos Chibaya, vakayambira vagari ava kuti vakoshese zvavanoudzwa nenyanzvi pamusoro pechirwere ichi vachiti chinouraya. Imwe nhengo yerimwe sangano rinoshandira kumaruwa eChipinge neChimanimani, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vanoti dambudziko rekusapfeka mamasiki ririko kwavanoshandira uye vanorwisana naro zuva nezuva. Vatiwo zvinoburitswa muongororo dziri kuitwa pamusoro pechirwere ichi zuva nezuva zvinoratiddza kuti chirwere ichi chakawandira kumaguta akaita seHarare neBulawayo izvo zvave kuita kuti vanhu varivare kumaruwa. Vaombove gurukota rezvehutano panguya yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Stduio7 kuti zviri kuitika kumaruwa zvine ngozi yakakura. Dr Madzorera vanoti dambudziko iri rinowanikwawo mumisha inogara veruzhinji mumaguta uye chirwere ichi chinogona kuputika zvakare kana vanhu vakarega kutevedza zvakatarwa nebazi rezvehutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation pakudzivirira Covid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Vasingaone Vopomera Kanzuru yeHarare Mhosva yeKutyora Kodzero Dzavo
text: Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vasingaone vapa chikumbiro kukanzuru yeguta iri chekuti vawane mashoko pamusoro pezvirongwa zvainoita. Mushamarari uye vasinaone VaLiberty Mkhululi Lupahla vanoti vasingaone havasi kuwana mashoko pamusoro pemisangano yekanzuru nezviziviso nekuti zvinyorwa zvacho zvakagadzirirwa vanoona chete, "Ngatizivei kuti vanhu vasingaone vagari vemumaguta semunhu wese muZimbabwe." Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Saka zvinhu zvakakodzera kuti pese panoumbwa hurongwa hwakakosha zvizivikanwe nemunhu wese." VaLupahla vanoti vasingaone vane kodzero yekuva mukati mehurongwa hweguta sezvakangoitawo vamwe, "Asi muchaona kuti ma budgets acho anenge akanyorwa ne print kwete braille kana kutaurwawo zvazvo nenzira inonzwikwa neveruzhinji." Vatizve, "Zvinonetsa nekuti vakaremara vanenge vachida kunzwawo hurongwa hweguta ravo sevanhu vanobhadhara mitero yakasiyana siyana. Saka kana ma budgets achiitwa ivo vasingazive zvinoti netsei nekuti vanoitwa sevana vadiki" VaAbraham Mateta igweta uye vasingaone vanoti dambudziko rekubatwa nekuseri kweruoko rinopera chete kana vakaremara vane hunyanzvi vakapinzwa mabasa mukanzuru. "Kana pane vanomiririra kodzero dzevakaremara mukanzuru vanezenge vachiona kuti vanhu vasingaone vanodawo runyoro rwe braille pamwe nekugadzira zvimwe zvishambadzo nemashoko zvinozobatsira vasingaone." VaMateta vanoti kanzuru iri kutyora mutemo wenyika pamwe nekodzero dzakatenderanwa nenyika dzepasi rose kana kuti Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities pakushayisa vasingaone mukana wekuti vawane mashoko. "Vemakanzuru vanofanira kuziva kuti bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinotaura kuti muhurongwa hwebudiriro zvishuwo zvevakaremara zvinofanira kunge riri rimwe dingindira rinofanira kutarisiswa." Muzvinafundo Tafara Marazi vepa University of Zimbabwe vanotungamirira sangano revasingaone reVisually-Impaired Persons Support vanotiwo vasingaone vane hunyanzvi hwekugadzira mutauro we braille vanofanira kuwaniswa mukana mukanzuru, "Vamwe vedu vane hunyanzvi vari kutopemha mudzinzira." Vaenderera mberi vachiti, "Dai zvaiita vanhu vakadaro vawaniswa mukana wekugadzira braille toraramawo hupenyu hunoraramwa nevamwe hwekuwana mashoko." Meya veguta reHarare vaJacob Mafume vatambira mashoko evasingaone vakati kanzuru ichatora matanho nekukurumidza ekuzvigadzirisa, "Ichokwadi kuti zvinyorwa zvedu hazvibude muzvinyorwa zvebraille." Vawedzera vachiti, " Zvimwe zvinhu zvinenge zvichida kuti munhu uzviwerengere. Tichaedza nepese patinogona kuti tizvigadzirise.: .

headline: Hurumende Yomisa Basa Vashandi Vayo Vose Vasina Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Hurumende inoti kutanga neMuvhuro uno vashandi vose vehurumende vasina kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 havasi kuzobvumidzwa kushanda uye havatembire mari. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashandi vakapihwa nguva yakakwana yekubayiwa nhomba uye vasina vari kuzomiswa basa nekuti vanenge votyora mutemo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti uku kuyedza kuda kumanikidza vari kuzengurira kuti vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo huwandu hwevari kubayiwa huri kuramba huchidzikira. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kusvika muna Zvita asi nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubayiwa pazuva zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. Hurumende yakaburitsa mugwaro rayo kana kuti Government Gazette kuti mushandi wose wehurumende anenge asina kubayiwa nhomba kusvika musi wa15 Gumiguru acharangwa. Asi zvinonzi vamwe vanogona kuregererwa ndokunge vapa zvikonzero zvakati tsvikiti zvekuti sei vasina kubayiwa nhomba. Vashandi vehurumende vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 300 000. Masangano evaraitidzi akaita seARTUZ nePTUZ anoti hurumende haifanire kumanikidza vashandi kubayiwa nhomba asi kungovakurudzira nekuvapa dzidziso yakakwana. No media source currently available

headline: Korera Inonzi Yauraya Vanhu Makumi Maviri neVasere muHarare Chete
text: Vanhu makumi maviri nevasere vanonzi vafa nechirwere chekorera kusvika pari zvino muguta reHarare chete, sekutaura kwevakafanobata chigaro chemukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Doctor Clemence Duri. Ukuwo bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwava kudarika zviuru zvina munyika yose. “Tiri kugutsikana nemafambiro ari kuita zvinhu nekuti vanhu vese vari kuisa misoro pamwe chete. Tiri kuedza kubata pamwe chete neshamwari dzedu nesuwo veHarare City Council tiri kuedza kuita zvatinogona,” Dr Duri vaudza Studio7. “Hongu, hatingagoni kuzviita zvese asi unonyatsona kuti vanhu vane chido chekuti chirwere ichi chipedzwe zvachose.” Dr Duri vanoti kunyange hazvo vachigutsikana nebasa riri kuitwa mukurwisana nechirwere ichi, vari kukumbira vanhu nemasangano ekunze kuti vabatsire mukurwisa chirwere ichi. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakati veruzhinji vanofanirwawo kubatsira nemari yekurwisa chirwere ichi. Korera yagara ichinetsa muZimbabwe. Muna 1993 ku muna 2003, korera yakabatwa nevanhu vanodarika zviuru makumo manomwe. Muna 2008 vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina vakafa nechirwere ichi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti Zimbabwe ndiyo chete nyika yawirwa nedambudziko rekorera rakaipisisa kudarika dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanhu Vaviri Vofa neCovid-19 kuManicaland
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakwira kusvika pamakumi matatu nevatanhatu zvichitevera kufa kwemumwe murume nemudzimai kuManicaland nechirwere ichi nezuro. Vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro. Pavanhu ava, zana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika, vamwe vaviri vakabva kuSouth Africa mumwe chete kuZambia. Kunyangwe hazvo chirwere checoronavirus chave kupararira zvakanyanya munyika, hurumende iri kutatarika kugadzirisa zvinhu muzvipatara zvapa kuti vashandi vemo kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vapinde mumwedzi wechipiri vachiramwa mabasa. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru vemuzvipatara zvehurumende reSenior Hospital Doctors Association Dr Aaron Musara vanoti nemusi weChina vanenge vatangawo kuramwa mabasa nekuti hurumende yakundikana kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo zvekuti vawedzerwe mari yemirhoro nekuwana zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kucoronavirus. No media source currently available Gurukota rinoona nezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakamboti hurumende yakagadzirira kuzeya nyaya yemihoro nevashandi asi kusvika parizvino zvienenge zvakona n’anga murapwa achida. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana masere ane makumi mana nemana kana kuti 844, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru gumi nezvinomwe ne mazana matanhatu anemakumi masere nevaviri kana kuti 17,682. Vapora vadarika zviuru mazana mana nemakumi masere nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 489, 000. Pasi rose, Johns Hopkins university inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu ane zviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 16,3 million, kuchiti vafa vadarikawo zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nechimwe kana kuti 651 thousand. America yave nevanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matatu kana kuti vadarika 4, 2 thousand vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 147,00.

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuzivisa Nyika Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kuwanikwa Vaine Omicron Variant
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti dziri kushushikana nekusabuda pachena kwehurumende pahuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa vaine mhando itsva yeCovid-19, yeOmicron Variant. Kushushikana uku kunotevera kuzivisa kwayakaita hurumende svondo rapera kuti vanhu makumi mashanu vaive vabatwa nemando yeOmicron munyika asi haina kuzoramba ichizivisa nezvehuwandu uhu izvo zviri kuita kuti vamwe vati pane zviri kuvanzwa pamusoro penyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vari chiremba anoshandira mudunhu reNorth Carolina muAmerica, Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iite tsvakurudzo nekuzivisa huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nemhando yeOmicron vachiti izvi zvinobatsira zvikuru pakurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Dr Ranga vati kunyange hazvo zvichidhura kuti paitwe ongororo yekuziva kuti mhando yechirwere cheCovid iri kutekeshera munyika ndeipi, vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende iwane mari yekuve nezvikwanisiro zvekuita izvi. Dr Norman Matara, avo vanove munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, vatiwo matanho akatorwa nehurumende mushure mekuveko kwemhando yeOmicron ndeechimbi-chimbi uye haana humboo hwescience hunoratidza kuti anobatsira. Vatiwo hurumende inodzoka yozvivhiringidza pachayo nekuramba ichiita zvimwe zvirongwa zvinoonekwa sezvinowedzera kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru wezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyik, Dr Agnes Mahomva, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haisi kukwanisa kugara ichipa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nemhando yeOmicron munyika. Asi vati vari mushishi kuongorora hutachiwana uhu kubva kumatunhu ose enyika vakati vachazivisa zvinenge zvawanikwa munguva pfupi inotevera. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vaviri vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro, uye vamwe vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri, 4 720, uye vabatwa munyika yose nechirwere ichi vavazviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nevasere, 150 628. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vakanga vava mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu nezana nemakumi mana nemumwe chete, 2 926 141, uye vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vari mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nezvinomwe nemazana masere nemakumi matanhatu, 3 907 860. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Anoshanyira South Africa Onyunyuta neKurambidzwa Kupinda neMapiritsi eKuronga Mhuri
text: Madzimai ari kushanya kuSouth Africa haasi kufara nekutorerwa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri kwaari kuitwa nevashandi vanoona nezvekupinda nekubuda kwevashanyi muSouth Africa. Madzimai aya anoti ari kubvumirwa kupinda nepakiti imwechete iyo inenge iyine mapiritsi anokwana mwedzi mumwechete. Madzimai aya anoti izvi zvinoita kuti azopedzesera oshandisa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri ekuSouth Africa ayo vakawanda vanoti anovarwarisa zvinosanganisira kubuda ropa kwenguva yakareba. Amai Getrude Tarumbwa, avo vanodzidzisa kuPretoria, vanoti kurambidzwa mapiritsi akawanda anovakwanira kunozovamanikidza kunwa mapiritsi ekuSouth Africa ayo anovarwarisa, uye kubuda ropa rakawanda. Amai Tarumbwa vanoti munhu anofanirwa kubvumirwa mapiritsi anoenderana nenguva yaanenge abvumirwa kugara muSouth Africa. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naAmai Patricia Zuze, avo vanoenda kunotengesa zvinhu zvakaita semidziyo yemumba yakagadzirwa nemiti kuSouth Africa. Amai Zuze, avo vanogara mwedzi miviri kana mitatu vachitengesa, vanoti kutorerwa mapiritsi kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo uye vanozomanikidzwa kunwa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri ekuSouth Africa avanoti anovarwarisa. Nekuda kwekurambidzwa kwemapiritsi akawanda pabhodha, mamwe madzimai ave kuita bhizinisi rekuenda nemapiritsi achinotengesera zvizvarwa zvemunyika zviri kuSouth Africa. Pakiti rimwe chete, iro rinopihwa pachena munyika rinotengeswa nemari iri pakati pemaRands zana nemakumi mashanu nemazana maviri zvichienderana nekuti munhu ari kuatengesera kunzvimbo ipi muSouth Africa. Amai Roselyne Chitani mumwe wemadzimai anotengesa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri kuSouth Africa. Vatyairi vemabhazi anoenda kuSouth Africa vanoyambirawo vanhu vavanenge vakatakura zvinhu zvisingabvumirwe kupinda munyika iyi kuitira kuti vasazobatwa vachinzi vari kutakura vanhu vanopinda nezvinhu zvisingabvumirwe. Mutyairi webhazi reFirst Class, VaFrank Muguti, vachiyambira vashanyi vechidzimai kuti vasatakure mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri akawanda. Zvinhu zvakaita semufushwa, manhanga, nzimbe muriwo hazvibvumirwe kupinda nazvo pabhodha. Munhu anowanikwa nazvo anotorerwa uye haazobvumirwa kupinda munyika iyi musi waanenge abatwa. Munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Brg Gerald Gwinji, vanoti vachaongorora nyaya iyi vachiti hazvisi pamutemo kuti vanhu varambidzwe kana kuita zvinotadzisa kuti munhu atore mushonga wake sezvinenge zvataura chiremba. Hatina kunzwa divi reSouth Africa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vabereki veMwana Ane Chirwere cheChiropa Vokumbira Rubatsiro
text: Hupenyu hwemwanasikana Manqoba Mabhena, uyo akaberekwa aine chirwere chechiropa chinonzi Biliary Atresia huri kuramba huri panjodzi sezvo vabereki vake vasati vawana mari yekuti ainde kunorapwa kuIndia. Amai vaManqoba, Muzvare Shamiso Yikoniko vanoti vana chiremba vakavataurira kuti chiropa chemwana chinogona kumira kushanda chero ipi nguva kana akasarapwa nekukurumidza. Vanoti vanoda mari inosvika zviuru makumi mana nematatu ($43,000) yekuti vainde kuIndia kunorapisa mwanasikana wavo. Asi pare zvino vanoti vawana mari inokwana chiuru gumi nemasere ($18,000) chete. Naizvozvo, Muzvare Yikoniko vari kukumbira rubatsiro kumhuri yeZimbabwe. Vanoti zve vanoda kubatsira vanogona kuisa mari mubhuku ravo rebhanga reFBC. Account number yavo inoti 3070070770125. Munogona zve kushandisa Ecocash muchishandisa number dzinoti 0772 935 224. No media source currently available

headline: Vabereki Vane Vana Vane "Autism" Votarisana neMatambudziko Makukutu
text: Vabereki vevana vanoita matambudziko pakutamba nevamwe kana kuita zvinhu zvinotarisirwa pazera ravo kana kuti vane "autism" vanoti vatarisana nedambudziko guru pakuriritira vana ava. Vanoti hupenyu hwavo hwakaomarara nepamusana pekuti vana vane autism havakwanisi kuita zvinhu zvinoitwa nevamwe vechidiki kana kushamwaridzana navo. Baba Luke Pencil veku Malbereign muHarare vane mwana wavo ane makore gumi ane autism. Baba Pencil, avo vane makore makumi mana nematanhatu ekuberekwa vanoti dambudziko guru rinosangana nevabereki ava nderekushaya ruzivo pamusoro pe autism. “Izvi hazvina kunge zvabatwa nana chiremba kunyange mwana akarwara kwenguva refu ndichienda kunana chiremba vakasiyana siyana nekunana mukoti vakasiyana siyana.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Pakashayikwa kana mumwechete akatibatsira chaizvo kuti mwana wenyu condition yake inonzi autism. Aiti akachema zvainzi ah, baba hamuzivi mwana anongochema, zvinoreva kuti haasi kunzwa zvakanaka kana kuti muri kumuitira zvaasingadi. Asi uchiedza kutsanangura kuti aiwa, mwana uyu pane zvaanoita zvandisinganzwisise zvakafanana nekuti dzimwe nguva anoramba kupfeka bhutsu, dzimwe nguva anoramba kugerwa musoro.” Baba Pencil vanoti vabereki vakawanda vanokatyamadzwa nekugumbuka zvikuru pavanoona kuti mwana wavo ari kukura zvakasiyana nevamwe vana. Vanoti ivo vakaita mhanza yekukurumidza kuziva zvaiitika kumwana wavo. “Vana ava vanenge vane ma censory issues anenge akavhiringika, haana kuita seevamwe vana. Saka kana achigerwa ane zvaanonzwa zvisinganzwiwi nevamwe vana vose saka achiita muitiro waanoita iwowo.” Vatiwo, “ Saka izvozvo ndizvo zvakaita kuti tinzwisise kuti ho mwana wedu condition yaaninayo inonzi autism. Izvozvo ndinoda kuti nditsinhire kuti izvi handina kuzviwana kunana chiremba kana kunana mukoti. Ndakatozvinzwawo kune mumwe mubereki akanga ari affected, akatoenda pa radio akanotaura. Ndopatazowana information yakadaro.” Baba Pencil vanoti murume nemudzimai vanofanira kubatana kwete kunongedzerana kana mwana asangana nedambudziko. “Saka izvozvo zvakatipa simba rekuti kuti mwana wedu aite zviri nani, tikwanise kumumaneja, regai tinorisecha.” Vatizve, “ Tikabva taenda pa internet. Iripo information pa internet. Ukaiwana zvinoita kuti umaneje mwana wako zviri nani. Zvinoita kuti kuwadzana kwako naye kuve kuri nani, kuwadzana kwake nenharaunda yakamukomberedza kuve nani.” Amai Emma Muchefa avo vane mwana ane autism, vanoshandira hurumende vari pa Domboshava training centre. Vanoti madzimai mazhinji ane vana vane autism anoshungurudzika zvikuru. “Vazhinji vana baba vanotiza, uye hama hadzizvitambiri. Kazhinji burden inosiyirwa amai, seni as a mother of three, two vari disabled murume akabva aenda ndikasara ndiri a single mother.” Amai Muchefa vatizve, “ Saka dambudziko rinenge rave rekuti unenge uchida kuenda kubasa, uri kuda ku physio nemwana iyeye, uri kuda zvekudya uri kuda zvekupfeka zvevana ivavo, uri kuda medication. Saka kazhinji kacho uri kuda zvekufambisa, hauna kana motor kana wheel-chair.” Amai Tendai Kamutero veku Domboshava vane mwana wavo ane autism. Vakatozozviziva mwana uyu ave nemakore matatu kuti ndizvo zvaari. Amai Kamutero vanoti kuriritira mwana uyu zvinovanetsa semunhu ari pamushando. “Pandinoenda kubasa, munhu anosara naye haanzwisisi zvaanoda nekuti haatauri.” Vatizve, “Sign language haaizivi, haakwanisi ku communicator naye. Asi iye takatozomudzidza kuti kana ave nenzara kana chikafu chiri paanosvikira anotora ega. Kana kuti ukaona akukudhonza, isaini yekuti ane nzara.” Amai Constance Mandishona vane vana vana, uye vaviri vavo vakaremara. Amai Mandishona, avo vanoshanda muhurumende vakapihwa imba yekugara kuMufakose mushure mekunge vakuru vavo vaona kutambura kwavaiita. Vanoti vakaremara vanofanira kusimudzirana. “Ipapo ndisati ndapihwa imba ndakanga ndisina pfungwa dzekuti I can advocate kana kumiririrawo kana kutsigira munhu akaremara.” Amai Mandishona vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Ndakazogara pasi ndikazvibvunza kuti, hongu ndamiririrwa, ko vari kunze uko vasina anovamiririrawo tochiita sei? Nekuti inini pandakabatsirwa nemba, Permanent secretary mai Nhekairo vakandiudza kuti, Cony, dai vana vako wanga wakavachengetesa kumaraini, vachiita kunge musara pavana, I wasn’t going to assist you. But pese patinotaura unotungamidza vana vako kumberi kuti ma’am vangu vazodai nekuti hauna kunyara navo saka tazokudai. Ndakakwanisa kubatsira vamwe vabereki vairi. Mumwe wacho anonzi mai Boora anoshanda ku President’s department. Ane mwana wakewo ane autism. Ndikamuti akoma nyaya yangu yakamira yakadai, inini ndakawanawo imba. Imimi can you not write a letter mukwanisewo kuti mubatsirwe? Vakapihwa flat ku Ardbennie.” Dr Cotilda Mangoma mugari wemuHarare uye vanofamba vachipa dzidziso pamusoro pe autism. Vanoti vabereki vevana vakadai vanofanira kushingaira kutsvaga ruzivo kuitira kuti vana vavo vave nepundutso. “Inini ndiri kuona kuti zvakakosha kuve neruzivo mukati memhuri nemhaka yekuti chinhu chawave kuziva unoziva kuti unochibata sei, unochibata nemutoo upi.” Dr Mangoma vanotizve, “Saka ini ndinoti vana baba nana mai vane vana vavasinganzwisisi kuti ingave autism here kana kwete zviri nani vatsvake rubatsiro kubva ku clinic level. Kana vabva ikoko voudzwa kuti enda ku rehabilitation. Rehabilitation yoferefeta kuti itype ipi ye autism, pamusana pekuti akasiyana siyana, akawanda. Nekuonekwa kunoita mwana, nemaitiro ake unobva waudzwa kuti aiwa ichi ndechakati, then rubatsiro rwobva rwauya. Angave anogona nezvemaoko, angave munhu ari bright kuchikoro, zvese zvinobatsirika along those lines.” VaPardon Gonorashe mushandi wehurumende ane hunyanzvi hwekubatsira veruzhinji, kunyanya vanotambura kuti vave neraramo iri nani. Vanoti vabereki vevana vane autism vanofanira kuve padyo nepavanowana ruzivo pamusoro pe autism.“Saka paida kuti patange pawanikwa centre yekuti vanhu vari kumaruwa, vangadai vari kuBinga, Muzarabani kana kuti kuMberengwa vakaona kuti vane vana vane autism they can refer vana ivavo kuno.” Vatizve,“Tikashevedza ma parents vari kumaruwa vanogona kuuya kuma campaign akaita seaya.” VaGonorashe vanoti hurumende inofanira kuisa mari yakawanda gore rega rega kuzvirongwa zvakanangana ne autism. “Hakuna zviri kunyanya kuitwa about disability as a whole.” Vatizve, “Then mukazopinda mudisability sector imomo munozoona kuti autism is relegated kuzasizasi kune other forms of disability. Saka ngatitorei disability sector se ine mari shoma mu budget. Then yapihwa mari shoma already, autism iri kuzasizasi zvekuti ikoko kunosvika one cent. Ndosaka kune vanhu vashomanana vari kutari nezve autism as a right.” Sangano guru rezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation rinoti pavanhu zana nemakumi matanhatu ega ega mumwechete wavo anenge aine autism. Vamwe vanhu vane autism vanokwanisa kuzviriritira asi vakawanda vavo vanotozoda kuchengetwa hupenyu hwavo hwese. No media source currently available  .

headline: Dzimwe Nyanzvi Dzinoti Mitemo yeCovid-19 Lockdown Ngaibviswe, Chikuru Kubayiwa Nhomba kweVeruzhinji
text: Hurumende yakawedzera nemasvondo maviri mitemo yeCovid-19, kana kuti Level 2 Lockdown. Izvi zvakaziviswa nemusi weChipiri negurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa. Vachitaura kuvatori venhau, Amai Mutsvangwa vakati mabhawa ane marezenisi ekuita basa rawo anogona kubvumidza vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba dzose kuti vapinde mumabhawa avo, asinvachiti mabhawa anosungirwa kutevedzera mitemo yose yokurwisana neCovid-19. Pasi pemitemo yeLockdown Level 2, vanhu vanorambidzwa kufambafamba pakati pa10 o’clock manheru na 5:30 mangwanani. Mabhizimisi anovhurwa na 8 o’clock mangwanani achisungirwa kuvharwa na 7 o’clock manheru. Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti veruzhinji vanokurudzirwa kutevedzera mitemo yose yekurwisana nedenda reCovid-19. Vachipindura mashoko abva kuhurumende aya, vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati maLockdown apedza basa rawo asi hurumende inofanirwa kuwedzera zvikuru huwandu hwevanhuu vanobayiwa nhomba zuva rogaroga. Dr Madzorera vati hazvibetseri kuti zuva nezuva hurumende iudze vanhu kuti vanhu vangani vafa neCovid-19, vachiti vanhu vanoda kuziva kuti mishonga iri kushanda sei uye vangani vakaita dambudziko mushure mekubayiwa nhomba. Vanoti hurumende inofanira kuudza vanhu zvinovakurudzira kuti vabaiwe nhomba, vachiti inofanirwavo kutsvaka motikari dzinoenda kwakasiyana siyana, kana kuti ‘mobile clinics’, kunobaya nhomba avo vasingakwanisi kusvika kuzvipatara kana kunzvimbo dzinobaiwa vanhu nhomba Chimwe chataurwa naDr Madzorera ndechekuti hurumende inofanirwa kushanda nevamwe vakazvimirira nekuti haisi kuzopedza chirwere ichi iri yega. No media source currently available Tabatavo mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vakati vari kunze kwenyika, vachiti vachataura nesu kana vadzoka munyika.

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvobatsira Mushure Mekufa kweZvimwe Mazana Maviri muBotswana Gore Rapera
text: Mushure mekufa kwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinodarika mazana maviri nezvirwere zvakasiyana siyana kubva kuBotswana, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika iyi zviri musangano reAll Zimbos in Botswana zvakaumba komiti yekukurudzirana kuti kana munhu arwara atsvage rubatsiro nekukasika kubva kune vamwe kana kukurumidza kuenda kuchipatara pane kuzoenda kuchipatara chirwere chakomba. Gore rapera, muzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana unoti wakagadzira mapepa ekudzosera kumusha mitumbi zana nemakumi manomwe nemitatu kana kuti 173 yezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvainge zvafa uye mimwe makumi matanhatu nemitanhatu yezvainge zvafa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Ndufu idzi dzakapa kuti nhengo dzesangano reAll Zimbos in Botswana dziise musoro pamwe chete kuti dzibatsirane kuti vanhu vabude pachena nehurwere hwavo kuti vatsvagirwe rubatsiro. Vakavamba uye vanotungamira sangano reAll Zimbos in Botswana amai Portia Muzondo vanotivakarasikirwa nenhengo dzesangano ravo makumi matnhatu gore rapera. Mukuru wekomiti itsva yekubatsirana pahurwere vachishanda sechipangamazano mune rimwe sangano rakazvimirira muBotswana, Muzvare Bithea Mthetwa vanoti ruzhinji rwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe rwuri kunonoka kuenda kuzvipatara. Muzvare Mthetwa vanoti vachashandisa madandemutande kukurudzirana kunorapwa. Muzvare Hazvinei Makwanise vanova nhengo yesangano iri vanoti mwana asingacheme anofira mumbereko Vaenderera mberi vachiti vanhu vakafanira kugara vachizvivhenekesa zvirwere zvakafanana nechemukondombera, chegomarara, blood pressure necheshuga sezvo zvichikwanisa kurapwa zvisati zvakomba. Chipangamazano munezvematongerwo enyika nehupfumi pamuzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana, VaFrancis Chimina vatiwo vakagadzirira kubatsirawo zvizvarwa zvenyika zvinenge zvawirwa nematambudziko. Nekuda kwekuoma kwehupenyu munyika uye kudawo mafuro manyoro, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakaendawo kunogara kuBotswana nedzimwe nyika dzakapoteredza asi dzimwe nguva zvinhu zvinoomera vamwe vanozoguma vofa nekushaya anobatsira zviri kupa kuti vamwe vaumbe masangano ekubatsirana sezvo kutsva kwendebvu varume vanodzimurana.

headline: Varwere Voburitswa Muzvipatara Sezvo Musina Vashandi
text: Chipatara chikuru chemuChinhoyi chavhara mawadhi akawanda nekuda kwekushomeka kwavana mukoti avo vari kuramwa mabasa nyika yose. Mukuru wechipatara ichi, VaCollet Mawire, vanoti vakamanikidzwa kuvhara mawadhi evarume nemadzimai evanorwara, medical ward, pamwe nemawadhi evarume nemadzimai evanorwara nezvinoonekwa, surgical ward nekuda kwekuramwa mabasa kwana mukoti vanosvika mazana matatu. VaMawire vanoti varwere vose vakaiswa muwadhi yemadzimai ari kutarisira kusununguka sedanho rekuti varapwe nanamukoti vashoma varipo. VaMawire vanoti kunyange zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka pachipatara vanoti havasati vafirwa nevanhu zvine chekuita nekuramwa basa kwana mukoti. Vamwe varwere vakaburitswa muchipatara vari kushora danho ravana mukoti rekuramwa mabasa vachisiya vanhu vachirwara muchipatara. Mumwe murwere asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti vana mukoti havafanirwe kukoshesa mari kudarika hupenyu hwevanhu. VaGilbert Tsomondo avo vanobva kuMhangura vatora baba vavo vaburitswa muchipatara vasina kunyatsopora. VaTshomomndo vanoti hurumende navana mukoti vanofanirwa kuwirirana nekuti varwere vasina mhosva ndivo vanofa. VaMawire vanoti pari zvino havana huwandu hwavana mukoti vari kudzidzira basa vari kuyamura muwadhi yakasanganiswa varwere. Varwere vakawanda vari kuburitswa vasina kupora vari kudzokera kumba uko vanoti vanogona kufa sezvo vasina mari yekuenda kunorapwa nanachiremba vakazvimirira. Vana mukoti vakatanga kukanda mapadza avo pasi nezuro vachiti hurumende yakavanyepera kuti ichagadzirisa zvinhu, asi iyo pasina chayiri kuita. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Vanoti Kuramwa Mabasa Kuri Kuendera Mberi
text: Mubati wehomwe musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association Doctor Prince Butau vanoti kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba kuchiri kuenderera mberi kunyangwe vari kutarisirwa kuita musangano mangwana kuti votora danho ripi. VaButau vanoti vanachiremba havachina chivimbo nezvinovimbiswa nehurumende zvikuru kana pasina chanyoreranwa pasi. Vati chakachenjedza ndechakatanga sezvo muna 2014 vakambovimbiswa pakashaya chakazobuda. Bepanhau reSunday Mail range raburitsa mashoko ekuti kuramwa mabasa kwapera sezvo hurumende yagadzirisa zvimwe zvichemo zvavanachiremba. Zvichemo izvi zvinosanganisa kushaikwa kwemari muzvipatara uye vanachiremba vanoti vanoda kutambiriswa mari yekuAmerica sezvo mitengo yezvinhu iri kuramba ichiita chamurambamhuru. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano VaObidiah Moyo sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: SADC Inoti Zvirango paZimbabwe Ngazvibviswe Asi Vamwe Vachiishora neKusataura neZvekodzero dzeVanhu
text: Vatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nhasi vari kutarisirwa kupeta musangano wavo wepagore kana kuti SADC summit kuTanzania. Vatungamiri ava vari kutarisirwa kubuda nezvisungo zvinobata nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica idzi. Nezuro, mutungamiri weTanzania VaJohn Magufuli avo vanenge vave sachigaro weSADC vakazivisa kuti SADC inoda kushanda kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neAmerica, Britain nenyika dziri mugungano reEU zvibviswe. Danho iri ratambirwa nemufaro nasachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mudare reparamende vari nhengo yeZanu-PF vachimirira Makonde VaKindness Paradza. No media source currently available Asi VaMagufuli vari kushorwa nevanopikisa nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu nekusakoshesa nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Sangano reCommitee to Protect Journalists kana kuti CPJ rakurudzira VaMagufuli neSADC kuti vaone kuti kodzero dzevatori venhau dzaremekedzwa. Sangano iri rati harisi kufara nekutsakatika kwemumwe mutori wenhau muTanzania Azoy Gwanda uye kusungwa kwevamwe vatori venhau munyika iyi nekumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzevamwe muZimbabwe, Zambia, Mozambique, DRC nedzimwe nyika dzemuSADC. Bato rinopikisa rainge ratumira mumwe mutevedzeri waro VaWelshman Ncube nemunyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo kumusangano weSADC uyu. Vaviri ava vadzoka munyika. Muzvare Hlatywayo vanoti vari kuda kuti SADC ione kuti muZimbabwe maitwa nhaurirano kupedza dambudziko rezvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Danho raVaNkosana Moyo
text: Kunyangwe hazvo ongororo yakaitwa neAfrobarometer iri kuratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoda kuti mapato anopikisa aumbe mubatanidzwa, izvi zvinenge zvakona n’anga murapwa achida sezvo mapato matsva ari kuramba achiumbwa zuva nezuva pasina mukana wekubatana. Nemusi weChina vaimbova gurukota muhurumende yeZanu PF, Doctor Nkosana Moyo, vabuda pachena kuti vari kukwikwidza gore rinouya musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaMoyo vakatiwo havaoni mubatanidzwa wemapato uchishanda sezvo kuita izvi kwakafanana nekusanganisia mvura nemafuta edzimotokari. VaMoyo vakati vachange vari musarudzo vakamirira chikwata chinozviti Alliance for the People’s Agenda. Hapana ane mukurumbira ati aziviswa ari muchikwata ichi. Nemusi weChitatu, gweta rinoshanda riri muHarare, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, vakatiwo vave kukwikwidza ku Mt Pleasant musarudzo yemumiriri wenzvimbo iyi vakazvimirira. Mapato ezvematongerwo enyika avepo anenge ave kutoda kusvika makumi matanhatu uye akawanda acho anoti haadi zvekubatana. Ko kuwanda kwemapato anopikisa uku kunorevei chaizvo? Gweta VaLloyd Msipa vanoti vari kupinda munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika ava vaneta nekukundikana kwevezvematongerwo enyika varipo pari zvino nekuti vagarisa. Asi mutevedzeri wemubati wehomwe muMDC-T VaCharlton Hwende vanoti zvakanaka kuita mapato akawanda asi vamwe vacho vanoshandiswa neZanu-PF. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Inoparura Chirongwa cheTakura Mwana Tiende
text: Vechidiki vebato reMDC inotungamirwa, naVaMorgan Tsvangirai vakapurura neSvondo chirongwa chekukurudzirana pachavo kuti vanyorese kuvhota musarudzo dza2018 pasi pedingindira rinoti Bereke Mwana Tiende. Vechidiki veMDC T vakaparura chirongwa chavo muMufakose vachiimba nezvechirongwa cheBereke Mwana Teinde. Vachiparura chirongwa ichi, sachigaro weMDC T Youth Assembly, VaHappymore Chidziva, vakati vechidiki munyika vanofanira kuvhota kuti vasunungure nyika kubva kuhutongi hwebato reZanu PF. Vakati chirongwa cheBereka Mwana Tiende chakanangana nekuona kuti vechidiki navose vanokodzera kuvhota vanyoresa kuti vakwanise kuvhota musarudzo dza2018. Vakati chirongwa ichi ndechimwe chezvirongwa zvakawanda zviri kuitwa nebato ravo zvekuona kuti vanhu vese munyika vane kodzero yekuvhota, vanyoresa kuvhota, vachiti vhoti chete ndiyo nzira yega inoita kuti bato rikunde musarudzo. Vakatiwo pane chirongwa che #99 icho chakanangana nekuti vese vane makore gumi nemanomwe gore rino vatore zvitupa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota gore rinouya. Vakati rwendo runo bato ravo harizi kuzopedza nguva richiita ma rally asi richapinda pamusha wega wega richitsvaga rutsigiro pamwe nekuona kuti munhu wqese anyoresa kuvhota. VaChidziva vakati kana hurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe ikada kuenderera mberi nesarudzo mitemo yesarudzo isina kushandurwa vachavhiringa sarudzo idzi. Mutungamiriri wevechidiki mubato iri mudunhu reHarare, VaPaul Gorekore, vakati vabereki vese munyika pamwe nevedzisvondo vanofanira kukurudzira vechidiki kunyoresa kuvhota. Sachigaro wemadzimai muMDC-T mudunhu reHarare, Amai Ronia Bunjira, vakati vanotsigira vechidiki pachirongwa chavo uye shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai vanhu vese vanyoresa kuvhota kuti vaunze shanduko gore rinouuya. Vatungamiri vakawanda vebato iri kusanganisira mumwe wevatevadzeri vemutungamiriri webato iri, VaNelson Chamisa, munyori mukuru webato iri, VaDouglas Mwonzora, nemutevedzeri wavo Amai Paurina Mpariwa-Gwanyanya, nhengo dzakawanda dzeparamende dzakapinda musangano uyu dzichiti sarudzo dza2018 dzidzo dzekuunza shanduko munyika. VaMwonzora vakati vari kunyora tsamba kuna VaMugabe nemutauriri weparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vachivaudza kutihavachada kuti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission ione nezvesarudzo sezvo ichitsigira Zanu PF. Vakati vanoda kuti United Nations neAfrica Union vaone nezvesarudzo dza2018. Vakati vachaudza veruzhinji mhinduro pamusangano wavachaita nemamwe mapato ari muNational Electoral Reforms Agenda, NERA, muAfrica Unity Square nemusi weChitatu. Pari zvino mapato anopikisa kusanganisira MDC T ari kuda kuti mitemo yesarudzo ushandurwe kuitira kuti sarudzo dziitwe zvakachena. Pari zvino mapato aya ari kupokana nehurumende nenyaya yekutengwa kwemichina yekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota yeBiometric Voter Registration. United Nations Development Program ndiyo yange yapihwa mvumo yekutenga michina iyi mushure mekunge hurumendde yati yainge isina mari. Asi hurumende inoti yave nemari yekutenga michina iyi, nokudaro yave kuenderera mberi nekutenga michina iyi.. Asi vemapato anopikisa vanoona sekunge hurumende yave kuda kupindira mumafambisirwo esarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Vatsigiri veMDC Alliance Vorwiswa neVanofungidzirwa Kuti VaTsigiri veZanu-PF paMusangano Wavo
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa neMuvhuro vakaita misangano nevatsigiri vavo kuCaledonia neMabvuku kwavakati makanzura ebato ravo achaita huori kana vapinda panyanga vachadzingwa pamwe nekutorerwa matanho akaomarara. Pakamboita mhirizhonga pakati pevechidiki vebato ravo nevechidiki veZanu PF vaChamisa vasati vasvika kuCaledonia. Mhirizhonga inonzi yakaitika panzvimbo yemabhizimusi paGazebo kuCaledonia apo vechidiki veZanu PF vanonzi vakanda matombo panga pakaungana vatsigiri veMDC Alliance vakamirira VaChamisa. Imwe nhengo yeboka revechidiki muMDCT inotungamirwa naVaChamisa, VaDennis Muroyiwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vechidiki veZanu PF vanga vaine chitsama vapotedzera matombo zvaita kuti vatsigiri veMDC vaviri vakuvare. VaMuroyiwa vati vakuvara ava vakaendeswa kuchipatara. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nasachigaro weboka revechidiki muZanu PF, VaGodfrey Gomwe, kuti tinzwe pamire bato ravo panyaya iyi. Mhirizhonga yaitika iyi inouya panguva iyo mutungamiri weZanu PF uye vari mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachigara vakataura kuti vanoda sarudzo dziri pachena uye dzisina mhirizhonga. Pavakasvika kuCaledonia, VaChamisa vatsoropodza nyaya yemhirizhonga vachiti mawoko avo akachena panyaya yemhirizhonga. Vachitaurawo pane mumwe musangano wakaitirwa kuMabvuku, VaChamisa vati makanzura ese ebato ravo achaita huori kana vachinge vapinda panyanga varangwa zvakaomarara vachiti mameya anofanira kunge aine masimba. VaChamisa vakakurudzirawo kuti vatsigiri vebato ravo vavhotere VaJames Chidhakwa pasarudzo dzeparamende vachiti nhengo yeparamende inomirira Mabvuku parizvino, VaJames Maridadi, havana rutsigiro rwebato ravo sezvo vachiti vakaendesa mapepa ekukwikwidza kuZEC zvemusoro wavo mushure mekunge vakundwa naVaChidhakwa musarudzo dzema primary dzebato ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Orova Madzibaba VeShanduko, Uko Zanu-PF Ichinzi Yoshungurudza veCCC
text: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change rinoti munyika maberekera ingwe zvichitevera kushungurudzwa kuri kuita nhengo dzaro kwasara vhiki rimwe chete kuti nyika iende kusarudzo. Sangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights raburitsa padandemutande raro reTwitter kuti VaGodfrey Chidhawu Karembera nhengo yebato reCitizens Coalition for Change (CCC) vanozivikanwa nekuti Madzibaba veShanduko varohwa vari mumaoko emapurisa kukamba yeHarare Central. ZLHR inotiwo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekusazvibata zvakanaka paruzhinji vachinzi vanga vachikurudzira vanhu kuti vavhotere VaNelson Chamisa veCCC. Bazi rezvekubuditswa kwemashoko ratiwo padandemutande retwitwer pari kuitwa tsvakurudzo nezvenyaya yekusabatwa zvakanaka kwaVakarembera vari mumaoko emapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa ari kuongorora nyaya yekuti VaKarembera varohwa vari mumaoko emapurisa uye imwe nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti vange vachitsvaga rutsigiro zvisina mvumo yemapurisa nekunzwiwo vatuka mapurisa pavange vachida kusungwa. Mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vatiwoimwe nhengo yavo Amai Thokozile Dube varikuda kutsvaka chigaro chehukanzura kuUmzingwane ward 20 avkarara vachishungurudzwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF. Mune imwewo nyaya, Bato reZanu PF rinoti rinoda kukunda sarudzo zvakachena uye ishuviro yavo kuti mapato ese ezvematongerwo enyika akwanise kutsvaka rutsigiro murunyararo. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau nhasi muHarare, vanoona nezvematongerwo enyika mubato reZanu PF, VaMike Bimha vati bato reZanu PF rinoda kuti mapato ese avachakwikwidzana nawo musarudzo vatsvake rutsigiro vakasununguka huye kusina mhirizhonga. VaBimha vakakurudzira mapurisa kuti aite basa nemazvo mukuferefeta nyaya dzine chekuita nemhirizhonga. Vatiwo bato reZanu PF ririkushandisa sarudzo dziri kutarisirwa munaKurume sechiyero kuona kuti zvirongwa zvehurumende zviri kutsigirwa here. Vaenderera mberi vachiti bato ravo ratotangawo kupa ruzivo kune avo vachange vari panzvimbo dzekuvhoterwa kana kuti mapolling agents. Asi Muzvare Mahere vati muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi sezvo Zanu-PF ichingotaura chete kuti haidi mhirizhonga asi nekune rimwe divi ichiipesvedzera. Nyanzvi munezvematongerwo enyika VaSydicks Muradzikwa vatiwo mamwe mapato munyika haasi kupiwa mukana wekutsvaka rutsigiro. Sarudzo dzemaby-elections dzirikutarisirwa kuitwa musi wa26 Kurume.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vopomera veUN neMizinda Yekunze Mhosva Yekupindira muNyaya dzezveMatongerwo eNyika muZimbabwe
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kupomera vakuru vesangano reunited Nations munyika uye vamiri vedzimwe nyika dzekumawirira mhosva yekushandisa masangano akazvimirira oga kupindira munyaya dzezvemtongerwo enyika vachiti vachavatorera matanho. VaMnangagwa vataura mashoko aya mugwaro ravanonyora nemusi wesvondo wega wega mubepanhau reSunday Mail. VaMnangagwa vati nekuda kweizvi hurumende yavo ichaenderera mberi nekudzika mutemo wekuvandudza mashandiro emasangano akazvimirira oga kana kuti Private Voluntary Act. Mutemo uyu uri kushorwa zvikuru nevakawanda munyika nekunze vachiti uchakanganisa kubatsirwa kwevanhu vanoshupika munyika paine yambiro yekuti vanhu mamiriyoni mashanu vakatarisana nenzara munyika. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vanotaura vakamirira United Nations kana mizinda yekunze sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa kusvika taenda pamhepo. Asi sachigaro wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition VaPeter Mutasa vati nekutya kukunsa musarudzo, bato reZanu-PF harichazive pfumo roribaya richingopomera mhosva munhu wose. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Younza Kusawirirana Pakati peMapato muNyika
text: Kunyangwe kwasara masvondo maviri kuti nyika iite sarudzo, komisheni inoona nezvekufambiswa kwesarudzo, yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, iri kushorwa nevakawanda vanoti iri kutadza kuita basa rayo nemazvo. Asi pane vamwe vanoti komisheni iyi iri kuita zvainosungirwa kuita pamutemo. ZEC ndeimwe yemakomisheniu mashanu akazvimirira anoumbwa pasi pembumbiro remutemo wenyika yeZimbabwe. Section 233 yebumbiro remutemo inoti makomisheni aya anoti ZEC, Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission nemamwe anofanira kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Kuita zvido zveveruzhinji, kuita basa rawo pachena pamwe nekutevedzera gwara reruzhinji. Makomishina eZEC, anosarudzwa nekomiti yeparamende yeStanding Rules and Orders.
