Standing Rules and Orders Committee, ikomiti inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa ese eparamende uye ine nhengo kubva kumapato ese matatu ari muparamende anoti Zanu PF, MDC T inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa neMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube. Mutemo unoti makomishina eZEC haafaniri kunge achiita zvematongerwo enyika kana kurerekera kubato ripi zvaro. Asi pane kuchema chema munyika kubva kune mamwe mapato anopikisa ayo ari kupomera ZEC mhosva yekuita basa yakarerekera kuZanu PF. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare VaJonstone Chirwa vanoti ZEC inoita sekuti ibandiko reZanu PF. Vanotiwo havafari nenyaya yekuti muZEC makazara mauto. Varikumirira MDC Alliance kuGoromonzi West, VaLuke Tamborinyoka ndemumwe asiri kufara nemashandiro eZEC. Gweta resangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights VaLizwe Jamela, vanoti kusara kwevamwe pamusoro peZEC kunokonzerwa nekuti ZEC haisi kuita basa rayo zvakajeka. Asi vamwe vakaita saVaNaison Murara vanoti semaonero avo, ZEC iri kuita basa rayo sezvakatarwa pamutemo wenyika. Mumwe wevanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzemutungamiriri wenyika VaBrayn Taurai Mteki ndemumwe anoona sekuti ZEC iri kuita basa rayo nemazvo. VaMteki vanotiwo vatori venhau ndivo vari kukonzera kuti ZEC ishorwe nekunyora kuti sarudzo dzegore rino dziri pakati paVaChamisa neMDC Alliance naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa veZanu PF. Sachigaro veZEC, Justice Priscillar Chigumba vanotiwo vazhinji vari kuchema chema nemashandiro avo vanhu vasinganzwisise mashandire ekomisheni yavo. Bumbiro remutemo wenyika rinoti sachigaro weZEC anofanira kunge ari mutongi wedare repamusoro kana kuti Judge kana kuti munhu anokodzera kuita mutongi wedare iri uye munhu uyu anodomwa nemutungamiriri wenyika mushure mekunge vataura neStanding Rules and Order Committee nekomisheni yevatongi vematare yeJudicial Service Commission. Dzimwe nhengo sere dzinodomwa nemutungamiriri wenyika pavanhu vanodarika gumi nevaviri vanenge vasarudzwa neStanding Rules and Order Committee. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiti Vanoti Zanu PF Inofanirwa Kuendeswa kuMatare neKuuraya Kwayakaita Upfumi hweNyika
text: Mumwe wevatungamiri veMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vanoti bato reZanu PF rinofanira kuendeswa kumatare richipomerwa mhosva yekuuraya hupfumi hwenyika zvavanoti zvaita kuti veruzhinji vatambudzike kwemakore akawanda. Vachitaura nevatsigiri vavo pamusangano weMDC Alliance wakaitwa kuMahusekwa nemusi weSvondo, VaBiti vakati veruzhinji vari kunhonga svosve nemuromo kuburikidza nekutadza kutonga kwavanoti kuri kuitwa nebato riri kutonga reZanu PF. VaBiti vakati Zanu PF inofanira kuendeswa kumatare edzimhosva vachiti kuoma kwaita hupenyu hweveruzhinji kubudikidza nehutongo hweZanu PF imhosva yakakura kwazvo inofanira kuyedzwa mumatare edzimhosva. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti vari kutogadzirira kuti kana vachinge vakunda musarudzo dzegore rino seMDC Allaince iri kutungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa vachatosunga dzisimbe kuti vagadzirise hupfumi vachiti vatove nevekunze vavakataura navo kuti vazosima mari yavo munyika. Vakasvora zvikuru mamiriro akaita mugwagwa unobva muna Masvingo Road uchienda kuMahusekwa uyo wave nemakoronga vachiti izvi ndezvimwe zvinoratidza kutadza kutungamira kuri kuitwa neZanu PF. Asi vaimbova mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vadzidzi reZimbabwe National Students Union, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, avo vave nhengo yebato reZanu PF, vanoti zviri kutaurwa naVaBiti ndezvemugotsi matsuro. VaMugwadi vanoti zviri pachena kuti ivo VaBiti nevamwe vavo vari muMDC ndivo vakakonzera kuti zvinhu zviome munyika. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMalvern Mkudu, vanoti zvinokwanisa kuti Zanu PF iendeswe kumatare sezviri kutaurwa naVaBiti. Zvichakadai, VaBiti vakakurudzira kuti masoja anonzi ari kumaruwa abviswe mumaruwa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vavhote musarudzo dziri kuuya vakasunguka. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemauto, VaOverson Mugwisi kuti tinzwe pamire mauto panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reCitizens Coalition Ronyunyuta neKusamira Zvakanaka kweGwaro reVavhoti
text: Bato reCitizens Coalition for Change rinoti riri kunyunyuta zvikuru negwaro risina kumira zvakanaka. Sangano iri rinoti izvi zvakabuda muongororo rarakaita. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, vanoona nezvesarudzo muCitizens Coalition for Change, VaIan Makone, vati ongororo yavo yegwaro revavhoti rakashandiswa muna 2018 neripo pari zvino inoratidza kuti kune vanhu vari kunzi vakachinja kwekuvhotera vakawandisa asi vasina kuchinja kwavanogara. VaMakone vatiwo kune nzvimbo dzakakushandurwa nzvimbo dzekuvhotera, izvo zvisina kuziviswa veruzhinji sezvinodiwa nemutemo VaMakone vatiwo bato ravo rinoda kuti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, igadzirise gwaro revavhoti zvinogutsa mapato ese ezvematongerwo enyika sarudzo dza2023 dzisati dzasvika sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika. VaMakone vatiwo vari kushamiswa nedanho rakatorwa neZec rekufamba ichinyoresa veruzhinji mugwaro revavhoti isina kubatana nehofisi yamabharani makuru wenyika kuitira kuti vasina zvitupa vawaniswe. Bato iri rati iyi inzira iri kushandiswa nebato reZanu PF mukubira sarudzo sezvo vamwe vanofanirwa kuvhota vasina zvitupa izvo zviri kunetsa kuwana munyika. Asi mutauriri weZec, Amai Leticia Kazembe, vati havana chikonzero chekubidirira sezvo Zec riri sangano rakasununguka risina bato rezvematongerwo enyika rainotsigira. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutauriri weCitizens Coalition for Change, VaGift Ostallos Siziba, vatiwo vari kuzoshandisa sarudzo dzemaby-elections senzira yekuona kuti Zec inogona kuita sarudzo dzakachena here kana kuti kwete. Mugwaro rayo kune veruzhinji, Zec inoti inobvumidzwa nemitemo kuchinja nzvimbo dzekuvhotera. Zec inotiwo harisi basa rayo rekuona kuti munhu anogara panzvimbo yaanyoresa here kana kuti kwete sezvo ichitarisa zvinenge zviri pamagwaro anenge auya nemunhu kuzonyoresa kuzvota. ZEC inotiwo kana gwaro revavhoti richakavhurwa kudai, zvakawanda zvinogonawo kuchinjwa, asi inoti hachisi chokwadi kuti iri kuchinja miganhu yematunhu. Hurongwa hwekunyoresa kuvhota hunotarisirwa kuenderera mberi munzvimbo dzose munyika, uye Zec ichashandisa zviri mugwaro rayo muna Nyamavhuvhu mukuona kuti matunhu achange akamira seyi musarudzo dzichaitwa gore rinouya.

headline: VaChamisa Vanodoma Mutauriri Wavo Mutsva, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda
text: Mutungamiri weMDC-T uye vari mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vadoma chipanga mazano munyaya dzematongerwo enyika paHuddersfield University kuBritain, VaNkululeko Sibanda, semutauriri wavo mutsva. VaSibanda vari kutora basa ranga richiitwa naVaLuke Tamborinyoka, avo vari kuda kukwidza kuGoromonzi West musarudzo yekumirira dunhu iri muparamende. Mukuru anoona nezvevashandi muMDC-T, VaSesil Zvidzai, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaChamisa vadomawo vamwe vanhu kuti vatore zvimwe zvigaro kuitira kuti basa rinyatsofamba zvakanaka vachigadzirira sarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mubato iri vanoti VaTamborinyoka vange vave kutadza kuita basa ravo zvizere sezvo vanga vave kupedza nguva yakawanda vachitsvaga rutsigiro kuGoromonzi West uko kwavakatarisirwa kukwikwidzana naVaEnergy Mutodi veZanu PF musarudzo dzeparamende. Vamwe vadomwa ndiVaJameson Timba avo vave mumiriri waVaChamisa pasarudzo, Muzvare Yvonne Mahlune vaitwa mumiriri weMDC-T kuBritain; VaRalph Black vava kumirira MDC-T kuAmerica; Va Austin Moyo vachimirira bato ku South Africa; VaMathula Lusinga vachimirira bato ku African Union; Muzvare Grace Kwinje ndivo vari kumirira bato kuEuropean Union, ukuwo VaElliot Pfebve vachiona nezvemabhizinesi ku Europe. VaDriden Kunaka ndivo vari kumirira MDC-T kuAustralia. VaZvidzai vati pachadomwazve vanhu vachamirira bato ravo kuSADC, COMMESA, North Africa, West Africa nekuMIddle East. No media source currently available

headline: Dare reSupreme Court muAmerica Rinorasa Chikumbiro ChaVaTrump Chekuti Zvakabuda Musarudzo Zviraswe
text: Dare repamusorosoro remuAmerica, reSupreme Court, neChishanu rakarasa nyaya yakanga ichitsigirwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump yekuti dare rirase zvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, izvo zvakaratidza kuti VaJoe Biden ndivo vakakunda. Danho redare reSupreme Court iri rasvitsa kumagumo kurwisa kwaVaTrump kwekuda kuti vatongi vematare ematunhu nevatongi venyika vatambire chikumbiro chavo. Mumutongo waro muchidimbu, dare repamusorosoro iri rakati dunhu reTexas harina masimba ekuendesa kumatare matunhu anoti Michigan, Georgia, Pennsylvania neWisconsin nekuti harina kuratidza zvikonzero zvinotambirika zvingaita kuti ripindire mukuitwa kwesarudzo nerimwe dunhu. Vatongi vanoti Justice Samuel Alito naJustice Clarence Thomas, vakambenge vati dare harina masimba ekurasa nyaya dziri pakati pematunhu, vachiti vaifanirwa kunzwa chinyunyuto chedunhu reTexas. Asi havaikwanisa kuita zvaidiwa neTexas pachimirirwa kugadziriswa kwenyaya nekusendekwa kwemavhoti makumi matanhatu nemaviri kana kuti 62 akawanikwa naVaBiden kubva kumatunhu mana aya. Vatongi vatatu vakadomwa naVaTrump vari kudare repamusorosoro iri. Mukuedza kwavo kuti mutongi wavakadoma, Justice Amy Coney Barrett, vakasike kutoreswa mhiko, VaTrump vakati vaidikanwa kuitira kuzobata nyaya dzaizosvitswa kumatare dzine chekuita nesarudzo. Justice Barrett vanoratidza kunge vakapindawo mukunzwikwa kwenyaya dzose svondo rino. Pavatongi vakadomwa naVaTrump vose, hapana zvinoratidza kuti vakapesana nevamwe vatongi munyaya dzose idzi. Mutongo uyu wakave wepiri svondo rino wekuraswa kwezvikumbiro zvebato reRepublican zvekuda kuti dare iri ripindire mune zvakabuda musarudzo dza 2020. Nemusi weChipiri vatongi vedare vakarasa zvakare chikumbiro chakanga chasvitswa kudare nenhengo dzebato reRepublican dziri mudunhu rePennsylvania. Chikwata chevanhu vanodomwa nematunhu ose emuAmerica chinovhota chichisarudza mutungamiri wenyika, kana kuti Electoral College, chiri kusangana neMuvhuro kuti chisarudze zviri pamutemo VaBiden semunhu achazove mutungamiri wenyika.

headline: Zanu PF Yoita Nyoka Huru Yozviruma
text: Vamwe vevanhu vakadzingwa muZanu PF neChina vanoti zvakaitika muPolitiburo yeZanu PF munongedzo mukuru wekuti Zimbabwe ichange yotongwa nevanhu vatsva munguva pfupi inotevera. Mashoko aya anotevera kudzingwa pamwe nekumiswa kwedzimwe nhengo dzeZanu PF dzichipomerwa mhosva yekushanda muchivande naAmai Joice Mujuru. No media source currently available Kunyange hazvo vazhinji vevakadzingwa ava varamba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi, mumwe wevakadzingwa ava, Va Kudakwashe Bhasikiti, avo vaimbova gurukota redunhu reMasvingo, vaudza Studio7 parunhare vari ku Mwenezi kuti kudzingwa kwavakaitwa uku kuchaita kuti Zimbabwe ive nehutungamiri hutsva munguva inotevera vachiti Mwari ane chikonzero nezvakaitika izvi. Vaimbova mutauriri weZanu PF avo vakadzingwa kare mu Zanu PF, Va Rugare Gumbo, vanoti munhu ari kufara nezviri kuitika mu Zanu PF izvi, igurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Va Jonathan Moyo, avo vavanoti vari kupwanya bato iri vari mukati maro. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weZanu PF, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe pfungwa dzavo panyaya iyi. Hatinawo kubata VaJonathan Moyo kuti tinzwewo divi ravo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano re Habbakuk Trust, Va Dumisani Nkomo, vanoti kudzingwa kwevanhu ava kune chekuita nekurwisana kuri kuitika mu Zanu PF panyaya yekuti achatora matomhu kubva kuna Va Mugabe ndiani. Zvichakadai, mukuru wesangano rinowona nezvesarudzo munyika, re Election Resource Centre, Va Tawanda Chimhini, vati kudzingwa kwakaitwa vanhu ava, vamwe vavo vanove nhengo dzeparamende, kuchakonzerawo zvakare kuti nyika irasikirwe nemari yakawanda ichashandiswa pakutsvaga nhengo dzekuvatsiva muparamende. Politburo yeZanu PF yakagara pasi neChina ikabvumirana kudzinga vaimbova sachigaro webato iri mu Mashonaland West, uye vari nhengo yeparamende, Va Ray Kaukonde, vaimbova gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, Amai Olivia Muchena, mumiriri weMwenezi muparamende, Va Kudakwashe Bhasikiti, vanga vachimirira Mbire muparamende, Va David Butau, vaimbova sachigaro wedunhu reMasvingo, Va Killian Gwanetsa, vaimbova gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, Va Dzikamai Mavhaire, Va Claudious Makova, avo vanga vari nhengo ye Central Committee, pamwe na Va Kudakwashe Gope avo vanga vari nhengo yepurovhinzi ye Mashonaland Central. Politburo yakabvumiranawo zvakare kumbomisa basa dzimwe nhengo gumi nenhatu kwemakore mashanu uye nhengo idzi dzinosanganisira vaimbova gurukota rezvevashandi, Va Nicholas Goche, vaimbova nhengo ye Politburo, Va Tendai Savanhu, Va Munacho Mutezo, Va Chrsitopher Chigumba, Va Amos Midzi nevamwe.

headline: VaMawarire Vanonzi Vabvise Mazana Matatu eMadhora seMari yeChibatiso
text: Asi VaMawarire havana kukwanisa kuburitswa mujeri sezvo mapepa avo ekuburitswa mujeri anga asati aunganidzwa sezvinodiwa nemutemo. Dare reHigh Court rapa Mufundisi Evan Mawarire mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomera yekuronga zvekupidigura hurumende yaVaMugabe. VaMawarire, avo vakasungwa svondo rapera panhandare yendege yeHarare International Airport, vanzi vabhadhare mari yechibatiso inoita mazana matatu emadhora, uye kusiya kudare pasipoti yavo. Mutongi wedare, VaClement Phiri, vati VaMawarire vanofanira kuzvipira kumapurisa kaviri pasvondo. Asi VaMawarire havana kukwanisa kuburitswa mujeri sezvo mapepa avo ekuburitswa mujeri anga asati aunganidzwa sezvinodiwa nemutemo. Magweta avo anoti vari kutarisirwa kuburitswa mujeri neChina masikati. VaMawarire vanonzi vakashandisa dandemutande vachikurudzira veruzhinji pasi rose kuti varatidzire kumusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly wakaitirwa kuNew York gore rapera. Hurumende inoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti VaMawarire vaikurudzira kuti veruzhinji vapandukire hurumende. VaMawarire vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi vachiti chavari kuda chete ndechekuti VaMugabe vachisiya basa vachiti vatadza kutungamira nyika zvakanaka. VaMawarire vakambosungwa gore rapera asi nyaya yavo yakaraswa nedare redzimhosva richiti kodzero dzavo dzainge dzatyora. Vakabuda munyika gore rapera vachiti vari kutyira hupenyu hwavo. Pavakadzoka neChitatu chapfuura, vakabva vasungwa vachingosvika panhandare yendege muHarare. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mumatare, nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare repamusoro-soro negurukota rinowona nezvedzidzo yepamusoro, VaJonathan Moyo, yekuti komisheni inorwisana nehuori yeZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission haina simba rekuvasunga, yapfuudzirwa kumberi nedare sezvo mapepa akakwidzwa kudare nemagweta aVaMoyo anzi anga asina kunyorwa manhamba pamapeji. Nyaya iyi ichadzoka mudare muzuva risina kutarwa nedare. VaMoyo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekushandisa mari inodarika zviuru mazana mana zvemadhora kubva muhomwe yeZimbabwe Manpower Development Fund zvine huori mukati. Asi vari kuramba nyaya iyi vachiti vakatora mari iyi vachinopa vanotambura kuTsholotsho pamwe nekutengera madzishe nemasabhuku kunzvimbo iyi mabhasikoro.

headline: VaTshinga Dube Vanotsanangura Zvakaitika "Bhambu" Risati Raputika
text: Vaimbove gurukota rinoona nezvevakamborwa hondo yerusununguko, VaTshinga Dube, vanoti bhambu rakaputika neMugovera panguva iyo ivo nemudzimai wavo vakange vachitaura nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantine Chiwenga. VaDube vanoti vakakuvara pabvi asi mudzimai wavo akambovhiringika amedza hutsi hwakabva mubhambu iri. “Zvinhu zvacho zvakaitika nekukurumidza zvokuti ndinenge ndichinyepa kuti chii chakaitika,” VaDube vakaudza Studio7. “Takange tigere apo pakauya General Chiwenga vachida kukwazisa mudzimai wangu. Panguva iyoyo ndipo pakatanga kudhuvuka ini ndikarara pasi asi mudzimai wangu akafema hutsi hwebhambu iri vakadonha nechekumusoro kwangu. Zvinhu zvacho zvakaitika nekukurumidza.” Vanhu vakawanda vanodarika makumi mana vakakuvara pachiitiko ichi, kusanganisira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, mudzimai wemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Mary Chiwenga nevamwe. Kusvika pari zvino, vanhu vaviri vafa zvichitevera kuputika kwechombo neMugovera. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, havana kukuvara. Mutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, vanoti hurumende yaisa mari parutivi ichapihwa munhu ane mashoko achaita kuti vakapara mhosva ava vasungwe. No media source currently available

headline: VaRutanhire Vanoti Mweya yeMagamba Asina Kuvigwa Zvakanaka Yopfukira Zanu PF
text: Imwe nhengo yeZanu Politiburo inoti makakatanwa ari mubato iri ari kukonzerwa nemweya yemagamba asina kuvigwa zvakanaka munyika pamwe nekuMozambique neZambia munguva yehondo. Nhengo iyi inotiwo Zanu PF ikapedza kuradzika mapfupa emagamba ari munyika, boboto riri mubato rinopera Zanu PF ichibva yabatana zvakasimba. Mashoko aya ataurwa pakuvigwa zvakanaka kwemapfupa emagamba kuManicaland. Vachitaura pakuvigwa patsva kwemagamba aya, uko kwakarongwa nesangano re Fallen Heroes Trust of Zimbabwe, iro rinotungamirirwa naVaGeorge Rutanhire vachishanda nebazi National Museums and Monuments, VaRutanhire, avo vanova nhengo yePolitiburo vachibva kuMashonaland Central, vati kurwira masimba kuri kuitika mubato reZanu PF, kuri kukonzerwa nemweya yemagamba asati apihwa ruremekedzo rwekuvigwa zvine chiremera uye ruremekedzo mukati. VaRutanhire vatiwo vane chivimbo chekuti bato ravo richaenda kukongiresi rakabatana kana rikagadzirisa nyaya yemapfupa emagamba asina kuvigwa zvakanaka. Vachitaurawo pachiitiko ichi, mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, vatiwo hurumendee yeZanu PF inofanirwa kupa ruremekedzo kune vaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko uye kuchengeta zvakanaka vapenyu nevaimbove varwiri ava Amai Mujuru vataura mashoko aya pakuvigwa patsva kwemapfupa emagamba makumi manomwe nemumwe chete avo vakatsakatikira muhondo yerusununguko pedyo nechikoro cheHartzel mudunhu rashe Mutasa. Mapfupa aya akawanikwa gore rino ari mumugodhi usingachashandiswi weHerbert Mine, uye zvinofungidzirwa kuti magamba aya akaurayiwa nevarungu munguva yehondo ndokunokandwa mumugodhi uyu senzira yekuviga zvavange vaita. Amai Mujuru vati zvakakosha kwazvo kuti hurumende iremekedze magamba ayo akatisiya, vakatiwo zvakakosha zvakare kuti magamba mapenyu agare hupenyu hunoyemurika sezvo vakasunungura Zimbabwe. Amai Mujuru vanoti zvakatora nguva yakareba magamba aya asati apihwa ruremekedzo rwekuvigwa zvine ruremekedzo nekuda kwezvimhingamupinyi zvakasiyana siyana. Amai Mujuru, avo vari parumana nzombe mubato ravo, vanoti kunyange hazvo magamba makumi manomwe nemumwe ava vapihwa ruremekedzo rwuzere, vati vapenyu ngavabatsirwewo nehurumende. Amai Mujuru vanoti varwiri vehondo yerusununguko vapenyu havanyanyoda zvizhinji kana vakawanirwa pekutangira zvakaita sekugoverwa minda kune vaya vasina kuyiwana. MuZimbabwe mune dzimwe nzvimbo dzine magamba asati avigwa zvizere kusanganiriwo kuMozambique nekuZambia. Vamwe vanyarikani vange vari pachiitiko ichi vanosanganisira, gurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaKembo Mohadi, gurukota remuhofisi memutungamiri wenyika, VaDidymus Mutasa, gavhuna weManicaland, VaChris Mushowe, munyori wezvemadzimai mu Zanu PF, Muzvare Oppah Zvipange Muchinguri, nevamiriri veparamende vane chitsama. No media source currently available

headline: Va Solomon Tembo Vokwikwidza Chigaro chaMeya weAllentown
text: Vagari vemudhorobha re Allentown, mudunhu re Pennsylvania mu America, vari kuvhota neChipiri musarudzo yekutsvaga meya weguta iri. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kukwikwidzawo musarudzo iyi, VaSolomon Tembo, vanoti vanovimba kuti vahakunda vamwe vana vavari kukwikwidzana navo. Kunyange hazvo sarudzo dzatanga zvisina mutsindo nekuda kwevanhu vashoma vari kuenda kunovhota, VaTembo vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti vanokunda musarudzo iyi vachiti vakaita zvose zvinoita kuti vadiwe nevagari vemuguta ravo munguva yavaitsvaga rutsigiro. VaTembo, avo vane makore makumi mashanu nemana ekuberekwa, vanoti guta ravo ranonokerwa neshanduko yavakavimbisa kana vakasarudzwa. VaTembo, avo vasina bato riri kuvatsigira, vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kukwikwidzana nevamwe vane mapato ane mukurumbira muAmerica, havaoni izvi zvichiita kuti vakundikane sezvo chiri kusarudzwa apa ari munhu kwete bato. Asi vanove meya pari zvino, VaEdward “Ed” Pawlowski, vebato reDemocratic Party, vanoti zvavaitira vagari vemuAllentown mumakore gumi nemaviri avanga vari meya zvikuru kwazvo zvekuti vanoona vachisarudzwa zvakare kechina. Vari kutungamira chikwata chiri kutsvagira VaTembo rutsigiro, VaFrancis Mawindi, vanotiwo havaoni VaTembo vachitadza kubudirira sezvo vakavimbisa vagari kuti vachagadzirisa zviri kudzosera guta ravo kumashure, zvakaita sekushaikwa kwemabasa, kushaikwa kwepekugara pamwe nekuderedza huwandu hwemhosva dziri kuparwa muAllentown. VaMawindi vanoti humwe hwehwaro hwekutsvaga rutsigiro hwaVaTembo hwaive hwekuvimbisa dzidzo kuvana vose zvisinei nekuti mwana wemurombo here kana kuti kwete. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinove zvakare mugari wemuAllentown, VaTendai Rukambe, vanoti naivowo vanoona bhiza ravo richitanga iro kusvika patambo, vachiti sevagari, vakaedza nhengo dzaibva kumapato makuru anoti Republican Party neDemocratic Party, asi hapana chikuru chavangati vakakohwa kubva mazviri. VaTembo vanoti havaoni VaPawlowski vachisarudzwa nevagari sezvo vaine mhosva dzinodarika makumi mashanu dzavakatarisana nadzo dziri kumatare edzimhosva. Asi ivo VaPawlowski vati havaoni izvi zvichivatadzisa kusarudzwa kuti vadzoke zvakare mudariro. Vamwe vari kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi ndaVaJohn Ingram, vakazvimirira, pamwe naVaRay O’Connell vebato reDemocratic Party asi zita ravo richange risiri pamagwaro ekuvhotera, zvichireva kuti vanenge vachida kuvavhotera vanoita zvekunyora zita ravo pamagwaro ekuvhotera, kana kuti write-in candidate. Guta re Allentown rakawambwa mugore ra 1762, uye pari zvino rine vanhu vanodarika zvishoma zana nemakumi maviri ezviuru. Zvichabuda musarudzo iyi zviri kutarisirwa kuziviswa usiku hweChipirii, uye vanhu vamirira kuona kuti nderipi bhiza rinobudirira kudhonza makore mana achatevera richitungamira guta iri. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voita Pfungwa Dzinopesana paRwendo rwaVaMnangagwa kuSouth Africa
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nedzematongerwo enyika dzinoti rwendo rwava Emerson Mnangagwa kuSouth Africa haruna zvarunochinja pamamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinotiwo VaMnangagwa hapana chavangachinja nekuti vange vari nhengo yehurumende yakakanganisa hupfumi hwenyika kwemakore makumi matatu nemanomwe. Asi vamwe vanotiwo VaMnangagwa vanofanira kupiwa nguva yekuti vagadzirise zviri kunetsa munyika. Mukuru wezvirongwa musangano reZimbabwe Network for Social Justice, VaTendai Mbofana, vanoti hapana chekutarisira chinobva murwendo urwu. Izvi zvinopikiswa nemukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, avo vanoti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kupiwa nguva yekugadzirisa zvinhu. No media source currently available

headline: Nera Yokurudzira Kuvandudzwa kweZec
text: Mapato anopikisa aungana zvakare muHarare neChitatu achisimbaradza nyaya yekuti sangano rinowona nezvekufambiswa kwesarudzo rivandudzwe pamberi pesarudzo achiti ave kuita gadziriro yekuratidzira mumigwagwa. Mapato anopikisa ari kushanda ari pasi peboka riri kuzvidaidza kuti National Election Reforms Agenda, kana kuti Nera, aungana panzvimbo yaari kudaidza kuti Freedom Square muHarare apo asimbisa nyaya yekupinda mumigwagwa achiratidzira kusafara nekutadza kufambisa basa kwaanoti kuri kuitwa nekomisheni inowona nezvesarudzo munyika yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti Zec. Mumwe ataura pamusangano uyu uye vari munyori mukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vaudza vanhu vauya pamusangano uyu kuti vabvumirana semapato ari muNera kuti vachapinda mumigwagwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera zvisinei kuti hurumende inoda here kana kuti kwete vachiti zvose zvinoita kuti sarudzo dzemunyika dzisafambe zvakanaka zvinofanira kugadziriswa sarudzo dzemuna 2018 dzisati dzaitwa. Mashoko aVaMwonzora aya anotevera kurambidzwa nemapurisa kwakaitwa Nera kuita musangano waitwa uyu muAfrica Unity Square vachinzi vaitire kuFreedom Square mapurisa achiti pakati pedhorobha panga pachizoitwa musangano wemakurukota ezvekunze kwenyika emunyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica dzinosanganisira Zimbabwe. Mumwe wevanhu vauya pamusangano uyu, VaWarship Dumba, vabvumirana nedanho ratorwa nemapato anopikisa ari muNera. Muzvare Eunice Nyakutsikwa avo vanga vari pamusangano uyu vati hurumende yeZanu PF haifanurwe kuramba ichiregererwa ichityora kodzero dzevanhu. VaMunyaradzi Banda, avo vataura vakamirira Amai Joice Mujuru vanove mutungamiri webato reNational People’s Party, vati bato ravo rakazvipira kushanda nemamwe mapato ari muNera kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzinoremekedza zvido zvevanhu. Vatiwo sebato riri kushanda nevakarwa muhondo uye rakatsemuka kubva muZanu PF, vanoziva chikiribidi chose chaiitwa neZanu PF mukubirira kwavanoti kunoitwa sarudzo neZanu PF. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaElias Mudzuri, avo vataura vakamirira VaTsvangirai, avo vanzi vari kunze kwenyika, vati chinodikanwa nedechekuti ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwutaure nezwi rimwechete kwete kusiya VaMugabe vachiita madiro aJojina nehupenyu hweveruzhinji. Zvichakadai, mapato anopikisa aya ati ave kuda kuti Zec ipwanywe -sarudzo dzofambiswa nesangano renyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica reSADC richibatsirana nesangano renyika dzose dziri muAfrica reAfrican Union nesangano renyika dzepasi rose reUnited Nations sezvo achiti hurumende yaVaMugabe ikaregwa ichitungamira sarudzo zvakafanana nekuenda kutsime nemugomo wakabooka. No media source currently available

headline: CCC Yokunda Zvine Mutsindo Musarudzo neKune Mamwe Maruwa
text: Bato ronopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change nemusi weMugovera rakakunda musarudzo nomwe pasere dzakaitwa munyika kutsiva vakadzingwa mumakanzuru neMDCT inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora. Bato reZanu-PF rakakunda muWard imwe chete kuPfura, Mt Darwin. CCC yakakunda kuChitungwiza, Rusape, Mutare, Mutasa neKariba. Bato reMDC Alliance rinotungamirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora harina kana kukunda muward imwe chete. Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru weCCC VaCharlton Hwende vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara nekukukunda kwavakaita nekumaruwa musarudzo idzi kunyangwe vapomera Zanu-PF mhosva yekuita mhirizhonga zvikuru kuChitungwiza. Asi mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato reZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vanogara vachiti bato ravo hariite zvemhirizhonga. VaMugwadi vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira nezvakabuda musarudzo izvi. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T VaWitness Dube vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu havasati vave kunyatsoziva bato ravo sezvo vachiti vakareverwa nhema nevanovapikisa pane zvavanomirira. Vati vanofunga kuti nekufamba kwenguva vanenge vowana rutsigiro. Zvichakadaro, vatori venhau veAlpha Media Holdings Blessed Mhlanga naChengeto Chidi vakasungwawo nemapurisa kuChitungwiza vachiita basa ravo pazuva resarudzo iri vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare neMuvhuro. Gweta ravo VaTapiwa Muchineripi vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa ari kuti vakatyora mitemo yesarudzo. Asi vaviri abs vari kuramba mhosva iyi. Sarudzo idzi dzakakundwa nevaive meya weChitungwiza VaLovemore Maiko vebato reCCC. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, sangano reZimbabwe Election Support Network rinoti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anofanira kukurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vasaite zvemhirizhonga. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzesarudzo dziri kuyambira kuti sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzinogona kuita mutauro kana mitemo yesarudzo isina kuvandudzwa.

headline: Vakawanda Vanoti VaMugabe Vanga Vogara Vari Mundege saSachigaro weSADC
text: Vanhuwo zvavo muZimbabwe vafarira kusiya husachigaro hwesangano reSouthern African Development Community, SADC, kwaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachiti izvi zvichaita kuti VaMugabe vawane nguva yekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika yavo. No media source currently available Vanhu vakawanda vanoti kubvira pavakasarudzwa pachigaro ichi gore rapfuura, VaMugave vange vave kugara mundege. VaTom Gondo vekuBudiririo ndemumwe weavo vati vanofara nekusiya chigaro cheSADC kwaitwa naVaMugabe. VaJohn Mlilo vekuMarimba vanotiwo vanofunga kuti sachigaro mutsva weSADC, uye vari mutungamiri weBotswana, VaIan Khama, vachabatsira mukugadzirisa zvinhu muZimbabwe. VaKhama vagara vachipokona nenyika dzese dzemuSADC panyaya yeZimbabwe zvikuru sei pasarudzo dzemuna 2013 idzo vanoti dzakabirwa kunyange SADC yakati dzainge dzakachena. Amai Emly Moyo vekuEastlea vanoti vanofunga kuti vachaona kubatsira kweSADC kana ichinge yave kutungamirirwa nemumwe munhu sezvo vasina chavakaona apo VaMugabe vaitungamira sangano iri. Asi Amai Melanie Gumbo vekuBindurra vanoti VaMugabe vakaita basa guru uye yava nguva yavo yekuzorora. Husachigaro hwaVaMugabe hweSADC hwange husina mutauro kana zvikaenzaniswa nemuna 1998 apo vaiva sachigaro weSADC Troika on Defence and Security apo vakatumira mauto eZimbabwe kuDemovratic Republic of Congo vasina kugara pasi nasachigaro weSADC panguva iyi, avo vaiva muchakabvu Nelson Mandela.

headline: Chitungwiza Yoberekera Ingwe kuVatsigiri veMDC?
text: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaJob Sikhala, vanoti munzvimbo yeSt Marys kuChitungwiza maberekera ingwe zviri kupa kuti vatsigiri vebato ravo vatize misha vachienda kunohwanda. VaSikhala, avo vanova mumiriri weZengeza West mudare reparamende, vanoti vatsigiri vebato ravo vari kutsvagwa nemumwe mukuru wemapurisa vangonzi vanonzi VaJabangwe munharaunda iyi vachida kusungwa. Tayedza kubata VaJabangwe asi havana kuda kupindura mibvunzo yedu. Studio7 haina kukwanisawo kunzwa kumutauriri wemapurisa,. Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, kuti seyi vatsigiri ava vari kuda kusungwa nemapurisa. Asi zvinonzi nyaya yekuda kusungwa kwevatsigiri veMDC yakanangana nekuda kuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa nebato iri munyika yose. VaSikhala, avo vakasungwa mwedzi wapera vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu vakawanda vari kutiza dzimba dzavo vachitya kusungwa. Vanhu vanopfuura makumi mapfumbamwe vakasungwa muHarare Chishanu chapfuura vachisungirwa zvine chekuita nekuratidzira kwainge kwarongwa neMDC musi uyu. Bato reMDC riri kuda kuratidzira mumaguta makuru munyika asi mapurisa ari kushandisa chikamu chemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act kurambidza bato iri kuenderera mberi nekuratidzira kwaro. Kusvika pari zvino mapurisa arambidza MDC kuti isaratidzire muHarare, Bulawayo, Gweru neMasvingo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti izvi zvinogona zvakare kuitika kwaMutare uko MDC ine hurongwa hwekuratidzira nemusi weChina. No media source currently available

headline: VaMadhuku Vanoti Sarudzo Ngadziitwe Muna 2023
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku vanoti bato ravo haritsigiri danho rekuti sarudzo dza2023 dzimbomira kuitwa kuti munyika muiitwe nhaurirano. Mashoko ekuti sarudzo dzimbosendekwa parutivi aya ari kubva kubato rinoDouglas Mwonzora. VaMadhuku vati kuda kuita izvi kunenge kwave kufanana nekupidigura hurumende nekuti muna 2023 nguva yevakasarudzwa inenge yasvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo. Vatiwo ivo ndivo vakatosarudzwa kumiririra bato ravo musarudzo idzi kunyangwe vachiti zvinogona kubviswa pakongiresi yavo iriko munZvita. Vatiwo vane chido chekuti vakwikwidze mumatunhu ose. No media source currently available

headline: America Yokurudzira Kuti Vatori veNhau Vasambunyikidzwa Vachiita Basa Ravo
text: Mugwaro ravakabudisa, mutevedzeri wemukuru wemapurisa eFederal Bureau of Investigation (FBI), VaWilliam Sweeney, vakati chikwata chinotsigirwa nehurumende yeIran chakaedza kubvuta mutori wenhau anogara muAmerica kuti vamudzorere zvechisimba kuIran. Mutori wenhau uyu ndiMuzvare Masih Alinejad, akazvarirwa kuIran asi ave mugari wemuAmerica. Kwemakore mazhinji, Alinejad akashanda semutori wenhau muIran, izvo zvakakonzera kuti hurumende yeIran ishatirwe naye pamusoro pezvaakange achibudisa pachena. Kubva zvaatiza kubva kuIran muna 2009, Alinejad ave nemukurumbira pa’social media’, paanogara achishora kumanikidzwa kwevanhukadzi muIran kuti vashandise jira rekuvhara misoro yavo, kana kuti hijab. MuAmerica, Alinejad anechirongwa chaanokokera panhephenyuro yeVoice of America. Mutauriri wemuzinda weWhite House, Amai Jen Psaki, vakashora Iran mukuronga kubvuta Alinejad, vachiti Iran inoda kunyaradza manzwi eavo vanoshanda murugare muIran nekune dzimwe nyika. Muongororo inonzi ‘2021 World Press Freedom Index’, yakaitwa nekunyorwa nesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatori venhau, reReporters Without Borders, Iran iri pachinzvimbo chezana nemakumi manomwe nechina (174) kubva munyika zana nemakumi masere (180) dzinobvumira vatori venhau kushanda vakasununguka. Sangano iri rinoti, mukudzvanyirira vatori venhau, hurumende yeIran inoshandisa nzira dzechisimba, dzinosanganisira kuvabvunzurudza, kuvaisa mumajeri kana kuvauraya. Sekutaura kwakaitwa negurukota reAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaAntony Blinken, Iran haisi iyo nyika yega inoshungurudza nekumbunyikidza vatori venhau. VaBlinken vakati hofisi iri mubazi ravo yakabudisa zvayakawana muongororo yayakaita, inonzi Human Rights Report, inotatidza kuti vatori venhau vazhinji varikumbunyikidzwa nekuurairwa basa ravo. Sangano rinorwira kuchengetedza kwevatori venhau, reCommittee to Protect Journalists, rinoti muna 2020, huwandu wevatori venhau vakaurayirwa kuita basa ravo hwakapetwa kaviri, richiti vatori venhau vazhinji vakaurawa muMexico neAfghanistan. Sangano iri rinotivo huwandu hwevatori venhau vakasungirwa kuita basa ravo mugore ra2020 hwakasvika pahusina kumbosvika kubva zvavatanga kuongorora kunetseka pabasa kwevatori venhau, richiti vazhinji vevatori venhau vakasungwa muPeople’s Republic of China, Turkey, nemuEgypt. Mushure mekuziviswa kuti Iran yakange yaedza kumubvuta muAmerica, Masih Alinejad akataura pfungwa dzevatori venhau pasi pose achiti haazoregi kuita basa rake, sezvo zvese zvirikuitika kwaari zvichimusimbaradza. VaBlinken vanoti chokwadi chinobudiswa nevatori venhau chinobatsira mukuvaka hurumende dzejekerere, vachitizve vanokurudzira hurumende dzepasi pose kuti dzichengetedze vatori venhau uye kuti dzione kuti vatori venhau vanoita basa ravo pasina njodzi. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Inoti Iri Kuita Hurukuro Dzekuti America Ibvise Zvirango Zvose
text: Zanu PF inoti iri kuita hurukuro nehurumende yaVaDonald Trump iine chinangwa chekuti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru mubato iri, zvibviswe. Sachigaro veZanu PF muNorth America Province, VaRegis Charumbira, vanoti pamusoro pekutaura nehurumende yaVaTrump, vari kutaurawo nenhengo dzedare reSenate, zvikuru komiti inoona nezvekudyidzana kweAmerica nedzimwe nyika kuitira kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe zvachose. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuhurumende yeAmerica kuti inoti kudii pane zviri kutaurwa neZanu PF. Asi gore rapera, VaTrump vakawedzera negore zvirango zvakamerwa vamwe vari muhurumende, muZanu PF pamwe nemakambani avanodyidzana nawo. America yakaisa vanhu nemakambani emuZimbabwe zana nemakumi mana nemumwe pazvirango. Vanhu ava vanosanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nevamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende yavo. Muna Gumiguru gore rapera, America yakaisa pazvirango gurukota rezvekusora, VaOwen Ncube, ichivapomera mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Asi VaCharumbira vanoti vane tarisiro yekuti zvirango izvi zvichabviswa zvose sezvo zviri kuomesera vana veZimbabwe, zvikuru vanoshupika. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe weVechidiki Anorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu Otyorwa Gumbo Mushure Mekupambwa neVasori
text: Mumwe wevari kutungamira nyaya yekuratidzira kusatambira kuparurwa kwemari yemabond notes, VaIshmael Kauzani, vakapambwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vakarorwa zvakaipisisa uye kutsikwa gumbo nemotokari richibva ratyoka. VaKauzani vari muchipatara chemuHarare mu “intensive care unit” munorapwa vanenge vachirwarisa. Mukoma wavo, VaGodfrey Kauzani, vakaurayiwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori muna 2008 apo panonzi pakaurayiwa vechidiki vakawanda veMDC-T munguva yesarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzechipiri kana kuti run off. Vamwe vechidiki vatanhatu vakasungwawo nemusi weChitatu vachinzi vaikurudzira vanhu kuti vasatambire mabond notes vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso inosvika zana remadhora. Pane vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso, pane mukomana ane makore gumi nemashanu anonzi Costa Zvokusekwa. NeChina vamwe vechikwata cheTajamuka vatatu vanosanganisira VaPromise Mkwananzi vakasungwa neMuvhuro vakapihwawo mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso inosvika madhora mazana maviri. Vose vari kusungwa vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu chechimakumi matatu nenomwe chemutemo weCriminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act vachinzi vari kukurudzira mhirizhonga uye kuita musarinya. Magweta ari kumirira vanhu ava inhengo dzeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaObey Shava naVaJeremiah Bamu. VaShava vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe vanhu vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso vari kushaya mari kumabhanga zvopa kuti vasungwe vagare mujeri kwenguva yakareba. No media source currently available

headline: United Nations Yobatsira Vapoteri veZimbabwe Vodzingwa kuBotswana
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevapoteri pasi rose reUNHCR kumaodzanyemba kweAfrica rinoti riri munhaurirano nehurumende yeBotswana dzekutsvaga nzira yekupedza dambudziko rakasangana nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muhupoteri muBotswana. Pane vapoteri mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe kusanganisira vana vadiki vari kutsika madziro munyaya yekuti vazvipire kudzoserwa kumusha muchirongwa chevoluntary repatration vachiti kuZimbabwe kwakaberekera ingwe. Kunyangwe hazvo hurumende yeBotswana yaiti bazi rinoona nezvekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu munyika iyi richavaita musengabere mushure mekudzosera vamwe vavo mazana mana nemakumi maviri kubva munaZvita kusvika pakati kwemwedzi uno, vapoteri ava vari kuramba vakamira semusambangwena. Muzvare Heinn Shin, avo vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko musangano reUNHCR, vaudza Studio7 kuti vari munhaurirano nehurumende yeBotswana senzira yekutsvaga pundutso panyaya iyi. Muzvare Shin vaenderera mberi vachiti vapoteri ava, vane makore anopinda gumi vari muhupoteri pamuzinda weDukwi Refugee Camp muBotswana, vhavasi kufara nekuda kudzoserwa kumusha nechisimba. Sezvo Botswana yakaisa ruoko rwayo pachibvumirano chekuchengetedza kodzero dzevapoteri che1951 UN Refugee Convention, Muzvare Shin vanoti nyika iyi inosungirwa kupa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe hupoteri vachiti kusadaro kumbunyikidza kodzero dzevapoteri nokuti hupenyu hwavo hunogona kupinda munataisireva kana vakadzoserwa kunyika yavo. Vachitsigira mashoko aMuzvare Shin, gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika yeBotswana, VaKagiso Mmusi vanoti hurumende yavo haisikudzosera kumusha avo vasiri kuda nechisimba kumusha. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe icho chiri muhupoteri, Amai Toendepi Mverechena vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakanzwawo nerunyerekupe kuti sangano reUHNCR riri kutaurirana nehurumende yeBotswana kuti vatsvagirwe kwavangaendeswe. Vachitsigira mashoko aAmai Mverechena, mumwe ari muhupoteri achibva kuZimbabwe uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo achitya kubvongodza muto kuseva achada, anoti kupindira kweUNHCR munyaya yavo kwaunza kugadzikana muhana dzevazhinji sezvo hurumende yeBotswana yati dzikamei. Pari zvino, paDukwi Refugee Camp pasara vapoteri zviuru zviviri chete zvinosanganisira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, Somalia, Uganda, Burundi nedzimwewo nyika dzekumabvazuva kweAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu-PF Yoita Sarudzo neSvondo Vamwe Vachigunun'una
text: Sarudzo dzekutsvaga vachamirira Zanu PF musarudzo dzichaitwa, kana kuti primary elections, dziri kuitwa nemusi weSvondo kunyange hazvo paine kugunun’una kwevamwe kuti vakarambidzwa kutsvaga rutsigiro nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Vari kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi vari kunzi vafambe vose pamwe chete vachitsvaga rutsigiro uye kuratidza kuti vanotsigirawo zvizere mutungamiri webato iri, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vari kukwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Munyori wezvemutemo mubato reZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti sarudzo idzi dzinoitwa musi mumwe chete.  No media source currently available

headline: Vaimbove Mutungamiri weHurumende yeJapan, VaShinzo Abe, Vanourayiwa
text: Vaimbove mutungamiri wehurumende yeJapan, VaShinzo Abe, vapfurwa ndokufa apo vanga vachitaura pamusangano wekutsvagira bato ravo rutsigiro kumawirira kweJapan. VaAbe, avo vanga vave nemakore makumi matanhatu nemanomwe ekuberekwa, vashaya vari mune chimwe chipatara muNara, umo vanga vachirapwa vari zvichitevera kupfurwa kwavaitwa nepfuti inenge yakagadzirwa kumba. Vanga vachitaura vari panokwirirwa zvitima muguta reNara, kumabvazuva kweOsaka, apo vasvikira nekugotsi kwavo nemurume anga aine pfuti uyo avapfura. Mavhidhiyo ari kutenderera pamadandemutande anoratidza kuti vanga vachiona zvanga zvichiitika vamboedza kuvabatsira. VaAbe vakapinda muhofisi muna 2006 vakatonga kwegore vachizodzoka zvakare muna 2012 kusvika muna 2020 apo vakazosiya chigaro nekuda kwehutano hwavo.

headline: Vanhu VemuSouth Carolina muAmerica Vomira neMhuri yekwaDzamara
text: Sangano reAmnesty International muCharleston, South Carolina muno muAmerica rakaparura chirongwa paFacebook chekukurudzira vanhu pasi rose kuti vatsigire mhuri yemurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu akapambwa akatsakatika gore rapera, VaItai Dzamara. Sangano iri riri kukurudzira vanhu kuti vatorwe mifananidzo ine mashoko ainge akatakurwa nemunin’ina wavadzamara, Doctor Patson Dzamara, pavakarohwa kuNational Sports Stadium musi wezuva rekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere ekuti vanhu vakasununguka asi munyika hamuna rugare uye kuti itai aripi. VaPatson Dzamara vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nevanofungiudzirwa kuti vasori nemapurisa mushure mekuratidzira uku. Vari kutungamira hurongwa uhu muCharleston Amai Anna Shockley vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatombonyora tsamba kumutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemukuru wemapurisa VaAugustine Chihuri vachikurudzira kuti vatsvage kuna VaDzamara. Amai Shockley vati semudzimai vari kurwadziwa kuti mudzimai waVaItai Dzamara, Amai Sheffra ari kunzwa sei kubva zvapambwa murume wake. Vati vanhu vemuSouth Carolina vakawanda vari kushushikana zvakanyanyaya nekupambwa kwaVaDzamara. Doctor Dzamara vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara nedanho ratorwa neAmnetsy International kuSouth Carolina rekumira nemhuri yavo. No media source currently available Vanoda kutumira mifanidzo yavo kutsigira kuratidzira uku vari kukurudzirwa kuti vaatumire paemail inoti annascadp@gmail.com.

headline: VaMnangagwa Votaura nezveGukurahundi Uye Kuendesa Masimba kuMatunhu kuBulawayo
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa voita musangano nevemasangano akazvimirira asi mumwe mutori wenhau achisungwa pamusangano wacho. VaMnangagwa vapinda mumusangano wanhasi negurukota rezvekugarisana nevanhu Dr Sekai Nzenza avo vati wafamba zvakanaka chose. Dr Nzenza vaudza Studio 7 kuti musangano uyu wange wakanangana nekuendesa masimba kumatunhu uye wakakokerwa naAmai Jenny Williams vesangano reWoza vanotungamirawo mubatanidzwa wemasangano akazvimirira oga muBulawayo. Chikamu chikuru chemusangano pakati pemutungamiri wenyika nevemasangano akazvimirira ega chaitwa vatapi venhau vaburitswa mumusangano uyu sezvo zvanzi zvange zvichikurukurwa zvange zvichifanirwa kuve pakati pemutungamiri wenyika nevemasangano aya. Vamwe vapinda mumusangano uyu vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya yekuuraiwa kwevanhu panguva yeGukurahundi ndeimwe yakurukurwa zvikuru pamusangano uyu. Pazobvumidzwa vatori venhau kupinda mumusangano uyu zvekare VaMnangagwa vatenda vemasangano aya nekuuya kwavaita vachiti vanzwa zvavataura vachivimbisawo kuti vachaita kuti pave nemukana wekusanganazve navo nekukasika. Aka ndekekutanga VaMnangagwa vachiita musangano wakadai nemasangano anoshanda ari mumatunhu eMatabeleland. Zvichakadaro, mutori wenhau Zenzele Ndebele uyo anove mutungamiri wesangano reCentre for Innovation and Technology, CITE, asungwa panze peState House apo pange pachiitwa musangano pakati paVaMnangagwa nevemamwe masangano akazvimirira. Ndebele azoendeswa kukamba yemapurisa kuHillside uko kwaanosvika kupomerwa mhosva yekuwanikwa aine zvigaba zvakashanda zvehutsi hunokachidza kana kuti tear gas canister. Sangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa, MISA, rabudisa mashoko paTwitter richizivisawo nezvekusungwa kwaNdebele. Vamwewo vatori venhau vanoshanda vakazvimirira vega varambidzwawo kupinda mumusangano uyu vachinzi vange vasina kukokwa. Pamenus Tuso ndemumwe wevatori venhau vanoshanda vakazvimirira vega varambidzwa kupinda mumusangano uyu. Tuso uyo anove sachigaro weMedia Centre muBulawayo ashora mabatirwo evatapi venhau akadai. Dr Nzenza vati VaMnangagwa vachaita misangano yakadai nemamwe masangano akazvimirira kune mamwe matunhu. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzotaura Pamusoro peSarudzo dzemuAmerica
text:
Vari kutevera zviri kuitika muAmerica vanoti Zimbabwe ine zvekudzidza zvakawanda kubva mumafambisirwo enyaya dzesarudzo dzemuAmerica.

Sachigaro vesangano reZimbabwe Election Support Network,
VaAndrew Makoni, vanoti kunyange hazvo pane musiyano wekuti muAmerica hamuna boka rimwe chete rinoona nezvesarudza semuZimbabwe umo mune Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, sarudzo dzemuAmerica dzinoratidza kuti dzinoitwa nenzira dziri pachena.

VaMakoni vanoti mapepanhau nenhepfenyuro dzemuAmerica dzinogona kutaura zviri kuitika musarudzo kusanganisira zviri kubuda musarudzo, kana kudaidzira kuti ndiyano akunda, zvinhu zvinoratidza pachena
kuremekedzwa kwevatapi venhau.

VaMakoni vanoti chimwe chidzidzo chakakosha ndechekuti vari kukwikwidza vanenge vasingagutsikane nezvabuda musarudzo vanogona kuenda kumatare nekukasika, vachitiwo veruzhinji vanobvumidzwawo kuratidzira pane zvavasiri kufara nazvo asi izvi zvose zvichiitwa murunyararo.

Chimwe chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe chiri kuAmerica mudunhu reNorth Carolina, Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoti kubudiswa kuri kuitwa zviri kubuda musarudzo dzemuAmerica, kunoratidza kuti zvinhu zvose zvinoitwa pachena uyewo kunoratidza kuremekedzwa kwevatori venhau.

Dr Ranga vanotiwo kunyange hazvo vanhu vanenge vapinda musarudzo vaine shungu dzekuti munhu wavanenge vavhotera akunde, zvakakoshawo kuti vanhu vanokwanisa kutambira zvinenge zvabuda zvose zvichiitwa murunyararo.

Mukuru wesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa, MISA Zimbabwe,
VaTabani Moyo, vanoti kuvepo kwemapepanhau nenhepfenyuro zvichikwanisa kutaura nezvesarudzo pasina kumbunyikidzwa kunobatsira kuti sarudzo dzacho dziwonekwewo sedzakachena.

Vakawanda, zvikuru vemapato anopikisa muZimbabwe vanogara vakachema nedambudziko rekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwesarudzo dzemuZimbabwe idzo dzinogara dzakamutsa mutauro mukuru vakawanda vachiti dzinenge dzabiridzirwa. Kunyange hazvo sarudzo dzemuAmerica dzichiitawo mutauro, nyika iyi ine mitemo inoita kuti mitauro iyi iagadziriswe nematare munguva yakafanira, izvo zvisingaitike nguva zhinji muZimbabwe. Semuenzaniso, zvakabuda musarudzo yemumiriri weChegutu West pakati paVaDexter Nduna veZanu PF naVaGift Konjana veMDC Alliance, hazvisati zvagadziriswa kwemakore maviri nyaya iyi iri mumatare. Ukuwo zvakapikiswa nenhengo dzeMDC musarudzo dza2008, hazvina kana kumbonzwikwa mumatare edzimhosva kusvika temu yeparamende yapera. Maitiro akadai anoita kuti vanhu vakawanda veZimbabwe vayemure mafambisirwo esarudzo dzemuAmerica, pamwe nedzimwe nyika dzinoremekedza mitemo yadzo. No media source currently available

headline: SADC Troika Inoti Mozambique Ngaibatsirwe Izvozvi
text:
Nyika dzinoumba bazi rerinoona nezverunyararo nekudzivirirwa kwenyika
dziri mudunhu reSouthern African Development Community, SADC Troika- nhasi dzabuda nechisunga chekuti paitwe musangano wechimbichimbi mwedzi uno usati wapera wekuzeya matanho angatorwe kumisa hondo iri kukonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero mudunhu reCabo Delgado muMozambique. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasangana ndokukurukura nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzinoumba SADC Double Troika iyo ine mutungamiri weMozambique, VaFilipe Jacinto Nyusi, sasachigaro wayo, Dr Lazarus Chakwena vekuMalawi, VaHusseini Ali Mwinyi vekuTanzania pamwe nevatungamiri venyika dzinoumba bazi reOrgan on Politics, Defence and Security Cooperation vanoti sachigaro VaMokgweetsi Masisi vekuBotswana naVaCyril Ramaphosa vekuSouth Africa. VaMwinyi vanga vakamirira mutungamiri wavo, Amai Samia Saluhu Hassan, avo vange vasiri pamusangano uyu. Mugwaro razivisa zvabuda mumusangano uyu munyori weSADC, VaStergomena Lawrence Tax, vazivisa kuti vatungamiri venyika vari kushushikana zvikuru nekuurayiwa kuri kuitwa vanhuwo zvavo, madzimai nevana nevanopfurikidza mwero veAl Shabab. VaTax vati nekudaro musangano weDouble Troika wati paitwe musangano
wechimbichimbi weOrgan Troika Summit musi wa29 Kubvumbi uyo uchazeya matanho achatorwa kumisa hondo iri kukonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero ava. Gweta uye vari mukuru wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe
kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vati vanga vachitarisira kuti musangano uyu ubude nechisungo chakajeka chekuyamura Mozambique kwete kunonokera wavari kuita vanhu vachifa.

VaMavhinga vati ongororo yavakaita yakaburitsa pachena kuti vanhu
vakawanda vari kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo nevapanduki veAl Shabab pamwe nemauto eMozambique.

VaMavhinga vati chimwe chinoshamisa ndechekuti Mozambique
haisi kubuda pachena kuti inoda ruyamuro rwedzimwe nyika here kana kuti kwete asi zvichioneka pachena kuti mauto ayo haana simba rekukunda vapanduki ava.

Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvellous Khumalo, vati
havasi kunyatsofara nezvabuda mumusangano wanhasi nekuti SADC iri kunonoka kupindiria panguva iyo vanhu vari kufa.

Izvi zvatsigirwa negweta rinoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu munyika
yeZambia VaMuleta Kapatiso avo vanoti pamutemo nyika dzinosungirwa
kuyamura imwe nekukurumidza kana yave kurwiswa nevapanduki.

Mumwe mugari wemuMozambique, Amai Nzira De Deus, vati madzimai
nevanasikana vari kubatwa chibharo mazuva ose. Stuio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa zvimwe zvabuda mumusangano wanhasi kumutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi pane mashoko ekuti SADC yawiriranawo kuti ipe Mozambique rubatsiro rwezvikwanisiro izvozvi panguva iyo mumwe musangano uri kurongwa kuitwa. Sangano reUnited Nations vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi , 670 000, vanonzi vakatiza misha yavo mudunhu reCabo Delgado, vachityira hupenyu hwavo. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Yozeya Mutemo weSarudzo weElectoral Amendment Bil
text: Dare reNational Assembly riri kuzeya mutemo wesarudzo weElectoral Amendment Bill, uye chibvumirano chemapato ezvematongerwo enyika chekuita sarudzo dzakachena dzisina mhirizhonga, cheElectoral Code of Conduct for Political Parties and Candidates and Other Stakeholders chapinzwawo mubhiri iri kuti chive mumutemo wesarudzo. Bhiri iri rakanangana nekuvanduza mitemo yesarudzo kuti nyika ikwanise kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Zvimwe zviri kudiwa nemapato anopikisa kuti mapato aya avewo nechekuita pamwe nekuongorora kudhindwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot papers. Mapato aya anodawo kuti mitemo yesarudzo usungire mapato kuti ape mukana wakaenzana kuvanhukadzi nevanhurume pazvinzvimbo zvese zvino kwikwidzwa musarudzo. Chibvumirano chemapato chekuita sarudzo dzakachena icho chapinzwa mumitemo yesarudzo, chinorambidza nyaya dzemhirizhonga uye chinosungira kuti vemapato, vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, vanokwikwidza musarudzo vapanane mukana pamwe nekuregawo vamwe vachitaura pfungwa dzavo pamwe nekupinda mumisangano pamadiro. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungurirawo kuti vanhu vapihwe mukana wekuzvishambadza uye chinoti vaye vachazenge vachibvisa kana kubvarurwa zvinyorwa zvevamwe kana kuti maposters, varangwe nemutemo. No media source currently available Chibvumirano ichi chinorambidzawo kutenga vavhoti kana kutyityidzira vanhu kuti vavhotere bato rinenge richida munhu. Chinorambidzawo vemapato kuti vataure zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo zvisati zvaziviswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vati danho rekuisa chibvumirano chemapato mumutemo wesarudzo chakanaka chose. VaMadhuku vati sezvo wave mutemo vanenge vautyora vacharangwa. Vati kana mutemo mutsva wesarudzo ukatevedzwa, nyika inogona kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungirawo vemapato ezvematongerwe enyika kurega vatapi venhau vachipinda mumisangano yawo yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamwe nekuvachengetedza. Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati vanofara nenyaya yekuti vatapi venhau vachengetedzwe pavenenge vachiita basa ravo. VaMoyo vati vatapi venhau vanogara vachishungurudzwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika zvikuru munguva yesarudzo uye mutemo unofanira kubuda nezvirango zvakaomarara kune vanoshungurudza vatapi venhau. Dare richiri kuzeya bhiri iri uye rinotarisirwa kuripasisa chero nguva

headline: Electoral College Yosarudza Mutungamiri weAmerica
text: Izvi zvinotevera sarudzo dzekudoma vanhu vaizosarudza mutungmiri wenyika ava dzakaitwa nezvizvarwa zveAmerica muna Mbudzi mumatunhu ose enyika aizokwikwidza akamirira bato ravo. Vanhu vanokwana kuita mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevasere vavhota muAmerica vachisarudza mutungamiri wenyika, sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika iyi, kana kuti Electoral College. Chikwata chevanhu ava chinomirira nhengo dzedare reparamende dzinoita mazana mana nemakumi matatu neshanu, dzeseneti dzinoita zana pamwe nevatatu vanomirira guta guru renyika reDistrict of Columbia vavhota kuti vasarudze mutungami wenyika nemutevedzeri wake. Izvi zvinotevera sarudzo dzekudoma vanhu vaizosarudza mutungmiri wenyika ava dzakaitwa nezvizvarwa zveAmerica muna Mbudzi mumatunhu ose enyika aizokwikwidza akamirira bato ravo. Vakakunda musarudzo dzakaitwa munaMbudzi ndaVaDonald Trump vebato re Republican Party, avo vakakunda Amai Hillary Clinton vaimirira bato re Democratic Party. Asi Amai Clinton ndivo vakawana mavhoti akawanda kudarika VaTrump, izvo zvinonzi nevamwe ndizvo zvinofanirwa kunge zvichiteverwa pakusarudzwa kwemutungamiri wenyika. VaTrump vanotarisirwa kukunda sezvo vakasarudzwa nematunhu akawanda anosvika mazana matatu nematanhatu, zvichienzaniswa neakasarudza Amai Clinton mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nemaviri. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vachitungamira sangano reBuild Zimbabwe Alliance, Doctor Noah Manyika, vanoti havaoni paine zvinoshandurwa nesarudzo dzeElectoral College idzi sezvo VaTrump vakatosarudzwa kare nevakavavhotera. Zvichabuda musarudzo idzi zvichaziviswa zviri pamutemo musi wa6 Ndira, 2017 mushure mekunge mavhoti aya everengwa nedare reparamende. Doctor Manyika vanotiwo nzira yekusarudza nayo mutungamiri wenyika iyi kana kuti Electoral College iyi, haishande muZimbabwe sezvo musina matunhu anozvimirira akaita seemuAmerica, ayo anozviitira oga zvinhu zvawo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vanoungana muNhandare yeOrlando Vachirangarira Amai Madikizela Mandela
text: Vanhu vakawanda vakabva kumativi mana enyika vakaungana nezuro muOrlando Stadium muSoweto vachirangarira mabasa akaitwa nemurwiri werusununguko muSouth Africa, Amai Winnie Madikizela Mandela, avo vakashaya nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rapera. Vanhu vazhinji vakaenda kumunamato wekurangarira Amai Mandela vakabva kumapato ezvematongerwo enyika akasiyanasiyana emuSouth Africa, vamiririri vemizinda yedzimwe nyika muSouth Africa, pamwe nehama neshamwari, kunyange hazvo vanhu vakawanda vakange vari pamunamato uyu vaive vanhukadzi. Vachitaura pamunamato uyu, imwe nhengo yeANC, Amai Jessy Duarte, vakati Amai Mandela vakange riri gamba, vari munhu asina humbimbindoga. Vachitaurawo pachiitiko ichi, mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaDavid Mabuza, vakati Amai Mandela vakachengeta vanhu vakawanda mumba mavo apo vatema vakange vachirwira rusununguko. Vakatiwo Amai Mandela vakange vari munhu akashinga, asina hutsinye, aibatanidza vanhu, uyewo vakange vachivenga rusarura ganda. Vakavimbisa kuti nyika yeSouth Africa ichaenderera mberi nekusimudzira nyika yavo, sezvo ichi chaive chido chemufi. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaDewa Mavhinga, vakarumbidza Amai Mandela vachiti ndivo vakaita kuti zita raVaMandela riite mukurumbira panguva iyo VaNelson Mandela vakange vari mutirongo. VaMavhinga vakati nekuda kweizvi, nyika yeSouth Africa yakarasikirwa zvikuru nekushaya kwavo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato rinopikisa reMDC T mudunhu reJohannesburg, VaSimbarashe Mujeyi, vanoti kunyange hazvo Amai Mandela vakavasiira hushingi, dambudziko riripo nderekuti vashaya panguva iyo dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzakasununguka dziri kudzvinyirira vanhu vadzo. Mutungamiriri webato rinopikisa re Inkata Freedom Party, Va Mongosuthu Buthelezi, vakati Amai Mandela vaive hanzvadzi, amai uyewo shamwari, kwete kwavari chete, asi kuvanhu vese. VaButhelezi vakaenderera mberi vachiti Amai Mandela vaive munhu akange akashinga, uyewo akachengeta mhuri dzakawanda apo nyika iyi yairwira rusununguko. Vemapato anopikisa hurumende vakakurudzirawo hurumende yeAfrican National Congress kuti ienderere mberi nezvido zvakarwirwa naAmai Mandela, pamwe nekuti hurumende yaVaRamaphosa idzore ivhu kuvanhu vatema. Amai Mandela, avo vakange vave nemakore makumi masere nerimwe, vachavigwa neMugovera uno muguta reJohannnesburg. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeMDC-T Dzorangarira Vamwe Vadzo Vakapondwa Muna 2008
text: Nhengo dzeMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa pamwe nehutungamiri hwebato iri vanoti hurumende inofanira kuongorora nyaya yemhirizhonga yakaitika makore gumi adarika pamberi pesarudzo yechipiri yemutungamiri wenyika ye presidential runoff iyo yakasiya vanhu vakawanda vafa uye vamwe vasisina pokugara. Vatsigiri veMDC vakaita saVaEnoch Mkudu vanoti mhirizhonga yakaitika iyi ichizere mundangariro dzavo vachiti dai hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa ikaona kuti sarudzo dzemwedzi unouya dzaitwa pasina mhirizhonga yakadai iyo yavanoti ichiri kuvabata pamoyo. Imwe nhengo yeMDC, VaKudakwashe Matibiri, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iite hurongwa hwekusangana nevakapona neburi retsono pamhirizhonga iyi. Mutungamiri weboka reMDCT iri, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti bato ravo pamwe nevatsigiri vavo vachiri kushushikana nezvakaitika izvi. Mutauriri waVaChamisa, VaNkululeko Sibanda, vati VaChamisa vachagadzirisa nyaya iyi vachiti VaMnangagwa vazvitadza sezvo vaiva mumwe wevanhu vaiva muhurumende yakakonzera mhirizhonga iyi pasi pehutungamiri hwaVaRobert Mugabe avo vakazobviswa pachigaro nemauto gore rapera. Mumwe mufundisi wechechi yeApostolic Faith Mission, Mufundisi Rogers Conrad Tekwa, vanoti vedzisvondo vane basa rakakura kwazvo rekubatsirana nehurumende mukuedza kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaObert Mpofu, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende panyaya iyi. Asi VaMpofu, avo vanove zvakare munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, vakati sebato pamwe nehurumende vakazvipira kuita sarudzo dzisina mhirizhonga rwendo rwuno. MDC inoti pane nhengo dzayo dzinodarika mazana maviri dzakapondwa pamberi pesarudzo yechipiri yemutungamiri wenyika yakaitwa muna Chikumi 2008. Vanhu vazhinzji vakapisirwa misha vamwe vakatiza kwavaigara vachinotsvaga hupoteri kune dzimwe nzvimbo. Mhirizhonga iyi yakakonzera kuti vaimbova mutungamiri weMDC, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vabude mumakwikwi esarudzo iyi vachiti zvaisaita kuti vagozotonga makuva izvo zvakazopedzira kuti paumbwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa iyo yakapera muna 2013 pakaitwa dzimwe sarudzo dzinonzi neMDC dzakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusorosoro. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Opomera VaChin'ono naVaNgarivhume Mhosva yeKuda Kukonzera Mhirizhonga
text: Mapurisa emuHarare asunga mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume nemutori wenhau VaHopewell Chin’ono. Vaviri ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira vanhu kuti varatidzire musi wa 31 Chikunguru. Mutsamba kuvatori venhau, mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vati vaviri ava vasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo weCriminal Law Codification and Reform Act uye chikamu chezana nemakumi masere nemanomwe kana kuti Section 187 chebumbiro remutemo vachinzi vange vachikurudzira vanhu kuti varatidzire vachiita mhirizhonga. VaNyathi vati vaviri ava vange vari kuHarare Central uye vachamiswa pamberi pedare munguva pfupi inotevera. Mapurisa anonzi anga akapakatira pfuti asunga VaNgarivhume kumba kwavo mumusha weWaterfalls muno muHarare nhasi mangwanani pamberi pekuratidzira kwavakashevedzera kuti kuitwe munyika yose musi wa31 mwedzi uno pasi peboka ravari kudaidza kuti July 31stMovement. Rimwe gweta raVaChin’ono rati mapurisa masere ange akapakatira pfuti apindawo zvine chisimba mumba mavaChin’ona kuChisipiti akaputsa magirazi ndokuvasunga. VaChin’ono vanogara vachinyora padandemutande reTwitter neFacebook vachishoropodza nyaya dzehuori munyika pamwe nekutadza kufambisa basa zvakanaka kwavanoti kuri kuitwa zvinhu nehurumende. VaNgarivhume vari kukurudzira kuti veruzhinji vapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira nenyaya yekusamira zvakanaka kwaita hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nehuori hwavanoti hwatekeshera muhurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Nhengo yekomiti yepamusoro yeTransform Zimbabwe, VaRhoddi Takaruza, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara nekusungwa kwaitwa VaNgarivhume vachiti kusungwa kwavo hakusi kuzotadzisa kuratidzira kwemusi wa31 Chikunguru. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutungamiri weHashtag Tajamuka, VaPromise Mkwananzi, avo vati varikuenderera mberi negadziriro yekuratidzira kunyange hazvo VaNgarivhume vasungwa. Mutungamiri wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatori venhau muZimbabwe reMedia Institute of Southern Africa, VaTabani Moyo, vati vashora kusungwa kwaVaChin’ono avo vavati vanga vakagariswa pamwechete VaNgarivhume kukamba yemapurisa yeHarare Central. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vatsoropodza kusungwa kwaVaNgarivhume naVaChin’ono vachiti zvaitika izvi zvinoratidza kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iri kuramba ichienderera mberi nekutyora kodzero dzeveruzhinji. Zvichitevera kusungwa kwaVaChin’ono, muzinda weAmerica muHarare waburitsawo mashoko padandemutande reTwitter kuti wanga uchishushikana zvikuru nekusungwa kwavo. Munyori mubazi rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana vaudza Studio 7 kuti havana chekutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti titaure naVaNyathi. Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reAmnesty International rashorawo zvikuru kusungwa kwevaviri ava. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashanu Vanofa Zvichitevera Mhirizhonga Iri Kuitika muSouth Africa
text: Mapurisa emu South Africa ashandisa zvombo zvemabara asingauraye senzira yekuti vanhu vanga vachiratidzira mumigwagwa yeAlexandria, vaparare. Vanhu ava vanga vachiratidzira vachiti havadi kuti zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika zvinge zvichigara nekushanda munyika iyi. Zvinonzi vanhu vashanu vafa mumhirizhonga iyi, uye vanhu vanodarika zana vasungwa munyika yose vachipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. Mutungamiri we South Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vashora zvikuru mhizhonga iri kuitika munyika mavo, vakati vachaita musangano negurukota rezvemapurisa, Va Bheki Cele, kuti patsvagwe nzira dzekugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Va Cele vabvuma kuti kune vanhu vashanu vafa mumhirizhonga iyi. Mumiriri we Zimbabwe mu South Africa, Va David Hamadziripi, vati havana ruzivo kana pavanhu vafa ava, pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe here kana kuti kwete. Asi vavimbisa kuti vachaunganidza zvavanenge vawana vozivisa veruzhinji. VaRamaphosa vati zviri kuitwa nezvizvarwa zve South Africa zvekurwisa nekushungurudza vabvakure, hazvisi zvinhu zvinokurudzurwa kuitwa. Vati izvi zvinofanirwa kumiswa izvozvi, vachiti vanhu vemuSouth Africa vanogara kugara murunyararo. Zvitoro zvevanhu vanobva kunze kwe South Africa zvakapwanywa kana kupiswa mudunhu reGauteng. Ukuwu mutungamiri wedunhu re Gauteng, Va David Makhura, vashanyira musha weAlexandria neChipiri masikati vachiona kuparadzwa kwakaitwa zvitoro. VaMakhura vakurudzira kuti mudunhu ravo muve nekugadzikana. Zvichakadaro, gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kweSouth Africa, Amai Nosiviwe Mapisa Nqakula, vati kuparadzwa kwezvitoro kwakanangana nekuzvibisa chimiro cheSouth Africa. Mhirizhonga iyi inonzi yakatanga ku Tshwane svondo rapera, isati yapararira mu Johannesburg nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza guta iri. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba, vanoti vanhu vana varasikirwa nehupenyu pamusoro pevatatu vakashaya nemusi weMuvhuro, asi havazivi kuti vanhu vangani vanobva kuZimbabwe vangave vakabatwa nemhirizhonga iri. VaShumba varatidzawo kushungurudzika nemaitiro emhuri yeZimbabwe iri muSouth Africa, iyo vati haina kubatana izvo zviri kupa kuti masangano anomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe atadze kuve neruzivo pane zvirizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogona kunge zviri kuvhiringwa nemhirizhonga iyi. VaShumba vakurudzira mhuri yeZimbabwe iri muSouth Africa kuti itumidzire padandemutare reZEF, kana vachinge vasangana netsaona munguva yemhirizhonga iyi. Mukuru wesangano rinomiririra mabhizimisi emhuri yeZimbabwe mu South Africa, reProudly 263, VaStan Makwara, vanoti vanoshungurudzika nezviri zvikuru bezviri kuitika muSouth Africa sezvo zvichivhiringidza mabhizinesi pakati peZimbabwe neSouth Africa. VaMakwara vaenderera mberi vachiti vari mubishi kuzivisa nhengo dzavo nzvimbo dziri kuitika mhirizhonga iyi kuitira kuti vagare vari kure. Vatiwo sangano ravo riri kushanda nemuzinda weZimbabwe muSouth Africa pachitsvagwa nzira dzekupedza dambudziko iri. Zvichakadaro, kune gwaro raburitswa riri kukurudzira zvizvarwa zvekunze, kuti zviratidzire mangwana, pamusangano we World Economic Forum on Africa, uyo uri kutanga nemusi weChitatu muguta reCape Town. Ratidziro iyi, ichange iri yekukurudzira vatungamiriri venyika dzemuAfrica vachange vari pamusangano uyu, kuti vatore matanho akaomara kunyika yeSouth Africa nekutadza kwayo kwairi kuita kuremeredza kodzero dzevanobva kunze kwenyika iyi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatove muCape Town kuti vazopinda mumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Anorambidza veMachechi Kunamatira Vatongi veMatare
text: No media source currently available Mapurisa arambidza vemachechi kuita munamato wekuti nyaya iri mudare re Constitutional Court yakakwidzwa nemutungamiri we MDC Alliance, Va Nelson Chamisa, inzwikwe zvisina tsvete mukati. Vemachechi vanga vachida kushandisa munamato uyu senzira yekuti Mwari vari kudenga, vaone kuti vatongi vari kunzwa nyaya iyi, vaita basa ravo vasina divi ravakarerekera. Vatiwo vanga vachida kunamatira vatongi vedare iri kuitira kuti pasave nevanhu vanovamanikidza kana kupindira mukutonga kwavo kuitira kuti vabude nemutongo unomirira zvido zvenyika, uye zvinangwa zvebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mumwe wevakuru vemachechi aya, Bishop Ancelimo Magaya, veZimbawe Devine Destiny, vanoti vakatyamadzwa nekumiswa kwaita munamato uyu sezvo munguva yapfuura vaibvumidzwa kuita izvi pasina kupindira kwemapurisa. Bishop Magaya vanoti kunyange hazvo vange vasina mvumo kubva kumapurisa kuti vaite munamato uyu, kazhinji kacho vemakereke havawanzo tarisirwa kuti vave nemvumo inobva kumapurisa.

headline: Matare Oramba Akaomesera Madzimai Matatu eMDC Alliance
text: Dare ramajisitiri raramba kutambira chikumbiro chekuti rirerutse maBail Conditions enhengo dzeMDC Alliance dzinoti Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri naMuzvare Netsai Marowa sezvo vachuchusi vari kutadzakupa vatatu ava zuva rekuti nyaya yavo ichatongwa rini. Vatatu ava, avo vanoti vakapambwa nevanhu vasati vave kuzvikanwa vakanosiiswa kwaMupondwa kuBindura muna Chivabvu, vari kupomerwa mhosva yekunyepa kuti vakapambwa, kubatwa chibharo nekushungurudzwa. Vatatu ava vakazosungwa nemapurisa mushure mekuwanikwa kwavo vakabhadhariswa mari yechibatiso zviuru gumi zvemadhora emuno pamunhu, vakanzi vamhan’are kumapurisa katatu pasvondo. Zvichitevera kutadza kuvapa zuva rekutongwa kwenyaya yavo sekuvimbiswa kwange kwakaitwa nevachuchusi, magwata avo akumbira dare kuti rirerutse maBail Conditions avo izvo zvaramba nedare. Rimwe remwagweta evatatu ava, VaObey Shava, vaudza Studio7 kuti dare rati maBail Conditions aripo anokodzera. VaShava vati vachataura nevatatu ava kuti vokwidza chikumbiro ichi kudare repamusoro here kana kuti kwete. Dare repamusoro ndiro rakavapa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso mushure mekunge dare ramajisitireti raramba. Nyaya iyi ichadzoka kudare zvakare musi wa13 Nyamavhuvhu. Mune imwewo nyaya, komiti inotungamira mabasa eparamnende yeStanding Rules and Orders Committee, yaita bvunzo dzekutsvaga vanhu vachadomwa kuve nhengo dzekomisheni yeZimbabwe Media Commission. Vanhu gumi nevasere vapinda mubvunzo uye pavanhu gumi ava panga paine madzimai mashanu. Vamwe vapinda mubvunzo idzi vanosanganisira sachigaro weEnglish Department paUniversity of Zimbabwe Professor Ruby Magosvongwe, mukuru wekambani yeAB Communications, Amai Susan Makore, vashandi veZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation, Omphile Marupi, Mqhle Tshuma, Dr Philip Pasirayi, pamwe nevarairidzi vezvidzidzo zvenhau paGreat Zimbabwe University, VaJasper Maphosa naVaTichaona Zinhumwe. Komiti yeparamende ichabuda nemazita gumi nemaviri aichaendesa kumutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vadome vanhu vasere vachapinda muZimbabwe Media Commission. Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvaitwa izvi zvichaunza komisheni nekukasika kuti ivandudze mashandiro evatapi venhau nemabasa avo munyika. Pave nemakore akati kuti bhodhi reZMC risina makomishina izvo zvange zvave kunganisa mabasa ekutapwa kwenhau munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Kudzingana muZanu PF Kwokonzera Kusagadzikana
text: Mapishapisha, kudzingana pamwe nekumbomisana kuve nhengo mubato reZanu PF zviri kuramba zvichienderera mberi panguva iyo bato iri riri kuita musangano waro wepagore, izvo zvinonzi nevakawanda zvichasiya bato iri risisina kusimba sezvaraive kare. Svondo rino chete bato iri rakurudzira kuti nhengo shanu dzinoti Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, Amai Esphinah Nhari, vaimbowe gurukota muhofisi yevaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vakazodzingwa mubato, Amai Joice Mujuru, VaSylvester Nguni, VaChristwell Mutematsaka pamwe naVaBatsirai Musona. Vamwewo ndivo vambomiswa kuve nhengo kwemakore ari pakati pemaviri nemashanu. Vanhu ava vari kupomerwa mhosva dzakasiyana siyana dzinosanganisira kuramba vachidyidzana nechikwata chaAmai Mujuru, kuzvidza hutungamiri, zvikuru mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe pamwe nekuda kutsemura bato nepakati. Zvisungo pamusoro pevanhu vanzi vadzingwe ava zvinozobuda kumusangano wepagore webato iri uri kutanga neChishanu kuVictoria Falls. Asi vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti kubva pakadzingwa Amai Mujuru nevamwe vanosanganisira VaRugare Gumbo naVaDydimus Mutasa, chigero chebato iri hachina kumira kushanda, asi vanotyira kuti chichacheka zvose nejira rine basa. NeChitatu kumusangano weCentral Committee yebato reZanu PF, VaMugabe vanonzi vakakurudzira kuti kudzingana kuite kushoma vachiti kunokanganisa budiriro yebato. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti havaoni mashoko aya achiteererwa sezvo mudzimai waivo VaMugabe ari mumwe wevari pamberi mukuona kuti vamwe vadzingwa mubato. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti bato reZanu PF rapindwa napongwe, uye mukuru webato iri aisimboonekwa seakachenjera zvikuru, VaMugabe, vanenge vakura. “Saka VaMugabe vave kunetseka manje kuti vakwanise kunge vari ivo vanotungamirira chete nekuti kune vamwewo vave kungoendawo mberi vachiti zvatinoita takatumwa naVaMugabe, handifungi kuti vanenge vakatumwa naVaMugabe ini,” VaZhou vanodaro. VaZhou vanoti vanowirirana nevane maonero ekuti kudzingana kuri kuitika mubato iri kwakanangana nevanofungidzirwa kuti vanotsigira mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. “Asiwo naivowo VaMnangagwa vacho vanenge vasingaoniwo politics, ndivo vaive mberi kudzinga vanhu vanobva kuma province kwavanobva, ndivo vanga vari mberi kudzinga vana VaRugare Gumbo, vana Machaya, ndivo vanga vari mberi kudzinga vana VaDzikamai Mavhaire, vana VaMakova. “Saka VaMnangagwa vasara pabani, vasinawo vanhu vanoti kana vachizodawo kuve president vanovasapota vanobva kumusha kwavo.” Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaChamu Madiridze, avo vari kuCape Town kuSouth Africa vanoti dambudziko rose iri riri kukonzerwa nenyaya yekuti VaMugabe havasi kubuda pachena panyaya yekuti ndiyani achavatsiva kana vasiya chigaro. “Mubato reZanu PF makanonoka kuita iya yatinoti leadership change, saka izvi zvave kukonzera kuti muite dongawatonga,” VaMadiridze vanodaro. Vanoti nyaya iyoyi ndiyo yaita kuti mubato iri rite mapoka mapoka. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rorerutsa Zvishoma Vanorwira Kodzero Dzevanhu Vari Kupomerwa Mhosva yeKuda Kupidigura Hurumende
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court nhasi rarerutsira zvishoma hurongwa hwekunozvipira kumapurisa kwevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanomwe vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika vaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Asi vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu ava vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi. Vanomwe ava vanzi vaende kunozvipira kumapurisa kamwe chete pavhiki kwete kamwe chetepazuva sezvavanga vachiita kubva zvavakasungwa. Mushure mekuenda kumusangano wekuMaldives wavanoti wainge usinei nekupidigura hurumende. Vakasungwa vanoti VaGeorge Makoni, VaTatenda Mombeyarara, VaGamuchirai Mukura, VaNyasha Mpahlo, muzvare Farirayi Gumbonzvanda, muzvare Sithabile Dew uye muzvare Beauty Rita Nyampinga. Vanomwe ava vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi. Muzvare Stabile Dewa, mukuru wesangano reWomen's Academy For Leadership and Political Excellence vanoti varikufara nekurerutsirwa uku. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Matanhatu Vosungwa Mukuratidzira Kwaitika muHarare
text: Pakaita bongozozo muHarare neChitatu apo nhengo dzeMDC dzarwisana nemapurisa padzanga dzichiratidzira. Mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vati vanhu makumi matanhatu vasungwa mukuratidzira uku. Nhengo dzeboka revechidiki reMDC- Youth Assembly dzakaungana pamuzinda webato radzo paHarvest House mangwanani ndokutanga kuratidzira dzakananga kumahofisi egurukota rinowona nezvemukati menyika, VaIgnatius Chombo. Vechidiki ava vaiti vainge vachida kunosiya tsamba yenyunyuto vachipomera mapurisa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu vanenge vachiratidzira. Asi mapurisa akarambidza nhengo idzi kufora zvakabva zvaita kuti paite kurwisana. Varatidziri ava vainge vachikanda matombo nekowo mapurisa achikanda hutsi huno kachidza pamwe nekuridzira pfuti mudenga kakakwanda sezvo kumhanyisana uku kwainge kwaparira nedhorobha rose. Mutungamiri weboka revechidiki muMDC-T, VaHappymore Chidziva vati kuratidzira kwavo kwanga kuri kwekuratidza kusafara kwavo nechisimba chavanoti chiri kushandiswa nemapurisa pavaratidziri vari kugaroratidzira vachiti havasi kufara nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Munyori muboka revechediki reMDCT, VaLovemore Chinoputsa vatiwo havasi kufara nekushayikwa kwemabasa nokudaro mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanofanira kusiya basa. VaChidziva vatiwo vachaita hwakiti nagonzo munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji kana mapurisa akaramba achishungurudza varatidziri. Zvichakadaro, zvitoro zvizhinji zvaswera zvakavharwa sezvo mapurisa anga achimhanyisana nenhengo dzeMDCT idzi. Mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Lucy Yasini, arohwawo paanga achiita basa rake. Zvichakadaro, vamwe vevaratidzi ava vatora zvinhu nechisimba muchitoro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaPhelekezela Mphoko cheChoppies Supermarket. Motokari yeZBC nedzimwe dzemapurisa dzapiswawo mukuratidzira uku. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vatungamiri Vokurudzira kuVandudzwa kweUN Security Council
text: Musangano weUnited Nations General Assembly waenderera mberi muNew York, vamwe vatungamiri pamwe nesangano reAfrican Union Commission vachienderera mberi nekukurudzira kuvandudzwa kwesangano reUnited Nation Security Council. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe mumwe wevamwe vatungamiri vakataurawo nezvenyaya yekuti sangano iri rivandudzwe. Zvimwe zvaitikawo kumusangano uyu kusimudzwa kekutanga kwemureza wenyika yePalestine. Zvichakadaro, Zimbabwe yaiswa panyika gumi dzemuAfrica dzichapihwa rubatsiro nehomwe yemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica yeUnited States President’s Emergency Plan for Aids Relief kana kuti PEPFAR. Izvi zviri kuuya papera mazuva mashoma-shoma vatungamiri venyika dzepasi rino vatambira chirongwa cheSustainable Development Goals icho chakanangana nekupedza kupararira kwehutachiona mukati memakore gumi nemashanu. Mumashoko aro kuvatori venhau, sangano reJoint United Nations Programme on HIV kana kuti UNaids rati ratambira chirongwa ichi nemufaro. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaMichel Sidibe vati pasi pehutungamiri wemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaBarack Obama, mari dzakadai dzichabatsira kuponesa vanhu vakawanda. PEPFAR iri kubatsira madzimai pamwe nevana vadiki. Dzimwe nyika dzichabatsirwawo pamwe neZimbabwe dzinoti Kenya, Lesotho, Malawi, Mozambique, South Africa, Swaziland, Uganda, the United Republic of Tanzania neZambia. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vadzokera kumusha vachinzi vane zvari kumhanyira, asi musangano uyu uchiri kuenderera mberi. Mimwewo misangano iri kuitwa prutivi pemusangano mukuru uyu inosanganisira yekutarisa nyaya dzechikafu, uyo unonzi watungamirwa neboka reOCHA. Panotarisirwawo kuitwa musangano uchazeyawo nyaya dzakanangana nemadzimai. Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Doctor David Parirenyatwa vanoti Zimbabwe iri kukumbira rubatsiro kubva kumasangano anosanganisira Global Fund neClinton Foundation, kuitira kuti ikwanise kubatsira vana vari kurarama nehutachiwana hwe HIV/AIDS asi vachitadza kuwana mapiritsi. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Votarisa Seri kweSarudzo dza 2018
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvinoti kunyange nyika yave nemakore makumi matatu nemanomwe yawana kuzvitonga, zviri kutotambura zvisati zvamboonekwa pasi rino sezvo zviri kunonga svosve nemuromo nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu munyaya dzeupfumi pamwe nedzematongerwo enyika. Vakawanda vanoti huwori, chizivano uye kutonga nedemo kwehurumende iripo yeZanu PF ndizvo zvaita kuti vasvike pavari nhasi. Asi vamwe ndivo vari kuti seri kwesarudzo dzegore rinouya ndiko kune tariro hombe, zvichibuda nekuti ndiani akunda musarudzo idzi. Vamwe vanoona sekunge pasina chinoshanduka kana bato riri kutonga reZanu PF rakakunda zvakare musarudzo idzi. Asi vamwe vanoti bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rakabatana nemamwe mapato anopikisa vanogona kukunda, izvo zvinozogona kuita kuti vekunze vanoda kuzotanga mabhizimusi avo munyika vatange kutsvaga musuwo wekupinda nawo. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakarerekera kubato reZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu vanoti bato reZanu PF rinokunda musarudzo dziri kuuya saka hapana chavangataura pamusoro pazvesarudzo idzi. "Hapana chatinotarisira kana chinombotarisirwa neZanu PF, kana chinotarisirwa nemaZimbabweans. Ndofunga zvinongotaura, since ma elections emakanzura, ama MP, Zanu PF inongohwinha. Last week iyo makazvinona zvakaitika kuMwenezi. Eighteen thousand, MDC zero, twumwe twuma party twunana nda, nde, ndu, ndu twune ma 200 ma 300. Saka Zanu PF izhou inongozvifambira yoga mbwa dzichingoukura," vadaro VaChirimhanzu. Asi mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti hapana chitsva chichaitwa neZanu PF chayakatadza kuita mumakore makumi matatu nemanomwe apfuura. No media source currently available

headline: VaDabengwa Voberekwa Kumusana naVaChamisa Kuti ZAPU Iwane Zvigaro
text: Bato reZAPU rinopinda muchibvumirano neMDC Alliance chekutsigira VaNelson Chamisa musarudzo.
