Mutungamiri webato reZAPU, VaDumiso Dabengwa, vazivisa nezvechibvumirano ichi pamusangano wavaita nevatapi venhau neChishanu muBulawayo. Mutauriri weZAPU, VaIphithule Maphosa, vanoti ZAPU haizi kupinda muMDC Alliance asi chibvumirano ichi chichaita kuti bato reZAPU ripiwe zvigaro gumi zvedare reparamende zvichakwikwidzwa nenhengo dzebato iri dzichitsigirwa neMDC Alliance. VaMaphosa vati bato ravo rakamboedza kutaura nemamwe mapato asi richitadza kuwirirana nawo izvo zvaita kuti rishande neMDC Alliance. Chipangamazano paUniversity of Pretoria, VaTinashe Mawere, vanoti VaDabengwa munhu ane nhoroondo inoremekedzwa mukurwira rusununguko rwenyika vachitiwo chibvumirano ichi chinogona kubatsira VaChamisa neMDC Alliance zvikuru. Mudzidzisi munyaya dzerunyararo nebudiriro uye vari muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira, Vincent Chakunda, vanotsinhirawo maonero aya. Mune imwewo nyaya, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inoti vanhu mazana maviri nevashanu ndivo vakakwanisa kuendesa mazita avo kudare reNomination Court nezuro kuti vakwikwidze pazvigaro gumi nezviviri zvedare reparamende zviri mudunhu reBulawayo. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe Mudzimai Oparura Bato Idzva reZveMatongerwo eNyika
text: Mumwe muzvinabhizimusi wekuHwange, Amai Elisabeth Valerio, nhasi vaparura bato ravo rezvematongerwo enyika muHarare vachikurudzira nyika dzekunze kuti dzione kuti sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzaitwa zviri pachena. Vachitaura pavaparura bato ravo nhasi ravari kudaidza kuti United Zimbabwe Alliance, Amai Valerio, avo vane kambani inoita nezvemhuka kuHwange, vati hwaro hwesarudzo hunofanira kuvandudzwa sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzisati dzaitwa kuitira kuti sarudzo idzi dzigoitwa mune zvakanaka. Vatiwo nyika dzekunze dzinofanira kupindira munyaya dzesarudzo idzi kuitira kuti sarudzo dzigoitwa zviri pachena vachiti vane tarisiro yekukunda musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Vaendererera mberi vachitiwo bato ravo riri kushanda zvakasimba munzvimbo ina dzariri kukwikwidza musarudzo dzema by-election kutsvaga nhengo dzeparamende vachiti vari kutarisira kukunda munzvimbo idzi. Bato iri riri kukwikwidza munzvimbo dzinoti Kuwadzana East, Harare East, Mbizo pamwe neKwekwe Central. VaValerio, avo vanoti aka ndekekutanga kupinda munezvematongerwo enyika, vavimbisa kuti vana vese vedzidzo yepasi kana kuti parimary vachange vachidzidza mahara kana bato ravo rikakunda musarudzo degore rinouya. Vati donzvo rebato ravo nderekuvaka nyika yavanoti yawondongwa nehurumende yeZanu PF vakati havasi kuzomirira kutanga vapinda muhutongi kuti vaite izvi. Vati panopera gore rino vachange vavhura makambani makumi matatu zvichaita kuti veruzhinji, zvikurusei vechidiki nemadzimai, vawane mabasa. Amai Valerio vati kana bato ravo rikapinda panyanga richaita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kutizira kune dzimwe nyika kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro zvidzoke sezvo vachiti munyika muchange mave nehuchi nemukaka vagadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Amai Zvanyadza Mutsigwa vanogara mumusha weDzivarasekwa muno muHarare vati vafara nemashoko aturwa naAmai Valerio pakuparura kwavaita bato ravo reUnited Zimbabwe Alliance kana kuti UZA. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemtongerwo, VaRashweat Mukundu, vati hapana chakaipa kuti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika awande munyika vachiti ndizvo zvinoratidza kuti nyika yakasununguka. Asi VaMukundu vati kunyukanyuka kunoita mapato ezvematongerwo enyika kana patarisanwa nesarudzo zvinopa mukana wekuti mapato anopikisa apatsanure mavhoti. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nesarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika, paramende pamwe nemakanzuru gore rinouya uye Amai Valerio, avo vati vachatora vanhu vese vachishanda navo zvisinei nekuti vanga vari kumapato api, vati pachaitwa sarudzo idzi vachange vaita gadziriro dzakakwana vachiti bato ravo richakwikwidza zvigaro zvose.

headline: Vechidiki Vanodzima Moto paMuzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House
text: Vechidiki veMDC vakabvuta muzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai muHarare vanoti pane vanhu vakaedza kupisa muzinda uyu neChina manheru. Vhidhiyo nemapikicha avakaisa padandemutande nepa 'social media' anoratidza moto uchibaka pamusuwo pemuzinda weMDC uyu. Vechidiki vakachengetedza muzinda uyu vakaudza Studio 7 kuti pane vanhu vakabatidza moto pamusuwo wemuzinda uyu asi ivo vakakwanisa kumisa moto uyu usati wapinda mukatikati memuzinda. Mumiriri weHighfield West muparamende uye vari veMDC Alliance, VaHappymore Chidziva, vakatsinhira nyaya iyi vachiti vechidiki vakamhanyamhanya vakakwanisa kudzima moto. Studio 7 haina kubata mapurisa neavo vanodzima moto kuti tinzwe zvakaitika asi mumwe wevechidiki vari mumuzinda uyu, VaWomberaishe Nhende, vakati zvinoratidza sekuti matayi emotikari akaiswa pumusuwo wemuzinda uyu akadirwa peturu ndokutungidzwa zvakakonzera kuti musuwo mukuru uvharwe nemoto zvekusashandiswa. VaNhende vakati ivo nevamwe vavo vakakwanisa kudzima moto kuti usasvika mukati kati meimba inosvikira vanhu. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata mapurisa kana vanodzimura moto kuti tinzwe zvaitika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanoshaya Vanoudza Nhunha Dzavo Mudzimai weMutungamiri eNyika
text: Vamwe vakwegura nevakaremara vanoti vakatarisana nematambudziko akawanda kusanganisira kutadza kurapwa nekuda kwekushaya mari kunyange hazvo vachifanirwa kubatsira nehurumende. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano pakati pemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxillia Mnangagwa, nevamwe vakwegura nevakaremera muBulawayo. Amai Mnangagwa avo vange vachiperekedzwa negurukota rezvemadzimai Amai Sithembiso Nyoni pamwe nevamwe vakuru vakuru vebazi rinoona nezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, kana kuti social welfare, vati vanoda kubatsira kuti vanhu munyika kusanganisira vakwegura pamwe nevakaremara vagare zvakanaka. Amai Mnangagwa vati vange vauya nevakuru vakuru veku social welfare kuzadzikisa chivimbiso chavakaita pavakasangana nevamwe vevakwegura nevakaremara muBulawayo muna Kubvumbi kuti vaizodzokazve vachisangana nevanhu ava vachipa mhinduro kuzvhichemo zvavo. Amai Mnangagwa vakurudzira vanhukadzi kuti vashandise mukana wekuvhurwa kwakaitwa bhanga remadzimai kuti vawane mari yekuzvisimudzira vachiti bhanga iri hariite zverusarura kuvanhukadzi vanenge vachida kuwana rubatsiro kwariri. Amai Mnanagwa vapa rubatsiro rwunosanganisira magumbeze, shuga pamwe nemupunga kune vakwegura nevakaremara. Mumwe wevakaremara auya pamusangano uyu, uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita kana kubuda pamhepo ati anoona sekuti musangano waitwa naAmai Mnangagwa inzira yekutsvaga nayo rutsigiro kubato reZanu PF pamberi pesarudzo vachibata vanhu kumeso kuti vachagadzirisa matambudziko anosangana nevakaremara pasina zvakati tsvikiti zvinobuda. Muzvare Chipo Matanganyidze vati kunyange hazvo vachinzi vanofanirwa kurapwa vachibatsirwa nehurumende, vakwegura nevakaremara vanotadza kuenda kuzvipatara nekuti vanenge vasina mari yekunyoresa inodiwa. Amai Sylvia Nyakudziwanza vati vafara kuti Amai Mnangagwa vauya kuzosangana nevakwegura nevakaremara. Vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakwegura vakawanda vari kutarisana nedambudziko rekushaya mari uye vanozonyanya kuomerwa sezvo vasisina simba rekuita mamwe mabasa angavawanise chauviri. Vamwe vevakaremara vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti iite kuti zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana zvavanoshandisa zvitengwe kunze kwenyika vasingabhadhariswe mitero yakakura yekuzvipinza munyika. No media source currently available

headline: NCA, EU neAmerica Dzoshora Mhirizhonga Iri Kuitika Munyika
text: Bato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, raburitsa gwaro rinoshoropodza mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika iri kuitika munyika. Ukuwo muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe, pamwe nesangano reEuropean Union muZimbabwe, EU, dzashorawo mhirizhonga ingava ichiitika pakati pemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, kanawo mukati mebato rimwe chete. America neEU dzinoti mhirizhonga munyika ine hutongo hwejekerere haitambirike, uye dzinokurudzira kuti vanenge vachikonzera mhirizhonga vatorerwe matanho. Mutauriri weNCA, VaMadock Chivasa, vanoti bato ravo rakanyanya kubatikana nemhirizhonga yakaitika mumusha weSt. Mary’s kuChitungwiza uko nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakarwisana izvo zvakazotora hupenyu hwevanhu vatatu. Bato iri rinoti rinoshamisikawo nekuti munhu anonzi akaponda vamwe vake veZanu PF ava anozonzi akawanikwa akafa ari mumaoko emapurisa muhusungwa. “Isu tinokurudzira kuti vanhu vasashandise mhirizhonga mukugadzirisa makakava avo,” vanodaro VaChivasa. No media source currently available Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaChamu Madiridze, vanotiwo dambudziko rekupedzwa kwemhirizhonga munyika richanetsa sezvo iine midzi kubva munguva yehondo yekurwira rusununguko. “Mukatarisa kubva munguva yehondo yeChimurenga, vanhu vaishandisa mhirizhonga kuti vanzwikwe, kwouya nyika yawana kuzvitonga, hurumende yaishandisa mhirizhonga kunyaradza vanenge vachida kuipikisa,” VaMadiridze vanodaro. VaMadiridze vanoti mhirizhonga iri kuitika iyi inogona kuve munongedzo wezvichaitika musarudzo dza2018, kana kurudziro iri kupiwa nemasangano akaita se EU nemuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe ikasatambirwa. No media source currently available

headline: Potyirwa Kuti Sarudzo dzeGore Rinouya Dzingangoita Mhirizhonga Zvichitevera Mhirizhonga Yakaitika muSarudzo dzeMakanzuru Svondo Rapera
text: Apo bato riri kutonga reZanu PF riri kupembera nekukunda kwarakaita musarudzo dzemakanzuru dzakaitwa Mugovera wadarika, vebato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change pamwe nevamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti bato iri rakashandisa mhirizhonga nekutyisidzira vanhu sechombo chekuti ivhoterwe. Vanoti uyu mucherechedzo wezvichaitika musarudzo dzegore rinouya, idzo vanoti dzichakanganiswa nemhirizhonga kana pakasatorwa matanho nekukasika. Zanu PF yakawana zvigaro zvishanu kubva pazvigaro zvitanhatu zvaikwikwidzwa, zvinoti Insiza Ward 4, Matobo Ward 2, Buhera Ward 24, Takawira Ward 6 kuMidlands neGuruve Ward 4, bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change rakawanawo chigaro chimwe chete cheMutare Ward 18 pazvigaro zvitanhatu zvaikwikwidzwa. Citizens Coalition for Change inoti nhengo dzayo dzinosanganisira vamiriri veparamende vanoti Amai Jasmine Toffa naVaDaniel Molokele, dzakarwiswa kuInsiza nekuMatobo kuMatabeleland South munguva yekutsvagira nhengo dzaikwikwidza rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo. VaTim Muringai vebato reCCC vari mudunhu reOhio muAmerica, vanoti kurwiswa uku kwakasiya Amai Toffa vakuvadzwa zvakaipisisa uye VaMolokele vakatandaniswa nemusango nenhengo dzeZanu PF. Asi bato reZanu PF rinoti aya manyepo sezvo nhengo dzaro dziri idzo dzakatorwiswa nevatsigiri veCCC. Nhengo yeZanu PF, VaFrenk Guni, vari muWashington D.C.,vanotiwo chave chigariro kuti vanopikisa ava vanongozhamba munguva yesarudzo kana vakundwa asi kana vakakunda havataure nezvemhirizhonga. VaGuni vanoti panogona kunge pakaitawo kurwisana pano nepapo, asi hazvifanirwe kubva zvave munongedzo wekuti munyika muchaita mhirizhonga gore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: EU Yoshora Kusungwa kweVeChidiki veMDC Alliance
text: Mumiriri weEuropean Union muZimbabwe VaTimo Olkkonen vari kushora zvikuru mutemo wemuZimbabwe wavanoti unotarisa kuti wabuda mumba maani. VaOlkkonen vakanyora izvi padandemutande ravo reTwitter zvichitevera kusungwa kwenhengo dzeMDC Alliance musangano reYouth Assembly dzinoti mumiriri weHarare West mudare reparamende Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, mutevedzer wasachigaro Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri uye mutevedzeri wemurongi wemabasa Muzvare Netsai Marova. Vatatu ava vakasungwa zvekare paHarare Central Police station kwavanoenda mukupera kwemavhiki maviri sezvakatarwa nedare pane dzimwe mhosva dzavari kupomerwa sechimwe chisunga chakaitwa kuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. Muzvare Mamombe naMuzvare Chimbiri vakabva vaendeswa kujeri reChikurubi vakamirira kunzwa neMuvhuro kuti vachapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso here kana kuti kwete panyaya yekunzi vakaratidzira munguva yeCovid-19. Vachuchuchisi vehurumende vari kupikisa kuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari chechibatiso uye hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya yekuti mapurisa ari kunyanya kusunga vanopikisa chete. Vatatu ava vane mhosva dzakawanda dzavari kupomerwa kusanganisira yekuti vakanyepera kuti vapambwa uye kutyora mitemo yeCovid-19. Asi vanoti hurumende iri kuda kuyedza kumbunyikidza kodzero dzavo. Mutauriri wemagweta ari kumiririra vatatu ava eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights VaKumbirai Mafunda vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatatu ava vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare neMuvhuro. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kumisa Kutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu
text: Sangano ravana chipangamazano muAmerica, re Freedom House, rinoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kumisa kusunga kwairi kuita vanhu vanoipikisa, uye inofanirwa kuferefeta kurohwa pamwe nekutochwa kuri kuitwa vanhu nehurumende. Vachinyora mugwaro ravatumira kumasangano enhau, mukuru wezvirongwa zvemuAfrica musangano iri, Va Jon Temin, vanoti kumbunyikidzwa kuri kuitwa vanhu muZimbabwe, kunotyora kodzero dzavo dzekuungana, pamwe nekutaura vakasununguka. VaTemin vati kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kuri kuramba kuchienderera mberi muZimbabwe zvisineyi kuti mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, vakavimbisa Zimbabwe itsva pasi pehutongi hwavo, uho vanoti hwakasiyana nehwavaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vakabviswa pachigaro nemauto muna Mbudzi 2017. Va Temin vanoti kana hurumende yeZimbabwe ichida zvechokwadi kusiya maitiro ayo ekare akashata, inofanirwa kusunga vose vari kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Va Nick Mangwana, kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende, asi nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. Gwaro reFreedom House rinobuda zvichitevera kumbunyikidzwa kwakaitwa vanhu musi Nyamavhuvhu 16, 2019 apo mapurisa akarambidza bato reMDC kuratidzira muHarare. Asi pane vanhu vakapinda muguta vachida kuratidzira vakapedzisira varohwa nemboma dzemapurisa, uye kusungwa. Mapurisa akaenderera mberi nekurambidza bato iri kuita misangano yavo mumaguta anoti Bulawayo, Gweru, Masvingo neMutare. Mapurisa emuHarare akasunga nhengo nomwe dzesangano reAmalagmated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, gweta resangano iri, VaDoug Coltart, pamwe nemumwe munhu asineyi nekuratidzira kwaiitwa nenhengo dzesangano iri pamahofisi egurukota rezvemari musi waNyamavhuvhu 23, 2019. Imwe nyanzvi inoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaRashweat Mukundu, vanoti vanowirirana negwaro reFreedom House nokuti hapana mutsauko pakati pehurumende yaVaMnangagwa nehurumende yaive yaVaMugabe. VaMukundu vanoti VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kugara pasi votaurirana nemutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, kuitira kuti gakava riripo pakati pavo rigadziriswe. VaMukundu, ava vakamboshanda nesangano reFreedom House, vanoti zvakakoshawo kuti vatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC vatore matanho ekuona kuti VaMnangagwa naVaChamisa vataurirana, kwete kungomhanyira kushora zvirango zvakatemerwa vakuru vakuru muhurumende pamwe nemuZanu PF. VaMukundu vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kubatsirwa kuitira kuti gakava riripo rigadziriswe izvo zvinozoita kuti munyika nekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu zvinozopawo nyika dzakabudirira kuti dzibvise zvirango zvakamerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende nemuZanu PF. No media source currently available

headline: VeMDC Alliance neZanu-PF Voudzana Meno Amire paNyaya yeKuputswa kweZvivakwa Mumaguta
text: Kutanga neMuvhuro vakawanda vange vachitengesa dzimotokari, midziyo yemumba, zvidhina nezvimwe pedyo nemigwagwa nedzimwe nzvimbo dzinonzi nehurumende dziri kuitirwa basa zvisiri pamutemo vakasara vave nemisodzi pamatama mushure mekunge zvivakwa zvavo zvaputswa muHarare, Ruwa, Epworth neChitungwiza. Asi nemusi weChina dare repamusoro soro rakati zvakaitwa nehurumende zvekuputsa zvivakwa isina mvumo yedare kutyo mutemo. Hurumende ine mazuva gumi ekupikisa mutengo uyu. Kunyangwe mapurisa ekanzuru ari kuputsa zvinhu akatsigirwa nemapurisa eZRP, danho iri rinotevera chisungo chedare remakurukota chekuti maguta atange kucheneswa kwete kusiya vanhu vachiita madiro aJojina. Asi vanopikisa nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti hurumende iri kukundikana kupa vanhu mabasa asi yovashungurudza kana voita mabasa avo emaoko. Vakakwikwidza vakamirira Zanu-PF musarudzo yedare reparamende kuWarren Park, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti nyaya yezvivakwa zviri kungonyuka mumadhorobha iri kukonzerwa nekusagona kutungamira kwebato reMDC Alliance rine makanzura nemameya akawanda. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti Zanu-PF iri kurwa siku nesikati kuda kuvhiringidza MDC Alliance. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Yokurudzira Kuti VaMnangagwa Vaumbe Hurumende Duku
text: Bato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanofanira kuderedza huwandu hwemakurukota ehurumende pavari kuumba hurumende yavo itsva. Vachitaura neStudio 7 muHarare nhasi, mumwe wevatevedzeri waVaTsvangirai, VaNelson Chamisa, vakurudzira VaMnangagwa kuti vadzikise huwandu hwemapazi ehurumende kuitira kuti mari yakawanda ishandiswe pazvinhu zvinosimudzira hupfumi hwenyika neraramo yeveruzhinji. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru muboka revaimbova varwi muhondo yerusunguko kana kuti Zimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, VaVictor Matemadanda, avo vatiwo zvakakosha kuti VaMnangagwa vaderedze huwandu hwemakurukota ehurumende, asi vachiti izvi zvinoenderanawo nekuti VaMnangagwa vachada kupinza here vanhu vasiri muZanu PF muhurumende yavo kana kuti kwete. VaChamisa vanoti hapana nhaurirano dzati dzavepo pakati pebato ravo nehurumende itsva panyaya yekuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Zvichakadaro, VaMngangagwa vakatarisirwa kudoma makurukota ehurumende yavo munguva pfupi iri kutevera. NeMuvhuro, VaMnangagwa vakadoma VaPatrick Chinamasa kuti vambofanobata matomhu egurukota rezvemari uye VaSimbarashe Mumbengegwi kuti vafanobatawo matomhu egurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kuti zvinhu zvikwanise kufambira mberi ivo vachitora nguva yavo kunyatsoumba dare remakurukota ehurumende yavo. VaMnangagwa vakatarisirwawo kusangana nevanyori vemapazi ose ehurumende nhasi masikati ano kuti vazeye kuti zvinhu zvofambiswa sei. No media source currently available

headline: Vanofungidzirwa Kuti ndeveChidiki veZanu PF Vanopinda neChisimba paPurazi raVaMatemadanda
text: Vechidiki vanofungidzirwa kuti vanotsigira bato reZanu PF mudunhu reMashonaland West vakapinda vakatora purazi remunyori mukuru weboka revaimbove varwi vehondo yerusununguko reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans (ZNLWVA) VaVictor Matemadanda neMugovera. VaMatemadanda vanoti vechidiki ava, avo vanosvika makumi matanhatu, vakadzinga vashandi vavo uye vari kuparadza hupfumi hwavo papurazi ravo reGarowa Number 8 kuTengwe, muHurungwe North. VaMatemadanda vanoti vechidiki ava vakatumwa nenhengo yeparamende kuHurungwe North Amai Sarah Mahoka. Asi hatina kunzwa divi raAmai Mahoka panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isingabatiki. Mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland West Inspectir Clemence Mabgweazara varamba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi. VaMatemadanda vanoti kutorwa kwepurazi ravo zvisiri pamutemo nevechidiki ava kuedza kuvarwadzisa pamusana pekusawirirana kwavo nevakuru veZanu PF. VaMatemadanda vanoti chiitiko chakadai imviromviro dzemhirizhonga panyaya dzemuminda kana rimwe bato risiri Zanu PF ravekutonga. "It's just a recipe yekuratidza kuti munyika hamuiti runyararo kana rimwe bato richinge rave kutonga," vanodaro. VaMatemadanda vanoti kutorwa kwepurazi ravo muratidzo wekuti chirongwa chekutora minda chinofanirwa kugutsa nhengo dzebato reZanu PF chete uye zvinopa mucherechedzo wakaipa kunyika. "Handizivi kuti even vakuru vacho vari kuona here the impression yazviri kupa to the international community," VaMatemadanda vanodaro. Kutorwa kwepurazi ravo kunotevera mashoko emunyori anoona nezvegwara remusangano muZanu PF VaSaviour Kasukuwere ekuti vose vanopesana nebato ravo vanofanirwa kutorerwa zvose zvavakawana vachiri mubato iri. Asi VaMatemadanda vanoti vachakwidza nyaya yavo kumatare edzimhosva.  No media source currently available

headline: Makanzura Akadzingwa Basa kuGweru Oronga Kuendesa VaKasukuwere kuMatare
text: Sangano re Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, rakamirira makanzura maviri emuGweru, ranyorera tsamba gurukota rezvematunhu richipikisa kudzingwa kwakaitwa makanzura aya. Gweta re Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum riri kumirira makanzura maviri aya, VaTafadzwa Christmas, vanoti VaMoses Marecha naVaAlbert Chirau vakadzingwa basa zvisiri pamutemo, izvo vanoti zvinotyora kodzero dzavo dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaChristmas vanoti kunyange hazvo mutemo we Urban Councils Act uchipa simba gurukota rezvematunhu kudzinga makanzura, masimba aya akabviswa mubumbiro idzva remitemo yenyika. VaChristmas vanoti mutemo uripo unosungira kuti paumbwe komiti inoferefeta kukanganisa kunenge kwaitwa nakanzura, kana meya. VaChristmas vanoti kana komiti iyi yawana kanzura kana meya aine mhosva, ndipo panopinda gurukota rezvematunhu richidzinga anenge achipomerwa mhosva, kwete zvakaitwa naVaKasukuwere. VaChristmas vanoti VaKasukuwere vakasatevedzera zviri mutsamba yavanyora, vachaendesa nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro soro vachipikisa kutyorwa kwekodzero dzemakanzura maviri aya. Asi VaKasukuwere vanoti havasi kuzodzosa makanzura aya pabasa uyezve havasi kuzopindura tsamba yakabva kumagweta emakanzura aya. VaKasukuwere vanotiwo vanoda kuvaendesa kumatare vakasununguka kuita izvi. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Rita Makarau, vati havasati vawana tsamba yakanyorwa naVaChristmas. Amai Makarau vanoti kudzamara vawana tsamba inovazivisa zviri pamutemo nezve kudzingwa kwemakanzura aya, komisheni yavo icharamba ichiita basa rayo semazuva ose. Makanzura maviri aya ndiwo akatanga kudzingwa basa vachipomerwa mhosva yeuori naVaKasukuwere, avo, svondo rapera, vakambomisa basa makanzura ese kusanganisira meya weguta reGweru, vachivapomera mhosva yehuori pamwe nekushandisa mari yekanzuru zvisiri mugwara. No media source currently available

headline: Chirongwa cheBVR Chinotanga muBulawayo Vanhu Vashoma Vachipinda Machiri
text: Kunyoreswa kwevanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kwatanga muguta reBulawayo kuine vanhu vashoma vange vachinyoresa kuvhota, michina yeBiometric Voter Registration, BVR, ichitadza kunyatsoshanda pane zvimwe zvainotarisirwa kuita, ukuwo vamwe vanhu vachiti chirongwa ichi chinofanirwa kushambadzwa zvakasimba sezvo veruzhinji vasina ruzivo rwakakwana pamusoro pacho. Vanhu vange vachiuya vari vashoma, asi kunyoreswa kwavo kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kwazotanga nguva dzekuma 9 mangwanani pamahofisi eZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, muBulawayo, sezvo vashandi veZEC vambotanga nekuwona kuti muchina wavo unoshanda zvakanaka here. Kunyange hazvo muchina uyu wange uchishanda zvakanaka, wange uchimbotadza kuita zvimwe zvaunotarisirwa kuita zvakadai sekukwanisa kuburitsa mazita enzvimbo dzekuti vanhu vanyoresa vanokwanisa kuzonotarisa kuti mazita avo akanyorwa zvechokwadi here kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kana kuti polling center. Munhu atanga kunyoreswa pahofisi yeBulawayo District, VaAbel Ncube, vati vafara kuti vakwanisa kunyoresa, asi vange vachinyunyuta kuti izvi kwavatorera nguva, izvo zvatsigirwawo naVaWeston Dumba avo vaita munhu wechipiri kunyoresa. VaDumba vati kunyange hazvo zvingave zvinotora nguva, zvakakosha kuti vanhu vose vanokodzera munyika vave vanonyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. VaDumba vatiwo maonero avo ndeekuti veruzhinji havasati vave neruzivo rwakakwana pamusoro pechirongwa chekunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Mumwezve mugari wemuBulawayo VaAustin Moyo, avo vanogara mumusha weveruzhinji weCowdray Park, vaudza Studio7 kuti vange vachitevera nyaya yekunyoreswa kwevanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota saka vaona zvakakosha kuti vauyewo vanyorese. Chirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota chakaparurwa zviri pamutemo nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, svondo rapera muHarare asi nekuda kwekuti pari zvino michina yekunyoresa ichiri mishoma, kunyoreswa uku kuri kungoitwa panzvimbo shoma kunyanya pane mahofisi eZEC mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana munyika. Pari zvino pamahofisi eZEC ari kumahombekombe kweguta kwakadziva kumadokero ndipo pari kunyoreswa vanhu vari pasi peBulawayo District pamwe neveUmguza District. Mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo muBulawayo, Amai Sithembiso Khupe, vabvuma kuti muchina wavo wambovanetsa asi vati vari kufara nemafambiro aita chirongwa pakutanga kunyoreswa kwevanhu. Amai Khupe vati hofisi yavo yeBulawayo yakanzi ichapiwa michina zana negumi rimwe chete uye vachave nenzvimbo dzinopfuura mazana mana dzavachange vachinyoresa vanhu. VeZEC vanoti chirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu chichasimudzirwa zvakasimba kana vawana mimwe michina iyo vakati vanotarisira kuwana pakati pemwedzi unouya. Kuti munhu ukwanise kunyoresa kuvhota unofanirwa kuve uri chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe chine makore gumi nemasere, kana kupfuura, uye unofanirwa kuve nechitupa, cherata kana cheplastic, chine mufananidzo wechiso chako kanawo gwaro rekufambisa richiri kushanda. Rezinesi yemotokari haikwanise kushandiswa pakunyoresa kuvhota. Munhu unozodawo gwaro rinoratidza paunogara ingave tsamba yemvura iri muzita rako kana gwaro raunonyora rosainwa naCommissioner of Oaths, sabhuku kana mumwe munhu akadaro. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rozeya Chikumbiro chaVaNguwaya Chekuti Vabvisiswe Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Pisirai Kwenda, vati pane zvakavanzika panyaya yechibvumirano cheDrax-SAGL nekambani yehurumende yeNatPharm vachiti zvinoshamisa kuti hurumende iri kunyanyobatikana nenyaya yekuti muzvinabhizimisi amutsa mutauro munyika, VaDelish Nguwaya, vakanyepera hurumende kuti isaine chibvumirano ichi asi isingashushikane kuti chibvumirano ichi chemamiriyoni makumi maviri emadhora ekuAmerica chakaitwa pasingatevedzwe mutemo wekutengwa kwezvinhu weProcurement Act uye pasina Procurement Regulatory Authority of Zimbabwe iyo inoona nezvekutengwa kwezvinhu muhurumende nekambani ayo. Justice Kwenda vataura mashoko aya mudare apo vange vari kuongorora nyaya yekuti dare raMagistrate rakapa mutongo kwawo here apo rakanyima VaNguwaya mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba panyaya dzavari kupomerwa. VaNguwaya, avo vanomirira muZimbabwe kambani yekuSwitzerland yeDrax, vane nyaya mbiri dzekuti vakanyepera hurumende kuti kambani yavo yaigadzira mishonga izvo zvakaita kuti hurumende ipinde muzvibvimirano zviviri, zve$21 million ne$40 million emadhora ekuAmerica zvekuti Natpharm itenge mishonga kubva kuDrax. Vachuchusi panyaya iyi vanoti dai VaNguwaya vasina kunyepa hurumende ingadai isina kupinda muzvibvumirano izvi sezvo yaida kushanda nekambani inogadzira mishonga kwete inotenga nekutengesa mishonga zvinotwa neDrax. Vatiwo VaNguwaya, avo vanomira kambani yePapPharma yekuAlbania, vakambotsvaga basa kurumende rekutengesa mishonga vakatadza kuriwana sezvo kambani iyi yainge isingagadzire mishonga. Vati mushure mekuziva kuti hurumende yaida kushanda nekambani inogadzira mishonga, ndipo pavakadzoka zvekare neDrax ndokunyepa kuti kambani iyi inogadzira mishonga izvo zvakaita kuti vapihwe basa. Asi Justice Kwenda vati chinoshamisa ndechekuti sei basa iri rinokosha mari yakawanda kudai rakaitwa pasina kutevedzwa mutemo weProcurement Act nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. Vati zviri pachena kuti zvisinei nekuti VaNguwaya vakanyepa zviri pachena kuti mutemo wekutenga hauna kutevedzwa uye ndiyo nyaya yakakosha apa. Vati zviri pachena kuti pane zviri kuvanzwa nehurumende panyaya iyi. Vachuchusi vaudza dare kuti zvekuti izvi zvakaitwa pasina kutevedzwa mutemo ndizvo zvakaita kuti gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, pamwe nevamwe vakuru vakuru vatatu vekambani yeNatPharm vanoti Amai Nancy Sifeku, VaCharles Mwaramba naVaRolland Mlalazi, vasungwe nenyaya iyi. Rimwe remwagweta aVaNguwaya, VaTafadzwa Hungwe, vaudza dare kuti nyaya yekuti mutemo wekutenga zvinhu hauna kutevedzwa handizvo zvingavanyimise mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso vachiti haraive basa ravo kuita izvi. Vati samuzvinabhimisi chavo kutsvaga basa uye havashandi muhurumende zvekuti vangazive kuti chinofanira kuitwa chii pakutenga zvinhu. Rimwe gweta ravo, VaAshely Mugiya, vati hapana chingaite kuti VaNguwaya vatize munyika kuti vasatongwa nekuti hapana mhosva yavakapara. Asi mumwe wevachuchusi panyaya iyi, VaLancelot Mutsokoti, vaudza dare kuti kana vakabatwa nemhosva VaNguwaya vanogona kukandwa mujeri kwenguva yakareba nekudaro pane mukana mukuru wekuti vanogona kutiza munyika. Vatiwo vavari kupomerwa mhosva navo vakaita saLlir Deja ari kunze kwenyika uye vanogona kuchengeta VaNguwaya kunze kwenyika sezvo vakatobhadharwa mamiriyoni maviri emadhora ekuAmerica nehurumende. Asi magweta avo anoti vakazvipira kuti vabatise gwaro ravo rekufambisa kunamabharani wedare. Justice Kwenda vati vanoda nguva yekumbozeya nyaya iyi vasati vapa mutongo wavo uye vati vachaita izvi musi weChitatu chinouya usati wadarika. Nyaya yaVaNguwaya yakaputika nguva pfupi yapfuura mushure nekunge sangano remapurisa pasirose reInterpol ranyorera kuZimbabwe Republic Police richida kuziva hukama weDrax neNatPharm. Huori uhu pakati peDrax neNatpham pamwe nebazi rehutano hwakatanga kuburitswa nebepanhau repaindaneti, reZim Morning Post. Nyaya yaVaNguwaya yamutsa mutauro mukuru munyika sezvo vachifambidzana nevana vemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, Collins naShaun uye vachionekwa pamadandemutande vaina VaMnangagwa pamwe nemudzimai wavo, Amai Auxillia. VaMoyo vari kutongwa vachibva kumba kwavo mushure mekubhadhara zviuru makumi mashanu zvemadhora semari yechibatiso. Amai Sifeku, VaMlalazi naVaMwaramba vari kutongwawo vachibva kunze mushure mekubhadhara mari yechibatiso zviuru gumi zvamdhora pamunhu. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reMapurisa neMauto reJoint Operation Command Rodaidzira Hurukuro neSangano Riri Kuronga Kufora paValentine's Day
text: Rimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Activists Alliance rinoti rino katyamadzwa nedanho ratorwa nemapurisa rekushevedza nhengo dzaro kumusangano weJoint Operation Command kana kuti JOC, uyo unonzi uchaitwa neChina masikati. Sangano iri rakanga ranyora tsamba kumapurisa richiazivisa nezvehurongwa hwenhengo dzaro hwekuda kufora mumigwagwa neMugovera dzichicherechedza zuva rerudo, reValentine’s Day. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, Muzvare Tendai Lynnette Mudehwe vanoti neChipiri vakasvitsa tsamba yavo kudivi remapurisa rePolice Internal Security Intelligence (PISI) vachi vazivisa nezvehurongwa hwavo hwekufora mumigwagwa pazuva iri senzira yavo yekuratidza rudo rwavo kunyika yavo yeZimbabwe. Vanoti dingindira regore rino rinoti “I Love my Zimbabwe”. Musangano weJOC uyu unopindwa nemapurisa, mauto, vasori pamwe nevanoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwemajeri. “Isu tichaenda kumusangano weJOC uyu mangwana, uye tichaenderera mberi nekuratidzira kwedu neMugovera, zvisineyi nekuti tapiwa mvumo here nemapurisa kana kuti kwete,” Muzvare Mudehwe vanodaro. Vanoti pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika, vanhu vanobvumirwa kuungana vachiratidzira, uye kuzivisa kwavo mapurisa hakusi kutsvaga mvumo asi kuti kuitira kuti vabatsirwe mukukwanisa kuti vanhu vafambe zvakanaka pamwe nekuchengetedza runyararo. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Yotarisira Kupeta Gwaro Idzva reVavhoti Mukupera kweGore
text: Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC Amai Rita Makarau vanoti vanotarisira kuti panopera gore rino vanenge vave negwaro idzva revavhoti. Izvi zviri kuitwa sezvo nyika iri kutarisira kuita sarudzo gore rinouya. Vanotiwo mukupera kwemwedzi uno vanenge vave nemichina yose inodiwa mukunyoresa vavhoti. Nemusi weChishanu, ZEC inoti yakakwanisa kupihwa michina mazana mana pamichina zviuru zvitatu zvakatengwa nehurumende kubva kukambani yeLaxton Group yekuChina. Amai Makarau vanotiwo vanhu vanokwanisa kuvhota nezvetupa zverata musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Mashoko aya anotevera zvainge zvambotaurwa namabharani mukuru wehurumende vaTobaiwa Mudede avo vainge vati vanhu havakwanise kuvhota kana vasina zvitupa zvebepa. Amai Makarau vanoti kana vachinge vapedza kugadzira gwaro revavhoti vanofunga kuti sarudzo dzinenge dzokwanisa kuitwa. No media source currently available

headline: MDC T: Hapana Chitsva Pakuenda Kwayo kuMusangano weSADC kuBotswana
text: Bato reMDC T rinonzi rakada kurova isati yamhara parakatumira chikwata chekunotsvaga rutsigiro panyaya yematambudziko ari muZimbabwe kuBotswana pakugadzwa kwemutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaIan Khama Seretse Khama, sasachigaro mutsva weSouthern African Development Community, SADC. Asi zvinonzi chikwata ichi, icho chinonzi chaitungamirwa nemukuru muhofisi yemutungamiri webato iri, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaAbisha Nyanguwo, chakarasiswa naVaKhama, avo vanonzi vakaramba kusangana nacho. VaKhama vaitora husachigaro kubva kumutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Asi mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti hapana chitsva pakuenda kwechikwata chebato ravo kuBotswana sezvo vagara vachitumira nhume kumisangano yakadai. VaGutu vanotizve chikwata ichi chakanga chiri nhume dzemutungamiri webato ravo, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, kwete kuti chainomirira bato rose, sezvo paine vanyori vanomirira bato kana pachidiwa kumirirwa bato. Nhengo yeZanu PF, uye vachiongororora zvematongerwo enyika, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti chave chigariro musoro weshuro kushaya nyanga, sezvo MDC T yave kuzivikanwa nemuririro wayo wekuchemera kune vekunze kuti vagadzirise matambudziko emuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinoti Vabva Kure Vane Kodzero yeKunyoresa Kuvhota
text: Dare repamusoro ratura mutongo wekuti vanhu vane vabereki vasiri zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe vane zvitupa zvakanzi Alien vakwanise kunyoresa kuvhota musarudzo dzichaitwa gore rinouya. Vachitura mutongo wavo panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare naAmai Sarah Kachingwe pamwe neMDCT ne MDC-N, mutongi wedare repamusoro, Amai Nyaradzo Munangati Manongwa, vati vanhu vane zvitupa zvemuZimbabwe vane vabereki vanobva kune dzimwe nyika zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nokudaro vane kodzero dzekuvhota. Amai Munangati Manongwa vati vanhu ava, avo vanozivikanwa nezita rekuti maAliens, vanofanira kutakura zvitupa zvavo nemagwaro avo ekuzvarwa pamwe neanoratidza pavanogara kuti vakwanise kunyoresa sevavhoti muchirongwa chekunyoresa kuvhota chiri kuitwa nekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Munyori mukuru muMDCT, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare vachiti vatsigiri vavo vazhinji avo vanga vachitadza kunyoresa vachinzi ma aliens vave kukwanisa kuzovhota musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Mumwe ane chitupa chakanzi alien, VaWilliam Banda, avo vanogara mumusha weMbare muno muHarare, vati vari kufara zvikuru kuti vave kuzokwanisa kuve nechekuita nezvekusarudzwa kwevatungamiriri munyika. VaBanda vati vave kutonokokorodzana nevamwe vavo kuti vanonyoresa sevavhoti. Zvichakadai, VaMwonzora vanoti vakawiririrana neZanu PF pamusangano wakaitwa neChipiri kuti chirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota chipfuudzirwe mberi sezvo chakakanganiswa nekuratidzira kwakaitwa kwakapedzisira kwaita kuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye chigaro. Chikamu chechitatu chechirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu sevavhoti chiri kuitwa neZEC chakatarisirwa kupera neChishanu svondo rino komisheni iyi isati yapinda muchikamu chechina. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti sangano ravo richiri kuda kuti rizeye mutongo uyu dzisati dzatora danho rekuti rinyorese here kana kuti kwete vanhu vari kunzi vane vabereki vabva kure kana kuti ma alien. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weEquatorial Guinea, VaNguema, Votarisirwa Kusangana naVaMugabe
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeEquatorial Guinea VaTheodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo vakasangana nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pavakazeya nyaya dzekusimbaradza kudyidyana pakati peZimbabwe nehurumende yekuMalabo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau paState House nezuro manheru mushure memusangano wavakaita nemutungamiri weEquatorial Guinea, VaTheodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati hapana zvitsva zvavakazeya naVaMbasogo munhaurirano dzavakaita kunze kwekungosimbaradza hukama hwagara huripo pakati peZimbabwe neEquatorial Guinea vasati vatora matomhu kubva kune vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaMbasogo vakaudzawo vatori venhau kuti kudyidzana pakati peZimbabwe nehurumende yavo kucharamba kuchienderera mberi zvisinei nekuti Zimbabwe yave nemutungamiri mutsva. VaMbasogo, avo vaitaura vachiturikirwa, vakati hurumende yavo iri kutsigira zvirongwa zviri kuitwa naVaMnangagwa zvakanangana nebudiriro yenyika. Vachiturikirwa, VaNguema vakati parwendo rwuno vakanga vasina zvitsva zvavakauya kuzotaura asi kungosimbaradza kudyidzana kwagara kwagara kuripo kuitira kuti vasimudzire nyika dzavo dzose dziri mbiri. Zvichakadai, VaMbasogo vakatarisirwa kuita musangano naVaMugabe, avo vavaidyidzana navo zvikuru vasati vatorerwa masimba ehutongi naVaMnangagwa zvakakonzera kuti pasave nekuwirana pakati paVaMugabe naVaMnangagwa. Musangano uyu wakatarisirwa kuitirwa kumba kwaVaMugabe kuBlue Roof kuBorrowdale mangwanani ano. Zvichakadai, vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mukushanya kwemutungamiri weEquatorial Guinea vanoti VaMbasogo vatumwa nemashoko kuna VaMugabe abva kuna VaMnangagwa ane chekuita nekuti VaMugabe naVaMnangagwa vayanane pakubvutirana kwavakaita masimba. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaMalvern Mkudu, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira, vanoti havaone VaMbasogo vachikwanisa kuita mutongi gava pakati pevaviri ava. VaMugabe naVaMbasogo vane hushamwari hunobvira kure uye VaMbasogo vakambobatsirwa naVaMugabe masoja emuno paakabata ndege yaiva nevanhu vainge vakatakura zvombo zvekunopidigurisa hurumende yaVaNguema kuMalabo. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reRevolutionary Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaTjenesani Ntungagwa. Vapedza kusangana naVaMugabe, VaMbasogo vakatarisirwa kusangana zvakare naVaMnangagwa vasati vaoneka kudzokera kunyika kwavo nhasi wakare. Kupinda munyika kwakaita VaMbasogo nezuro kwakananganawo nekusvitsa chidimbu chepakati chegore kubva pakagadzwa VaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika munaMbudzi gore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Musikana Anoti Akarohwa naAmai Grace Mugabe Oramba Kupihwa Mari Kuti Asaende kuDare redziMhosva
text: Gweta riri kumirira musikana anonzi akarohwa naAmai Grace Mugabe, VaGerry Nel vakaudza Studio 7 nemusi weChina kuti vanhu vaimirira Amai Mugabe avo vasina kudomwa nemazita vakayedza kuti musikana uyu, Gabriella Engel areve mari yaanoda kuti nyaya iyi isaende kudare. No media source currently available Asi VaNel vati akaramba achiti anoda kuti mhosva itongwe nekuti chaari kuda haisi mari asi kuti nyaya itongwe nyakupara mhosva arangwe. Amai Mugabe vari kupomerwa mhosva yekurova zvakaipisisa Muzvare Gabriella uyo ainge ari muhotera muSouth Africa nevanakomana vavo vaviri, Chatunga Bellamine naRobert Junior. VaNel vatiwo kana hurumende yeSouth Africa ikati amai mugabe varegerererwe semuyarikani kana kuti kupihwa “diplomatic immunity” vachanda kudare repamusoro kuti vasabvumidzwe kubuda munyika iyi. Muzinda weZimbabwe wakatoendesa chikumbiro kuhurumende yeSouth Africa chekuti Amai Mugabe vabatwe semunyarikani. VaNel vati vachine chivimbo chekuti Amai Mugabe vachamiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva. Vatiwo vatiwo Amai Mugabe havakwanise kubatwa semunyarikani. Mutauriri wemapurisa muSouth Africa Brigadier Vish Naidoo vaudza Studio 7 kuti semapurisa vambomira kuferefeta nyaya iyi kusvika vanzwa chikumbo chaAmai Mugabe chekuti vabatwe semunyarikana. Pavabvunzwa neStudio 7 kuti ko Amai Grace Mugabe vari kuti kudi pakupikisa mhosva iyi, VaNaidoo vaudza Studio 7 kuti Amai Mugabe havana kana humbowo kana mashoko avakapa kumapurisa sezvo vasina kuuya kukamba kwavainge vakamirirwa. Mamwe magweta anoti Amai Mugabe vanokwanisa kubatwa semunyarikani asi vamwe vachiramba. Muzvinafundo munyaya dezvemutemo paUniversity of Zimbabwe vachitungamira bato reNCA VaLovemore Madhuku vanoti Amai Mugabe vanokodzera kubatwa semunyarikani asi vozotongwa vave kuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Ko Vanhu Gumi neVanomwe Vabviswa Pazvirango neAmerica Ndivanani?
text: Kunyangwe hazvo America yakatemera zvirango vamwe vanhu vana nezuro kusanganisira mwana wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, Emmerson Mnanngagwa Junior, pane vamwe vanhu kunyanya vaive muhurumende vakabviswa pazvirango. Vanhu ava vanoti Amai Flora Buka, VaIgnatious Morgan Chombo, VaNicholas Tasungunurwa Goche,naVaRugare Aleck Ngidi Gumbo. Vamwe vabviswa vanosanganisira VaJaison Machaya, VaReuben Marumahoko, VaHerbert Murerwa nemudzimai wavo Amai Ruth Chipo Murerwa, VaKenneth Keparadza Mutiwekuzivam VaDavid Chapfika, VaPhineas Chihota, mwana waVaPatrick Chinamasa, Gamuchirai Chinamasa, Amai Abigail Damasane, VaAndrew Langa, mupurisa VaLevy Sibanda, Amai Hellin Mushanyuri Gono, mudzimai waVaGideon Gono, uye VaChenhamo Chakezha Chimutengende.

headline: ARTUZ Inoudza Mapurisa neMasoja Kuti Iri Kuvarwiravo paNyaya dzeMari
text: angano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ, rinoti masoja nemapurisa vanoshandiravo hurumende naizvozvo riri kuvakurudzira kuti vasarove vanhu kana kuvhiringa varairidzi vanenge vachiratidzira nezvenyaya dzemihoro. Mutungamiriri we ARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vaudza Studio 7 kuti varairidzi vari kurwira mihoro yevanhu vese vanoshandira hurumende, kwete varairidzi chete saka vari kukurudzira kuti masoja nemapurisa kuti vafunge zvakadzama kana vatumwa kunomisa kuratidzira kwavanenge vachiita. VaMasaraure vati sangano ravo riri kuronga zvekuratidzira zvine mutsindo rakabatana nemamwe masangano. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri kana gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaCain Mathema sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Vashandi vehurumende vakawanda kusanganisira varairidzi nemadhokotera vave nenguva yakareba vachiratidzira nenyaya yemihoro. Hurumende inoti vashandi ava vanofanira kusimbisa nhaurirano kwete kuratidzira. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vanourayiwa neMauto Vakawanda Vachikuvara Mukuratidzira muHarare
text: Vanhu vatatu vapfurwa vakafa muHarare apo vatsigiri veMDC Alliance vange vachiratidzira kusafara kwavo nemafambisirwo aeri kuitwa basa rekuzivisa nyika zvakabuda musarudzo dzakaitwa neMuvhuro. Vaona zvaitika vanoti vanhu vapfurwa ava vanhuwo zvavo vabatwa nemhirizhonga yange isineyi nezvavanga vachiita. Mashoko atiri kutambira anoti vamwe vapfurwa vakafa afa madzimai anga achizvifambirawo zvawo. Muguta remuHarare maswera muchiridzwa pfuti nemapurisa achirwisana nevatsigiri veMDC Alliance. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba, vatenda kuti pane vanhu vaurayiwa muHarare mukuratidzira uku uye mitumbi yavo iri kuParirenyatwa Hospital. Mauto anofungidzirwa kuti ndiwo auraya vanhu ava. Zviuru nezviuru zvevatsigiri veMDC Alliance zvapinda mudhorobha mangwanani mazvatanga kuratidzira zvichiti sarudzo dzemusi weMuvhuro hadzina kubatwa zvakanaka neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec. Varatidziri ava vatematema motokari dzeZanu PF nematombo pamwe nekutema mahwindo epamuzinda weZanu PF pamwe neZec. Pasina chinguva mapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo abva atanga kuridza pfuti panze pemahofisi eZanu PF. Panga pachiridzwa pfuti pamahofisi eZanu PF, vamwe varatidziri vaenda kwanga kuchiverengerwa mavhoti asi vazodzingwa nemapurisa avakandira hutsi hunokachidza pamwe nekuridzira pfuti mudenga. Varatidziri ava vabva vaparira nedhorobha rose vachiimba vachiti “tinoda Chamisa”. Chikopokopo chemasoja chazenge chave kutendererawo nepamusoro pevanhu vanga vachiratidzira uye masoja anonziwo anga ave kurova vanhu kune mimwe migwagwa iri pakati pedhorobha. Varatidziri ava vanoti havasi kuzofa vakadzokera kudzimba dzavo kudzamara zvavanoti ndizvo zvechokwadi zvakabuda musarudzo zvaziviswa kwete zviri kuziviswa neZec. Pataenda pamhepo, masoja pamwe nemapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo anga achimhanyisa vanga vachiratidzira ava. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Voita Musangano kuChikomba neMugovera
text: Mapurisa anonzi azivisa bato re MDC-T kuti harikwanise kuita musangano nevatsigiri varo ku Chikomba mudunhu reMashonaland East neMugovera sezvo Zanu PF iine hurongwa hwayo mudunhu iri musi uyu. No media source currently available Mutauriri weMDC-T, Va Obert Gutu, vanoti vakazivisa mapurisa kuti mutungamiri webato ravo,Va Morgan Tsvangirai, vanoda kuita musangano nevatsigiri vavo, asi mapurisa akati havakwanisi kuita izvi. Va Gutu vashora mapurisa vachiti ari kushandiswa ne Zanu PF vachirega kuita basa ravo vasina divi ravakarerekera. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vatora danho sebato rekuti Va Tsvangirai vaenderere mberi nemusangano zvisinei nemhinduro yemapurisa vachiti mapurisa haana kodzero yekuvarambidza kuita musangano uyu pasi pemutemo we Public Order and Security Act. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, vati havakwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti havasati vakwanisa kutaura nemukuru wemapurisa mudunhu re Mashonaland East kuti vanzwe kuti nyaya iyi yakamira sei. Mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland East, Inspector Clemence Mabweazara, vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachigarowanzotaura vachitsigira Zanu PF, Va Goodson Nguni, vanoti MDC-T yakashanda kwazvo kuti pave nebumbiro idzva remitemo yenyika saka nokudaro vati Va Tsvangirai nebato ravo vanofanirwa kuwanikwa vachitevedzera mutemo. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo uye vari mudzidzisi pa University of Zimbabwe, Muzvinafundo Charity Manyeruke, avo vashora danho ratorwa ne MDC-T iri vachiti uku kuzvidza vanochengetedza mutemo nerunyararo munyika. Asi pasi pemitemo yenyika, mapurisa haana mvumo yekurambidza mapato kuita misangano yayo, kunze kwekuti mapurisa anogona kuti anenge akawandirwa nebasa musi uyu, kana kuti nzvimbo inenge ichida kushandiswa, inenge ichishandiswawo nemamwe masangano.

headline: Crisis in Zimbabwe Yonetseka neKutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu muNyika
text: Sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition nemusi weMuvhuro rakaita musangano kuJohannesburg, South Africa vachizeya mamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe zvikuru nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Masangano akapinda mumusangano uyu anosanganisa Tajamuka, National Vendors Union Zimbabwe, ZCTU, Platform for Youth Development nemamwe. Mukuru weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition Amai Pamela Kadau vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kunetsekana zvikuru nenyaya yekurohwa kwevanhu munyika nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori uye mapurisa. Amai Kadau vati zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuSouth Africa zvinotiwo zviri kuda kupihwa mukana wekuvhota. Asi mukuru weZimbabwe Electotal Commission Amai Rita Makarau vakaudza vatori venhau mazuva mashoka apfura kuti mutemo uripo parizvino haupe vanhu vari kunze kwenyika mukana wekuvhota. Vakati izvi zvinokwanisika chete kana bumbiro remutemo ravandudzwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vodaidzira Misangano yeKuyedza Kugadzirisa Zvinhu Zvaita Manyama Amire neRongo
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vatarisana nematambudziko makukutu zvichikonzerwa nekurwisana mubato ravo uye hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere vari kutarisirwa kuita misangano mitatu yakakosha svondo rino kutanga neChitatu kuyedza kugadzirisa zvinhu. VaMugabe vari kuita misangano yePolitburo, Central Committee uye mumwe neveZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association. Nyaya yekuti VaMugabe vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri pasina kujeka kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chavo yakonzera kuti mubato ravo nemunyika muiite kunetsana kwakanyanya. Pane vamwe vari kutsigira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vamwe vachitsigira Amai Grace Mugabe vari kuchikwata chinonzi Generation 40. Vaviri ava vanoramba kuti vane zvikwata zvavanotungamira. Vakarwa hondo vari kutsika madziro vachiti VaMugabe vanofanira kudzinga mubato vamwe vechikwata cheG40 vanosanganisa makurukota matatu anoti VaJonathan Moyo, muzukuru wavo VaPatrick Zhuwao uye VaSaviour Kasukuwere. Asi vachitaura mushure mekudzoka kuJapan mushure mekupfuura nekuSingapore nemusi weSvondo, VaMugabe vakati vakarwa hondo havafanire kuudza bato zvekuita asi kuti vanofanira kungotevera gwara rebato. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association VaDouglas Mahiya vanoti vari kuda kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe. Izvi zvinosanganisa nyaya dzehutano, kuendeserwa vana kuzvikoro nezvimwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda muHarare Votaura nezveSarudzo dzekuAmerica
text: Apo America inoita sarudzo dzemutungamiriri wenyika nemusi weChipiri, vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika pamwe neveruzhinji vanoti hurumende yeZimbabwe, vakuru vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nekomisheni yesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission vanofanira kudzidza zvakawanda musarudzo idzi. Vakawanda vanoti vanotsigira Amai Hillary Clinton kuti vave mutungamiriri mutsva weAmerica vachiti kana izvi zvikaitika zvichasimudzira vanhukadzi kwete muAmerica asi pasi rese. Amai Clinton vari kukwikwidzana neshoroma VaDonald Trump. Sarudzo dzemutungamiriri wenyika yeAmerica idzi dzinoitwa musi wa8 Mbudzi mushure memakore mana oga oga uye dzinotarisirwa zvikuru nenyika dzepasi rose. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaVivid Gwede, vanoti sarudzo idzi dziri kuitwa zvakajeka uye vese vano kwikwidza vachipihwa mukana wekuita misangano pamwe nekusangana nevatsigiri vavo izvo vanoti hazviitike muZimbabwe. Vanoti ichi ndicho chikuru chinofanira kudzidzwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, mapurisa pamwe neveZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaDonald Chibika, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo paine matambudziko pano neapo, sarudzo dzekuAmerica dzakajecha zvikuru kana zvikaenzaniswa nemuZimbabwe. Vanotiwo America inopa mukana kuzvizvarwa zvayo zvese zviri kunze kwenyika kuti zvivhote kwete muZimbabwe mekuti hurumende inoda mari dzevanhu vanogara kunze asi isingavape mukana wekuvhota. Sachigaro weZimrights, zvakare vari gweta, VaPassmore Nyakureba, vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirawo kuti idzidze kubva kuAmerica iyo inopa mukana akaenzana kune vanenge vachikwikwidza. Mukuru weDemocractic Party, Vurayayi Zembe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti America inyika yakabudirira chose nekuti inota sarudzo dzakachena uye Zimbabwe inofanira kuita zvimwezvo kuti kana ichida kuti zvinhu zvayo zvifamba zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi kana dzematongerwo enyika. Vanoti hupfumi hweZimbabwe hwaparara nenyaya yekuti munyika muoitwa sarudzo dzinemutauro nguva nenguva. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa namuzvinafundo Welshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwayi vanoti chidzidzo chikuru chabuda musarudzo dzekuAmerica ndechekuti nguva yesarudzo haisa nguva yekupondana asi yekusarudza vatungamiriri. Zvichakadai vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vanotsigira Amai Hillary Clinton kuti vave mutungamiriri weAmerica anotevera. Munyori wevechidiki muPeoples Democratic Party, Tatenda Chigwada vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotsigira Amai Clinton nekuti vanoona sekuti vane moyo munyoro uye vanoda kuti madzimai asimukire munyaya dzematongerwo enyika. Amai Esther Shumba vanotiwo VaDonald Trump munhu asingaremekedze madzimai nekudaro haazviite kuti vavatsigire. VaGwede vanobvumirana nevaviri ava vachiti kana Amai Clinton vakakunda zvichapa manyukunyuku kuvanhukdzai pasi rese kuti vapinde munyaya dzematomgerwo enyika. Kana Dr Zembe vanoti madzimai ange akadzvinyirwa kwenguva yakareba muAmerica uye chingave chinhu chakanaka chose kana Amai Clinton vakakunda. Vanotiwo Amai Clinton mukadzi akashinga uyewo vakambove gurukota reAmerica rinoona nezvidzimwe nyika, vakavazve mudzimai wemutungamiriri wenyika zvekuti hapana changave tadzise kutungamira nyika yeAmerica. Ongororo dzir ikuitwa muAmerica dzinotaridza kuti makwikwi pakati paAmai Clinton naVaTrump akaoma kunyange hazvo Amai Clinton vari pamberi nezvikamu zvishomanana. Kana Amai Clinton vakakunda, kanenge kari kekutanga kuti nyika yeAmerica itungamirwe nemunhukadzi.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanonyorerana Zvibvumirano neMutungamiri weChina
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasangana muBeijing nemutungamiri weChina, Va Xi Jinping.  Vatungamiri vaviri ava vanonzi vaita musangano wavo muGreat Hall of The People of Beijing, vakanyorerana zvibvumirano munyaya dzehupfumi, pamwe nekuumba hukama hwakasimba pakati penyika mbiri.  Zvibvumirano zvitanhatu zvanyoreranwa zvinosanganisira zveupfumi, zvebudiriro, pamwe nerubatsiro rwechikafu munguva dzenjodzi.  Chimwe chibvumirano chinonzi chakanangana nenyaya dzekurima. VaMnangagwa vari muChina kekutanga semutungamiri wenyika, kunyange hazvo vaimboperekedza vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe.  Rwendo rwemutungamiri wenyika urwu rwuri kutarisirwawo kuti rwuchapa mukana zvizvarwa zveChina zvinoda kuzotanga mabhizimusi munyika.  Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemari nehupfumi, VaTerence Mukupe, vati China iri kuda kunzwawo kubva kuZimbabwe kuti zvii zvairi kuda kuita senyika mukuvandudza hupfumi hwayo.  VaMukupe vati chikuru chiri kuda kuitwa neChina kuvhura mukana wekuti vanamuzvinabhizimusi veikoko vashande neZimbabwe, ivo vachiwanawo zvakapfumbatwa neZimbabwe.  Vatiwo hukama hweZimbabwe neChina hwakabva kure uye inyika inotarisawo Zimbabwe neziso rakanaka.  VaMnangagwa, avo vari kuperekedzwa nemudzimai wavo, Amai Auxilia Mnangagwa, pamwe nemakurukota ane chitsama, vari kushanya kwemazuva mashanu.  China yava nenguva ichisima mari yayo muZimbabwe zvikuru munyaya dzemhando dzemoto, nhandare dzendege, migodhi nezvimwe.  Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda vakazvimira uye vakambotungamirawo sangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce (ZNCC), VaLuxon Zembe, vanoti zvinofadza zvikuru kuti VaMnangagwa vakwanisa kunyorerana zvibvumirano muzuva ravo rekutanga kushanya kunyika iyi.  Asi VaZembe vanokurudzira kuti dai VaMnangagwa vakwanisa kuwaniswa rubatsiro rwemari kuitira kurerutsa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika.  No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti VaMugabe Varemerwa neMutoro weKutonga
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakundikana kutonga nekudaro vave kufanira kuchienda pamudyandigere. Vachitaura neStudio 7, VaTsvangirai vati tsika yaVaMugabe yekuti hupfumi hwaenda kumawere nenyaya yezvirango uye vanhu vekuChina vave kunzi vari kuita kuti nyika ishomekerwe nemari kutsvaga kweashaya kutsvaga uta mugate. VaTsvangirai vanotiwo hupfumi hwenyika hunokwanisa kugadziriswa nechimbi chimbi kana hurumende yakazvipira kugadzirisa zvinhu uye kumira nyaya dzekuita zvehuwori. Vanoti muhurumende yemubatanidzwa vakakwanisa kugadzira zvinhu nechimbi chimbi kunyangwe hazvo hupfumi hwainge hwave kumaziva ndadzoka. Bato reMDC riri kuratidzirawo mumaguta ose enyika richiti harisi kufara nenyaya yehuori uye mabond notes ari kuda kuparurwa nebhanga guru renyika reRBZ. Kumwe kuratidzira kuri kwaMutare nemusi wa 25 Chikumi. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Mugabe Vanoti Vakazvipira Kushanda Vari Pasi paVaMnangagwa
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vaenderera mberi nemisangano yavo kuMataga Business Center, Mberengwa kuMidlands. Amai Mugabe vati havana chido chekutora chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, sezviri kutaurwa nevamwe mubato. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ekuti vamwe muZanu-PF, vachitungamirwa nedunhu reMashonland West, vari kuda kuti Amai Mugabe vatore chigaro chekuva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available Pari zvino Amai Mugabe ndivo mukuru webazi remadzimai reWomens League. Amai Mugabe vatiwo VaMugabe munhu agara achinetsekera nyika uye achirarama hupenyu hwakaoma kubva munguva yechimurenga. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika ashorawo bato reMDC achiti rakaumbwa navanasapurazi vaisafara nekutorerwa minda. Vatiwo mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai,ndivo vakaunza zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti Amai Mugabe havana zvavanoziva pane zvavari kutaura. VaGutu vatiwo bato ravo riri kuenda kumatare kuti amise Amai Mugabe kupa vanhu matarakita ehurumende, sezvo asiri ehurumende. No media source currently available Amai Mugabe vashorawo VaRugare Gumbo vePeople First vachiti mutengesi uye vari kufamba vachipa vanhu mari kuti vavatsigire.Asi VaGumbo vati zviri kutaurwa nemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika hazvina nemusoro wese. No media source currently available Vatevedzeri vose vemutungamiri wenyika, VaMnangagwa naVaPhelekezela Mphoko vange varipowo pamusangano uyu. VaMpoko varatidza kusafara apo vadaidzwa kunzi VaMboko nevakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro weMidlands, VaKizito Chivamba. Vati uku kushora uye kunyomba.

headline: Vatsigiri vaVaTrump Vanoratidzira muWashington DC
text: Vanhu vari kutsigira mutungamiri we America, VaDonald Trump, mumashoko avo asina huchapupu ekuti sarudzo dzemuAmerica dzakabiridzirwa, vaswera vaine hurongwa hwekuratidzira munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana muguta guru reWashington mudunhu re District of Columbia. Makungano ekuratidzira aya anga akarongwa muguta rose reWashington, vamwe vachiratidzira pasi pehurongwa hwemasangano anoti; Million MAGA March, Women for Trump, uye ne Stop the Steal. Vari kutungamirwa hurongwa hwakasiyana siyana uhu, vari kuburitsa mashoko asina humbowo mukati pamwe nechokwadi chizere achiti sarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, yakabiridzirwa zvemhando yepamusoro soro, nokudaro inofanirwa kudzivirirwa zvakasimba. VaTrump vari kuramba kutambira kuti vakakundwa nevaimbove mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, avo vakanzi nemasangano enhau, kusanganisira Fox News yagara ichitsigira VaTrump, ndivo vakakunda musarudzo iyi. VaTrump vari kuti pane zvakaitwa mumamwe matunhu zvinotyora mitemo yesarudzo, kunyange hazvo pasina vakuru vakuru vematanhu vati vazivisa kutyorwa kwekadzama kwemitemo yesarudzo, kunze kwedunhu reGeorgia riri kuverenga zvakare mavhoti sezvo mitemo yedunhu iri, ichisungira kuti kuverengwa kwemavhoti kudzokororwe kana paita mutsauko wemavhoti ari pasi pe 0.05% pavanhu vari kukwikwidzana. Georgia inonzi ine vanhu mamiriyoni mashanu vakavhota uye mutsvauko uripo une vanhu zviuru gumi nezvina, 14,000 votes vakavhotera VaBiden pamusoro pevanhu vakavhotera VaTrump. Izvi zvinosiya pane mutsauko we 0.03%, uyo uri pasi pe 0.05%. Maawa maviri kuratidzira kwekutsigira VaTrump kusati kwatanga, VaTrump vaonekwa vari mumotokari dzavo dzakaita mudungwe dzichipfuura nemumugwagwa, Pennsylvania Avenue, vachinyemwerera pamwe nekusimudzira vanhu maoko avo sechiratidzo chekufarira zviri kuitwa nevanhu ava. VaTrump vapfuura nemu Freedom Plaza vachienda kunotamba gorufu mudunhu rine muganhu ne District of Columbia, reVirginia. Vatsigiri vaVaBiden, avo vari kutarisirwa kugadzwa semutungamiri weAmerica wechimakumi mana nematanhatu, vanga vari muWashington DC zvakare vachiratidzirawo kutsigira kwavo VaBiden. Vatsigiri ava vanga vakaungana paBlack Lives Matter vaine zvinyorwa zvakanzi Biden Won. Kunyange hazvo hurumemende isati yatambira kukunda kwaVaBiden, mugari wekuDelaware uyu ari kutoronga hurumende yake itsva, uye akadoma vanhu mazana mashanu vachange vachifambisa basa rekutambidzana masimba. Asi bazi rehurumende rakakosha, reGeneral Services Administration, harisati ratambira kukunda kwaVaBiden, izvo zviri kuripa kuti risape chikwata chaVaBiden svumbunuro dzekushandisa mahofisi ehurumende pamwe nemari inoita $9,9 million inofanirwa kupihwa VaBiden kuti vashandise mukugadzirira hurumende yavo. Chikwata chaVaBiden chine mutoro mukuru wekuona kuti chabuda nemazita evanhu vanosvika zviuru zvinomwe vachange vachitungamira mapazi akasiyana siyana ehurumende pamwe nekuva vakuru vatsva muzvinzvimbo zvakawnda muhurumende. Pavanhu ava, vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana maviri nemakumi mashanu vanofanirwa kutambirwa nedare reSenate mushure mekunge vaongororwa kuti vanokodzera here kuva vashandi vakuru muhurumende. Kuongororwa kwenhoroondo dzavo kunoda mari yakawanda zvikuru. Kunyange hazvo vasati vapihwa rubatsiro nehurumende, VaBiden vanokwanisa kushandisa imwe yemari yavakapihwa yekuti vashandise muhurongwa hwavo hwekuti vasarudzwe semutungamiri wenyika. Mari iyi inopihwa vose vanenge vachikwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, kunyange hazvo mapato avo achizvitsavagirawo ega mari idzi. Kunonoka kutambidzwana kwemasimba muAmerica kwakaitikawo muna 2000 zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nevaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weAmerica, VaAl Gore, rekupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo dzemu Florida. Asi dare repamusoro soro rakabuda nemutongo wekatambira kuti VaBush ndivo vakanga vakunga musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika.

headline: ZimRights Yodzidzisa Vanhu Pamusoro peKukosha kweRunyararo neKugarisana
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Associationa, ZimRights, neChina rakapeta chirongwa chemazuva matatu chekudzidzisa vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu zvidzidzo zviri pamusoro pekukosha kwerunyararo pamwe nekugadzirisa makakava, zvikuru nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dza 2018. Chirongwa ichi chakatangwa nemusi weChipiri muguta reBulawayo chichipindwa nevanhu vaibva muBulawayo makare, muMidlands, Matabeleland South neMatabeleland North. Mukuru weZimRights, VaOkay Machisa, vanoti havasi kungotora vanorwira kodzero chete, asi kuti vanoremekedzwa mumatunhu avagere, sezvo vari vanhu vane mazwi anogona kuteererwa kana nevezvematongerwo enyika. Vanoti chinangwa chechirongwa chavo ichi ndechekuumba musha une runyararo munguva yesarudzo. VaMachisa vanoti chirongwa ichi vachapindawo nacho mune mamwe matunhu ose emunyika, uye vanotarisira kuti vari kudzidziswa ava vachakwanisawo kupakurira vavagere navo kukosha kwerunyararo munguva dzesarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: RDZ Inoti Misha yeNhengo Dzaro kuMakoni North Yakapiswa neZanu PF
text: Bato rinopikisa reRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe, RDZ, rinoti misha yenhengo dzaro mubhuku reMukuwamombe kuMakoni North mudunhu reManicaland yakapiswa usiku hweChipiri nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri vebato reZanu PF. Bato rinopikisa reRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe, RDZ, rinoti misha yenhengo dzaro mubhuku reMukuwamombe kuMakoni North mudunhu reManicaland yakapiswa usiku hweChipiri nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri vebato reZanu PF. Mutauriri weRDZ, VaPishai Muchauraya, vanoti midziyo yakawanda ino sanganisira chikafu, mbatya nemagumbeze zvakaparadzwa mumoto uyu, uyo vanoti wakasiya vanhu vakawanda vasisina pekugara. VaMuchauraya vanoti vane chokwadi chekuti izvi zvakaitwa nenhengo dzeZanu PF nekuti zvakaitika mushure mekunge Zanu PF raita musangano waro mudunhu iri apo vanoti pakanzi vese vanopikisana neZanu PF vanofanirwa kutama kubva mudunhu iri kana kuti vaizotorerwa matanho asina kutsanangurwa. Vanoti chiitiko ichi chakamhan’arwa kumapurisa epa Mayo Police Station asi kusvika pari nhasi hapana matanho ati atorwa ekusunga vanhu vavanoti ndivo vakaita izvi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZanu PF panyaya iyi. Mutauriri wemapurisa Senoir Assistant Commissioner, Charity Charamba, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanga vasati vanzwa nezvekupiswa kwemisha iyi kunyange hazvo vachiita misangano yekurovana misoro mangwanani oga-oga. No media source currently available

headline: Vakarwa Hondo yeRusununguko Voronga Nhaurirano neBritain
text: Vanotungamirira sangano revakarwa hondo yerusununguko reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association vanoti vari kuronga musangano neBritain nedzimwer nyika dzakabudirira kuti vagadzirise nyaya yemagariro avo sezvo vari kuti hurumende yavarasa. Vesangano re ZLHR ava vakataura mashoko aya apo vakaita musangano nevatori venhau muHarare nemusi weChina. Munyori mukuru musangano re ZNLWA VaVictor Matemadanda vati kunyangwe hazvo vakazoshorwa kuti vave kuita misangano nevekumawirira havana hany'a nazvo sezvo chinangwa chavo chiri chekuti varwi vehondo yerusununguko vabatsirikane. Vati vane chivimbo chekuti hurukuro dzavachaita idzi dzichabatsira kusimudzira hupenyu hwevarwi verusununguko. VaMatemadanda vashoropodzawo Brigadier General Retired Asher Walter Tapfumaneyi munyori mubazi revakarwa hondo vachiti vanofanira kuregedza kuda kutonga sangano revarwi vehondo yerusununguko. VaTapfumaneyi vanoti hurumende yave kuda vatungamiri vatsva sezvo isingakwanise kushanda nevatungamiri varipo nekuti vakati mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ngavaende pamudyandigere vachitiwo havachavatsvagire rutsigiro. VaMatemadanda vati bato reZanu PF harina kumboita hany'a nevarwi vehondo yerusununguko uye sangano ravo isangano rakazvimirira risinei nebato reZanu PF. Vatiwo vari kushushikana kuti kunyangwe vakarwa hondo, vana veZimbbwe havana rusununguko. Vanoona nezvemabasa musangano iri, VaFrancis Nhando vatsigira mashoko aya vachiti vakazvionera pamhuno sefodya apo vange vobvunzurudzwa nemapurisa kuti sei vange vakamira muHarare Gardens vari vana apo vaigadzirira kuita musangano wavo. Vanoona nezvekubuditswa kwemashoko musangano iri, VaDouglas Mahiya vati vanokatyamadzwa kuti hurumende inoda kupindira munyaya dzesangano revarwi verusunungukonekuyedza kuri putsa. Musangano uyu wange uine vanasachigaro vekumatunhu akasiyana-siyana avo vati kunyangwe hazvo hurumende ichida kuvanganisa, vari kuzoramba vachibatira pamwe nemukuru wavo VaChristopher Mutsvangwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvevakarwa hondo VaTshinga Dube kana VaTapfumaneyi sezo vange vasiri kudarira nharembozha dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiden Voshanyira Dunhu reOklahoma
text: Mutungamiri we America, VaJoe Biden, nhasi vachashanyira guta re Tulsa, mudunhu re Oklahoma, uko vanoti vanoda kunopemberera kushinga kwevanhu vechitema vakararama mukupondwa kwakaitwa vatema nemhomho yevachena mugore ra 1921. VaBiden vanoti vanhu vatema vakararama havana kuora moyo asi vakashanda nesimba vakaumba hupenyu hwavo patsva. Kupondwa kwevatema uku kwakaitika kwemazuva maviri, anoti 31 Chivabvu ne 1 Chikumi mugore ra 1921, dzimba nemabhizimisi evatema zvichitungidzwa nemoto vanhu vachipfurwa kana kusungirirwa. Izvi zvinonzi zvakaitika mushure mekunge umwe musikana wechichena aiva nemakore gumi nemanomwe akapomera mhosva mukomana wechitema aive nemakore gumi nemapfumbamwe achiti akange achida kumubhinya. Zvinonzi pakaurawa vanhu vechitema vanopfuura mazana matatu. VaBiden varikuita rwendo urwu panguva iyo vachieza kudzika mitemo inopedza rusaruraganda mu America. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, Muzvinafundo Stan Mukasa, vanodzidzisa paIndiana University of Pennsylvania, vanoti kupondwa kwakaitwa vanhu ava muna 1921 kwaka zivikanwa muna 1995, mushure memurume ainzi Timothy McVeigh akabhomba mahofisi ehurumende muguta reOklahoma City, mudunhu re Oklahoma. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Akazvimirira Okwezva Vanhu Kunonyoresa kuVhota Kuburikidza neMimhanzi
text: Vanhu vane chitsama vaungana mumusha weCowdray Park muBulawayo neSvondo vachiona vaimbi vakasiyana-siyana pamwe nekunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota pasi pechirongwa chaitwa nemamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega. Masangano aya anga achishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission mukuedza kukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota musarudzo dzichaitwa gore rino. Vamwe vevanhu ava, vanosanganisira vechidiki, vange vachinyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kekutanga muhupenyu hwavo. Mumwe wevanhu vakadaro ndiKindness Mukume uyo ati ange asati awana mukana wekunyoresa achitiwo azokwezvwa kuuya kuzonyoresa nenyaya yekuti anga auya kuzoona vamwe vevaimbi vange varipo sezvo achifarira zvemumhanzi. Mumwezve wechidiki Muzvare Shamiso Ncube, avo vane makore makumi maviri nemana ekuberekwa, ndemumwe wevanyoresawo kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota pachiitiko ichi, vachiti vange vasati vanyoresa nekuti vange vave nekanguva vari kuSouth Africa. VaTawanda Chimhini vanove mukuru wesangano reElection Resource Centre, rinove rimwe remasangano ange ari muchirongwa ichi, vati vakatanga kushandisa chirongwa chekushandisa vaimbi kuedza kukwezva vanhu kuti vanyorese kuvhota kubvira gore rapera. Vati chirongwa ichi vari kuchiita senzira yekuedza kukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota, kunyanya munzvimbo dzine vanhu vashoma vari kuita izvi. VaChimhini vatiwo kunyange hazvo chirongwa cheMop-Up chave kupera, chirongwa chekuedza kukwezva vanhu ichi chinobatsira sezvo kunyoreswa kwevanhu kucharamba kuchienderera mberi kusvika kumazuva gumi nemaviri mushure mekunge zuva rekuvhota ratarwa zviri pamutemo. Mukuru wezvesarudzo mudunhu reBulawayo Amai Sithembiso Khupe vati chirongwa chanhasi chavabatsira zvikuru pakusimudzira huwandu hwevanhu vauya kuzonyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Chirongwa cheBVR Mop-Up, icho chakatanga musi wa10 Ndira, chinotarisirwa kupera nemusi weChina 8 Kukadzi. Dunhu reBulawayo ndiro rine vanhu vashoma vanyoresa pamatunhu ose ari munyika. Vanhu zvikamu makumi mashanu nezvinomwe kubva muzana ndivo vanyoresa kusvika pari zvino mudunhu iri. Vanhu vanopfuura mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana maviri ndivo vanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota munyika mose kusvika pari zvino. ZEC inoti yakanga yakatarisira kunyoresa vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni mashanu. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Pane Vanhu Vari Kuda Kuvauraya
text: Mutungamiri weZanu PF, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangangwa, vapona nepaburi retsono zvichitevera kupitika kwaitika pavanga vachiitira musangano wavo kuWhite City stadium muBulawayo. Kuputika uku kwaitika apo VaMnangagwa vanga vobva pasiteji vapedza kutaura. VaMnangagwa havana kukuvara. Asi mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, pamwe nemudzimai wemutuvedzeri wemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, Amai Mary Chiwenga, vakuvara muchiitiko icho. VaChiwenga vanonzi vakuvarawo kumeso. Vamwe vanonzi vakuvara vanosanganisira sachigaro weZanu PF, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, murongi wemisangano muZanu PF, VaEngelbert Rugeje, nevamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Vanhu vangangosvika gumi vanonzi vakuvara muchiitiko ichi. Vanhu ava vanosanganisirawo vashandi vanochengetedza mutungamiri wenyika vanosvika vana. Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, vati ichokwadi kuti VaMnangagwa havana kukuvara muchiitiko ichi uye vabva paWhite City vachimhanyiswa kuState House yemuBulawayo kwavanochengetedzwa. VaCharamba vati vanochengetedza nyika pamwe nemapurisa vave mubishi rekuferefeta kuti chii chakonzera kuputika kwavari kufungidzira kuti ibhambu kunyange hazvo mutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. VaCharamba vati VaMnangagwa vamhanya kuchipatara cheMater Dei chiri muBulawayo uko kunonzi kwaendeswa VaMohadi pamwe naAmai Chiwenga. VaCharamba, avo vanga vava kupinda mundege, vati VaMohadi vakuvara gumbo asi hatina kunzwa kuti Amai Chiwenga vakuvara pai uye kuti murume wavo akuvarawo here kana kuti kwete. VaMnangagwa vaudza nhepfenyuro yeZBC kuti sachigaro webato ravo, Amai Kashiri, pamwe nemutevedzeri wemutauriri wedare reparemende, Amai Mabel Chinomona, ndevamwe vevakuvara. Vatiwo pane vanhu vari kuda kuvauraya vasiri vemuBulawayo vavati vanhu vanobva kunze kweBulawayo vakaronga izvi. VaMngangwa vakamboenda kuSouth Africa kunorapwa mushure mekupihwa chepfu pamusangano wakaitwa nevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kuGwanda gore rapera. Kunyange hazvo izvi zvaitika, VaMnangagwa vati vacharamba vachienderera mberi nekutsvaga rutsigiro vachiti chiitiko chanhasi hachisi kuvatyisa uye vati kubva pakatanga vemapato kutsvaga rutsigiro, munyika manga mune runyararo. Muzinda weAmerica muHarare washoropodza zvikuru chiitiko ichi. Muzinda uyu wati mhirizhonga dzemhando yose hadzitambirwe. America yati iri kurangarira vose vakuvara muchiitiko ichi No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti Havasi Kuzosiya Basa Sezvo Varikutarisira Kunaya
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai vanoti havasi kuzosiya chigaro sezviri kukukurudzirwa nevamwe vanhu. VaTsvangirai vakazivisa nyika kuti vane chirwere chegomarara rematumbu uye varikurapwa. "Haiwa zvekuti ndisiye basa ndezvavana tinhai dzirwe. Mungangoti munhu arwara otonzi asiye basa?’’ Vatiwo vari kufara nebasa riri kubatwa nevatungamiri vebato ravo avo vari kutungamira zvirongwa zvebato parizvino ivo vachinaya. Bepanhau reHerald ndiro range riri pamberi kutaura mashoko ekuti zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo. No media source currently available

headline: SADC Summit Yoshorerwa Kusakoshesa Dambudziko reMhirizhonga Iri muSouth Africa
text: Vatungamiri venyika dzekuchamhembe kwe Africa vari kupinda muZimbabwe kutanga neMuvhuro kuitira kuti vapinde mumusangano wechimbi chimbi weSADDC Extraordinary Summit uri kuitirwa muHarare. Kunyange hazvo musangano uyu uri wechimbi chimbi, uri kuzeya nyaya yekusimbaradzwa kwemaindasitiri enyika dzemu SADC chete, usingaise pamusoro mhirizhonga iri kuitika mu South Africa. Asi vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari kushora zvikuru vatungamiri veSADC ava vachiti havasi kukoshesa matambudziko ari kukonzerwa nemhirizhonga iri kuitika muSouth Africa uko zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zvemuAfrica zviri kurwiswa kana kuurayiwa nezvemuSouth Africa. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika ava vanoda kuti kudeuka ropa kuri kuitika mu South Africa kuve imwe yenyaya huru inofanirwa kutaurwa nezvayo pamusangano uyu. Musangano wemazuva mashanu uyu wakatanga neMugovera uye kwange kuchisangana makurukota ezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwemusangano uyu, munyori mukuru weSADC, Dr Stergomena Lawrence Tax, vati panofanirwa kutorwa gwara rekutevedza panyaya yemaindasitiri. Mashoko aVa Tax anotevera kurudziro yemusangano wemakurukota ezvegwara rehupfumi emuSADC. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanova sachigaro weSADC, vapinda munyika vachibva ku Indonesia kumusangano weAsia-Africa Summit. Munyori mubazi rezve kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaJoey Bimha, vanoti zviri kuvatungamiri venyika kuti vazeye nyaya yemhirizhonga iri muSouth Africa. No media source currently available Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vachikokera mabasa musangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti hakuna nyaya dzehupfumi dzinobudirira kana paine mhirizhnga seiri kuitika muSouth Africa. VaMabenge vanoti vatungamiri venyika dzemu SADC vanofanirwa kuona kuisa pamusoro nyaya yemhirizhonga kuitira kuti ipihwe chiremera painenge yokurukurwa. No media source currently available Apo vezvematongerwo enyika vakaisa maziso avo kumusangano weSADC wechimbi chimbi uyu, sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti misangano yakadai ndeyekungopedza nguva sezvo pasina chinotaurwa chinozadzikiswa nevatungamiri venyika dziri kuchamhembe kwe africa. ZCTU inoti vatungamiri veSADC dai vaida kuita zvine musoro, vangadai vakaisa nyaya yemhirizhonga iri mu South Africa senhaurwa yepamusoro soro kuitira kuti ikurukurwe pobuda zvisungo zvinotorwa nenyika idzi. Sangano iri rinoti VaMugabe vanofanira kubvunzwa nevamwe vavo kuti murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaItai Dzamara, avo vakapambwa mwedzi wapera, varipi.

headline: Mutumbi waVaTsvangirai Unosvika kuBuhera uko Watambirwa neZviuru zveVanhu
text: Mutumbi wemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMorgan VaTsvangirai wasvika kuBuhera, mudunhu reManicaland, kumadeuka zuva kweMuvhuro, uko waendeswa nechikopokopo chehurumende. Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa muKenya, reOrange Democratic Movement, VaRaila Odinga, vasvikawo muHarare kuti vaonekane nemumwe wavo. Mhomho yevanhu inonzi yaungana ikoko kugamuchira mutumbi waVaTsvangirai, avo vari kutarisirwa kuradzikwa neChipiri mubhuku rekwaHumanikwa kwakare kuBuhera. Mutumbi waVaTsvangirai usati waendeswa kumusha watanga wapfuudzwa nepamuzinda webato iri weHarvest House kuitira kuti veruzhinji vapiwe mukana wekuonekana nemutungamiri wavo. Motokari yanga yakatakura mutumbi uyu yambomira kwemaminitsi gumi pamuzinda webato apa, ukazoendeswa kuFreedom Square, motokari dzichifamba zvishoma nezvishoma veruzhinji vachitora mifananidzo vamwe vachiimba. uko kwanga kwakaunga vamwe vanhu vakawanda Vachitaura pamusangano weveruzhinji wekupedzisira wekuperekedza VaTsvangirai paFreedom Square, vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa vaudza vatsigiri vebato kuti vachagadzirisana nevamwe vatungamiri mubato ravo kuti vaende kusarudzo dzegore rino vakabatana. VaChamisa vati VaTsvangirai vaiva munhu aida kubatanidza vanhu vose ndosaka vakaita kuti vatungamiri vemapato anopikisa vabatane pasi peMDC Alliance kuti vaite chinhu chimwe chete musarudzo. Vati vachaedza kuti vabatane nevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato, Amai Thokozani Khupe naVaElias Mudzuri zvichitevera makakatanwa ari mubato ravo panyaya yekuti ofanobata chigaro chaVaTsvangirai ndiyani. Zvichitevera kukandirana makobvu nematete kuri kuitwa muMDC-T panyaya yekuti achatsiva VaTsvangirai ndiyani, dangwe raVaTsvangirai, VaEdwin Tsvangirai, vakurudzira vari mubato iri kuti vabatane kuitira kuti vagokunda musarudzo uye vasiye mhuri ichichema baba vavo murunyararo. Zvichakadai, VaChamisa vashora hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa nekupa ruremekedzo rwekutakura VaTsvangirai nechikopokopo chemasoja kuenda kumusha kwavo kuBuhera asi vakatadza kuvaremekedza vachiri vapenyu. VaChamisa vatiwo vanoziva zvose zvaidiwa naVaTsvangirai sezvo vakafamba vose kubva muna 1999 pakavambwa MDC kusvikira VaTsvangirai vashaika. Vati VaTsvangirai vangafara zvikuru kana Zanu PF ikabviswa muhutongi vachiti sebato, vakasiirwa gwara rekutevedzera naVaTsvangirai. Ataura akamirira mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance uye vari mutungamiri weZimbabwe People First, VaAgrippa Mutambara, vati semubatanidzwa vacharamba vakabatana sezvakasiya zvarongwa naVaTsvangirai. VaTsvangirai vanotarisirwa kuradzikwa neChipiri masikati nenguva dza 2. No media source currently available

headline: VaSikhala Voda Kuripwa Mamiriyoni Matatu eMadhora neKusungwa Kwavakaitwa
text: Mutewedzeri wasachigaro vebato reMDC, VaJob Sikhala, vanoti vakakwanisa kusvitsa masamanisi kudare repamusoro ekuti varipwe mari inosvika mamiriyoni matatu emadhora ekuAmerica mushure mekusungwa kwavo gore rapera vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kubvisa mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pachigaro. VaSikhala, avo vakazowanikwa nedare repamusoro kuMasvingo vasina mhosva, vanoti vakwirira kumatare gurukota rezvemukati menyika, Vakazembe Kazembe, mukuru wemapurisa Commissioner-General Godwin Matanga, pamwe nemupurisa wekudivi reLaw and Order muHarare avanoti akavashungurudza zvikuru pavaive muhusungwa, Superintendent Daniel Joseph. VaSikhala, vanove zvakare mumiriri weZengeza West muparamende, vakatanga danho rekukwira kumatare iri gore rapera muna Nyamavhuvhu vachikwirira mapurisa pamwe naVaCain Mathema vaive gurukota rezvemukati menyika panguva iyi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuvatatu ava kana vati vatambira masamanisi aya. No media source currently available

headline: Makereke Opokana neMashoko aVaGeorge Charamba
text:
Paita kukandirana makobvu nematete pakati pemutauriri wemutungamiri
wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, nevamwe vakuru vedzisvondo dziri pasi
pemubatanidzwa weZimbabwe Heads of Christian Denominations, CHOCD,
pamusoro pekuti makereke avhurwe asi achibvumidza chete vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira cherwere cheCovid-19. Mubatanidzwa weZHOCD, wakazivisa kuti danho rehurumende iri rakanaka asi rinonetsa kutevedzera sezvo kereke isingagone kudzinga vanhu vanenge vauya kuchechi ichivati havana kubayiwa nhomba. VaCharamba nezuro vakabva vatuka makereke aya padandemutande ravo
reTwitter vachidoma munyori weZHOCD, VaKenneth Mtata, nezita kuti
kuramba kwavo uku kune chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Asi VaMtata vaudza Studio 7 nhasi kuti mashoko aVaCharamba anoratidza
