kuti havazive kuti zvinyorwa zveZHOCD zvinonyorwa sei. VaMtata vati ivo munyori chete asi pfungwa ndedzehutungamiri nemakereke awo.

VaMtata vati havatyi kuti vakadomwa nezita naVaCharamba vachiti semugari wemunyika vakasununguka kutaura zvavanoda
zvinosanganisira zvematongerwo enyika.

Sachigaro wekereke yeEvalengical Fellowship of Zimbabwe, imwe
yemakereke anoumba ZHOCD, Bishop Never Muparutsa, vati mashoko aVaCharamba haana kunaka sezvo VaMtata vanongove munyori.

Bishop Muparutsa vati vachanotaura negurukota rezvehutano uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, gurukota
rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri, pamwe nemukuru weNational Covid-19 Taskfore, Dr Agnes Mahomva, pamusoro pedanho rehurumende rekuti vasina kubayiwa nhomba vasabvumidzwe kupinda muchechi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaCharamba pataenda kumhepo sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi anopinda chechi yeRoman Catholic,
VaClifford Rusere, vati mutemo unofanirwa kubata munhu wese zvisinei
kuti makereke here kana kuti makambani. VaRusere vati kana makambani ave kumanikidzirwa kuti vanenge vasina
kubayiwa vasaende kubasa makereke anofanirwa kutevedzerawo izvozvo.

Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekuderedza
kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: United Nations Population Fund Yokurudzira Kumiswa kweMhirizhonga Mazuva Ose ePagore
text: United Nations Population Fund nemusi weChina svondo rapfuura yakaparura muzinda wekupotera kana vasangana nemhirizhonga yemudzimba kana kumbunyikidzwakana kuti One Stop Centre. Chirongwa ichi chiri pasi pechirongwa che GV 365 chinova mubatanidzwa pakati pebazi reUnited Nations iri, hurumende dzeBritain, Sweden nemubatanidzwa weEuropean Union. Mumiriri webazi reUnited Nations Population Fund munyika Dr. Esther Muia vachiparura chirongwa ichi vakati vanhu vanofanirwa kucherechedza mazuva gumi nematanhatu ekurangangarira kumiswa kwemhirizhonga yemudzimba mazuva ose pagore kwete mumazuva akatarwa. Vachitaura pakupemberera kuvhurwa kwemusha wekupotera weavo vanenge vashungurudzwa mudzimba mukuru muChinhoyi, Dr Muia vanoti nyika inofanirwa kurangarira kumiswa wemhirizhonga yemudzimba mazuva ose kuti huwandu hwemhirizhonga dzemudzimba huderere. Vachitaurawo pachiitiko mukuru wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland West, Amai Priscila Makotose, vakataura vakamirira mukuru wemapurisa VaGodwin Matanga vakati mhosva dzemhirizhonga dziri kuwanda gore negore. Vakeenderera mberi vakati gore rino kwaparwa mhosva dzine chekuita nemhirizhonga dzemudzimba dzinosvika zviuru makumi maviri nemazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nemana zvichienzaniswa negore rakapera apo pakaparwa mhosva dzinosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezana rine makumi manomwe nemaviri. Amai Makotose vanoti havasi kuzopeta maoko vanhu vachipara mhosva dzekushungurudza vamwe mudzimba dzinosanganisira kubatwa chibharo kunonzi kuri kuparwa dzimwe nguva nevehukama. Bazi remagweta anomiririra madzimai anenge ashungurudzwa mudzimba reZimbabwe Women Lawyers Association rinoti madzimai akawanda zvichienzaniswa nakare vari kuuya kuzoyamurwa nemagweta ebazi ravo. Mumiriri wesangano iri Muzvare Mulela Nyatsuro vakatiwo vamwe varume vari kurohwa mudzimba vave kubuda pachena. Zimbabwe iri kubatana nedzimwe nyika kucherechedza mazuva gumi nematanhatu ekukurudzira kumiswa kwemhirizhonga dzemudzimba kubva musiwa 25 Mbudzi kusvika musiwa 10 Zvita. Gore rino mazuva aya ari kurangarirwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekudzivirira kubatwa chibharo kana kuti “Prevention, Protection, Participation and Services: End Gender Based Violence” No media source currently available

headline: Vari kuSouth Africa Vorwadziwa neKutadza Kuenda Kumusha Kunovhota
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanobva kuZimbabwe vanogara nekushanda muSouth Africa, vanoti vanonzwa kurwadzikana zvikuru nekutadza kuenda kumusha kunovhota nepamusana pezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Mumwe akange anyoresa kuitira kuti azovhota, Amai Pennylope Kacheche, vanoti vakatadza kuenda kunovhota kumusha nezuro nepamusana pekuti vakange vasina mari. Muzvare Melody Chivhunze vanobva kuChipinge, asi vachishanda nekugara muSouth Africa. Muzvare Chivhunze vanoti vakatya kuenda kunovhota sezvo vaifunga kuti sarudzo idzi dzichaita mhirizhonga. VaSamson Matimba, avo vanobva kuChiweshe, vanotiwo vakange vakatarisira kuti bato reMDC T inotungamirirwa naVa Nelson Chamisa, richavabatsira nemari yekufambisa sekuvimbisa kwarakange ramboita. VaMatimba vanoti mari yavanowana ishoma zvikuru. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuMDC-T kuti seyi isina kuzadzisa zvayakanga yavimbisa nhengo dzayo. Mumwe mugari wekuSouth Africa, VaRomeo Manunure, vanotiwo vakange vanyoresa kundovhota sezvo vaida zvikuru kusarudza mutungamiriri wavanoda, asi vanoti vakakundikana nekuda kwekuti havana kunge vapiwa mukana wekundovhota, kubva kubasa kwavo. Vamwe vanoti vakakundikana kunovhota nepamusana pekuti havana magwaro ekufambisa. VaShepard Madhuna vanoti havana kuda kupedza nguva yavo mukunyoresa kuvhota nekuda kwekuti hapana zvazvinosandura sezvo hurumende iripo yakagara yakakunda kare. Mudzidzisi pachikoro chepamusoro che Tswane University of Technology, Va Rick Mukonza, vanoti vanhu vakawanda havana chivimbo nehurumende yeZanu PF chekuti ingaremekedze zvido zvevanhu. Zvichabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika zvinofanirwa kuziviswa mukati memazuva mashanu kubva musi waitwa sarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoita Hurukuro neMutungamiri weAngola
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaita musangano nemutungamiri weAngola vanovazve sachigaro weSADC Troika, VaJoao Lourenco kuLuanda. Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaGeorge Charamba, vaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti VaMnangagwa vari kuita hurukuro nevatungamiri venyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica uye vakatoita musangano nemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaJacob Zuma. Mashoko ari kubva kuAngola anoti vaviri ava vari kutaura nezvemamiriro ezvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika muZimbabwe uye nyaya yesarudzo dzichaitwa muZimbabwe mukupera kwegore. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kuenda kuNamibia neMuvhuro vozoenda kuZambia, Botswana nedzimwe nyika uko vachaita zvakare misangano nevatungamiri venyika idzi. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vari kuita misangano iyi kuti vatsanangure zvakaita kuti vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa uye kutaurawo nyaya dzekudyidzana munyaya dzezvehupfumi. VaMnangagwa vaperekedzwa negurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Retired Major General Sibusiso Moyo, VaCharamba, munyori mubazi rezvemhando dzemoto, VaPatson Mbiriri, uye munyori mubazi rezvekurima, VaRingson Chitsiko. VaKembo Mohadi ndivo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika. Sachigaro weZanu-PF kuBritain, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti zviri kuitwa naVaMnangagwa zvinhu zvakanakira nyika. No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vachishanda nesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti VaMangagwa vanofanirwa kugadzirisa mhirizhonga iri kumboitika pano neapo munyika vasati vaenda kunze kwenyika. Asi VaMabenge vatiwo nematorerwo akaitwa chigaro naVaMnangagwa hazvishamise kuti vanoda kuti SADC ivatambire. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Nyagomo Vokurudzira Vari Kunze Kunonyoresa Kuvhota
text: Mutungamiri werimwe remapato anopikisa, reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe, Muzvare Barbara Nyagomo, vanoti bato ravo riri kushanda zvakasimba kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe vari munyika dzakapoteredza nyika vadzokere kumusha kunonyoresa kuti vazokwanisa kuvhota musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Muzvare Nyagomo vanoti vari kuita izvi munyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, Mozambique, Botswana neZambia. "Isusu tiri kunyanya kuisa simba rakawanda muSouth Africa, mune vana veZimbabwe vazhinji vatinoziva kuti vanokwanisa kuenda kumba vachino register kuti vavhote. Saka tiri kuita voters education ne awareness kuti vazive kuti sei vachifanira kuti vano register izvozvi, chero vakanga vaka register kubva muna 1980," Muzvare Nyagomo vanodaro. Muzvare Nyagomo, avo vari kuManchester kuBritain, vanoti hapana imwe nzira yekuti vari kunze kwenyika vakwanise kupinda musarudzo kunze kwekutoenda kumusha kunonyoresa, sezvo Zimbwbwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yakatozivisa kare kuti haina mari yekuti ikwanise kunyoresa vese vari kunze kwenyika vari munyika dzavari kugara. Bato reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe riri mumubatanidzwa wemapato ari kurwira kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe, weNational Electoral Reform Agenda, NERA. Mapato ari mumibatanidzwa yeNERA neCODE ari muSouth Africa pari zvino munhaurirano dzinonzi dzakanangana nekuedza kuumba mubatanidzwa pakati pemapoka maviri aya. No media source currently available

headline: Magweta eVeritas Anoti ZEC Inofanira Kuudza Mapato Anopikisa Ari Kudhinda Magwaro ekuVhotesa
text: Magweta anoshanda nesangano reVeritas iro rinoongorora mitemo inenge iri mudare reparamende anoti bumbiro remutemo rinosungira sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo reZimbabwe electoral commission kuti risume mapato anopikisa kuti magwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot papers ari kudhindwa kupi kuti nyaya dzesarudzo munyika dzisaite mutauro. ZEC inoti sezvo nguva yekuita sarudzo yave pedyo, yave kutsvaga vanodhinda mapepa aya nechimbi chimbi. Asi vanopikisa vange vachiti vanoda kuti zviitwe pajekerere pachikokwa makambani akawanda kuti sarudzo dzisabirirwe. Mutemo unosungirawo ZEC kuti isume mapato ari kukwikwidza huwandu hwemapepa anenge adhindwa uye anenge aendeswa kunzvimbo yose yekuvhotera. Veritas inoti hapana chinokanganisa ZEC kuti izivise vanopikisa kuti kambani yavakasarudza kudhidha mapepa ndeipi uye kukoka a nhumwa kunoona kunenge kudindwa mapepa acho. Mutungamiri wenyika vaemmerson mnangagwa vave kutarisirwa chero nguva kudoma zuva resarudzo sezvo senate iri kutarisirwa svondo rino kutambira bhiri rekuvandudza mitemo yesarudzo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehumhizha mumichina yekuvhotesa kana kuti BVR Doctor Samuel Chindaro vanoti kubirira sarudzo dzeBVR kunogona kuti netsei asi mitemo inodzikwa nemapato inogona kukanganisa jekerere musarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiti Voshanyira Dr Patson Dzamara neVamwe Vari muHusungwa
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople’s Democratic Party VaTendai Biti nhasi vaenda kuHarare Central Prison nekuChikurubi uko kune nhengo gumi neimwe dzakasungwa dzichiratidzira muAfrica Unity Square. Vakasungwa ava vanosanganisa Muzvare Linda Masarira, Tatenda Mombeyarara, Dr Patson Dzamara, Pride Mukono, Muzvare Pamela Mawire, Makomborero Haruzivishe, Muzvare Irene Takavada, Shadreck Dhliwayo naBrian Kansunzuma. Vechidiki ava vaida kuratidzira kwemazuva gumi nematanhatu vachiti havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kutonga nedemo. Kudare ramajastiriti vakanzi vabhadhare mari yechibatiso inosvika chiuru chemadhora inonzi nemagweta yakawandisa. No media source currently available VaBiti vati vanhu vari muhusungwa ava vari kunetseka zvikuru nekuti hapana vari kukwanisa kuunganidza mari inosvika zviuru zvisere zvemadhora zvemari yechibatiso. Madzimai ari kuChikurubi anonzi ari kunetsekawo nekushaya zvokudya uye mvura yakachena. Mumwe mudzimai ane mwana ane mwedzi mitatu anonzi akatomurumura nekuda kwekusungwa uku.

headline: ZEC Yotanga Chirongwa Kunyoresa Vanhu Vachavhota Pachishandiswa BVR
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vatara kuti kutanga svondo rinouya nemusi wa14 Gunyana kusvika musi wa15 Ndira 2018, Zimbabwe Elections Commission, ZEC, inofanira kutanga kuumba gwaro idzva revavhoti kana kuti biometric voters roll. VaMugabe vaita izvi kuburikidza negwaro rezvisiviso zvehurumende kana kuti “government gazette”. Izvi ndizvo zvinofanira kuitwa pasi pemutemo wesarudzo kana kuti Electoral Act, gwaro idzva risati raparurwa. Asi vachitaura neStudio7, sachigaro weZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vati hazvireve kuti vanobva vatanga kunyoresa vanhu musi wa14 Gunyana sezvo vachiri vakamirira mimwe michina yekunyoresa vanhu. No media source currently available Mukuru wesangano reElection Resource Centre, VaTawanda Chimhini, vati vari kufara nezvaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika sezvo vakagara vayambira ZEC kuti kuda kutanga kunyoresa vanhu pasina kuteverwa mutemo kwaizokonzera mutauro. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Yokurudzirwa Kufambisa Basa reKunyoresa Vavhoti
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Election Support Network (ZESN) rinoti komisheni yezvesarudzo, yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, rinofanira kudoma kambani ichanyoresa vanhu kuvhota nemhando yeBiometric Voter Registration(BVR). Asi nyanzvi dzinoti ZEC inogona kushandisa nzira yaishandiswa kare nekuda kwechinono chairi kuita. Sangano iri rinoti ZEC inofanira kudoma nechimbi chimbi kambani ichapihwa basa yekunyoresa vavhoti pachishandiswa BVR kuti itange basa sezvo sarudzo dza2018 dzave pedyo. Vachitaura pamusoro peBVR pachirongwa cheQuill Speak muHarare, mukuru weZESN, Amai Rindai Chipfunge –Vava, vakati ZEC inofanirawo kujekesa mitemo yekuti chirongwa ichi chichashandiswa sei, sezvo pasina ruzivo kumapato ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe neveruzhinji pamusoro pechirongwa ichi. Vati ongororo yavakaita yemichina yeBVR, yakaitwa nemakambani ari kuda kupihwa neZEC, yakaratidza kuti michina iyi inononaka. Vakatiwo zvakakosha kuti Zec ishandiswe vadzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusoro kuti vashande sevanhu vachange vachinyoresa vanhu pachirongwa cheBVR sezvakaitwa kuKenya. Amai Chipfunde- Vava vanoti zviri pachena kuti hurongwa hweBVR huri kufarirwa neveruzhinji uye huchapedza mamwe matambudziko ange achiwanikwa pagwaro revavhoti rekare. Mukuru weElections Resources Centre, VaTawanda Chimhini, vaudza Studio7 kuti zviri pachena kuti chirongwa cheBVR chinenge chiri nani kudarika nzira dzaishandiswa kare. ZEC yatove kumashure pahurongwa hwayo hwekunyoresa vavhoti hwayakatura kuparamende. Pahurongwa uhwu ZEC yaifanira kunge yakatanga kunyoresa vavhoti muna Kubvumbikusvika munaMbudzi. Asi kusvika nhasi haisati yatombodoma kana kambani yaichashanda nayo pabasa iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemutemo uye vachidzisa paKent University kuBritain,VaAlex Magaisa, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvese zviri kuitika izvi zvinofanira kusuwisa veruzhinji. Vati mutemo hauna kunyatsojeka, uye pane mukana mukuru wekuti vanhu vanogona kunyoreswa pachishandiswa nzira dzakare. VaMagaisa vanotiwo zviri pachena kuti ZEC haikwanisi kuzvimirira uye inotoita zvinodiwa nehurumende. Amai Chipfunde-Vava vanoti zvakakosha kuti chirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti chitange pachine nguva nekuti hapana ruzivo pamusoro pechirongwa ichi. VaChimhini vati sezvo BVR ichishandisa mitezo yemuviri yakaita sezvigunwe maziso nezvimwe pane vanhu vari kuudzwa manyepo nekutyityidzirwa uye izvi zvinogona kukanganisa zvichabuda musarudzo. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZEC panyaya iyi. Asi zvichitevera kuongorora kwavakaita michina yeBVR kubva kukambani yekuGermany neChina, veZEC vakatoendesa magwaro ekuti vanoda kushanda nekamabani ipi kune veState Procurement Board avo vane mvumo yekutora danho rekupedzesera panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Botswana Yomakidza Vapoteri Kudzokera Kumusha Kwavo
text: Hurumende yeBotswana inoti ichaita musenga bere kune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvo zviri muhupoteri munyika iyi kana zvikasasarudza kunyoresa kuti zvidzoserwe kumusha musi wa31 Zvita usati wapera. Asi hurongwa hweBotswana uhwu hwuri kushoropodzwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nevapoteri avo vanoti vakatiza mhirizhonga nekumbunyikidzwa munyika nenhengo dzebato rinotonga reZANU PF. Mudzidzisi wemitemo paGaborone University College of Law and Professional Studies, VaCharles Kungwengwe, vanoti danho iri rinoratidza kuti hurumende yeBotswana hairemedzi zvisungo zvakaitwa nesangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dzepasi rose, reUnited Nations. Sangano rinochengetedza kodzero dzevapoteri pasi rose reUnited Nations High Commissioner of Refugees rakasunga kuti hakuna nyika inofanirwa kumanikidza kudzosera vapoteri kwavakatiza kana paine kuratidza kuti hupenyu hwavo huri munjodzi nokuda kwezvematongerwo enyika kana chii zvacho. Chisungo ichi chakaitwa musi wa23 Nyamavhuvhu 1977 chichitsigira chimwe chisungo che United Nations Convention chakaitwa muna 1951. Imwewo nyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevapoteri uye vachidzidzisa mitemo paUniversity of Botswana, VaTakudzwa Matambo, vashoropodza danho reBotswana vachiti vapoteri ava vanogona kukwidza nyaya yavo kumatare edzimhosva vachipikisa zviri kuitwa neBotswana. Mukokeri wesangano remubatanidzwa wemapato anorwira kodzero dzevashandi muBotswana, reBotswana Federation of Trade Unions, VaGadzani Mhotsa, vanoti hurumende yeBotswana yatora danho iri isana kutsanangurira veruzhinji kuti yakaongorora here mamiriro ezvinhu muZimbabwe kana kuti kwete. Mutauriri wevari muhupoteri muBotswana, VaBhekimpilo Weza, vaudza Studio7 kuti hurumende yeBotswana haisi kuda kuteerera nhunha dzeavo vakatiza mhirizhonga yakaitika munyika mushure mesarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakadzokororwa muna 2008. Vapoteri vari muBotswana vazhinji vakatiza kuZimbabwe muna 2008, vazhinji vavo vachiti vatsigiri veMDC vakatiza misha yavo mushure mekurayirwa hama dzavo mumhirizhonga yakaitika mugore iri. Mukuru anoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwevapoteri muhurumende yeBotswana, Amai Gloria Letlhage, vanoti Botswana iri kuita hurongwa uhu zviri pamutemo asi varamba kutsanangura kuti sei vachidaro. Asi Botswana inoti mupoteri anenge asina kuzvipira kudzokera ega kumusha kwake panopera gore rino, anozoita zvekumakidzwa kudzoserwa kuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yozadza Mapurisa Mumigwagwa neKuda Kumisa Kuratidzira
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika, VaIgnatius Chombo vanoti mapurisa achange akadirwa munyika yose neChitatu apo pakatarisirwa kuti veruzhinji vacharamwa mabasa zvakare sezviri kukurudzirwa nemamwe mapoka. Zvichakadaro, mapurisa neChipiri akasunga Mufundisi Evan Mawarire, avo vanove mumwe wevari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasaende kumabasa nemusi weChitatu. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare nemusi weChipiri, VaChombo vati mapurisa achange akagadzirira zvakakwana kuchengetedza runyararo munyika pahurongwa hwemazuva maviri hwekusaenda kumabasa huri kurongwa nemamwe masangano. VaChombo vati kunyange hazvo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine nhuna dzazvo nehurumende, pane nzira dziri pamutemo dzazvinofanira kutevedzera vachiti mapurisa achasunga vese vachakonzera mhirizhonga pakuramwa mabasa uku. VaChombo, avo vanga vakatsigirwa negurukota rinowona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaSydney Sekeramayi pamwe negurukota rinowona nezvevasori, VaKembo Mohadi, vati hurumende haisi kuzopinza mauto mumigwagwa vachiti mapurisa ari munyika akakwana kuti achengetedze runyararo. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti sei mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nehurumende yavo vasiri kutevedzera zviri kutaurwa neveruzhinji zvekuti vabve pachigaro, VaChombo vati VaMugabe havana kwavari kuenda sezvo vachiti vakapihwa masimba ekutungamira nyika neveruzhinji musarudzo dzemuna 2013. VaChombo vanoti kuramwa mabasa kuri kuda kuitwa kubva musi weChitatu kuri kurongwa nehurumende dzekunze idzo dziri kuda kuti hurumende yaVaMugabe ibve pachigaro kunyange hazvo hurumende dzekunze idzi dzichiti hadzineyi nehurongwa uhwu. Zvichakadai, gweta riri kumirira Mufundisi Mawarire, VaHarrison Nkomo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare manheru ano vari kukamba yemapurisa yeHarare Central Police Station kuti VaMawarire vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira kuti munyika musagadzikanane. Tichiri panyaya iyi, sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu re Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights raburista mashoko ekuti riri kushushikana zvikuru nekusungwa kuri kuitwa vanhu vari kuronga nyaya yekuramwa mabasa mangwana. Mumwe mushandi wehurumende uyo aramba kudomwa nezita anoti vatowirirana nevamwe vavo kuti havasi kuzoenda kumabasa kwemazuva maviri ari kutevera zvisinei nekurudziro yaVaChombo yekuti vanhu vasateerere kurudziro yekurambwa mabasa iyi. Svondo rapera vashandi vazhinji munyika vakateerera kurudziro yekusaenda kumabasa iyi, danho rinonzi nevamwe ndiro riri kutyiwa zvakare nehurumende kuti vanhu vachatora pamazuva maviri ari kukurudzirwa kuti vanhu vasaenda kumabasa aya. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinorasa Mhosva Yanga Ichipomerwa Chin'ono
text: Dare repamusoro nhasi rarasa mhosva yanga ichipomerwa mutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, yekuburitsa mashoko emanyepo richiti mutemo wakashandiswa kusunga Chin’ono wakabviswa kare mumabhuku emitemo yenyika. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Jester Charewa, varasa mutongo wakaitwa nedare repasi wekuti Chin’ono ane nyaya uye anofanira kutongwa. Gweta raChin’ono, VaHarrison Nkomo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti Justice Charewa varasa mutongo wedare ramajisitiriti panyaya iyi vachiti mutemo wakashandiswa pana Chin’ono hausisiri mutemo munyika ino. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naChin’ono kuti tinzwe kuti ari kunzwa sei nemutongo wapihwa nedare. Asi VaNkomo vati Chin’ono afara chose nemutongo uyu ati zvese zvakaitika zvingadai zvisina kuitika dai mapurisa nevachuchusi vakange vamuterera paaitaura kuti mutemo wavaishandisa wainge waraswa nedare repamusorosoro kare. VaNkomo vati vachagara pasi naChin’ono kuti otora matanho apo zvichitevera mutongo waJustice Charewa. Vatiwo vari kuda kuti Chin’ono atange apihwa mari yechibatiso yaakabvisa panyaya iyi sezvo yaraswa nedare. Chin’ono akasungwa musi wa 8 Ndira achipomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu chemutemo weCriminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act mushure mekunyora padandemutande rake reTwitter kuti pane mwana mudiki ainge afa mushure mekurohwa nemapurisa. Akagara jeri reChikurubi mushure mekunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nedare ramajisitiriti uye akozipihwa mukana webhabhadhara mari yechibatiso musi wa 27 Ndira. Chin’ono akabvisa zviuru makumi maviri zvemadhora emaRTGS semari yechibatiso zvihitevera kusungwa kwaakaitwa muna Ndira. Asi achinyora paTwitter yake, Chin’ono ati ari kuda kusungisa hurumende nekumusunga kwayakaita, pamwe nekumuchengetedza uye nehutsinye hwayakaratidza paive muhusungwa iye asina mhosva yaakapara. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Fadzayi Mahere pamwe nemuriri weZengesa West, VaJob Sikhala, vari kupomerwawo mhosva yakafanana neyanga ichipomerwa Chino’ono. Mune imwewo nyaya, mukuru wevechidiki muMDC Alliance, Obey Sithole, avo vakasungwa nemusi Muvhuro vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvinhu zvinonyangadza kana kuti Criminal Nuisance amiswa pamberi pedare nhasi. Gweta rake, VaObey Shava, vakumbira dare kuti musungwa atongwe achibva kumba asi mutongi wedare, VaRichard Mangosi, vati vaudza VaShava kuti vachapa mutongo wavo pachikumbiro ichi mangwana. Mune imwewo nyaya mumiriri weHarare West muNational Assembly, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, nemumwe wavo Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri, vasvitsawo chikumbiro chekuti vapihwe mukana wekutongwa vachibva kudzimba dzavo mushure mekubhadhariswa mari yechibatiso. Aka ndekechina vaviri ava vachikumbira kuti vabviswe kuChikurubi Maximum Prison kwavakachengetedzwa. Mutongi wedare, VaTawanda Chitapi, vaudza gweta revaviri ava, VaAlec Muchadehama, kuti vachapa mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chaMuzvare Mamombe naMuzvare Chimbiri nemusi weChishanu. No media source currently available

headline: VaTrump Votungamira Musarudzo dzeAmerica
text: Zviri kubuda musarudzo parizvino mukutanga kuverengwa kuri kuitwa mavhoti kune mamwe matunhu. Pane vari kukwikwidzana, Amai Hillary Clinton naVaDonald Trump anenge akunda anofanira kutanga kusvika mavhoti mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 270 electorao votes. Mavhoti aya anoverengwa pachitariswa huwandu hwevanhu vari munzvimbo. Semuenzaniso California ine macollege vote 55, ukuwo Washington DC ine vanhu vashoma iine macollege vote matatu. Pari zvino VaTrump vakunda ku Indiana, Kentucky, Oklahoma, Tennessee, South Carolina, Alabama, Kansas, Louisiana, Wyoming, Arkansas, Texas, North Dakota, Montana, Missouri, Ohio, South Dakota neWest Virginia (167 electoral votes) Amai Clinton vakunda kuVermont, New Mexico, New Jersey, Rhode Island, Illinois, Massachussetts, Maryland, Virginia, Connecicut, Washington DC, New York neDelaware (122 college votes)

headline: VaBiden Voshora Vari Kuti Havatambire Zvinenge Zvabuda Musarudzo muAmerica
text: Kwasara mazuva mashanu kuti America iite sarudzo dzepakati nepakati kana kuti mideterm dzedare reHouse of Representatites, Senate, magavhuna nemamwe mahofisi, mutungamiri wenyika VaJoe Biden vari kuyambira kuti vanhu vari kuti sarudzo dziri kubirirwa pasina humowo vave kukanganisa hutongo hwejekerere. VaBiden vakataura izvi nezuro pachiteshi chezvitima paUnion Station muWashington DC. Vakati pane vamwe vanhu vari kukukwidza musarudzo dzedare reHouse of Representatives, senate uye magavhuna vari kuti vakakundwa havatambire zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo. VaBiden vakashora vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump nekuramba kwavo kuti vakakukundwa musarudzo dza2020 zvavanoti zviri kupesvedzera vamwe kuti vashaye vimbo nesarudzo. Asi vebato remaRepublican vanoti VaBiden vari kungotaura zvisina humbowo vachiziva kuti bato ravo ratarisana nekukundwa musarudzo

headline: Malawi yapinda mu’Round of 16′
text: APO maWarriors ari kudzoka kumusha mushure mekuburitswa mumutambo weAFCON, zvimwe zvikwata zvainge zviri muboka rimwe chete nechikwata chenyika ichi reGroup B zvinoti Malawi, Guinea neSenegal zvose zvabudirira kuenda muRound of 16 yemakwikwi aya.   Malawi yabudirira kuenda muRound of 16 zvichitevera kukunda kwayakaita Zimbabwe apo yakahwina 2-1 nemusi weChishanu svondo radarika uye nekuita mangange 0-0 neSenegal mumutambo uyo yakapotsa nepadiki yahwina apo yakazonyimwa pena mushure mekupindira kweVideo Assistant Referee (VAR).   CAF yazivisa nezvekubudirira kweMalawi kuenda kuRound of 16 apo yanyora padandemutande rayo reTwitter ichiti, “Nhoroondo. Chikwata cheMalawi chabudirira kuenda ku#TotalEnergiesAFCON knockout stages kekutanga munhoroondo yacho. Izuva rakakosha zvikuru kunyika yose.”   MaWarriors – ayo akapedza ari pasi muboka rawo – ane zvibodzwa zvitatu uye ari kutarisirwa kusvika munyika achibva kuCameroon.

headline: ‘Tagadzirira’ . . . bhora ngaritambwe.
text: KUCHANGE kusingadanwe anonzwa svondo rino kunhandare dzinosanganisira National Sports Stadium muHarare, Mandava Stadium (Zvishavane) neBabourfields (Bulawayo) uko zvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League zvichatatsurana mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup.   Iyi ichave mitambo yekutanga yezvikwata izvi kubva pakamiswa mitambo yose munaKurume gore rapera nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nevarairidzi vezvikwata zvakasiyana avo vakarakidza mufaro mukuru nekudzoka kwenhabvu.   Murairidzi weFC Platimun, shasha dzePSL, Norman Mapeza anoti nguva yanga yareba vatambi vakangogara.    Mapeza   “Isu semakore ese tinotambira kuti tihwine uye iye zvino tiri kushanda nesimba kuti tigohwina. Asi tiri kutanga patsva nekuti takashandura zvakawanda kuchikwata chedu, vamwe vatambi vakaenda kukauya vamwe. Saka tichafamba nebhora nekuti tinoziva kuti zvimwe zvikwata zvinoda kusvika patiri,” anodaro Mapedza. FC Platinum kana kuti Pure Platinum Play iri muboka reGroup 4 rine zvikwata zvinoti Ngezi Platinum, Triangle neWhahwa. Murairidzi weDynamos FC – Tonderai “Stanza” Ndiraya – anoti nhabvu yadzoka panguva yakanaka chose. Anoti DeMbare yagara inozivikanwa sechikwata chikuru saka mwaka uno vanoda kurakidza nyika yose kuburikidza nekuhwina mikombe yakawanda.   “Zita rekungoti Dynamos chete ihombe uye zvakawanda zvinotarisirwa kubva kwatiri. Saka isu sechikwata tinovimbisa kuti tichashanda nesimba kuti mwaka uno vatsigiri vedu vagofara tahwina mikombe yakasiyana.   “Asi sezvo tange tave nenguva ndefu takangogara, tinokumbira kuvatsigiri vedu kuti ngavatipe nguva kana tikakundikana tinenge takundikana sezvo vakomana vachiri nengura. Asi ndinofara hangu nekuti tiri kutangirana zvikwata zvose sezvo tose tange takagara nguva ndefu,” anodaro Ndiraya.   DeMbare yakaiswa muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti CAPS United, Henrentals, Harare City neZPC Kariba. Iri ndiro rega boka rine zvikwata zvitanhatu sezvo mamwe ese ane zvikwata zvina.   Kuchiti kuBulawayo, murairidzi weChicken Inn — Joey “Mafero” Antipas — anoti chikwata chake hachisati chambohwina Chibuku Super Cup saka vacharwa semvumba gore rino kuti vatore mukombe uyu. Mafero akatungamira maGamecocks mugore ra2015 kuhwina mukombe wePSL.   “Kudzoka kwenhabvu kunofadza uye tiri kutanga nemukombe weChibuku uyo tisati tambohwina sechikwata saka mwaka uno ticharwa semvumba kuti tiuhwine,” anodaro MaGamecocks ari muboka reGroup 2 rine zvikwata zvinoti Bulawayo City, Bulawayo Chiefs neHighlanders.   KuManicaland, murairidzi wechikwata chichangopinda muPSL cheCranborne Bullets — Nesbert “Yabo” Saruchera — anoti ino ndiyo nguva chikwata chavo yange yakamirira.   “Nguva yatange takamirira yazosvika manje, tange takamirira kwenguva ndefu saka tiri kufara uye takagadzirira kusangana nezvimwe zvikwata tigovarakidza kuti isu tauya tichipisa.   “Mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup, vamwe vari muboka redu ngavazive kuti isu tatobudirira kufambira mberi mumutambo uyu. Hatina kupinda kuzozadzikisa mazita kwete asi tinoda kutaridza nyika kuti nhabvu iyi tinotoiziva,” anodaro Saruchera.   MATCH DAY 1 GROUP 1 Caps United FC v Yadah FC Harare City FC v ZPC Kariba FC Herentals FC v Dynamos FC GROUP 2 Bulawayo City FC v Chicken Inn FC; Bulawayo Chiefs FC v Highlanders FC GROUP 3 Tenax FC v Black Rhinos FC Manica Diamonds FC v Cranborne Bullets FC GROUP 4 Ngezi Platinum Stars FC v Triangle United FC

headline: ‘NETBALL IRI MUMHURI’
text: MUTAMBI wenetball wechikwata chenyika chemaGems, Ursula Ndlovu (25), anoti amai vake ndivo vakamumanikidza kuti atambe mutambo uyu sezvo iye aive nerudo rwemujaho wekumhanya.   Vazhinji vanoziva Ursula – uyo anotambira chikwata cheHarare City Queens zvakare, ari mumwe weshasha dzemaGems dzakanetsa kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup akaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland nguva yadarika.   Mutambi uyu ange ave nemakore achinetsa mumutambo uyu izvo zvakambomuona achihwina mibairo inosanganisira Moment of the Match mune mumwe mutambo waakanotamba kuSouth Africa.   Ursula anoti achikura akadzidza kuzvikoro zvinosanganisira Nkulumane Primary neMsiteli High School, kuBulawayo uye aikwikwidza mumujaho wekumhanya.   Anoti mugore ra2013 ndipo paakatanga kutamba netball akurudzirwa namai vake – Norah Ndlovu – avo vakambotambawo mutambo uyu.   “Ini mwoyo wangu waive pamujaho wekumhanya, ndizvo ndaida nekuti ndaive ndiri pfuti pakutiza. Asi, amai vangu ndivo vakati ndisiye zvekumhanya nditange kutamba netball.   “Saka mugore ra2013 ndipo ndakatanga kutamba ndikapinda muchikwata chemupurovhinzi tikanokwikwidza kumakwishu emaYouths Games, kubva ipapo handina kuzobvira ndatarira shure.   “Netball ndiyo yave hupenyu hwangu uye yandiendesa kune dzimwe nyika dzandaisafungira kuti ndichazoenda muhupenyu hwangu,” anodaro Ursula.   Anoti amai vake vakatombonetsa vachitambawo netball muchikwata chenyika kare chisati chave kuzivikanwa semaGems uye vairaidzwa naLedwin Dondo uyo anove ave kurairidzawo Ursula zvakare.   Ursula anoti anopa kutenda kuna amai vake vakaita kuti atambe netball sezvo yave kumupa pundutso muhupenyu hwake.   “Amai vangu iGaffa chairo, vaive shasha panetball uye ndivo vakaita kuti ndive nerudo nemutambo uyu. Asi chinondifadza hangu parizvino ndechekuti amai vangu vakarairidzwa naLedwin Dondo vari kuchikwata chenyika uye nhasi Dondo ndiye ave murairidzi wangu.   “Kashoma kuzviona zvichiitika izvozvo kumitambo yakasiyana,” anodaro.   Anoenderera achiti, “Nhasi netball yandipa hupenyu hwandaisambofungira. Iye zvino ndave kukwanisa kuchengeta mhuri yekwandinobva kusanganisira ambuya vangu vakandichengeta Gogo Matshabalala, handidi navo. Amai pavaienda kunotamba netball, gogo ndivo vaisara neni vachindichengeta saka nhasi yave nguva yanguwo yekuvachengeta.   “Izvezvi pandinoenda kunze kwenyika kunotamba netball mwanasikana wanguwo ndinomuendesa kwagogo vangu kumusha vanosara naye vachimuchengeta sekundichengeta kwavaiita ini,” anodaro Ursula.   Mutambi uyu akwanisa kutambira zvikwata zvakasiyana zvinosanganisira Beta Queens, Connemara neHarare Queens uye akatanga kutambira maGems mugore ra2017.   Ursula anoti shuviro yake anoda kuzonotambira zvikwata zvekunze kwenyika dzakaita seAustralia, England neNew Zealand uko kunotambwa netball yepamusoro.

headline: Eboue odzoka munhabvu
text: weArsenal, Emaanuel Eboue (35), anogona kudzoka munhabvu achitambira LA Galaxy, makore maviri apedzisira kutamba nhabvu.   Chizvarwa chekuIvory Coast ichi anoshuvira zvikuru kudzoka munhabvu zvichitevera kutemerwa zvirango kwaakaitwa neFIFA kuti asatambire Sunderland mugore ra2019 apo akanzi asatambe kwegore atadza kubhadhara mumiriri wake.   Nyaya dzehutano hwake dzakamutadzisa kuti atengwe nechikwata chekuCyprus, Ocagi Limasol gore radarika.   Mutambi uyu akasiiwa asina kana kobiri zvichitevera kurambana kwaakaita nemudzimai wake izvo zvakamudya chaizvo mupfungwa zvekusvika pakuda kuzviuraya.   Asi chikwata chekuMLS – LA Galaxy – chiri kuedza kuda kumudzora munhabvu, sekutaura kwenhau dziri kubva kuThe Sun.   Chikwata ichi chinoziva kuti ruzivo rwaanarwo rwenhabvu rwakakosha zvikuru.   Eboue ange asiri munhabvu kwemakore maviri, asi nguva yadarika akambotambira chikwata chemaArsenal Legends munaChikumi.   Achitaura neCanal gore rino, akati, “Chandinongoda chete kudzoka munhabvu nekuti ndichiri kukwanisa kutamba.   “Ndinogona kuenda kunzvimbo dzakaita seBaghdad kana Pakistan kuti ndingotamba chete. Handina basa nazvo kuti ndekupi.   “Ndinogara nemabhegi angu akarongedzwa nekuti pane mukana wekuti ndinogona kudzingwa mumba mangu.   “Handina munhu parutivi rwangu ari kundimirira mazuva ano. Ndingori ndega. Ndaimbofara chaizvo nevana vangu nemhuri yangu asi iye zvino ndave ndega.” – SportsMail Football

headline: ZVIBHAKERA ZVANDIRERA: MONALISA
text: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai, Monalisa “Queen of the Jungle” Sibanda, anoti hakuna chisingapere, naizvozvo vanhu ngavasanyanye kutya sezvo chirwere cheCovid-19 chichapera neimwe nguva.   Sibanda anotiwo mutambo wetsiva wakanaka uye kana ari iye, zvinhu zvabhadhara nekuti ari kurarama kubva mukukanda zvimbokoma zvematsenganzungu.   Vanhu vari mune zvemitambo vakawanda vakakanganiswa nedenda reCovid-19 sezvo mitambo mizhinji yakambomiswa nekuda kwechirwere ichi pasi rose izvo zvakonzera matambudziko makuru uye kushushikana kune vari mune zvemitambo.   Asi muhurukuro naQueen of the Jungle, anoti zvinhu zvose zvinoitika pasi pano zvine chirevo uye Mwari vachagadzirisa zvose zvigonaka.   “Zvinhu zvose zvinoitika pasi pano zvine chirevo, hazvingoitike. Matambudziko aya achapera uye Mwari vachatitungamirira kusvika zvanaka.   “Zvinonzi chisingapere chinoshura, saka iyo coronavirus (Covid-19) yatishungurudza iyi ichasvikawo pakupera,” anodaro.   Sibanda anozivikanwa ari iye mumwe wemadzimai kubva muZimbabwe vakaita mukurumbira achitamba tsiva izvo zvakamuona achitamba mitambo 25 muboka reamatuer akaihwina yose. Akazokwirira ndokutanga kukwikwidza muboka reprofessional achirwa muJunior weight akatamba mitambo 17 umo akahwina misere uye nemabhande anosanganisira reWorld International Boxing Association (WIBA), World Intercontinental Champion iro akahwina gore radarika kuNairobi, Kenya.   Shasha iyi haina kuenda kure nechikoro asi inoti ine mufaro mukuru muupenyu hwayo nekuti mutambo wetsiva wakaichengeta zvikuru uye nanhasi uchiri kungoira- ramisa.   “Tsiva ndiwo upenyu hwangu, kubva kare uye kusvika nanhasi mutambo uyu wandichengeta zvikuru. Ndinongotenda Mwari vakandipa chipo ichi nekuti handitombokwanise kuverenga ndikazvipedza zvose zvandakawana kuburikidza netsiva,” anodaro Sibanda.   Queen of the Jungle akakomborerwa nevanakomana vatatu uye vose vari kutevera mumatsimba ake ekutamba tsiva uye mukuru wacho ane makore 16 ekuberekwa ave kutokwikwidza muboka reamatuer.

headline: MaPlatinum obandana
text: KUCHANGE kusingadanwe anonzwa nemusi weSvondo kunhandare yeMandava Stadium, kuZvishavane uko FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum Stars zvichabandana mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup final.   Rwendo rwekusvika pafainari iyi rwange ruri rurefu sezvo pakatanga mutambo uyu munaChivabvu, wakambomiswa mitambo iri pakati pekutambwa munaChikumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mutambo uyu mukuru sezvo uchiuya netikiti rekuzokwikwidza mumitambo yemuAfrica yaCAF Confederations Cup.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvose zvakambohwina mukombe weChibuku Super Cup final kare saka zvichange zvichirwira kuti zvigousimudza kechipiri.   FC Platinum yakahwina mukombe uyu muna2014 apo yakakunda Harare City mufainari 3-1 kumapena mushure mekunge mutambo uyu wapera uri mangange 1-1.   Kuchiti mugore ra2016, Ngezi yakazvambaradza FC Platinum 3-1 ndokuhwina mukombe uyu mumutambo wakatambirwa kuBaobab Stadium.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvaive muboka rimwe chete reGroup 4 umo maive nezvimwe zvinoti Triangle United neWhawha FC. Mubati wepagedhi weFC Platinum arizve kaputeni, Petros Mhari, anoti zvinofadza zvikuru kutamba mumutambo mukuru wefainari.   Mhari, uyo aive muchikwata cheFC Platinum chakahwina mukombe uyu mugore ra2014 necha2016 icho chakazvamburwa neNgezi, anoti mitambo yefainari haisi nyore sezvo zvikwata zvese zvinenge zvichida kuhwina.   “Mitambo yefainari yose yakaoma zvikuru nekuti zvikwata zvinopindamo zvinenge zvabva kure uye zvese zvinoda kuhwina. “Asi isu sechikwata kusvika patave kurakidza kuti takabva kure naizvozvo zvinofadza zvikuru uye tichashanda nesimba kuti tigohwina mutambo uyu uyo tinoziva kuti unenge wakaoma.   “Hatifanire kutarisira pasi Ngezi nekuti chikwata chikuru chatinoziva chinogona uye takambosangana nacho kare mufainari chikambotikunda. Saka mutambo uyu uchange wakaomarara zvikuru. Chikuru isu sechikwata chatiri kutarisira kuhwina mutambo wemusi weSvondo, zvimwe zvese tinozotarisa zvichazotevera,” anodaro Mhari.   Kuchitiwo nekune rimwe divi, murairidzi weMadamburo – sezita remadunhurirwa reNgezi Platinum Stars – Rodwell Dhlakama, ari kunyunyuta zvikuru nekufamba kwakanyanya kwakaita chikwata chake apo chakatarisana nemutambo.   Chikwata ichi chakaenda kuBulawayo chichida kunosangana neHighlanders mumutambo usina kuzoenderera mberi nekuda kwevaridzi vepembe vakamboramwa basa, ndokuzouya kuHarare kuzotamba semi-final yemutambo uyu neHighlanders uyo chakahwina.   Vachipedza, vakabva vadzokera kuBulawayo zvakare kumutambo wePremier Soccer League neHighlanders uyo wakapera uri mangange 0-0. Dhlakama anoti mutambo wavo wekupedzisira wakaona vatambi vazhinji vakaita saWellington Taderera, Keith Murera, Ariel Makopa naNelson Chadya vachikuvara izvo zviri kudzosera gadziriro dzavo kumashure.   “Rwendo rwedu kusvika pamutambo uyu rwange ruri rurefu kunyangwe zvazvo tiri kugadzirira hedu. Asi, gadziriro dzedu dzakadzorerwa kumashure nekuda kwekukuvara kwakaita vatambi vedu vazhinji. Tiri kuvatarisa kusvika musi weSvondo kuti vanenge vave papi sezvo vakatikoshera.   “Asi hatitye hedu kupinda mumutambo uyu nekuti nhandare yacho tave kuiziva sezvo tatambira mitambo yedu mizhinji ikoko saka tichanorwa semvumba.   “Mutambo uyu uchange wakakosha nekuti unenge uine vatsigiri sezvo pataitamba mitambo yemuboka redu vatsigiri vange vasingatenderwi kupinda munhandare nekuda kwemitemo ine chekuita nekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19,” anodaro Dhlakama.   Chikwata chichahwina mukombe uyu gore rino chinopihwa mari inosvika US$75 000 uye chinenge chakundwa chichiwana US$50 000.

headline: Muchatiguta muPSL: Balakasi
text: MUTAMBI weSimba Bhora – Tinashe Balakasi – oyambira zvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League kuti zvichavaguta mwaka unotevera zvichitevera kupinda kwavakaita muPSL.   Balakasi, mwaka uchangopera weRuyamuro Northern Region Division One, akanwisa ka29 ndokunyora nhoroondo yekunwisa kanodarika ka20 mumwaka mumwe chete.   MuCastle Premiership, pave nemwaka yakawanda pachishaya mutambi anokwanisa kunwisa kanodarika ka20 mwaka mumwe chete izvo zvakapedzisira kuitwa naNorman Maroto mugore ra2010 apo aitambira Gunners FC.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Balakasi anotsidza kuti mwaka wa2023, uyo uchange uri wekutanga weSimba Bhora muPSL, zvikwata zvizhinji zvichamuguta sezvo achange achipisa sezvaaiita muNorthern Region.   “Gore rinotevera, ndichange ndichitokwikwidza nevamwe vatambi ndichivarakidza kuti ndinotonwisa sezvavanotoita uye ndinogona kutovadarika.   “Ndinoda kuvarakidza kuti ndiri mutambi wepamusoro saivo,” anodaro.   Mutambi uyu asati aenda kuSimba Bhora, akambotambira muPSL kuzvikwata zvinoti Harare City neCAPS United.   Panguva iyi, akangokwanisa kunwisa kana chete paaitambira zvikwata izvi.   Anoti haana kutamba zvinonwisa mvura apo akambotambira muPSL nekuti aisanyatsowana mikana yekutamba kuzvikwata izvi.   “Pandakambotambira muPSL ndaisanyatsowana mikana yakakwana saka handina kunyatsotamba zvinonwisa mvura. Asi, iye zvino ndadzoka nechikwata chinovimba neni nekudaro ndicharakidza zvikwata zvese chipo changu uye ndinoda kunyora imwe nhoroondo,” anodaro.   Balakasi anoti mumakore maviri anotevera, anoshuvira kunge ave kutambira nhabvu yake kunze kwenyika. Anoti mwaka unotevera achashanda nesimba kuitira kuti azoshevedzwa kuzotambira chikwata chenyika asi hunge kana zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neFIFA zvabviswa.   “Mutambi wese wenhabvu shuviro yake kutambira kunze kwenyika uye kutambira nyika yake. Saka iniwo ndinotarisira kuti mumakore maviri anotevera, ndinge ndave kutambirawo kunze kwenyika. Ndinoda kutanga kutambira kuSouth Africa uye ndinovimba ndikashanda nesimba zvinoitawo kuti ndigoshevedzwa kuzotambira nyika yangu.   “Izvezvi nekuda kwezvirango zviripo ndinoziva kuti nyika yedu haisi kutamba nhabvu nezvikwata zvekunze. Asi kushanda nesimba kwakanaka nekuti kunoita kuti ndigare ndichitariswa nevarairidzi venyika kuitira panozobviswa zvirango ndinogona kuwanawo mukana,” anodaro Balakasi.   Zvakadaro, Simba Bhora iri mushishi kuita gadziriro yekusangana neGolden Eagles mufainari yeAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament ichatambwa musi wa22 Gumiguru kuRufaro Stadium.   Vaimbi vanoti Sulumani Chimbetu naBaba Harare vanotarisirwa kuzoridza pamutambo uyu vachivaraidza vatsigiri venhabvu.

headline: Mbappe oshuvira Kante
text: Saint-Germain, Kylian Mbappe, anoti akaedza kukurudzira N’Golo Kante weChelsea kuti auye kuzotambira chikwata chekuLigue 1 apo vaviri ava vaive kumutambo weWorld Cup.   Mbappe, uyo ane makore 19 okuberekwa, akaudza muridzi wePSG Nasser Al-Khelaifi kuti atenge mutambi uyu kubva kuchikwata ichi chekuPremier League.   Kante, uyo akahwina mukombe wePremier League kaviri, ange achinzi ari kudiwa kuParc des Princes mwaka uno uye Mbappe ari kutsigira kutengwa kwemutambi uyu.   “Ndakaudza (Al-Khelaifi) zvakare kuti Kante anenge akatinakira mukamutenga auye kuchikwata chedu,” akaudza France Football.   “Ndakataura naN’Golo pataive kuWorld Cup asi ndisingamumanikidze nekuti ndinoziva zvinoitika kana zvikapinda mumusoro wako zvekuda kutengwa nezvimwe zvikwata.   “Pakupedzisira ndakangoisa mashoko mashoma muhomwe dzake zvandakanyora pakapepa, izvo zvandinoziva akazozviona adzokera kumba kwake.”   Mbappe naKante havasati vadzokera kuzvikwata zvavo zvichitevera kuhwina kwavakaita kumutambo weWorld Cup neFrance nguva pfupi ichangodarika. Vaviri ava vakabatsira Les Blues kuhwina mukombe weWorld Cup kechipiri munhorondo yechikwata ichi mushure memakore 20 zvichitevera kukunda kwavakaita Croatia 4-2 mufainari yemutambo uyu. —SportsMail Football

headline: PANE NYAYA: MAFERO . . .uku ndiri kumaWarriors, Chicken Inn
text: MURAIRIDZI weChicken Inn nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors Joey “Mafero” Antipas anoti mabasa maviri aya ari kumupedza simba, asi acharamba achishingirira kuti agobudirira maari ose.   Mafero anoti anoda kutora mukombe weCastle Premiership kechipiri munhorowondo yeGamecocks – sezita remadunhurirwa reChicken Inn.   Muchinda uyu akambofanogadzwa kuve murairidzi wemaWarriors nesangano reZifa apo kondirakiti yake ichapera musi wa31 Zvita.   “Zvinhu zvakaoma kuita mabasa maviri, kurairidza Chicken Inn muligi kozoti maWarriors chikwata chenyika. Zvakaoma asi unofanirwa kushanduka nekuchimbidza paunenge wave kuenda kune rimwe basa.   “Zviri kundipedza simba rakawanda asi ndinoramba ndichishanda nesimba nekuti ndiri kuda chaizvo kubudirira mumabasa maviri ese aya,” anodaro Mafero.   Parizvino Chicken Inn iri pechipiri palog ichitevera CAPS United.   Nerimwewo divi, Mafero mumasvondo anotevera achange achitungamira maWarriors apo achatanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu e2021 Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ayo achazoitirwa kuCameroon.   Sezvo kondirakiti yake ichapera musi wa31 Zvita, Mafero anoti haasati aziva kuti acharamba ari panyanga here.   “Parizvino ndichiri kumboshanda, tichagara pasi tozokurukura toona kuti zvichafambiswa sei,” anodaro Mafero

headline: NHABVU YORWISA COVID-19
text: ZVIKWATA zvenhabvu izvo zvinokwikwidza muCastle Lager Premiership zvakatora matanho ekubatana nemamwe masangano mukurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 kuburikidza nezvirongwa zvinosanganisira kupa chenjedzo yedenda iri.   Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nezvimwe zvezvikwata izvi kusanganisira Dynamos, Highlanders neFC Platinum izvo zvinotaura pamusoro pezvirongwa zvazviri kuita munharaunda yazvinobva.   Mukushi wemashoko kuDynamos FC, Tinashe Farawo anoti sechikwata, vari kushanda nevanhu vakasiyana mukupa chenjedzo kuvanhu pamusoro peCovid-19 achiti vatambi veDeMbare vari kuvashandisa kugadzira mavhidhiyo ayo vanotumira vanhu vachivayambira kuti vagare vakachengetedzeka.   “Isu sechikwata, tiri kupa chenjedzo kuvatsigiri vedu kuti ngavagare vakachengetedzeka panguva ino, nekuti chirwere ichi chiri kupararira. Mukudaro, tine mavhidhiyo evatambi vedu vachitaura nezvechirwere ichi ayo tiri kugadzira tichitumira kuvanhu tichivapa yambiro.   “Tiri kushanda zvekare nemasangano akasiyana uye vamwe vanhu vakuru kuti tirwise denda iri uye tibatsire vatsigiri vedu panguva ino,” akadaro Farawo.   Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weHighlanders, Modern Ngwenya anoti Bosso yakabatsira chimwe chipatara chekuBulawayo nemari sedanho rekurwisa coronavirus uye vatambi vavo vari kubika mavhidhiyo ayo ane mashoko ari pamusoro pedenda rabata nekuuraya vanhu vakawandisa pasi rose iri.   “Isu takabatsira chimwe chipatara nemari yekushandisa kutenga zvinodiwa mukurwisa coronavirus. Vatambi veduzve vari kubika mavhidhiyo ayo ane shoko rechenjedzo ayo tiri kutumira kune veruzhinji,” anodaro Ngwenya.   Muhurukuro nemutauriri weFC Platinum, Chido Chizondo anoti sechikwata, vari kuita basa guru munharaunda yeZvishavane nedunhu rose reMidlands kusanganisira kupa chenjedzo uye kupa masanitizers kuti veruzhinji vashandise kubvisa kana kuuraya hutachiona.   “Tine rudo nenharaunda yatinobva saka tiri kuita mabasa akasiyana ekubatsira anosanganisira kupa masanitizers uye kupakura chenjedzo pamusoro pechirwere ichi. “Chokwadi chirwere ichi chiriko uye chiri kuuraya vanhu saka isu sechikwata chevanhu chine vanhu pamoyo, tiri kuita zvose zvatinokwanisa kuti tibatsire vatsigiri vedu panguva ino,” akadaro Chizondo.

headline: Voshandisa mitambo kurwisa mhirizhonga
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Powerlifting Federation (ZPF) rodzidzisa veruzhinji kuipa kwemhirizhonga yemudzimba pamwe nekupa chenjedzo pamusoro pedenda reHIV/AIDS kuburikidza nekuita mitambo yakasiyana.   Svondo radarika, ZPF yakaita mutambo wekusimbisa muviri kuHighfields, muHarare apo vaisendeka mamitsi 15 parutivi pachikamu chega-chega voita hukurukuro neveruzhinji pamusoro pemhirizhonga yemudzimba, kuipa kwekutora zvinodhaka nekupa chenjedzo yedenda reHIV/AIDS.   Sachigaro we ZPF mupurovhinzi yeHarare – Moses ‘Black Moses’ Nyamhotsi – anoti zvakakosha kuti pose panoitwa mitambo yakasiyana pombotorwa nguva yekukurukura neveruzhinji vachipihwa chenjedzo pamusoro penyaya dzemhizhonga, zvinodhaka zvinokanganisa muviri nezvirwere zvakasiyana.   Black Moses anoti nyaya dzemhirizhonga yemudzimba dziri kuwanda mazuva ano nekudaro vakatora danho rekuronga mitambo iyi.   “Mitambo ine simba uye inounganidza vanhu vanobva kunzvimbo dzakasiyana. Saka isu takaona kuti panoungana vanhu tichiita zvemitambo, ngatibve tatora mukana wekukurukura navo nyaya todzidzisana kuti mhirizhonga yakashata zvachose. Tiri kubva tabata dzimwe nyaya dziri kunetsa dzakaita sedzekutorwa kwezvinodhaka uye topa chenjedzo pamusoro pedenda reHIV.   “HIV iriko hama, vanhu ngavangwarire uye vagare vachizvichengetedza nguva dzose,” anodaro.   Black Moses anoenderera achiti: “Danho iri takaritora nechinangwa chekuti vanhu pavanoita mitambo yekusimbisa miviri dzimwe nguva vanenge vakaneta, saka pfungwa dzekutora zvinodhaka hadzimbovabate. Chikuru chavanenge vave kufunga nezvacho kusimbisa muviri chete.”   Zvakadaro, svondo radarika ZPF yakaita mitambo yeNational Powerlifting nePara-Powerlifting Championships.

headline: Japan chidzidzo — Makusha
text: SHANGWITI yemujaho wekumhanya — Ngoni Makusha —inoti yakadzidza zvakawanda kumakwikwi emaOlympics ayo pari zvino ari kuitirwa kuJapan uye yave kushanda nesimba kuti igokwanisa kudzokera zvekare kumitambo iyi mumakore mana anotevera.   Makusha mumwe wevatambi vashanu vange vachimirira nyika kumitambo iyi.   Nemusi weMugovera akakwikwidza mumijaho miviri apo wekutanga wakaita kuti azopinda mumujaho mukuru umo akazopedza ari pechinomwe ndokubva aburitswa mumutambo uyu.   Achitaura ari kuJapan achigadzirira kudzoka kumusha, Makusha anoti zvinhu zvinofadza zvikuru kumirira nyika kumutambo mukuru wakaita semaOlympics uye ave kutotanga kugadzirira kuzoenda kunokwikwidza zvakare kune mimwe inotevera.   “Ndiri kunzwa kufara kuti ndakazadzikisa chishuwo changu chekukwikwidza kumaOlympics. Ndakadzidza zvakawanda zvandichagara nazvo uye iye zvino ndave kutotanga gadziriro dzangu dzekuti ndizodzokera kune mamwe maOlympics anotevera. Gore rinotevera, ndinoda kunokwikwidza kumaWorld Championships,” anodaro Makusha.   Kunyangwe hake ari kudzoka kumusha asina menduru yaakabata, Makusha anoti haasi kutarisira izvozvo nekuti chikuru kwaari kwaive kuenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu achidzingirirana nedzimwe shasha dzepasi rese.   Anoti rutsigiro rwaange achiwana rwuri kumusimudzira zvekuti acharamba achishanda nesimba. “Rutsigiro rwandange ndichipihwa kubva kuvanhu vakawanda rwunosimudzira naizvozvo ini ndicharamba ndichishanda nesimba kuitira kuti mune remangwana ndigounza menduru. “Chikuru chandaitarisira pandakaenda kumutambo uyu kusvika ndokwikwidzawo zita rangu rozivikanwa izvo ndakakwanisa kuita.   Kukwikwidza kumutambo uyu kwakanakisa chose nekuti unoramba uchidzokera, iye zvino ndave kushanda nesimba kuitira kuti ndigoramba ndichidzokera kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu.”

headline: Zimbabwe Yoiswa Mugungano Rakaoma kuNetball World Cup
text: Chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaGems chaiswa mugungano rakaoma kumakundano e 2019 Netball World Cup. MaGems eZimbabwe aiswa mugungano rimwechete nechikwata chine mukombe uyu Australia, Northern Ireland pamwe ne Sri Lanka mumakwikwi achaitwa kubva musi wa 12 kusvika 21 Chikunguru muLiverpool kuEngland gore rinouya. Asi Zimbabwe haifanire kunyanya kutemwa nemusoro nekuti zvikwata zvitatu kubva mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakwikwi aya ayo ari kuunganidza zvikwata gumi nezvitanhatu. Zimbabwe iri kutanga kurwira mukombe uyu musi wa 13 Chikunguru apo irikusangana neSri Lanka, zuva rimwechete Australia ichangobva kubandana neNorthern Ireland. Sri Lanka ndiyo iri pasi pasi mugungano iri muhurongwa hwenetball pasi rese zvekuti mukuru weZimbabwe Netball Association Muzvare Leticia Chipandu vanofunga kuti vakarova Sri Lanka chete, zvavo zvinenge zvaita. Mumwe mutsigiri wemutambo uyu Muzvare Charity Muzanenhano vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kukunda mumutambo wavo neSri Lanka kuti nzira yavo ichene. Asi mumwe muteveri wemutambo uyu VaTichafa Kathumba vanoti Australia chete ndiyo inotyisa mugungano iri. Aka ndiko kekutanga Zimbabwe ichikwanisa kubudirira kuenda kumakundano aya kubvira muna 1963 apo makwikwi aya akavambwa. Zimbabwe yakasvika padanho iri mushure mekupedza iri pachinhanho chechipiri pasi peUganda kuma Africa Netball Championships. Zvimwe zvikwata zviri kumiririra Africa kumakwikwi aya iSouth Africa, Malawi ne Uganda. No media source currently available

headline: Zim Cricket yotarisira kuna Houghton
text: ZIMBABWE Cricket inoti iri kutarisira zvikuru kubva kumurairidzi mutsva wemaChevrons – Dave Houghton – uyo akagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi svondo radarika.   Houghton akatsiva Lalchand Rajput zvichitevera kupihwa kwaakaitwa chigaro chitsva chatechnical director.   Givemore Makoni anove managing director weZC anoti Houghton inyanzvi yecricket muZimbabwe nekudaro chikwata chemaChevrons chichange chiri mumaoko akanaka.   Aka kachange kari kechipiri Houghton achiraidza maChevrons uye akambochitambira chikwata ichi ari kaputeni asati atanga kurairidza mutambo uyu.   “Dave Houghton igamba recricket munyika yedu uye anoziva zvinodiwa kuti mutambo uyu usimukire zvikuru. Saka takamupa basa iri nechinangwa chekuti asimudzire mutambo uyu sezvo tange tadzikira.   “Munhu akatambira maChevrons ari mutungamiri wevatambi ndokuzorairidza chikwata ichi zvekare makore ayo chaitamba mhando yecricket yepamusoro-soro. Saka tinotarisira zvikuru kwaari uye tinovimba kuti achasimudzira zvekare matambiro echikwata chedu,” anodaro Makoni.    Givemore Makoni   Zvichitevera kugadzwa kwake, Houghton ari kutarisirwa kutungamira maChevrons mumutambo we2022 ICC Men’s T20 World Cup Global Qualifier B wekurwira kuenda kuICC 2022 T20 World Cup uyo uchatambirwa kuAustralia munaGumiguru gore rino.   Mutambo wekurwira kuenda kumakwishu aya uchatambirwa muno mwedzi unotevera uye uchange uine zvikwata zvisere. MaChevrons ari muboka rekutanga rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Jersey, Indonesia neUnited States of America kuchiti rimwe boka rine zvikwata zvinoti Hong Kong, Netherlands, Papua New Guinea neUganda.   Muboka rega-rega muchabuda zvikwata zviviri izvo zvichaenda kumasemi-final.   Zvikwata zvinohwina musemi-final ndizvo zvichabudirira kuenda kuAustralia.

headline: Young Igwe osimudzira maboozer
text: ZVIKWATA zvitanhatu zvenhabvu yemaboozer zvichasangana svondo rino nemusi weMugovera paPrince Edward School, muHarare apo zvichatatsurana pamutambo wePeter Moyo at 29 Tournament.   Mutambo uyu uri kurongwa nemuimbi wemusambo weSungura – Peter ‘Dhewa’ Moyo – uyo anove nerudo nenhabvu zvikuru sezvo akambotambira zvikwata zvakadai seLancashire Steel Juniors nevatambi vanosanganisira Dennis Dauda.   Mutambo uyu uchange uri wekupemberera kusvitsa makore 29 okuberekwa kwaYoung Igwe sezita remadunhurirwa raMoyo pamwe nekusimudzira nhabvu yemaboozer.   “Nhabvu yechiboozer vazhinji vanoiona seyezvidhakwa chete, asi yakakosha zvikuru sezvo ichitibatsira kuvaka nekuchengetedza miviri yedu.   “Kana vanhu vakura, kazhinji nguva yekuvaka muviri tinenge tisina saka ndiri kuda kusimudzira mitambo yemaboozer iyi iite mukurumbira itambwe nezvikwata zvakawanda.   “Hongu, ndinoziva kuti zvikwata zvakawanda zviriko zvinotamba nhabvu yemaboozer zvichikwikwidza asi ini ndiri kuda kuisimudzira iite mukurumbira,” anodaro.   Moyo achatambawo mumutambo uyu sezvo chikwata chake chaanotambira cheLimpopo FC chichange chiri chimwe chezvichakwikwidza.   “Ini ndiri kutambawo musi wacho sezvo chikwata changu Limpopo FC chiri kuzokwikwidzawo. Ndichange ndichirakidzawo tarenda rangu,” anodaro Moyo.   Zvikwata zvichahwina pamutambo uyu zvichawaniswa mibairo yakasiyana-siyana inosanganisira mikombe nemenduru.

headline: Hatikwate: Chegutu Pirates
text: CHIKWATA chenhabvu cheChegutu Pirates chinoti hachina chimwe chachinovhunduka apo chatarisana nekusangana neSimba Bhora FC mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament svondo rino.   Mitambo iyi ichaona zvikwata zvange zviri muTop 8 zvichibandana apo ligi reNorthen Region Soccer League (NRSL) rakamboenda pazororo. Mumitambo iyi, kunze kweChegutu Pirates ichisangana neSimba Bhora FC, Herentals U20 FC ichatamba neBlack Mambas FC, Golden Eagles ichitatsurana neNgezi U19 FC uye Commando Bullets ichibandana neTrojan Stars FC.   Munyori mukuru weChegutu Pirates, Jeffrey Wachiseka, anoti vagadzirira mutambo uyu uye hapana chikwata chavanotya.   “Zvikwata zvose zvikuru, kusanganisira iyo Simba Bhora, tiri kusangana nayo svondo rino mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament, takatombosangana nayo tikasvitsana kumiganhu.   “Haina kutikunda uye hatisati tambokundwa nezvikwata zvikuru, taitozvikunda. Saka tiri kuzvitemba kuti tine mukana mukuru wekufambira mberi mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Wachiseka.   Murairidzi weNgezi Under-19 FC, Klifton Kadurira, anoti chikwata chavo chiri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura uye vanoda kubika vatambi vechidiki avo vanozotumira kuchikwata chevakuru.    Klifton Kadurira   “Isu tinofara kuve pakati pezvikwata zvisere zvakabudirira kuti zvigokwikwidza mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament. Zvinorakidza kuti basa ratiri kuita rekubika vechidiki riri kufamba negwara chairo.   “Kutaura kuno, tine vatambi vatatu avo vave kutotambira muchikwata chevakuru. Saka ticharamba tichisevenza nevechidiki tichivabika.   “Mutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Cup tiri kuona kuti uri kusimudzira vatambi vedu vazhinji,” anodaro Kadurira.   Zvakadaro, neMugovera svondo rino apo Simba Bhora FC iri kutamba neChegutu Pirates, nemusi weSvondo kuchasangana Herantals U20 neBlack Mambas.

headline: MaWarriors 9 vane Covid-19
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) razivisa kuti rambomisa gadziriro dzechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors dzekuenda kumakwikwi eAfrican Nations Championship (CHAN) zvichitevera kubatwa kwakaita vatambi vacho vapfumbamwe nechirwere cheCovid-19.   Muchinyorwa chakatumirwa neZifa, competitions manager ari zvekare mukushi wemashoko wesangano iri – Xolisani Gwesela – anoti vatambi vose vemaWarriors vainge vakasarudzwa kupinda muchikwata chaZdravko Logarusic nemusi weMuvhuro vakaongororwa pavakadzoka kubva kuzororo reKirisimasi zvikaonekwa kuti vapfumbamwe vavo vane chirwere ichi.   “Tichitevedzera mitemo, vatambi vose nevaraidzi vacho vakavhenekwa nemusi weMuvhuro (28 Zvita) vachibva kuzororo reKirisimasi ndokuonekwa kuti vapfumbamwe vavo vane Covid-19,” anodaro. Gwesela anoenderera mberi achiti vose vaonekwa kuti vane denda iri vaziviswa uye vave kutevedzera mitemo yeWorld Health Organisation (WHO) vachimbogara kwavo voga.   Kunyangwe zvazvo vatambi vane chirwere ichi vasina kudomwa nemazita, Gwesela anoti chikwata chemaWarriors chicharamba chiri mukembi asi chisingaite gadziriro.   Mitambo yeCHAN, iyo iri kutambirwa kuCameroon, ichatanga musi wa16 Ndira 2021 uye maWarriors ari muboka reGroup A rine zvikwata zvinoti Burkina Faso, Cameroon neMalawi.   Zvichakadai, kuMalawi, chikwata cheNyasa Bullets icho chinorairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa kusvika pari zvino vatambi vacho 11 vabatwa vaine Covid-19.

headline: Nadal akabuda muCincinnati Masters
text: wetenesi pasi rese, Rafael Nadal (32), akabuda mumutambo weCincinnati Masters sezvo ari kuedza kutanga gadziriro dzake dzekuchengetedza mukombe weUS Open. Nadal – uyo anove chizvarwa chekuSpain – akaumburudza Stefano Tsitsipas wekuGreece achibva ahwina mukombe wake wechi80 ndokubva atora zvakare Rodgers Cup kuToronto musi weSvondo. “Ndine hurombo kukuzivisai kuti handisi kuzotamba kuCincinnati gore rino,” Nadal akanyora padandemutande rake reTwitter musi weSvondo. “Hapana chimwe chikonzero kunze kwekuchengetedza hupenyu hwangu uye nekuedza kuramba ndiri mutano sezvandiri kunzwa iye zvino. “Ndine kutenda kukuru kune shamwari yangu Andre Silva, tournament director weCinciannati Tournament, uyo wandakataura naye panharembozha akanzwisisa zvikuru nyaya iripo yandakamutsanangurira.” Kubuda kwaNadal mumutambo uyu kwave kusiya Roger Federer, uyo aive asiko kuToronto, ariye mutambi ari kutarisirwa kuhwina makwishu aya eCincinnati. Makwikwi eUS Open achatanga musi wa27 Nyamavhuvhu, kuFlushing Meadows. — Sportsmail Tennis

headline: Highlanders neFC Platinum dzotarisirwa Kupinda muMafinals eChibuku Super Cup
text: Makundano eChibuku Super Cup ar ikupinda musemi fainari apo Highlanders yadongorera mufainari. Chikwata chinotora mukombe weChibuku Super Cup chinobudirira kumiririra nyika mumakwikwi emuAfrica eCaf Confederation Cup Highlanders haisi kuvanza kuti chinangwa chavo ndechekutora mikombe yese mikuru weleaague newe Chibuku Super Cup. Chikwata ichi svondo rino chiri kuswedera pedyo nekuzadzikisa chinangwa chavo apo vari kusangana neNgezi Platinum Stars musemi fainari yeChibuku Super Cup muBabourfields Stadium. Pakambosangana zvikwata zviviri izvi munhandare imwe cheteyo, Ngezi Platinum Stars yakabuda ichizhamba ichiti yaive yabirirwa mushure mekunge Highlanders yapihwa penareti mutambo wave kupera ndokukunda 2-1. Asi ikozvino kuzhamba uku kungangotadza kuitika sezvo Highladers yacho iri kubvira moto. Bosso yakunda mumitambo gumi yavo yakateverana zvekuti pane vakawanda varikuti Ngezi Platinum Stars haisi kumira. Mutori wedu wenhau dzemitambo Michael Kariati anotipa nyaya iyi. VaRichard Musengezi mutsigiri wenhabvu vanoti mutambo uyu uchange wakaoma asi vari kuona Highlanders ichienderera mberi nekukunda kwayo. Asi Highlnders isafunge kuti yakatokunda kare nekuti Ngezi Platinum Stars inozivikanwa nenyaya yekuita zvishamiso. Imwe semi fainari iri kuMandava Stadium mangwana uko FC Platinum irikubandana neHarare City iyo inorairidzwa naMoses Chunga. Pakapedzisira kusangana zvikwata zviviri izvi Kugona Kunenge Kudada yakarohwa 2-1 ndokubviswa pamusoro pegungano reCastle Lager Premier Soccer League zvekuti vane shungu dzekudzorera. Murairidzi wavo Norman Mapeza anoti haasi kutarisa kuti uyu mutambo weligi kana wemukombe. Anoti iye vari kugadzirira mutambo uyu sezvavaingoita imwe yese yavakatamba. Murairidzi wemaSunshine City Boys Moses Chunga anoti mutambo wese wavanotamba vanotarisira kukunda achiti iye zvemutambo we Platinum arikuzvigadzirisa. Vakawanda vasineyi nezvikwata zvirikutamba izvi varikuona kunge fainari ichave pakati peFC Platinum neHighlanders. Fainari yemukombe uyu iriko musi wa 5 Mbudzi.

headline: Morocco Yosimudza Mureza weAfrica kuWorld Cup
text: Morocco yakashamisa vakawanda nezuro kumakwikwi eWorld Cup ari kuitirwa kuQatar mushure mekurova Belgium 2-0 zvange zvisingatarisirwe nevakawanda. Aka ndekekutanga Morocco ichikunda mumutambo weWorld Cup kekutanga kubva muna 1998. Morocco yave nyika yechipiri yemuAfrica kukundawo kumakwikwi aya zvichitevera kukunda kwakaita Senegal Qatar 3-1. Morocco iri muGroup F pamwe chete neCroatia iyo yakatungamira gungano iri nezvibodzwa zvakawanda mushure mekurova Canada- 4-1. Croatia ine mapoinzi mana, Morocco ine manawo ichiteverwa neBelgium ine poindi imwe chete sezvakangoitawo Canada iyo yabva yabuda mumakwikwi aya. Zvikwata zvise zvasarirwa nemutambo mumwe chete wekupedzisira. Morocco ichatamba neCanada musi wa 1 Zvita ukuwo Belgium ichitamba neCroatia musi wakarewo.

headline: Dynamos Inotenga Vatambi Vatsva
text: Dynamos yatenga vatambi vatsva senzira yekuti chikwata ichi chisimbe kudarika zvachiri. Dembare iri kudzoka munhandare neSvondo iine vatambi vatsva apo ichatamba neZPC Kariba sekutaura kwaita gwaro rabva kune vanoronga mitambo muPremier Soccer League, VaElisha Mandireva. Mutungamiri weDembare, VaSolomon Sanyamandwe, vanoti vateveri veDynamos vanofanira kugadziririra kuona Dynamos yakasimba uyezve yakasiyana zvikuru neyaivepo munharaunda yekutanga iyo yaitatarika zvinotyisa. VaSanyamandwe vanoti Dembare yakatenga vatambi vatsva vakati wandei kusanganisira Kingstone Nkhata kubva kuSupersport yekuSouth Africa uyo vanotarisira kuti achapedza dambudziko ravanaro rezvibodzwa. VaSanyamandwe vanoti Nkhata akanyorerana chibvumirano chemwedzi mitanhatu neDembare vachizoona kuti vanokwanisa here kuwedzera nguva yacho. Nkhata ane nhoroondo yakasimba mumutambo wenhabvu mushure mekutambira Kaiser Chiefs, Free State Stars, Black Leopards neSupersport United muSouth Africa pamwe neBuymore neCaps United mu Zimbabwe. Nkhata akatambira Zimbabwe kanokwana kagumi akanwisa zvibodzwa zvitatu. Pamusoro paNkhata, VaSanyamandwe vanoti Dynamos yakatenga zvekare Brett Amidu kubva kuFC Platinum vachiwedzera ivo kuti zviri mumaoko emurairidzi wavo, Lloyd Mutasa, kushandisa kana kuregedza Denver Mukamba uyo akadzoka kubva kuCaps United. Mukamba ane nhoroondo yemisikanzwa. Asi Mutasa anoti hapana mutambi ane nzvimbo muchikwata ichi. Dynamos yaifanira kuve yakadzoka munhandare svondo rapera ichisangana neHighlanders asi mutambo uyu wakamiswa nePSL.. Pari zvino, Dembare iri pachinhanho chegumi nenhatu, mapoinzi mashanu kubva pachikwata chakatarisana nekubuda muPSL cheNichrut icho chine mapoinzi gumi nemanomwe. Mutasa anoseka avo vari kuti chikwata chake chingangobuda mumakwikwi aya. Pari zvino, chikwata cheFC Platinum ndicho chiri kutungamira makundano ePSL nemapoinzi makumi mana nemapfumbamwe, mapoinzi maviri pamusoro peNgezi Platinum Stars. No media source currently available

headline: Mbare Junior League yosimudzira vechidiki
text: VECHIDIKI vokurudzirwa kuti vapinde mune zvemitambo nechinangwa chekugadzirira remangwana ravo pane kuswera vachitora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwe mumuviri.   Kurudziro iyi yakapihwa nasachigaro weMbare Junior Football League – Stanley Kavayi – achiti mitambo yakakosha muhupenyu hwevechidiki.   Kavayi, uyo anove murairidzi wenhabvu zvekare, anoti vechidiki vakawanda vane matarenda emitambo yakaita senhabvu, cricket nebasketball asi hupenyu hwavo huri kuenda mudondo nekuda kwezvinodhaka.   Anoti vari kuronga mitambo yakasiyana yekuti vechidiki vatambe.   “Mitambo yakakosha nekuti inobatsira kubika vechidiki nekuvarakidza gwara chairo. SeMbare Junior Football League, tiri kuronga mitambo yenhabvu yekuti vechidiki vatambe nekuti donzvo redu kuvabvisa pedyo nezvinodhaka.   “Kune vechidiki vakawanda vekuti unotoona kuti uyu ane chipo mumitambo asi anozomedzwa nezvinodhaka. Saka isu tiri kuda kuvabata toshanda navo kusvika vakura tovabatsira kuti vagotengwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana,” anodaro.   Anoti vari kupota vachishevedza varairidzi vezvikwata zvakasiyana avo vanouya vachiongorora mitambo yavo votsvaga vatambi vekutenga.   “Patinotamba mitambo yedu kazhinji panenge pane varairidzi vezvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League (PSL) kana Division One avo vatinoshevedza kuti vauye kuzoona vatambi vakasiyana.   “Kana pakauya varairidzi vakasiyana, ndinoziva kuti zvinopa vatambi manyuku-nyuku ekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro sezvo vanenge vachiziva kuti vane mukana wekutengwa nezvikwata zvikuru,” anodaro Kavayi.   Anoti pachavharwa zvikoro, Mbare Junior Football League icharonga mitambo yakasiyana senzira yekuti vechidiki vawane zvinovavaraidza sezvo vamwe vanogona kufuririka kutora zvinodhaka apo vanenge vakazorora.

headline: Celtic musha wangu: Rodgers
text: Brendan Rodgers, anoti anoshuvira kuzoshanda muEnglish Premier League rimwe zuva asi kwete iye zvino.   Rodgers – uyo ari kunzi anodiwa neArsenal kuti azorairidze chikwata ichi uye achitsiva Arsene Wenger zvichitevera kubuda pachena kwaakaita kuti ari kubva kuchikwata ichi pachapera mwaka uno – anoti anoda kubhadhara rutsigiro rwaakapihwa nebhodhi reCeltic nekuramba achitungamira chikwata ichi kuenda kumberi.   Shasha iyi yasarirwa nemutambo mumwe chete kuti chikwata chake chihwine mukombe wechitatu wegore rino zvichitevera kukunda kwachakaita Rangers 5-0 ndokuhwina mukombe weLadbrokes Premiership Title.   Rodgers asarirwa nemakore matatu pakondirakiti yake uye akabuda pachena kuti haadi kushanda kumwe kunze kwekuCeltic.   Aimbove murairidzi weLiverpool uyu anoti, “Ndakamuka nemusi weMuvhuro kuno mangwanani ndiri maneja weCeltic, zvizivei kuti kuGlasgow kuno kunonakidza.   “Ndiri kurairidza chikwata chandinoda chikuru pasi rose. Ndinoda basa randiri kuita kuno.” – SportsMail Football

headline: Vakawanda Votadza Kuona World Cup neKudzimwa kweMagetsi
text: Vanhu vakawanda muZimbabwe vari kutadza kuona makundano avanofanira efifa World Cup nenya yekudzimwa kwemagetsi neZESA Saudi Arabia nhasi yashamisa pasi rose nekurova Argentina 2-1 pamutambo weWorld Cup kuQatar muGroup C. Vakawanda vange vachitarisira kuti Argentina ichasimudza mukombe uyu. Asi muZimbabwe vamwe havana kuona mutambo uyu sezvo kwange kusina magetsi. Nzvimbo zakawanda munyika dzatarisana nedambudziko guru remagetsi ari kuenda mangwanani odzoka pakati pehusiku panguva iyo mitambo ye2022 World Cup inenge yapera. Vanoitawo zvekubheja vatarisana nedambudziko guru sezvo nzvimbo dzavanotambira dziri kuswera dzakavharwa nekushaya magetsi. Muzvinabhizimisi VaInnocent Mutenha avo vane mabhawa muWarren Park nekuKuwadzana vanoti magetsi avakanganisira basa panguva ino yeWorld Cup. Nemhaka yekushaikwa kwemagetsi uku, vakawanda nezuro vakatadza kuona mutambo weWorld Cup wavaishuwira pakati peSenegal neNetherlands uyo Senegal yakarohwa 2-0. Mutambo weSenegal unotevera uriko neChishanu apo iri kusangana neQatar.MMuongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaTinashe Museti vanoti Qatar inofanira kukunda kana kuti huhwandu hwevanhu vemuQatar mudzinhandare kumakundano aya hunodzikira. Zvimwe zvikwata zviri mugungano rine Qatar neSenegal iEcuador pamwe neNetherlands. Brazil iyo veruzhinji varikutarisira kuti ichatora mukombe uyu iri kupinda munhandare neChina apo iri kusangana neSerbia. Vakawanda kusanganisira mukuru weZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association VaJoseph Mutawu vanoti mukombe uri kuenda nemaSamba Boys aya. Asi vaongorori vemutambo uyu vanoti hapana chikwata chiri pamberi vachiti chimwe cheArgentina, Belgium, France, Germany neNetherlands chinokwanisa kutorawo mukombe uyu. Munyori wezvemutambo wenhabvu anogara kuEngland Admire Muhimeke anoti Argentina kana Germany ndidzo dzinogona kutora mukombe uyu. Panyaya yemagetsi, mutauriri weZesa VaGeorge Manyaya vanoti Zesa haikwanise kubuditsa hurongwa hwenguva dzinodzimwa magetsi nekuti dzimwe nguva kudzima uku kunosangana nekufa kwezvinotakurisa moto wacho. Vanoti veruzhinji vanofanira kujairira kudzimwa kwemagetsi kwenguva refu kuri kuitika uku. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vakawanda munyika vachatadza kuona mitambo yakawanda. Makundano eWorld Cup aya ayo akatanga nezuro achapera musi wa 18 Zvita. No media source currently available

headline: Mitambo yePSL yamiswa
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League razivisa kuti mitambo yose yePSL ye”match day two” iyo yange ichitambwa svondo rino yambomiswa zvichitevera kusauya kwaita varidzi vepembe kuzoridza mune mimwe mitambo yange ichifanirwa kutambwa nhasi.   Pachinyorwa chabva kuPSL, chamangwiza wePSL, Kennedy Ndebele, anoti kusabatika kwaita varidzi vepembe mumitambo yanhasi kwavatuma kumisa mitambo yose ye”match day two” nechinangwa chekuedza kuita tsvakurudzo kuti zvafamba sei.   “Tinoziva kumiswa kwemitambo yose yematch day two izvo zvakonzerwa nekusauya kubasa kwaita varidzi vepembe kumitambo yakasiyana.   “Asi kune vamwe vaenda kunhandare vachida kunoridza asi havana kuzokwanisa kuenderera mberi sezvo vamwe vazongoregedza mitambo yave kuda kutanga.   “Tamboedza kuita hurukuro neZIFA Referees Committee kuti tinzwisise kuti zviri kufamba sei, asi hapana chabuda.   “Tinovimba kuti zvichagadzirika nekukasika,” anodaro Ndebele.   Kusabatika kwevaridzi vepembe kumitambo yanhasi vamwe vanoti zvakonzerwa nekumbomiswa kwaita basa bhodhi reZIFA nhasi neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC).

headline: Zim shasha yeIKF Africa Champions
text: CHIKWATA cheZimbabwe Korfball chakasimudza mureza wenyika kuZambia uko chakahwina mukombe weInternational Korfball Federation (IKF) Africa Champions ndokuwana tikiti rekunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup iyo ichatambirwa kuChinese Taipei gore rinotevera.   Achitaura vachangodzoka kubva kuZambia, mutungamiri weZimbabwe Korfball Association arizve mutungamiri weIKF Africa – Tarirai Chadebah – anoti chikwata chavo chine mufaro mukuru nekukunda kwachakaita.   Kuhwina kwavakaita kuZambia kunoreva kuti Zimbabwe pari zvino ndiyo iri pamusoro muAfrica yese mumutambo wekorfball. Africa ichange ichamirirwa neZimbabwe neMorocco iyo yakahwina mutambo werimwe boka reNorthern Region.   “Senyika, tiri kufara kuti takakunda kuZambia ndokuhwina tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup ichatambwa gore rinotevera kuChinese Taipei.   “Kuhwina tikiti iri pamwe chete neMorocco kunoreva kuti senyika tiri kufamba mugwara chairo uye tiri kuziva zvatiri kuita. Saka tinofanirwa kuramba tichishanda nesimba kuti tirambe tichisimukira mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Chadebah.   Anoti chikwata chavo hachisi kumbozvipa nguva yekuzorora nekuti vanoda kubva vatotanga gadziriro dzeWorld Cup izvozvi.   “Tinoziva kuti patinoenda kuWorld Cup tinotarisirwa pasi asi isu tinoda kunorwa semvumba kumutambo uyu tigovarakidza kuti tiri shashawo.   “Saka hatina nguva yekuzorora, takangobva kuZambia ndokusvika takutotanga kuronga rwendo rwedu rwekuenda kuChinese Taipei kumutambo uyu,” anodaro Chadebah.

headline: ZOC yoyambira vatambi
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Olympic Committee (ZOC) riri kukurudzira vatambi vakabudirira kuenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo yeTokyo 2020 Olympic Games, kuJapan kuti vatevedzere mitemo yose yeWorld Health Organization (WHO) yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mitambo iyi iri kutanga munaChikunguru.   Sangano reInternational Olympic Committee rakaparura “Play Book” iro rine matanho anofanirwa kutevedzerwa nevatambi vose vachakwikwidza kumaOlympics senzira yekudzivirira denda iri.   Matanho ari muPlay Book iri anosanganisira kuvhenekwa Covid-19 vatambi vasati vaenda kuJapan, kukurudzira kuti vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19, kugara vakapfeka mamasiki, kugeza maoko nemvura ine sipo nguva nenguva kana kushandisa sanitizer uye kuti vasaungane. Chamangwiza weZOC – Stephen Mudawarima – anoti sangano ravo riri kukurudzira chikwata cheTeam Zimbabwe chichaenda kuTokyo kuti chigare chakachengetedzeka uye kuti vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19.   “Kwakauya Playbook remaOlympics iro takatumira kune vose vachaenda kumitambo iyi zvakabva kuInternational Olympic Committee maringe nekuzvichengetedza kubva kuCovid-19. “Tiri kukurudzira vatambi vose kuti ngavatevedzere zviri muPlaybook iri nekuti ndizvo zvichatibatsira patichaenda kuJapan kuti tinge takachengetedzeka kubva kuCovid-19. Matanho arimo anosanganisira kuvhenekwa Covid-19, kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19, kugara takapfeka mamasiki, kugeza maoko nguva dzose uye kusaungana.   “Tiri panyaya yekubaiwa nhomba, hazvimanikidzwe munhu, asi isu tiri kuita hurukuro nevatambi vemunyika yedu tichivazivisa zvakanakira kubaiwa nhomba iyi,” anodaro Mudawarima.   Pari zvino muZimbabwe, vatambi vatatu kubva mumitambo inoti rowing nevaviri vanotuhwina ndivo vabudirira kuenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo iyi. Mudawarima anoti pane mumwe mutambi wegorofu achiri pakati pekukwikwidza nekurwira kuenda kumitambo iyi saka vakangobatira hana mumaoko kuti agobudirira.   “Tine mutambi wedu wegorofu iye zvino akagara pa51 kubva pavatambi 60, saka tikasvika musi wa21 Chikumi ari mutop 60 anenge ahwina tikiti rekuendawo kuTokyo,” anodaro.   Zvakadaro, sangano reNational Athletics Association of Zimbabwe (NAAZ) rinoti riri kutarisira kuti shangwiti dzemujaho wekumhanya dzichabudirirawo kuenda kumaOlympics.   Director wecoaching and development kuNAAZ – Phakamile Lisimati – anoti sangano ravo rakaisa tariro pashasha dzemujaho dzinosanganisira Tinotenda Matienda, Ngoni Makusha, Kundai Maguranyanga naChengetai Mapaya avo vachiri pakati pekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumitambo iyi. “Vatambi vedu vekumhanya vamwe vari kuAmerica koita vari kuSouth Africa uko vari kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumitambo iyi. Vanomhanya vanofanira kubata nguva dzinotarisirwa kuti vakwikwidze musi wa29 Chikumi saka vari kukwikwidza vari kunyika dzakasiyana.   “Isu kuno tinenge tichikurukura navo tichivaudza zvekuita kuti vagobudirira kuenda kumitambo iyi,” anodaro Lisimati.   Mitambo yemaOlympics yaifanira kuitwa gore radarika asi yakamiswa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye ichatanga musi wa23 Chikunguru ichipera musi wa8 Nyamavhuvhu.

headline: Mitambo yeCastle Premier Soccer League Yopfungaira Hutsi Zvekare
text: Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League adzoka zvine mutsindo mushure mesvondo rimwe chete rezororo. Nemusu weMugovera masikati nhandare yeRufaro Stadium ichange isingadanwe anonzwa apo pachatambwa mitambo miviri apo Yadah neBlack Rhinos dziri kushandisa nhandare imwechete, zuva rimwe chete, mumitambo yavo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League yevhiki remakumi maviri nemaviri. Yadah iyo iri kuti nhasi yabaka moto, mangwana wodzima, ndiyo iri kutanga kupinda munhandare yeRufaro Stadium iyi kusangana neChapungu iyo iri kukwikwira zvishoma nezvishoma muhurongwa hwemakundano aya. Yadah, iyo yaimbotungamira makundano aya yave pazvikwata zvina zvakatarisana nekubuda mumakwikwi aya zvekuti inofanira kukunda kuitira kuti isaverengwe pazvikwata zvaingopinda muPremier Soccer League nekubuda gore rimwe chetero. Mutambo uyu ukapera, uri kuteverwa nemutambo mukuru pakati peBlack Rhinos neChicken Inn iyo iri pachidanho chechipiri mumakundano ezvikwata gumi nezvisere aya. Chipembere chadonha zvinotyisa mumakundano aya zvekuti chikwata cheZimbabwe National Army ichi chave pachidanho chechisere mushure mekumbotungamira makundano aya, kwemasvondo akati wandei. Kunyange hazvo varohwa mitambo mina yakataverana murairidzi weChipembere Stanford Stix Mtizwa anoti iyi yave nhoroondo achiti iye varikuda mapoinzi ese matatu vakatarisana nechinangwa chavo chekuramba vari muPremier Soccer League mwaka unotevera. Asi machikichori muRufaro Stadium haasi kutanga nekugumira pamitambo miviri iyi, sezvo nesvondo maGreen Machine eCaps United achange achiedza kupunzira pasi Ngezi Platinum Stars iyo iri pamusoro petafura yeligi. Mushure mekutora poindi imwechete kubva mumitambo mina vabuda mumakundano eCaf Champions League, Makepekepe irikubhebha moto mushure mekutora mapoinzi manomwe kubva mumitambo yavo mitatu ichangopera kusanganisira wemusi weChitatu uyo yakarova FC Platinum 2-1. Mapoinzi manomwe aya asiya Makepekepe ave pachinhanho chegumi neina mumakundano aya asi vaine mitambo mishanu yavasati vatamba nemhaka yekukwikwidza kwavo muCaf Champions League. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda varikuti maGreen Machine haasisimo mukurwira kutora mukombe weligi uyu, mumwe mutsigiri wechikwata ichi VaTakunda Mupereki vanoti Makepekepe anokwanisa kudzivirira mukombe uyu, uyo vakatora mwaka wapera. Asi sachigaro weNgezi Platinum Stars VaJeremiah Getiseni vanoti vanonokerwa nemutambo neCaps United uyu vachiti ivo maGreen Machine haasi kumira. Mimwe mitambo iriko yakamira seizvi…  Bulawayo City v Harare City Hwange v Bantu Highlanders v Tsholotsho Pirates Shabanie Mine v ZPC Kariba Triangle v Platinum Dynamos neHighlanders hadzina mitambo svondo rino, sezvo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvaifanira kuve zviri kuBotswana kumakundano ezvikwata zvina aifanira kusanganisirawo Taffic Stars neMochudi Centre Chiefs. Makwikwi eSupa Power Cup aya haasi kuzoenderera mberi mushure mekunge vange vakaronga makundano aya vakundikana kuzadzikisa zvange zvichidiwa nezvikwata izvi. Asi zvikwata izvi hazvichaenda kuFrancistown asi vePremier Soccer League vazivisa kuti hapana nguva yekuti mitambo yavo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ienderere mberi. Dynamos yanga ichifanira kusangana neHow Mine, Highlanders ichibandana neTsholotsho Pirates. Zvakamira zvakadai, makundano eEnglish Premier League arikupinda mumitambo yechipiri apo chikwata chirikutungamira makwikwi aya cheManchester United chiri munzira kuenda kuWales kunosangana neSwansea. Vanoziva zvemutambo wenhabvu vanoti Swansea haisi kumira zvekuti varikutarisira zvekare kunaya kwezvibodzwa sezvakaitika svondo rapera apo maRed Devills akabvarura West Ham 4-0. Asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mukamba yeChelsea iyo yatarisana nemutambo mukukutu apo varimuguta ravo reLondon as kuWembley uko varikunobandana neTottenham Hotspur iyo isingaroveke roveke pamusha.
