Mimwe mitambo mugungano iri ndeiyi… Liverpool v Crystal Palace Southampton v West Ham Burnemouth v Watford Stoke v Arsenal Burnley v West Brom Huddersfield v Newcastle Manchester City v Everton KuSpain, makundano emwaka uno ari kutanga svondo rino apo chikwata chine mukombe weLa Liga che Real Madrid chir ikutanga chiri kunze kwemusha kuDeportivo La Coruna panguva iyo Barcelona iri Nou Camp neReal Betis. Madrid neBarcelona, zvakasangana pakati pesvondo pamutambo wemukomba apo Barceloma yakadamburwa 2-0.

headline: Warriors muna 2021 . . . • Pamitambo 15 vakakunda 1 • Vasimuka kuenda kuAFCON
text: GORE ra2021 rakaona chikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors chichitamba mitambo 15 uye zvakarakidza kuti chadzikira zvikuru sezvo chakangokwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwe chete.   Gore richitanga, maWarriors airairidzwa naZdravko “Loga” Logarusic uyo akarairidza mitambo 14 kubva paakagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi kusvika azodzingwa basa munaGunyana.   Loga paaitungamira maWarriors, akangokwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwe chete uye akaita mangange mishanu ndokukundwa misere.   Asi tichitarisa mitambo yakatambwa nemaWarriors gore ra2021, akatamba 15 yemakwikwi anosanganisira African Nations Championship (CHAN), Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) Qualifiers, Cosafa Cup neyekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup kuQatar.   Pamitambo iyi, maWarriors akangohwina kamwe chete apo akakunda Botswana 1-0 kunhandare yeFrancistown Stadium kunyika iyi mumutambo weAFCON wekurwira kuenda kuCameroon, ndokuita mangange mitambo mina uye ndokukundwa ka10. Tichitarisa mitambo yakatambwa nemaWarriors, tichitanga neyeCHAN iyo yakatambwa munaNdira, akatamba mitambo mitatu ndokukundwa yese – 1-0 neCameroon, 3-1 neBurkina Faso uye 1-0 neMali.   Mitambo yaitevevera yakatambwa munaKurume yaive miviri yekurwira kuenda kuAFCON iyo yakaona maWarriors achikunda Botswana 1-0 panove ndipo akabva ahwina tikiti rekuenda kumutambo uyu. Mutambo wekupedzisira muboka ravo chikwata chenyika ichi chakakundwa 2-0 neZambia.   MunaChikunguru, maWarriors akaenda kumutambo weCosafa Cup kuSouth Africa uko akanotamba mitambo mina akakwanisa kuita mangange miviri 0-0 neMozambique, 2-2 neMalawi asi ndokukundwa miviri 2-0 neNamibia uye 2-1 neSenegal. Achibva kuCosafa, maWarriors akatamba mitambo mitanhatu yekurwira kuenda ku2022 Qatar World cup apo angokwanisa kuita mangange miviri ndokukundwa mina.   Panguva iyi, ndipo pakadzingwa Loga basa ndokutsiviwa naNorman Mapeza uyo ari kutungamira maWarriors kuAFCON pari zvino.   Pamitamo iyi, maWarriors akaita mangange 0-0 neSouth Africa muno kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium uye 1-1 zvekare munyika muno neEthiopia, ndokuzokundwa mimwe mina inoti 3-1 neGhana kuGhana, 1-0 neGhana muno, 1-0 neEthiopia kuBahir Dar kuEthiopia ne1-0 neBafana Bafana kuFNB Stadium.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza maonero ake pamusoro pematambiro emaWarriors aya, maneja wechikwata ichi — Wellington Mpandare — anoti haakwanise kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya iyi uye varairidzi ndivo vanofanirwa kunge vachitaura nezvazvo.   “Ndiro basa revarairidzi iroro, mofanira kuvabvunza kuti vakazvifambisa sei. Asi, tinoziva kuti mitambo mizhinji yakatambwa 2021 akairairidza wacho haasisipo,” anodaro Mpandare.   Chikwata chemaWarriors chakasimuka nemusi weChitatu chakananga kuCameroon uko chiri kunoita gadziriro dzekutanga kwemutambo we2021 Africa Cup of Nations nemusi wa9 Ndira.

headline: Xhaka angangodzokera Borussia
text: Granit Xhaka, anoti anogona kudzokera kuBorussia Monchengladbach kana kondirakiti yake yapera.   Chizvarwa chekuSwitzerland ichi chakambotamba mwaka mina kuBundesliga asati ayenda kuArsenal mugore ra2019 uko akatengwa nemari inosvika £35m.   Xhaka iye zvino ane kondirakiti nemaGunners ichapera mugore ra2024 uye anoti angade kudzokera kuMonchengladbach kana chikwata chekuGerman ichi chichimuda.   Achitaura neMit Geredet Podcast anoti, “Handina kubva kuBorussia ndichiuya kuArsenal nekuda kwemari kwete. Chaive chishuvo changu kutamba muEngland.   “Ndichangobva kuwedzera kondirakiti yangu, iyo yasara nemakore maviri kuti ipere. “Ndichabva ndasvitsa makore 32 saka kana Max Eberl (Monchengladbach’s director of sport) achida kundidzosa ndine makore 32, saka ini musuwo wangu wakazarurwa ndinoenda.”   Xhaka achangobva kusaina kondirakiti imwe kuArsenal yegore mwaka uno, zvichitevera kudiwa kwaaiitwa naJose Mourinho murairidzi weRoma. Mutambi uyu (29) pari zvino haasati ave kutamba nhabvu zvichitevera kukuvara kwaakaita gumbo rake mumutambo weNorth Londona Derby apo Arsenal yakakunda Tottenham 3-1. Akakuvara paibvi rake izvo zvichamuona asingatambe nhabvu kwemwedzi mitatu. — SportsMail.

headline: Haisi nguva yekufunga nhabvu, asi upenyu: PSL
text: PREMIER Soccer League (PSL) inoti ichamirira kuudzwa pamwe nekupihwa mvumo neSport and Recreation Commission (SRC) kuti nhabvu izotanga kutambwa zvekare zvichitevera kumiswa kwayakaitwa pamwe chete nemimwe mitambo apo mukombe weChibuku Super Cup wange uri pakati pekutambwa.   Nguva pfupi yadarika apo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakatanga kukwira zvekare, SRC yakamisa mitambo yose kunze kweyezvikwata zvichamirira nyika zvinosanganisira maWarriors ayo ari kuSouth Africa uko ari mumitambo yeCosafa Cup kozoita chikwata chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chiri kubandana necheBangladesh mumitambo yeTest match, one day international netwenty20 series. Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, chamangwiza wePSL – Kennedy “Kenny” Ndebele – anoti sePSL, vari kukoshesa mitemo yose yeHurumende yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 uye havasi kufunga nezvekudzoka kwenhabvu pari zvino sezvo chinhu chikuru chavari kukoshesa utano neupenyu hweveruzhinji.   “Utano neupenyu hweruzhinji ndizvo zvakakosha panguva ino, saka ngatimbomire zvekufunga kuti nhabvu inodzoka rinhi kana kuti tichatanga kuitamba rinhi apo vamwe vanhu vari kufa.   “SePSL tiri kutevedzera zvose zvatinenge taudzwa kuti tiite neSRC neHurumende nekuti denda iri riri kuuraya vanhu uye nguva ino yatiri haina kumira zvakanaka zvachose. Kana nguva yekuti nhabvu ichidzoka ikakwana ndine chivimbo kuti SRC ichatizivisa ipapo tobva tasimudzira mutambo weChibuku Super Cup uyo watakambosendeka parutivi kwazvino.   “Ino inguva yekuti tichengetedze upenyu hweveruzhinji,” anodaro Ndebele. Ndebele anoenderera mberi achiti kudzoka kwenhabvu yePSL kuri mumaoko eSRC saka naizvozvo ivo vachangotevedzera gwara ravanenge vaziviswa kuti vagofamba naro.   “Zvinhu zvose zviri mumaoko eSRC, isu hatikwanise kupikisa mitemo yeHurumende. Covid-19 iriko uye kana zvichinzi mitambo imbomira kuitira kuti vanhu vachengetedzeke, ndizvo zvatinotevedzera izvozvo.   “Saka gwara ratichapihwa maringe nekuzodzoka kwenhabvu zvose zviri mumaoko eSRC, ndiyo inotiudza zvekuti totevedzera saizvozvo,” anodaro. Apo zvimwe zvikwata zvange zvichiendesa vatambi vazvo kunobaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19, Kwayedza yakaedza kubvunza kuna Ndebele kuti vari kuona sei mafambiro ari kuita nyaya dzekubaiwa kwenhomba yeCovid-19 muzvikwata zvavo uye zvikwata zvose zvati zvaenda here, iye ndokupindura achiti, “Panguva ino hatisati tave kukwanisa kutaura nezvenyaya iyoyo, tichazokuzivisai pamberi apo kuti zvingani zvabaisa vatambi vazvo nhomba yeCovid-19.   “Asi semutemo wenyika wekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, zvakakosha kuti munhu wese anobaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19.”

headline: FC Platinum Yotatsurana neEsperance muCaf Champions League
text: Vatsigiri venhabvu munyika vane mukana wekuona chikwata chine mukurumbira muAfrica uye chine mukombe weCAF Champions league cheEsperance icho chiri kutamba neFC Platinum mangwana kuBarbourfields Stadium kuBulawayo. Esperance yakasimudzamukombe weCAF Champions katatu uku FC Platinum yakapinda mumini League kekutanga iri kutatarika zvakasimba ichikwanisa kungoita mapoinzi maviri chete pamitambo mishanu zvichireva kuti ndiyo iri pasi muGroup B. Esperance ndiyo iri pamusoro mugungano iine mapoinzi gumi nerimwe. FC Platinum yakatobuda mumakwikwi aya kare zvekuti changosara kungobudawo nechiremera nekukunda chikwata chine mukurumbira ichi. Pamusoro pemikombe mitatu yeCaf Champions League, Esperance yakambotora zvekare mukombe weAfrica Super Cup pamwe neweCaf Confederation Cup. Payakapedzisira kutamba mumakundano aya kuSouth Africa, FC Platinum yakaita rombo rakaipa apo yakakandwa chibodzwa, mutambo wave kupera vakatungamira 2-1, mutambo uyu ndokupera uri mangange Mumwe muteveri wechikwata ichi Muzvare Olivia Mushipe vanoti FC Platinum ikatamba sezvayakaita neOrlando Pirates kuOrlando Stadium masvondo maviri apfuura inokwanisa kudonhedza gomo guru remuAfrica iri. Imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association VaObert Masvotore vanoti FC Platinum haifanire kuvhundutsirwa nemazita nekuti zvikwata zvakaita seEsperance zvinoroveka. Mumwe muteveri wechikwata ichi vaMaxwell Mufandaedza vanoti vachitarisa matambiro avakaita kuTunisia, negadziriro yavaita ikozvino, varikuona chikwata chavo chichikunda, vachitiurira zvibodzwa. Asi FC Platinum inennge isina vatambi vatatu mumutambo uyu nekuda kwemacards avakapihwa, vatatu ava vanoti Gift Bello, Elvis Moyo naKelvin Madzongwe. Pavakatambira kuTunis, FC Platinum yakarohwa 2-0 mumutambo uyo vakatambisa mikana yakawandisa. UEFA Champions Mune mamwe makwikwi ange akatarisirwa nevakawanda eUEFA Champions league, draw yemaquater finals yemutambo uyu yakamira yakadai Ajax vs Juventus Liverpool vs Porto Tottenham vs Manchester City Manchester United vs Barcelona No media source currently available

headline: ‘Tagadzirira kudzoka kwePSL’
text: VARAIRIDZI vezvikwata zvakasiyana zvinokwikwidza muCastle Premier Soccer League (PSL) vanoti vakagadzirira kudzoka kwemitambo iyo iri kutanga nemusi weMugovera svondo rino zvichitevera makore maviri yakambomiswa senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Svondo rino, kuchange kusingadanwe anonzwa kunhandare dziri kumativi mana enyika uko zvikwata zvichatatsurana mumitambo yePSL yekutanga iyo yakapedzisira kutambwa mugore ra2019 apo FC Platinum yakahwina mukombe uyu kechitatu.   Varairidzi vakaita hurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino vanoti vane mufaro mukuru nekudzoka kwemitambo iyi.   Murairidzi wevakomana vatsva muPSL veCranborne Bullets – Nesbert ‘Yabo’ Saruchera – anoti chikwata chake chagadzirira zvakasimba kusangana nezvimwe zvavakabva nazvo kuDivision One. Mumutambo wekutanga, Cranborne Bullets ichasangana neChicken Inn kuLuveve Stadium kuBulawayo.   Yabo anoti mitambo yavange vachitamba yeChibuku Super Cup yakabatsira chaizvo kuumba chikwata chake apo chatarisana nemwaka wacho wekutanga muPSL.   “Yazosvika mitambo yatange takamirira kwenguva ndefu. Takatarisira zvikuru svondo rino apo tichatamba mutambo wedu wekutanga wePSL tichisangana neChicken Inn, maGamecocks. “Zvinhu zvatange takatarisira kwenguva ndefu asi tichikundikana kuzviita nekuda kwedenda reCovid iro range richidzorera mutambo wedu uyu kumashure. Iye zvino tave kutarisira mberi, mutambo wave kutsvuka ropa. Tingave tiri vadiki pazita sezvo tichangopinda muPSL asi tinovimbisa kuti tichatamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura,” anodaro Yabo.   Kuchiti murairidzi weTriangle United – Taurai Mangwiro – anoti kudzoka kwemitambo yePSL kunofadza asi zvakakosha kuti vose vane chekuita nenhabvu varangarire kuti denda reCovid-19 richiriko uye votora matanho ose ekuridzivirira.   “Iyi ndiyo nguva yatange takamirira kubva takaenda palockdown, taingoti nhabvu yedu ichanyatsodzoka rinhi. Iye zvino tine mufaro kuti tave kuchisimudzira mitambo yedu. “Asi zvakakosha kuti tirangarire kuti Covid-19 ichiriko haisati yapera. Saka patinenge tichitamba mitambo yedu titevedzere matanho ose anodiwa ekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri,” anodaro.   Chikwata chaMangwiro mutambo wacho wekutanga wemwaka uno chiri kunanga kuBulawayo uko chichasangana neBulawayo Chiefs. Murairidzi weChicken – Joey ‘Mafero’ Antipas – anoti mwaka wegore rino uchanakidza zvikuru sezvo vatsigiri vange vasuwa nhabvu.   Mafero, uyo chikwata chake cheGamecocks chakaburitswa muquarter-final yeChibuku Super Cup svondo radarika, anoti vachashanda nesimba kuti vagopedza vari pakati pezvikwata zvepamusoro. “Takatarisana nekudzoka kwemitambo yePSL, mutambo wedu mukuru wenhabvu munyika. Mutambo uyu pawange usingatambwe zvange zvichitirwadza, asi zvakakosha nekuti taive pakaoma senyika nekuda kweCovid-19. Isu tiri kutarisira zvikuru kutanga kwemitambo uye tinovimbisa kuti ticharwa semvumba mumitambo yedu tiyedze kusimudza mukombe watakambohwina 2015. Ndinoziva kuti zvakaoma nekuti tinenge tichikwikwidza nezvikwata zvakasimba,” anodaro Mafero.   Zvakadaro, kune mimwe mitambo iriko svondo rino, Dynamos ‘DeMbare’ inenge iri pamusha apo ichasangana neYadah Stars kuchiti vakaomana veBlack Rhinos vachange vari pamusha zvakare vachitatsurana neHighlanders.   FC Platinum iri kutanga mwaka wayo mutsva iri pamusha apo ichasanganawo nevakomana vachangopinda muPSL veTenax.

headline: ZVICHANGOITIKA . . . Cristiano adzingwa neMan United
text: CHIKWATA cheManchester United chazivisa kuti vasiyana naCristiano Ronaldo mushure mekunge vabvumirana.   Pachinyorwa chabva kuManchester United, yazivisa kuti mutambi uyu abva.   “Cristiano ave kubva kuManchester United izvezvi mushure mekunge tabvumirana naye.   “Tinoda kumutenda nebasa raakaita kaviri kaatambira chikwata chino,” yadaro Manchester United.   Kudzingwa kwaRonaldo kunotevera kushuropodza kwaakaita chikwata ichi svondo radarika pamwe chete nemurairidzi wacho Erik ten Haag uyo waakati haamuremekedze.   “Handina ruremekedzo nemurairidzi wangu nekuti iye haandiremekedzewo. Ukasandiremekedza neniwo handikuremekedze.   “Manchester United iri kusarira kumashure zvikuru, pandakabva pekutanga ndikadzoka hapana chamboshanduka, zvinhu zvingori zvimwe chete.   “Pane vanhu vari muchikwata vasiri kundida kuno, hazvina kutanga nhasi kubva gore radarika chairo,” akadaro Ronaldo.

headline: Jordan Zemura anotambira mari shoma
text: MUTAMBI wenhabvu weAFC Bournemouth nemaWarriors eZimbabwe – Jordan Zemura (22) – ndiye ari kutambira mari shoma kuchikwata chake mwaka uno apo chiri kukwikwidza muEnglish Premier League.   Mutsvakurudzo, zvaonekwa kuti Zemura, uyo akasaina chibvumirano chake kuBournemouth achiri kutambira chikwata chevadiki, anotambira mari inosvika £385 pasvondo.   Mari yaanotambira iyi yakaderera zvikuru kana ichienzaniswa nevamwe vatambi vemuchikwata chake vakadai saJefferson Lerma uyo anotambira mari inosvika £55 000 pasvondo.   Tichitarisa mari inotambirwa naZemura, zvinoreva kuti pamwedzi anotambira £1 432 uye mwaka wose achitambira £17 184.   Mari yaanotambira mwaka wose haisvike pane inotambirwa naLerma yepasvondo rimwe chete.   Muchikwata ichi zvekare, vamwe vatambi vakadai saDominic Solanke vanonzi vanotambira mari inosvika £50 000 pasvondo, kuchiti Phillip naLewis Cook vanotambira £40 000 pasvondo pamumwe nemumwe wavo.    Mari dzinotambirwa nevatambi veBournemouth – (spotrac.com)   Asi pane tarisiro yekuti Bournemouth ichatanga kuita hurukuro naZemura munguva inotevera kuti iwedzere kondirakiti yake iyo inotarisirwa kupera gore rinotevera. Mutambi uyu ari kutarisirwa kutamba zvikuru mwaka uno sezvo achidiwa zvakanyanya naScott Parker uyo aimushandisa mwaka wadarika apo vakahwina tikiti rekupinda muEPL.

headline: Mudzimai wekutanga kuridza pembe kuWC
text: wechidzimai wekuFrance — Stephanie Frappart — achanyora nhoroondo nemusi weChina apo achaita mudzimai wekutanga kuridza kumutambo weWorld Cup wevarume.   FIFA yakazivisa kuti Frappart ndiye acharidza pamutambo weCosta Rica neGermany.   Achange ari muchikwata chemadzimai vacharidza mumutambo uyu nevamwe vanosanganisira Neuza Back wekuBrazil naKaren Diaz wekuMexico avo vachange vari vatevedzeri vake. — The African Referees Platform

headline: Vatsigiri vava kutenderwa munhandare
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vakabaiwa majekiseni ose ekudzivirira Covid-19 vave kutenderwa kuona mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup. Sangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) rakanyorera kuZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) richazivisa kuti chikumbiro chavo chekuti mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup inge iine vatsigiri 2 000 munhandare chatambirwa.   Mutsamba yakanyorwa neSRC, akafanobata chigaro chadirector general – Sebastain Garikai – anoti vatsigiri 2 000 vachaona mitambo iyi vanofanirwa kunge vakabaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19 uye pose pavanoenda kumitambo iyi vagare vakapfeka mamasiki nekutevedzera matanho ose ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Chikumbiro chenyu chekuti vatsigiri vaone nhabvu vari munhandare chatambirwa. Saka vatsigiri vose vari muZone 3 neZone 4 vanofanirwa kuuya nemakadhi anoratidza kuti vakabaiwa majekiseni ose eCovid-19 pamwe nezvitupa zvavo kunhandare pavanenge vachipinda. “Naizvozvo, tinokurudzira kuti matikiti ekupinda mumitambo iyi atengeswe mitambo isati yatanga kuitira panhandare pasazoita nyonga-nyonga uye tinotarisira kuti pave nemagedhi akasiyana anopinda nekubuda nevanhu.   “Mazita evatsigiri aya anofanirwa kunge akatonyoreswa kare zvekuti pakupinda munhandare pane vanenge vachiongorora. Kana munhu zita rake risipo, haatenderwe kupinda munhandare macho.   “Mitemo iyi nemimwe ikoshesei uye ngaitevedzerwe nekuti mukasaitedzera zvinotituma kuti timise vatsigiri vacho kuuya kuzoona mitambo iyi,” anodaro Garikai.

headline: Zim gymnastics yahwina bhuronzi
text: CHIKWATA chenyika chegymnastics chakahwina menduru yebhuronzi kumakwikwi eAfrican Union Sports Council (AUSC) Region 5 Youth Games ayo akaitirwa kuLilongwe, kuMalawi.   Zimbabwe yakapedza iri pechitatu kumashure kweSouth Africa iyo yakahwina menduru yegoridhe neAngola yakatora nhamba yechipiri ikahwinha yesirivha.   Chikwata cheZim gymnastics chaive nevatambi vanosanganisira Alexandra Chenelle Hencil, Maitaishe Naomi Chikuni, Nontokozo Makanaka Sibanda, Shameela Naida Fazilahmed, Pride Nyagura, Tatenda Kajonde, Tanatswa Clement Mutowo naLennon Kutenda Kagona.   Murairidzi wechikwata ichi – Rodwell Ngadziore – anoti vatambi vake vakadadisa nekupedza vari pechitatu uye anoona chiedza chakanaka mune remangwana zvekuti vanogona kuzokwikwidza mumitambo mikuru yemuAfrica.   Anoti vatambi vazhinji vaive muchikwata chake aka ndiko kekutanga kavo kuenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu.   “Tine mufaro mukuru nekuhwina kwatakaita bhuronzi mumutambo uyu wemagymnastics. Zvinorakidza kuti remangwana rechikwata chedu rakajeka zvikuru nekuti tichitarisa vatambi vari muchikwata chedu, vadiki vanotangira kubva pamakore 13 kusvika pa18 okuberekwa chaiwo.   “Isu sevarairidzi takasarudza kutakura vatambi vane makore mashoma ivavo kuti tiende navo kuMalawi nechinangwa chekuti vakure mumutambo uyu.   “Tinoziva kuti pavachazokera, vanogona kutorwa zvekuzvekutosvika pakuhwina menduru yegoridhe chaiyo,” anodaro Ngadziore.   Zvakadaro, mumitambo yese, chikwata cheTeam Zimbabwe chakakwanisa kuhwina menduru dzinodarika 13 kuAUSC Region 5 mumitambo yakasiyana. Mutambi weTaekwondo, Clarity Ndhlovu, akahwina menduru yesirivha kumakwikwi aya.

headline: ‘Coach wemaWarriors mutsva munaNdira’
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti richatanga kutsvaga murairidzi mutsva wemaWarriors munaNdira apo pachange papera kondirakiti yaJoey “Mafero” Antipas uyo akafanobata chigaro chekurairidza chikwata ichi.   Kondirakiti yaAntipas  — uyo anorairidza Chicken Inn zvakare — ichapera nemusi wa31 Zvita.   Antipas akagadzwa kuti afanobata chigaro chekurairidza maWarriors zvichitevera kusiya basa kwakaitwa naSunday “Mhofu” Chidzambwa apo maWarriors aive achangobva kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mukushi wemashoko weZifa, Xolisani Gwesela — uyo anove zvakare competitions manager — anoti Antipas ndiye ari kurairidza chikwata ichi kusvika gore rino rapera uye vachazozivisa kuti ndiani achatora chigaro ichi.   “Parizvino Joey Antipas ndiye ari panyanga uye kondirakiti yake yatinayo ichapera musi wa31 Zvita gore rino, kubva ipapo ndipo tichazozivisa nyika kuti tave kufamba sei,” anodaro.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti parizvino Zifa yambokurukura nevarairidzi vangani kana kuti vangani vakauya kwavari vachitsvaga basa rekurairidza maWarriors,  Gwesela anoti, “Sekutaura kwandaita, tichakuzivisai kana musi wa31 Zvita wadarika apo kondirakiti yedu naAntipas inenge yapera.”   Mwedzi unotevera maWarriors achatanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu e2021 Africa Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon uye Antipas ndiye ari kutarisirwa kutungamira chikwata ichi.

headline: Zhoya apihwa ‘red card’ neFIFA
text: AIMBOVE munyori mukuru wevaridzi vepembe kuZIFA, Obert Zhoya, akatemerwa zvirango zvekuti asave nechekuita nenhabvu kwemakore mashanu zvichitevera kubatwa kwaakaitwa nemhosva yekushungurudza zvine chekuita nebonde varidzi vepembe vechidzimai.   Akabva aripiswa US$20 400.   Zhoya akasiya chigaro chake muna Kubvumbi gore rino apo FIFA yakatanga kuferefeta nyaya yakaendeswa kwavari nevanhu vaimupomera mhosva.   Zhoya akawanikwa aine mhosva nesangano reFIFA Adjudicatory Independent Ethics Committee. Muchinyorwa, FIFA, iyo isingade kunzwa nyaya dzine chekuita nekushungurudzwa, inoti chikwata chaiferefeta nyaya iyi chakagutsikana nehumboo hwachakawana panyaya yaZhoya.   “Mushure mekunyatsoongorora humboo hwakabva kune vakashungurudzwa zvichitevera kuferefetwa kwakaitwa nyaya iyi, chikwata cheInvestigatory neAdjudicatory Chamber chakagutsikana kuti Zhoya akatyora mutemo weArticle 23 (Protection of physical and mental integrity), Art. 25 (Abuse of position) uye Article 13 (General duties) yeCode of Ethics,” chinodaro chinyorwa cheFIFA.   Zhoya akaziviswa nezvemutongo wake uyu nezuro, zuva iro pakabva patanga zvirango zvaakatemerwa. Aimbove shefu waZhoya, Bryton Malandule ari kupomerwawo mhosva yekushungurudza varidzi vepembe vachidzimai uye nyaya yake iri kuferefetwa.   Nyaya dzekushungurudzwa nenzira yepabonde munhabvu, kubva kuhutungamiri kusvika kuvatsigiri, huri kuwanda muZimbabwe zvekuti vanamazvikokota vanoti nyaya yaZhoya inofanirwa kuve mucherechedzo kune vangade kuzopara mhosva dzakadai mune remangwana.

headline: Simudzirai nhabvu yevechidiki’
text: ZVIKWATA zvenhabvu zvinokwikwidza muDivision One kana muPremier League zvokurudzirwa kuti zvikoshese vatambi vechidiki nechinangwa chekusimudzira matarenda avo kuti vagozove vatambi vemangwana.   Kurudziro iyi yakapihwa nasachigaro weNorthern Region Division One, Martin Kweza, achiti kuti nhabvu yemuno ibudirire zvakakosha kuti zvikwata zvipe mikana kune vechidiki.   Anoti kuNorthern Region, zvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza vakazvitaurira kuti zvinofanirwa kuve zvine vatambi vashanu kana kudarika vane makore ari pasi pe18 ekuberekwa avo vavanoda kuona vachitamba masvondo ese.   Izvi, anodaro Kweza, zvinobatsira kuti nhabvu irambe ichikura pamwe nekuti vatambi ava vagofambira mberi mumutambo uyu.   Anoti kuwanza vatambi vechikuru muzvikwata hakubatsire sezvo zvichidzosera nhabvu kumashure uye nekushaisa vechidiki mikana yekusimukira mumutambo uyu.   “Donzvo redu isu kuvaka vatambi vechidiki kuti vasimukire vagotimirira vachienda kunotambira kunze kwenyika kune zvikwata zvakasiyana. Ndiko kusaka isu tichikurudzira zvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza muNorthern Region kuti ngazvive nevatambi vashanu kana kudarika vane makore ari pasi pe18 ekuberekwa nekuti chatinoda kuona vechidiki vachivakwa tarenda ravo.   “Kungowanza madhara ega hakubatsire uye hakuna kwamunosvika nechikwata nekuti madhara anenge achembera. Ndiko kusaka muchiona kuti zvikwata zvinobva muNorthern Region pazvinopinda muPSL zvinosvika zvichitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura nekuti chikwata chinenge chakaumbwa chine vechidiki vakawanda.   “Tinoona kuti madhara mazhinji kana apera anouya kuzopedzera nguva yavo muDivision One voshaisa vechidiki mukana. Asi tinoti ipai mukana kune vechidiki uye madhara musamarase zvachose nekuti vanodiwa kudzikamisa vechidiki nekubatsira kuvaumba,” anodaro Kweza.   Pari zvino pazvikwata zvinokwikwidza muPremier League, zvitatu zvinoti Ngezi Platinum Stars, Harare City neHerentals ndizvo zvine vechidiki vanokwikwidza muNorthern Region Division One.   Zvikwata zvevechidiki izvi zvnoti Ngezi Platinum Under-19, Harare City Curbs neHerentals U-20.   Kuchitiwo Highlanders ndiyo yega ine chikwata chinokwikwidza muSouthern Region Division One.   Kweza anoti kana zvikwata zvakawanda zvemuPSL zvikave nevatambi vanokwikwidza muDivision One zvinobatsirikana kuburikidza nekubika vatambi uye hazvizombonetsekane nekutenga vatambi.   “Zvikwata zvose zvemuPSL zvikaita vechidiki vanokwikwidza muDivision One, zvinobatsira kubika vatambi vakawanda uye hakuna chikwata chinozombonetsekana nekutenga vatambi nekuti vanenge varipo vakawanda.   “Saka kurudziro iri kuzvikwata zvose kuti itaiwo zvikwata zvenyu zvevechidiki zviri muDivision One uye koshesai kubika vatambi vechidiki,” anodaro Kweza.

headline: Chisora orovana naTakam
text: (34) acharwa naCarlos Takam (37) apo vanenge vachitsigira mutambo waDillian Whyte naJoseph Parker.   Chisora (ari pamufananidzo kurudyi) – uyo anokwikwidza muboka reheavyweight – ari kumhanyidzana nenguva kuti azvirakidze kuti anogona kurwira mabhande makuru zvichitevera kukundwa kwaakaitwa katatu mumitambo yake mitanhatu yadarika.   Takam, anove wekuFrance asi ari chizvarwa chekuCameroon, akarakidza kuti anogona kuzvimirira apo akamisidzana naAnthony Joshua kusvika muround rechi10 muna Gumiguru gore radarika, asi kubva ipapo haana kuzombokwikwidza zvakare.   Akazopinzwa kuti akwikwidze mumutambo uyu pakupedzisira asi akarwa semvumba zvakashamisa vazhinji zvisinei kuti akazorikitwa hake naAJ muround rechi10.   “Kudivi raDel Boy uyu mukana wake wekupedzisira kuti arwe aende pamusoro pevamwe vatambi vetsiva uye kunaTakam mumwe mukana wake wekurwira kuti azorwire mamwe mabhande makuru etsiva zvichitevera kurwa kwaakaita naAJ zvinonwisa mvura,” anodaro puromota wetsiva, Eddie Hearn.   “Ndinonzwa manyukunyuku kuti tave kuronga mutambo uyu weheavyweight uyo ndinoona uchinakidza zvikuru kukunda ngoma kurira mwedzi unotevera, mutambo mukuru uyu.” – SportsMail boxing

headline: Hatina chekutaura: Zifa
text: MUTAURIRI weZimbabwe Football Association – Xolisani Gwesela – anoti havana chekutaura zvichitevera kumbomiswa basa kwaitwa vatungamiri veZifa neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) nhasi.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti Zifa inoti kudii nedanho ratorwa neSRC, Gwesela anoti, “Handikwanise kupindura mubvunzo iwoyo, kana muchida kuziva zvakawanda taurai neSRC mubvunze zvose vanokubatsirai.”   Nhasi mangwanani SRC yazivisa nezvekumisa kwayaita basa bhodhi reZifa nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda izvo iri kupomera sangano renhabvu iro rinotungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo.   Zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvamisirwa Zifa basa zvinosanganisira kusashandisa nemazvo mari yeveruzhinji pamwe nekutadza kupa umboo hwekuti mari iyi yakashandiswei, kutumira zvikwata zvenyika kunokwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana kunze zvisina kupihwa mvumo sezvinodiwa pasi pemutemo wekurwisa denda reCovid-19 uye mashoko ekushungurudzwa kwevaridzi vepembe vechidzimai.   Nyika yamirira kuona kuti sangano reFifa richatora matanho api kuZimbabwe sezvo isingatendere kuti hurumende dzipindire munyaya dzenhabvu.

headline: Germany Yoburitswa Mumakwikwi eWorld Cup
text: Germany iyo yakasimudza mukombe weWorld Cup kuBrazil muna 2014 nezuro yakaburitswa muchikamu chekutanga chemakwikwi aya kuRussia mushure mekurohwa 2-0 neSouth Korea muGroup F.  Mune mumwe mutambo muGroup iri, Sweden yakatova Mexico 3-0 asi nyika mbiri idzi dzakabudirira kuenda muchikamu chechipiri. Germany yapinda munhoroondo yezvikwata zvakasimudza mukombe zvozobuditswa muchikamu chekutanga. izvi ndizvo zvakaitwa France, Italy neSpain. Mitambo yenhabvu yeWorld Cup iri kutambirwa kuRussia iri kuenderera mberi nhasi. Pane mumwe mutambo wakatambwa nezuro muGroup E, Brazil 2- Serbia 0, Costa rica 2, Switerland 2. Nhasi muGroup H mitambo iriko yakamira yakadai, Senegal neColumbiA kochizoti Japan nePoland. Muzvikwata zvabudirira mukupinda muzvikwata gumi nezvitanhatu kana kuti Round of 16, France iri kutamba neArgentina musi weMugovera na 4 masikati panguva imwe Uruguay ichitamba nePortugal. Nemusi weSvondo Spain iri kutamba neRussia musi nenguva dza 4 masikati apo Croatia inenge ichitamba ne Denmark. Mumwe mutambo pakati peBrazil neMexico unenge uriko nemusi weMuvhuro.

headline: MaChevrons ofara
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chigere mudenga rechinomwe zvichitevera kukunda kwachakaita cheBangladesh mumitambo yeTwenty20 International Series (T20) pamwe chete neyeOne Day International (ODI).   MaChevrons ange aine makore anodarika mapfumbamwe asati ambokunda Bangladesh mumitambo yeODI, izvo akazoita svondo radarika apo akahwina mitambo miviri yavakatamba ndokuhwina series iyi vaine mumwe mutambo usati watambwa.   Mumitambo mitatu yeT20 yakatambwa nezvikwata zviviri izvi, maChevrons akahwina miviri, Bangladesh ndokuhwina mumwe chete kuchiti yeODI yatambwa kusvika pari zvino, maChevrons ahwina miviri (wechitatu wakatambwa bepa rino richitodhindwa).   Pamitambo iyi, mutambi wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza ange achitamba seakasvikirwa izvo zvakamuona achitamba cricket inonwisa mvura ndokubatsira maChevrons kuhwina. Anotungamira maChevrons, Regis Chakabva anoti kuhwina kwavakaita kwakaunza mufaro mukuru kuchikwata chavo pamwe nevatsigiri sezvo nguva yange yareba vasati vambokunda Bangladesh.   Anoti kushandura kwavakaita matambiro chimwe chezvikonzero zvakabatsira kuti vahwine mutambo uyu. “Nguva yange yareba tichitatarika kukunda Bangladesh asi tadzoka, ndinoona kunge kushandura matambiro kwatakaita ndiko kumwe kwakabatsira kuti tinge tiri patiri nhasi, tichitamba mhando yecricket yepamusoro.   “Asi nguva pfupi yadarika tange tichibata mhando yecricket yepamusoro, uye Sikandar Raza semitambo yadarika, ange achitamba cricket zvinonwisa mvura. “Tinovimba kuti tikaramba takadaro tinoenda mberi tichisimukira sechikwata,” akadaro Chakabva.   Vatsigiri vecricket vamwe vange vachiti kudzorwa kwakaita Dave Houghton kuzorairidza maChevrons ndiko kumwe kwakabatsira kushandura matambiro emaChevrons ayo ange achingohwina mitambo yose yaange achitamba kunze kwemumwe weT20i uyo vakakundwa neBangladesh asi vakazohwina mutambo wose sezvo pamitambo mitatu maChevrons akakunda pamiviri.

headline: Dynamos Yotatsurana neFC Platinum Mumutambo Wakakosha weCastle Premier Soccer League
text: Dyanamos iyo ine gakava mumba mayo iri kutarisirwa kutamba nechikwata chiri kutungamira gungano reCastle Premier Soccer Leagur cheFC Platinum mumutambo wakatarisirwa neveruzhinji munyika neMugovera. Nhengo yeDynamos Supporters Association Muzvare Judith Nyatsanza vanoti vateveri vechikwata ichi vanofanira kubatana vakananga kuZvishavane kuti vanokunda FC Platinum. Chikwata ichi chirikubaka moto nekudzima zvekuti vateveri vavo havasisina chivimbo nechikwata chavo mumitambo mitanhatu yasara. Muongorori wezvemitambo VaDannyboy Muneri vanoti vachitarisa matambiro anga achiita zvikwata izvi Kugona Kunenge Kudada iri kukunda. VaMuneri vanofembera zvibodzwa zvavanofunga kuti FC Platinum inokunda nazvo. Chikwata chiri pachidanho chechitatu Highlanders chiri pamusha neMutare City Rovers apo Caps United iri pamusha zvekare neTsholotsho Pirates. Mutare City Rovers irikusangana ne Ngezi Platinum Stars panguva iyo Triangle ine Chapungu. ZPC Kariba ichatamba neHarare City Chicken Inn ichivhara musangano neNgezi Platinum Stars

headline: Kasikana (8) shasha yemotor-cross
text: KASIKANA kemakore masere okuberekwa koita zvinorova mumutambo wemotor-cross izvo zviri kukaona kachitatsurana nevakomana vakuru kwakari mumujaho yakasiyana.   Kare mujaho wemotor-cross waizivikanwa uri wevarume asi kuzouya kwakaita Tanya Muzinda, uyo akwanisa kunokwikwidza kunyika dzakasiyana dzekunze achihwina mikombe yakawanda, kwabva kwavhurira mikana vamwe vasikana vakaita saMufaro Kabasa (8) uyo ave kutevera mumatsimba ake.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, Mufaro anoti chishuwo chake kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe sezvinoitwa naTanya kuburikidza nekuhwina mibairo yakawanda kunze kwenyika.   “Ndakazviona kuti hapana mutambo unonzi ndewevakomana chete, isu vasikana tinogona kuzviitawo uye pasina chinotikanganisa.   “Ndakazvarwa ndichingofarira kuchovha bhasikoro uye ndichikwikwidza nevakomana kumaraini. Pandakanzwa nezvaTanya ndipo ndakati ndinokwanisa kuzviitawo uye ndokutanga kukwikwidza kuDonnybrook.   “Hapana chinombonditadzisa kusvika kure nekuti zvese zviripo zvinondibatsira kuti ndibudirire,” anodaro Mufaro. Shasha iyi parizvino iri kuita Grade 4 pachikoro cheGroombridge Primary, muHarare uye anoti dzidzo ndiwo musimboti wezvose muhupenyu hwake nekudaro anoikoshesa sezvaanoita mutambo wemotor-cross.   Anoti paanoenda kuchikoro, haasiye mukurumbira waave nawo uchimupinda mumusoro asi anongoita zvefundo yake. “Fundo yakakosha uye ndiwo musimboti wezvese muhupenyu saka ndinotanga ndaita zvechikoro changu, ndapedza ndochienda kumotor-cross kunoita gadziriro dzangu kana ndakatarisana nemujaho.   “Mazuva ano fundo inodiwa pazvose nekuti mune ramangwana kana ndave kuzoenda kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika handizive kuti zvinofamba sei saka zvakakosha kushanda nesimba kune zvose,” anodaro Mufaro.   Baba vake, Kudakwashe Kabasa uyo anove zvakare maneja wake, anoti chipo chiri pamwana wake chakakosha zvikuru. “Tinokoshesa fundo yaMufaro nemutambo uyu saka ini ndinenge ndiripo nguva dzese ndichimuendesa kuchikoro kana apedza toenda naye kunoita gadziriro dzake. Chishuwo chedu kuona achibudirira mumutambo uyu uye fundo yake achipasa zvakare,” anodaro Kabasa.

headline: Tsigirai Division 1: Mushonga
text: MUNYORI mukuru weZifa Northern Region Division One, Sweeney Mushonga, anoti makambani akawanda anofanirwa kutsigira nhabvu yeDivision One neTwo sezvo kuriko kunobikwa vatambi. Apo pavasisina mitambo yemikombe inoona zvikwata zvemuPremier League zvichitatsurana nezvemaDivision ari pasi, Mushonga anoti mitambo iyi inofanirwa kudzoswa sezvo ichibatsira kusimudzira nhabvu yemuno. “Mazuva ano zvikwata zviri mumaDivision pazvinowana mukana wekutamba nezvemuCastle Premiership panguva yepre-season chete, hapanazve pamwe pazvinosangana nazvo. “Izvi hazvina kunakira nhabvu yedu nekuti zvikwata zvedu zvinofanirwa kumbomhanyisana nezvemuCastle Premiership sezvatinomboona kune dzimwe nyika. “Zvakatonakira isu nhabvu yedu sezvo zvichibatsira kuti zvikwata zviwane mari uye kusimukira kwevatambi kuti vaonekwe nezvimwe zvikwata zvepamusoro,” anodaro Mushonga. Zvakadai, svondo rino kuchange kusingadanwe anonzwa apo zvikwata zvepamusoro zvemuDivision One zvichange zvichitatsurana. Mushowani Stars – iyo iri kutungamira palog mumujaho wekurwira kupinda muPSL – iri kuenda kuMorris Depot uko ichasangana neZRP iyowo yakagara pechitatu palog. Cranborne Bullets, iyo iri kufemera mugotsi meMushowani Stars, ichasangana neHarare City Cubs musi weSvondo kunhandare yeRufaro.

headline: Vorwisa mhirizhonga netsiva
text: Ndooka   SHASHA dzetsiva dzechidzimai dzichamirira Zimbabwe mumutambo uyo vachabandana nevatambi vekune dzimwe nyika wekurwira kodzero dzevanhukadzi unozivikanwa nekunzi Kick Out Girl Child Abuse.   Mutambo uyu uri kurongwa neDeltaforce Boxing Promotions uye uchaparurwa nemusi weChishanu svondo rino apo vatambi ava vachazotatsurana munaMbudzi.   Shasha yetsiva ine mukurumbira – Patience Mastara – achirwira bhande reWBF Women’s International Super Bantamweight pamutambo uyu apo acharwa naJessica Mfinanga wekuTanzania. Murairidzi waMastara anove zvakare mutungamiri weDeltaforce Boxing – Clyde Musonda – anoti pakatanga kunyuka denda reCovid-19, nhau dzekushungurudzwa kwevanhukadzi dzakawedzera zvikuru nekudaro mutambo uyu vakauronga nechinangwa chekupa chenjedzo pamusoro pekuipa kwemhirizhonga mudzimba pamwe nekusimudzira vanhukadzi vanotamba tsiva.   “Vanhukadzi vakatikoshera uye nyaya dzekushungurudzwa kwavo dzakatanga kuwanda zvikuru munguva yelockdown. Saka chinangwa chedu kuti tisimudzire vanhukadzi vadzidze kuzvimirira kana kodzero dzavo dzave kutyorwa.   “Hatidi kunzwa nezvekushungurudzwa kwevanasikana saka mutambo uyu ndewavo wekuvarakidza kuti vakatikoshera, uchange ungori wemadzimai chete,” anodaro Musonda.   Mimwe mitambo ichatambwa munaMbudzi ichaona Cecilia Pitiseni achitatsurana nechimwe chizvarwa chemunyika muno Chiedza Homakama mumutambo weLightweight kuchitiwo nerimwe divi, Anisha Basheel wekuMalawi achasangana naBridget Mbabi wekuDemocratic Republic of Congo.   Musonda anoti mutambo uyu uchange uchitsigirwa neshasha yetsiva yechidzimai yekuCanada — Olivia Gerula — uyo ari kushanda chaizvo kurwisa nyaya dzemhirizhonga kumadzimai.

headline: MUSHEKWI ANE ZVIPO . . . kunze kwebhora anotamba rugby, basketball nemujaho
text: MUNIN’INA waNyasha Mushekwi uyo anove mutambi wemaWarriors nechikwata cheZhejiang Greentown chekuChina – Elvis Mushekwi – anoti mukoma wake munhu ane zvipo zvemitambo yakasiyana izvo zvakamuona achitamba mitambo yakadai serugby nebasketball uye zvenhabvu akaita zvemasanga nazvo.   Mukukura kwake, Nyasha aiitawo zvemutambo wemujaho wekumhanya zvakare. Nhabvu wakange usiri mutambo waaitamba zvakanyanya asi ndiwo wakazomuona achienda kunotambira kunyika dziri kunze dzinosanganisira South Africa, Belgium, Sweden nekuChina uko ari kutambira parizvino.   Elvis anoti Nyasha munhu ane zvipo zvemitambo yakawanda zvekuti dai asina kutamba nhabvu angadai akabudirira mune mimwe mitambo inosanganisira basketball kana rugby.   “Vanhu vanoziva Nyasha achitamba nhabvu asi mukukura kwake aitamba rugby, basketball nemujaho wekumhanya. Basketball yaive shasha manje uye akahwina mibairo yawakanda. Zvenhabvu zvakazongoitikawo asingafungire, akangonozama raki rake ndokupihwa mukana kuCAPS United uye kubva ipapo haana kuzotarira shure,” anodaro Elvis.   Nyasha akatanga kutamba nhabvu mugore ra2008 apo aive kuCAPS United uye ndokuzotengwa neMamelodi Sundowns yekuSouth Africa mushure memakore mashoma ndokugadzira zita rake. Muchinda uyu akazobva achienda kunotambira kuEurope kuzvikwata zvinosanganisira KV Oostende yekuBelgium kozoti Djurgardens yekuSweden uko kwaakanopisa akanwisa ka12 mumitambo 21 yaakatambira chikwata ichi.   Matambiro aakaita kuSweden, ndiwo akamuona achitengwa neDalian Yifang yekuChina iyo yaakatambira kwemakore mana uye ndokubatsira chikwata ichi kubva muDivision One chichizopinda muSuper League umo chiri kutambira parizvino. Ari kuchikwata ichi, Nyasha akambotamba nevatambi vane mukurumbira vakaita saYannick Carrasco wekuBelgium uyo akambotambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira Monaco yekuFrance uye Atletico Madrid yekuSpain kozoti Marek Hamsik wekuSlovakia akambonetsa achitambira Napoli yekuItaly.   Muchikwata ichi maive zvakare nechizvarwa chekuArgentina Nicolas Gaitan uyo aimbotambira Benfica yekuPortugal neAtletico Madrid. Elvis anoti iye naNyasha pamwe nemumwe mukoma wake – Ishamel – nehanzvadzi yavo vakachengetwa naambuya vavo sezvo amai vavo vachigara kunyika yeEngland.   Anoti ambuya vavo vaisada kuti Nyasha atambe nhabvu asi kuti aite zvemabhuku uye nemimwe mitambo asi iye zvino vanodada naye nekubudirira kwaakazoita mumutambo uyu.   “Takakura tichichengetwa nagogo, amai vedu vaenda kuEngland uko vanogara vachishanda. Saka gogo vaida kuti tiite zvemabhuku asi Nyasha akangoshinga akaenderera mberi nenhabvu. Asi nhasi vanodada nekubudirira kwaakaita nemutambo uyu uye kwaasvika nawo nhasi.   “Kuburikidza nenhabvu, ari kutichengeta uye ari kubatsira vanhu vakawanda,” anodaro.   Mumhuri mavo, Nyasha ndiye akakwanisa kutamba nhabvu zvekusvika kure. Ishmael anonzi akambozama raki rake kuCAPS United asi akazofunga zvekusiya ndokutanga kuita zvemabhizimisi.   Elvis anoti iye ari kuenda kuchikoro chekubika sezvo achida kuzoita basa rehuchef.   “Ini ndine rudo munyaya dzekubika, ndofarira kubika zvikuru saka ndizvo zvandiri kuendera kuchikoro. Nyasha ndiye anotondikurudzira kuti ndienderere mberi nezvandinoda kuita. Nhabvu handina hangu kumboita shungu nayo zvakanyanya, asi mumwe mukoma wangu Ishmael ndiye akamboenda kuCAPS United asi haana kuzosvika kure,” anodaro.   Nyasha aive muzvikwata zviviri zvemaWarriors zvakakwikwidza kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations mugore ra2017 kuGabon uye negore rino kuEgypt.

headline: Mamonya onokwikwidza kuSA
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Powerlifting Federation (ZPF) riri mushishi yekuumba chikwata chenyanzvi 10 dzinosimudza masimbi ekuvaka muviri avo vachaenda kunomirira Zimbabwe kumakwikwi achaitwa kunyika yeSouth Africa munguva inotevera.   Muna Chikumi, nyanzvi dzekusimudza masimbi dzepasi rose dzichange dzichirakidzana masimba mumakwikwi eWorld Classic Open Powerlifting Championships ayo achaitirwa kuSun City, kuSouth Africa.   Sachigaro weZPF mupurovhinzi yeHarare, Moses Nyamhotsi, anoti vakatotanga kuita gadziriro dzekuenda kumutambo uyu.   Mumasvondo anotevera, anodaro Nyamhotsi, vachaita mitambo yakawanda yekusarudza chikwata chavo chevatambi 10 – varume vashanu nemadzimai mashanu.   “MunaChikumi, tinoda kutumira chikwata chedu kumutambo weWorld Classic Open Powerlifting Championship kuSouth Africa. Mutambo uyu mukuru uye vatambi vose vanoda chaizvo kuenda kunokwikwidza.   “Isu chinangwa chedu kutumira vatambi vedu 10 vanoti varume vashanu nemadzimai mashanu. Saka mumasvondo anotevera tichange tichiita mitambo yakasiyana tichisarudza vatambi vedu vatinoda kuti vapinde muchikwata chatichazotumira kuenda kuSun City kunomirira nyika kumutambo uyu.   “Tarisiro yedu ndeyekuti chikwata chedu tinge tapedza kuchisarudza munaKurume,” anodaro Nyamhotsi.   Aka kachange kari kekutanga Zimbabwe ichitumira vatambi kumutambo uyu.   Nyamhotsi anoti vanotarisira kuti chikwata chavo chiende kunobata basa sebasa kumakwikwi aya.   “Kuenda kwatichaita kuSouth Africa, tinoda kuti chikwata chedu chigonobata basa sebasa kwete kuenda kunozadzikisa chete.   Tiri kuda kutonohwina, kunyangwe tichiziva hedu kuti mutoro wacho unenge wakakura sezvo chikwata chedu chichasangana nedzimwe shasha dzepasi rose,” anodaro Nyamhotsi.

headline: Breaking...Senegal Yopinda muChikamu Chechipiri Mumakwikwi eFIFA World Cup kuQatar
text: Senegal yave nyika yekutanga muAfrica kupinda muchikamu chechipiri chemakwikwi eWorld Cup kuQatar. Senegal yakunda Ecuador 2-1 muGroup A. Yabudirira kuenda kuchikamu chenyika gumi nenhatu kana kuti Group of 16 pamwe neNetherlands yakunda Qatar 2-0 muGroup A zvekare. No media source currently available

headline: Argentina Yosimudza Mukombe weWorld Cup keChitatu
text: Argentina yasimudza mukombe weFIFA World Cup kechitatu munhoroondo yenyika iyi mushure mekurova France 4-2 mumapenalties kuQatar. Argentina yakasimudza mukombe uyu kekutanga muna 1978 pawakatambirwa munyika iyi ichi ichitungamirwa nakaputeni wayo Daniel Passarella. Yakarova Netherlands 3-1. Yakazosimudza mukombe uyu zvekare muna 1986 ichitungamirirwa naDiego Maradona. Argentina yakarova West Germany 3-2 kumakwikwi akatambirwa kuMexico. Mumutambo wanhasi wange uchinakidza zvikuru, France neArgentina dzaita mangange 3-3 dzisati dzaenda kumapenalties. Argentina ndiyo yatanga kutungamira 2-0 muchikamu chekutanga mushure mekunge Lionel Messi anwisa penalty papera mamaminitsi makumi matatu nerimwe, (31’ mins), Angel Di Maria akanwisa chechipiri mushure memaminetsi makumi matatu nematanhatu, (36’mins).  Asi muchikamu chechipiri, Kylian Mbappe anwisa mushure memaminetsi makumi masere uye makumi masere nerimwe, (80’ ne 81’). Mutambo uyu wazoenda munguva yemuwedzeredzwa kana kuti extra time. Messi anwisa mushure memaminetsi zana nemasere (108’), Mbappe achizonwisa mushure nemaminetsi zana negumi nemasere (118’) . Nezvibodzwa zvitatu izvi, Mbappe ndiye anwisa zvibodzwa zvakawanda kudarika vamwe vatambi vose kuWorld Cip aine zvibodzwa zvisere achiteverwa naMessi ane zvinomwe. Mbappe apihwa mukombe wekurova mambure kakawanda kana kuti Golden Boot. Messi ndiye apihwa mukombe wekukunda vamwe vose kumakwikwi aya kana kuti Golden Ball.  Emiliano Martinez wekuArgentina ndiye akunda vamwe vabati vepagedhi vose kana kuti Golden Glove Award. Akunda vamwe vatambi vechidiki vose kana kuti Best youngster mutambi weArgentina zvekare Enzo Fernandez. Ane makore makumi maviri nerimwe.

headline: Vogadzirira kupanana zvematsenganzungu
text: VATAMBI vetsiva vane chitsama votarisirwa kubandana mumutambo wePound for pound Knockout Covid Boxing Series uchatambwa nemusi wa5 Chikumi kuHarare Showgrounds.   Mutambo uyu uri kurongwa neDeltaforce Boxing iyo inotungamirirwa naClyde Musonda uye uchaona vatambi 16 vachirwa mumitambo misere.   Mutambo mukuru pazuva iri uchange uri waFreeman Mabvongwe uyo acharwira bhande reZimbabwe Welteright naPeterson Machinjike.   Clyde Musonda, anove zvakare murairidzi wevatambi vetsiva vazhinji, anoti mutambo uyu uchabatsira zvakanyanya sezvo vatambi vange vave nenguva ndefu vasingakwikwidze zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose munaKurume gora rapera senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Anoti chishuvo chavo kuona vatambi vari kusimukira vachiwaniswa mikana yekukwikwidza nekugadzira mazita avo kuitira kuti vagonorwira mabhande akasiyana kunze kwenyika.   “Isu chishuwo chedu kuona vatambi vetsiva vachisimukira nekuwana mikana yekugadzira mazita avo. Nekuda kweCovid-19, mitambo yange yakamiswa uye vatambi hupenyu hwavo hwakakanganiswa zvikuru. Saka isu taronga mutambo weKnockout Covid, tinoda kuirwisa kuti ngaiende Covid-19 itisiye tiite mabasa edu atange tajaira hupenyu hwedu hudzokere pahwainge huri kare,” anodaro.   Mutambo wePound for pound knockout Covid boxing series ndewechipiri wetsiva kurongwa muno kubva mitambo payakapihwa mvumo yekunzi ichiitwa munyika.   “Tiri palockdown, taienda nevamwe vatambi kunze kunyika dzakaita seTanzania vachinokwikwidza ikoko, asi vange vari vashoma. Saka iye zvino vatambi vakawanda vave nemukana wekuzoenda kunorwira kunze kwenyika asi hunge vakatamba zvinonwisa mvura mitambo yatinovarongera muno,” anodaro Musonda.

headline: ‘Covid-19 yaondonga mutambo wenetball’
text: MUTAMBI wenetball wechikwata chenyika chemaGems  Felistas Kwangwa — uyo anove kaputeni — anoti coronavirus yakamisa zvinhu zvakawanda muhupenyu hwake sezvo mutambo uyu uriwo unomuraramisa.   Kwangwa vazhinji vanomuziva ari mumwe wevatambi akatamba netball yainwisa mvura apo maGems akaenda kunokwikwidza kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup Liverpool 2019.   Achidzoka kubva kumutambo uyu, akasvika achitsiva Perpetual Siyachitema ndokugadzwa kuve kaputeni wechikwata ichi.   Kwangwa anoti kusawana mukana wekutamba mutambo uyu unomuraramisa iye pamwe nevatambi vakasiyana, kuri kurwadza uye kudzosera hupenyu hwavo kumashure.   “Zvinhu hazvina hazvo kumira zvakanaka, hatina kumbozvifungidzira kuti coronavirus ndizvo zvaichaita izvi.   Hatina kukanganiswa isu tega, asi pasi rese riri kuchema nechirwere ichi,” anodaro.   Mwedzi uno chikwata chemaGems chaifanirwa kunge chaenda kunokwikwidza kune mumwe mutambo kunyika yeRepublic of Wales asi wakamiswa nekuda kweCovid-19.   “Mwedzi uno tange tichifanirwa kunge taenda kuWales kunokwikwidza kune mumwe mutambo asi zvese zvakaenda mudondo.   Tave kungomirira pachapera coronavirus tozoona kuti tozvifambisa sei.   “Asi iye zvino tiri kuita gadziriro dzedu tiri kudzimba sezvo takangonzi tigare takagadzirira nehutungamiri hwedu nekuti tinogona kunotamba bhora kana ‘lockdown’ ikapera. Ndofunga pane zviri kurongwa,” anodaro Kwangwa.   Parizvino Kwangwa ari kugara kuZvishavane uko anoshanda.   “Ndiri kuZvishavane izvezvi, ndine vamwe vatambi vemaGems vatatu saka tinoita tichimbobatana tichiita gadziriro dzedu pamwechete.   “Vamwe vari kunzvimbo dzakasiyana munyika tinokurukura paWhatsApp tichitumirana mavhidhiyo uye tichirakidzana kugadzirira kwatinenge tichiita,” anodaro Kwangwa.

headline: ‘TAGADZIRIRA LIVERPOOL’. . . tichigara hedu kuStodart: Chipandu
text: MUMAZUVA makumi matanhatu nemana ari kutevera, chikwata chenyika chemutambo wenetball – icho chinozivikanwa nezita rekuti maGems – chichange chotatsurana nedzimwe shasha dzemutambo uyu kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Nyika gumi nenhanhatu dzichakwikwidza munhandare yeEcho Arena kubva musi wa12 kusvika 21 Chikunguru uye gadziriro dzemutambo mukuru uyu dzasvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo.   Mutungamiriri wesangano reZimbabwe Netball Association, Leticia Chipandu, anoti ari kushushikana nekugunun’una kuri kuita vamwe vatsigiri vemutambo uyu.   Izvi zvinobva pakuti mazuva mashoma adarika, vamwe vatsigiri vakanyunyuta vachiti sei maGems ari kugara kuMbare munguva yegadziriro dzavo?   Gurukota revechidiki, mitambo nezvekutandara, Dr Kirsty Coventry, vakanyorawo padandemutande reTwitter vachiti, “. . . kubva zvandakagara pasi nevatungamiri venetball gore rakapera muna Mbudzi, gadziriro dziri kufamba negwara chairo.   “Takavavimbisa rutsigiro rwuzere maringe neWorld Cup uye nazvino tiri kuvatsigira uye hatisi kuzosanduka.”   Chipandu anoti Hurumende iri kuvatsigira zvizere pagadziriro dzechikwata ichi.   “Hurumende iri kutsigira zvizere chikwata chemaGems mugadziriro dzeWorld Cup yatatarisana nayo munaChikunguru.   “Pari zvino, (Hurumende) yakatobhadhara imwe yemari inodiwa kuti tikwanise kukwikwidza mumitambo iyi.   “Imwe yemari yasara, Hurumende yakavimbisa kuti ichabhadhara zvizere nenguva inodiwa,” anodaro Chipandu.   Pari zvino chikwata ichi chiri kuUganda uko kwachiri kukwikwidzana necheko cheShe Cranes segadziriro dzeWorld Cup.   Chipandu anoti kuburirira kwerwendo urwu kunoratidza kuti Hurumende iri kutsigira zvizere chikwata ichi.   Panyaya yekugara kwemaGems kuMbare, Chipandu anoti Mbare Stodart Netball Complex ine nhoroondo yakakosha kuvatambi.   “Munhandare yeStodart Netball Complex mune hudzamu hurimo kuvatambi venetball, nhoroondo yatinovimba kuti yakatikoshera patiri kugadzirira World Cup.   “Takakokwa kunzi tiuye kuzogara kuBelvedere Technical Teachers’ College nekuZESA Training Grounds asi nzvimbo idzi takati tichazodzishandisa pane dzimwe gadziriro.   “Stodart zvakare ndiyo nzvimbo inozivikanwa nevatsigiri vedu, naizvozvo takaona zvakakosha kuti tigare ikoko kuitira vatsigiri,” anodaro.   MaGems anotarisirwa kusimuka musi wa7 Chikunguru akananga kuEngland.   Mukuenda mhiri kwemwakungwa, Chipandu anoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti vasikana vose vari makumi maviri vari kuita gadziriro vaende.   Pagadziriro idzi, ndipo pachabviswa gumi nevana vachanotamba kuWorld Cup.   “Tinoda kutakura chikwata chose pakuenda kuEngland.   “Aka ndekekutanga kuti Zimbabwe isvike kuWorld Cup naizvozvo tinoda kuti vatambi vedu vaende vaine zvakakwana zvokunotambisa zvichireva kuti isu tinofanira kutsigirana neHurumende mukutsvaga rubatsiro,” anodaro Chipandu.   Patience Kabanda wekuSports and Recreation Commission anotsinhira kuti gadziriro dzechikwata ichi dziri kufamba negwara kwaro.   Anoti ZINA yakatoendesa magwaro ehurongwa hwayo naizvozvo Hurumende iri mubishi kuti igadzirise zvose zvinodiwa.   “Zvinosuwisa chaizvo kuti vamwe vari kutaura zvakasunama maringe negadziriro idzi, asi zvinova zvisiri izvo zviri kuitika.   “Gadziriro dziri mugwara uye seSRC, tiri kuvatsigira zvizere nekuvapa zvose zvinodiwa.   “Tinovimbisa kuti vasikana vachafamba zvakanaka kunomiririra nyika,” anodaro Kabanda.   Kumutambo weWorld Cup uyu, Zimbabwe yakaiswa muchikwata cheGroup A pamwe chete nenyika dzinoti Australia, Northern Ireland neSri Lanka.   Zimbabwe yakabudirira kupinda mumakwishu aya mushure mekunge yakunda mumitambo yemaAfrican Championships akatambirwa kuZambia muna Gunyana gore rakapera.   Uganda, South Africa neMalawi dzichanokwikwidzawo kuWorld Cup.

headline: Mutambi weFC Platinum, Walter Musona, Anosimudza Mukomwe weSoccer Star of The Year 2022
text: Mutambi wechikwata cheFC Platinum, Walter Musona, ari kunyemwerera akananga kubhanga mushure mekutora mukombe we2022 Castle Lager Soccer Star of the Year pamabiko akaitwa muHarare neChishanu manheru. Musona akatambidzwa mari inoita iyo zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti US$5000.00, mushure mekutora mukombe une chiremera chikuru munhabvu yemunyika weCastle Soccer Star of the Year wemwaka uno. Mari iyi imari yakawandisa zvikuru munyika muno pachitariswa mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika. Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaTinashe Museti vanoti Musona anokodzera nekutora mukombe weligi kwaakaita nechikwata chake. William Manhondo we Caps United akatendwa nemari inoita iyo zviuru zvitatu zvemadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$3000.00 mushure mekupedza ari pachinhanho chechipiri. VaMuseti vanoti ndipo paanofanira kuve ari nekuti hapana chaakabuda nacho chinobatika neCaps United kunze kwekurwira nzvimbo yavo mugungano iri. Frank Makarati weDynamos ndiye akatora chinhanho chechitatu ndokutambidzwa mari inoita iyo zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$2500.00. Chiri kushamisa ndechekuti mutambi weHerentals, Tino Benza, ndiye akavhoterwa nechaunga kunzi ndiye mutambi akatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka uno. Asi pakasarudzwa ma Soccer Star, veruzhinji vaitonyunyuta kuti Benza aive asingakodzere pamberi paBlessing Majarira uyo vanotamba vese kuchikwata chimwechetecho. No media source currently available

headline: NDAKARASA MUKANA: CHARLES MANYUCHI
text: SHASHA yetsiva – Charles Manyuchi – anoti akarasa mukana mukuru mugore ra2017 apo akakundwa naQudratillo Abduqaxorov wekuUzbekistan, kuSingapore izvo zvakamuona achitorerwa bhande raaive naro reWorld Boxing Council Silver Tittle asi kudzoka kwaaita ane chishuwo chekurwa nedzimwe shangwiti dzepasi rose dzinosanganisira Floyd Mayweather (Jr).   Kukundwa kwakaitwa Manyuchi mumutambo uyu kwakamudzorera kumashure sezvo akange ave pedyo nekukwanisa kurwira mabhande makuru etsiva akadai seWBC Championship uye nekusangana nevatambi vane mukurumbira vakaita saAmir Khan wekuEngland, Manny Pacquiao wekuPhilippines naShawn Porter wekuAmerica. Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Manyuchi anoti iye zvino ave munzira kugadzirisa zvakakanganisika kumashure uye achiri nemukana wekudzokera zvakare pamusoro mumutambo uyu.   “Ndakarasa mukana paye pandakakundwa kuSingapore naAbduqaxorov nekuti dai ndakahwina mutambo uyu ndakange ndatosvika pedyo nekutosangana nanaPacquiao uye nedzimwe shasha dzetsiva dzepasi rose. Zvakaitika hazvo asi ndiri kuzvigadzirisa nekuti chishuvo changu kuti ndirwe naManny Pacquaiao, Amir Khan kana naFloyd Mayweather (Jr) chaiye nekuti ndinoti dai adzoka mutsiva nekuti ndiri kuda kumbosangana nayewo,” anodaro.   Manyuchi mwedzi yadarika akahwina mutambo wake weRestoration Fight naPablo Ezequiel Acosta wekuArgentina ndokuhwina mabhande maviri eUBC neGBU izvo zvakamusimudza. Parizvino ave kutarisira kusangana naNordine Orik wekuFrance mwedzi unotevera uye mutambo uyu anofanirwa kuuhwina kuti akwanise kudzokera padanho raaive kare.   Manyuchi anoti mutambo wake naAcosta kudai asina kuuhwina ndipo paibva paperera kutamba kwake tsiva sezvo wainge wakamukoshera mukudzoka kwake.   “Mutambo wangu naAcosta ndiwo wandisvitsa nhasi pandave iye zvino, dai ndakakundwa zvingadai zvakabva zvaperera ipapo asi ndakahwina saka mukana uchiripo uye ndiri kutarisira mutambo uri kutevera naOrik. Ndozviziva kuti ndikauhwina aihwa ndenge ndadzokera pandaive chaipo uye iye zvino ndiri kuvimbisa kuti zvakaitika kare hazvichadzokorodzeke.   “Ndave kumberi chaiko uye ndiri kubata basa sebasa nekuti ndiri kuhwina, handidi kukundwa zvakare,” anodaro.   Muchinda uyu anoti akavamba boka rake iro ari kudzidzisa vatambi vetsiva vari kusimukira rinonzi Charles Manyuchi Boxing Academy.   Vamwe vatambi vari muboka iri vacharwa mitambo yakasiyana apo shasha iyi ichatatsurana naOrik musi wa28 Gunyana kuHarare International Conference Centre.

headline: Afcon: Ngatirongekei
text: VARAIRIDZI nevatsigiri venhabvu votambira nemufaro mukuru draw rekurwira kuenda kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) 2023 iro rakaona Zimbabwe ichiiswa muboka Group K pamwe chete neMorocco, South Africa neLiberia.   Muboka iri muri kutarisirwa kubuda zvikwata zviviri zvichaenda kumutambo mukuru wenhabvu wemuAfrica uyo uchatambirwa kuIvory Coast gore rinotevera.   Murairidzi wenhabvu ane mukurumbira, Luke ‘Vahombe’ Masomere, anoti maWarriors anogona kukunda chero chikwata chipi chemuAfrica asi hunge kana akarongeka chete.   Anoti gadziriro dzekuenda kuIvory Coast dzinofanirwa kutanga izvezvi kwete kumirira mazuva ekupedzisira.   “Draw takariona rakanaka chose, Zimbabwe tinotokunda zvikwata zvose zviri muboka redu, topedzerana nazvo zvose uye tiri kutoenda kuIvory Coast.   “Chinhu chikuru chatinofanirwa kuita kurongeka chete, totanga kuita gadziriro dzedu pachiri nenguva chete.   Kazhinji tinozvikanyira zvinhu zvedu toga nekusarongeka, saka ngatirongeke tigoenda kuIvory Coast,” anodaro Vahombe. Kuchiti murairidzi weCranborne Bullets, Nesbert ‘Yabo’ Saruchera, anoti mazuva ano hakuchina chikwata chinonzi chiri muAfrica sezvo zvose zvichitamba nhabvu yepamusoro.   “Tichitarisa muboka redu, zvikwata zvese zvatichasangana nazvo tinozvikunda, hapana chatinofanirwa kutya. Patichasangana nazvo tinofanirwa kuhwina mitambo yedu yose yemuno tozoenda kwavo kunorwa kuti tibve tiine chibodzwa chete, tikadaro ndinoona tichibuda muboka iri tichienda mberi,” anodaro Yabo.   Mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu, Adomsi Mukwasi, anoti Zimbabwe yatove netikiti rekuenda kuIvory Coast gore rinotevera.   “Tichitarisa zvikwata zvese zvatichasangana nazvo, hapana chingativhundutse kubva pane South Africa, Liberia kana iyo Morocco. Tiri kufanirwa kungorongeka chete,” anodaro Mukwasi.   Aimbove sachigaro weBlue Swallows, Public Mpofu, anotiwo draw rakanaka uye chiri kungodiwa kuti gadziriro dzechikwata chenyika dzitange paine nguva kuitira kuti pasawane chinokanganisa mafambiro achaita mitambo yemaWarriors.   “Draw rakanakisa chaizvo asi chinhu chinongodiwa chete kurongeka, toita gadziriro nguva ichiripo. Pasina izvozvo hapana kwatinoenda, ngatigadzirire pachiri nenguva,” anodaro Mpofu.   Zvakadaro, sangano reConfederation of African Football (CAF) rakazivisa kuti riri kupa Zimbabwe masvondo maviri ekuti idzorere vatungamiriri veZifa pabasa zvichitevera kudzingwa kwavakaitwa vachipomerwa kusaita basa ravo zvakanaka uye kana izvi zvikasaitwa maWarriors anobva aburitswa mumutambo weAfcon.   Nekune rimwe divi, gurukota rezvemitambo nevechidiki, Dr Kirsty Coventry, vanoti mamiriro ezvinhu zvichitevera zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu pasi rose reFifa achazivikanwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera.

headline: Tichiri kuda kuenda kuCHAN: Zifa
text: MANEJA wechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors — Wellington Mpandare — anoti vakanyorera kuHurumende vachikumbira mvumo yekuti vaende kuCameroon kunokwikwidza kumutambo weAfrica Nations Championship (CHAN) uyo unofanirwa kutanga nemusi wa16 Ndira.   MaWariors anofanirwa kusimuka musi wa11 akananga kuCameroon kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu sezvo ariwo achavhurira makwikwi egore rino apo achasangana neCameroon iyo inenge iri pamusha. Zvichitevera matanho akatorwa neHurumende ekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 izvo zvakaona mitambo yose ichimbomiswa munyika, Mpandare anoti sangano rinotungamirira nhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rakabva ranyorera kuHurumende richikumbira mvumo yekuti vatenderwe kuenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo weCHAN.   “Takanyorera kuHurumende tichikumbira mvumo yekuti tigoenda kuCameroon kunokwikwidza kuCHAN.   Asi kutaura kuno tichiri takamirira kunzwa kuti vachati kudii nenhau yacho. Asi isu tiri kuda chaizvo kuenda kunokwikwidza,” anodaro Mpandare.   Svondo radarika, vatambi vapfumbamwe vemaWarriors vakawanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 izvo zvakazotuma murairidzi wechikwata ichi kuti adome vamwe vatambi gumi kuitira kuti kana vakabatwa nedenda iri vakasapora vozovatakura kuenda navo kuCameroon.   Mpandare anoti vatambi vakabatwa neCovid-19 vose vachaongororwa nemusi weChina svondo rino. “Sekuziva kunoitwa, munhu anenge abatwa kuti ane Covid-19 anogara mazuva 10 ari pake oga saka vatambi vedu vose vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vari kwavo voga uye kana zvikasasanduka tine vamwe vatakaudza kuti vagare vakagadziririra.   “Saka nemusi weChina vose vakabatwa kuti vane Covid-19 vachaongororwa zvekare kuti chirwere ichi chichiri mumuviri yavo here kana kuti chakabuda,” anodaro Mpandare.   Kumitambo yeCHAN, maWarriors akaiswa muboka reGroup A rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Cameroon, Mali neBurkina Faso.

headline: Tuchel otsiura Mbappe
text: Saint-Germain, Thomas Tuchel, akaramba kutaura pamusoro penhau yekuti chikwata chake chinogona kutenga mutambi weChelsea, N’Golo Kante.   Kante – uyo akapembera kuhwina mukombe weWorld Cup neFrance gore rino – ari kunzi ari kudiwa kuzotengwa nechikwata ichi chekuFrance chinove shasha dzeLigue 1 mwaka uno.   Mutambi wePSG, Kylian Mbappe, akabuda pachena kuti akasiya katsamba muhomwe dzaKante achiedza kumukurudzira kuti auye kuzotambira nhabvu yake kuchikwata ichi chekuFrance apo vaive kuWorld Cup kuRussia.   Asi, Tuchel anoti hazvina kunaka kutaura pamusoro pezvevatambi vekune zvimwe zvikwata panyaya yekuda kuvatenga. “Hazvina kunaka uye handizvifarire zvachose, uye handizvifarire kana vamwe varairidzi vachitaura pamusoro pevatambi vari kutambira zvimwe zvikwata,” anodaro Tuchel. Saka hapana nyaya panhau yaKante uye hatisi kufunga nezvazvo mwaka uno.”   Apo Tuchel ari kuramba kutaura nezvevamwe vatambi vari kuuya kuchikwata chake, murairidzi wePSG uyu anoti ane chivimbo chikuru chekuti Edinson Cavani haasi kuzobva achienda kuReal Madrid.   Mutambi uyu – uyo anove chizvarwa chekuUruguay – ari kunzi anodiwa kuti azotsive Cristiano Ronaldo uyo akabva achienda kuJuventus nemari inosvika 100 miriyoni paunzi.   Asi achitaura chikwata chake chichangobva kukunda Atletico Madrid 3-2 mumutambo weInternational Champions Cup, Tuchel anoti, “Ndinofunga kuti acharamba ari kuno, hapana ambotaura chinhu kwandiri nezvenyaya yake saka ndinoziva kuti acharamba aripo.   “Hazvina kumbouya mupfungwa dzedu kuti angangoenda, ndakataura naye uye haana kurakidza kuti anoda kubva.” — SportsMail Football

headline: Vatambi vebhora baiwai majekiseni
text: VATAMBI venhabvu uye vatsigiri vemutambo uyu vokurudzirwa kuti vaende kunobaiwa majekiseni emushonga wekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 segadziriro yekutanga kwemitambo iyi iyo iri kutarisirwa kutanga munguva pfupi inotevera.   Kuridziro iyi yakaitwa neaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weDynamos FC – Esther Tayo Mawere – uyo ari mune zvehutano zvekare achiti zvakakosha kuti vatambi venhabvu vabaiwe mushonga wekudzivirira denda iri pamwe nevatsigiri kana vachida kuzowaniswa mukana wekuona nhabvu yePremier Soccer League nekufamba kwenguva.   Nhabvu nemimwe mitambo yose zvakapihwa mvumo yekuti zvichidzoke asi vatambi uye vatungamiriri vemitambo yakasiyana vanofanirwa kunotariswa denda reCovid-19.   Mitambo yose ichange ichitambwa munhandare isina vatsigiri.   Mawere anoti kunze kwekuti vatambi vangovhenekwa vaonekwe kuti vane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete, zvakakosha kuti vabaiwewo majekiseni ekudzivirira chirwere ichi.   “Nhabvu yakadzoswa uye vatambi vanonzi vachange vachitariswa kuti vane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Asi, ini ndinokurudzira kuti vakasununguka ngavabve vaenda kunobaiwa zvekare jekiseni rekudzivirira denda iri kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisambowane mukana wekunyuka.   Vatambi venhabvu vagara vanosangana nevanhu vakawanda uye nhabvu painenge ichitambwa ipapo vanenge vachisangana vakawanda saka kutobaiwa jekiseni uku kwakatokosha nekuti kunobatsira kuvachengetedza kubva kuchirwere ichi,” anodaro Mawere.   Anoti nhabvu yemuno inonetsa kutambwa pasina vatsigiri nekudaro zvakakoshawo kuti vatsigiri vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira nguva inotevera kana vachinge vave kuzotenderwa kuenda kunhandare kunoona mitambo.   “Kurudziro iyi tiri kuipa zvekare kuvatsigiri venhabvu kuti vakasununguka ngavaende kunobaiwa jekiseni.   Hakusi kuti kungobaiwa chete asi zvakatonakira hupenyu hwavo sezvo pavanosangana nevamwe vanhu denda iri vanogona kutapurirana asi akabaiwa jekiseni anenge akachengetedzeka zvake,” anodaro Mawere.

headline: ‘Joshua, Wilder votyanana’
text: akapa chikwata chaDeontay Wilder kusvika pakupera kwevhiki rino kuti mutambi wavo agorwa naAnthony Joshua kana kuti osiyana nazvo voronga zvavo mumwe mutambo naAlexander Povetkin muna Gunyana. Hurukuro dziri kuitwa dzekuronga mutambo uyu pakati pevatambi vaviri ava – Joshua naWilder – avo vasati vambokundwa muboka reheavyweight.   Baba vaHearn, Barry, akatombosangana nevamiriri vaWilder Shelly Finkel kuNew York masvondo adarika kuti vapedzise hurukuro dzekuronga mutambo uyu waJoshua uyo ane mabhande eIBF, WBA neWBO kuti asangane naWilder uyo ane bhande reWBC.   Asi iye zvino Hearn (Jnr) anoti mukana wekuti mutambo uyu uitwe gore rino mudiki sezvo vave kutarisira kuti Joshua arwe naPovetkin muna Gunyana.   Izvi zvinoreva kuti mutambo waJoshua naWilder, uyo uchaburitsa mutambi mumwe achazobata mabhande mana makuru mutsiva, uchambomirwa kuitwa kusvika muna Kukadzi 2019.   Hearn anoti, “Baba vangu vakasangana naShelly uye vave kugara vachikurukura. Vakasangana svondo radarika musi weChishanu, uye vakatitumira mashoko padandemutande musi weMuvhuro mangwanani saka tiri kuvapindura. “Ndinofunga kuti tichazvigadzirisa asi WBA iri kugara ichitibvunza zuva nezuva kuti tave papi uye isu tiri kugara tichiwedzera mazuva ehurukuro acho.” – Sportmail Boxing

headline: Mutasa akapotsa atiny’udza: DeMbare
text: MWAKA wenhabvu wa2018 uchagara mundangariro dzevatsigiri veDynamos sezvo gore rino chikwata ichi chakapona nepaburi retsono kuburitswa muCastle Premiership League.   Dynamos mwaka uno haina kutamba nhabvu yainozivikanwa ichitamba makore ese izvo zvakaona chikwata ichi chichisvika pakushandura varairidzi kanokwana kana.   Pekutanga, DeMbare yakadzinga Lloyd Mutasa ndokumutsiva naBiggie Zuze asi ndokuzomudzinga zvakare ichidzosa Samaita – sezita raMutasa remadunhurirwa – uye ndokuzomudzinga kechipiri achitsiviwa naLloyd Chigowe.   Zvese izvi mumaziso amaneja wechikwata ichi Richard Chihoro anoti zvakakonzereswa naMutasa uyo waanoti aive nehumbimbindoga asingade kushanda nevamwe kana kuteerera mazano aaipihwa pamusoro pechikwata ichi.   “Munoziva nhabvu haidi humbimbindoga, kuti ndiwe unoziva kudarika vamwe vese! Kwete, hazvidi kudaro.   “Nhabvu inoda mushandirapamwe, kana muchida kuhwina munofanirwa kushanda semhuri. Manje Lloyd aisada izvozvo aingoda kushanda ari ega,  asingateerere vamwe.   “Takapotsa tanyura nekuda kwake kusateerera achifunga kuti ari kugona iye pasina zvaaiita,” anodaro Chihoro.

headline: ‘Ngatichitarisai AFCON’
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu iri mubati wepagedhi weRio Tinto nemaWarriors — Raphael Phiri — inoti yave nguva yekutanga kuvaka chikwata chakasimba chichanomirira nyika kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (AFCON) kuCameroon gore rinotevera.   Zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaitwa maWarriors neGhana mumitambo miviri yadarika, inoti 3-1 kuGhana ne1-0 muno nemusi weChipiri, mukana wemaWarriors wekuramba vachirwira kuenda kuQatar World Cup wakabva wapera.   Chikwata chenyika ichi pari zvino changokwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwechete kubva mumitambo mina zvekuti kunyangwe chikahwina mitambo miviri yasara, hapana zvazvichashandura.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Phiri anoti murairidzi wemaWarriors — Norman Mapeza — anofanirwa kushandisa mitambo miviri yasara yechikwata chake muboka reGroup G, iyo ichatambwa munaMbudzi, neSouth Africa uye neEthiopia kugadzirira kuenda kuCameroon.   “Isu senyika zvekufunga kuenda kuWorld Cup zvichiri kure nesu nekuti hatisati tambotora mikombe mikuru yakaita seAFCON asi tinofunga zvekuenda kuWorld Cup.   “Ngatitange tambotsviriridza muno muAfrica nekunetsa kuAFCON pamwe nekukunda zvikwata zvikuru zvakaita seGhana, ndiko kuti tigotange kufunga zveWorld Cup nekuti uko kunoenda shasha. Taenda kuAFCON kakawanda chaizvo asi hapana zvatamboita zvinobatika taenda ikoko.   “Kazhinji tinogara tichingochema-chema tichiti hatiwane mitambo yehushamwari yekugadzirira, miviri yasara ngatiishandise kuita gadziriro dzedu nekuvaka chikwata chedu,” anodaro Phiri. Jimmy Cliff, sezita raPhiri remadunhurirwa iro aizivikanwa naro munhabvu, anoti zvakakosha kuti chikwata chemaWarrioirs chivakwe patsva chiine vatambi vechidiki.   Anoti vatambi vakaita saBrendan Galloway naJordan Zemura vachiri vadiki uye remangwana ravo rakajeka.   “Tine vatambi vakawanda vechidiki, ngavashevedzwe chikwata chemaWarriors chovakwa kubva pavatambi ava. Ngatisangorambe tichingoshevedza madhara chete nekuti vapera, pave kudiwa vechidiki kuti vatakure chikwata ichi kuenda mberi,” anodaro Phiri.   Kubva asendeka shangu dzenhabvu, Phiri ave kuita basa rekurairidza mutambo uyu izvo zvakamuona achirairidza zvikwata zvinosanganisira Golden Valley iyo yaikwikwidza muDivision One.   Pari zvino akavamba chikwata chake cheEiffel Flats United icho chiri kukwikwidza muDivision Two. Zvakadaro, sachigaro wesangano reFriends of the Warriors – Edward Chimedza – anotsinhira mashoko aPhiri achiti maWarriors anofanirwa kushandisa mitambo miviri yasara kuvaka chikwata chichaenda kuAFCON.   “Yave nguva yekutanga gadziriro dzekuenda kuAFCON, mitambo miviri yasara ngaishandiswe kuvaka chikwata chedu chakasimba.   “Zifa ngaipe Norman Mapeza rutsigiro rwose kuti avake chikwata chake chakasimba. Iye zvino haisi nguva yekungoshandura-shandura varairidzi pose pose, tinoda kuti pave nemurairidzi wavanopa kana kondirakiti yemakore mashanu anyatsoshanda kuvaka chikwata chakasimba chaicho,” anodaro Chimedza.

headline: KuZifa handibve ini: Phidza . . . ndiko kukereke kwangu
text: MUTUNGAMIRIRI wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu munyika muno reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa), Phillip Chiyangwa, anoti kukunda kwaakaita musarudzo dzichangobva kuitwa kuti amirire Zvimba South mudare reNational Assembly hakumukanganise kutungamirira sangano iri sezvo asiri mushandi waro.   Mubvunzo mukuru une vatsigiri vakawanda venhabvu parizvino ndewekuti zvichitevera kusarudzwa kwakaitwa Phidza — sezita remadunhurirwa raChiyangwa — kuve mumiriri weZvimba South uye nemutevedzeri wake Omega Sibanda kuve mumiriri weVungu mudare reNational Assembly hazvichavakanganise here kutungamira Zifa?   Pamusoro pezvo, mitemo yeFederation International de Football Association (FIFA) haitendere kuti nhau dzenhabvu dzinenge dzichinetsa dzinge dzichipindirwa neHurumende.   Kana Hurumende ikapindira munyaya dzenhabvu dzinenge dzichinetsa kumasangano akasiyana, nyika iyoyo inotemerwa zvirango zvakasimba neFIFA.

headline: Vemitambo rongekai: Coventry
text: GURUKOTA revechidiki, mitambo nekutandara, Kirsty Coventry, vanoti hutungamiri hwemitambo yese hunofanirwa kurongeka uye kugadzira magwaro anoratidza hurongwa hwavo hwemakore gumi anotevera.   Gurukota iri rakataura mashoko aya pamusangano warakaita nevatori venhau dzezvemitambo vanoshanda vari pasi peZimpapers nemusi weChishanu chadarika muguta reHarare.   Musangano uyu wakapindwa zvakare nasachigaro webhodhi reZimpapers, Dr Tommy Sithole, nachamangwiza wekambani iyi VaPikirayi Deketeke.   “Basa randiri kuita kugadzira nzira yemakore 10 anotevera iyo ichabatsira kuti mitambo yedu muno igosimukira zvekuti rimwe gurukota richazonditsiva mune ramangwana rinosvika basa rakagadzirwa kare, ropfuurira mberi.   “Tiri ipapo zvekare, kumitambo yese muno tiri kuvakurudzira kuti ngavagadzire magwaro avo ayo anoratidza kuti mumakore 10 anotevera vachange vachifambisa sei basa ravo,” vanodaro.   Dr Coventry vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Isu tinoda kuona kuti muchafambisa sei basa renyu uye vechidiki muri kuvasimudzira sei nekuti ndivo vatinofanirwa kugadzirira remangwana ravo.”   Vanoti munyika muno mune hutungamiri hwemitambo yakasiyana inosvika 60 uye 12 chete kusvika pari zvino ndiyo isati yave kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo rezvemitambo.   “Kutanga gore rinotevera, vemitambo ipi neipi vachauya vachitsvaga mari kwandiri vasarirwa nemazuva mashoma kuti vaende kumakwikwi akasiyana, havana kana sendi randinovapa, kuratidza kusarongeka ikoko.   Vamwe vanozotanga kumhanya-mhanya kumapepanhau kunotaura kuti ndiri kuvanyima mari.   “Muno munyika mune mitambo inosvika 60 uye 12 chete kutaura kuno ndiyo isiri kutevedza gwaro ratakavapa nekudaro ivavo hatina mari yatinovapa kusvika vagadzirisa zvatinoda.   Sangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) riripo kuvabatsira kuti magwaro avo arongeke,” vanodaro.

headline: Tarumbwa ‘anwisa’ zvekare . . . apa Quin Tasha pamuviri
text: VATAMBI venhabvu pasi rose, vanoratidza sekuti vanopinda murudo kana kuroora nevanhu vane mukurumbira sewavo. Aimbotungamira chikwata chenyika yeEngland, David Beckham, akaroora tsvarakadenga yaiita zverunako, mutambi wemadhirama uye muimbi Victoria Caroline Beckham, Wayne Rooney akaroorawo Coleen Mary wekuIreland uyo anova munyori uye achishanda pachiteshi cheterevhizheni. Imwe yenyaya dzinogona kunakidza ndeye aimbova mutambi weFC Barcelona, Gerard Pique, uyo akachata neshasha yekuimba yekuColumbia, Shakira.   Zvino aimbove mutambi weHighlanders neChicken Inn – Obidiah Tarumbwa – akapindawo muboka revatambi venhabvu ava zvichitevera kudanana kwaari kuita naQuin Tasha uyo anozivikanwa zvikuru munyaya dzekutamba mimhanzi. Tasha aimbova mutambi wechikwata chevanhukadzi chete cheWhin Quins.   Tarumbwa, uyo akambotambira chikwata chekuBelgium chinonzi Cercle Brugge, anoratidza kuti achiri “kunwisa” zvichitevera kupa pamuviri kwaakaita Quin Tasha.   Vaviri ava vakatanga kudanana makore maviri adarika uye Tasha ane pamuviri pave nemwedzi misere. Kunyangwe zvazvo vaviri ava vasina kuda kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro perudo rwavo, Tasha akatumira mashoko padandemutande kumudiwa wake musi wekupemberera zuva rekuzvarwa kwake 29 Mbudzi, izvo zvakatsinhira kudanana kwavo.   Zvisinei nekuti Tarumbwa ane vana nevamwe vakadzi uye dzimwe nguva vaasingabhadharire mari dzemendenenzi, Tasha ari kuratuidza kusave nehanya nazvo.   “Izuva rako mudiwa wangu uye ndiri kupemberera zuva rino newe. Mwari wemasimba ose vakuropafadze nemakore akawanda azere nebudiriro. “Ndinonzwa kufara nekuve nemunhu ane rudo uye mweya wakanaka sewe muupenyu hwangu.   “Vakazvitaura zvose, vakataura mashoko akaipa pamusoro pako asi handiwirirane nazvo. Mukomana uyu anoshamisa kwandiri. Anotya Mwari, ane ruremekedzo, anotsigira uye nekusimudzira.   “Nguva dzose anenge ari padivi pangu panguva yakanaka neyakaoma, anondiudza nzira dzekugadzirisa matambudziko ose. Ndiye zvose zvandinoda pamunhurume.   “Achava MURUME wangu, achazova DADDY, ndinokuremekedza uye ndinokuda murume iwe #Obidiah Tarumbwa,” anodaro Quin Tasha padandemutande.

headline: Arsenal yopfeka Adidas
text: kupfeka majezi anogadzirwa neAdidas kutanga gore ra2019 ichibva kune ePuma ayo yange ichipfeka bvira makore adarika.   Chibvumirano nePuma change chichiona chikwata ichi chichipihwa mari inosvika 30 miriyoni paunzi pagore kwemakore mashanu.   Chiri kupera gore rinotevera, uye Arsenal ichaona ichiwedzera mari iyi nekutanga kupfeka Adidas. Dhiri itsva iri richaona chikwata ichi chichipihwa 60 miriyoni paunzi pagore kwemakore mashanu anotevera.   Mari iyi ichabatsira murairidzi wechikwata ichi – Unai Emery – gore rinotevera pakuzotenga vatambi vatsva.   Akamanikidzwa kushanda nemari shoma inovsika 70 miriyoni paunzi zvichitevera kutsiva kwaakaita Arsene Wenger.   Arsenal iri kuzama kushanda kuti igadzirise remangwana raAaron Ramsey (27).   Mutambi uyu kondirakiti yake inopera pakupera kwemwaka uno uye anogona kuenda mahara gore rinotevera.   Chelsea iri kuda kutenga Ramsey uye inogona kubhadhara mari inosvika 30 miriyoni yekuunza chizvarwa chekuWales ichi kuchikwata ichi.   Arsenal inogona kutambira mari iyi sezvayakaita mugore ra2012 apo yakatengesa Robin van Persie kuManchester United apo akange aramba kusaina kondirakiti itsva ndokuetengeswa ne22.5 miriyoni paunzi. — SportsMail Football

headline: Haye osendeka tsiva
text: (37) ari kutarisirwa kusendeka magirovhosi ake etsiva izvo zvichamuona achizorora kubva mumutambo uyo waatamba kwemakore anodarika 16. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ange achibva kuruzhinji ekuti shasha iyi ngaichisiya tsiva.Haye akataura padandemutande reTwitter svondo rino kuti ramagwana rake acharizivisa nekuchimbidza uye SportsMail iri kuziva kuti akaronga kuti achisiya mutambo uyu zvichitevera kukundwa kwaakaitwa kaviri kakatevedzana naTony Bellew.   Vazhinji vanoti shasha iyi yaifanirwa kuve yakasiya tsiva paakakundwa naBellew pekutanga gore radarika, apo paakakuvara gumbo rake, uye kuzorikitwa kwaakaitwa zvakare mwedzi uno ndiko kwave kumutuma kuti achisiya mutambo uyu izvo zvakarakidza kuti haasisiriye mutambi waaive kare apo akahwina bhande reWBA heavyweight mugore ra2009.   Mabhande aakahwina mumakore masere ekutanga mumutambo uyu acharangarirwa zvikuru mumakore anotevera sezvo Haye akave mumwe wevatambi vetsiva vepamusoro kwemakore akawanda. Asi anoteverwa nenyaya dzakawanda dzinosvibisa zita rake kubva pakunyepera kutyoka chigumwe zvichitevera kukundwa kwaakaitwa naWladimir Klitschko uye kurwa naDereck Chisora pamberi pevatori venhau (press conference) zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaitwa Chisora naVitali Klitschko mugore ra2019. – SportsMail boxing

headline: Joshua ndomurikita: Tyson Fury
text: anoti ane idi rekuti anokwanisa kukunda Anthony Joshua uyo ane bhande reWorld Heavyweight.   Nhaurwa dzehupenyu hwake uye nedzimwe dzakasiyana dzakaona Fury achimbomira kukwikwidza mutsiva kubva mugore ra2015 apo paakakunda Wladimir Klitschko ndokumutorera mabhande eWBA, IBF neWBO ayo ave naJoshua ose.   Fury achatanga kukwikwidza muna Chikumi uye shasha iyi haisati yambokundwa mutsiva.   Anotarisirwa kukwikwidza kuManchester Arena nemutambi asati ave kuzivikanwa uye kana apedza naye anogona kuzorwa naJoshua.   Paakabvunzwa kuti anofunga kuti anokunda Joshua here, Fury akaudza ITV Good Morning Britain kuti, “Hongu ndinozviziva, dai ndisingazvizive ndisina kumbogara pano ndichitaura zvatiri kutaura izvi. Ndingadai ndiri kuSpain uko ndichinwa hangu Sangria kana zvimwe.   “Hongu, ndozviziva kuti ndozviita nekuti ndinofunga kuti tarenda retsiva ndinaro, ndinofamba nenzira chaiyo uye ndinokwanisa kumisidzana nemutambi akaita saye zvakanaka. Ane simba zvake uye haarwisike naye zviri nyore asi haazosvike pandiri, ini ndave kumberi zvangu.   “Ndinodada hangu naye nezvaaita mumutambo uyu, uye mucherechedzo wakanaka zvikuru kune vamwe vatambi vari kusimukira. Asi ngaachangetedze mabhande ese nekuti ndiri kumuvinga kuzomubvutira manje-manje. Munhu wese mutsiva anoziva shasha chaiyo.” – SportsMail Boxing

headline: Votatsurana mumitambo yenaph
text: makuwerere nomusi weChishanu chino paAlfred Beit Primary, muHarare, apo shasha dzakakunda mumitambo yakasiyana yezvikoro zviri mudunhu reHarare dzichange dzichitatsurana.   Kwayedza neMuvhuro uno yakashanyira zvikwata zvakanga zviri kukwikwidza pachidanho chedistrict zviri pasi peMbare-Hatfield District pachikoro cheNettleton Junior ndokuita hurukuro nazvo.   Mai Lilian Chidovori Tadzingwa, avo vanova sports director paNettleton Junior, vanoti vanasikana vazhinji vepachikoro chavo vakasarudzwa kukwikwidza mumitambo yebhora (ball games).   “Tine chivimbo chekunokunda, saka pachidanho ichi sangano reNational Association of Primary School Heads (NAPH) ndiro richasarudza chikwata chichanomiririra Harare Province pakati pematunhu manomwe ari muHarare. Pamakwikwi atakaita, takasangana nezvimwe zvikoro musi wa8 Chikumi paDavid Livingstone School tikatora nhamba yetatu mumitambo yebhora pakati pezvikoro zvinomwe,” vanodaro.   Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Mukuru wechikoro cheNettleton, VaLeo Busvumani, vanotsigira zvikuru nyaya dzemitambo uye temu ino vakatenga mabhora matsva, zvekushandisa mumitambo yehockey nemimwe midziyo yakawanda. Pachikoro chedu tine vana vane matarenda akawanda zvikuru nekuti handi vose vanogona muchikoro. Saka sevarairidzi, zvakakosha kuti ticherechedze zvimwe zvipo zviri muvana.”   Vanoti sevarairidzi, vanofundisa vana mitambo yakasiyana. Vanoshuvira kuti kudai zvikoro zvakwanisa kuvawanisa rutsigiro rwekuti vanofundiswa humwe hunyanzvi hutsva maringe nezvemitambo.   VaNobert Mudzikati, vanova district coach kumitambo yenhabvu yevasikana, vanoti vanofara kusimudzira vane matarenda emutambo uyu.   “Pano tine chikwata chakasimba uye tinovimba kuti tichakunda zvisinei nekuti hatina hedu kuwana nguva yakakwana yekufundira,” vanodaro.   Makwikwi emhando iyi anogaroitwa gore negore achitsigirwa neNAPH.

headline: NAAZ yotumira shangwiti kuNigeria
