text: SANGANO reNational Athletics Association of Zimbabwe (NAAZ) rinoti rakanyorera kuHurumende richikumbira mvumo kuti rigotumira shangwiti dzerelay kunokwikwidza kumujaho weMoC relays (4×100) uyo uchaitirwa kuLagos kuNigeria svondo rino.   NAAZ yakashevedzwa kumutambo uyu neThe Athletics Federation of Nigeria (AFN) uye chikwata cheZimbabwe chinofanirwa kunge chave kuNigeria musi weChishanu chino chichigadzirira mujaho uyu uchamhanywa musi weMugovera neSvondo.   Mutungamiri weNAAZ — Tendai Tagara — anoti sangano ravo richiri rakamira mhinduro kubva kuHurumende uye kunzwa kubva kuAFN nevakotsveri vemutambo uyu kuti vagotumira matikiti endege nemaVisa evamhanyi vavo vavachatumira.   “Takangomirira kunzwa kubva kuHurumende yedu kuti tozvifambisa sei parwendo urwu uye kubva kuAFN nevakotsveri vemutambo uyu vekuNigeria avo vakatidana kuti tiende kunokwikwidza. Mujaho uyu uchashanda mukurwira zvekare tikiti rekuenda kumaOlympics saka tiri kuukoshesa zvakanyanya. Kana tapihwa mvumo, chikwata chedu chinofanira kunge chave kuNigeria musi weChishanu, choswera chakazorora chiriko nekuti musi weMugovera chinenge chakatobvondoka kumujaho uhu,” anodaro Tagara.   Anoti iye zvino havasati vaziva kuti ndevapi vatambi vavachasarudza kuti vapinde muchikwata ichi sezvo vari kumbomirira mvumo yekuenda ndipo vozotanga kudoma vatambi vekutakura.   “Pari zvino hatisati tave nechikwata asi vatinogona kutumira ndevari kurwira kuenda kumaOlympics vanosanganisira Ngoni Makusha, Chengetai Mapaya, Kundai Maguranyanga, Tinotenda Matienda nevamwe vari kurwira kuenda kuIAAF World championships,” anodaro Tagara.

headline: ‘NHABVU INODA PAINE VATSIGIRI’
text: MUTAMBI wechikwata chenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors necheYeni Malatyaspor chekuTurkey, Teenage Hadebe, anoti nhabvu hainakidze kutamba munhandare isina vatsigiri.   Mwaka wenhabvu weTurkish Super Lig – uko Hadebe ari kutambira – unotarisirwa kudzoka mumasvondo ari kutevera.   Mitambo mizhinji pasi rose yambenge yakamiswa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chaurauya vanhu vakawandisa. Asi kutanga masvondo achangodarika, kune dzimwe nyika nhabvu yava kuita ichidzoka asi ichitambwa munhandare dzisina vatsigiri.   Muhurukuro dzange dzichiitwa kuTurkey, pane fungidziro huru yekuti mitambo yenhabvu yeko inogona kusimudzira musi wa12 Chikumi.   Achitaura neKwayedza ari kuTurkey, Hadebe anoti ari kufara kuti nhabvu yave kudzoka asi anoti zvikwata zvinofanirwa kugadzirisa pavanotambira kuti pange pakachena uye pakachengetedzeka panyaya dzeutano.   “Kunyangwe hangu ndiri kufara kuti tave kudzoka kuzotamba nhabvu zvekare, asi zvandaona nekudzidza zvange zvichityisa. Vanhu vari kufa kunze uko, saka tinofanirwa kunge takachengetedzeka uye takangwarira tichitevedzawo mutemo nekurudziro dzeveutano.   “Ndanga ndasuwa nhabvu yangu nekuti ndiyo inondichengeta, saka ndiri kutarisira kutamba zvakanaka zvekare,” anodaro.   Kunyangwe zvazvo achiti ari kutarisira kudzoka kwenhabvu, Hadebe anoti zvichamuremera kutamba munhandare dzisina vatsigiri sezvo iye ange ajaira kutamba pamberi pechaunga chevanhu.   “Tajaira kutamba nhandare dzakazara nevatsigiri vachitikuza. Zvino izvi zvitsva kwandiri, saka zvichandiremera nekuti vatsigiri vanotipa manyuku-nyuku ekutamba zvakanaka.   “Asi totongojaira zviripo nekuti pakupera kwezuva tinofanirwa kubata basa, uye tiine utano,” anodaro muchinda anoti kana achitamba kumashure kwechikwata chemaWarriors uyu anoita zvekusunga chishwe chaicho.   Svondo richangodarika nhabvu yakatanga kutambwa kunyika yeGermany asi munhandare dzisina vatsigiri.   Mimwe yemitemo yakaiswa mitsva ndeyekuti vatambi venhabvu havachatenderwa kukwazisana nemaoko uye kana vakanwisa, pakupembera havabvumidzwe kumbundirana.

headline: TAGADZIRIRA AFCON: DECO
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neLamontville Golden Arrows yekuSouth Africa – Danny “Deco” Phiri – anoti anoda kuita zvinorova apo vari kuenda kuEgypt kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) ayo ari kutanga masvondo maviri  anotevera.   Phiri aive muchikwata chemaWarrirors chakaenda kuAfcon kuGabon mugore ra2017 apo chairairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa asi havana kusvika kure mumutambo uyu sezvo vakaburitswa kumagroup stages ndokudzoka kumusha vasina kumbohwina kana mutambo mumwechete zvawo.   Muchikwata ichi maive nevamwe vatambi zvakare vakasarudzwa gore rino vakadai saMarvelous Nakamba, Knowledge Musona, Khama Billiat, Kudakwashe Mahachi naTeenage Hadebe.   “Aka kachange kari kechipiri kedu vamwe vatambi kudzokera kunotamba kuAfcon saka tiri kufanirwa kurakidza kuti takura uye tine zvidzidzo zvatakawana pamakwisu ekutanga ayo takaenda mugore ra2017.   “Saka gore rino tiri kufanirwa kutamba sevanhu vakurawo uye vanoziva zvavari kuita, tiri kuda kuita zvinorova,” anodaro Phiri.   Parizvino maWarriors ari kuSouth Africa uko ari kurwira kuchengetedza mukombe weCosafa Cup.   MaWarriors kana akabudirira kuhwina mukombe weCosafa svondo rino anobva apinda munhorowondo yekuhwina mukombe uyu katatu kakatevedzana.   South Africa neZambia zvakambohwinawo mukombe uyu kana, pachikwata chimwe nechimwe.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chichange zvakare chichishandisa mutambo uyu segadziriro yemakwishu eAfcon apo chichasangana nemaPharoahs ekuEgypt musi wa21 Chikumi.   Deco anoti vanozviziva kuti vatsigiri venhabvu vachange vakatarisira mutambo uyu apo vachatatsurana nevatambi veEgypt vanosanganisira Mohamed Salah.   Mugore ra2017 kuAfcon, maWarriors aive muboka reGroup D nezvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Algeria, Senegal neTunisia izvo zvaive zvizere nevatambi vepamusoro vanosanganisira Riyad Mahrez weAlgeria uyo panguva iyi aipisa zvikuru achangobva kuhwina mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kozoti vamwe vakaita saSadio Mane weLiverpool.   “Isu vamwe sekutaura kwandamboita Afcon iyi ndeyedu yechipiri, takadzidza zvakawanda kare.   “Tinoziva kuti vatambi vane mazita aya uye Afcon yadarika takasangana nevamwe vaitopisa futi.   “Saka isu sechikwata tave kuziva kuti vatambi ava tinovamaka sei uye zvii zvinodiwa kuti tibudirire patinosangana navo.   “Chedu chatinofanirwa kuita chete kutamba sechikwata.   “Isuwo muchikwata chedu varimo zvakare vatambi vane mukurumbira saka hatisi kuvhunduka, tinongofanirwa kushanda nesimba chete kuti tisvike kure,” anodaro Deco.

headline: Pivac ave panyanga
text: ndiye akasarudzwa kuti azotsive Warren Gatland semurairidzi weWales gore rinotevera pachapera mutambo weWorld Cup.   Pivac ange achiita basa rimwe chete kuScarlets kubva mugore ra2014 izvo zvakamuona achiitungamirira kuhwina mukombe weGuinness PRO12 zvikabatsira chikwata chake kupinda musemi-fainari yeChampions Cup mumwaka mumwe chete uyu.   Shasha iyi – iyo yaimbove mupurisa kunyika yake yeNew Zealand – akakunda vamwe vanoti Dave Rennie naScott Robinson kupinda pachigaro ichi icho chichazosiiwa naGatland gore rinotevera pachapera mutambo weWorld 2019 Japan. Pivac acharamba achitungamirira maScarlets kusvika kupera kwemwaka we2018-19   Achazove pasi peWRU muna Chikunguru 2019, Gatland apedza kutungamira Wales kuWorld Cup. — SportMails rugby

headline: Zim yakunda Singapore
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons nhasi chakunda Singapore ne111 runs mumutambo wacho wekutanga wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuICC Twenty20 International Series World Cup uyo watambirwa paQueens Sports Club kuBulawayo.   MaChevrons ndiwo ange atanga kutamba (bat) izvo zvamaona achiita 236 pachibuda vatambi vashanu kubva pa20 overs yazotadza kuteverwa neSingapore iyo yaita 125 pabuda vatambi vayo vanomwe.   Mutambi wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza, ndiye ahwina mubairo weMan of Match zvichitevera maruns 87 aaita kubva pamabhora 40 aasangana nawo.   Mumutambo uyu, maChevrons ari kubandana nedzimwe nyika dzisere apo zvose zviri kurwira matikiti maviri ekuenda kuICC Twenty20 International Series World Cup kuAustralia munaGumiguru.   Mutambo uyu wakaparurwa nemutungamiri wenyika, President Mnangagwa, nezuro kuQueens Sports Club, kuBulawayo.   MaChevrons ari muboka reGroup A uye nemusi weChipiri achasangana neJersey ozopedzisira neUnited States of America musi weChina.   Mune rimwe boka, kune zvikwata zvinoti Netherlands, Hong Kong, Uganda nePapua New Guinea.   Mumapoka maviri aya, muchabuda zvikwata zviviri izvo zvichatamba musemi-final uye zvinenge zvahwina ndizvo zvichabva zvawana matikiti ekuenda kuAustralia.   Fainari yemutambo uyu ichazotambwa musi weSvondo.

headline: Croatia Yotamba neFrance Kurwira Mukombe weWorld Cup
text: Croatia yapinda mufainari yayo yekutanga yeWorld Cup kubvira makundano epasi rese aya avambwa muna 1930. Vateveri vechikwata cheCroatia vari mumafaro mushure mekunge chikwata chavo chakapinda mufainari ye 2018 World Cup nezuro manheru mushure mekurova England 2-1 nechibodzwa chakakandwa na Mario Mandzukic munguva yemuwedzerwa. Croatia yakatanga yakatungamirwa ndokudzora kuita mangange 1-1 ndokuzopedzisa England apo varuzhinhi vanga vave kufunga kuti mutambo uyu uchaenda kumapenereti. Aka ndiko kekutanga Croatia ichipinda mufainari yemakundano eWorld Cup mushure mekusvika muma semi fainari muna 1998 apo yakarohwa 2-1 neFrance. VaTapiwa Mahwengwa avo vanotevera chikwata cheBarcelona vanoti zvinodakadza kuti zvikwata zvisina mukurumbira wakanyanya seCroatia zviitewo mukurumbira. Mumwe muteveri wemutambo wenhabvu, VaWalter Mombo, vanoti veruzhinji vanga vachidherera Croatia asi vasina kutarisa nhoroondo yayo mumakwikwi aya. Croatia yave kusangana mufainari ichaitirwa muLuzhiniki Stadium neSvondo neFrance, iyo yakarova Belgium mu semi final. Belgium iri kusangana neEngland neMugovera dzichirwira chinzvimbo chechitatu mumakwikwi e2018 World Cup ari kutarisirwa kupera zvine mutsindo pamutambo we Croatia neFrance neSvondo. No media source currently available

headline: Hatizivi pachadzoka nhabvu: PSL
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League (PSL) rinoti harizive kuti nhabvu yemuno ichatanga kutambwa rinhi sezvo pari zvino vari kumbotevedzera mitemo yakatarwa neHurumende yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Kubva pakambomiswa mitambo yose munyika muno muna Kurume gore radarika apo pakatanga kunyuka denda reCovid-19, hakuna kuzombobvira kwatambwa mitambo yePSL.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, chamangwiza wePSL – Kennedy ‘Kenny’ Ndebele – anoti pari zvino havasi kumbofunga pamusoro pekuti nhabvu ichadzoka rinhi sezvo nyika iri mushishi yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Tiri kutevedzera mitemo yeHurumende iri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vagare kudzimba,  takanzi tishandire kumba saka iye zvino takagara kumba uye tiri kushandira kudzimba dzedu.   “Nyika iye zvino iri palockdown, danho iro rakatorwa neHurumende kuti denda reCovid-19 risarambe richipararira. Saka isu tiri kutevedzera mutemo weHurumende.    Nguva ino, nyaya yekuchengetedza hupenyu hwevanhu yakakosha zvikuru,” anodaro Ndebele.   Kubva pakanyuka chirwere cheCovid-19 gore rapera, kune dzimwe nyika dzakadai seSouth Africa, Zambia neTanzania nhabvu yakadzoka ikatanga kutambwa munhandare dzisina vatsigiri nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri.   KuTanzania nhabvu ichiri kutambwa pamberi pevatsigiri uye nguva pfupi yadarika chikwata cheFC Platinum chakasangana necheSimba Sports Club kunyika iyi mumutambo weCAF Champions League qualifiers.   Gore radarika, zvikwata zvinokwikwidza muPSL zvakange zvambopihwa mvumo yekutanga kuita gadziriro dzazvo.   Izvi zvakaona chikwata chemaWarriors – icho pari zvino chiri kuCameroon uko chiri kukwikwidza mumutambo eCHAN – chiita gadziriro kuburikidza nekutamba mitambo yehushamwari nezvikwata zvemuno.   Mitambo iyi ndiyo yakashandiswa nemurairidzi wemaWarriors, Zdravko ‘Loga’ Logarusic, kusarudza vatambi vekuti vazopinda muchikwata chekuenda nacho kuCHAN.

headline: World Cup: Chabvondoka
text: anonzwa svondo rino kutanga musi weChina apo pasi rose richange rakatarira kunyika yeRussia uko kuri kutambirwa mutambo weFifa Wold Cup 2018.   Mutambo uyu ndiwo mukuru pasi rose wenhabvu nekudaro Kwayedza yakaita ongororo yemitambo yekutanga yezvikwata zvakasiyana izvo zviri kutamba gore rino.   Mutambo wekutanga uchaona Russia – iyo inenge iri pamusha payo – ichisangana neSaudi Arabia kunhandare yeStadion Luzhniki.   Zvikwata zviri izvi zviri muboka rine zvimwe zvinoti Egypt neUruguay asi zvose vashoma vanoona zvichisvika kure mumutambo uyu.   Musi weChishanu ndipo pachange pakabaka apo shasha dzemuEurope – Portugal – ichasangana neSpain iyo yakambohwina mukombe weWorld Cup mugore ra2010 kuSouth Africa.   Uyu mutambo uchange wakatarisirwa nevazhinji sezvo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvinogona kubuda zvose muGroup B zvofambira mberi mumakwishu aya.   Portugal ichange yakaisa tariro yayo pavatambi vanoti Cristiano Ronaldo, Bernardo Silva, Adrien Silva nevamwe. Kozoti Spain, izere nemukaka wevatambi vanosanganisira  Isco, Marco Asensio, Koke, Diego Costa naThiago Alcantara.   Musi weMugovera, Nigeria ichisangana neCroatia, maSuper Eagles chimwe chezvikwata zvakamirira Africa kumutambo uyu uye vatsigiri vazhinji vari kushuvira zvikuru kuti aiite zvinorova kuWorld Cup.   France ichisangana neAustralia neMugovera zvakare, kozoti Argentina ichitatsurana neIceland.   Kuzvikwata zviri kukwikwidza kuRussia gore rino, France neArgentina zvimwe zvine vatambi vakawanda vanotamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   France ine vatambi vanosanganisira Kylian Mbappe, Antoine Griezmann, Paul Pogba, Ousmane Dembele naNabil Fekir.   Nerumwe rutivi, Argentina ine vatambi vanoti Lionel Messi, Angel di Maria, Gergio Aguero, Gonzalo Higuain, Paulo Dybala nevamwe vakawanda.   Musi weSvondo shasha dzine mukombe weWorld Cup – Germany – ichatamba mutambo wayo wekutanga apo ichasangana neMexico kuMoscow kuStadion Luzhiniki.   Germany chimwe chezvikwata zviri kutarisirwa kuhwina mukombe uyu asi inofanirwa kutanga yabuda muboka rayo rine zvikwata zvinoti Mexico, Sweden neKorea Republic. Die Mannschaft ine vatambi vakaita saMesut Ozil, Thomas Muller naTimo Werner. Musi uyu zvakare ndiwo uchaona Brazil – iyo yakahwinha mukombe weWorld Cup yakawanda – ichitamba mutambo wayo wekutanga apo ichasangana neSwitzerland kuRostov Arena.   Makore mana adarika, Brazil yakabatiswa pasi pamusha payo apo yakakundirwa musemi-fainari neGermany nekudaro gore rino ichange ine huturu hukuru sezvo iri kuda kuhwina mukombe uyu nepainogona. Samba Boys ichange yakaisa tariro yayo pana Neymar, Gabriel Jesus naRoberto Firmino.

headline: Barcelona yotenga Martial
text: kugadzirira mari inosvika 60 miriyoni paunzi yekutenga mutambi weManchester United, Anthony Martial.   Martial zvinonzi haasi kufara kuOld Trafford uye hurukuro dzekuwedzera imwe kondirakiti yake hadzisi kufamba nekuda kwekushaya mikana yekutamba yakawanda muchikwata chaJose Mourinho. Kondirakiti yake yaanayo parizvino ichapera mugore ra2019, asi ine chimwe chibvumirano chekuti inogona kuwedzerwa rimwe gore pamusoro.   Kubva Alexis Sanchez auya kuchikwata ichi muna Ndira, Martial haasati ambonwisa, angotamba mitambo mina chete inosanganisira uyo vakakundwa neTootenham pamwe neNewcastle uye akazoburitswa angotamba maminitsi 64 chete apo vakasangana neChelsea. Martial anonzi haana kufara paakaudzwa kuti ave kuchinja nzvimbo yekutambira zvichitevera kuuya kwakaita Senchez kuchikwata ichi.   Barcelona yaida kutenga Martial mwaka uno  ndokuzosarudza kutenga Ousmane Dembele kubva kuBorrusia Dortmund, asi inogona kuzodzokera mutambi uyu panopera mwaka uno.   Barcelona ine chivimbo chekuti inogona kutenga mutambi weFrance – Antoine Griezmann – kubva kuAtletci Madrid uye inonzi iri kuongorora Ryan Sessgnon weFulham. – SportsMail Football

headline: Ndasuwa bhora: Figgy
text: MUTAMBI weMighty Warriors neBlack Rhinos Queens, Felistas Muzongondi,  anoti asuwa zvikuru mutambo wenhabvu.   Izvi zvinotevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo pasi rose nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kubvira muna Kurume gore rino.   Mitambo yakatanga kuitwa munyika muno nguva yadarika apo maWarriors akasangana neAlgeria mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations Cameroon 2021.   Mutambo uyu wakatambwa pasina vatsigiri sezvinodiwa pasi pemitemo yekurwisa Covid-19.   Figgy, sezita remadunhurirwa raMuzongondi, anoti akaita rombo rakanaka rekupinda basa kuZimbabwe National Army (ZNA) pamwe nekuve mutambi wenhabvu.   Muzongondi anoti kuva nerimwe basa kuri kumubatsira zvikuru sezvo ange achikwanisa kuwana raramo panguva yelockdown asi asuwa nhabvu unove mutambo waanodisisa.   “Kubva nyika yakaenda palockdown tange tichienda kumabasa, ndizvo zvange zvichitiraramisa muhupenyu hwedu nemhuri dzedu. Semutambi wenhabvu wemuZimbabwe zvakakosha chaizvo kuita rimwe basa uye mamwe mabhindauko anounza mari nekuti anokubatsira muhupenyu hwako pane dzimwe dzenguva. Kana usina zvimwe zvekuita ndipo paye zvinhu zvinooma,” anodaro.   Muzongondi anoenderera mberi achiti, “Chokwadi ndechekuti nhabvu ndaisuwa zvikuru, ndinonzwa manyukunyuku ndichitamba ndiri munhandare asi iye zvino chakakosha hupenyu hwevanhu uye hwedu tose pamberi.”   Figgy achagara ari munhorowondo yenhabvu yemaMighty Warriors sezvo ndiye ane chiremerera chekuva kaputeni wekutanga wechikwata chenyika kuchitungamirira kuenda kumakwikwi eRio de Janeiro Brazil 2016 Olympics.   Pari zvino zvikwata zvizhinji zvevarume zvakapihwa mvumo yekutanga kuita gadziriro dzavo asi hunge kana vatambi vacho uye hutungamiri hwaongororwa denda reCovid-19.

headline: Fury otatsurana naWilder
text: anoti vakanyorerana pasi chibvumirano nevamiriri vaDeontay Wilder kuti vaviri ava vagorwe mumutambo weheavyweight muna Zvita kuLAs Vegas.   Puromota wemutambi uyu, Frank Warren, uyo anozivikanwa saGypsy King akataura svondo rino kuti mapoka maviri aya ange ari muhurukuro uye Fury ane chivimbo chekuti mutambo uyu uchabvumidzwa kuti uenderere mberi asi hunge kana akahwina mutambo wake wechipiri apo achasangana naFrancesco Pianeta mwedzi uno.   “Zvave kuitika manje, hunge ndikakunda Pienata,” Fury akaudza Behind The Gloves.

headline: Garai kumba:ZIFA
text: MANEJA wechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors — Wellington Mpandare — oyambira vatsigiri vangade kuenda kunoona mutambo weZimbabwe neAlgeria uyo uchatambirwa muno nemusi weMuvhuro unotevera wekurwira kuenda kumutambo we2021 Africa Cup of Nations kuti vasaende kunhandare asi kuti vaone mutambo uyu vari kudzimba dzavo.   MaWarriors nemaDesert Foxes ekuAlgeria, iyo ine vatambi vane mukurumbira vakaita saRiyad Mahrez anotambira Manchester City yekuEngland naIsmael Bennacer weAC Milan (Italy), vari kusangana mumitambo miviri yemuboka ravo reGroup H.   Mutambo wekutanga uriko husiku hwemusi weChina chino kuAlgeria uye wechipiri uchange uri muno kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium nemusi weMuvhuro unotevera.   Boka iri rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Botswana neZambia.   Mitambo miviri yevakomana vaZdravko Logarusic, murairidzi wemaWarriors, neAlgeria yakakosha zvikuru uye vanofanirwa kutora zvibodzwa zvose kuti vaende pamusoro muboka ravo iri vagowana mukana wekuenda kumakwikwi e2021 Africa Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon.   Mutambo wemaWarriors wemusi weMuvhuro uchange uri wekutanga kutambirwa munyika muno kubva pakamiswa mitambo pasi rose nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, maWarriors asati asimuka akananga kuAlgeria, Mpandare anoti vatsigiri venhabvu havasi kutenderwa kunhandare kuchange kuchitambwa mutambo uyu muno.   “Vatsigiri venhabvu havasi kutenderwa kunhandare saka ngavagare kudzimba dzavo. Nemusi weMuvhuro patiri kusangana neAlgeria muno hakuna ari kutenderwa kuuya kuzoona nhabvu, mutambo uyu uchatambwa pasina vatsigiri.   “Isu tiri kutevedzera matanho akatorwa neHurumende, hatidi kuisa utano hwevatambi vedu nehweruzhinji panjodzi saka vanhu ngavagare kudzimba dzavo,” anodaro Mpandare.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Ngatisazoti hatina kupa yambiro, kuchange kune vemitemo vachichengetedza vachiona kuti hapana ari kupinda munhandare.”   Zvakadaro, sangano revatsigiri vemaWarriors reFriends of the Warriors rinoti riri kuronga nzvimbo dzichaonerwa bhora nevatsigiri nemusi weMuvhuro.   Mutungamiri wesangano iri — Edward Chimedza — anoti sezvo kunhandare kusiri kutenderwa kuti vanhu vapinde, sevatsigiri vari kutsvaga nzvimbo dzichaungana vanhu  vasingadarike 100 kuitira kuti vakwanise kuona mutambo uyu pamaterevhizheni.   “Isu tinoziva kukosha kwemitambo miviri iyi saka tiri kuitawo zvatinokwanisa kuti titsigire chikwata chedu. Tichaungana sevatsigiri kunzvimbo dzakasiyana uko tinenge tichitevedzera hedu mitemo yese yesocial-distancing kuti vanhu vasaite chitsoko-tsoko.   “Saka tine nzvimbo dzakawanda dzatichange tichishanda nadzo. Vakomana vedu vanofanira kuziva kuti tinavo uye tiri kuvatsigira, ivo ngavabate basa sebasa,” anodaro Chimedza.   Mumitambo mina yakapedzisira kusangana zvikwata zviviri izvi, maWarriors haasati ambokundwa neAlgeria.   Zvikwata izvi zvakaita mangange katatu uye maWarriors akahwina mumwe mutambo wacho.
